❧heir beginnis hystory croniklis scotland ¶the excusation prentar ingyne man inclinatioun sindry wyse geuin se sum men ar geuin detractioun inuy displeseir malancolie thair nychbouris he cherite sum ar nobill full gentilnes thay luf thing bot ioy merynes ¶sum ar vndir sum maid vp nocht sum men luffis peace sum desitis weir sum blyth mery thocht curis nocht may perseueir grace fauour lady deir sum boldin othir maist cruell feid lance dagar rynnis deid ☞ ane he mycht ane hundreth weil sustene leiffis wo pennance table gud fallois comptis nocht ane bene wrechit mynd insaciable heuin hell wer thing bot ane fable bir • ay sycht gud euil rynnis baggis deuil ¶and prentar doi considir weil thir sindry myndis men thair leuing desiris nocht bot laubour leil mycht leif iust wynnyng mycht first pleis god syne noble kyng ȝe reders bousum attent wer laubour besynes content wark haue heir assailȝeit bring lycht maist humely exhort ȝow nobill reders quhare haue failȝeit letter sillabe poyntis lang schort ȝe ȝour gentrice support tak sentence best wyse ȝe may sall better god ane othir day ¶finis ☞ contentis buke first proheme apon cosmographie schawand ye fyne vicius virtewis leiffing causis quhy translatoure tuke werk hand ¶the discriptioun scotlād deuidit rubrikis cheptouris ¶ane compendious narratioun auld institutionis maneris leuing scottis ane morall doctryne deploring sindry recent euill conswetudis brocht realme gret difformite pepill present samyn ¶ane schort recapitulation kyngis britane fra first beginning thairof empire kyng hary viii regnand gret felicite aboue inglismen ¶the table ye historie contenand euery buke cheptour craftely seuerit thaym self ¶the name kyngis gouernouris scotland sen realme began schawing quhat bukis cheptouris historie followyng thair lyuis marciall dedis salbe esalie foundin ¶the proheme apon historie schawand breiffelie contentis maist notable thingis buke ¶the beginnyng scottis quhy thay wer callit name thair happy cumyng egipt spanȝe ireland ilis albion regioun wes callit thaym scotland ¶the vailȝeant weirlie dedis kyngis princis gouernouris chiftanis scotland maist dangerus terribil battallis fochtin sindry chancis fortoun aganis ye britonis pichtis saxonis inglismen dauis ¶the beginning pychtis thair confideratioun scottis amite blud freindschip thair weris lang continewing aganis ye romani support scottis thair exterminioun finall expulsioun albion weris scottis ¶the beginning britonis thair lang weris perseueryng aganis ye romani yai wer subdewit thair realme maid tributar forme prouince finalie doung britane walis weris saxonis ¶the cumyng saxonis britane thair weris slychtis marciall dedis wrocht sindry chancis aganis britonis scottis pichtis ¶the weris inglismen eftir cumyng saxonis ¶mony vncouth meruellis wounderfull thingis schawin ay samyn season thay fell name maist notable clerkis sanctis leuand tyme warld ¶mony graue concionis orisonis consultationis epistillis contenand rycht fructuus morall doctrinis sa resolute degest response na othir buke salbe foundin mair proffitable plesand reders ¶ane epistill direckit translatoure ye kyngis grace ye letter end buke inducyng hienes frequent reding ye historie precedent ¶finis ☞ followis proheme apon cosmographie quhen siluir diane ful bemis brycht fra dirk eclips wes past yi othir nycht ye crab hir ꝓpir mansion gane artophilax contending mycht gret eist set visage rycht mene ledar charle wane aboue heid wes vrsis twane quhen sterris small obscuris sycht lucifer left twinkland hym allane ☞ frosty nycht hir prolixit houri hir mantill quhit spred tender flouris quhen ardent lauboure he addressit translait story progenitouris thair gret manheid hie wisdome honouris quhen may cleir ane mirroure se furius end sum tyme tirannye sum tyme glore prudent gouernouris ilk stait apprisit thair faculte ¶my wery spreit desyring repres emptiue pen frutles besynes awalkit furth tak recent ayre quhen priapus stormy weid oppres raqu • istit • maist tendernes rest ane quhile amyd gardingis bare bot maner couth mynd prepare set asyde vnplesand heuynes comtemplyng solitare ¶and fyrst occurrit remembring wes seruice kyng put grace ȝeris tenderest clerk comptis youcht wes inding hart hand euery othir thing mycht hym pleis ony maner best quhill hie inuy seruice kest thaym court gouerning bird plume heryit nest ¶our lyfe giding auenturis dependis thir heuinlie creaturis apperandlie sum necessite youcht ane man wald set besy cutis far laboure wisdome furis fle hard chance infortunite youcht eschew difficulte cursit weird ȝit ithandlie enduris geuin hym first natiuite ☞ erdlie stait beualing thus chance fortoun gud na esperance lang swomit hir seis deip sad auising hir thochtfull lance couth fynd na port ankir hir firmance quhill morpheus dery god sleip reuth curis weip set sleuth deidly contenance snorand vanis throw body creip▪ ¶me thocht wes ane plesand meid quhare flora maid tender blewmys spreid throw kyndlie dew humouris nutratiue quhen goldin titan flāmis reid aboue seis rasit vp heid diffounding doun heit restoratiue euery frute nature maid liue quhilk wes afore wynter deid stormys cald frostis penitriue ¶ane siluer fontane sprang watter cleir place quhare approchit neir quhare sone espy ane fellown reird courtly gallandis thair best maneir reiosyng thaym season ȝeir bene mayis day feird thair gudlie hauing maid nocht affeird thaym saw ane crownit kyng appeir tendir downis rising beird ¶thir courtlie gallandis settand thair intentis sing play diuers instrumentis according princis appetit two plesand ladyis come pransand ouir bentis thair costlie clethin schew thair mychty rentis quhat hart mycht wi thay wantit noch • ane myt rubeis schone apon • thair fingaris quhit finalie knew thair consentis ane virtew othir hecht delite ¶thir goddess arrayit wyse reuerence honoure list deuise afore prince fell doun apon thair kneis syne dressit thaym thair best auyse far wisdome thair power lyis thyng mycht hym best appleis quhare reiosit heuinly gleis hym desyrit hie empryis ane thaym two vnto lady cheis ☞ first delite vnto prince said thus▪ maist vailȝeant knycht dedis amorus lustiest euir nature wrocht quhilk floure ȝouth mellifluus notis sweit sang melodius awalkis heir amang flouris soft thow he game bot thy mery thocht heuinlye blis delicius welth erd aualis nocht ¶youcht thow france italie also spaine ingland pole othir realmes mo youcht thow mycht regne stait maist glorius thy pissant kyngdome nocht worth ane stro gyf vnto thy pleseir ane fo truble thy mynd curis dolorus thair na thing may odius man leif miserie wo defraudand god nature genius ¶dres thairfore thy besy cure thow ioy pleseir may indure sycht thir four bodyis elementar two heuy grosse two ar lycht pure thir elementis wirkyng nature douth change othir youcht rycht far fra othir seuerit qualiteis contrar thaym ar maid leuand creature finalie thaym resoluit ar ¶the fyre aire aire watter cleir erd watter turnis without weir erd watter turnis ouir agane furth ordour na thing consumis heir ane man new borne beginnis appeir othir figure afore wes tane quhen deid mateir doi remane youcht resolue sum new maneir thing new nocht bot forme gane ¶thus thing erd bot fugitiue passand cumand spreiding successiue ane beist ane man consaue seid infuse membris genitiue furth tyme pleseir doi ouir driue chance hym ledis quhill laid graue thairfore thy heuyn pleseir ressaue quhill thow art heir present liue eftir deith thow sall na plesier haue ¶the rose lyllyis violet unpullit sone ar wynd ouiese • fallis doun ony frut wi thairfore say sen thing may let bot thy brycht hew mon ȝeris fret▪ euery thing bot ane season thow may nocht haue ane excellent blis ly nycht myn army plet hals brais mony lusty ky ¶and haue tender body thy side propir fet quhilk nature he prouide euery pleseir thow may deuyne ay quhill tender ȝeris ouir slide gif pleis thy brydill gyde thow mon way fra agit men declyne syne dres thy hart thy curage ingyne suffir nane thy hous abide bot gyf thay vnto thy lust inclyne ¶gyf thow desyris seis fleit heuinlie blys thy lady treit said clerkis renoun thair na pleseir eird gret quhen ane luffar doi lady meit quikin lyfe mony deidly swon hiest pleseir comparison sall gyf thy ȝeris swete ane lusty halk mony plumys broun ¶quhilk salbe found ioyus plesant gyf thow vnto hir mery flychtis hant euery blys may erd appeir hart wyll think thow sall plente want quhill ȝeris swift quhelis properant consume thy strenth thy bewte cleir quhen delyte said maneir rage ȝoutheid thocht maist releuant uirtew said ȝe sall eftir heir ¶my landis braid mony plentuus schyre sall gif thy hienes gyf thow list desyre triumphant glore hie honoure fame deuyne sic pissance thaym na furius ire werand age flame birnand fyre bitter deith may bring vnto rewyne bot thow mon first insuf • er mekill pyne aboue thy self thow may haue empyre sall thy fame honoure haue na fyne ¶my realme set amang fois quhilkis he ane weir continewall euir still doi bordour ly youcht thay may wayis ouir thrall thay ly wait gif ony chance may fall sum tyme get victory thus lyfe ane ithand cheualry laubour haldis strang ony wall thing brekis bot slogardy ¶na fortoun may aganis auaill youcht scho cludy stormis assaill brek streme scharp aduersite weddir louin maist tempestius haill ony dreid beir ane equall saill schip strang may neuir de wit reason manheid gouernis hie influence sterris may preuaill regne infortunite ¶the rage ȝoutheid may nocht dantit gret distres scharp aduersite reason experience finest gold siluer se may nocht wrocht vtilite flāmis kene bitter violence distres intelligence quhay salis lang hie prosperite ar sone ouitset stormy violence ¶this fragill lyfe moment induring dout sall euery peple bring sickir blis eternall wo gyf thow honest lauboure doi ane thing thy panefull laubour sall vane tarying howbeit thy honest werkis nocht gyf thow lust doi ony thing also schamefull deid without disseuering remanis ay quhen pleseir ago ¶as caruell tycht fast tending throw see leuys na prent amang wallis hie birdis swift mony besy plume peirsis aire wait nocht quhare thay fle siclik lyfe without actiuite gyffis na frut howbeit ane schado blume quhay doi thair lyfe e • consume without virtew thair fame memorie sall vanis sone • • eky • inne ☞ watter purgis makis bodyis fair fire nature ascendis aire purifyis heitis vehement floure doi smell frute nurisare precius balme reuertis thingis sare makis thaym rot impacient spice maist swete ro maist redolent stern day mouing circulare chasis nycht bemis resplendent ¶siclik werk perfitis euery wycht feruent luf maist excellent lycht makis man erd peir doi saule fra corruptioun dycht odoure dulce makis brycht diane full ȝit appollo cleir syne rasis vnto hiest speir immortaly schyne goddis sycht chosin spous creature deir ¶this othir wenche clepit delite inuoluis man sensuall appetite euery kynd vice miserie becaus na wit reason perfite quhare seho gyde bot skaithis infinite doloure schame vrgent powerte scho wes get frothis see quhilk signifies hir pleseir vennomit mydlit ay scharp aduersite ¶duke hanniball mony authouris wrait throw spanȝe come mony passage strait italy furour bellicall brak doun wallis montanis slait army maid ane oppin gait victoryis romani capua pleseir sensuall duk wes maid soft deligait fois wes sone ouir thrall ¶of feirs achill weirlie dedis sprang troy grece quhill virtew rang lust hym slew bot reuth heir siclik troianis thair knychtis strang vailȝeant grekis fra thair roumes dang uictoriuslie exercit mony ȝeir nycht thay went thair lust pleseir fatall hors throw thair wallis fang quhais prignant sidis wer full men weir ¶satdanapall prince effeminat fra knychtlie dedis wes degenerat twinand thredis purpur lynt fingaris soft amang ladyis sat lust couth nocht saciat quhill fois come bitter dynt quhat nobill men ladyis he bene tynt quhen thay lustis wer intoxicat schaw lenth toung suld neuir stynt ¶thairfore camil vailȝeant cheualeir quhen gallis dantit weir heritable landis wald haue na recompence gyf barnis freindis deir wer virtewis thay couth nocht fall ilk ȝeir haue yneuch romane prouidence gif thay wer geuin vice insolence wes nocht neidfull conques geir occasioun thair incontinence ¶sum nobill men poetis list declare werdeifeitsum goddis aire sum heuin eolus uulcan saturn mercury appollo iupitare mar hercules othir men preclare glore immortall thair lyuis wan quhy wer thir peple callit goddis becaus thay ane virtew singulare excel •• nt hie aboue ingyne man ¶and otheris ar reik sulphurius ixion wery sisiphus eumenides furyis rycht odibill proud giandis thristy tantalus huglie drink fude vennomus quhare flāmis bald mirknes ar sensibill quhy ar thir folk panis terribill becaus thay wer bot schrewis vicius thair lyfe dedis horribill ¶and youcht na frute wer eftir consequent mortall lyfe bot warld present ilk man haue allanerlie respect ȝit virtew suld fra vice different quik fra deid riche fr • indigent ane glore honour ay direct othir saule body neclect ane reason intelligent othir beistis following affect ☞for nold aganis lustis striue bot leiffis beist knawlege sensitiue eildis richt fast deith hym sone ouir halis thairfore mule ane langar liue stomt hors also barant wiue apperis ȝoung quhen brudie falis se also quhen nature nocht preualis pane dolour ar sa pungitiue medicine pacient aualis ¶sen thow he hard baith intentis thus cheis w two maist delitius first sustene ane scharp aduersite danting rage ȝoutheid furius fyne posseid triumphe innumerus lang empire hie felicite haif ane moment sensualite fuliche ȝouth lyfe voluptuous thy dayis full miserie ¶be phebus firy cart dyd wry fra south west declinand besaly dip steidis occeane quhen began oui • sile visage dry vapou • thik cloudis full sky notus brym wynd metidiane wyngis donk penni full rane awalkenit mycht nocht aspy quhilk thaym two lady tane ¶bot sone knew thay war goddess come sleip vailȝeant hercules quhen ȝoung fre euery lore lust honour pouerte rich quhen contempnit lust ydilnes▪ virtew micht life decore werkis maist excellent glore incressit panefull besines hie triumphe louyng ¶than throw morall eruditioun quhilk come said visioun tuke purpos forthir went wryte story regioun dedis mony illuster campioun youcht pane apperis vehement make story redaris patent wyll begyn discriptioun albion maner subsequent ¶finis ☞heir begynnis cosmographe discription albion ☞¶hovv thyngis sub devvit alteratioun deith na thyng permanent erd ca primo traist nane he sa dirk intelligence bot knawis cosmographye maist necessar knawlege hystoryis ȝit dis • riue samyn office na smal ingyne attoure auctouris yt he wryttyn apon discription warld ar patent knawin ilk regioun pepyll amang quhome he bene mony crafty resolut men schawing mony gret thyngis aboue ingine men ꝓfound sentence▪ samyn na thing different fra verite discription mony vncouth diuers thingis succeding contynewally gret cōmodite pleseir reders ȝit sen mater thay treit solide permanent samyn forme ymage first found apperis baith vnletterit pepil vtheris quhilkꝭ he na sicht continewal alteration materis ye verite schawin thaym al partis sen thyngis quhilkis ar comprehendit within speir mone ar sa thirlit deith alteration ye 〈◊〉 othir consumit afore w elli afore yame apperis na thing mair corruptible ȝit mair alteratioun erd situatioun thairof •• u changis sa mony figuris lang age proces ȝeris nocht 〈◊〉 may se presently ene bot fyndis mony crafty profound 〈◊〉 quhare sum tyme bene maist notable cietes maist plen ••• u lesuris medois throw erd quaik trymblyng elli continewall inundation watteris nocht remanis bot othir huge seys elli • nproffitable ground sandis attoure y• see alluu • oun pres rage •• • er cumys sum landis gangis furth vtheris dayly occurris experience baith seys watteris geuis iniust merchis al mekle sum landis thay reif fra vtheris heirfore beleif syndry chance lang proces tyme yt euery thyng sall respondent samyn perfection knawlege discriuit • e auld cosmographouris figure situation erd thairfore na man suld haue admiration howbeit recent ••• houri discriue ye warld sum vthir figure sort he bene discriuit afore pompouiꝰ mela ptholome othir auld cosmographouris erd mair frequent pepyl thā thay dayis passage al cuntreis mair knawin throw quhilk situation regionis exact scharp deligence authouris mair patent artoure gif thir auld cosmographouris war bot men ar followis na admiration howbeit thay na sicker cognosance ful erudition al thingis yat caus thay mycht wryt forthir thay saw thair win inquisition elli experience vtheris authourꝭ past afore yame thir reasonis think lytyl wrang sum tymes nocht follow al thair opinionis thay knawlege experience materis thairfore dar mair baldly wryt sū thingꝭ ye cōmon proffet specially cōcernyng ye fygure situation scotland maneris pepyll thairof sū vthir sort he bene schawin afore vthir authouris haue onely sene samyn bot he knawlege thairof lang experience vse throw quhilk yi quhat sumeuir werk sal vnprofitabyl ȝit vnplesand ye reders sawe schawin maneris conditioun pepill scotland situation thairof attoure mak ye reders bowsum attent pro mit faithfullie writ na thing werk bot allanerlie sik thing bene maist patent knawin w othir awin exact deligence industrye elli rehers otheris rycht trew faithful auctouris thairfore gyf werk found plesand reders sall writ sum othir tym mair largelie othir materis batth thair eruditioun pleseir ☞ discriptioun albion quhy vves callit vvith name beginning britonis scottis ca ii hail ile albion quhilk contenis baith realmes ingland scotland discriuit ye latyne greik cosmographouris enueronyd euery syde gret occeane hauand eist syde almane seis south syde franche britane seis west syde ireland seis north syde norroway seis yi ile extendit lang passage fra southsoutheist northnorwest mair extendit lenth breid nocht far differēt fra figure ane triangle ile auld cosmographouris wes callit albion remanis ȝit vndir samyn name sum auctouris sayis ile wes callit albion ab albis montibus say fra quhit montanis thairof full calk utheris allegis wes callit albion fra ane lady namit al • yne quhilk history nocht vnlik fabulis ar writin l vouchteris danau kyng argiues yi albyne allegit wt hir l sisteris eftir thay slane al thair husbandis pullit vp salis come grece throw seis hercules spanȝe fra spanȝe come throw ye franche almane seis ony impediment ye said ile eftir hir arriuing samyn namyt albion fra hir name yi albyne hir l systeris eftir thair cumyng said ile conuersit deuillis forme men consauit childrin naturall cōmixtion thir childrin increscit sa huge stature pissance thay wer callit ye peple giandis inhabit said regioun continewallie tyme brutus first beginner britonis brutus wes nepot elli pronepot gret troiane eneas becaus wes exilit banist slauchter othir gret offencis done hym italie wes constranit depart ye residew troianis fallois • erche sum new dwellyng eftir lang trauell tempestiꝰ storme seis arriuit albion fra beginnyng warld iiiimxxvii ȝeris brutus fallowis eftir thair cumyng albioun inuadit giandis afore rehersit sindry chancis battall finalie brocht thaym sa hie rewyne baith yair landis guddis fell pray brutus fallowis sa ye cuntre wes callit britane ye pepill britonis bot beginnyng scottis wes ane vthir maner writtin anciant historiographouris gathelus ane rycht illuster vailȝeant knycht discending lang progressioun lynage ye blud riall grece marijt scota douchter kyng pharo egipt youcht mony riche landis fell hym gret honouris singulare manheid ye realme egipt ȝit wes astonist mony terrible greuus plagis appering prophecy moyses plane euersioun realme peple egipt thoucht na thing sa gud proffitable maist remote distāt thairfra gathelus mouit thir causis come furth ye mouth nyle wyfe freindis seruandis grekis egiptianis throw seis mediterrane finalie brokin lang incredible danger vncouth chancis arriuit north part spanȝe conques beneuolence wyfe namit pepill scottis eftir hir name yair vulgar laūgage wes callit gathelik gathelus eftir hꝭ cumyng spanȝe send ane band weirmen ireland quhilkis singulare manheid prudence dantit pepill thairof thay gat hail empire said ile • ang mony ȝeris eftir gret honoure glore army ☞¶hovv scottis pich • come albioun thair syndry lynnage maneris hovv said ile vvas inhabit thre syndry pepyll ca iii nothesay ane kyngis sonnis ireland come schort ȝeris eftir ane cumpany ȝoung hardy pepill ilis albion becaus fand samyn waist nocht inhabit yan ony empire britonis sat doun remanent fallowis wiffis barnis ye said ilis namit thaym hebredes fra name hibernia elli fra name hiber first son gathelus yi rothesay come sone eft freindis said ilis albion sa mekil gat possessioun 〈◊〉 callit scotland day scottis come first albion wes fra beginning warld iiiimvicxvii ȝeris mony ȝeris eft thair cummyng albion thay wer callit realbi • say kyngis albioun mak thaym sum thing different fra remanent kyngis inhabit ye said land eftir afore thair cumyng forthir youcht scottis thair singulare manheid prudence rang continewallie ony interruption baith spanȝe ireland ȝit thair name perist yai partis othir yair cō mixtion vncouth blud elli roust lang proces ȝeris throw quhilk remanis na scottis memory bot thay inhabitis last boundis albion attoure spanȝeartis dwellis ȝit ye montanis vthir desertis spanȝe knawis na thyng romane weris ar lityll different fra ireland men baith thair maneris habit langage ye britonis becaus thay wer mony ȝeris afore w albioun occupyis ye south maist plentuus boundis thairof inhabit north partis full montanis quhilk ar nocht sa fertill cōmodius said landis occupiit britonis eftir cumyng scottis britonis maner albioun ane vncouth peple namit pychtis vthirwayis namit agathirsanis quhilkis wer banist sarmathia come denmark quhair thay sone eftir gat schippis prouisioun efferyng thairto eftir thair finall arriuyng albioun thay sat doun waist myddil boundis betuix britonis scottis maid wyd marchis betuix baith thair realmes cumyng pychtis albioun wes eftir cumyng scottis samyn iicl ȝeris ȝit amang sum authouris rysis ane fuliche dout quhidd scottis pychtis come first regioun sum thir authouris al legis rewther wes first beginnar scottis albioun bot opinioun far different fra treuth historie fyue scottis kingis rang continewallie ilk ane succeding vthis afore rewther apperis • leirke historie following sa ile albioun wes inhabit fra beginning thairof thre sindry pepill say britonis scottis pichtis first part ile becaus wes inhabit brutus posterite wes namit britane secound myd part becaus wes inhabit pichtis wes namit penthland remanent boūdis thairof wer inhabit scottis namyt scotland ȝit romane historicianis ptolome quhē yai treit ony thing cōcernyng ile albioun callit ye hail ile britane peple thairof britonis thir thre peple namit vnder ane name albianis inhabit ye said ile ȝit romani partis quhare thay come within ile namit peple thairof sindry name thay namit men walis tegenianis fra tegenia ye men angus horrestianis fra horrestia ye men cauder callender wod calidonianis fra calidonia ye men galloway brigandis fra brigantia apperis cornelius tacitus quhilk writis beȝound ye britonis dwellis allbion ye gret north two peple richt different fra vther maneris nature yat ane yair ȝallo hair callit pichtis discendyng albianis vthir thair blak curland hair callit scottis na thyng different fra spanȝcartis nature conditionis yi ile dayis inhabit allanerlie two peple inglismen scottis ye south partis ar inhabit inglismen north part scottis haue schawin causis quhy britonis wer callit name maner thair cummyng albioun sall schaw end cosmographie quhat peple realme britane he bene inhabit continewallie vnto tyme kyng hary ye viii regnand gret felicite aboue inglismen ¶the boundis albioun vvith sindry cōmoditeis thairof generall gret infirmiteis fallis peple thairof thair intemperance ye religion vsit thaym auld tymes ca iiii ile albioun contenis hail circumference compas circular two thowsand mylis hauand lenth viic mylis breid iiicl mylis apperis weill fu • thairof fornence franche seis fra fute thairof procedis ay small quhill come ye vter marchis last boundis baith ingland scotland betuix mule galloway fornence ireland seis sanct ebbis heid fornence almane seis ar skars ane hundreth lx mylis breid frathens gaderis ay mair small quhill cumyn last boundis thairof quhare he skarslie xxx mylis breid ane rycht profitable ile full peple nocht onlie rycht plentuus store bestiall • ot kynd cornys euery boundis thairof saiffing allanerlie thay boundis quhair god singulare gudnes he ordanit maist ryche mynis gold siluer tynne bra copper quik siluir sic fouth aboundance metallis samyn ar nocht onlie sufficient maner necessaris peple said ile bot ar sufficient vthir oure nychtbouris dwellis w gyf peple perfite craft industrye wyn samyn bot superflew aboundance vthir thyngis necessar vse man quhilk nature he producit oure regioun makis peple le industrius crafty delyi • ng ay mair sleuth ony exercitioun besyde gret fouth gers cornis bestiall landis besyde gret aboundance fowlis air sa gret plente fische partis feis specially towart north ye samyn sufficiēt yneuch nuris peple howbeit thair wer na frutis growand oure land apperis experience landis yat lyis w france flanderis zeland holland mekill almany cumys sindry flotis sekand fische ȝeirlie seis nocht allanerlie thair prudent industry wynnis fische sufficient sustene thaym self bot generall marchandyce yir fische thay sustene peple vthir cuntreis passand tyme lentroun throw ye seis mediterrane ay selland thair fische yair gret proffet winning mony vthir riche precius thingis ar gottin ye said ile▪ haldin gret delit ye eist peple warld quhat may said wol quhilk sa quhit small samyn desyrit peple cof • gret price speciallie marchandis quhair best knawn woll maid fyne skarlettis mony vthir granit deligat clathis heirfore dar baldlie affirme gif albianis sic grace yai mycht leif concord amang thaym self gif thair realmes ony honest way mycht cum vnder empire senȝorie ane kyng thay mycht nocht allanerlie haif necessaris within thaym self vncoft bot small difficultie mycht dant nychtbouris cuntreis lyand thaym quhen ony externe h •• outh weris hapnit inuaid thaym thay haue sa elegant stature sa fair lusty bodyis na vthir peple may preferrit thaym thay ar rycht ingenius abill al weil letteris vthir virtewis corporall exercitioun handis rycht hardy reddy ieoperdyis baith weir peace sic maner na thyng may difficill thaym • thay leiffit temperatlie thairfore prouident beginnar ye warld he nocht gret resoun maid thair region nakit bair wynis knawing eterne wisdome wynis howbeit samyn ar rycht necessar vthir peple ar rycht skaithfull nature albianis thay ar geuin sic vnnaturall voracite desire vncouth metis drinkis thay nocht refrene thaym self fra immoderat excesse apperis weill experience throw thair crapulus schamfull glutone thay ar strikin oftymes sa dangerus irremediable infirmiteis▪ howbeit thow wer accumpanyt thaym thair tender age thow sall fynd thaym throw thair intemperance surfet di • sa fowsumlie growin thair myd latter age thay sall appeir al vncouth thy sycht thow neuir knawin thaym yair tender age quhairthrow thay sal appeir erar misfassonyt monstouris ony naturall peple sindry thaym throw surfet diet growis furius thair latter age mony sorowfull maledeis following thaym ye prouerbe sayis sendyll ar men gret glutonie sene haue lang dayis agit proces ȝeris becaus thair excessiue intemperat diet consumys al substanciall humouris thair bodyis bot wil return purpos albianis writis cesar cōmentaris cornelius tacitus wer rycht religious eftir ryte wes thay dayis thay dayis wer ye preistis britane namyt driades rycht expert baith naturall morall philosophie thair doctrine come first sculis thair sect opinion france principall • ct thir preisti • wes ile man quhilk w • tyme spectacle fontane honest •• uditioun letteris fra thir preistis • ani profest catholik faith thay presen • • gret constance ony spot • • ☞the discriptioun est vvest myddyll bordouris scotland vvith maist notable tovvnis fludi • thairof ca v pichtis sum tyme principall maist plenteus boundis al y• landis ar vnder empire scottis eftir thay rougin samyn imicli ȝeris vnder ane blude amyte • freindschip scottis concurrand thaym equalie euery danger ieoperde battall aganis romani britonis sū tymes fechtand aganis scottis thair awin confiderat freindis vnprudence ȝoung suspect personis quhil last outragius exorb • tant haytrent rais sic slauchter murdir sidis thay werbrocht vter rewyne doung albion wer • scottis yocht scottis he bene oftymes brokin maist terrible dangerus wer • mony scharp ennymes ȝit diuyne beneuolence thay fluris hail vnto thir dayis he dantit al yair ennymes thir cōmodites quhilkis ar schawin generalie albion ar patent mony vthir singulare prerogatiuis speciallie amang scottis hieland peple thairof he na repair marchandis vncouth realmes becaus thay ar nocht corruppit myngit vncouth blude thay ar ye strang rude may suffir mair hungir walking distres ony vthir peple albion maist hardy ieoperdyis rycht agill deliuer bodyis rycht ingenius euery new inuentioun maist sychty rea • cheualrie kepi thair faith promes maist seuerite constance scotland he mers quhilk wes sum tyme maist plenteus regioun pichtis thair march • fornence almane seis regioun sa lang wes inhabit pichtꝭ wes nami • deere eftir expulsioun pychtis wes namit y• mers▪ say marchis scottis eftir expulsioun pichtis eki • thair marchis tweid quhilk deuides northumbirland fra ye mers tothir syde sindry small burnis discendis fra hillis cheuiot vthir moutanis lyand thair deuiding cumbir fra annar • ail fallis watter sulway▪ yi watter sulway rynnis ye ireland seis marche scotland fornence west 〈…〉 hillis cheuiot abhorrit nocht eit flesche •• lden prisoneris wyuis v • slay thair husbandis quhen yai wer found cowartꝭ discomfist thair ennymes gif▪ occasioun otheris bald hard • quhen danger occurrit quhill last thay wer •• alie distroyit weris romani west borduris gret north lyis nidisdail namit fra water nith begynnis ane narow ane strait • al • ▪ incressis mair braid quhair lyis middil marchis scotland n • sum men haldis brigance wes samyn regioun ingland callit walis quhai • britonis leiffi • mony • eris eftir thay wer doūg britane bot opinion bane ye romane auctouris sayis yle man lyis fornence brigance myd passage betuix ireland ȝit apperis experience howbeit brayis alluuioun flux seis ar worne mair distan • fra vthir thay wer afore ȝit samyn latitude eleuatioun • pole ptolome assignis brigance correspondis weil eleuatioun pole aboue galloway quhilk distant seuerit lang iurnay fra walis ye ile man lyis thre hundreth mylis fra walis ye sycht galloway •• oure • estimoniall sindry auctouris say brigance ye toun spanȝe quhilk namit compostella come ane new cumpany peple ireland wer namit spanȝeartis ireland come ane gret cumpany pepill king fergus albioun remembrance ciete brigance quhilk wes sum tyme thaym inhabit spanȝe ya • war callit brigandis opinioun applaudis cornelius tacitus saying brigandis wer discendi • spanȝeartis dwellis remot last boundi • britane callis britane hail ile albioun thir regionis afore rehersit say annandail nidisdail galloway nocht allanerlie aboundis fyne woll store bestiall bot ar rycht proffitable • maner cornis except quhie • aboue galloway carrik • e part silu • ie silurie deuidit thre partis say▪ carrik kyle cunnynghame carrik wes sū tyme ane riche •• ete vnder name quhais ruynus wallis schawis gret magnificence thairof
