risis annād discendis wt lāg passage ye irelād seis▪ far fra ye fōtanis clide springꝭ y• fōtanꝭ forth quhilk dis •• e wt āple braid 〈◊〉 ꝭ almane seis ye tothir syde ye watter clyd eftir ya • he roun lang wart north crukis ay inw • rt quhill come montanis granȝebane syne discendis lang passage south quhill fall ireland set ye cuntre quhair rynnis callit clidisdail betuix clid lennox lyis baronie renfrew quhilk ar twa lochis namye quhyn south leboth sum xx sum xii mylis lenth rycht plentuus full fische aboue renfrew occeane seis lyis lennox nami • ptolome lelgonia quhilk ane gret loch namit lochmond xxiiii mylis lenth viii mylis breid within loch ar xxx ilis weil biggi • kirkis templis housis yi loch ar thre notable thingis fisch swomand ony fyn ane rycht dāgerus storme wal ony wynd ane ile fletis heir thair wynd seruis ¶this loch standis fute montanis granȝebene quhilkis wes sum tyme gr •• marchis betuix scottis pychtis gangis fra lochlowmond mouth dee ye pichtis n • landis beȝound montanis granȝebene ȝit lyand ireland seis thir boūdis wer ay inhabit scottis viii mylis fra lochlowmond ye castell dunbri • ane namit sum tyme 〈◊〉 quhair watter leuin fallis clyde beȝound lochlowmōd argyle ane cūtre ful rochis craggis montanis ar twa lochis lochtyne lochquho ye land deuidi • thre patres ye land yat lyis myddis thairof callie knapdail lochfyne mair plente heryng yan ony seis albion lochquho ar mony fische sik leiffis •• esch watter argyle ar twa castellis glennunquhart en • one • l ar xii ilis bot thay ar mair proffitable store b • stial yan ony cor • argyle ar mony riche mynis full metall bot ye pepill thairof he 〈◊〉 craft industry wyn samyn sa •• cuntre ane stane sic nature yat kendlis cauld stra hardis fyre quhen inuoluit thairwith argyle ar vii vthir lochis sum xxx • ylis •• nth ane breid 〈◊〉 le wes said schir duncane campbell w • arlo •• loch argyle ye ȝeir god imvcx ȝetus come ane terrible beist al 〈◊〉 ane grew hound furit lik ane ganar straik doun gret theis dyn • hir tail slew thre men quil • • wer thair houn ••• 〈…〉 hir tail wer ye remanent 〈…〉 thay ha • bene slane samyn maner eftir slanch ••• • thir 〈…〉 •• eidlie loch sindry prudent • beleuit gret 〈…〉 land appering yi • eist scho wes sene 〈…〉 foll • wing thairefter marche argyle ly •• lorn quhilk 〈…〉 part thairof lyis maner ane • oung 〈…〉 lang hals ix mylis lenth breid yi toung 〈…〉 within ye seis wes sum tyme namit nouantia bot callit kyntyre say▪ y• heid lorn ye outm •• st part yi toung 〈…〉 sū auctouris sayis baith argyle 〈…〉 makꝭ n • mention argyle ī cosmograp • ie 〈◊〉 growis heir wt gret plente beȝound lorne lochquhabir quhilk wes sum tyme ane part murrayland full mynis sic irne leid rycht proffitabill store bestiall ar mony woddis lochis riuers full salmond vthir fische swomand sa plenteuslie samin tane ony craft principall riuers lochquhabir ar lochtie spanȝe howbeit cause thairof vncertane lochtie risis nocht viii mylis fra lochnes fallis vnder ye name almane seis besyde ane roche crag dippand ane lang hals ye seis namit hardnomorth ye mouth lochtie wes ane riche toun namyt inuerlochtie quhair sū tyme wes gret change repair vncouth marchandis quhill last wes sa vterlie distroyit weris danis come neuir ye honour magnificence afore quhiddir samyn procedis sleuth pepill inuy lymmers quhilkis may suffir na wallit tounis cuntre vncertane beȝound lochtie castell dunstafage sum tyme namit euonium beȝound dunstafage mouth watter spanȝe quhair fallis almane seis ¶the discription ro stranauern murray land vvith louchis fludis notable tovvnis thairof ca viii beȝound ye watter spanȝe lyis ro sum tyme namit lugia rising ane strait narow hals yair eftir cassin furth mair braid lesuris vali montanis circulit baith ta syde tothir occeane yi cuntre quhair lyis maist approchand ireland seis he rycht difficill passage ganis mair store bestiall yan ony habitatioun man best manurit fornence almane seis rycht plentuus baith gers corn thir hailsum vali quhare riuers discendis makis herbis rycht delicius nurisand ro ar sindry lochis bot lochbroun maist mony riuers ar ro full fische ro cromarte ane firth sicker port shippis saif yame fra danger tempest namyt peple heil schipmen ro ye toun thane quhair blissit banis sanct dutho restis gret veneratioun peple ane vale ro twa housis round forme ane bell ar saiffit dayis memory sum antiquiteis eldaris merchand ro lyis stranauern outmaist boundis scotland quhilk se cost lyis northnorthwest crukis agane sum tyme fornens almane seis hauand fornens gret north cathnes ye gret eist sutherland gret south ro gret west northnorwest seis thre gret craggis lyis outmaist syde stranauern namit hoy howbroun downis • ie becaus thir thre rochis schutis far ye see thay mak twa gret firthis lochis seuerit fra vthir merchand cathnes lyis sutherland ane proffitable cuntre baith store cornis ȝond syde lyis murray sum tyme namyt uararis bot he nocht samyn marchis boundis betuix spay ne ireland seis wer namyt murray bot lyis sum tyme beȝound watter spay kissok quhil cum ireland seis betuix ro murray land crukis ane gret discens vale quhilk fallis fyue riuers ne nardyn findorn los spay spay rynnis sa feirs violent strem • see tyde quhen cumys maist swiftlie may nocht resist violent discens streme watter bot preis streme thairof born doun per force chefeis nesrysis fra ane loch vnder name nocht viii mylis fra samyn loch lochtie cumys fra rynnis ireland seis nothir fresis water lochtie ȝit loch cumys fra ony storme wynter greter admiratioun ony frosyn thyng cassyn meltis resoluis hastelie yairfore rycht proffitable al frosin beistis ye mouth ne standis toun innernes quhare sum tyme wes gret plente tak heriyng howbeit thay euanist offence maid aganis sum sanct treuth quhen ony auaricius vnhappy men fechtis fische god sendis infinit gudnes sustentatioun peple diffoulis see thair blude mony ȝeris eftir na fische swomis place besyde lochnes quhilk xxiiii mylis lenth xii breid ar mony wyld hors amang yame ar mony martrikis beuers quhitredis toddis furringis skynnis thaym ar coft gret priee amang vncouth marchandis murray nocht allanerlie gret aboundance fouth quheit beir aytis siclik cornis gret plente nutis appillis bot ie ar gret fouth fische speciallye salmond cuntre ane vncouth maner fisching peple makis ane lang mand narow halsit wyid mouthit mony stobis inouth maid sik craft fische thrawis yame self nocht get furth agane al sone • e see ebbis fische ar • ane dry crelis murray ane loch namit spy • ee quhair gret plente swannis cause quhy swannis multiplyis sa fast loch throw ane herbe namyt olour quhilk burionis gret fertilite said loch seid rycht nurisand delicius swannis herbe sa brudy quhair ani sawin plantit neuir distroyit may prouin experience youcht loch v mylis lang wes sum tyme ye memorie man ȝit beris full salmond vthir gret fische ȝit fra herbe began burgeon watter growin sa schauld ane man may waid throw maist partis thairof thairfore maner gret fische quit euanist murray land kick pette quhare ba • lytill iohne remanis gret admiratioun pepill he bene fourtene fut hycht square membris effering thairto vi ȝeris afore cumyng werk lycht saw hanche bane al mekill haill bane ane man schot arme mouth thairof quhilk apperis strang square pepill grew regioun afore thay wer effeminat lust intemperance mouth murray ye toun elgyn nocht far fra ye mouth spay quhilk nobill cathedrall kirk murray decorit richelie college channonis sindry riche abbayis ar murray killos ordoure cestuus pluscardie ordoure clunacensis ☞ ¶the discriptioun boene anȝe buchquhane mar mernis fifte angus vvith lochis fiudis abbayis tounis vthir notable thingis thairof ca ix marcheand murray lyis boene anȝe twa plentuꝰ regionis store bestiall liand ample roume boū dis seis thir regionis ar full scheip nolt sindry lesuris woddis samyn throw myddis thairof rynnis watter douern ye mouth watter standis toun bamf thir two regionis afore namit lyis buchquhane ane proffitable land scheip passis cuntreis lyand rich quhit deligat woll mony watteris ar buchquhane full salmond except rattra quhilkis ar nane buchquhane castell slanis constablis hous scotland beside quhilk ane meruellus coue watter • droppis growis within schort tyme ī maner ane hard quhit stane wer nocht coue oft temyt wald fillit sone stanis na rattonis ar sene cuntre al sone thay ar brocht thair thay de buchquhane growis aytis ony tylth seid quhen peple passis set purpos scheir yir aytis thay fynd nocht tume hullis ȝit quhen ya • pa ony premiditatioun thay fynd thir aytis ful weil ripit thir thingꝭ cumys nocht nature erar illusioun deuillis dissait blind supersticius pepill buchquhane lyis mar ane plentuus region store bestiall lx mylis lenth breid fra almane seis badȝenoch ciete abirdene bischoppis seit generall vniuersite flurising science wes foundit nobill bischop william elphinstoun ane riche magnificent college ciete lyis betuix tworiche riuers done dee quhilkis ar mair fouth salmond yan ony part albioun marchand mar lyis mernis see ane riche cuntre store bestiall dunnothir ye marschel scotlandis hous mernis toun fordoun quhare blissit banis sāct paladie restis gret veneratioun peple marchis mernis rynnis ye watter esk vthirwayis namit northesk ane dangerus watter quhare mony passingeris perisis falt ane brig bordorand ye mernis lyis angus quhilk wes sum tyme ane part horrestia deuidit thre riuers northesk southesk tay angus ane hie montane dippand ye almane seis callit reid brayis tay risis far beȝond y• montanis granȝebene fra loch tay quhilk xxiiii mylis lenth x mylis breid discendis gret plente fische quhill cum almane seis besyde dunde ye toun quhair wer born quhair mony virtewꝰ lauborius pepill ar makyng claith angus ar mony vthir gud townis montroys brechin forfair sa gret noumer castellis wer ouir tedius laubour writ thaym angus ar mony lochis full fische ar mony abbayis resteneth channons regulare eftir ordour augustyne aberbrothak coupar first ordour turonen nixt ordour cistuus vale esk sa quhit small wol he na compair albioun besyde tay fiffe sum tyme ane part octolyne growis maner cornis al gret plente doi ony part albioun quhare na cornis ar rycht proffitable store bestial fiffe ar blak stanis quhilk he sa tollerable heit quhen yai ar kendillit y• yai resolue meltꝭ irne ar yairfore rycht proffitable operation smythis yi kynd blak stanis ar na part albion bot allanerlie betuix tay tyne fiffe maid gret plente quhit salt fiffe ar mony noble townis sanct androis archebischopis seit scotland kirkcawde disart kyngorne cowpar dunfermeling quhare ane riche abbay decorit generall sepulturis kingis mony vthir abbayis ar fiffe • edicat ye blissit virgyne cul • o bawmerinoch petmoyg pettinwenie fyffe ar sindry lochis loch torre lochleuin lochleuin ane castell mony ilis ane thaym kirk sanct phillane fiffe deuidit fra louthiane reueir forth quhilk rynnis ane braid firth almane seis firth rycht plentuus coclis osteris muschellis selch pellok merswyne quhalis gret plente quhit fische amang mony vthir ilis firth ile may decorit ye blude martirdome sanct adriane fallowis myddis ile springis ane fontane fresche purifyit watter outhrow ane roche crag gret admiratioun peple considerin lyis ye myddis seis beside ile ane wounderful crag risand within see sa narro strait hals na schip bait may arriue bot allanerlie ane part crag callit ba vnwynnabill ingyne man ar coue al proffitable defence men yai wer biggit crafty industri euery thīg yt ye crag ful admiration w • ar incredible noumer soland geis nocht vnlik thir fow ••• • hat plineus callis see ernis ar sene na part albion bot crag ailsay thair first cumin quhilk ye spring ȝeir yai gadder sa gret noumer treis stikkis big thair nestis ye samyn mycht sufficient fewell ye keparis ye castell howbeit yai na vthir prouision yocht ye keparis tak fra yir fowlis yir stikkis treis ȝit yai tak litil indingnation thairof bot bringis haistelie agane al mony fra vthir placis quhair thay fle thay nuris thair birdis maist deligat fische yocht yai haue ane fische yair mouth aboue ye seis quhair yai fle ȝit gif yai se ane vthir bett thay lat ye first fal doukis ane fellon stoure ye see bringis haistelie vp fische yat thay last saw youcht fische reft f • hir ye keparis ye castell scho takkis lytill indingnation bot fleis incontinent ane vthir thir keparis ye castell forsaid takis ye ȝoung geis fra thaym lytill impediment thus cumys gret proffet ȝeirlie ye lord ye said castell within bowellis yir geis ane fatnes singulare medicyne helis mony infirmyteis speciallie sik cumys gut cater discedyng hanches lethe men wemen crag growis ane rycht delicius herbe quhen transportit plantit ony othir part lytill sapor gust crag wes sum tyme ane stane full ene holis like ane watter spounge holkit myddis sik nature salt watter waschin thairwith becumis incontinent fresche delicius mouth heir st • ne fast castell ane ile forth ye abbay sāct colme chānons regulare eftir ordour sanct augustyne mony othir ilis ar firth full cunnyngis oftymes ar sene firth vncouth wounderfull fische coulis hingyng ouir thair hedis like monkis signifyis ay mortalite men beistis quhare yai ar sene ☞ discriptioun louthian • striuel • ng menteith calidon • vvod bovvgevvall gareoth vvith notable ••• teis castellis fludis thair ca x south side forth lyis louthiane callit tha • name fra lothane principall kingis pichtis louthiane maist plentuus ground scotland ar mony abbayis castellis tounis hadingtoun dunbar northberwik leith bot edinburgh passis thaym baith polese reparation wisdome rich aboue ye castell vnder ye name sū tyme callit ye madin castell ȝit remanis vnder ye sam • name nocht two mylis fra edinburgh ane fontane dedicat sanct katrine quhair sternis oulie springis handlie sic aboundance howbeit samyn gaderit away springis incontinent gret aboundance fountane rais throw ane drop sanct katrynis onlie quhilk wes brocht mont synay fra hir sepulture sanct margaret blissit quene scotland al sone sanct margaret saw onlie spring ithandlie diuine miracle said place scho gart big ane chapell thair honour sanct katherine onlie he ane singulare vittew aganis maner cankir skawis nocht far fra mouth forth castel dunbar quhilk nature crafty industre man strenthiest hous day albion dunbar wes sū tyme ye cheif chemis ye erlis marche nocht far fra ane toun vnder name ane magnificent riche college channons foundit honorabily dotat said erlis eist syde louthiane lyis mers cuntre quhilk w first diser • uit ye mers lyis teuidail aboue lyis twedail twedail lyis dryisdaill waulco • dail douglasdail clidisdaill thir dali beris name reuer discendis throw thaym principall toun clidisdail glasqw archebischoppis seit quhare ane nobill kirk dotat richelie honour sanct mungow biggit gret magnificence glasqw ane generall vniuersite study liberall science clidisdail ane riche myne gold asure ony laubour sū tymes ar sindry precious stanis variant hewis • goldin myn • wes found ye • yme kyng iames fei • quhilk sa mony singulare virtewis decorit realme infinite rich myne gy • god fortunit hym haue dayis sleuth necligence vncrafty peple myne doi small proffet fra glasqw north lyis menteith striuelingschire marcheand argyle lennox striuelingschire ye toun striueling aboue standis ye castel vnder ye samyn name sum tyme namit dolorus montane toun began ye gret wod calidon wod calidon ran fra striueling throw menteith stratherne atholl lochquhabir ptolome writtis first table wod wes sum tyme quhit bullis crisp cursand mane like feirs lionis youcht thay semit meik tame remanen • figure thair bodyis yai wer mair wyld ony vthir beistis sic hatrent aganis societe cūpany men yt yai come neuir ye woddis lesuris quhair thay fand ony feit haynd thairof mony dayis eftir thay eit nocht herbis yt wer twichit handillit mē thir bullis wer sa wyld yt yai wer neuir tane slycht crafty laubour sa impacient yat eftir thair taking thay deit importable doloure al sone ony man inuadit thir bullis thay ruschit terrible preis hym thay dang hym eird • akand • feir houndis scharp laneis vthir maist penitriue wappinnis said king robert bruce eftir coronatioun went ane hunting wod hauand bot ane quiet cūpanye hym eschapit narowlie lyef ane bullis eftir wes sair woundit huntaris ruschit feirslie kyng howbeit na wapinnis hand debait hym self fra dynt thairof incontinent ane man gret spreit quhilk wes standing neir lap afore kyng nocht allanerlie kest bull manifest force erd bot held hym quhill remanent huntaris slew hym thair wappinnis man rescoursit kyng wes callit turnbull wes rewardit riche landis kyng youcht thir bullis wer bred sindry boundis callidon wod continewal hunting lust insolent men thay ar distroyit partis scotland nane thaym left bot allanerlie cumarnald eist syde menteith lyis strathern marchis samyn syde fiffe throw vali regioun rynnis watter ern fallis tay nocht four mylis fra ye place quhare▪ ern fallis tay ane stane small quantite howbeit meruellus nature thair nothir preis ingyne man nay transport place quhair lyis attoure ane man ane hundreth mouis elik tothir syde tay beȝound angus gowrie lyis stermond ane plentuus regioun baith gers cornis nocht far fra stermond lyis athole quhilkis ar mony lusty vali fludis ful fische ground sa riche beris cornis ony lauboure ane toun namit lud quhilk land sa plentuus gif weil manurit beris gud beir ony seid athole ar vthir landis mair contrarius nature quheit sawin degeneris turnis ry buchquhane boene west lyis bostgewell gareoth rycht plentuus regionis baith gres cornis gareoth ane hyll namit doundore say goldin montane scheip gangis yi montane ar ȝallo thair teith ar hewit like gold thair flesche reid wer littit safron thair woll maner regioun ane carnell stanis liand togiddir maner ane croun ryngis quhen thay ar doung ane bell ane temple wes biggit sum men beleuis said place quhare mony auld • itis superstitionis wer maid euill spretis mony vthir regionis ar scotlād bradalbane strabraun badȝenoth sindry vthir small landis fludis howebeit thay ar nocht sa notable thir landis haue schawin▪ ☞¶of gret plente haris hartis vthir vvild bestiall scotland▪ meruellus nature syndr • scotti • doggis nature salmond ca xi becaus haue discriuit regionis scotland speciall schaw sum thing concernyng thaym general first say boundis scotland except yai partis quhair continewall habitatioun peple makis impediment yairto gret plente haris hartis hindꝭ dayis rais wolffis wyld hors roddis yir wild hors ar tane crafty slycht tyme wynter landwart peple puttis certane tame cursouris merl amang thir wild hors thair cōmixtioun frequent cumpanye makis thaym tame thay may handilli • uolffis ar rycht noysum tame bestiall partis scotland except ane part thairof namit glenmores quhilk ye tame bestiall gettis litill dāmage wyld bestiall specialie toddis tik hous cuntre nurisis ane ȝoung tod certane dayis mengis flesche yairof eftir yt slane sic meit thay gif yair fowlis vthir smal beistis sa mony etis meit ar preseruit twa monethis eftir fra ony dāmage toddis toddis wyll eit na flesche gustis thair awin kynd thair bot ane beist fowll he nocht gustit meit tod wyll • heis amang ane thousand scotland ar doggis meruellus nature aboue cōmoun nature conditioun doggis quhilkis ar sene partis ar thre maner doggis scotland quhilk ar sene na vthir partis warld first ane hound baith wycht hardy swift thir houndis ar nocht allan •• lie feirs cruell wyld beistis bot theuis ennymes thair maister maner secound kynd ane rache sekis thair pray baith fowlis beistis fische sent smell thair neis thrid kynd mair ony rache reid hewit elli blak small spraingis spottis ar callit peple sleuthoundis thir doggis he sa meruellus wit yai serche theuis followis thaym allanerlie sent guddis ar tane away nocht allanerlie fyndis theif bot inuadis hym gret cruelte youcht theuis oftymes cors watter quhair thay pa caus ye hound tyne sent thaym guddis ȝit serchis heir thair sic deligence fut fyndis baith trace theif guddis meruellus nature yir houndis wil haue na faith vncouth peple howbeit samyn ar rycht frequent ryfe bordouris ingland scotland attour statute lawis bordouris denyis entres sleuthound tyme chace serching guddis salbe haldin participant cryme thift cōmittit fowlis sic leiffis reif ar sindry kyndis scotland ernis falconis goyshalkis spa • halkis marlȝonis sik like fowlis watter fowlis sa gret noumer yat wonder heir mony vthir fowlis ar scotland quhilkis ar sene na vthir partis warld capercailȝe ane foul mair ane rauin quhilk leiffis allanerlie barkis treis scotland ar mony mure rokis hennis quhilk etis nocht bot seid • r • ppis hadder sic like ar gret noumer blak cokis hennis nocht vnlike ane fa •• ane baith quantite sapoure yair flesche bot thay haue blak fedderis reid • e breis beside thir thre vncouth kynd fowlis ane vthir kynd fowlis mers mair vncouth namit gustardis al • le ane swan bot colour thair fedderis gust thair flesche thay ar litil different fra ane pertrik thir last fowlis ar frequent bot noumer sa far hayti cumpany man gif thay fynd thair eggis ayndit twichit men thay leif thaym layis eggꝭ ane othir place thay lay yair eggis bair erd othir kynd fowlis ar scotland maner yai ar ony othir realmes fische mair plente scotland speciallie salmond thā ony▪ vthir partis ye warld becaus procreation nature salmond vncouth strange haue inserit maner thairof buke thir salmond tyme heruist eumis vp throw smal watteris speciallie quhare ye watter maist schauld loun spawnis thair wamis plet vthir ye hie fische spawnis meltis ye scho fische • ir rounis incontinent coueris thaym ouir sand reueir • ftir thair spawning thay grow sa lene small na thing apperis thaym bot skyn bane he sa warsche gust thay ar vnproffitable eit sum men sayis othir salmond metis thaym eftir thair spawning growis lene maner thay ar sindry thaym ar foūd lene ta syde fat tothir forthir thir rownis meltis quhilkis hid said vnder sandis growis spring nixt ȝei • 〈◊〉 render fische na gretar ane mannis thoume gyf thay handillit thay melt away like ane blob watter alwayis first streme watter risis yai discend see within xx dayis eftir yai grow meruellus quantite maist feruent desyre appetite returnis samyn placis quhair thay wer generit forthir becaus mony ye watteris scotland ar full lynnis al sone thir salmond cumis ye lyn thay lei • • mony ar wycht lepis weil thay get vp throw lyn returnis place quhair thay wer bred abidis thair quhil season • um thair generatioun utheris quhilkis lepis nocht cleirlie ouir lyn brekie thaym self thair fall growis mesall vtheris ar kepp • caw • rounis la • wart peple settis oftymes cawdronis playand hair watter cheik lyn thus quhen salmondis faillis thair loup▪ thay fall callour said caldrounis • maist delitius mouth defendit lawis sla ony salmond fra ye viii day september xv day nouembre na man knawis quhair thir fische leiffis na thing found thair wambe quhen thay ar oppinnit bot ane thi • grosse humour ☞¶of syndry kyndis muffillis cocles scotland perlis ar gottin yame sindry vncouth strange fische nature hadder ca xii schaw nature mussillis coclis▪ quhilkis mony kyndis ar amang w sum ar small • thairof rycht delicius mouth utheris ar mair nocht vnlike forme quantite samyn mussillis ya • he purpure howbeit yai haue na thing thairof ya • ar ȝit rycht delicius mouth utheris ar lang greter callit hors mussillis ar gottin sindry reueris specialie de done thir mussillis ar generit perlis thir mussillis 〈◊〉 mornyng quhen lift cleir temperat opnis thair mouthis litill aboue watter maist gredelie swellis dew heuin eftir mesure quantite dew thay swellie thay consaue bredis perle thir mussillis ar sa doyn gleg twiche heryng howbeit voce neuir small maid bra besyde thaym stane neuir sa small cassin watter thay douk haistelie atanis gangꝭ ground knawing weill quhat estimatioun price frute yair wambe al peple al sone fischaris fyndis yir mussillis thay thrist thaym fast togidder maner thair takyng followis ¶first four fyue personis passis reuer togidder standis maner ane round cirkill within watter thair schulderis ilk ane thaym he ane staffe thair hand thay sall nocht slide syne thay luke viseis throwe cleir purifyit watter quhill thay se mussillis becaus yai may nocht tak thaym vp thair handis thay cleik thaym vp thair tayis slingis thaym nixt brayis perlis ar gottin scotland ar nocht littill valoure thay haue ane cleir schynand quhitnes round lycht sum tymes ar al mekleas naill ane mannis fyngar▪ quhilkꝭ haue part wes schawin thaym yat come fra sanct iames thair siclike mussillis spanȝe bot thay haue na perle thay leif salt watter see costis scotland ar coclis mussillis maner youcht tha mair proffitable mouth ony procreatioun perlis mony vncouth forme figuris fische ar scotland sum thaym armyt schellis sum hard skalis sum thaym ar round ane ball bakkit like ane hurcheon hauād bot ane conduc • baith purge thair wambe ressaue thair mei • schaw euery kynd fische scotland wer bot ane faschious vane lauboure samyn ar knawin al cuntreis ¶of al othir kyndis fische sa gret plente throw partis seis howbeit infinit noumer thaym wer tane away ta day na thing thairof salbe myst morow attoure ane thing cumys singulare prouidence god ay ye mair derth penurite vittallis scotland fische swoumis abundance plente attoure desertis muris realme growis ane herbe namit hadder ony seid richt nutritiue baith beistis fowlis specialie beis herbe moneth iulii he ane floure purpure hew al sweit huny pychtis maid yi herbe sum tyme ane rycht delicius hailsum drynk nochtheles maner making perist exterminioun said pichtis scotland thay schew neuir craft making drink bot yayr 〈…〉 attoure thair na part scotland sa vnproffitable bot producis othir yrne elli sum vthir proffitable kynd metal may notabilly prou • n throw ilis scotland ☞ discriptioun ilis scotland maist notabyll thingis thairof capitulo xiii sen ar fallyng cōmonyng ilis discriue ye maner forme followis fornens scotland ye ireland seis lyis xliii ilis quhilkis sum ar xxx mylis lang vtheris xii mylis vtheris mair vtheris le thir ilis wer callit sum auctouris ebonie vtheris ar callit hebredes principall ile ile man quhilk lyis fornens galloway wes sum tyme principall seit preistis namit driades cornelius tacitus cesar cōmentaris mony othir romane auctouris testifyis north fra ile man lyis arane vthirwayis namit botha secound name wes geuin sanct brandane biggit sum tyme ane hous namit fra arrane lyis law • othesay namit fra first scot yat brocht scottis ireland albioun nocht far fra thir ilis ailsay quhair siclik plente • g •• schew afore ba fra ailsay lyis mony vthir ilis de • idi • seuerit thair awin name full mynis sik irne tyn leid 〈◊〉 metallis ȝit maist notable ile scotland ila quhilk lyis beȝou •• toung lorne sycht lochquhabir ane riche cuntre xxx mylis lenth rycht plentuus corne full metallis gif thair wer ony crafty industrius peple wyn samyn nocht far fra ila lyis cumbra mula al mekill ila baith lenth breid ile mula ane cleir fontane two mylis fra ye see fra fontane discendis ane litil burne strip rynnand ful rounis ye seis thir rounis ar round quhit schynand like perle full thik humour within two houri eftir thay come see thay grow gret cocles schort gait fra thir ilis iona othirwayis namyt colmekill quhilk ane abbay full deuot religius men abbay wes cōmoun sepulture scottis kyngis fra tyme kyng fergus secound ye tyme kyng malcolme cā quhilk biggit abbay dunfermling quhair maist part kyngis lyis sen fundatioun thairof passand forthwart northnorwest seis fornens ro ane ile namit lews lx mylis lenth yi ile bot ane reueir said gif ony woman waid throw watter spring ȝeir thair sall na salmond sene ȝeir said watter otherwayis sall abound gret plente beȝound lewis lyis two ilis namit sky rona last ile incredible noumer selch pellok meirswyne na thing astonist sycht men last maist ile namit hirtha quhare eleuatioun pole lxiii greis sen eleuatioun pole aboue ile man lvii greis ilkgre extending lxii mylis ane half distance ptolome vthir astronimeris nowmeris conclude fra ile man first ile albion hirtha last ile thairof ar thre hundred lxxvii mylis last ile namit hirtha quhilk irsche callit ane scheip thꝭ ile gret nowmer scheip ylk ane gretar ony gait buk hornis lang thykkar ony horne ane bewgyll he lang talis hyng erd ile circulit euery syde roche craggis na baitis may land bot allanerly ane place quhilk ane strait narow entres sumtyme thair mycht na pepyll pa ile extreme dangeir yair lyuis ȝit thair na passage bot quhen seis ar cawnie ony tempest moneth iuny ane preist cumis ye lewis ane bait ile ministeris sacrament baptisme ye barnis he bene borne ȝeir afore al sone preist he done office certane messis ressauis tyndis thair cōmoditeis returnis hame gait come ile lewis ar ii kirkis ane dedicat sanct peter tother dedicat sanct clement fame al sone fyre gangis furth ile man haldyn maist clene innocent lyfe layis ane wosp stra alter quhen pepyll ar geuyn maist deuotly thair praers wosp kyndellis ane bleis beȝound thir ilis ȝit ane vthir ile bot inhabit ony pepyll • ar certane beistis nocht far different fra figure scheip sa wyld thay nocht tane girnis hair thaym lang tattie nothir like woll scheip gait betuix thir ilis oftymes richt dangerus passage see contrarius stremes makis collision sum tymes ȝettand tyd sum tymes swelleand soukand agane sa forcy violence y• ▪ quhē y• schippis ar saland throw thir dangerus veylis oftymes thay ar othir drownit elli brokin craggis gretest vele heirof namit corbrek wyll othir synk elli draw ane schip howbeit distant thair fra ane myle ☞¶of nature claik geis syndry maner thair procreation ile thule capitulo xiiii hestis speik geis generit see namit clakis sum men beleuis thir clakis growis treis nebbis bot thair opinioun vane becaus nature procreatioun thir clakis strange haue maid na lytyll lauboure deligence serche ye treuth verite yairof haue salit throw ye seis quhare thir clakis ar bred fyndꝭ gret experience yt nature seis mair releuant • au thair procreatioun ony vthir thyng howbeit thir geis ar bred mony syndry wayis thay ar bred ay allanerly nature seis treis ar cassin seis proces tyme apperis first worme etin small boris hollis thairof growis small wormis first thay schaw thair heid feit last thay schaw thair plumis wyngis finaly quhen thay ar cumyn iust mesure quantite geis thay fle aire othir fowlis doi notably prouyn ȝeir god ane thousand iiii hundred lxxxx sicht mony pepyll besyde castell petslego ane gret tre brocht alluuion flux see land wonderfull tre brocht lard ground quhilk sone efter gart deuyde ane saw apperit ane multitude wormis thrawing thaym self syndry hollis boris tre sum thaym war rude thay war bot new schapin sum batth heid feit wyngis bot thay na fedderis sum thaym war perfit schapin fowlis last pepyll hauand ylk day tre mair admiration brocht kirk sanct androis be • de town tyre quhare remanis ȝit dayis within two ȝeris efter hapnit sic ane lyk tre cum ye firth tay besyde dunde worme • tin hollit full ȝoung geis samyn maner siclike port leith beside edinburgh within ȝeris efter hapnit sic ane lyke cais ane sch •• • amit cristofir efter scho lyin iii ȝeris ane ankir ane th • r ilis wes brocht leith becaus hir tymmer apperit failȝeit scho brokin incontinent appe • afore al inwart partis hir worme etin hollis thairof full geis samyn maner haue schawin attoure gif ony man wald allege vane ar • ument cristofer maid sic treis grew allanerly ilis ru • treis growis said ilis ar nature fynaly nature seis resoluit geis preif cuntre thairof • notable example schawin afore ene maister alexander galloway person kynkell w thir ilis geuand mynd maist ernist besynes serche verite thir obscure mysty dowtis aduenture liftit vp ane see tangle hyng full mussill schellis fra rute branchis sone efter opnit ane thir mussyll schellis bot mair astonist afore saw na fische bot ane perfit schapin foule smal gret ay efferyng quantite schell clerk knawin w richt desirus sic vncouth thingis come haistely said tangle opnit w circumstance afore rehersit thir mony othir reasonis examplis beleif yt thir clakis ar producit ony nature treis rutis thairof bot allanerly ye nature oiceane see quhilk ye caus production mony wonderful thingis becaus ye rude ignorant pepyl saw oftymes ye frutis yt fel ye treis quhilkis stude neir ye see cōuertit within schort tyme ī geis yai beleuit yt yir geis grew apon ye treis hingād yair nebbis siclik appillis vthir frutis hingis yair stalkis bot thair opinioun nocht sustenit al sone thir appillis frutis fallis 〈◊〉 see • lude thay grow first worme 〈◊〉 schort proces tyme ar al • eta • geis haue schawin sufficientlie yneuch ilis scotland gyf schawin ane thing say nocht allanerlie wes ye ile thule remanent ilis scotland sene w bot al • er sen • mony romane auctouris • cornelius tac • tus sayis romane nauy quhilk wes send ilis • e cōmand iulius agricola saw yi ile thule remanent ilis •• ande yair • • h • ptolom • writtis ile thule ly • amane ilis scotland ȝit wr • ting prouin experienc • may haue na faith thule mony mylis distant fra schetland schetland 〈◊〉 beȝound orknay approe • hand • noroway sum auctoutis sayis • ule samyn▪ ile w • call island thir auctouris sayts thul • • ast ile ye occeane see sa island quhilk lyis cauld frosty seis beȝound •• rkill artik north pole peple island becaus na cornis grow •• leif • allanerlie fische thay bray dry fische al small meil b • ikis thaym watter fyre vsis maner breid ☞ discriptioun orknay schetland vvith sindry vthir small ilis maneris conditionis peple thairof ca xv beȝound ilis scotland lyis orknay sum part • northnorwest seis sum part ye almane seis principall ile orknay pomonia ye bischoppis se • quhilk ar two strong castellis orknay growis na quheit nakit wod othir comis growis • gret plente orknay he na vennomus beistis ireland na beist ennyme nature man may le •• orknay sen ar fallyn speking irelād howbeit pertenis na thing purpos tuke hand schaw ane wonder thairof quhilk passis wonderis eui • red afore ony othir bukis ireland ane loch famyn mony mylis growis nothit • e • tre gyf ony • affixit • et doun loch within space • ne ȝeir eftir • alteris sa mekle hyd within erd tu •• ane hard stane y• hyd watter turnis irne sa mekle abo • e watter kepi nature tre tre stane • r • e ar • unyt togidder vnder ane st • k bot returne orknay schaw l •• ill▪ le wonderis first howbeit pepill g • uin excessiue drinkin plente b • ir makis stark • st ail albioun • nane thaym • sene wod daft dru • kin al thay 〈…〉 feir thair bod • extreme • ge • vse 〈…〉 strang fai • bodyis 〈◊〉 cuntre he • two 〈◊〉 〈◊〉 thre ata • wyld foull tame mai • fou • h orknay 〈◊〉 part albioun thair hors ar li • ill mair asynis bot thay may indure mair labour ony othir hors speik fische thair mair 〈…〉 thairof th • n ony vncouth p • ple may beleif orknay ane gret fische mair ony hors meruellus incredible sleip fische quhen scho beginnis sleip • e •• hi • • eith fast ane crag aboue 〈◊〉 al sone marineris fyndis hi • • n sleip thay cui • • ne stark cabill • ne boit eftir tha • haue borit ane gret hole throw hir tale thay fe • e hir samyn al sone • fi • cheis awalknit scho makis hir •• ip gret force ye see fra scho fynd hir self fast scho wrythis hir hir awin skin deis fatnes scho he maid dulie gret quantite hir skyn becaus du • lang maid strong cabellis ane hundreth skylis beȝound orknay • scherland q • hilk rich standis onlie fische dryit son • ny hydis skynnis oxin scheip • ait • trikis dryit sonne •• mys cuntre scotland maner marchandis holland ȝeland almanie • umys ȝei • lie schetland interchange othir marchandyis p • ple • hairo •• quhilkis ar nature conditionis peple orknay b •• ound schetland ar mony ilis quhilkis le • ffis maner • doi youcht ye peple yi • ilis pure ȝit thay leif langer ar better content thair lyuis tha • thay he mair welth rich warld n • contentioun amang thaym singulare proffet ilk man prouidis sa mekle fische ye symer may sustene hous agane wynter thir peple ar nakit ambitioun vice neuir trublit vncouth wer • amang pleseiris 〈…〉 ar iosit mankynd thay think na thyng sa gud leif concor • peace hauand ane quiet lyfe ony vthir displeseir yi perfection lyfe cumys thaym onlie throw thair symplicite followis samyn y• fu • steppis crist ilk ȝeir ani cumys thaym ane preis • orknay ministris thaym sacrament baptisme eftir hai • • e deuore ressauis teyndis iustlie returnis samyn gait come orknay forthir gif ony giftis nature may noumerit aman • wardly guddis▪ say thir ilis he may feliciteis guddis ony vthi • cuntreis peple thairof ar fair lusty strong body dotat mony giftis nature he gud h • ill body quhilk may preferrit rich • l knawis thir men 〈◊〉 experience lang infirmiteis thir gy • peple • ist riche standis sa content thair awin gudd • thay couet na vtheris▪ say yi • peple ar al happy ony vthir peple warld fo •• hir gyf 〈…〉 wa • say thir thingis writ ar vane considrin wes neuir ī yir ilis say wes weil informit yame ane noble man edward sum tyme • •• shop orknay bischop come ane man thir ilis •• cht alt • nerlie schew thir thingis al • circumstance afore rehersit bot 〈…〉 thaym hym self passit commoun stature men sa wycht na man durst cōtend wers •• hym wes 〈◊〉 visage hyde wes ony lady warld thir reasonis appe • auctorite thay auctouris na worth sayis peple 〈…〉 sonne • barbour miserable thair na happiar creaturis warld thir peple thir landis forsaid amang • ochis craggis thir ilis growis ane maner electuar goum wit like gold sa attractiue nature drawis stra flox▪ hemmis claithis samyn maner doi ane adamont stane goume generat see froith quhilk cassin vp continewal repercussion craggis aganis see wallis throw ithand motioun see growis al teuch glew ay mair mair quhill last fa •• doun crag see said thaym he experience thairof goum quhen lyis crag like ane froith blob watter becaus nocht sufficientlie wrocht motioun see oftymes see tangle foūd inuoluit yi goume becaus doung heir thair sa mony wayis alluuion watter sa lang fletis sone inuoluit ony thing metis twa ȝeir afore cumin buke lycht arriuit ane gret lomp gou • buchquhane al mekle ane hors wes brocht hame hirdis quhilkis wer kepand thair beistis thair housis cassin fyre becaus thay fand ane smelland adour thairwith thay schew thair maister wes ganand sen • aid kirkis thair maister wes ane rud man thay wer tuke bot ane litill part thairof left remanent behynd hym mater litill effect partis goum quhen wes brokin wes hew gold schane •• ke lycht ane candyli maist part goum electuare wes • • royit rud peple afore come ony wyse mannis eris quhome • verifyit proueth sow cutis na balme al sone wes aduertist thairof maid sic deligence ane part wes brocht abirdene thir ar maist notable thingis culd fynd concernyng • albioun orknay schetland ¶thus wer neidf • put ane end cosmographie wer nocht ane vncouth wounderfull historie taris lityll pen maister iames ogilby vthir noble men wes send ambassatouris fra maist noble prince kyng iames feird kyng france tempest see thay wer constranit land norroway quhare thay saw nocht far fra thaim mony wild men nakit roth maner thay ar payntit last thay gat aduertising landwart peple thay wer doum beistis vnder figure men tyme nycht yai vsit cum gret cumpanyis landwar • villagis quhair thay fynd na doggis thay brek vp durris slayis al peple thay fynd thair intyll al sone thay heir ye noys doggis thay euanis dar nocht abide thay ar sa huge strenth sum tymes thay pull vp treis r • ti fechtis thairwith amang thaym self ambassatouris wer astonist thir monstouris maid stark waches gret fyris birnand nycht morow thay pullit vp salis departit forthir thir norroway men schew said ambassatouris yat yair wes nocht far fra thaym ane peple swomit symer like fische see leiffand ay fische wynter becaus watter cald thay leif wyld beistis discendis fra montanis sum tyme bringis yir bestis hame thayr couis ¶and sa endis heir ye cosmographie discriptioun scotland ☞ ane prudent doctryne maid auctoure concernyng baith nevv maneris auld scottis capitulo xvi becaus sindry nobill men he desyrit schaw ye auld maneris scottis quhilkis ar skatterit sindry partis yi buke vnder ane cōpendius treit may knawin far thir present dayis ar different fra maneris leiffing auld fad • ri youcht knaw na thyng bettar bot schawing thairof wyll draw hattent sindry gret personagis ar may suffir thair vice taxit thaym self repreuit ȝit becaus stand sum part vnder reuerence thir nobill men forsaid haue condiscendit may thair desiris thay allege proffitable rederis speciallie sik men ar nocht geuyn ouir immoderatlie thair awin affectioun • ȝit ouir mekill sopit sensuall pleseir sik men may reducit fra thair errouris thairfore intend first schaw quhat maneris he bene amang eldaris baith tyme weir peace quhat ingyne wisdome cheuelrie thay haue debatit aganis sa mony strong ennymes howbeit thair ennymes come oftymes realme maist dangerus • cursionis finalie schaw notable strenth vigour souerane virtew failȝeit ay mair amang thaym thay declinit fra ye temperance yair 〈◊〉 quhill last cumin thir dayis quhilkis leif gret tranqui • lite howbeit samyn mair beneuolence sleuth nychtbou •• ony manlie prowis self schaw schortest way may thir present dayis ar drounit maner auarice lust ȝit beleif sic men seuere lyfe following ye temperance yair eldaris sall reiose heir honourable maneris thair eldaris utheris ar mair brutall vicius lyfe seyng thair vice taxit sik dish • nour sall dres thaym plesandlie reuert fra thair euil schamefull dedis better lyfe ¶first suppone thing say repreuing corruppit maneris warld present nocht takin repreif euery man bot allanerlie sik men leiffis intemperance sik men deseruis mair repreif may gif thaym tyme gif ony man fyndis byle opnit purgatioun hyde nocht infirmite bot erar seik ye best rameid may amend lyfe ¶our eldaris howbeit thay wer rycht virtewis baith weir peace wer maist exercit temperance fontane virtew thay wer temperat sleip meit drink sic refectionis wer preparit litill laubour cost yai • breid wes maid sic stuf grew maist • salie ground thair vitallis wer nocht • iftit mak thaym delicius mouth bot wer ground togidder vnder ane forme • e flesche maist frequent amang yame wes othir wild flesche fellis thair hunting quhilk maid thaym incredible strenth elli wes thair awin tame bestial specially b • ȝit dayis howbeit ar rycht far different fra vse custome vthir nationis steirkis quhen thay ar bot ȝoung velis ar othir slane elli libbit oxin manure land bot ye quiokis war 〈…〉 quhill thay wer calfe thay ar fattest maist delicius mouth common meit eldaris fische nocht ye plente bot erar becaus thair landis lay oftymes waist throw continewal exercition cheuelry yat caus thay leiffit maist fische thay disiunit •• rly morning smal refectioun sustenit thair lyffis thairwith quhil tyme sowper throw quhilk thair stomok neuir surfetly chargit empesche thaym vthir besines sowper thay war mair large howbeit thay bot ane cours quhen thay kest thaym self mery thay vsit maist aqua vite nocht maid costly spicis bot sic naturall herbis grew thair awin ȝardis common drink thay vsit ayll tyme weir quhen thay lay thair tentis thay vsit nocht bot watter ilk man al mekyll mele mycht suffice hym day maid breid yairof fyre samyn maner romani specialy antonius caratallus empriour thay sendyll flesche yair campis bot gif war pray ennymes thay eit cōmon flesche half raw saup maist nurisand maner ¶attoure thay ay thaym ane gret vessell wrocht full butter cheis mele milk vinac • e temperit togidder quhilk thay saiffit thair liffis mony dayis fra exstreme hungar soukand ius humouris thairof quhen na vittallis throw incursionis ennymes mycht found howbeit thay peace yair ennymes thay sufferit nocht thair bodyis corruppit sleuth bot wer exercit othir continewall hunting game gret honour amang eldaris▪ elli thay exercition rynnyng sum tymes fra plane montanis fra montanis planis elli thay war exercit wirslyng vthir corporall exercition thay thair hedis ay cowit spanȝeartis vsis ony bonet couer les▪ thā thay war trublit infirmite nane yame throw ythand cowing thair hedis grew beld thay ȝeid commonly bairfu • gif thay ony schone thay dippit thaym first watter thay put thaym specialy wynter quhen maist schill persand stormes apperit thair sollis quhilkis war hardyn hetis semer snawis wynter suld mair abyl sustene laubour thair abulȝemēt maid motion insolence bot erar efter general gise cū tre thair hois war maid smal lynt wol ȝeid neuir aboue thair kne make thaym mair waldyn sowpyll mantyllis thay vsit wynter wes maid gros woll semer wes maid small fynest woll thay mycht get thay slepit benkis bonchis stra ony couer lernit thair sonnis fra thair first ȝeris eschew eis sleip samyn maner ilk moder wes nurice hir awin barne ane suspition adultre aganis ony woman quhare hir milk failȝeit▪ wemen thocht yair barnis wa • tender kyndly thaym bot gif thay war nurist al weill mylk thair breist thay war nurist afore blude thair wambe ¶a • toure thay held thair barnis war degenerat fra thair nature kynd gif thay war nurist vncouth mylk thay war sa accustomit▪ ythand pyne laubouris▪ thay curit nothir feruent heytes semer ȝit schyl frostis ye wynter thay trauelit maist yair fute tyme weir thay thair carlagis vittallis turst thaym thair hors quhen dangeir occurrit thay refusit na maner besines laubour micht pertene forsy campionis▪ gif hapnit yam mischance vincust thay fled sic spede montanis na hors men micht ouirtak thaym iniure done ony ane thaym repute sa common thaym al yt thay wald neuir euoid ye displeseir yairof thair hertis quhill samyn war recompansit blude thair ennymes wes maist noble desyrit erest fecht wangard quhare vassalage manheid mycht maist knawin nobyllis commonis contendit quhay suld maist faithful othir quhen capitane throw fers spreit hardynes apperit ony extreme dangeir ennymes band opinion ruschit sa fersly defence othir thay delyuerit hym ye present dangeir elli atanis lois thair lyues hym sepulturis nobyllis war decorit al mony hie stanis rising slane afore ennymes lyfe found army flint furisine swerd beltit fast sidis schamefully scurgit sald swerd laid wed degradit auctorite banist vnworthy creature thair cumpany fled tyme battall departit fra army without cōmand capitane slane ony dowme quhare euir mycht apprehendit bot gudis war geuyn sonne wemen war lytyl le vassalage strenth men al rank madynnis 〈◊〉 gif thay war nocht child ȝei • al weill battall men al sone army passand forthwart thay slew first leuand beist thay fand nocht allanerly baithit thair swerdis blude thairof bot taistit samyn thair mouth na le religion faith thay bene sicker sum felicite following▪ gif thay saw thair awin blude battall thay grew nocht astonist bot boldin maist bryme fury set thaym reuenge samyn▪ battallis assailȝeit thaym thay socht neuir victory treason falset slicht thocht ay degrading thair nobilite vincus thair ennymes ony othir thing bot force fechtyng thay held gret febylnes reuenge ony displeseir hatrent slauchter treason attour sencerite sympilnes equaly honorit amang thaym all▪ quhen thay war pa thair ennymes ylk mā ȝeid apon awin cost except sa mony war wagit trublit ye falling euyl fallyn daft wod hauand sic infirmite succedis heritage fra fader son geldit infeckit blude suld spreid na forthir wemen fallyn lipper ony othir infection blude banist fra cumpany men gif scho cōsauit barne vnder sic infirmite baith scho hir barne war buryit qu • k dronkattis glutonis consumer vitttallis mair necessar sustentation men wer tane first commandit swelly thair fouth quhat drink thay plesit incontinent thairefter drownit ane fresche reuer ¶forthir howbeit thay na administratioun iustice tyme weir ȝit sic iustice mynyste • tyme peace oftymes thay war ouir seuere yair puuition thay knew weil fra • hair pepyl wer drawin fra battal peace thay • ul • geuyn sa mony enormyteis samyn mycht nocht dantit gret punition▪ pepyll war sic nature al sone thay knew thaym self gylty ony offence committit aganis kingis maieste commoun weill thay set thaym rais diuisioun amang gret princis realme nochtheles quhē thay ar tretit soft moderat empire thay ar found richt humane meke pepyl richt obeysand reason nocht allanerly kepi thair faith efter reason thair contract bot geuys ane gowpin elli sum thingis mair aboue iust mesure thay sell consuetude sa straitly kepit gif samyn nocht done biar wyll nocht stand contract merchandice thay vsit rytis maneris egiptianis fra quhome thay tuk thair first begynnyng thair secret besines thay vsit writ cōmon letteris vsit amang othir pepil bot era • sifars figuris beistis maid maner letteris sic thair epithafis superscriptioun aboue thair sepulturis schawis nochtheles crafty maner writing quhat sleuth say perist ȝit thay haue certane letteris propir amang thaym self quhilkis war sum tyme vulgar commoun forthir thay spekis auld toung cuntre he thair asperatioun thair diptongis thair pronunciation better thā ony othir pepyl commonis ar nocht exercit thairwith bot allane • ly thay dwellis hie partis land becaus thir men he thair langage mair eloquent propir commonis he thay ar callit poetis makis poetis effering thair eruditioun science mony gret cerimonyis beside mony traftis science quhilkis thay haue translatit yair awin toung thay profes maist science medcinary ar richt excellent thay knaw nature euery • growis thay cuntreis curis maner • edyis thairwith heirfore say thair na region warld sa barrant vnfrutfull distance fra sunne bot prouidēce god maner necessaryis ye sustentatioun man may gottin plesandly gif thair war si • pepyll cu • laubour effering nature thairof nochtheles e • datis quhilkis dwelt continewally merchand realme ingland lernit saxonis • oung frequent ieoperd • chance battall sustenit mony ȝeris aganis thaym sa pepyll present scotland he tynt ba • th langage maneris wrytyng v •• sum tyme ou • eldaris he ane new maner writingis langage howbeit hieland he ba • th writingis langage thay afore 〈◊〉 ingenius ony othi • pepyll may thair ane greter 〈◊〉 make ane bait ane 〈◊〉 hyd bound na thing bot wandis bait callit ane 〈◊〉 quhilk thay fysche salmond 〈…〉 passis 〈◊〉 gret riuers thair quhen thay haue done thai • 〈…〉 ony place thair b • k quhare thay pleis bot wyl 〈…〉 chāce sindry seasonis specialy 〈…〉 malcolme c • al thingis began change ¶for 〈…〉 brytonis wa • maid effeminat lang 〈◊〉 douing ou • britane saxonis wall began 〈…〉 romani inglysmen specially efter 〈◊〉 pichtis 〈◊〉 dayly cumpany thaym began rute thair langage superflew maneris oure breistis throw quhilk virtew temperance eldaris began lytyl estimation amang w thā war geuyn efter arrogance pride inglismen vane glore ambution honouris began ye tyme seke new name nobilite howbeit afore thay dayis maist nobyl decorit mair virtew rich confiding mair awin dedis ony dedis eldaris began scotland maneris dukis erlis lordis baronis afore thay dayis principall men scotland vnder king war callit thanis say gaddera • kyngis mali war ay rewardit kyng thair faith virtew deseruit bot beleif nane he sic eloquence fouth langage sufficiently declare far thir present dayis ar different fra virtew temperance eldaris quhare eldaris sobriete haue ebri • te dronkynnes quhare thay plente sufficence haue immoderat cursis superfluite war maist noble honest▪ culd deuore swelly maist extreme deligence serchis sa mony deligat cour • thay prouoke stomok ressaue mair may sufficiently degest throw quhilk ingorge fyllis self day nycht sa full meris drinkis nocht abstene quhyll wambe sa swon vnabyl ony virtewis occupation nocht allanerly may surfet dennar sowper suffice w abo • e temperance oure eldaris bot al continew schamefull immoderyt voracite duble dennaris sow • aris throw quhilk mony w ganis na othir besines bot fil teme wembe attour continew schamefull intemperance aboue necessar sustentation nature geif w sic vnhappy laubour yt na fische see foule aire best wod may haue rest bot socht heir thair satify hungry appetit glutonis▪ nocht allanerly ar wynis socht france bot spainȝe italy grece sum tyme baith aphrik asya socht new delicius metis wynis samyn effect thus warld sa vterly socht mane • droggis electuaris may nuris lust insolence pepyl ar brocht scotland maist • mptuus price na le dammage perdition pepyll thairof▪ 〈…〉 immoderat glutony wit reason ar sa bli • dit within 〈◊〉 body may haue knawlage heuy • ly thyngis body inuoluit sic clowdis fatnes howbeit gud complexiou • nature sa opprest superfl • w metis drinkis may 〈◊〉 weild ȝit ouir self bot confessand self vin • ust geuis place infirmiteis quhill miserably distroyit apperis • e syndry experience f • r mony pepyll remot maist cauld region ar strikyn oftymes maist vehement feuer yair inwart bo • elli blesand yai war 〈…〉 fyre quhilkis cumis sic spicery vncouth •• ggis brocht 〈◊〉 remot cuntreis regioun utheris thaym ar sa sw • llyn growin full • humouris thay ar strikin haistely deid poples • 〈…〉 recouer ane schort tyme efter thay ar bot ane deid p • pyl 〈…〉 sepulture hauand bot ane schadow life ye ȝoung pepyll ••• ni followyng yir vnhappy customis thair 〈…〉 self lust insolence hauand virtuus occupation craftis contemptioun becaus ya • ar lang customit hantit thairwith quhen tyme occurris weir defend cuntre thay ar sa effeminar soft thay pa hors heuy marti ar sa fat growin thay may na thing compare souerane mā heid thair eldaris al sone thay ar returnit hame becaus thair guddis ar sufficient nuris yame voluptuus life pleseir thair wambe thay ar geuyn maner auarice othir castis yame strang maistrifull theuis elli sawaris dissention amang ye nobyllis thir mony othir enormiteis following thaym procedis originaly fra ye fontane voluptuus leuyng intemperance nochtheles wald refrene w thairfra wait thair na region vnder ye sonne mair halsum le subdew pestilence ȝit mair commodius nurisand lyfe man ȝit nocht sa disparit bot traistis within schort tyme corruppit mane • pepyl salbe reparit ane better fassoun nocht allanerly syndry partis realme remanis ȝit ye futsteppis mony auld virtewis vsit sum tyme amang eldaris bot al risis euery day new feruent deuotioun ornament cristin fai • h ane thyng wyl say vnder reuerence vthir realmes yair neuir pepyl mair sicker ye cristin faith ȝit mair constant thair faithful promis scottis he bene ay sen thair first beginning thairfore say ane thing finaly nocht allanerly yair louing bot al exhortation yair perseuerāce sa fat pepil p̄sently leuād region passis thair eldaris sūptuus riatus abulȝement sa far yai ar mair eligant honest yair housis letterꝭ mair magnificent thā afore ornament yair kirkis templis yus want yai na maner virtew yt yair eldaris except temperance thair bodyis quhilk mot bring yame haistely blissit lord amen ☞¶follovvis ane compendius recapitulation kingis britane▪ sen first begynnyng thairof tyme king henry viii history scotland sa implicat history ingland difficyll knaw becaus crown ingland he bene iosit syndry pepyll syndry chance variance oftymes thocht expedient cōmodite pleseir rederis mer thair genelogy first fra brutus quhom britonis war brocht grece ile albion fra begynnyng warld iiiimxxvii ȝeris iosit ye crown britane space imicxvi ȝeris quhilk tyme thay war inuadit cruelly iulius cesar vincust bot thair realm maid tributar forme ꝓuince howbeit thir britonis kingis lang tyme namit britonis blud ȝit thair realme gouernit ay romani ȝeir god iiii hundreth xxxvi ȝeris season thay war subdewit scottis pichtis nocht allanerly maid tributaris thaym xxx ȝeris bot gaif ouir mekyll thair landis empire scottis pychtis paulus diaconus beda sabellicus mony othir recent authouris schawis lenth yair historyis nochtheles thir britonis impacient sustene ye empire ba • har pepyll becaus thay war accustomit afore romane pleseiris chesit constantine son androenus duke bertanȝe king hatrent scottis pichtis cōstantyne come sic pissance army britane yt delyuerit ye britonis al seruitude recouerit thair realme fra redēption iiiiclxv ȝeris efter constantine rang constantius son efter constantinus rang uortigern ye space xxii ȝeris mene tyme ye scottis pichtis rais sic army yt thay almaist subdewit ye britonis agane seruitude throw quhilk uortigern wes constranit seke support saxonis yair weris resistit certane ȝeris al inuasion scottis pichtis quhill last tane slicht hengist brocht extreme seruitude banist al ye britonis walis thꝰ come ye remanent boundis britane vnder ye empire hengist callit hengist land ye pepyl yairof hengistis men bot corruption langage realme callit ingland pepyl inglismen ye britonis war onely disparit ttubyl bot mony ȝeris efter faucht aganis inglismen kīg arthure sindry chancis fortoun bot efter deith yai war subdewit agane content callit inglismen vnder ane name saxonis fra ye deith king arthure quhilk ye ȝeir god vcxlii ȝeris ye ȝeir god imxvi ȝeris ye realme ingland gidit inglismen ay vnd ye empire ane king bot sone efter deuidit vii syndry kingdomes brocht agane ye empire ane king vnder ye samyn marchis yt he lang efter subdewit conquest danis v kingis thair 〈◊〉 continewally efter othir succeding quhom last namit hardy canute quhilk maid mony proude lawis aboue inglismen rang sic tyranny yt ye inglismen fynaly rebellit slew al ye danis within ye space ane nicht hardy canute inuadit al sidis slew hym self disperation inglismen efter slauchter creat edward ye son king eldrede yair kīg eldrede rang aboue yame afore ye cumyng danis nochtheles ye inglismen efter ye slauchter king edward quhilk •• haly lif ye nowmer sanctis dred yt ye danis suld cū yame new battall thairfore creat herald yair king discendit baith ye lynnage inglismen danis thus edward neuo sanct edward bruthir sanct margaret ye haly quene scotland disherist crown ingland herald geuyn rage insolence lust maryit ye douchter willyā bastard normandy within dayis efter brocht hir ingland last tuk sic hatrent aganis hir hir blud yt causit hir schamfully defow lit rebaldis lymmaris cuntre wyllyā ye bastard duk normandy impatient sustene odius offence come ingland gret army depriuit king herald baith lyfe realme atanis ye ȝeir god imlxvi ȝeris efter ye first conques maid yame danis l ȝeris williā ye bastard cōcreour ingland tuk ye crown efter slauchter king herald causit ye normanis inglismen • ncres togidd •• vnd ane blud ony memory ye name danis ye posterite w ••• iam perseueris ȝit gret honour victory thir dayis tegnand abo •• mar vincust ca ii fo cc xlv ¶of gret iustice done kīg iames first al partis scotland natiuite iames ye secund syndry actis done said nobyll prince iames first ca iii fo ccxlv ¶how ye bischop sanct androis lang precheing dissuadit riatus custome bankettis ca iiii fo ccxlvi ¶of sege roxburgh king brocht mony craftismen realme paule craw brint charturaris perth foundit ca v fo ccxlvi ¶how ye erle marche forfaltit syndry vassalage done erle mar gret industry wisdome ca vi fo ccxlvii ¶how denmark scotland war aggreit debaitis kyng iames douchter margaret maryit ye dalphine frāce perse discomfist douglas pyperdene ca vii fo ccxlvii ¶of slauchter kyng iames first punitioun maid thairfore syndry meruellis se • e albioun ca viii fo ccxlviii ¶finis tabule ☞ ¶heir begynnis name scottis ci king xvii buke ca end thairof ¶iames secound son iames first cii king scottis gret trubyll certane ȝeris begynnyng regne conspiratioun principall baronis aganis hym bot last dantit thaym efter rong xxiiii ȝeris brocht subdittis gret trāquillite peace slane roxburgh sklice ane gun brak ouirchargeing xvii day august ȝeir god imiiiiclx certane reasonable causis mouing w haue left history vnwrittin baith iames secund thrid feird quhill tyme mair ganand occur ¶iames thrid son iames secound wes y• ciii king richt different fra y• chance fortoun fader gouernance realme began gret tranquillite peace iustice bot last conspiration maist part baronis aganis hym slane ye xi day iuny ȝeir god imiiiiclxxxviii ¶iames ye fourt son iames ye thrid ye ciiii king realme mony ȝeris gret tranquillite equall ministration iustice throw al partis realme theift reif slauchter dantit seuerane iustice quhil last fortoun began inuy gret felicite causit hym moue weir aganis ingland ye action allanerly france yt micht battal draw king ingland france quhilk inuadyng tyme maist awfull dāgerous weris come bordouris ane hundreth thousand armit men efter yt castell norame mony othir strenthis ye bordourꝭ ingland abaid xx dayis ony battall quhill two part army war skalit fra hym last ruscheand ouir feirsly ennymes ordour slane floddon mony nobyllis ix day september xxv ȝeir regne ȝeir god ane mvcxiii ¶iames fift cv king scottis regnand gret felicite honour aboue w ye maist noble vailȝeand prince yat euir rang afore tyme quhom god conserue grant grace perseuere iustice lang empire gud successioun body amen ☞¶heir endis namis kyngis ☞¶the translatoure sayis buke thow marcyall buke pa nobyll prynce kyng iames fyft souerane maist preclare gif sum tyme thow gettis audience humyll wyse vnto grace declare walkrife nychtis lauboure sare quhilk ithandly he pleseir tak quhyll goldin tytan birnand chare he past signis ȝodiak ¶quhill besy cere hir pleuch harrois he fild hir graingis full euery corne stormy chiron bow arrois he cloudis heuynnis schorne schyll triton wyndy horne ouir quhemlit flowand occean phebus turnit vnder capricorne samyn greis quhare first began ¶sen thow art drawin sa compendius fra flowand latyne vulgar prose schaw quhat princis bene maist vicius quhay he bene cheuelry rose quhay thair kingrik maist honour iois thair blud liberteis he coft regardyng nocht de amang thair fois sa thay mycht memory brocht ¶schaw quhat dangeir difficill wayis antecessouris thair vter mychtis he brocht realme honour dayis ay fechtand thair liberteis richtis romani danis inglismen pichtis curtas reders may throw thy proces ken thairfore thow ganis na catyue wichtis allanerly bot vnto nobyll men ¶and si • personis couettis heir vailȝeand dedis progenitouris cuntre baith peace weir bene gouernit vnto thir present houri forcy cheiftanis mony bl • dy stouris blawin vulgar • en maist vailȝeandly wan landis honouris thair virtew call •• nobyll men ¶for nobylnes sum tyme louyng cumis meritis eldaris gone aristotyll writis rethorikis amang nobillis quhay castin thaym repone mon dres thair life dedis one one mak thaym worthy haue memore honour thair prince nation glore thair posterite ¶ane othir kynd thair nobylnes cumis infusion naturall makis ane man sa full gentylnes sa curtes plesand sa lyberall euery man doi hym ane nobyll call lyon sa nobyll men tellis rage aganis bestis small bot thaym quhilkis maieste rebellis ¶the awfull chu • le ane othir strynd • houcht borne vilest seruitude thair may na gentrice sink mynd help freind nichtbour gud bludy wolf samyn stude fetis gret • stis ragi small leiffis slauchter tyranny end blud ony mercy quhare may ouirthrall ¶this man born ane nobyl thow wyll say geuyn sleuth lust immoderat eldaris wan puttis away fra thair virtew degenerat eldaris fame eleuat thair lyfe honour approche thair fame louyng ay interminat ay vnto vice reproche ¶amang oist grekis hard two knichtis war achylles tersete ane maist vailȝeand othir maist coward better sayis iuuinall poete tersetis son hauand achylles sprete manly force purpos f • lfyll lord euery land strete syne maist cowart cumyn achill ¶man callit ay maist nobyll creat • becaus lyfe maist reason doi assay ay sekand honour • esy cure na noble quhen honour away thairfore maist nobyll man thou say estatis vnder reuerence vailȝeantly doith close latter day natyue cuntre deand defence ¶the glore armis forcy dedis quhen thay ar worthy memoryall na le wyt manheid ay procedis plinius wrait story naturall ane herd hertis strong hauand ane lyon aganis houndis soure herd lyonis arrayit battall hauand ane hert thair gouernoure ¶quhen fers achilles paris slane amang grekis began ane subtell plede quhay maist nobyll prudent capitane place armour succede quhay couth thaym best euery dangeir lede saif thair honour afore vailȝeant aiax wan manhede quhen wise ulisses bure away glore ¶manhede prudence ane fury blynd bringis ane man schame indegence prudence manhede cumis oft behynd howbeit haue na le intelligence thingis cum gone sapience thairfore quhen wit manhede doith concurre hie honour risis magnificence glore noblis ane groundin spurre ¶sen thow contenis mo vailȝeand men wyse euir red ony buke dout gif ony churle velane dispyse byd hence hym harlot rout heir ar kingis mony nobillis stout nane thaym pertenand clan thou art full nobylnes per tout wald nane red bot ane nobyll man ¶thus nobyllis sen thow art dedicat schaw breifly gret deligence ilk story self seperat mak thaym bowsome thyne audience schrink nocht thairfore bot byde thy sentence sen thow art armit inuincible trewth gentyll reders take beniuolence cure otheris na inuy rewth ¶pas lycht thy sentence hie groundit feid assentatioun naturall morall philosophie mony graue prignant orisoun • reders crud • tioun renowmit hector boetius supportit oft scoticronicon make thy mater sententius ¶bring nobyll dedis mony ȝeris gone al fresche recent memorie • thay war bot dayis done •• nobyll men may haue baith laud glorie thair excellent brut victorie ȝit becaus tyme he bene schort thynk quhen haue oportunite ring thair bell ane othir sort ¶leir kingis hait peple vitius na sic personis thair hous ressaue suffir na seruandis auaritius ouir scharp exactionis thair subditis craif done without thair honour saif sekand na conques vnlefull wanis schaw mony reasonis na king mycht haif baronis hartis thair geir atanis ¶schaw kingis life gouernance murrour leuyng peple bene luffis ordinance maneris ar peple sene thairfore kingis he na oppin rene vse pleseiris thaym lykis best hiear honour office thay sustene thair vice ay hiear manifest ¶schaw quhat kynd soundis musicall maist semand vailȝeand cheueleris thondrand blast trumpat bellicall spretis men hardy curage steris syngyng fydlyng piping efferis men honour hye estate becaus spoutis swete venome thair eris ☞and makis thair myndis al effeminate ¶be mony reasonis gret experience schaw na thing erd may gud precius ane virtuus prince quhilk nedefull realme hym he nocht bot deith pouerte schaw na gard armour may defend unhappy lyfe cursit tyranne gyf thay continew mischeuus end ¶persuade kingis gif thay haue ony sycht lang empire honour singulare conques fauour luf euery wicht euery wrangis thair realme repare quhen thair subditis ar oppressit sare fyndis na iustice thair actionis risis nois rumour populare drawis noblis sindry factionis ¶schaw quhat punition reason iustice efferis thay vnhappy creaturis nurisis kingis corruppit vice schaw quhat truble quhat vengeance iniuris contynewaly realme enduris quhen men obscure auaritius he king gydyng thair curis makis nobyllis hym odius ¶schaw gret baronis thair euyll obeysance aganis thair prince makand rebellyon deieckit bene fra thair hie gouernance brocht finall extermynion schaw na hous gret dominion na men rich excellent mycht may lang continew region becaus pepyll may suffer hycht ¶schaw kirkis superflew rent ennyme gud religion makis preistis sleuthfull feruent pietuus werkis deuotion allanerly perdition commoun weill bullis sumptuus bot euyll prelatis gret occasion rage lust life maist vicius ¶schaw ȝoung knychtis suld men weir hardy sprete euery ieoperdie like thair eldaris bene sa mony ȝeir ay defend thair realme liberte thay thair sleuth cowartre fame honour thair eldaris tyne apprise ylk stait thair awin degre ay thay leif morall discipline ¶schaw furth ylk king quhill thow come prince regnis gret felicite quhais anciant blud hie preeminence decorit maist excellent gre without compare hie nobilite 〈◊〉 giftis mo nature hym geuyn gi • nane abusit ȝoutheid euir geuyn noble vnder heuyn ¶thocht thow pa furth bird implume lycht gratius eris werke implore quhare may se ane murrour bricht notable storyis baith vice glore quhilk neuir sene toung afore quhair throw may prudent gouernyng al weill honour realme decore ane virtuus ane noble king ¶finis ☞ heir efter followis history croniklis scotland compilit newly correckit reuerend noble clerke maister hector boece channon aberdene▪ translatit laitly maister iohne bellenden archedene murray channon ro command richt hie riche excellent noble prince iames v name king scottis imprentit edinburgh thomas dauidson dwellyng fornens f • ere wynd ¶heir beginnis first buke croniklis scotland ¶hovv gathelus first ꝓ genitour left land grece come egipt mary scota dochter king pharo cumyng spanȝe capitulo primo efter maner othir pepyl ye scottis desyrand schaw thair beginning richt anciant schawis thame present historie discendi • grekis egiptianis auld croniclis beris thair wes ane greik namyt gathelus sonne cec • • kyng athene otherwayis sonne argus kyng argiues gathelus insolence maid mony heirschippis macedone achaia quhilkis war certane landis grece becaus couth suffer ye correctioun freindis left natiue cuntre grece come egipt ane cumpany siclik ȝoung men fugitiuis wes fra thair cuntre tyme rang egipt pharo scurge pepyl israel quhais son follow faderis iniquite wes drownit eftir wt army ye reid seis punitioun god gathelus wes plesandly resauit egipt appecit cumpany support kyng pharo aganis ye moris pepyll • nd quhilkis vnprouisit haisty incursionis wastit landis townis egipt memphis principall ciete realme thus pharo sene ane miserabyll rewyne realme war nocht changit gouernance empyre epipt industry moyses quhome command god army pharo wes cōmittit pharo supple gathelus wan ane maist dangerus battall agane moris brocht thame sa hie rewyne tuk thair principall ciete callit meroy gathelus • ftir happy victory returnit egipt becaus wes ane lusty persone strang body greit spreit conquest baith fauour ye kyng familiaris plesand victory generit mair inuy thā glore moyses egiptianis hatit blud israell thairfore moyses knawing hatrent egyptiants persewyng hym ylk day deith fled 〈◊〉 egipt ynde saif lyfe gathelus victorius vailȝeand dedis wes maid generall lieutenand kyng pharois army becaus wes ane lusty ꝑson semely blud riall grece prudent ingyne gat kyng pharois dochter namyt scota mariage part thay landis heritage quhilk laitlie war tane force battall fra pepyll israel thir causis ye grekis began reios seand thair capitane sic familiarite prince traistyng thairthrow sumtyme haue ane sicker dwellyng place egipt schort ȝeris eftir pharo deceissit eftir quhome succedit croun egipt sonne bochoris pharo quhilk opprest pepyll israell mair seruitude tyrā ny dyd fader apperit thus na esperance liberte said pepill quhill moyses returnit furth ynd egipt schaw cōmand god bochoris pharo delyuering said pepyll seruitude eftir egipt wes punist vncouth plagis becaus thay held prophecy moyses de • isioun thus war egiptianis sa astonist thay inquirit thair goddis remeid quhome wes ansuerit present plagis quhilkis rang amang thame ye • yme war na thyng respect terrible greuous plagis quhilkis war appeirand cum haistely thame gathelus astonist respon • seand pepyll presently tormentit sorrowful plagis▪ tuk ferme purpos leif egipt • rar assailȝe chance fortoun sum vthir dwellyng thā abide ye manifest vengeance goddis thairfore maid prouisioun thingis necessar saling come mouth nyle wyfe frendis seruandis grekis egiptianis feir said plagis ȝeir fra begynnyng warld iiimvicxliii eftir mekyll wylsum trauell seeis mediterane arriuit land numide quhare w • stoppit inhabitantis land eftir pullit vp salis lang paneful trauell arriuit ane part spanȝe callit thā lusican quhylk wes eftir arryuyng thair callit portyngall say port gathele quhay may surely affirme ane mater sa greit antiquite gathelus sowpit lang trauell hauand na thyng refresche cumpany landit folkis seik vittallis vthir necessaris cumfort thayme eftir thair wery labour meyne tyme ye inhabitantis regioun gaderit aganis hym arrayit battal nochttheles thay war discumfist put flycht throw vyctory gathelus folkis grew esperance gud fortoun traisting eftir sa lang wylsum trauel put end thair labouris haue ane stabyll permanent abydyng said regioun eftir victory inhabitantis maid ane band peace gathelus assygnit hym certane lādis quhair suld haue dwelling ī tymes cuming • chort time eftir bigg • ane toun • pon reuair munde quhylk wes callit tyme brathare▪ bot callit bersale nochttheles inhabitantis dredand thir new pepyll oncouth blud suld incres haistely rich strenth beside thame wes penitent contract thame maid thairfor assistāce thair nychbouris arrayit thame battall aganis gathelus first send certane armit men interrup thair biggynnis syne maid thame • elf reddy cum staill gathelus weill aduertist battel mouit aganis hym micht suffer na delay arrayit folkis meit ennymes exhortyng thame vailȝeantly thair liuis honour haue sicker esperance victory sen battell wes led thame quhylkis war victorius aganis thair vincust ennymes quh • lkis na exercition knawlaige cheualry inhabitantis seand thir strangearis cum batell mychty curage spreit ane oncouth cuntray dred gyf thay war vincust said battell thay suld brocht perpetuall seruytude thairfor desirit gathelus ane cōmonyng quhilk thay gaif hym new appointment certane landis north part spanȝe callit galicia thay ꝓphecy ane strange pepyll suld cum sumtyme dwell thay boundis cōmandit hym pa pepyll sayd partis quhylkis suld brukit hym ony impedimentis tymes cumyng ꝓmyttit gif ony pepyll hapnit inuade hym assist support ¶hovv gathelus beildit ciete brygance namit pepyll scottis hovv send tvvo sonnis ireland decels ca ii band roborat maner forsayd gathelus maid sacrifice vse wes thay dayis goddis syne past north partis spanȝe thair amite confiderit inhabitantis thairof beildit ane toun callit compostella quhair resident princely dignite maid lawis caus subdittis lif togidder ī iustice efter callit pepyll sco • ti affectioun wife callit scota quhome gat two sonnis hiber hemecus spanȝeartis na thyng reiosyng brudy spreding scottis dred samyn sumtyme ryse thair displesour thus tuke thay ferme purpos bring scottis vter distructiō gathelus knawyng weil thair ordinance brocht furth pepyl arrayit battel followit ane richt dangerus doutsum battell bot last vyctory succedi • scottis nane thir parteis war glaid chance fell battell maist forcy vailȝeāt capitanis war slane athir side thus war thay cōstranit ilk side seik peace quhilk wes fynalie tre • tit vnder thir cōditionis baith thir pepyll ī tymes cumyng sal ceis thair weris euery ane thame sall lyfe thair awin lawis reios ye samyn landis impedimentis quhylk thay possedit afore last battel ony persecutioun throw quhilk hapnit ane certane thair pepyll proces tyme send efter ī ireland sicker peace thus standyng amang two pepyll gathelus sittand chiar merbyll within ciete brygance gouernit pepyll iustice▪ chiar merbyl sic weird yt maid euery land quhair wes found natiue scottis thir versis schawis ¶the scottis sall bruke realme natyue ground geif vveirdis fayll nocht quhair euir chiar found throw quhilk hapnit said chiar merbyll wes eftir brocht spanȝe ireland ireland ī thay partis albion quhilkis wer callit efter scotland chiar kingis scotland war ay crownit quhil ye tyme kyng robert bruse ☞¶in quhais tyme besyde mony othir cruelteis done kyng edward lang schankis sayd chiar merbyll wes taikin inglismen brocht scone london put westmonistar quhare remanis dayis ☜ gathelꝰ • pepyl incres brygāce mair multitude mycht sufficiently nurist thocht mair expedient bryng pepil sum othir part quhair thay mycht esely sustenit violat bād faith thairfore counsal prudent men send exploratouris spy gif ony landis war within occeane see quhilkis mycht bryng ane part pepill fame fornens spanȝe ye north wes ane ile inhabit wt rude pepill hauand na lawis maneris sic thingis knawing gathelus brocht schippis mycht get nixt port ī quhylkis put baith sonnis hiber hemecus marinaris w •• rmen othir thingis ne • essare thairto cōmandit hiber admyrall pa said ile quhylk callit irland thir two sonnis gathelus pullit vp salis fortunat wyndis arriuit fift day efter said ile efter thay landit thair folkis thay affixit thair tentis ye nixt strēthis rude pepyl ile astonist cumyng thir weirmen fled thair bestial guddis thair cau •• ni hiber efter cumyng send certane armyt men se quhat pepyll inhabit ile weirmen quhilkis war send effect hapnit cum apon sayd pepyll fleand said thair guddis auenture ane part thaym slew otheris brocht prisoneris thair admyrall hiber knawing syndry signis land plentuous commandit gif pepil wald plesandly subdewit na forthir inuasion maid thaym pepyl seand hym mercyfull cā drit thair self thair guddis ressauit thaym sic beniuolence sufferit thame incres pepyl vnder ane name lawis left broder gouerne thaym autorite iustice sic thyngis done maid sacrifice honour goddis send felicite pepyll syne returnit spanȝe leuand behind hym ane strang garison wiffis barnis inhabit land keip vnder obeysance brother hemecus hyber returnyng spanȝe fand fader gathelus deccissit efter quhais deith wes maid kyng began eik boundis empire wan sindry townis fra spanȝeartis hauand hym tymis ane strang gard men quhais pissance cheualry dantit pepyll sic maner wes haldyn gret estimatioun reuerence amang sayd pepyll thus war thay constranit seik peace efter last band peace ye scottis grew spanȝe quhylk wes namit hiberia fra hiber sic amyte baith pepyll grew vnder ane name blude sic tender freindly beneuolence y• ony memoree auld iniuris ilk man set hym defend nichbour brothir fader baith weir peace hiber discendit lang progressioun ane gret posterite efter hym lynealy succedīg amāg quhom wer mony nobyll famous princis metellius hermoneus ptolomeus hibertus symon brek ☞ hovv hemecus gouernit irland hovv symon brekvves maid king efter deith ca iii quhill sic thyngꝭ war done spanȝe hemecus quhilk wes left said brothir hiber irelād gouernit ye gret felicite namit samin hibernia fra hiber quhilk callit langage ireland ile wes inhabit thay dayis two pepill scottis auld inhabitantis quhilkis war gottin sum auctouris sayis gyandis hemecus gouernyt baith thir pepill gret iustice hauand na le respect seissoun tyme occurrit maneris pepill vnder obeysance knawyng weil nathyng mycht bryng pepill sonar vnder ane freindschip band yan sic doyngis ȝit mycht neuir bryng thaym effect schort tyme eftir hemecus deceissit eftir quhais deth rais ane odious debait quha suld gouernour euery natioun contendyng haue lord thair awin blude quhill last thay creat two gouernouris betuix quhom rais continuall battall slauchtir athir syde throw ambitioun byrnand desyre gouernour sayd ile efter lang battallis thir two pepyl brokyn wt syndry displesourꝭ war cōstranyt tak peace howbeit schort tyme indurit ilk ane thaym persewyng othir battal ȝit thay dwelt mony ȝeris togiddir interchange weir peace quhill last y• scottis brokyn ylk day mair iniuris send thair ābassatouris metelliꝰ quhilk wes ye tyme regnand aboue scottis spanȝe desiryng thair lamētabill regrait haue support aganis ye auld inhabitantis ireland schawand thaym ane wyld pepill impacient suffir oncouth empire aboue thame throw quhilk ye scottis mycht haue na tranquilite without said pepill wer mair haistelie dantit▪ message scotis ye mair acceptabili metellius yt concernit ye cōmoun weil baith scottis spanȝe ireland discending lang progression lynage blud king metellius nocht refusit thayr desyris traistyng samyn succeid na le honour glore hym self ye proffet freindis thairfore send thre sonnis hermoneꝰ ptolomeus hibert ane army vailȝeant men ireland quhair thay richt dangerus battal vincust auld inhabitantis said ile sic thyngis done ireland hermoneus eldest brodir returnit spanȝe leuand behynd hym two brethir ptolomeꝰ hibert quhilkis gouernit pepill lād mony ȝeris eftir gret tranquillite iustice maid lawis efferyng ryte thay dayis instrukkit preistis mak sen sacrifice goddis ye maner egiptianis vsit thus incressit pepill mony ȝeris eftir gret felicite rich bot nature men
