ouir greit prosperite engeneris euil maneris causis men wirk frequent displesourꝭ thaym self quhē thay fynd na ennimes inuaid thaym hame thir pepil eftir lang peace war deuidit two opinionis cōtendyng gouernance administratioun realme thir two partis vterlie distroit othir war thay war reconseld togiddir ane nobill man namyt thanaus principal man vnder kyng quhilk wes send afore ambassatour said ile reiosyng felicite succedyng frendis caus thaym prudēt consultation incres togidder vnder mynd thanaus honest behauyngis hal • yn amang thaym gret prudence hauand bot newtrall affection baith partyis persuadit thaym thair conuentioun remoue cō tentionis risyng amang thaym cheis ane quhō thay thocht maist expedient thair kyng obeysant hym thair gouernance na thing micht ī erd sa gud ane gud kyng throw persuasioun ye pepyll tuk sic feruent desyre haue ane kyng iniuris beand reparit thay cōmandit thanaꝰ • heis hym kyng quhom thocht maist expedient thā said thanaus knaw ȝour myndis sa deuidit syndry factionis na man participant thairwith may esaly ȝour kyng senȝour myndis haue ane newtral person regne aboue ȝow thair spanȝe ane nobyll man gret seuerite iustice namit symon brek weill accustomit wt ȝour lawis lynealy cumyng metellius ȝour ancient progenitour quhais sonnis sumtyme nocht supportit ȝow quhan maist danger occurrit bot gouernit ȝow mony ȝeris efter gret tranquillite iustice quhais posterite ȝit remanis amang ȝow ī maist honouris think symon maist abyll ȝour kyng partyis herand name symon brek war glad haue hym kyng becaus ye name wes haldyn richt fortunat thay dayis ¶and ony lang tary thay send thair ambassatouris spanȝe caus symō cum ireland ressaue crown thairo • symō knawing degest auysement entent thir ambassatouris prouydit ane flote schippis finaly ꝓsper windis arriuit ireland quhair wes solemply ressauit▪ crownit ye chiar merbyll quhilk wes brocht spanȝe maist riche iowell thay dayis symon wes first kyng rang abou • scottis ireland fra begynnyng warld iiiimvc iiii ȝeris fra flude noy iimcc viii fra begynnyng rome lx ȝeris fra empire brutus albion cccclxxii ȝeris incarnatioun god viclxxxxv ȝeris symon gouernit ireland gret ꝓsperite counsel namely thanaus quhome gaif syndry landis lyand south partis ireland beside ryuere birsus quhilkis landis ar callit dowdale quhair said thanaus dwelt efter pepyll y• brocht hym brigance famous ciete spanȝe thir pepyll war callit brigandis quhome efter proces tyme discendit mony nobyll vailȝeant men quhilkis come efter fergus ye first kyng scottis albioun quhome thay landis scotland quhilkis ar callit galloway wes callit brygance quhais inhabitantis war fundin ay full manheid strangest ennymes romani brytonis fall efter heir symon gouernit ireland gud felicite deceissit fourty ȝeir regne▪ ¶of gret posterite scottis regnand ireland efter symon brek first cumyng scottis pichtis albion hovv pichtis vvar alliat vvith scottis ca iiii symon deceissit said sonne fanduf wes maid kyng efter hym succedit ethione efter ethione succedit glaucꝰ efter glaucus succedit nathasyll efter nathasyll succedit rothesay rothesay wes first kyng send ony scottis ilis albion first ile inhabit callit rothesay fra name remanent ilis wer callit hebredes fra hiber eldest sonne gathelus rothesay herand deth fader nathasyll returnit ireland quhair generall vocis pepyll wes maid kyng ȝeir scottis wer brocht ireland albion fra ye empire symon brek ireland ccxvi ȝeris fra begynnyng warld iiiimvicxvii ȝeris scottis cumyng ireland maner spred ī syndry ilis albiō lyand ye gret north thairof deuidit thaym ī syndry tribis first ile thay tuk possessyoun croniklis schawis wes nami • ardgaell fra gathelus quhylk corruptioun langaige callit ardgile scottis deuidit maner syndry tribis chesit certane capitanis euery tribe gouerne thaym baith ī tyme weir peace hauand name thair capitane sic reuerence quhasa euir tuke samyn vane war na le punist thay manesworne thair goddis attour thay maid inuocation thairto quhē maist trubyll occurrit sum diuinite war samyn preserue thaym fra danger consuetude perseuerit mony ȝeris efter ilis nocht lang efter banist pepyll namit pichtis come furth denmark serche ane dwellyng place efter yt thay war īhibit land baith france brytane ireland thay landit ī albion sum authouris sayis thay come first ī orknay sone efter cathnes ro murray mernis angus fiffe louthiane expellit ye pepyll inhabit region afore thair cumyng thir pepyll war callit pichtis outhir thayr semely personis elli variant colour thair clethyng elli thay war namit pychtis fra pychtis namit agathirsanis thair anciant faderis probation heirof orknay wes callit auld realme pichtis siclike seeis betuix cathnes orknay war namit pentland fi •• h landis quhilkis ar callit louthiane war callit thā pētland sum authouris sayis thir pichtis wer ye residew hunn • banist flemyngis come first britane seik ane dwelling quhair thay sorrowfull battall lost humber thair king lot • yne camber sonnis brutus quhilk began ye empire britane opinion plesant war nocht ye dait ȝeris descordant ye history brutus sonnis war mony ȝeris afore thair cumyng albion thir pichtis wrytis mony auld recent authouris quhom applaudis cornelius tacitus lyfe romane agricola quhare namis ye scottis cumyng spanȝeartis pichtis almanis quhat sum euer natioun thay ben discendit treuth efter thair cumyng albion thay war ane ciuill pepyl richt ingenious crafty baith weir peace sone efter thair cumyng albion quhilk wes fra begynnyng warld iiiimviiiclxvii ȝeris creat ane kīg gouerne thaym iustice began maik policy byggyng munitionis townis castellis becaus thay knew al pepyl successioun abyll perische thay send thair ambassatouris ye scottis desyring haue thair dochteris mariage schew thocht thay war oncouth blude thay suld nocht vilependit sen thay na le prudence thā manheid he ouirset incredibill dangeris baith see land laitly conquest throw beneuolence goddis richt plentuous landis sic peace tranquillite nane othir pepyll may clame thaym reason confiding surely gif ye goddis support thaym thair awin industry equall ony thair nychtbouris baith peace weir forthir gif scottis cōdiscendit thair honorabyll desyris mycht fall two pepyl incres togidder sa strang vnder ane blude thay mycht ye better resyst fury ennymes quhen euir hapnit thaym inuadit legatioun wes vnplesand first tyme scottis think vnworthy haue ony societe mariage ane vncouth banist pepyll ȝit degest auisement thay fand thair cōmoun weil wes nocht risyng sic pyssance yt thay mycht resist ye britonis quhilkis hatit thaym sen thair first begynnyng heirfor augment thair cō moun weill maik thaym strāg aganis ye britonis thay wer profoundly resoluit haue aliance ye pichtis gif thair dochteris mariage vndir thir condicionis ylk ane thaym sall reiose ī tyme cumyng al thay landis quhilkis thay reiosit afore mariage concurre togidder thair hale pyssance al oft thay war inuadit ennymes maid offence ony ane thaym sall reput ennymy thaym baith al oft croun pichtis come pley king chosyn nerrest womānis blude thir conditionis plesand sydis scottis gaif thair douchteris mariage pychtis ¶hovv britonis thair quent slichtis dissoluit band allyance betuix scottis pichtis trubyll fell thairthrovv ca v britonis tuk na lytyl suspitioun mariage dredand gif thir two pepyll incressit togiddir vnder ane blude sa strang schort tyme nothir micht said britonis tyme present thair posterite sufficient resyst pyssance thir two pepyll thairfor tuke purpos distroy thaym baith inuade thaym erar fraudefull slychtis thā ony force battal bring thair purpos effect thay deuysyt • ai sic seditioun betuix thir two pepyll ylkane thaym sall inuade othir battall fra ane war cleirly distroyit othir brokyn ye wetris micht facyl pray thaym ¶ȝit couir thair slychtis secretly thay supersedit thair intention thre ȝeris auyse gif ꝓces tyme mycht gif ony better occasioun moue battall tyme affinite afore contrackit pichtis multiplyit ane brudy successioun quhairthrow two pepyl grew equal beneuolence pichtis geuand thair industry polecy labour thair handis settand thair ingyne beilde municiounis townis defence agmentation thair cōmoun weil scottis exerceyng thaym craft hunting halkyng nurising thair bestiall hauād na othir rich bot grew thair store war dayly clothit haberione mailȝe bow arrowis ythand exercition al reddy tymes defend thair lyuis landis liberteis thair ennymes war inuaid thaym set battal menetyme brytonis send thair ambassatouris ye pichtis hauand gret wounder quhy thay preferrit ye scottis thaym sen thay war ane pepyl full rich glore quhais famous cheualry wes knawin france almany othir syndry regionis seeis landis hauand ane riche realme repleit mynis mettall sa plentuous euery frutis necessar vse man yt thay mycht hie pleseir thair nychtbouris al weill weir peace contrar scottis war ane ondantit pepyll hauand rude wyld maneris ony humanite cō fydyng mair thair fuliche audacite ony proues vertew dwelling amang strait barrant montanis reiosyng na thyng sa mekyll murdir men beistis attour thay prophecy pichtis suld extermynat vterly distroyit scottis without thay socht haisty remeid thir causis desirit thaim mak ane new band confideracioun britonis fyne ye scottis may outhir expellit albion elli brocht vter distruction quhilkis doingis thay mycht haue incredibill commodite reiosyng baith thair realmes ony feir tymes cumyng gif thaym prouocatioun attempt besynes thay ꝓmyttit support thaym men money vitallis thair pleseir message credit pichtis afore ane vehemēt suspitioun brudy spredyng scottis suld sumtyme fall hie dā mage thair posterite al nathing mycht haue causyt thaym mair moue battall aganis scottis responsis thair goddis concurrand thair awin suspition last pichtis lang consultatioun answerit thay contrackit affinite scottis mair necessyte ony hartly frendschyp quhais corruppit maneris war richt vnplesand thaym nochttheles sic oportunite may cum proces tyme thay mycht haue sufficiēt occasyon moue weir aganis scottis thay desyrit na thīg mycht sa acceptabyll thaym amyte fallowschip brytonis prouydyng alwayis said britonis maid thaym sufficient help quhen tyme requirit aganis scottis sic besynes done occurrit tyme ambassatouris war dispeschit schort tyme eftir pichtis seikand oc • asyoun moue battall aganis scottis cōmandit general edict na scottis found within ony townis lādis pichtis efter ane prefixit day vnder pane deth pichtis efter yt day wes ouir past slew scottis war found within thair townis munitionis roumes brekaris thair lawis scottis richt vnpacient sustene sa hie iniuris ceissit quhill thay slane al mony pichtis wer afore slane scottis incontinent haisty trubil risyng maner wes sa lamētable murdir athir syde yt ylkane thame slew othir thair recountering regarding nothir affinite blude tyme place ¶hovv pichtis scottis maid thair ordinance inuade othir battell hovv ferquhard kyng irland send sonne fergus vvith ane army support scottis aganis pichtis hovv said fergus vves maid kyng ca vi maner ye peace dissoluit pichtis denuncit battall scottis efter quhilk followit con • inual īcursionis athir syde attour euery thyng suld done erar consultatioun inmoderat hatrent pichtis prouidit al thingis necessar battell ī quhat wise quhat capitanis suld led quhidder thay suld abide ye cumyng thair enymes inuade thame within thair awin rowmis tyme scottis cōuenit argyle quhair capitanes war deuidit sindry opinionis concerning battell sum accusyng tresonable slichtis pichtis desyrit pa thame haistely wrangus manesworne pepyll brekaris thair fayth quhais iniure wes sa importabyll micht suffer na delay otheris thocht expedient sen ye mater wes wechty inuade thair ennymes hyd slychtis gud ordour mene tyme rais vp ane agit man sayd maner knaw weill hartly frendis iniure pichtis sa intollerabyll odius suld rusche haistely harnes reuenge ye same▪ nochttheles besynes bene weill done yt procedis gud auisement sen ireaualis nocht strenth knaw weill battell ȝe intende moue sall na le aganis brytonis pichtis howbeit ȝe haue nocht craft cheuelry pissance resist thame baith thir causis thinke na besines sa profitable send ambassatouris aunciant progenitouris ireland haue thair support maist dāgerus cais forther sen pluralite capitanis oft occurris rasis seditioun best chese ane amāg w haue empire aboue laif quhais coūsel sall fecht lyuis liberteis aganis ane fals manesworne pepyl quhilk he inuadit w ony occasyoun iniuris last opinioun wes maist apprisit scottis sone efter send thair ambassatouris ireland complenand ye wickit offence done pichtis desiring support ferquhard quhilk wes tyme kyng scottis ireland sore mouit displesure done frendis scottis albion send sonne fergus ane wyse vailȝeant prince thair support gyue thame esperance permanent sonse weird send thame fatale chiar marbyll fergus wes plesandly ressauit scottis yt thair cōmoun weil wes approchand hie dāgear ane maist perellus battall efter cumyng ane counsell wes set argyle quhylk fergus said wyse maist vailȝeant pepyll ȝe se ane cumpany nobyll men ȝe desyrit cumyng ȝour regioun resyst fury ennymes faderis ar sa reuthfull thair chyldrin nane offēce may done thair said childrin bot returnis thair dishonour schame ar dettit ȝou faderis thair chyldrin schaw ȝou thairfor oure chyldrin sall schaw w ȝour faderis lat ane iniure commoun w baith sen ar coniunit togydder blud amyte glore honour may redound w proffyte vnto ȝow ȝit ane thyng bene necessar auyse quhidder ye empire ane mony mair proffitabill ȝour cōmoun weill quhilk thame ȝe think maist proffitabill sall plesand w sen fauoure beneuolence goddis ar happely arriuit ȝour regioun cumyng ȝour syngulare weill support counsel efter orison fergus thocht pluralyte capitanis vnproffitabill thairfor degest consultatioun condiscendit gouernit empire ane kyng kyng haue empire thame al weill peace euery trubyl appering aganis thair ennymes attour remoue suspitioun hatrent becaus ylk tribe desyryt ane kyng thair awin lynnage thay chesit fergus baith nobyll blude othir excellent virtuous thair kyng attour wes sa prouyn manheid iustice na capitane tribis mycht comparit hym fergus chosyn kyng maner wes crownit fatale chiar merbyl quhilk brocht hym respons goddis stabyll realme albion wes ye first kyng y• rang aboue scottis ye regioun fra begynnyng ye warld iiiimviiiclxix ȝeris afore incarnatioun god cccxxx ȝeris fra begynnyng rome ccccxx fra impire brutis brytane viiicxxxvii ȝeris ¶hovv kyng fergus come vvith gret ordinance aganis pichtis hovv • dessait britonis vves discouerit baith scottis pichtis ori • maid fergus kyng pichtis ca vii scottis rysyng maner haue schawin albioun kyng fergus gaue hole mynd attendance resyst iniure battall mouit pichtis efter callit al capitanis afore hym cōmandit euery ane thame reddy pa hym wt careage hors fourty dayis vitallis becaus knew na thyng mair odius seditioun amang weirmē maid afald concord amang pepyll cōmandit thame obeysant thair capitanis sic ordour none thame wauer fra thair fallois ī auē ture thay fall pray thair ennymes sic thyngis done maid sacrifice honoure goddis according ye vse wes thay dayis praying goddis take vengeance ye party gaif first occasyoun battall aganis othir grant hym sic felicite iust defence ye victory may succede hym heuy dammage pepyll quhill scottis war thair besynes pichtis assemblit ane army na litill gareson brytonis concurrant thair support apperit athir syde ane wickit vnnaturall bergane betuix two pepyl freindis cietezouris faderis sonnis pichtis come first ye scottis lādis aganis quhome wt na le curage thā manheid went fergus wt anciant armis displayit forme baner quhilk wes ane reid lyoun rampand ane feild gold thunderand steir awfully dyngand bak gise gentyll lyoun quhen enforsis hym wrayth fergus wes first bure thir armis albion efter hym thay war ay armes kyngis discendyng lynnaige dayis quhyll scottis pichtis wer ar • ayit otheris sycht army brytonis stude arrayit dreich nocht far fra thame deuisand quhat slychtis thay micht distroy thame baith ferme purpos quhen scottis pichtis wer ionit togidder ta • e thame discomfist thā party vyctorius suld finaly distroit thair f • esche army quhen thir two pepyll war distroyit slicht ye britonis mycht reiose baith thair realmes albion ony feir tymes cumyng subtel slicht wes discouerit fergus ane banist briton throw quhilk hapnit baith ye armyis mouit na le feir ennymes thair awin propir dammage supersedi • battall certane dayis meyne tyme kyng fergus desyrit ane cōmonyng kyng pychtis apon hi • materis concernyng na le weill pychtis scottis kyng pichtis refusit nocht cō monyng met kyng fergus ane cumpany nobillis oistis standing ylk syde arrayit sayd fergus maner ¶oftymes riche townis • nd pepyll contendyng su • eriorite he brocht thaym self 〈◊〉 rewyne thair ennymes 〈◊〉 hie cō moditeis quhilk thingis •• nocht faill cum w gif happin fecht day occasion battell quhylk ȝe mouit first aganis w desyris nocht tyme discussit lauchfull iniust howbeit scottis he sustenit ȝour pepyll importabyll iniuris ony redres ȝit gif leful erar schaw verite ony flurisand wourdis desyre kyngdowme slicht britonis he mouit ȝow battall ȝe wald neuir haue inuadit w ȝour faderis war nocht britonis oure commoun ennymes he deuisyt quent slichtis baith mischeiffis quhidder thir thyngis trew fals ȝe may best discus howbeit na reasone may perswaid beleif ony othir bot battall sal cum gif cōtinew irrecouerable dammage w baith gif fecht quha doutis▪ b • victory sall vncertane ar equal pissāce suppone vicust quhilk may nocht succeid vndemus murdir ȝow sall ȝe ane facyll pray ȝour ēnymes bryngand thaym tryumphe honour ȝour self misire seruitude quhat thyng may odius detestabyll▪ sonnis inuade thair faderis • faderis ȝe sonnis ȝour sonnis nepotis quhidder vincus • victorious ȝe sall defoull ȝour self maist terribyll offence aganis goddis heirfor lat w commoun peace nychtbouris freindis alliat togidder cō sider quhat infinite dammage battall sall w quhat commodite commoun ennymes gyf ony iniure done scottis ȝour pepyll sall redressit fyne quhilkis ar ane proximite blude may euade quent slychtis deuisit brytonis baith dammage inuade ennymes ye samyn tressoun thay deuysit w reason iustice may seme mair pyssant amang w thā hatrent inuy beleif na othir way sa souir stabyll pepyll ile albion ¶of syndry consultationis maid pichtis hovv thay vvar recounseld vvith scottis ca viii king pichtis āswerit thir wordis fergus mycht nocht priuate autorite dissolue thīgis done publyk counsell nobyllis battall mouit wes decernit publyk nocht priuate counsell nochttheles wald glaidly auyse nobillis quhidder thay wald haif weir peace sal conuene place thair mynd al sone baith ye kyngis returnit thair tentis kyng pychtis rehersit wourdis fergus afore counsell schew day behuuit thaym nocht haue fochtin aganis ye scottis bot aganis tressoun britonis verify entent brocht certane britonis testimoniall thairof attour inoportune sollicitation brytonis desyryng battal aganis scottis maid slycht credibill pichtis pichtis auysyng vnprudently mater war deuidit two opinionis sum allegit amyte scottis wes refusit thay haue persewit pichtis sa mony slauchteris reiffis may nocht dewly redressit heirfor thair alliance al thair condicionis peace aucht cō temnit sic thyngis may nocht indure quhare reif iniure hatrent ar estemit faith reason iustice otheris said amyte scottis wes baith honest necessare becaus thay mony pleseiris afor pichtis mouit na battall quhil thay war first iniurit sen britonis war cōmon ēnymes baith scottis pichtis force thaym reconseld elli schāfully doūg albiō attour affinite blude rysyng betuix thaym suld put end thair weris sen na thyng detestabyll goddis abhominabyl mortal creaturis thā thay pepil moue battall aganis othir quhilkis ar alliat vnder ane cōmixtioun blude thairfor apperit na thing sa gud pychtis haue freindschyp scottis le thay purposit rendir falset hatrent euyl dedis faith luf gud thankis efter mony pichtis war geuin peace ane pichtis ennemy scottis becaus broder wes slane last battall said wise blind contentioun rysyng amang ȝow maist vailȝeant men haue ȝe nocht sufficient experience falset cruelte scotti • delite ȝe ony forther assailȝe gif ony band may kepit vnfaithfull pepyll full fers ingyne cruelte borne vter mischeif beleif ȝe respons goddis vane suld nuris pestilē cius vennome fynall perdicioun baith w realme bludy tressonabyll pepyll gif goddis schawis verite sall nocht fail rais amang w ane flame sall neuir sloknit wickit man answerit ane othir picht said ȝe suld nocht mouit respons goddis gif thay determit verite thay may nocht eschewit gyf thay fals thay suld nocht dred heirfor iniuris done ony slicht tressoun athir partus suld remouit saif oure honestee lat neuir oure aith band brokin oure defalt becaus haue sufficient experience dayis quhat notabyll vengeance bene takyn apon mony nobyl vailȝeant campionis quhen thay nocht thair faith goddis reuerence lat w returne band scottis sen ye may nothir dissoluit offence goddis ȝit incredibill scham • sa may perseuere kyndnes offence othir ye inmortall goddis tender freindis al nature moder euery thyng constranis w luffe faderis thay luffe barnis thair nepotis nocht necessar thairfor haue ony battal bot erar luffe freindis nocht derisioun ennymes al sone thir wordis war said wyffis pychtis quhilkis followit army luffe thair husbādis fell kneis ruthfull teris praying thair husbandis violat nocht thaym self schamful slauchter thair faderis better w barnis said thay de ony maner deith se faderis husbandis slaand othir cruell wondis pychtis mouit sum part luffe thair wiffis barnis sum part reuerence thair godis condiscendit haue peace scottis vnder thir cōditionis redres maid ylk syde brytonis quhilkis wer mouaris battall sall haldyn ennymes baith pepyl chargis pleseir two kyngis quhidder thay list strength peace vnder auld conditionis new gyf thir conditionis war nocht sufficient roborat peace quhat conditionis two princis thocht maist ganand sone eftir ane day set renewe peace brytonis quhilkis come ī support pichtis heirand concord returnit hame dredand ye samyn succede thair lytyll proffet day affixit scottis pichtis war agreit al debatis efter tenour ye auld band thir new conditionis ilk ane thir two pepyl sal leif content thair awin rowmes supportyng othir al weill honour profit quhen hie difficil chargis occurris aganis thair ennymes iniuris done ony ane thaym sal reput commoun thaym baith quhen wes necessar thaym fecht aganis thair ennymes baith pepyll sall conuene togidder vnder ane mynd ordināce peace beand roborat maner bait • kyngis returnit hame ¶hovv coyll kyng britoni • vvas slane army discomfist scottis pichtis ca ix coyll kyng brytonis herand ȝork scottis pichtis confyderat maner foresaid richt sorrowfull dred thir two pepyl incres sum tyme hie displeseir astonist heirof nocht knawing quhat ingine micht distroy thaym baith slychtis afore come lytyll effect tuke ferme purpos haue experience gyf scottis quhome held ane vagabound banist pepyll vncouth blude strang murdir bestis durst fecht aganis pepyll full glore cheualry ȝit supersedit mater two ȝeris se gif ony prowd insolence mycht gener new deuisyoun amang thaym quhairthrow mycht fynd sum better occasioun inuaid thaym battall vnder stude na sickir tranquillite peace mycht amang pepyll duryng fallowschip scottis pychtis vnder ane concord blude heirfor rais sum occasioun battal betuix thir two pepyl send ane cumpany brytonis nowmer inuade bordouris pichtis frequent heirschippis quhen reason trewis desyrit pichtis reparit britonis schew thaym neuir accustumate sic corruppit de • thyft said wes done scottis allanerly last ye ground slycht serchit brocht lycht ye prouyn cleirly ye brytonis throw quhilk two confiderat pepyll tuke syk hatrent aganis said brytonis yt efter incredibyll slauchter thair pepyl thay inuadit thair realme brocht ane multitude bestyall samyn ¶kyng coyll impacient suffer outraige maid hym wirk thyng force armes quhilk micht afore slycht ingyne assemblit sone efter ane huge nowmer pepil gret ordinance battall entrit west bordouris scotland affixit tentis ryuer dune inuadyng countre continuall heirschyppis fyre slauchter fergus weill aduertist thair doingis cōmandit bestiall guddis dreuyn ye mōtanis thaym cōmandit ye wiffis barnis febyll creatouris pa ye strenthis ye said montanis eschew ye fury ennymes sic thyngis done cōmandit general proclamationis al fensabyl mē reddy thayr best auyse resist thair ēnymes howbeit desyrit na thing mair prolong battal yt lang tary penurite vittallis ennymes mycht wery irkit mene tyme ane scot tresonabilly fled kyng coyll discouerit hym euery thyng deuysit kyng fergus incontinent kyng coyll send v britonis take said pray bestyall fra montanis mycht vntraist suddante cruelte exerce maid army reddy inuade scottis ye nixt morrow sic thyngis schawin scottis pychtis thair scurriouris apperit na lytyll affray thair army fergus tuke consultatioun nobillis quhat best done mony thaym astonist multitude curage brytonis dissentit battall utheris exhortit hym thairto saying thay war ane sufficient army determit fecht defence thair wiffis barnis lyberteis deith sa wald assist thaym attour wes na le necessar honorabyll assail • e chance battall victory gottyn erar manheid prudence ony multitude pepyll efter dyuers opinionis concludit ye fergus folkis first vigill sall set wache brytonis ye kyng pichtis folkꝭ sal pa ouir ye watter dune quhare army britonis lay cū haistely thair bakkis al sone thay heir nois ryis scottis sic thyngis done manheid prudence submit resydew chance fortoun samyn • aycht fergus deuisit slew gret ieoperdy wache britonis nocht braik thair trinschis bot enterit fersly within thair tentis afore king coyll aduert • st cumyng incōtinent rais ane terribyll clamour amang britonis fast raschand harnes resist haisty effray quhen suddanly pichtis come thair backis suspekand na thyng le sic irruptioun ennymes britonis nocht weill walkinit thair sleip war inuadit al sydis discomfist thay mycht cum array amang quhome kyng coyll vnwarly kepit nobillis slane memory heirof ye place quhare slane namit efter coyll quhilk regioun remanis ȝit vnder ye name lytyll different thairfra callit kyle ¶of king fergus orisō nobillis hovv croun scotland vvas tailȝet hym successouris ca x efter victory scottis pichtis displayit baner conuenit ane lytyll mote resydew brytonis quhilkis war eschapit fra battall thair • eyng vnder nycht herand thair kyng slane thair army discomfist send ane herald desyre peace scottis pichtis insolent efter vyctory afore rebutit britonis denyit peace nochttheles two kyngis quhilkis knew weill gret pissance britonis cōdiscendit thair peticionis quhen pray spulȝe battall equaly deuydit amang ye two pepil efferyng thair manheid prowes two kyngꝭ returnit hame sone efter fergus cōuenit nobillis ī argyle said ī wyse ȝe se maist vailȝeant cā pionis ȝe speciall fauour goddis he vincust ȝour ennymes brocht ȝour landis wysdome manheid sickir peace thocht ȝe war vnequale baith nowmer pissance ȝit goddis he bene sa propiciant ye ȝe haue vincust ennymes quhome ȝe maist dred erd ȝe haue put ȝour noysum ennyme al army ar richit thair spulȝe thay contemnit ȝow afore febyll banyst vnarmit pepyll he reuthfully desyrit ȝour peace mair necessar honest thaym ane notabyl exampyll tymis cumyng vnsycker confyde ony vane pissance man knaw weill riche pissant ar brytonis baith see land riche thay ar schame redoū dis thaym glore w sen thay vincust w quhome thay held maist vyle febyll haue vsit victory ony cruelteis haue vincust ire fyne goddis quhilkis he geuyn w sa prowd victory sall nocht fynd peruerst insolence ony occasyon bring w sum othir tyme derisioun ennymes sen nocht exercit hattent thir dyscomfist brytonis fleyng oure fury dirknes nycht bot sufferit thaym depart mercy peace thus may euydently se wiffis barnis liberteis landis quhilkis ennymes intendit haue bereft w ar saiffit allanerly fauour goddis restis auyse prudent cōsultation may eschew dangier apperyng tymes cumyng quhylkis thyngis sall succede better gyf haue goddis reuerence kepand band pychtis britonis promyttit continewyng realme samyn gouernance ȝe deuysit first cumyng prouydyng wayis remoue seditioun scurrilite auaricius leuyng sic thyngis may induce hatrent amang ȝow forthir maik ylk persone leif awin war best part landis regioun generall consent swa euery ane w content awin may haue na occasioun iniure nychtbour sic thyngis sall caus w incres glore honour oure freindis dredour fayis wald god mycht se ȝow deir pepyll rysyng sic vertew afore deid mycht syckir esperance schaw ȝour eldaris weil apperyng thair posterite ¶quhen fergus endit orisoun pepyll schew thaym reddy fulfyll desyre neuir gouernit tymes cumyng bot empyre ane kyng nane regne aboue thaym bot kyng fergus blude failȝeing thairof prayit ye goddis send na le vengeance thaym thair posterite fel sumtyme thaim egipt spanȝe transgressioun cōmand goddis kyng fergus gat charter euydence crown scotland hym successouris sort quhilkis charteris war grauyn merbyll ymagis beistis forme letteris vsit thay dayis syne gaif samin maist religious preistis obseruit thair tempillis ¶hovv kyng fergus partit landis scotland amang nobyllis realme maneris brigandis ca xi schort tyme eft quhē scottis refreschit thaym huntyng othir exercitionis kyng fergus cōuenit nobyllis said maner tyme maist prudent faderis sen oure realme stablit gud peace part landis realme quhylk ȝe reiose ordour amang ȝow otheris come ireland regyoun ¶to plesandly ar chosyn vii newtrall men amang w quhilkis sall deuyde realme sic reasone prudence quhare lādis ar maist plētuous salbe geuyn ye le quhare ye samyn ar barrant geuin pepyl well applesit counsell chesit seuyn prudent men quhilkis cōsiderit boundis scotland deuydit samyn marchis equally refering thairto thir prudent men returnit fourt moneth efter argyle quhare kyng fergus resydent ye tyme quhais presence ye landis scotland war cassin cauyll amang nobyllis thairof first cauyll fell cornath capitane tribe landis cathnes lyand fornens orknay betuix dummysbe watter thane secundly capitane lutork fel landis betuix watter thane ne callit ro lutork come ane band vailȝeant men ireland kyng fergus albion land ro lyis breid fra cromarte mouth watter lochte countre famous castel urquhart quhilk rewinous wallis remanis ȝit gret admiratioun pepyll thridly capitane warroch fell landis lyand betuix spay ne fra ye almane ireland seis pepil land war callit ware name thair capitane bot sone efter thay war sa sedicious thay war doung countre murrayis brocht thair rowmis quhom ye landis war callit murray land nixt cauyl fell capitane thalis landis boyne aynȝe bogewall gariot formartyne bowquhan thir landis war callit vndir ane name thalia name thair capitane nixt cauyl fell capitane martach landis marre badeȝenoch lochquhaber vi cauel fell capitane nouāce landis lor • e kyntter hillis montanis thairof lyand fra marre ireland seis ye vii cauell fell atholus landis athole discendit scottis spanȝe come spanȝe ireland ireland come fergus scotland ane vailȝeant man weill prouyn fatis armis ye viii cauill fel creones epidithis two capitanis tribis landis strabrawn braidawane lyand west fra dunkeld nynt cauyll fell capitane argathelus landis argile folkis war namit argathelis fra gathelꝰ thair first progenitour bot thay ar callit men argyle x cauyl fel capitane lolgonas landis linnox clidisdail xi cauyll fell capitane silurch landis siluria quhilk regioun deuydit kyle carrik cunynghame quhais pepyl war rycht engenius fers xii cauyll fell brigandis landis brigance callit galloway thir brygandis war ane vailȝeant pepyll war deuysit thairfor dwell neir ye britonis resist thair incursionis gif ony occurrit ane certane thir brigandis wes banist efter thair seditiōis fechting quhilkis confiderat thaym ane cumpany pichtis outrageous wickit lymmeris thay war inhabit thay landis quhilkis ar callit annandale put brytonis quhais posterite grew sa full fury thay inuadit thair nychtbouris maner cruelteis ¶the wemen past thair husbandis battall fauche mair cruelly dyd men hauand na mercy quhare thay war vyctorius thay eschamit takyn battall reiosit de fechtand quhen thay saw thair freindis vexit lang irrecouerabyll malideis yt thay sall nocht de thair bed thay slew thaym swerd land annandale he ane strait entres circulit euery syde outhir seis mossis synkand sandis throw quhais difficill enteres hapnit yt inhabitantis thairof dwelt cauernis leuand thair incursionis thyft regardyng nouthir empyre scottis pychtis britonis cōtinual wachis al weil nicht day al sone thai war aduertist ony īuasouris thay drew thaym pertly thair wappinnis sic maner quha abstenit cowartly absentit thaym quhen sic chargis occurrit efter slane thair wiffis thair returnyng thay sufferit thaym self taikin prisoneris war haldyn ay sklauis thair wyffis quhill thay sum honest wassalege recouerit thair honour thair wiffis war commoun barne wes haldyn son quhome maist like vissage al othir boundis scotland war pychtis handis meirnis angus steremond gowry stratherne perth fiffe striueling callender calderwod louthiane mers teuedale othir remanent dailis scherefdome berwik ¶hovv king fergus maid concord betuix princis ireland hovv perist returnand ireland seis ca▪ xii quhen fergus deuidit landis scotland maner brocht sicker peace tuke ferme purpos nuris pepyll gud maneris thyngis better began iustice quhylk na pepyll may leif togidder maid sic lawis punis theft slauchter bestiall gudis scotland war saiffit feildis ony trubyll efter beildit castel berigone lochquhaber castell standis west part scotland fornent ilis quhare exercit lawis fyne pepyl micht drawin thair esaly exercitioun iustice past remanent dayis tranquillite peace nichtbouris britonis pichtis geuand ingyne caus pepyll incres togidder vnder ane beneuolence concord quhyll last chosyn ane iuge arbitrall discus certane hie debatis fallyng amang freindis ireland ¶sone efter said fergus accumpanyit ane certane nobillis past ireland pacyfyit thaym deba • ti wes last act dyd ¶for efter agreance nobyll prince returnyng hame throw ireland seis ane wickit tempest dreuyn apon ane crag quhare perist nobyllis xxv ȝere regne ¶in quhais memory crag quhare perist namit ȝit crag fergus ¶in tyme rang esdaill kyng britonis cruthneus cameloun kyng pychtis quhylk byggyt efter apon watter carron ciete camelon ye princypall chymmes pichtis quhare sumtyme wes ane gud hauyn ressaue schippis contrar ye wynter stormes thocht alterit necligence pepyll turnit ane medo ciete camelon resistit mony ȝeris efter britonis romani quhyll last kynneth kyng scottis quhilk put pichtis albion brocht vter subuersioun cruthneus biggit town castell edinburgh namit sumtyme madyn castell al ye nobyl wemē pichtis war nurist within castell crafty labouris thair handis quhil thay war reddy mary ¶and sa endis heir first buke thir croniklis quhilk haue sene scottis first began fergꝰ first kyng ye brocht iustice lawis amang thaym ¶now wyll schaw residew ye kyngis succedyng efter hym ordour thay rang ❧heir begynnis secund buke thir croniklis scotland ☞ hovv scottis efter kyng fergus deith contendit crovvn hovv vvas inhibit ȝoung childrin sall kyngis ca fergus maner perist ane day set counsel cheis king quhen day cumyn nobillis war deuidit ī syndry opinionis fergus two sonnis ȝoung tender age sum men thocht wes ane odius thing baith god man defraude ayris kyng fergꝰ thay beand pupillis thair faderis heritage puttyng hous sic vter dishonour skaith tyme sa mony nobyll actis thair commoun weill otheris said ȝoung barnis war vnabyll ony publik administratiō ane king suid ane prudent man hauand wisdome māheid baith resist ye fury enymes punis trespassouris auctorite iustice othir wayis na pepyll mycht leif togidder fame ane nobyll prince ane grete firmance realme answerit sembathis capitane argyle maner following ¶nane amang ȝow gud freindis nocht mouit mony reasonis defend barnis fergus sen incredibyll luffe brocht w ī extreme neid ane strang army quhilk nocht allanerly delyuerit w maist dangerus battal bot maid ennymes freindis land ane realme decorit w wt honest lawis he nocht dantit pissant britonis ane pepyll full rich cheualry put thaym baith boūdis scottis pichtis geuand w sic institutionis may leif otheris nichtbouris feir ennymes gif haue▪ na discentioun amang self quha sall thynk w worthy haue kyndnes gyf defraude thir barnis iust heritage quhat displeseir sal ennymes gif sic importabyl schame prince lat fergꝰ goyst knaw w gud mē luffaris vertew vnmyndful gud dedis ye mynd left w posterite ressaue eldyst sonne crown gif ȝe haue ony respect ȝour faith gyf ȝe ony fauour hym duryng lyf wayis ȝe sall odius immortall goddis men pepyll war sum part mouit thir wourdis frauchtaus chiftane brygandis said maner se ȝow belouit freindis contendyng heir quhithir expedient haue fergꝰ ȝoūg sonne vnabyl regne minorite ane othir prudent man kyng thynk sembathis mynd suld louit gyf na thyng bot kyndnes suld considerit electioun ane prince nane misknawis amang ȝou odius detestabyll defraude kyng fergus sonnis thair kyndly heritage na sic cruelteis beleif myndis occurris nocht tyme decerne gyf fergus sonnis suld immediatly succeid bot se crown may kepit hale thair perfyte aige quhat vengeance skaith dammage sall fall w commoun weill gif accordyng sēbathis mynd suffer ane barne kīg first sall ryse amang w ane byrnand occasion hatrent thair mony amang w equall othir power rentis attoure empyre gouernance realme duryng ȝoung kyngis mynorite sall geuyn ane w gouernis realme duryng ye kyngis mynorite sall kyng tyme honorit amang w auctorite reuerence euery honoris efferis princely estait quhay wyll nocht besely contend honour suppone ane w obtene office mā sall kyng ye tyme sal riche awin hous al oft ony thyng occurris done cō mon weill ambassatouris gret realmis rewardit armyis send apon fayis man regnis duryng kyngis mynorite sall conuert hym gudis sall constranit gyf hym substance man nuris ane auaritius cumpany lymmers hym nothir weil king realme ane thing haue na admiratioun ane man plesant sa lang priuat howbeit alter maneris quhen clothit publik auctorite gud fortoun gud maneris ar seildin grantit ani leuand creatouris fynally quhen ȝoung kyng cumyn age xiiii ȝeris takis hym gouernance realme wyl accumpanyit suspitious pepyll maik hym repair al wrangis done liegis within tender aige al sic besynes requirit commoun weill howbeit nathyng ye tyme laik wysdome quhen he maist neid wise counsalouris sal suffir nane hym bot thay wyll assist vice sal thay corruppit rutouris mynȝons salut kyngis haldyn reuerence amang w nochtwithstandyng thair insaciabyll auarice schame quhay sall haue ye curage spreit punis thaym feit insolent price forthir behald ane ȝoūg prince regnand aboue ony realme siclike quhay wald se commoun weill sweyand sall haue theiffis oppressouris takand oure gudis baith burgh land without punytioun laik iustice sall ythand slauchteris realme deuidit pepyll bridyl gouernance may nocht leif fayth iustice thairfore said ye wyse salomon uengeance sorrow sall pepyll haue he ane ȝounge kyng thir reasonis thynk barnis fergus suld geuyn wyse preceptouris lerne lawis gud hauyngis maneris thay may abyll efter gouerne realme gouernance realme geuyn •• rithais thair eme ony othir • yll man quhome ȝe thynk expedi • nt quhais auctorite crown sall remane reddy geuyn thaym thair parfite age al sone kyng deys thir barnis succede immediatly crown gyf thay abyll thairfore duryng kyngis lyf thay sall honorit immediat successouris ye crown efter kingis deth way ȝe may saif barnis fergꝰ vndefraudit thair kyndly heritage gyf desyre eschew ye sprout sedicioun innomerabyll inconuenientis efter followyng gyf desyre baith defend self bryng commoun weil proffet electioun princis suld obseruit conforme ye mynd fergus quhilk duryng lyffe wald neuir haue socht ony syngulare proffet dammage commoun weill quhen ferithais endit orisoun ye counsall assentit haill opinionis plane consent parliament maid actis quhen hapnit thair kyng deceis leuand behynd hym ȝoung child gottin body nerrest kyngis blude ablest iustice sall reiose crown tyme efter deith kyngis son sal succeid crown pley gyf war abyll thairto defendit samyn act na barnis kyngis consuetude kepit mony ȝeris efter throw quhylk rais mekyll troubyll realme oft tymis fader brother regnand ye minorite neuo kest extreme desynes distroy hym siclik neuo fader brother ambitioun crown throw quhilk occurrit cōtinual slauchteris kyngis nobyllis gret trubyll realme dammage commoun weill· ¶of kyng ferithais deith ca ii thir actis afore rehersit ferithais brother kyng fergꝰ chosyn kyng prince efter electioun maid ane orisoun nobyllis effect thairof yt wald nocht ressaue crown rich ambition dignite bot support neuois quhill ane thaym war abyll succeid becaus left tutour testamenter thair fader wald leif na thyng vndone mycht auance commoun weill othir weir peace na le affectioun neuois thay war awin sonnis ¶syne exhortit nobyllis make sic support fauour said neuois nocht bot thay suld appere gouerne publyk weill hauand perpetuall remembrance honorabyll actis done thair nobyl fader kyng fergus desyrit al graue wyse preceptouris chosyn said neuois yt thay mycht incres al weill vertew science ī ȝeris ony dammage ennymes fynaly declarit wald accept na publyk gouernance hym quhil thir thyngis war first prouidit sic thingis done ferithais crownit fatall chiar merbyll ressauit kyngis armis quhylkis ane scherand sword septoure crown tressour maner ane weirly trinsche defence realme ī lyberte punition trāsgressouris iustice fra then thir war ay ye nobyll armis scotland ony varyance quhyll tyme kyng achaus quhylk maid first band confideratioun betuix w france charllis magne kyng france romane emperour quhylk confyderatioun eikit tressour foure goldyn lyllyis four goldyn crocis set ī equale ordour tressour sygnify scottis he ay inuiolatly kepit crystyn faith ony spot heresy sen thai first tuke sone efter ane conuention maid betuix ye two kyngis scottis pychtis quhylk war syndry vtilites deuysit weill ye two realmis new peace ratifyit punitioun maid lymmaris mouaris sedition trubyll betuix two realmes redres maid sydis obseruatioun peace tymes cumyng sic thyngis done two kyngis returnit hame sone efter ferlegus eldest sonne kyng fergus motioun familiaris otheris corruppit men mycht nocht suffer iustice begā hate eme ferithais purpos distroy hym last seand wyckit purpos cum lytyll effect gaderit ane cumpany euyll disposit men desyrit crown geuyn hym iust heritour thairof ferithais dredand gyf war repugnant thir desyris cruelly inuadit ansuerit suld exoner hym glaidly ye crown ye nixt conuentioun ye maner geuyn hym neuir purpos beir auctorite langar ony brother sonnis war abyll succede desyrit na thyng sa mekyll se ane thaym reiose empire mycht schaw efter deid fergꝰ ye sycker weill apperyng poste rite forther desyrit said neuo pa hym conuentioun quhilk suld baith exoner hym al auctorite euery thyng sa far pertenit ye weil king fergus hous plesand ansuer mesit mynd ferlegus hatrent tyme beand amouit thay conuenit baith togidder afore nobillis counsall quhair kyng ferithais said maner ☞ ¶i traist nocht vnknawin ȝow wyse faderis quhē disput amang ȝow quhat wyse realme mycht gouernit ye minorite fergus sonnis ȝe gaif crown thocht vnworthy nocht gouerne iustice bot suld remane hale quhyll sonnis fergꝰ war abyll regne quhat trauell quhat incredybyll danger haue sustenit baith ȝour commoun weill felicite realme rysyng honouris sen na thyng mair patent ȝow thā sic besynes wyll omyt ye resydew thairof ȝe may haue na occasyoun deme arrogant desyrus fenȝet glore war rycht inhumane sen haue na airis body gyf wald defraude brother sonnis thair kyndly herytage transfer samyn ony vncouth blude ferlegus cousyng iust heritour crown clames samyn fra gud reason ȝoung lusty hie engyne strang lusty body sustene gret chargis sall euery day abyll gouerne realme contrar feblit lang •• ge desiris releuit heuy 〈◊〉 beseik ȝou thairfore ye publyk administratioun quhylk ressauit ȝour auctoryte geuyn cousyn sen abyll vnganand thairfore na thing may sa plesand haue ane priuat lyffe tymes cummyng ony publict chargis ressaue ye auctorite mair gladnes euer geuyn counsall knawyng weill quhat irremidiabyl displesouris war apperyng thair realme gyf ȝoung insolent prince ferlegus war maid kyng cō tinewit ferithais empyre requirit hym sustene gouernance realme afore ony feir aige sen realmes ar gouernit mair wysdome aigit personis ony corporall strenthe nobyllis wald nocht abrogat lawis maid afore aganis empire ȝoung chyldryn tuke gret indignation ferlegus desyrit sic thyngis war repugnant thair commoun weill thoucht thay ressauit hym thair counsal reuerence honouris ȝit thay seuerit hym fra pepyll repreuyng hym quhy ȝeid fra counsall wyse nobyllis keparis desyring crown without thair aduise make knawin suld obey counsal wyse lordis ferlegus brokin wyse fra purpos maid hym heuy cheir depart fra ye counsall nobyllis dredand syndry displeseris follow departyng brocht hym agane force kest corruppit counsullouris preisoun ¶amang quhom ane schew ye kyng quhat maner deith deuisit traistīg reuelatioun thairof get lyf saiffit pepyll heirand tressoun war sa cōmouit thay slane ferlegus war nocht kyng pecifyit thair ire tyme thocht kyng aduertist tressoun deuysit slauchter ȝit schaw hym mair reuthfull rigorus prince kest mynd mei fury pepyll keip neuo fra displeseir ferlegus geuyn new keipyng nobyllis bot seruitouris war punist deith ferithaes al sone conuentioun skalit raid throw realme equall administratioun iustyce quhyll last slane within nycht neuo ferlegus thre monethis efter ye first conspiration xv ȝeir regne ¶hovv ferlegus vvas banist slauchter kyng ferithais kyng maynus ca iii ferithais slane haue schawin ferlegus murderar war gylty said cryme fled amang pychtis fyndyng thair na securite lyffe fled brytane quhare consumed residew dayis gret misery nobillis efter slauchter ferithais conuenit castell dounstafage argyle election king quhilk day counsall mouit kyndnes kyng fergus chesit maynus ȝoūgest sonne xxiiii ȝeir aige kyng ☞ ¶maynus ane nobyl prince richt different fra bruthir hauand vicious men gret hatrent exercit iustice equaly realme gaif commission liegis conuene dres debatis amāg thaym self difficyll materis quhen thay occurrit discussit self ani ī ye ȝeir quhen past throw realme halding iustice ayris redressyng wrangis▪ punitioun trespassouris tyme crynus kyng pychtis send ambassatouris kyng maynꝰ reiosyng felicite desyryng band peace maid afore betuix scottis pychtis renewit kyng maynus weill īstruckit nobillis quhat done ressauit thir ambassatouris condiscendit thair petition peace ratefyit maner scottis began burgeoun sycker peace ¶kyng maynus knawyng weill na pepyll may incres iustice peace religioun seand realmes euery thyng erd sa subdewit ye power goddis na deuise ingyne man may auale bot gyf goddis stand propiciant thairto quhais beniuolence bene sicker gard protectioun pepyll ¶thairfore moue liegis religioun eikit certane new cerimonis maid honour goddis within thair tempyllis first ordanit ane huge stane rasit south syde said tempyllis quhilk thair sacrifice maid ¶in memory heirof remanis ȝit dayis mony huge stanis drawin togidder forme circulis namit pepyll y• anciant tempyllis goddis na lytyll admiratioun quhat ingine strenth sa huge stanes bene brocht togidder ¶the sacrifice vsit thay dayis ane portioun cornis cattellis ony othir frutis yt grew apon groūd quhilk geuyn kyrkmen thair sustentatioun offerit ye goddis quhen samyn super flew mair thā sufficient sustentatioun preistis ¶kyng maynus foundat al ane sacrifice maid monethly honoure diane goddis woddis hū taris thairfore pepyll maid thair adoratioun new mone quhilk superstitioun lang vsit amang oure anciant faderis mony othir va • e cerymonyis efter ryte egiptianis ¶quhen maynus gouernit pepyl gud iustice institute thaym thir othir superstitionis plesand religioun thay dayis resygnit crown sonne doruidilla deceissit xxix ȝeir regne kyng elgane regnand aboue brytonis kyng thaar aboue pychtis ¶of kyng doruidilla constitutionis maneris deith▪ ca iiii maynꝰ deceissit haue writtīg son doruidilla wes maid kyng efter coronatioun renewit peace nichtbouris pychtis brytonis schew hym nurisar tranquillite detesting na thing mair sic besynes gaif occasioun battal delytit euery thyng mycht draw pepyl peace tuke gret delyte huntyng rachis houndis maid lawis grew quhelpis suld nocht lyne thair moderis fand experience hoū dis gottin maner vnproffitabyl 〈◊〉 huntyng ordanit al yik nobyll suld nuris twa rachis ane hound huntyng quhen houndis war manȝeit aduenture chais sustenit cō moun gud ordanit slayar ane wolf haue ane ox reward oure eldaris persewit beist gret hatrent gret murdir beistis done samyn scottis hauand na occasioun cyuyll vncouth weris set thair ingyne pre • ell othir pepyll ye craft huntyng maid dyuers lawis concernyng ¶in first commandit yt quhais dog first bait deir suld haue hyde thairof quhais dog bait nixt suld haue heid hornis ye body curit pleseir maister huntis resydew houndis gif ony contention rais amang hūtaris cheis ane iuge thair consentis tempyll diane aggre thaym thir lawis war maid generall consent pepyl nuris thaym commoun pleseir drawyng fra thaym occasioun iniuris hatrent quhylkis lawis war kepit mony ȝeris efter thir cōstitutionis vtheris deuysit afore kynge fergus war colleckit togidder tabillis geuyn kepyng wysest maist profound clark tyme shaw baith iuge persone quhilkis war accusit punition conforme thair demeritis pepyll mycht vnderstand iuge past nocht fra boundis iustice punytioun crymes attour counsal wald condāpne na faltouris thay dayis quhyll y• lawis war first schawin accordyng falt throw quhylk come vse criminabyll personis seand thaym iust sentence cōdampnit deid tuke samyn pacience gyf ony punytyon maid thaym aboue lawis thay murmurit opprest iugis ☞ ¶this maner iustice remanis ȝit amang ilis scotland may na way abrogat thair bene certane interpretouris lawis quhom thay gyf na richtwys iugement ¶quhen doruidilla roung xxviii ȝeris deceissit berigone left behynd hym ane ȝoung chyld namit rewthar quhilk micht nocht succede ye lawis maid afore aganis ȝoung chyldren ¶of tyrane kyng nathak slauchter ca v efter ye deith doruidilla brothir nathak ane fair lusty persone abyll apperit publik administration maid kīg prince rang skarsly two ȝeris quhen opprest pepyll sic seruitude haldin ane myscheuous tyrane sufferit na lawis exercit spulȝeit cō mounis thair ryches gudis persewit nobillis slauchteris banissing thir doyngis maid hym odius liegis maid empire rycht vnsycker thocht oft tymes counsallit freindꝭ abstene fra sic enormyteis desislit nocht bot grew ay vyce incressit ȝeris lyke ane bludy monstoure schame mercy ¶ȝit cruell vnhappy dedis war nocht lang vnpunist dowall capitane brygandis quhome thocht afore haue slane ouir greit pissance assistance mony vthir nobyllis conspirit aganis hym bryng purpos sonar effect maid rewthar sonne kyng doruidilla thair gouernoure intentioun gyf thir hie attemptatis succedit nocht syk felycyte desyrit charge thairof suld allanerly redound rewthar ☞ ¶dowal fynd occasion micht bring purpos effect broucht ȝoung rewthar ane cumpany armyt men samyn place quhare kyng nathak remanit quhen sawe mater dressit deuysit haue occasyoun debait gaif displesand wourdis kyng nathak saying ane fals tyrane schame nocht spoylȝeit rewthar ye crown bot rang maist cruell odius tyranny aboue pepyll hyd slychtis tressoun he slane ane gret part nobyllis ¶nathak ansuerit agane wod fury kyng ordour iustice suld thairfore regne tymes cumyng contrar mynd dowall otheres opynyoun sic maner said dowall sall neuer fynd hym mair fauorabyll gratius thā afore declarit wtin dayis sall punys hym al vtheris opynyoun scharpest sort mycht deuysit thair attemptatis ¶dowall mouit thir dispitfull wordis ruschit forthwart complicis slew kyng nathak nobyllis war mynd secund ȝeir regne ⸫ ¶hovv revvthar ane ȝoung chyld vvas maid kyng contrar lavvis hovv ferquhard capitane lorne vvas chasit dovval ilis orison maid pepyll thairof ca vi nathak ye tyrane slane sayd dowall maid ane conuentioun assistence syndry nobyllis opinion crownit rewthar chair merbyl mony nobyllis war nocht cō tent thir doyngis hauand gret indignatioun baith thayr kyng slane ye lawis concernyng electioun thair prince abrogat priuat auctoryte ane ȝounge chylde maid kynge aganis thair honourabyll actis laitly maid thair commoun weill ¶thir nobyllis war mynd maid ane priuat conuentioun togydder amang thaym ferquhard capytane kyntyre lorne maich kyng nathak ane man subtyll • ngyne hauand gret ambition crown ¶this ferquhard beleuyng tyme ganand conques crown dissimilit mynd wald debait actione commoun weill complanit baith slauchter nathak cruell dowall ane barne maid kyng dā mage pepyll commoun weill exhortit thairfore coū sall prouyde ane haisty remeid resist tyranny dowall quhilk intendit vsurp crown name rewther gyf samyn war nocht done sic sedicioun ciuill weiris • ryse hais • ely amang chiftanis thair realme samyn suld fynd ane haisty subuersioun ¶skarsly war thir wordis sai • quhen dowal enterit ane ban • men slew syndry nobillis counsall bot ferquhard euyll woundit eschapit ane certane frendis fled ilis quhare conuenit clā ni pepyll thairof ane counsall sayd maner obseruit lawis concernyng election kyngis maist vailȝeant pepyll nocht bene necessar day make orisoun mycht haue leiffit gud tranquillite peace vnder ye empire nathak wyse vailȝeant prince laitly slane dowall cruell tyrane attour aggrege importabyl cruelte ī mair dammaige commoun weill he nocht slane kyng bot intrusit ane ȝoung chyld place plane derogatioun oure lawis intēdyng thairthrow bring baith w oure commoun weill vter myscheif fynd na thyng maist forcy campionis yt may seme w le lurk heir schamfully effiminat pepyll eschewyng wraith oure ennymes regardyng nouthir honour proffet sen thair na way sa plesand strenth ennymes febyll oure self maist cruel tyrane he nocht slane nobillꝭ realme bot slane ye preistꝭ religious men na esperance suld remane w withstād cruelte he tressonably put vailȝeant men fauorit w albion haldis • igit men mycht haue proffit w thair wyse counsall sic captiuite yt thay ar na better deid may oppres w pissance he maryit r • wther ane ȝoung chyld quhome namis kyng douchter gethꝰ kyng pychtis ☞¶this vnmercyfull tyrane he deuysit ar surely aduertist al sone he vincust w cut oure eyris put oure eyne may remane lyue oure schame perpetuall derisioun ☞¶ȝit wyl ȝe concur mā heid wysdome opinioun traist fermely ȝe sall nocht eschew sic cruelteis fauour goddis bot punis hym conforme demerites beleyf fermely thyngis sall succede w hie felicite gyf na le curage wysdome defend oure rycht oure liberte oure fayth se oft tymes vailȝeant gret pryncis deieckit fra thair honoure imperyall dygnyteis quhen thay applaudit tressoun falset ☞¶heirfore gyf men worthy callit posterite oure nobyll progenitouris quhilkis neuir refusit assailȝe maist dangerus battallis thair iust defence lat w defend richt lawis wiffis chyldryn aganis maist odyus tyrane erar assailȝe extreme chance battall thā leif perpetuall schame dout goddis sall propiciant w oure iust persut contrar thay salbe repugnant ennymes thair tyranny lat w othir de honoure elli haue victory triumphant glore reuenge murdir kyng nobyllis recently maid tyrane ¶hovv ferquhard dovvall recountering vthir plane battall vvar baith slane vvith nobyllyte scottis pichtis kyng pichtis slane king scottis tane ca vii capitanis tribis pepyll thairof mouit ī gret hatrent thir wordis turnit feir deith maist rageād fury baithit thair hādis wt mannis blude ye ryte thay dayis maid thair aithis reuenge slauchter nathak nobyllis scharpest maner mycht deuisit moretary thay gaderit ane army ireland argyle lorne canter othir partis adiacent syne landit mony galȝouns lang faddis albioun ferquhard returnyng wyse drew mony pepyll quhare come opinioun tuke thair aithis outhir reuenge slauchter king nathak elli de ani dowall knawyng cummyng met hym army berigone quhare cruelly fouchtyn sydis bot last dowall discomfist seuyn thousand men army slane ȝit slauchter bene maid war nocht nycht seuerit thaym morrow dowall furius hatrent colleckit resydew army new array hauand hym gethꝰ kyng pichtis rewthar king scottis mony nobyllis baith thair realmes ¶on army aduersar ferquhard ye inhabitantis cathnes argyle murray mony otheris ilis thir two armyis met fynally togydder mair fury afore faucht neir vter exterminioun thaym baith ¶in vnhappy battall slane gethus kyng pichtis incredibyll nowmer baith nobyllis commounis baith chiftanis dowall ferquhard slane nobilite scottis ¶this lamentabyll vnhappy battall fochtyn sic perseuerant hatrent allanerly remanit viii hundred men vnslane baith sydis ¶the resydew ferquhardis army quhome vnplesand vyctory succedit seyng feild left efter sa huge murdir followit ye chais ythand slauchter quhyll thay come castell callender thair king rewther tane ¶throw vnhappy battall maid sa terribyll slauchter mony ȝeiris efter nouthir scottis pychtis left lyffe sufficient inhabit realme ȝit withstand thair ennymes ¶hovv scottis pychtis vvar doung albion brytonis ca viii britonis quhilkis war ay ennymes heirand thꝭ lamētabyl distructioun scottis pychtis cumyng thaym vnprudence ciuill weris traistit tyme sufficient make thaym reiose ye hale empire albion thairfore rasit thair army maist weirly ordinance inuadit syndry landis pychtis baith swerd fyre pychtis brokin weiris afore reheirsit disparit support gaderit thair 〈◊〉 • gudis thair wiffis chyldren▪ freindis come mony wylsome difficil gaitis orknay efter thair cumyng chesit g •• hus brother kyng gethus afore deceissit thair kyng dwelt syndry ȝeris efter ye said regioun gud peace freindschip pepyll thairof thairfore orknay ay namyt aulde realme pichtis brytonis herand ye pichtis departit wise come penthland mers teuydaill plenist strenthis thairof thair gudis pepyl nocht lang efter thay come ye scottis landis scottis rich • affrayit thair cumyng seyng na remeid drew thaim thair harnes wappynnis met thaym arrayit battall calder wod nochttheles scottis war discomfist two thowsand thaym slane ye resydew fled heir thair syndry partis fame vnhappy battall maid pepyl na le disparit nobyll blude fergus bene endit day albion brytonis proud insolent thir feliciteis herand thair exploratouris ane certane scottis quhilkis eschapit fra last battal war fled berigone defence king rewther said castel ane nowmer nobyllis resydew scottis thair wiffis barnis fled ilis gaderit ane army ordinance oenus thair kyng lade ane sege said castell nochttheles scottis defēdit lang tyme quhil last thay war dreuyn sic penurite becaus thair vittallis failȝeit thay kest cauillis quha suld first deuorit sustene liffis thaym war within hous becaus thay saw maist vailȝeant campionis fall deuorit miserabyll wyse thay deuysit samyn nycht ische thair ennymes erar reuēge sum displesour thaym thā miserably de sort kyng micht ische esely noblis thay deuysit y• colane chiftane lorne sal ysche ane hundreth mē ye nixt montane deuysit followit colane yschyng furth wyse fechtand vter exterminioun fayis finaly slane folkis ¶and mene tyme quhen maist ernestly fechtand kyng rewther ischit ane quiet posthern nobyllis come hastely see quhair schyppis war reddy abidynge cumyng rewther eschapyng maner arriuit ilis fyndyng th • ir na securite lyffe past ireland wiffis ye tribe lorne seing thair hus • ādis slane afore thair ene slew thaym self thay suld nocht remane seruitude thair ennymes britonis knawyng fynaly rewther nobyllis war eschapit war sa cōmouit yt thay slew resydew scottis partis quhair thay war apprehendit syne garnist al strenthis scottis thair garisonis resydew scottis sauit thair fleyng seyng thaym self nocht pissance resist britonis fled montanis debaitit thair miserabyll lyffis straytnes ground scar hard fude leuand somer mylknes rutis herbis beryis wynter wyld flesche montanis sumtyme thay draif gret prayis bestial dirknes nycht fra ye britonis sustene thair liffis thus stude scottis pychtis abaid albion nere twelf ȝeris vnder seruitude britonis ¶hovv scottis pichtis recouerit thair landis discomfist sysyll kyng britonis resydevv kyng revvtheris liffe ca ix quhill sic thingꝭ war done ī albion king rewther wyf ireland ane sonne namyt thereus lang efter request gethus kyng pichtis returnit albion landit lochbroun ī ro al sone scottis war returnit wyse ī albion thay slew auld rite first man thay met bathit thair mouth swordis ī blud syne prayit goddis grant thaym sic felicite thay may condingly reuenge slauchter thair progenitouris belyue thay maid thaym pa forthwart towart south mene tyme thay war aduertist gethus kyng pichtis cumyn wtin xxx milis thaim ane gret army send thaym thair freindis albion help thaym recouer thair landis thrid day efter baith armyis met togydder gret triumphe passyng forthwart ye south thay met scottis pichtis quhilkis war haldyn ye ȝeir afore vnder seruytude sysyl kyng brytonis herand thir tythyngis gatherit haistely ane army reconter ennymes incontinent cō fiderat pepyll ony sicht conques ony strenthis gudis entrit auful army britane inuadit samyn gret iniure cruelteis kyng sysyll reuenge thir cruelteis inuadit scottis pichtis haiste battall nochttheles army fynaly disconfyst hie souerane manheid kyng rewther principal occasyon glorius victory memory thairof ye cuntre quhare battall fochtin callit ȝit oure dayis rethirdayll say ye vale rewthir battal sa cruelly fochtin baith armyis war constranit talk peace vnder thir conditionis britonis sall render al strenthis landis townis pertenyng scottis pichtis sal nocht inuaid thaym tymes cumyng scottis pychtis brytonis leuit mony ȝeris efter gud trā quillite peace ☞ ¶the ȝeir kyng rewther recouerit realme fra begynnyng ye warld iiiimixclxxxxv ȝeris afore ye incarnatioun cciiii ȝeris fra ye beginnyng rome vcxlvi ȝeris kyng rewther leuit resydew dayis ony vncouth weris seditioun liegis deceissit xxvi ȝeir regne ¶of kyng revvtha lavvis gouernance hovv ptolome kyng egipt send oratouris se situatioun scotland ca x rewther deceissit haue schawin sonne thereus wes tender age yt mycht nocht succeid crown • eason lawis afore rehersit thairfore cusyng rewtha maid kyng thay war brethir barnis rewtha first kyng amang scottis y• • aud ingyne put nobyll men thair vailȝeant dedis memory maid riche sepulturꝭ ye bodi • thaym yt war slane brytonis defence realme commandit al mony hie stanis set sepulture euery nobil mā slane hym brytonis memory heirof syndry thaym remanis ȝit hie landis pepyll may knaw sic men war vailȝeant thair dayis throw quhylk come ī vse sepulturis nobyll mē haldyn ī gret reuerence amang pepyll thir sepulturis ingrauyn ymageris dragonis wolfis othir beistis na inuentioun letteris thay dayis put deidis nobyl men memore commoun pepyll geuyn tyme store beistis telyng thair landis ony othir industry thus ••• ȝet al ingenious craftis cuntre thairfore kyng rewtha brocht maner craftismen othir contres sparpellit thaym syndry schiris realme feis dewteis sum part takyn commoun purs sum part thay mycht wyn thayr laubouris heid euery ox slane geuyn smyth schyre • rag forester wod toung man law half ane cost sercheouris theuis al mekyll wricht two rybbis cost medcinat al mekyll surrurgiane besyde war geuyn thaym certane mesouris aitis beir becaus na change money ī thay dayis throw partyng ox wyis rais vp annuell rentis land efter king rewtha plenist realme maner craftismen informit gret dāmage fell oftymis pepyl ignorāce euil medcinaris thairfore inhibit vnder payne deid yt ony man exerce ye art medicinary without thay war found richt expert lang experience thairof afore tyme na medcinaris vsit cuntre al personis war trublit infirmiteis war brocht marcat ony commoun place quhare pepyll mycht se thaym gyf thaym counsall vse sic remedyis thay vsit quhen thay conualescit thayr maledis ane thyng richt odius thay dayis visee nocht pacient comfort consolation tyme come certane oratouris fra kyng ptolome egipt explore ye maneris situacioun euery pepyll regioun thi • oratouris war plesandlie ressauit ye kyng thay war discendit ye egiptianis forbearis king gart conuoy thaym bath throw realme scottis pychtis accordyng thair desyris thir oratourꝭ wrait thair bukis situatioun hillis firthis ilis townis lochis castellis within region wt lenth dayis nychtis baith wynter symer thay war commādit king ptolome quhilk gaif ingyne discriue ye situatioun erd euery regioun ilis quhare ony mē vsit haue passage discriptioun montanis firthis cieteis samyn diuers instrumentꝭ astronomy quhais deligence laubour remanis ane rycht crafty proffitable werk namit cosmographe ptolome richt expert ī methamatik ingenius werk completit tyme adriane empriour quhen thir oratouris sene degeistlie considerit regioun thay persauit samyn ritis maner writtyngis toung habit cerymonyis vsit amang egiptianis caus thir oratouris war plesandly • depischit realme kyng rewther gouernit realme xiiii ȝeris efti • ī gret iustice ony vncouth ciuill weris quhill last began suspek lang felicite thairfore preuene calamite gif ony war approcheand mischance fortoun resignit crown thereus son kyng rewther xvii ȝeir regne ¶of kyng thereus hovv vvas exilit tyranny hovv conane chiftane brigandis vvas maid gouernour proscription ca xi thereus res • uing ye crown man apperit first sex monethis regne ane virtewis prince bot sone eftir becam ane vicioꝰ tyrane inuoluit wt lust yt na regard ressone honesty iustice namit amang pepill ye scornar religioun ye pepill imitation insolent prince increscit euery day corruppit maneris throw quhilk followit ithand slauchter nobill men reif heirschippis partis strongest theuis gretest oppressouris war haldin maist veneratioun honouris cōmonis war sa disparit ye irrecouerable skaithis done thaym thay traistit nocht possibil ony tyrane vicious mycht regne aboue thaim capitanis ye tribis mouit thir insufferable offēcis thocht vnworthy ony noble men suld misgidit sic ane corruppit monstour thairfore maid ane quiet conuentioun amang thaym self quhilk thay cōcludit baith degraid hym crown kyngdome thereus heirand conspiratioun nobillis aganis hym sa astonist fled brytane last quhen socht lāg tyme support britonis restore realme frustrat yair cōsumit ye residew dayis misere ȝork xii ȝeir regne quhen thereus exilit maner nobillis scotland thair common weill sal incurre na dāmage lakyng ane king chesit conane capitane brigandis gouernour conane efter maid gouernour tuke gret laubouris mei al dissentionis war rissyn afore amang ye nobyllis sleuth thereus punist theiffis reuers othir criminabyll personis sic seuerite iustice bestiall gudis lay thairfurth ony trubyl quhill last kyng therus deceissit brytane quhais deith auctorite expirit ¶of kyng iosyne experience prechyng tvvo philosophouris ca xii al sone nobillis war aduertist deith thereꝰ thay maid ane conuentioun berigon ye quhilk iosyne bruther thereus maid kyng iosyne renewit ye peace nychtbouris pichtis britonis held surrurgianis medcinaris gret reuerence wes nurist tyme ȝoutheid sic personis ireland ane gud medicinar gud experience herbis forbearis vsit na othir medcin curyng thair woundis infirmiteis bot herbis thay dayis thair nocht sa mony dyuers kindis maladyis ar sene infirmiteis war sene tyme bot grauellis caterris siclike maladyis cumyng throw distemperance cauld donk humouris pepyll leiffit sa skars naturall fude thay nocht lang dayis bot war preseruit fra maner maledyis nochtheles fra abstinence forebearis set asyde thā vncouth delicious coursis begā multiply sa • mang w yt vncuth strange metis come vncouth strange infirmiteis becaus vnȝemē ti drogareis yt forbearis vsit mycht nocht cure new maledyis pepyl war cōstranit throw importabyl dolour incressing samyn seke remeid new ingyne craft sen tyme sa vēnomit vncouth superflew metis drīkis thocht sum thing necessar rehers temperance forebearis thair leuyng sic maledyis remedyis war vsit thair dayis quhilkis sall schawin largely efter quhen tyme occurris expedient ye tyme kyng iosyne war brocht presence berigone two venerabyll clerkis plesant visage bot thay war al maist nakit wryttin yt thay war preis • spanȝe passyng portingale athene vnmercifull tempest see war schip brokin ro thair schip remanent pepyl thaym perist thay sauit becaus thay war philosophouris mē gret experience thay war weill tretit last quhen thay war xiiii dayis refreschit efter thair walkyng trubyll see thay war brocht agane ye kyngis presence king demādit thaim schaw quhat thay vnderstude nature ground scotland maneris religioun pepyll thairof thir philosophouris answerit thay mycht nocht say perfitely thir questionis becaus thay nocht lang tyme haue experience thairof al war sum part febillit thair fā tasyis calamite laitly falling thaym storme see nochtheles sa far thay micht coniecture thair rich proffet gottin within vanis erd scotland thā aboue geuyn winnyng mynis metallis thā ony production cornis thay knew said thir philosophouris influence heuyn maneris religion ye pepyll thay declarit thair religion nocht commendit thay adorit ymagis brutall beistis forme leuand goddis ye egiptianis vsit quhilk suld nocht god thyng contenit landis see euery creature quhais perfyte verray ymage cā payntit deuysit īgyne man necessar thairfore yt pepyll suld leif thair ydolatryis adore allanerly leuand god mouer heuynnis sacryfyce prayer thair tempillis allanerly ony ymageryis finaly leif hope reward gif thay leiffit clene lif iustice vthir way deuisit thaym bot dolour tormēt thir philosophouris preching maner inducit ye pepyll leif thair ydolatryis makand thair sacrifice prayer allanerly mouer heuyn eternall god thus war pepyll brocht way yt sacrifice yt wont geuyn isi apis goddis egypt abrogat throw quhilk scottis war mony ȝeris efter sa religious thay made ado • ation god mouar heuyn ȝit vtheris war sa indurat ī thair awn errouris thay couth nocht omyt thair auld suꝑstitionis beleuit firmely son mone otheris sternis lanternis ye heuyn war verray goddis thay war sa obstinat blyndit auld arrour gentilis ye quhē thay saw na thing erd bricht meruellus thā son mone vther lychtis heuyn thay beleuit sum diuinite thairin adorit thaym goddis history sa far drawin colleckit ueremond iohne campbell cornelius ireland quhom haue determit follow maist autētik auctouris ye end quhatsū euer werke kyng iosyne ane virtuous prince deceissit berigone xxiiii ȝeir regne ¶of kyng fynnane lavvis college clerkis ile man ca xiii efter deith iosyne son finnane ane wise virtuous prince maid kyng sa gret luffar iustice rychely rewardit capitanis tribis quhare fand thaym luffaris cōmoun weill gaif hale attendance wyn hertis pepyll maid na exercition ministration iustice aduise nobillis ekit nowmer counsal senatouris thā afore mak thaym ye renoumit maid ane law kyng sall na thyng concernyng ye publik administration realm aduyse nobillis maid al ane vther law kyng sall nothir denonce weir treit peace aduise ye capitanis tribis thir siclike constitutionis king fynnane conquest gret fauour beniuolence pepyll maner gouernance maid hym sa strang amang liegis neuir assailȝeit efter ony vncouth weris grew gret aboū dance ryches fynaly set mynd repare ye religiō goddis▪ wes decait faders tyme first commandit ymagis thair goddis restorit thayr tempillis pepil mycht haue samyn ī adoration afore ȝit wald nocht inhibit pepil adore leuand god mouer heuyn wes institute afore philosophouris sufferit pepill adore quhat god thay plesit wes first kyng institute prelatis clerkis yi realme thir clerkis suld remane togidder gaif thaym ye ile man lyand betuix ireland britane fornens brigance quhare thair principall seit wes ordanit thir clerkis conuenit ilk ȝeir ani cōmand gret maist bischop thairof specialie quhen ony hie wechty materis occur ••• concernyng defence thayr 〈◊〉 common weil ¶thir preis • war namyt druydes wes •• stitute ile aduy • e kyng nobillis mak sacrifice ye honour thair goddis instruk sonnis nobill men virtew science siclik thay war lernit athene wes commandit ane thaym bischop maister sall haue iurisdictioun aboue laif quhom wes borne ane gleib fyre signe hꝭ honour diuinite eft quhais deith ane othir maist approcheand virtew cunnyng wes chosyn succeid place thir clerkis throw thair ithand exercitioun increscit sone eftir rycht expart morall naturall philosophie wes haldin pepill maist iust haly creaturis thay maid lawis discus doutis baith publik singular actionis deuisit nocht onlie punitioun maner cryines bot ordanit condigne rewardis geuyn al gud dedꝭ thay cursit thaym contempnit thair auctorite punition wes euir odious amang oure forbearis ye cursit pepil war thay dayis resecat fra al gud cumpany participant reward honouris digniteis bot numerit amang cumpany infamyt wickit misdoaris ¶thir preistis war exemit fra chargis weir othir exactionis ¶of thir preistis writtis mony auctouris affirmyng thair ordour religioun first found britane thay cal hail ile albion vnder ane name britane fynnane wes ane virtuous prince na le honorit ciuil religious maneris quhilkis decorit realme ¶he maryit son durstus agasia douchter kyng britonis conquest samyn na litill glore beneuolence amang britonis last past gyf consolation ye kyng pychtis quhilk wes lyand ye tyme ī vehemēt feuer camelon quhare deceissit xxx ȝeir regne body wes brocht berigone beriit amang remanent sepulturis progenitouris ¶of kyng durstus hovv vvas slane cruell tyranny ca xiiii fynnane deceissit wyse sonne durstus wes mayd kyng yi durstus insolēt ȝouth wes geuyn drounknes vnbridelit lust different fra faderis gouernance yt hat tit thaym fader luffit brak ordour law wes institute afore ꝓgenitouris ministratioun iustice vsit na counsal gret materis bot onlie thaym fauorit vicious maneris culd fynd new maner lustis sa mischeuous ane tyrane al ye nobil men fader vsit secret counsall war othir slane banist elli feynȝeit causis forfaltit thair landis guddis finalie wes brocht sic cruelte onlie slew yame quhilkꝭ war odius hym bot al slew al thaym quhare beleuit get ony rich guddis thair deith repudiat nobil quene agasia kyng britonis dochter gart vicious harlotis deforce hir quhill vnhappy tyrane wes inuoluit thir siclik abhominable dedis capitanis ilis lorne argyle ro frequēt conuentionis amang thaym self maid ane conspiratioun aganis hym far haitit thir capitanis rage tyrany thay wald na langar abid opinion yat fyne thay sall nocht appere brekaris faith suld kepit thair natural prince thay schew thaym opin proclamatio • •• cht assemblit inuaid 〈…〉 onlie punys vicious vnhappy counsalouris quhome realme brocht sic enormiteis without remeid war haistely prouydit ye samyn suld pa vter rewyne ¶quhyll capitanis foresayd war preparand thair armis maner cōmonis rycht desy • u dystroy tyrane rais haist •• athir hand assist thir capitanis ȝit part commonis wald nocht concurre thir capitanis beleuyng thaym nocht assemblit ony cōmon weill bot vsurpe crown durstus na litil affrayit • thair assemblance knew hym self gilty maid hym flee seand na place sufficient keip send britonis desyring quene agasia send ane power armyt men resyst ane certane nobyllis aganis hym conspirit last seand na support apperand began turne treasonabyll mynd falset slychtis tuke purpos sla thir cōspiratouris sum hyd waching beleuyng way eschew danger apperyng ¶incontinent send ambassatouris thir capitanis fenȝeit hym sa penitent wald reforme offē ci iniuris done hym perditioun commoun weill promittit nocht gouerne realme tymes cumyng thair aduyse bot punys wickit coū salouris quhilkis war occasioun displesouris hym done ¶it al ane odious thyng ane kyng fecht aganis subdittis specyally quhen thay ar nocht set degraid hym crown bot reduce hym better estait obseruation thairof wald bynd hym tempyll dyane vnder quhat astrictionis thay plesit gyf mycht nocht sufficient suld cum thaym ony assurance submit hym vnderly quhat correctioun thay pleasit ¶and wordis mycht haue credyt kest ane certane seruitouris prysone war punys thaym deith thair assistence vyces ¶otheris small estimatioun arrayit precious cl • thyng send thayme sayd capitanis punyst thayr plesour capitanis geuand haistelye credence wordis send doron capytane trybe lorne take aithis eftir promys thus durstus brocht temple diane sworne ye preist thairof aithis couth deuisit ressaue thir capitanis maist tender freindschip remitting rankour mind al maner cryme micht imput thaym onlie hald thaym faithfull tendir freindis bot gouerne realme tymes cummyng thair auise al sone thir capitanis vane cōfidence wer cumyn hym ressauit yame sa plesandlye baith wordis visage contenance apperit ony dissimilance thus generall concord blythnes maid athir syde kyng durstus reiosyng concord callit thir capitanis ane banket within castell berigone al sone thay war entrit vnmercyfull tyrane past ane towr castell incontinent certane armyt mē ruschit furth chalmeris quhare thay war hyd slew thir capitanis vtheris enterit castell thair opinioun wiffis matronis followit thair husbandꝭ terrible banket euil hurt woundit debait thair said husbandis past berigone dolorus spraichis cry vengeans cursit tyrane violatioun faith promys treson falset durstus nocht lang vnpunist al remanent freindis thir capitanis assemblit ane army baith men wemen sufficient beir wappynnis sa haistely thay laid ane sege ye castel berigone durstus aduertist yairof ane certane yam past incontinent wallis said thay suld haue sone experience quhidder crafty treason fechtyng durstus disparit help come ye castel wod fury ane cumpany euill arrayit peple sone spulȝeit baith liffe crown nynt ȝeir regne ¶and howbeit ane vicious tyrane buryit ane kingly sepulture amang forbearis ¶of gret contention amang capitanis orisoun maid charon capitane argyle hovv evvin first name vvas maid kyng ca xv durstus slane yi maner sonny fled irelād sone eftir ane cōuention maid cheis kyng nobillis beand ane mynd concludit suffir nane durstus blude regne aboue thaym aduenture ye sum yame suld reuēge slauchter thair fore thay tuke lang consultation quhat lynage blud ye kyng suld chosin sū desyrit ragaon chiftane ilis cōspyrit first aganis durstus ¶ȝit becaus fauourit euill dedy men repellit utheris desyrit cormanus capitane lorne ¶thus war ye tribis deuidit syndry vocis eft lāg •• te • ion charon capitane argyle said ī maner ȝe may haue perfite experience wyse faderis ciuill weris dowall ferquhard recentlie ye empire wickit durstus dangerus vnthankfull pepill haue ane cruell tyrane regnand aboue thaym thay samyn weris yi nobil realme quhilk bene debatit sa mony ȝeris gret manheid wisedome curage wes neir brocht finall euerstone samyn weris nobillꝭ war slane cōmonis brocht sa vile seruitude gyf samyn continewit oure name lynage suld haue perist albione quhat miserie sustenit faderis berigone quhen thay war cōstranit vrgēt necessite saif thair miserable lyuis fude thair bowellꝭ quhat danger sustenit kyng rewther euadyng ennymes maist perellus ischeyng quhen realme neir lost colane vailȝeant capitane slane onelie defence hym realme quhat fury thay nobill wemen slew thaym self berigone thay suld nocht leif seruitude ennimes quhat he brocht nobillis sic mesiry thay war banist socht suple vncouth realmes nocht bot sedition intestyne amāg thaym self britonis al thair rich cheualrie mycht neuir haue maid sic incursionis heirschippis landis peple war nocht maid first ane reddy gait thaym awin dissentioun thairfore eschewit rycht vailȝeāt men dissentioun risyng amang ȝow cum nocht dāmage ȝour common weil ¶ȝe haue deliuerit laithe realme tiranny durstus ȝe haue sufficientlye reuengit slauchter nobillis deith tyme maist ganand
