help oure materis tyne nocht gud freindis victory ciuill dissentioun ȝe haue conquest gret labour ¶ȝe se pepil glaid durstus deith desirus haue ane kyng ȝour election quhil thay ar ȝour opinioun mak ane kyng yat tak ȝour part ¶otherwayis na thyng salbe amang ȝow bot ciuill weris heirschippis slauchter baith nobillis commonis meyntyme sum durstus freindis sall nocht onlye vsurp crown bot sall punys ȝow slauchter nobillis commonis seand charon sic exellent wisdome gaif hym power cheis quhom thocht best kyng charon crown sal remane ay ye blud chesit ewin first name kyng durstus ewin war brethir sonnis ¶thus ewin crownit chair marbill berigone castell haldin certane dayis aganis freindꝭ durstus nochtheles finalie randerit ¶this ewin first kyng scottis socht aith fidelite fra subditis say nobillis subditis suld leil trew hym throw quhilk come vse mony ȝeris eftir capitanis tribis thair electioun constranit thair subditis gyf thair aithis fidelite quhilk ryte ȝit obseruit ¶for pepill dwellyng hie land ilis thairof electioun thair capitane haldis vp thair handis leil trew hym al sone capitane chosyn thay past nyxt mote defendis vnder pane deid ye nane thaym name thair capitane ony vthir sloggorne bot auld name tribe quhen thay heir name bek discouer thair heid na le reuerence war god beleif thairfore ye pepyll dwellis hie land ilis quhen thair hieest besynes occurris sweris fute hand name thair capitane sum hyd diuinite war ewin stabyl realme virtew commandit ȝoung child realme nurist skars hard fude sleip erar hard burdis plumis coddis ythandly exercit swift rynnyng werslyng make thaym abyll debait realme quhen tyme requirit ordanit thaym abstene fra thyng micht make thaym soft effeminat virtuus prince past throw boundis realme ministration iustice punist criminabyll personis syndry punitioun sum skurgit sum punist ye deith samyn tyme come ambassatouris pichtis desyryng tenoure confideratioun haue support aganis britonis quhilkis war laitly cummyng gret incursionis mers purposit sege thair ciete camelon kyng ewin support confiderate freindis come ane haisty army aganis brytonis scottis pichtis assē blit maner went forthwart na le curage thā victory ben present thair handis far war thair myndis inflammit reuenge iniuris done thaym ye ȝeris afore britonis na thing affrayit thair cumyng met thaym na le ferocite tothir 〈◊〉 followit ane dangerus cruell battall fochtin lang tyme vncertane victory bot last nicht seuerit thaym rycht sorowfull doutsum chance battal confiderat kyngis seand thair army brokyn fled vnder nycht pentland hyllis ye britonis brokyn siclike calamite disparit ony new support fled ye maner disconfist pepyll left thair carage behynde thaym al sone ye confiderat pepyl war aduertist heirof thay returnit partis quhare ye brytonis war cāpit afore partit spulȝe thairof custum army sic thyngis done kyng ewin returnit berigon rewardit richely ye freindis thaym war slane battall sum capitanis thair prouyn vassalage war promouit publik officis othirs rewardit ryches gudis fra then concludit gouerne realme trāquillite peace maid certane iugis abide syndry regionis realme minister iustice pepil ordanit certane exploratouris remane ilk schire thay micht serche sornaris theiffis reiffaris bring thaym lawis thir exploratouris mycht continew thair offyce dotat thaym syndry landis memory heirof remanis ȝit day syndry infeftmentis auld baronis quhais landis war geuyn virtuous princis samyn caus howbeit thay exerce nocht effect thairof kyng ewin biggit ane castel nocht far fra berigon callit ewin efter name callit dounstatage gidit realme mony ȝeris efter gret commodite common weil deceissit xix ȝeir regne ¶hovv gillus bastard sonne kyng evvin slevv tvvo sonnis tvvo nepotis du • stus make hym self kyng hovv thrid nepot edeir eschapit ca xvi eftir deith ewin bastard son gillus conuenit nobillis bury fader tyme hꝭ obsequies com dothane dorgall two sonnis durstus fast contendyng crown thay war reconseld kyng ewin afore deth ȝit becaus thay war two twynnis borne atanis law couth nocht decerne thay dayis quhilk thaym maist richt crown thus rais ane schamful debait betuix thir two brethir ilk ane thaym set ī othir slauchtir gillus ane mā subtell ingyne seik occasioun conquis crown ekit hatrent thir two brethir mony slichtis armit yame athir slauchter last appoyntment gillus thir two brethir war brocht togidder agreit auise freindis debatis ane thaym maid kyng nochtheles thay war sa extreme conuentioun athir side yt thay partit war freindis thay met nocht lang eftir thay war brocht agane gillus ane secreit chalmer eftir lang consultatioun concludit sū tyme deuide crown betuix thaym sum tyme mak ane yame king alwayis gillus inflāmit yair hatrent thā mesit ye mene tyme certane armyt men ruschit priuat chalmeris thay war cō mandit gillus slew thaym baith eftir thair slaucht gillus ran heir thair wt piteus cryis schawin eschapit ane richt dangerus aduenture quhare kyngis sōnis war layd slauchter baith slane incontinent commandit freindis yt stude hym haue hym sum sycker place gyf fled nocht tyme suld tynt freindis beleuyng al thyngis trew schew followit hym castell dounstafage gyllꝰ enteryng wyse within castel fynding mony opinion arrayit men syndry abuschementis cōmandit sla thaym war repugnant desyris incontinent callit capitanis tribis ane counsall began lang orisone detest ye insolence auarice vnnatural hatrent ye kyngis sonnis quhilkis cōtendyng crown he slane thaym self maner detes • ye bludy tyrany durstꝰ thair fader schawand mony reasonis sonnis vnabyll ye crown gaif thā ki thairfore ye goddis yt cuntre deliuerit thair tyrāny ye tresson falling thaym self quhilk thay deuysit hī finally schew gret laubour cure diligence yt tuke baith commoun wele haue brocht kyngis sonnis cōcord quhilkis thā war baith slane nocht knaw quhat maner bot narrowly eschaping wt lif forthir schew fader kyng ewin left hym gouernour testament power part tresoure gudis amang ye nobyllis luffit hym duryng lif commoun weil mycht suffer na dammage desyrit administration realme geuyn hym quhyll war cleirly discussit quhay war iust herytouris thairto capitanis quhilkis war tyme within ye castell knawand weil treason saif thair liffis maid hym kyng al sone gillus maid kyng wyse stabil realme sickir firmance tuk ye • pepil faithful liegis sic thingis done partit tresure guddis kyng ewin promittit way cō quest thair beneuolence fauour nochtheles ambition auarice mouit hym seik crown remanit hym eftir kyng set mynd mony slychtis distroy lynnage blude durstus mycht reiose ye crown ony clame otheris becaus wes aduertist dothane sonne durstus afore slane thre sonnis nurist ile man vnder ye wise clerkis thairof quhilkis ye eldest lismorus xii ȝeris age secund cormacus x ȝeris thrid ed • ir nocht thre ȝeir age wēt ye nerrest way ye said yle wt dissimilat mīd wald haue brocht thir child castell dunsta • age fosterit thair otheris nobillis sonnis ye realme eldest two arrayit thair best auyse met kyng gillus quhome maist tenderlie ressauit spendit residew ye nycht cherisyng thir barnis ye gret maister bischop said ile suld haue na suspition hyd treason ¶on morow began cōmon bischop clerkis concerning thair religioun constitutionis lawis ¶on thrid day maid sacrifice goddis solempnit cerimonis eftir left certane men behynd hym • thrid sonne edeir pullit vp salis arriuit doūstafage hauand hym two eldest sonnis ye said dothane thair fostar fader brether thay dayis ye pepyll na le affection thair foster brether fader thā thair awī naturall fader brether ȝoungest son edeir sic infirmite yt na man beleuit lif al sone began conuales brocht nuris argyle quhare nurist lang tyme amang desert craggis montanis ye land scho suspeckit na gud cum two remanent brether yt come gyllus handis scho coniecturit followit first nycht yt gyllus returnit dounstafage slew baith thir sōnis dothane armis thair foster fader brether herand yt thrid son edeir eschapit become sa wod furius slew men yt left behynd hym slauchter thair returnyng fra thēs set hꝭ vter besynes ꝑsew edeir deith ceissit nocht quhyll suerly aduertist fleyng ireland ¶hovv kyng gyllus vvas banist hovv cadal chiftane brigandis vvas maid gouernour slevv gillus ireland hovv evvin secund vvas maid kyng ca xvii lāg efter ane coū sall set doū stafage ye quhilk gyllus schew lāg orisō deseruit na litil fauour nobyllis commonis prudent administratioun realme geuand vter besines baith take away al mouaris sedicion saif fra dissention weris intestine fra insolence ane ȝoung prince thairfore desyrit na suspition imput hym howbeit sōnis dothane war deceissit apperit mynd goddis thay ordanit kyngdomes empire haue thay cōmandit na wemen barnis bot men prouyn virtew haue samyn gouernance forthir thair syndry seditius men mouaris discord quilkis necessar drawin fra ye laif al sone gyllꝰ said thir wordis enterit ane certane nobyllis castel dounstafage incontinent gart sla freindis durstus ony miseration quhidder thay war men wiffis barnis mony noblis ye stude hym rycht astunist cruelte dreidand slane maner gyllꝰ seand thaym affrayit maid thaym consolatioun gif thay continewit opinioun thay sall leif gret felicite tymes cumyng efter kest wickit mynd ylk day cruelte mycht vterly distroy thaym fauorit durstus quhen bludy tyrane roung certane tyme thir siclike inhumane cruelteis vnsemand ane prince capitanis nobyllis scotland assemblit ane army chosyn men fra partis realme conspirit aganis hym sic prudēce yt tyrane wist nocht thairof quhyl yay war arrayit afore hym dounstafage gyllus destitute support hauand nane hym bot sa mony war outhir haldyn aganis thair wyll coft money gat ane fischar bait fled ireland efter fleyng men war al ȝoldin cadal chiftane brigandis baith castellis berigone dounstafage taikin nobyllis gud aduisement tyrane gillus suld perpetually exilit maid cadall gouernour quhilk kest extreme labour persew gyllus ye deith come fynaly ilis quhare fand edeir thrid son dothane quhilk sauit afore fra treasone gyllus nurice said becaus sayd edeir destitute freindis thay war al slane gyllus send epiak principall ciete brigance kepit thair quhil war perfectioun aige gyllus banist wyse complanit princis ireland heuy iniuris done hym ye scottis quhome exilit spulȝeit empire kyngdome throw quhylk na place left sicker hym albion promittit gif said princis wald restore hym realme gif ye ilis scotland fra empire scottis haldyn perpetually dominion ireland ireland princis glaid promis assemblit ane army cum scotland ye effect cadal weill aduertist thair ordinance returnit doūstafage tuke consultatioun nobillis said gillus mycht esely resistit concludit y• ewin secund name sal kyng nepot kyng fynnane gottin bruther dowal gyllus seand see campis stuffi • partis albion resyst cumyng arryuit ilis quhare exercit cruelte ony miseratioun piete syne tuke hym guddis mycht caryit remanent put fyre kyng ewin impacient suffer thir • uris prouidit ane flote galȝeonis schippis marineris weirmen thingis necessar send thaym cadall admyrall ireland sone efter cadall pullit vp salis fortunat wyndis arriuit ī ireland quhais cumyng went sic confluence pepil hym semit nocht vincus gyllus bot pepyll ireland gyllus sone efter arrayit folkis sound trumpet baith armyis iunit faucht gret cruelte ylk syde quhyll last mony gyllus folkis wery mate specially thay thocht • odius fecht aganis thair natiue pepyll fled fra gillus▪ randerit • haym cadall gyllus dispa • victory raif coit armour fled thik wod sone efter certane armit men war send seik gyllus fand hym fynaly ane dirk coif wod neir famyst hunger incontinent thay slew hym brocht heid cadall ☞ ¶this miserabyll end maid gyllus secund ȝeir regne confydyng ouir mekyll tyranny falset ¶hovv cadal returnād ireland lost maist part army rage see consolatioun maid hym kyng evvin ca xviii efter ye deith gyllus cadall returnand albioun ireland see vyctorius army quhen suddandly rais ane vnmercyful storme turnit glore victory desolatioun irrecouerabyll skaithis fallyng said tempest passit proffet victory miserabyll moderis wiffis knawing thair husbandis sonnis perist see conuenit schippis hydduous spraichis schowtis amang othir lamentabyll sichtis cadall come land dolorus array beirand handis heuyn warying fortoun goddis distroyit sa mony nobyll vailȝeant men conuertyng thair glore victory supreme misery quhais dolorus hauyngis war sa petuous euery man compassioun thairof ¶kyng ewin rycht sorrowfull thir nouellis come gret diligence cadall said maner thou he brocht realme maist vailȝeant cadall na lytyll consolatioun returnyng thy victorius army albioun▪ vnbrokyn •• uris ennymes thou he vincust ennymes ane vncouth regioun▪ fechtand manly displayit baneris eis realme common weill tyrane gyllus pump euery vice vincust howbeit schamefull fleyng mycht support hym quhais heid schorne fra body brocht albion fyne sal nocht want quhen deid schame dishonour deseruit tyranny lyf aduersaryis ar penitent thair rebellyoun brocht opinion army thy industry ar saiffit reproche amang thair vncouth strongest fais thou he left na thing vndone pertenit ane forcy campioun na caus occurris reclame aganis fortoun heuynnis yocht ane part thy army perist tempest rage seis ȝit thow beneuolence fauour goddis ar saffit hie honour realme thow arriuit ireland nocht bot propiciant fauour ye goddis returnyng sa riche spulȝeis ony iniuris ennymes thocht thy ennymes reiose ye mischance fallyng thy army ȝit na glore may succeid thairof thaym stait eirdly creatouris he condicioun eftir prosperite cumys aduersite eftir aduersite cumis prosperite proceding reward fatal destineis quhais affect may nocht mouit ȝit esche wit prudence mortall creatouris thow he thairfore na caus lament bot erar haue thy aduersite pacience saiffyng ane better forton sen na creatouris may remeid thir displesouris bot goddis quhilkis gouernis empire men thair pleseir schaw ane plesand vul • w thy freindis ennymes may knaw ferme constance na mair brokin aduersite prowd prosperite thy spreit curage may appere al inuincible thy body battall cadal heir consolatioun prīce fenȝe • al y• cheir mycht howbeit repentit sair vnmercyfull tempest consumit sa mony vailȝeant men left hym liue se thair mischeif sorow calamite fallyng cadall sumpart rehersit ye poete claudiane othir auctouris ¶hovv kingis scottis picht •• vvar alliat togidder mariage hovv balus king orknay slevv hym self b • disperation vvyse counsall geuyn kyng evvin edeir ca xix kyng ewin eftir slauchter gyllus desiryng gouerne realme iustice visit boundis thairof punist faltourꝭ gaue cadal ye faithfull seruice hym done town epiak sindry othir landis townis brigance fre regalite nocht lang eftir kyng ewin accumpanit nobillis met gethus kyng pychtis borduris brigance renewit band peace pychtꝭ peace wes roborat mariage king ewin maryit stora dochter gethus thrid king pychtis mariage wes solempnisit ye bischop preistis ile man nocht lang eftir wes aduertist balus kyng orknay wes cumming ane flote schippis throw pentland firth maid na litill heirschippis slauchter ro cathnes kyng ewin meit thir attemptatis assemblit ane flote schippis sic deligence balus wes aduertist thairof quhill wes arriuit sycht ¶the orknay men abasit suddand cummyng war constranit gyf battall bot thay war sone discomfist continewall chais dreuin seis quhare ane part yame eschapit fischear batis residew vincust slane kyng balus seyng na way eschape sall nocht cum ennymes handis slew hym self kyng ewin throw yi victory conquest gret fauour pepill quhen wes returnyng hame ireland seis arri • mouth lochtie quhare biggit ane town callit inuetlochtie maid thair ane sicker refuge honour goddis defēdyng vnder pane deid ony criminabill personis abstrakit ye samyn nochtwithstāding quhat sumeuir crymis thaym cōmittyt town wes eftir ane commoun port till marchandis france spanȝe incredibill plente fische swōmand thay seis town remanis nocht ī day • aif onlie ruinus wallis thairof wes euertit danis sall eftir schaw kyng ewin biggit ane othir town ye riuer ne quhilk ȝit namyt innernes qu • air sū tyme wes gret repair mar • handis quhilkis come almany seik riche furringis martrikis bewatis siclik skinnis quhilkis aboundis regioun town remanis ȝit vnd y• auld name full marchandise guddis howbeit oftymes heryit euil • ychtbouris liand thair kyng ewin ane noble illuster prince baith peace weir passit remanent dayis ony domistik vncouth weris peacefyit seditionis rais ye ilis maruellus wisdome detestit ay ciuill weris al weill quhen wes priuat ī publik 〈◊〉 schort tyme afore deith past epiak agre sonnis cadall quhilkis fell gret contention efter thair faderꝭ deith rich guddis nochtheles nobyll prince aggreit thaym sone efter cumyng efter done obsequies cadall efferyng gyse thay dayis gart rais ane huge stane grauyn quik ymage cadall apon ane hie mo • cōmandit pepyll offer hym wyne sen oure forebearis war dissauit al weil othir pepyl thair arrouris kyng ewin sorrowfull deith cadall fell heuy infirmite sa dispari • heill resignit ye crown edeir thrid nepote kyng durstus iust h • rytoure crown haue schawin fyne edeir suld ane gud kyng counsalit hym defende liegis subdittis fra iniuris na man iniure geif na man office auctoryte ennyme iustice dres gret materis hym self small materis commit nobillis gouerne hym ay sic maner may worthy regne aboue subdittis neuir moue battall le mycht na othir waris quhen necessar haue battal yrk na chargis pertenyng weirly ordināce▪ deuoid neuir picte virtew maist semand ane prince fynaly commandit hym aboue othir besynes haue goddis ī reuerence quhais fauoure wes ane souer protectioun realmis quhen geuyn coūsal edeir dece • ssit ye xvii ȝeir regne eft quhais deceis raisit ane crafty ymaig • maid symylitude quhylk haldin mony ȝeris efter gret veneratioun amang pepyll ¶and sa endis heir secund buke heir begynnis thrid buke croniklis scotland ¶of kyng edeir hovv reuengit heirschippis maid tratoure bredus ilis ca primo ewin deceissit ī maner edeir crownit chiar merbyl sone efter vesyt boundis realme quhais passaige mair plesand nobyllis geuyn huntyng delytit thyng chais wild beistis houndis rachis specially wolffis thay ar noy sum tame bestiall regioun throw cauld humouris thairof ingeneris wolffis feirs cruell nature kyng edeir brocht pepil sic tranquillite thay leuit mony ȝeris ony oppression iniure nychtbouris bot last bredus ilis cosyng gyllus afore rehersit arriuit mony schyppis galȝeonis argyle reuenge slauchter said gyllus othir freindis slane ireland pepyll impacient suffer heirschippis slauchter hym maid complaynit kyng edeir quhylk huntand nixt montanis tyme kyng edeir aduertist heirof past nycht ane cumpany chosyn mē ye see quhair said bredꝰ arriuit first brint thair schyppis gailȝeonis thay mycht haue na refuge fle ireland ¶on nixt morrow kyng edeir persewit bredus complicis sic manheid thay war finaly tane put detth ¶sic thyngis done kyng edeir past ilis quhare punyst syndry conspiratouris followit opinioun gyllus bredus ¶hovv brytonis send ambassatouris kyng edeir support aganis iulius cesar thair orison kyng edeiris ansvver hovv ye said iulius vvas doung albiō support scottis ca ii al sone edeir dantit inuasouris realme returnit dounstafage mene tyme come hym ambassatouris cassibilane kyng brytonis desyryng support aganis iuliꝰ cesar romane emperour quhais army reddy maist awfull ordinance cum albion edeir plesandly ressauit thir ambassatouris commandit thaym propone thair eirandis ¶sone efter ane nobyll man namit androgeus sayd maner ¶i wyll say na thyng famous auditoure name cassibilane king brytonis maist nobyl prīce saif sal pertene baith ye weil thy realme liegis nature wyse moder creatouris he put ile albioun thre vailȝeant pepyll nocht ye behuffe thay suld leif seditioun inuaid othir beistis reasoun bot incres togydder vnder ane beniuolence freindschip yt thay may strang resist vncouth ennymes quhen euir sall happin thaym inuadit quha may beleif traist ye realme stand sicker quhen ye britonis ar distroyit romani bot gyf sum man vane esperance wald traist romani quhylkis reiffis sceptouris fra kyngis plesand mercyfull ȝow ȝoure nychtbouris ar distroyit thou may haue cognossance dāmage othir pepyll opinioun vane romani calland thaym self proude insolence lordis ye warld quhilkis ar hatit pepyll thair tyrannye ar determyt cum haistely albioun subdew sa myn thair empire quhat othir thyng may beleif romani sall quhen thay haue subdewit w britonis bot siclik auarice tyranny reif fra ȝow scottis pichtis ȝour landis lawis liberteis quhat othir thyng desyre thay bot sit landis castellis townis outhir thryll w maist schamefull seruitude elli banis maist nobyll vailȝeant men amang w thair deidis schawis weill thair tyranny▪ may weil prouyn w rewyne cartage sumtyme ryche ciete brocht finaly nocht fra randerit romani nochtwithstādyng abaid thair opinion faith forther gif sa remot vncouth hystory may nocht moue ȝow beh • ld gallis ȝour nychtbouris quhilkis al sone thay war vincust romani war thirlit perpetuall seruytude thair munitionis euery maner wappynnis tane fra thaym nocht traistit romani sall propiciant w albianis gif w • vincust thay haue bene otheris afore ay ye incressis thair dominioun thair tyranny mair insufferabyll lat w heirfore resist thir commoun iniuris pissance equale cō curryng best resist violence romani begynnyng aduēture thay grow efter sa strāg quhē thair power iunit togidder thay may nocht resistit belt ye thairfore maist inuincibyl prince thy prouyn virtew support w thir thy vailȝeāt pepyl come lusty gallandis arrayit ī battal aganis common ennymes defend ȝour anciant liberte▪ haue ferme esperance victory sen cōmon ennymes nocht content remanent boundis warld insaciabyl auarice • ut ony occasion iniuris intendis subdew ile quhilk seuerit fra pepyll thair empire forthir quhen ȝe fauour goddis h • conquest • ictory aboue mony vn • ellabil comod • teis ȝe sall reiose ȝoure liberte conquest glore immortall baith ȝow ȝour realme quhen • idr • geus endit th • orison remouit asyde quhill noblis aduisit quhat done efter ripe deliberation concludit send support britonis resist commoun • anger app • ryng kyng edeir maid answer thir ambassatouris wyse ȝe desyre thyng weil belo ••• britonis baith honest proffitabyll tyll cōmon weill mouand w defend realme quhilk he bene sa vailȝeantly defendit oure progenitouris fra extreme dangeir thairto apperyng auarice rich cheualry pridfull empire romani ar schawin weill w thaym he bene subdewit thairto forthir knaw weill gyf romani subdew ȝow brytonis thair dominioun thay inuaid w nixt outhir thryll w vile seruitude elli expell w albyoun dammage gallis spanȝartis fra quhome anciant faderis discēdit schewis dayly w quhat afflictioun misery thay sustene ar subdewit romani bene mair honest thaym opinion haue fouchtyn maist strangly ye deid defence thair liberte haue reseruit thair miserabyll lyuis sic schameful seruitude knaw britonis wyl nocht • ine thair realme thair liberte lawis strang bergane sen common weill may suffer na danger sa lang ȝe britonis standis ī sicker firmance ar degest counsall profoundly resoluit ieoperde lyuis guddis defence ȝow thynkand better de vailȝeantly sort gyf sic thyngis plesand goddis remane hame suffering ȝow tender freindis reft fra ȝour landis liberteis fynaly rander oure natiue goddis wiffis barnis ennymes handis thir reasonis wyll caus army maist weirly ordinance send haistely london support cassibilane kyng brytonis ¶we wyll al require gethus confiderat brother kyng pychtis concur w band alliance affect beleif thay ye dwellis albioun respect thay haue common weill wyll heir w gladly behalf luf beir vnto natyue cuntre enforcis w inuincibyl bodyis assist thairto ambassatouris britonis rasit esperance gret felicite answere returnit cassibilane al sone thir ambassatouris war dispaschit kyng edeir send two vailȝeant men cadallane dowall capitanis brygandis lorne xm chosyn mē london ¶the cumyng thir scottis thankfull cassibilane yt fecht aganis maist pissant ennyme iulius dantour warld mene tyme cassibilane aduertist iulius arriuit within see brocht army land ye pepyll fled war left resist cumyng see camp nobyl men vailȝeantly resistit slane egyll quhilk ansenȝe romani prowdly dysplayit hycht thir nouellis na lytyll affray amang brytonis nochtheles cassibilane maid yame plesand cōsolation exhortit yame vehemently battall defence thair realme liberte thair wiffis barnis natyue goddis quhilkis ar sa deir mortall pepyll thaym lyf man nothir plesand sicker beleif na othir thīg said bot sicker victory sen ȝour ennymes persewis ȝow na occasioun iniuris bot thair insaciabyl auarice britonis war rasit gret esperance victory cummyng scottis pychtis thay na lytyll confydence thair manheid cheualry ☞ ¶incontinent cassibilane went forthwart hale power aganis romani first send hors men syndry wageouris weir cartis breke array ordināce romani first contering two smal incursionis vncertane victory bot last baith armyis iunit thair hale power followit ane doutsum batt • lang continewing vncertane chance quhyll last cumyng welchemen cornwal sa huge nois rais reird sowne bellis yt hang thair bardyngis yt ennymes war affrayt finaly put flycht brytonis scottis pichtis come thair support followit chace sic fury skatterit array yt thay gat mair skaith thay dyd thair ennymes romani kepit si • ordour thair fleing abaid sa fast togidder thair ansenȝe thay maid thaym oftymes renew battall howbeit thay war nocht power resist brytonis wyde skatterit syndry buschement • eschapit nocht thair chace gret slaucht quhyll ye last nicht seuerit thaym al sone iulius persauit chace endit gaderit ye residew folkis togidder send ye woundit men schippis purpos reuēge outrage ye morrow nochtheles herand morrow mony schyppis war sa brokin violent tempest yt thay war abyll hym proffet dreidand calamyte fallyn schippis suld na le curage ennymes discomfitour awin folkis supersedit intent quhyl saw ane tyme mair ganand al sone reparit nauy brocht folkis new strength quhare britonis mycht nocht inuaid hym syne pullit vp salis within nycht returnit france leuand behynd hym ane huge pray guddꝭ quhilk mycht nocht turst laik schippis ȝeir iulius come first albion fra begynnyng warld vmcxxxix ȝeris afore ye incarnation lx ȝeris ye iiii ȝeir empire king edeir ¶hovv iulius returnit britane maid tributar romane empire▪ ca iii quhen cesar doung albiō wyse albianis yt say scottis pichtis brytonis partit spulȝe found tentis custum armis reiosyng glorious victory maid sacrifice thair goddis beleuyng perpetually delyuerit baith weris romani othir vncouth pepyll tymis cumyng cadallane dowall richely rewardit cassibilane returnit ye army scottis schew kyng edeir al thingis done maner afore rehersit edeir reiosyng thir nouellis commandit generall processionis sacrifice maid honoure goddis followit sa incredibil luf kyndnes betuix scottis brytonis pychtis thay apperit le • f tymes cumyng perpetuall peace ȝeir followyng kīg edeir past innernes quhare sindry marchandis aduertist iulyus pecifiit france empire makand prouisyon ane new army returne ī brytane reuenge ye iniuris done hym ȝeir afore edeir sone efter send ambassatouris cassybilane schaw hie dangeris appering realme promittit send gyf plesit xm chosin men support thir ambassatouris thair cumyng london schew thir offeris cassybylane brytonis mouit vane arrogāce yt ye glore victory suld tane fra thaym refusyt haue ony supple scottis pichtis answerit thay war nocht brocht sic febylnes yt necessar thaym haue support al tyme quhen ennymes inuadit thaym thay pyssance instantly quhylk thay dantit romani ȝeir afore king edeir nobillis na lytyll admiration sic vane arrogance refuse support aganis sa pissant ennymes dantaris warld iugit thairfore nobyl realme britonis proude insolence ane smal victory sustene gret dammage quhylk thyng weill sene end thir weris iulius returnit sone efter brytane quhais cumyng pepyll left resyst hym affrayit infynyte multitude schippis fled thair best refuge nochtheles iulius stoutly assailȝet cassibilane thre syndry tymis put abak bot last cassibilane discomfist vailȝeant capitanis tane slane cassibilane brokin ylk day irrecouerabyll skaithis disparit support randerit hym iulius▪ gaif plegis realme sall remane tributar romane ꝓuince cassibilane ȝoldin ī maner cōmandit pay ȝeirly iiim poundis syluer romane pepyl maner tribute ¶of syndry message send iulius scottis pichtis thair ansvver iulius hoif syndry opiniōis cōcernyng first foūdaris thairof ca iiii al sone iuliꝰ dā tit brytonis wyse come london quhare ressauit gret reuerence honoure quhen tarryit thair certane dayis refresche army maid prouision pa scottis pichtis motiue weris becaus scottis pichtis maid support afore brytonis first tyme come ī britane ȝit afore maid ony battall aganis thaim thocht best assailȝe thair myndis ambassatourꝭ quhidder thay lyst haue weir peace peace gif thay wald subdewit romane empire weir gif thay ꝑuersly wald cōtempne belyue send ambassatouris ye two kyngis scottis pichtis schaw thaym yt realmis fauoure apperit goddis war subdewit romani ye goddis sindry reuolutionis tyme geuyn monarchy empire warld syndry pepil say affricanis medis persanis grekis instantly romani placis ar foundin erd quhare romane cheualry vnknawin thay fauour goddis he brocht realmis landis vnder thair empire▪ thay haue vincust aphrik egipt araby ioury perthia troy thebe asia macedone grece france spanȝe laitly brytane al regionis circulit ye occeane see ar obeysant romane lawis na pepyl ar erd yt knawis nocht name romani thair na sicker leuyng honeste bot quhare ye romani lawis he dominioun senat pepyl rome ar port sycker refuge pepyl quhais glore defend thair subdittis freindis iustice faith thir causis war na lytyll honour scottis pichtis haue societe romani callit confiderat freindis quhilkꝭ he sa mony cietes realmis brocht thair prouinces mony kyngis vnder thair seruitude cōmand cesar romane pepyll quhilk suld feruently desyrit syngular cō modite baith scottis pychtis le thay wyll rebelland goddis quhilkis he determit bryng hale warld vnder romane empire kyng edeir noblis herand thꝭ message vnderstude colorit dissait romani thairfore maid answer sayng thay wald defend thair wiffis childrē lā dis liberteis al ye power thay mycht vter end thair lif • rar ieoperde thaym maist dangerus battall leif seruitude fame romani nocht knawin thaym bot sa far thay war repute aboue ingyne man maist auaricious theiffis reiffaris realmes depriuing kyngis fenȝeit causis slichtis subdewyng fre pepyll iniust dattall seruitude forthir gif romani mouit occasyon iniuris bot corruppit malyce hapnit inuade thaym iniust battal thay tuke goddis quhilkis ar punyssaris iniuris done innocent pepyll wytnes fecht ye deith defēce thair lādis quhill ane thaym war left lyf ambassatouris hauand siclike answer pichtis returnit britane quhen iulius herd answer scottis pychtis send thaym secund message wt mair dispiteful chargꝭ thā afore efter followis gret cesar romane counsull persuadis kyng edere ȝow scottis submit ȝow romani ye maist pissant pepyll ye warld adu • ture ȝe bring ȝoure self imprudent fechtyng vter exterminioun take exempyll irrecouerabyll scaithis fallyng vthir pepyl thair vane rebellion behald ye maieste romane pepil cōsyder ye magnitude thair name wyl ȝe assailȝe thaym chāce battall britonis ȝour nychtbouris he laitly done quhilkꝭ fuliche b • rgane ar outhir slane tane brocht perpetuall seruitude quhat pissance haue ȝe respect romani concreouris warld haue ȝe vane cōfidence romani dantouris pepyll may vincust ȝow ye hynmaist pepyl thairof beleif ȝe yt warld may deliuerit fra seruitude romani ȝow may ȝour power quhilkis nocht respect romani restore empire sa mony kyngis dystroyit knaw ȝe nocht yt thair mony romane campionis na le actiue thā cesar baith wisdome māheid cheualry quhais illuster deidis he decorit regionis quhare sonne schynis ȝit difficil vincus cesar hym allone vincus warld presumptuous foly cumyn ȝow contempne ȝ • goddis quhilkis thair propiciāt fauour romani he ordanit regionis thaym subdewit beleif ȝe romani wyl sa irkit straitnes ȝour craggis mō tanis marressis p • nurite vittallis thay may nocht abide ȝour regionis beleif ȝe sicker ȝour said montanis ȝour guddis ȝe ar dissauit gyf sic bane confidence ȝow sic impedimentis sal moue na mair romani fra thar purpos ȝour rowmys war plentuous full euery frutis necessar sustene thair weris ye romani he experience aboue ingyne man cheualry sa agill thair bodyis thay may dant thortour difficill gatis swift rynk reddy euery kynd ieoparde skars meit sleip accustumat euery danger yt may occurre battall sa prouident thay sall caus vittallis gyf neid beis brocht thaym regionis adiacēt cesar he ane ripe wit euery cais may occurre heirfore gif ȝe haue ony regarde ȝour weill gyf ȝe prudent eschew warly ȝe fuliche vnprudent bergane bryng nocht ȝoure self ȝour wiffis frendis barnis irrecouerable dāmage ȝe may haue honest cōditionis peace afore victory quhilk ȝe sal nocht obtene quhen ȝe force battal ar randerit sall ȝe ȝour rebellioun reft baith ȝour landis honouris finaly brocht sic disperatioun ȝe sall neuir haue esperance recouer ȝour liberte al sone thir wourdꝭ war said sic fury noys rais amang ye scottis thay war impacient seruitude yt thir ambassatouris bene maist cruellie slane war nocht law pepill quhilk forbearis ay ī maist reuerence saffit yame nochtheles answer wes mayd thaym cadallane kyngis name followis ¶suppois scottis sum opinionis ar repute nocht circumspect bot fuliche dull ingyne ȝit thay ar nocht mouit mair cesaris plesand disfaitfull wourdis awfull minassyng lose thair landis liberteis extreme ieopardie battall thay ar nocht vse obey tyranis reuaris realmes kyngdomes bot onlie obey thayr natiue prince yairfore degest auisement counsall thay ar profoūdly resoluit haue na amite alliance romani becaus yair fair wourdis ar nocht hyd treason falset thair wrangus iniust weris thay haue plane diffiance committing thaym thair iust actioun protection goddis iulius rycht commouit answer maid ordinance tary dant thayr rebellion mene tyme gatte lettris fra labienus admirall normādis piccardis quhilkis war pecifyit departyng war rebellit attoure carnutes he rasit gret truble france slane ane man namyt transegeriꝰ quhilk wes chosin romani kyng france hald vnder ye empire romani iulius feir nouellis left comyng scotland becaus vittallis war skant army na apperance new vittallis cum britane ye wynter season quhen tempestuus seis sufferis na passage marchandis gaderit residew army togidder returnit france leuand behynd hym britane tributar empire scottis litill abasit weris historie cummyng cesar britan • subdewing empire nocht far discordāt fra ye wourdis commentaris ar drawin w uerimond campbell othir authouris bot said vulgare croniclis iuliꝰ come callēdare wod kest camelon principall ciete pichtis efter samyn randerit hym syne left behynd hym nocht far fra carron ane roūd hous square stanis xxiiii cubitis hecht xii cubitis breid ane memory cumyng y• place otherꝭ sayis vsit hous tent al viage ay tursit hym ye caus callit iulius hoif ȝit becaus na famous authouris makkis mention ony weris led iulius aganis scottis pychtis lat thaym pa wyll infer na thyng werke bot yt may repreuit hous iulius round may ȝit se hauand na wyndois bot aboue maner ye anciant tempillis quhilkis ar ȝit sene rome benkis • ane roūd within pauement he bene aselar stanis egyll quhyik ye romane ansenȝe craftely ingrauyn bot roust ȝeris worne away ane huge stane standand south quhylk gentilis maid thair sacrifice utheris authouris wryttis tempyll biggit uespasiane honour claudius emperour goddes uictory tytyll thairof schew bot cassin edward ye first king ingland yt name wyl schaw mair largely heir efter ¶hovv tratour murket cō plicis vvar punist deith kyng edeir vicious kyng evvin thrid lavvis deith ca v sone efter dyffiance send iuliꝰ king edeir assemblyt ane army frome boundis realme resist ye romani knew nocht impediment iulius weris ye mene tyme quhen gaderit wise come murket quhylk nepote gyllus afore rehersit arriuit mony galȝeonis ilis slew thair baith wiffis barnis agit personis ony resistence fensabyll mē said war drawin thay boundis kyng edeir al sone edeir aduertist thairof send cadallane capitane brigance ane band army • men ilis quhylk sone efter cumyng brynt galȝeonis ba • ti within nycht pertenit murket morrow tuke murket hinggit hym complicis ye gallous kyng edeir leuit ye residew dayis ony vncouth domistik weris deceissit doūstafage xlviii ȝeir regne xxvi ȝeir empire august emperour fra beginnyng ye warld vmclxxxiii ȝeris body burnt dounstafage sepulture war rasit mony hie pillaris memory nobyl deidis edeir syngulare virtew • ht haue bene callit ane happy prince baith leuand deid war nocht left sonne ewin thrid name y• maist vicius man erd heritoure crown ewin eftir deith fader maid kyng beleuit ylk man haue followit futesteppis fader nochtheles fra declarit kyng began burgeon euery kynd vi • e effeminat soupit iust past aboue common insolence ȝouth ane hūdreth concuvinis chosyn nobillest matronis virginis cuntre thocht wes irkit surfet noumer ȝit couth neuir saciat persuasioun lymmers harlottis quhilkis maid vp nocht assistance vice banyst ane certane nobillis otheris slew hyd wachyng ye fyne mycht esaly waik lust set mynd sla banis fenȝeit causis thaym haitit vice abhominable tyrane geuyn wyse maist terribill cruelteis enuennomit cuntre vi ȝeris wt na le infelicite pan schame counsall certane diffamit creaturis quhilkis hop proffet extollit louit gouernance schortlie tyrane become sa auaritius vnthankfull ony reuerence lawis goddis men spulȝeit seruitouris al thair landis rich gudis thay conquest vnder hym finalie grew sic blynd fury yat nurist opinle within hous theiffis mak reiffis heirschippis ye cuntre ony punitioun tuk ane large part thairof assistence beside thir mony othir thyngis vnworthy reheirsit maid lawis liegis sal haue al mony wyffis thay pleis efferyng thair guddis ane othir law maid wyffis commonis sal fre nobillis lord ground sall haue madinheid virginis dwellyng thocht ye first two lawis wes reuokit eftir counsall ȝit last law wes sa plesand ye ȝoung nobillis couth neuir abrogat quhill tyme kyng malcolme cammore blist quene sanct margaret quhilkis thocht samyn sa iniurius baith god man thay solistit ye nobillis reuoik said law takand thairfore ane goldin penny callit marchetis quhilk ȝit payit lord ground quhen virginis ar maryit redemption thair honour chaistite bot wil returne ewin quhais horribill vice wes sa dreuin euery mannis eir nobillis thoch • effeminat monstoure wes geuyn sic cruelte vice vnworthy thair prince maid yair fore ane haiste cōspiratioun aganys hym ewin nochtwithstandyng yi conspiratioun come displayit baner feild ane certane euill arrayit mē nochtheles wes sone vincust tane eftir lang cō sultation wes cōmādit ye nobillis yat salbe degradit kyngdome remane perpetual prison wes ordanit al cadallane duryng lyfe salbe gouernour bot first nycht wes put preson wes slane ane ȝoung child quhilk traistit becaus wes odious pepill get reward slauchter bot morow child wes iustifyit presence mony pepil end maid vnhappy tyrane kyng ewin deceissit vii ȝeir hꝭ regne ony airis body xxxii ȝeir empire august ¶of kyng metellane natiuite crist saluiour gret fouth poetis oratouris philosophouris flurisit ī tyme ca vi eftir ye deith kīg ewin nobillis chesit metellane quhilk wes nepote kyng edeir gottin hꝭ brodir carrō king yi metellane wes ye maist humyll prince yt rang aboue ye scottis day hauand na vncouth domistik weris duryng tyme gouernyt materis baith hame fe • gret felicite wes ane mercyfull prince subditis rycht religious eftir ye rite thay dayis tuk gret labouris abrogat cursyt lawis kyng ewin nochttheles wes faschit inopertune solicitation nobillis specially thay war geuyn thair lust wes constranit desist tyme come ambassatouris romani kymbalyne king 〈◊〉 britonis thankand hym perseuerance peace amyte senat pepill rome schew hym ye hail warld w • tyme peace tranquillite euir wes sene ony tyme afore exhortyt brito • thairfore example othir pepill keip peace concord amāg thaym occasioun ony ciuill vncouth weris sic doyngis pertenit baith felicite august empriour othir pepill thir ambassatouris come sone eftir kyng metellane siclike exhortatioun kyng metellane heirād narratioun thir ambassatouris farrest pepill oriēt secht amyte romani send syndry goldin crownis august emprioure thocht wald nocht vnplesand cōtempne maieste magnitude romane pepill send thairfore thir ambassatouris sindry riche iowellis offerit august empr • oure othir romane goddis ye capitol way kyng metellane conquest sicker amyte romani quhilk mony ȝeris eftir indurit yi message send august britonis writtis strabo buk geography callit discriptioun erd quhilk schawin situation britane ye maneris inhabitantis thairof ¶the warld beand thus peace christ saluioure wes borne virgyne mary douchter anna ioachym bathelem cite iowry▪ tyme quhen scheip hirdis herd ye angellis syng quhen thre kyngis gydit sterne come place quhare saluiour wes borne mony vncouth strange miraclis apperit tyme natiuite haly writ schawis natiuite fell x ȝeir regne metellane fra begynnyng realme scottis iiic xxx ȝeris xlii ȝeir empire august fra begynnyng ye warld vmiclxxxxix ȝeris kyng metellane rang mony ȝeris gud peace doyng na man iniure sa happy plesand subditis fame wes patent throw boundis albioun deceissit xxxix ȝeir regne xiiii ȝeir tiberius empriour fra natiuite crist xxix ȝeris tyme wes rome prince latyne poetis uirgill horace ouide tullius marcus uarro strabo titus liuius salustius mony othir naturall morall philosophouris sic fouth virtew letteris multiplyit thay dayis felicite birth crist ye geua • science grace apperandlie wes neuir sene sa mony eloquent poetis profound clerkis leuand ani wes tyme quhen god clothit nature man wes sene erd bot returne historie ¶of king caratak hovv dantit sindry ꝯspiratouris realme hovv britonis rebelland aganis ye romani • va • discomfist thair massaige send scottis ca vii metellane micht haue ben callit maist happy prince euir rang aboue scottis war nocht decessit airis bobody throw quhilk ye crown come caratak son vailȝeant cadallane afore rehersit wes nepot metellane gottin sister ewropea caratak eftir coronatioun ressauit huge treasour rich gaderit kyng metellane excedit pepill albion rich nocht lang eftir past throw al boundis realme syne past ane army ye ilis capitane thairof wes rebellit aganis hym nochtheles peacefyit truble rais seditioun punist principall mouaris thairof deith thingꝭ peacefyit maner returnyt albioun syne past carryk quhilk wes principal ciete yat schyre quhil sic materis wa • • ressit scotland deceissit kymbalyne kyng britonis quhilk ȝouth wes sa familiar august yt held ay britonis opinion romani eftir quhais deith guiderius wes maid kyng guiderius seing realme stabillit hym thocht heuy britonis suld leif vnder seruitude romani mouit heirfore vane esperance recouer liberte conuenit nobillis ane counsall quhare lang orison complenit realme liegis war haldin vnder seruitude romani nocht onlie ye said romani held strenthis cuntre garnist sodiouris bot resset rebellis wald nocht restore ye pledgꝭ war geuyn thaym bot causit thaym waist thair dayis captiuite preson best thairfore rebell aganis romani suffre na lāger thair ȝoke seruitude ye britonis inflammit thir wordis concludit generall consent suffer na langer seruitude romani incontinent thay ruschet harnes slew romani yt war found takin vtouth thair munitionis strenthis mene tyme guiderius gaderit ane army distroy garisoun romani afore ony noys rebellion war knawin rome nochtheles claudius empriour wes sone aduertist thairof send two capitanis namit aulus plancius gneus sentius britane mony romane legionis dant said rebellioun thir capitanis yair cū myng britane reparit al strenthis munitionis quhilkis war vnder romane obeysance new vittallis sodiourꝭ vtheris siclik ordināce resist ye britonis thay suld segit wtin yair strenthis thay brocht yair army ye planis reddy battall quhen thair ennimes list inuaid yame lang eftir guiderius assailȝeit ye romani wt arra • battal notheles ye victory succedit ye romani ye britonis eschapit wt smal dāmage cumyng ye nicht folowit mony incursionis gret slaucht baith romani britonis cōtinewing symer cumyng wynter ye romani held thaym thair munitionis tentis tyme come certane ambassatouris fra guyderius caratak kyng scottis said maner thynk reasonabyl maist illuster prince thay seikis support strange vncouth realmis gyf na amite kyndnes deseruit thaym gud dedis schaw thyng yt thay desyre honest proffitabyll thir reasonis britonis ambassatouris kyng guiderius opprest heuy weiris destitute supple help saif ȝow scottis pichtis ar cumyn h ••• illy ȝow treuth romane pepyll quhilk dayly inuadis w insufferabyl iniuris ar sare ••• ymes rycht pissant baith ry • he cheualry aboue estimatioun men nochtheles thay may vincust cesar vailȝeant emperoure ȝour support virtew doung baith realme ȝouris howbeit frāce spāȝe almane grece asia egipt aphrik obeyit hym thir romani inuadis w ar bot refuse cesaris army dout thay may vin • u • ȝour gretter honour gif ye goddis fauourabyl thay call thaym self proude insolence lordis warld ȝow hynmest pepyll thairof dyng thir oure commoun ennymes albyoun desyre ȝoure support sen samy • may nocht done oure pissance quhilk thyng gif ȝe remembrance ȝour anciant kyndnes amite supportyng w oure maist aduersite dangere ȝe sall conques aboue ȝoure hon • st victor • interminabyll glor • honoure ȝow ȝour posterite first becaus ȝe help w quhilkis ar nocht pe • sewaris bot defēdaris na thīg may sa honest plesand amāg leuand creatouris defend actioun common liberte natiue goddis secundly ȝe sall delyuer ȝoure realme pepyll fra hie dangeir thairto appering romani ȝour deidly ennymes intendis subdew w way may patent ȝow sen thir thī gi ar manifest ȝow maist vailȝecampionis gif ȝe haue respect weil ȝour self ȝour landis garnis ȝoure realme maner munitionis aganis romani quhilk thyng may esaly done gif ȝe pychtis equaly concur w aganis common ennymes samyn dare bauldly afferme sall pertene na le ȝoure common weill ouris quhen romani he vincust w battal spulȝeit w guddis subdewit oure realme forme prouince thay wyl ye abyl subdew ȝou thair empire tyme assailȝe ennymes battall quhill haue strenth quhil may help othir sufficient wi • hstand thaym suthly gif • • lbianis wyll equaly concur togi ••• r ane mynd thay sall draw al mekyll fra romani thay haue ony othir pepyll heirfore lat pissance scottis britonis pichtis equaly concur togider defend common liberte lat w tak wappinnis ani resyst iniure appering thocht war vincust quhilk god forbeid war na reproche w ar vincust ane pepyl bot pissance ye warld gif victorius iust actioun fermely beleuis victory sall na le glore proffet ȝow w ȝe salbe perpetually estemit pepyll ¶of caratakis ansvver hovv britonis solistit normanis picardis rebellion hovv said britonis vvar discomfist romani thair kyng slane ca viii caratak maid ansuer message ī maner followyng ȝe britonis nocht refusit oure supporte frely offerit ȝow quhen iulius romane counsull inuadit ȝow iniust battall▪ suld nocht haue bene necessar ȝow day seik support w ȝit suld haue ben necessar w rais army aganis sa pissant ennymes iunyng al pissance togidder mycht esaly haue vincust thaym bene delyuerit dredoure reiosing oure rowmis albion perpetuall rest ȝit better thay say lait neuir thryf nocht deuysit mycht haue dantit romani tyme bigane bot may eschew hie dangeir appering ȝe complane ȝe ar iniustly inuadit ane ryche pepyl richt desirus haue dominion reif othir mennis guddis ȝe haue bene subdewit thaym mony ȝeris lyffand vnder thair seruytude ȝour awin defalt ȝe ar deuidit amang ȝour self seditionis intestyne sa lang ȝe stand ȝour common weill sall neuer fre forthir ȝour munitionis strenthis ar stuffit romane sodiouris ȝour planis ar garnist thair tē ti heir al claudius cesar uaspasiane ar aduertist ȝour instant rebellioun reddy cum mony legionis pepyl ȝour realme think thairfore sen ȝe ar brokyn sa many calamiteis battallis howbeit ye haill power albion war concurrant ȝow ȝe resist sa pissant ennymes tyme le ye goddis war contrarius thaym best thir causis mei seditionis amang ȝoure self superseding ȝoure weris ane seasone set ȝour laubour maist crafty ingyne trāsport dangerus battall france wirk prudently ȝe man solist normandis picardis bartaneris almanis vthir pepyll lyand bordour france rebell aganis romani esperance recouer thair liberte promit gif thay wyll assyst thairto support thaym schippis weirmen gold vthir necessaris pertenand thair weris ȝe man eik confiderat pepyll hatis romani gif ȝe weill ȝe sall eschew battall romani intendis moue ȝow conuert frāce thus sall baith ȝe delyuerit fere ennymes leif remanent ȝeir quiete mair abyll ye nixt ȝeir battall gif thair na way eschew maist dangerus battall think best assemble pepyll albion togidder fecht honest battal deith ony respect lif bot allanerly glore honour na pepil may de mair honestly fechtand thair liberte natiue goddꝭ aganis ye lordꝭ ye warld ambassatouris britonis rasit esperāce gud fortoun answer returnit guiderius britane quhen guiderius hard wyse counsall caratak send ambassatouris persuaid normandis pycardis bartaneris othir pepyll see costis rebell aganis romani saying na thyng abhominabyll fre pepyll contrar thair natiue lawis subdewit romani quhilkis war ane proude cruel pepyll dayly exercyng thair tyrā ny sa many new intollerabyll conditionis seruytude plegis subdewit realmis na maner deith • uld refusit recouer thair liberte quhilk lif mā • nocht thir reasonis na thyng 〈◊〉 sa gud pepyll throw •• undis france rebell aganis romani sla thair sodiouris partis quhare thay mycht apprehendit gyf hortatioun thairto thay schaw kyngis albion sal assist thaym support thaym money vittallis schippis weirmen othir necessaris referyng thairto schew romani quhilkis war laitly cumyng britane hais tynt thair horsmen remenant brokyn sic calamite thay ar outhir chasit ye see elli thair strenthis cietezouris teruana flanderis quhom thir ambassatouris first come rycht desyrus recouer thair lyberte refusit nocht thir offeris bot charge hie thay couth nocht answer quhyll thay war aduysit thair nichtbouris prayit thaym keip thair peticionis secrete gif samyn war diuulgat al thair plegis war geuyn afore romani sall cruelly tormentit remoue suspitioun prayit thaym remane calice quhyll thay war resoluit mater ¶thus abaid thir ambassatouris britane certane dayis calice abiding thair answer mene tyme guiderius aduertist aulus plācius rasit camp distroyit al landis fyre swerd stud opinion guiderius seand na way eschew ennymes gaderit pepyll togidder arrayit battall closit thaym wanis car • euery syde except part fornens thair ennymes fyne nane thaym sal haue esperance fle syne put wiffis said wanis cartis exhort thair husbandis fecht vailȝeantly thair lyffis landis tother syde plācius deuidit army thre battallis blast trumpet come sa fe • sly britonis thay na space schute thair arrowis britonis slāg thair bowis fra thaym faucht thair swerdis wiffis exhortit thaym wt loude cryis delyuer thaym romane seruitude battall cruelly fochtin bot last brytonis war discomfist guiderius thair kyng slane mony ye wemē war smorit cartis preis thaym yt fled chais ceissit nocht quhyll britonis war dreuyn ye reuer garieme vi mylis fra place quhare feild discomfist victory nocht rycht plesand romani gneus sencius mony othir romane nobillis war slane al sone vnhappy battall schawin ī frāce maid pepyll thairof disparit recouer thair liberte ye ambassatou • quhylkis war send said ī france returnit ony expedition thair message hystory haue wryttyn colleckit godofryde wrytar inglis historyis ueramond iohne campbell cornelius tacitus eutropius ¶hovv claudius emprioure come britane subdevvit orknay empire sanct peteris first cumyng italy assumptioun glorius virgine mary ca ix schort tyme eft claudius empriour uespasiane ane mā singulare virtew arriuit mony legionis pepyll britane britonis herand cumyng war gretumly affrayit nochtheles publik aduysement thay send oratourꝭ excuse thaym sayng offence committit aganis romani done euyl counsall thay wald thairfore repare iniuris thaym done bot obeysant empire romani thair lawis tymes cumyng claudius cōmandit thaym geif plegis obseruatiō thairof syne commandit prince lordis britane cum afore hym aganis ane certane day intimatioun gyf thay dyd nocht suld persew thaym deith britonis knawyng na refuge gaif plegis come london desyrit last quhen claudius demandit thaym quhy thay brak thair faith thay fell kneis confessand thair offence prayit hym sen thay war sufficiently punyst goddis ressaue thaym agayne mercy saif thair liffis vnder quhat condition seruitude plesit maid solempne aithis neuer rebell tymes cumyng gif thay failȝeit al vengeance erd fal thaym thair posteryte sum romani gaue counsall claudius punys thair rebellioun sla principal mouaris thairof othir wayis britonis mycht nocht haldyn opinion nochtheles uespasiane persuadit hym mony reasonis mercy ane prince mercy may well dred bot neuir luffit al na thyng pertenit sa mekyll maieste romane pepyl haue mercy thair subdittis defend thaym fra al iniure ennymes way ye empire romani ekit suld indure samyn way end warld thir wordis uespasian mesit empriour ī sic maner▪ chesyt erar namyt ane mercyful prince ane vengeabyl tyrane mene tyme began treit materis concernyng ye administratioun britonis first maid arniragus kyng britonis crown sall remane natiue blude prince walis bruthir guiderius afore slane ordanit plautius gouernour afore trebelliꝰ thesaurar commandit thaym stuf strenthis townis brytane strang gareson weirmen minister iustice lawis hald brytonis peace defend thaym fra iniure pepyll liand thaym specially fra scottis pichtis quhilkis wer ane pepyll full cheualry impacient seruitude seik na occasion weir aganis thaym gif war necessar haif battal haif stout wachis baith hame feild hauand na le respect keip britonis opinion romani e • k thair empire finaly exhortit nobyllis britane remember ye affliction fallyng thaym thair rebellion keip thair faith tyme cuming weill thaym self thair barnis gudis sic thyngis done ye britonis returnit hame gaif thankis uespasiane humanite schawin thaym efter claudius cesar desyryng sum triumphe honouris afore returnyng rome thocht expedient vesy orknay last ilis within occiane see motiue weris aganis thaym becaus thay supportit ye albianis battall afore rehersit aganis romani schort tyme 〈◊〉 claudius prouidit necessaris come brytane prosper windis passit throw pentland firth orknay quhare nei • perist nane orknay mē sene first cumyng quhē thay saw sa huge flote schippis arriuit wtin thair see thay hyd thaym cauernis claudiꝰ find ile desert went kirkwall send scurriouris spy nature cuntre pepyl thairof fra aduertist yt full euery bestyall foulis necessar sustene lyf man thocht ye sufficient eneuch decore triumphe morrow herand ganꝰ kyng orknay ane castell nocht xii mylis fra army send ane cumpany weirmen sege said castell quhē thir mē war passand forth wart ye effect thay persaui • syndry rude pepyl cuntre cū mand fra ye couis quhare thay war hyd nycht passyng ye montanis thir rude pepyll war astonist sycht romani nochtheles se • na refuge thay facht cruelly ane quhyle bot last thay war slane tane romani reiosyng victory laid ane sege ye castel last quhen kyng ganus debaitit lang tyme saw na rescours randrit castell brocht presoner wiffe child claudius thā claudius pullit vp salis arriuit calice quhare abaid certane tyme quhill army wer refreschit syne returnit rome led ganus wyf barnis plegis brytonis triumphe ¶this hystory claudius cummyng brytane drawin suetoniꝰ eutropiꝰ beda campbel cornelius ireland tyme sanct peter ye appostyll come antiochia italy efter ereckit mony kirkis ī asia quhare prechand ye euangell crist began found crysten fayth tyme glorius blissit vergyne mary moder god tane body saule heuyn v ȝeir ye empire claudius efter incarnatioun xlvii ȝeris ¶hovv syndry princis britane conspirand aganis aruiragus vver discomfist hovv confiderat kyngis come support thir princis britane aganis romani ca x al sone aruiragus maid kyng maner repudiat lauchfull quene uoada sister caratak put hir preison efter scho borne hym two douchteris ane sonne mene tyme mariit ane romane lady • amit genissa ꝑsuasiō pla • etis 〈◊〉 gif hap hym ye romane lady adheir▪ lauch • ull wy •• e▪ quhy •• bene 〈…〉 borne hym plesand chyldr • n▪ 〈◊〉 quhome na thyng •• rd mirht • omparit attour thay • hew quhat proffet mycht frottis gif ennymes hapnit sū tyme inuaid hꝭ r • alme prait hym eschew yt rage lust dissaitful wordis romani drew nocht hym self britonis fra 〈◊〉 thair • uld confderat freindis nochtheles quhen thay assai •• eit hym ī vane thir siclik wordis thay fand nocht bot reason blyndit new lust ony sich •• wisdome honour ye nycht followyng thay brak preison quhare uoada incarcerat brocht hir hir barnis thaym ī walis aruiragus wrait gre • prin • realme schewyng yt freindis lordis walis quhom maist confidi • tuke indignatioun preferrit ane romane lady first wiffe bene vnleiffull hym haue syndry wiffis pleseir howbeit nouthi • lawis • • suetude britane maid diroga 〈◊〉 • ha • rto affermyng eik said mariage na rage lust bot ye britonis romani micht 〈◊〉 togidder vnder ane blude amyte forthir desyrit thaym gyf lordis walis hapnit conspire aganis hym thay defend th •• fayth promittit romani answer • thaym yt vnleiffull hym ony maner way prefer ane new wif hꝭ first wif caus thay war nocht cō tent iniuris done hir aruiragꝰ knawing quhat mynd thir nobyl • bure hym thocht best inuaid thaym tary aduise plancius assemblit ane army romani brytonis went walis princis walis na thyng affrayit cumyng met hym ane gret power nochtheles thay war vincust put flycht morrow aruiragus plancius aduertist yt darby longcastell ȝork syndry othir schiris war rebellit dredand thairfore thair ennymes suld inuaid ye • ist partis britane thay returnit london fra then plancius lytyl confidence britonis send france two new legi • ni support army syne garnist strenthis new wageouris vittallis sic thyngis done plancius princis walis conuenit schrewisbery take consultatioun maist dangerus mater last concludit pepyl vnder thair obeysance sal conuene ane certane day place expell ye romani britane elli al ani • e counsal decernit oratouris sall pa lordis carlyll kendell durame solist thaym samyn effect heruest followyng thir princis foresaid conuenit schrewisbery quhare thay lang regrait romane iniuris lamentit heuely fekylnes aruiragus quhilk desyre seruand romani kyng britonis nochtwithstandyng haill mynd pissance thay concludit recouer thair anciant honouris liberte bot began na lytyl contention quha suld capitane army thaym wald geif place othir thā comus prince walis said maner may sone gadder maist vailȝeant mē ane greter army pepyl freindis thay may esaly resystit sa yt euery thīg war gouernit craft cheualry ī stādis al victory glore battall nochtheles sedition discord ambitioun honouris ar cōtratius thairto quhare thay sprout nouthir ordoure craft cheualry may haue place ȝit victory may ennymes thairfo • e ambition drawin aw • y▪ dissentionis expirit fynaly ane man chosyn quhome remanent pepyll sall obeysant quhais auctorite battall sall led gif intend haue victory obeysant thairto ar nere equale othir power thairfore best send oratouris caratak kyng scottis quhilk maist cruell ennyme romani desyre hym cōcur w reuenge oppressioun done sister uoada defend neuo quhome ye romani intendis defraude crown britonis exhort hym take ye gouernance thairof quhill neuo war perfite aige thay obey hym chargis occurrit affection haue sister neuo esaly may mater solistit sone efter oratouris wer send caratak schew hym mater lenth afore rehersit caratak answerit yt greuit ye aruiragus maryst ane romane lady distruction hym self realme ony iniuris done sister neuo knawing weil • omani vane fallowschip gyle▪ subdewis vnprudent kingis thair dominion nochtheles promittit eū agane ye spring ye ȝeir support yame wt army thocht maist expedient ¶the oratouris depeschit maner returnit • schrewisbery spryng ȝeir said thir foresaid prince britane generall edict assemblit men yt mycht beir wappynnis ane certane day ȝork defende thair cōmon liberte ye nowmer lxxxm men ye said day come caratak congestus ye confidera • kyngis scottis pichtis quhais cumyng maid brytonis sa reiosit yt thay beleuit na thing bot sicker victory incontinent afore deuysit caratak maid general capitane army maid vnder hym syndry othir capitanis quhare thay war found maist wisdome manheid exhortit pepyl obeydient thairto▪ sic respect thair singulare commoun weill thay suffer nocht thaym self randerit ennymes sumtyme prayit thaim remēber manheid thair elderis quhilkꝭ dang ye vailȝeant iuliu • albion albianis inflāmit battal hortation come forthwar • weill arrayit thair ennymes al sone plantiꝰ aruiragꝰ war aduertist thairof thay arrayit thair folkis nochtheles thay thocht vng • nand geif hasty battall knawing weil thair ennymes ful yre hatrēt thairfore cōcludit yrk thaym •• lāg tary walkyng labour penurite vittallis thā ieoꝑde aganis sa huge multitude peple enragit aganis thaym ani quhilk culd nocht vincust vntellabil murdir albianis delayng battall come sic poynt yt thay mycht nocht multitude peple haldin togidd sic derth hunger rais thair army sindry yame deꝑtit fra yair camp seik vittallis quhom ane certane wer takin brocht planciꝰ schew britonis hunger walking truble neir discōfist plā cius morow maid armye reddy battall caratak weil aduertist yairof arrayit folkꝭ sound trūpat iunit followit ane scharp battal fochtin cōtinewalie vncertane victory quhill ye nycht seuerit thaim ilk side plā cius ye morow seyng yt mycht nocht renew hꝭ army returnit lō eftir yt ye maist part hors men wer tynt caratak brokin yt samyn maner come ye remanēt army ȝork cōmandit al folkꝭ pa hame quhil thay wer new warnit ¶of message send caratak planciꝰ ansvver ye deith geniss • hovv vespasian vvas send britane dant britonis ca xi plancius eftir yi vnhappy batal send oratourꝭ caratak schew yt gret admiration yat caratak ony occasioun iniuris inuadit ye landis romani supportit thair ennymes hauand na remēbrance ye gret humaniteis done hī claudius • empriour quhen ye said claudius wt smal difficulte micht haue subdewit hꝭ realme pepil howbeit abstenit exertit wraith orknay thairfore desyrit repair al iniurꝭ hym done obstene thairfra tymes cumyng elli suld reput ennyme romanꝭ wes answerd caratak wes haue admiratioun yocht defendit nepote guideriꝰ vndefraudit iust heritage kyngdome ye remanēt pointꝭ answerit wes na fauour yt claudius inuadit nocht ye relame scottꝭ bot onlie becaus knew ye samyn nocht possible conquest extreme ieoperde chance battal ye caus past ye rude vnarmyt pepill orknay quhilkis mycht sone vincust ye fyne y• glorius vailȝeant empriour amāg febil creaturꝭ mycht haue ane fenȝeit glore triūphe thir causis ye romani suld redres baith new auld iniuris done scottꝭ pychtis depart hastely albion thair folkis utherwayis nocht wes traistit bot scottis pychtꝭ britonis quhom thay held maist contemption suld thair perpetuall ennymes defence thair liberte natiue goddis plancius yi answer tuk hie indignatiō thocht rycht vnworthy ane pepill nothir pissant rich cheualry pertlie sal contempne power romani maid thairfore aith reuenge proud contemption done caratak mony othir romani maid thair aithis samyn maner quhen aruiragus considerit ye gret constance caratak yi maner tuke ferme beleif gif pissance wer concurrant remanent albianis ye romani mycht esalie doūg albion desiryng thairfore recouer anciant honouris liberte left plancius past al war opinion ye remanent princis britonis quhilkis war conuenit tyme schrewisbery quhare plesandly ressauit genissa romane lady quhome aruiragꝰ tuke ī place lauchfull wyf herand rebellion aruiragus tuke sic displeseir yt scho partit child sone efter deceissit aulus plancius ilk day hauand le cōfidence britonis becaus thair faith sa oft brokin began garnis muni • ionis strēthis townis romani new wageouris vittallis send letteris diligence claudius cōplenyng ye falset britonis quhilkis mycht na way haldyn vnder romane lawis bot maid new rebellion he brocht wt thaym 〈◊〉 • cottis pichtis ye maist cruell b •• dy pepyll erd thairfore ye battal sal led ī tymes cuming aganis ye britonis bot erar aganis ye albianis thir reasonis gud war send hasty support romani yt thay nocht schamefully doung britane al sone claudius rede thir letteris send uespasian mony romane legionis ī britane uespasian efter cū myng seyng yt dāgerus cais yt romani war intyl maid hym bring materis beter estait first callit afore hym ye said plancius se gyf dāmage fallyng romani battal succedit imprudence sleuth plancius hie • purgation maid wordis bot sufferit dedis schaw thaym self euery thyng yt pertenit craft cheualry war sa wysly hym ꝓuydit yt sic admyraration uespasian yt fermly beleuit said plancius sufficient howbeit na othir power cumyn hym haue subdewit albianis romane empire ¶hovv thre kingis albion mouand vveir aganis vespasian vver discō fist hovv vespasian ressauit aruiragus mercy maid landis tributar romane empire ca xii uespasian sone efter maid ordinance pa aruiragus britonis thayr rebellyon aruiragus aduertist thairof cōuenit noblis ȝork quhare scottis pichtis war deuisit cum counsall deuysit afore yt euery mā sufficient beir armoure suld conuene expel ye romani albion bot ane certane euery schyre allanerly yt thair vittallis mycht ye mair esaly prouydit thus war ye britonis ye day affixit gaderit nowmer lxvm chosin mē conuenit ȝork two monethis vittallis abidyng ye cumyng ye confiderat kingis quhilkꝭ come sone efter lxm men albianis assemblit togidder maner deuidit thaym ī syndry battallis capitanis hald thaym ī gud array tothir syde uespasian rasit tentis cōuoyit certane treasonabyll brytonis quhare ye albianis war followit sone ane dā gerꝰ terribil battal ye albianis stude ane strenth besyde ane mo nocht xii mylis fra ȝork alway ye romani yt faucht rycht wyng war neir discomfist nochtheles uespasiā supportit thaym ane new legion quhais cumyng thair curage sa rasit yt notwithstādyng thair heuy woūdis thay renewit battal quhē thay war persit throw ye bodyis thay ceissit quhyll thay slew thair ennymes fornens thaym otheris faucht sa cruelly yt quhen thair hand swerd doūg away thay fell aboue thair ennymes raue thaym thair teith nochttheles ye fatal necessite victory geuyn deuyne weirdis romani micht vincust ye day multitude māheid lang ꝑseuerance battal repugnance goddis quhilkis determit subdew realmis romani ye albianis howbeit thay left na thyng vndone yat mycht pertene vailȝeant campionis war finaly discomfist aruiragus opprest heuy dolour slauchter sa mony nobyl campionis wald haue slane hym self bothe stoppit freindis ī esperance better fortoune caratak saiffit ane nowmer pepil went brygance illithara kyng pichtis desiring leif efter ye slauchter dere freindis raif coit armour slane sone efter vnknawin quhat britonis efter vnhappy battall send ane herald vespasian desyrīg peace schew sa huge calamite fallyng thaym yre goddꝭ yat lxvm britonis war left vic mē lyue war sa punist yat thay mycht sufficient exemple schaw quhat vengeance sorow cumis pepyl violation thair faith ꝓmys uespasiā answerit wald heir na cōdicion peace quhyll aruiragus wer brocht presence aruiragus seand na refuge comperit ī humly maner quhilk thīg mouit uespasiā gret reuth seyng chance fortoune yat quhylk sa ꝓuit yat day morow thā sa destitute freindis yat desyrit mercy ennymes incontinent aruiragus fel kneis saying ye goddis tane sa rigorus punition hym pepyl yat couet leif aboue hie calamite thairfore desyrit nocht bot grace son wif quhilkꝭ afore wrangusly exilit ony falt uespasian seing dolorꝰ estait sic cō passiō yt micht ꝯtene fra teris nochtheles tuke counsall suld behaif hym ī mater sū gaif counsal yat aruiragus suld send wt wif childrē guddis rome lauchful pray abide iugement romane senatouris exempyl pepyll quhat frute procedis rebellion aganis romani otheris hauand sicht chance fortoune coūsulit hī haue reuth trauel ye said aruiragus rome sen thair lauchful pray bot cumyng vnder assurāce romani quhais empire eikit inuiolat faith slichtis thair subdittꝭ uespasian coū sal tuke aruiragꝰ mercy cō tine wit hym auctorite syne cōmandit ye strenthis ye townis britane quhilkis afore war stuffit aganis ye romani randerit capitanis plegis geuyn obseruation yairof prīcipal mā yt geuin tyme ī plege wes guiderius prince britane sonne aruiragus quhilk passand uespasian rome fell gret infirmite deceissit quhen uespasian dantit britonis wyse distroyit al thair awin lawꝭ brocht thaym ye lawis romani cōmandit yt na man sal haif cō mission blude within britane bot plancius deputis quhom certane mē war lymit minister iustice ye romane maner fame thir lawis causit al ye remanēt brytonis ȝoldin uespasian gaue hym mony riche iewellis satisfaction thair offence ¶hovv vespasiane vvan tovvne camelon discomfist caratak message send caratak caratakis ansvvere ca xiii winter cummyn causit uespasiane returne ȝork quhare abaid sayd wynter aruiragus nixt somer rasit army come within boū dis mers berwyk pertenyng dominion pichtis quhais inhabitātis war ay maist vailȝeant strangest ennymes britonis nochtheles thay war sa brokin tyme battall afore rehersit yat thay mycht make lytyl resistance bot war haistely ȝoldin ro ••• ni utheris quhilkis war mair nobyl fled camelon beleuand ye romani suld nocht cum thair difficill strait passage uespasiane weill aduertist thair departing come diligence ony mē presumit wan ye said town camelon amang mony riche precius iewellis spulȝeing town war found armis ye kyngis pichtis ane crown gold set precius stanis variāt colouris▪ ane swerd heft gold maist curiously wrocht ane purpour scheith swerd worne mony ȝeris efter uespasiane weris nobyllis pichtis war takyn camelō war licent returne hame thair pledgis uespasiane abaid lang tyme efter camelon brocht dyuers auld capitanis dwell leif vnder romane lawis instrukand rude pepyll thairof ciuill maneris biggit ane tempil nocht far fra said town apon watter carron honour claudius uictory cōmandit ye samyn adorit ye pepyl quhill uespasian geuyn maner polesy vane religion gētilis aduertist exploratouris yt caratak kyng scottis renewit hꝭ army cumand furthwart reuenge ye iniuris done hym romani uespasian lytyll affrayit thir nouellis abaid camelon cōmandit planciꝰ ane part ye romani army meit hym lang efter soūd trumpat baith armyis iunit faucht incredable slauchter athir syde last quhē thay fochtin fra ye dawyng ye mydday▪ victory succedit romani residew scottis yt eschapit fra sorowful battall fled montanis kyng caratak euyl woundit brocht ye felde gret difficulte doū stafage throw fame vnhappy battall mony pepyl war ȝoldin romani thay dwelt brigāce hauand lytyl cōfidence thair strenthis fled thair wiffis child guddis ye nixt montanis fourt day efter plancius tuk ye town carrik ꝑtit al ye spulȝe guddis found amang weirmen send ane herald uespasian aduertis hym victory schew yt brigance principal prouince scotland randerit ony forthir rebellyon uespasian reiosyng thir nouellis come carrik quhare ressauit mony pepyll brigance opinion efter hauand compassion ye lamētabyl chance fallyng caratak fechtand vter exterminion pepyll defence lyberte send messingeris hym saying nocht ganand hym ony forthir repugnant goddis quhome victory empire auctorite procedis erd quhais deliuerit sentence he ordanit regionis subdewit romani wes necessar thairfore hym pepill obey goddis quhilkis he tane ane manifest punitioun hym pepill thair rebellioun attoure promytti • gyf wald obedient romane empyre suld remane honouris afore reput freind senat pepill rome uthirwayis gyf wald repugnant perseueir vnprudent hatrent aganys thaym suld degradit auctorite peple vterlie distroyit thir wourdis answerit caratak wes na le fury inprudence mortall pepill presume thay war familiar goddis haue ony cognoscance thyngis cum forthir gyf romani ony occasion iust battall wald inuaid hym culd na thyng le resist sa farre mycht traistit ye goddis sa iniust gif victory iniurius wrangus pepil forthir culd nocht vnderstand romani suld defend hym realme sen thay haue socht sa mony wayis reif hym thay haue done othir kyngis ye amite freindschip romani thocht ye desyrit gyf mycht hym ony cōmodite bot refusit gret dāmage suld follow thairthrow realme subditis ye realme scottis wes al fre hym kyngdome romani wes cesar empriour sen pepill nocht defend thair awin ar repute na le detestabil thay reiffis othir mennis realmes suld perseueir battall aganis romani fynall end liue defence realme liberte ¶hovv caratak cūand vvith nevv army aganis romani vves vincust deith plātiꝰ hovv ostoriꝰ vvas sēd ī place dātit ye britonis ca xiiii answer uespasian tuk gret admiratiō seing caratak sa inuinsabyl sperit quhē al ye remanent princis albion wer subdewit pretēding fecht aganis romani proud cōtemptiō tuk purpos put hī pepill vter rewyne ȝit becaus passage wes difficil vittallis mycht trāsportit boundis huge dammage romani changit mynd maid hym reddy pa ye ile man liand betuix ireland albion expedition thairof brocht mony schippis galȝonis nixt port reddy ye samyn effect ye mene tyme gat lettris schewand yt baith walis ye ile wicht wes rebellit vncertane gyf ye procedit persuation france uespasiane traisting na thyng sa gud meit presēt truble afore ony forther spred supersedit passage ile man past britane leiffand behynd ye strent ••• brigance garnist strang sodiouris residew army plancius cumyng britane pepill facill lauboure wer sone dantit ye principal cōspiratourꝭ punist yair rebellion uespasiane eftir thir feliciteis returnit commād claudiꝰ empriour rome quhare wes ressauit gret triumphe ¶als sone caratak wes aduertyst uespasyane wes deꝑtit albion thocht tyme ganand recouer landis scottis pychtis quhilk war reft afore tyrany romani assemblit thairfore ane army fra syndry boundis albion al pepil hatit ye romani desyrit reuenge thair iniuris ye romani weil certifyit hꝭ cūing met wt arrayit ostis followit ane terribill bergane fochtyn birnād hatrēt sydis scottis desiryng recouer thair liberte romani tyne ye landis thay wan afore gret difficulte pyne battall wes lang fochtin vncertane victory nochtheles wisdome cheualrie romani wā victory put scottis flycht caratak seyng army brokin colleckit residew folkꝭ come donstafage quhare 〈◊〉 consultatioun afore nobillis tuke auisement mycht defend realme aganis romani desyrit ane new army gaderit al boundis vndir dominioun al support yt micht gottin fra princis ireland thair anciant faderis expel ye romani scotland ani de counsal ripely •• sit thir p̄sent calamyteis fallyng thaym frequent victorye romani thocht nocht profitable ieoperd ye realme ye last chance battall bot erar suffer yair pepill vaik sumtyme fra battal recouer sum strenth quhilkis he bene sa oft diffait afore ye samyn counsall wes deuisit certane chosyn men suld lye bordour brigance stop romani fra inuasioun ye remanent boundis scotland frequēt incursionis erar yan plane battall thus wes battall prolongit twa ȝeris ef • ony gret slauchter samyn tyme plancius gouernour romane army fel irremediable infirmite flux quhen vnderstude cleirly mycht nouthir conuales support nature medcine wes sa disparit life yt desyrit claudius empriour sen mycht nocht labour forthir common weill rome send ane prudent capitane place hald albianis vndir romane lawis ye landis conquest afore gret difficulte wer nocht tyn • claudius desyre send britane ane vailȝeant knycht namyt ostorius scapula sone eftir cumyng plancius deceissit camelon body wes brynt eftir custome rite romani consecrarit ye tempill claudius victory thus rais ane cōsuetude mony ȝeris eftir obseruat amang scottis pychtis byrne bodyis thaym yat deis apperis ȝit mony signys dayis ȝeir god imvcxxi ȝeris fyndou • e ane town ye mernis v mylis fra aberdene wes found ane anciant sepulture quhilk wer ii lame piggis craftely maid letteris ingrauit full brynt powder quhilkꝭ sone eftir thay wer handillit • el dros siclike kenbothen ane town mar x mylis fra aberdene wer found two sepulturis samyn maner full brynt powder mony othir sepultutis he bene oft tymes found maner ful brynt powder bot wil return historye quhare left britonis eftir cummyng ostorius scapula beleuyng recouer yair liberte becaus knew thair maneris countre rebellit ostorius desyryng haue occasion rebellioun yt mycht schaw proues manheid rasit camp inuaid welche men otheris britonis west partis brytane finalie put thaym discomfiture eftir yi victory went ye est britonis fornence ye france seis quhilkis war ye principal monaris rebelliō thir britonis seyng na refuge fledde ane strait ground quhare thay mycht nocht esalie inuadit nochtheles thay wer finalie vincust throw fame vnhappy battall remanent britonis wer subdewit ostorius ¶hovv caratak fechtād vvith nevv army aganis ye romani vvas discomfist maid presoner ostoriꝰ treason cartumandia stepmoder ca xv ostorius schort time eftir tuk ane castell cūber namit carlill eftir tane gret praye guddis partis lyand thair come al army baith ī penthland carrik kyle cunyngham wrocht insufferabil iniuris fyre swerd pepyll thairof caratak impacient sustene thir offēcis determit outher de elli reuenge samyn mony othir albianis come hym ye samyn mynd army caratak tyme wes noumerit xlm men wes arrayit sic maner yt al yair bakkꝭ wer set contrar ane deip riuere ony furde ye fyne ye nane yame may haue esperāce flee yan wes al ye agit wemen quhilk come ī gret noumer visie chance feild set ilk syde battall rais ye spreitis men thair clamour cast stanis thair ennymes sla thaym quhen thay fell al othir wemen yat war ȝoung wicht war arrayit armour wappinnis amang ye men sic thyngis done capitanis went heir thair ye army exhortyng yame general battal said yat daye behuffit thay othir recouer thair liberte elli thirlit perpetual seruitude sūtyme thay maid inuocatioun ye deuine spreit thair eldaris quhilkꝭ yair man heid glorius cheualrie dang iulius albion maid thaym thair posterite exonerat fra al tribut seruitude romani yan followit sa huge clamour noyis ye army yt ilk man promittit ony feir fecht thair realme liberte deith ostorius wes na litil astonist seyng ye scottis sa huge multitude brym desire battall knawyng weil dangerꝰ wes fecht aganis ony men extreme disperation refuge caratak ȝit gyf ye army curage spreit fecht schew yt thair ꝑpetual liberte wes present thaym yat feild wynnyng othir syde ostorius wes na le prudēt hortation hꝭ folkꝭ desiryng yame lang orison remēber thay wer romani dantaris pepill thair ennymes bot rude barbar humanite cassin nature crafty moder al creature ye remote last nuyk ye warld incōtinent baith ye armyis thunderand preis trumpat iunit faucht wt mair cruelte yan euir wes herd ī ony warld afore nochtheles romani wer finalie victouris battall wes tane caratakis wif hꝭ docht bred oft sene men cā haif sickir freīdꝭ ī aduersite caratak fled gud moder cartumādia quene scottis quhilk eftir deceis fader cadallane wes maryit apon ane va •• ȝeant knycht namit uenisius curtumandia seyng caratak distitute consolatioun deliuerit hym ostorius ix ȝeir eftir ye b • ttall wes begun romani albion ostorius seyng caratak brocht afore hym • fra kynglie dignite sic compassioun tuke hym hand said caratak yi mischance suld sufferit pacience thocht thow distitute gud fortoun ȝit thou art nocht cumyn hādis nakit virtew eschame nocht pray romani quhilkis he subdewit sa mony riche vailȝeant kyngis
