led thaym triumphe▪ 〈◊〉 answerit caratak heuy • heir mon said suffer aduersite howbeit contrar ȝit na thyng sa greuous fortoun quhilk sa cōtrarius gouernance yat scho he de • eckit thy feit example hir mutabilite maid presoner treason thā force quhil pyssance indurit maid impediment bot treason stepmoder cartumandia quhom maist confidence eftir discomfitour cumyn thy handis part obey victour vnderlie ye wil pleseir ennyme thy part salbe vse ye chance ane victorius capitane mercifull vincust miserable peple may haue sum esperance grace al sone caratak said thir wourdis wes brocht tentis romani tretit reuerence • fferit ane kyng ¶hovv caratak vvas brocht • ome hovv • e returnit scotland vncouth meruellis sene alhion syndry nobyll clerkis deith caratak ca xvi caratak within dayis eft wes brocht throw italy hꝭ wiffe douchter bredir rome ye pepil heirand cū myng assemblit ꝑtis rycht desyrus se vailȝeant kyng quhilk fouchtyn sa mony ȝeris aganys ye romani cumyng stude arrayit stretis rome ye band weirmen gret ordour first wer schawin hors harnes bardyng riche spulȝeis quhilkꝭ war gottin feild aganis hym followit wif douchter last hym self caratak brocht afore empreour maner seyng freindis come hym sumpart astonyst schaw curage na thyng de • eckit calamyte said maner bene al fortunat prosperite rich hie nobilite blud micht haif erar cūmin freind presonere town wes nocht vnworthy throw progenitouris gret dominioun haue bene cōfiderat romani present calamyte na le honorable cesar empriour vnplesād sūtyme hors harnes men rich quhat wonder thocht haue lost thaym aganis wyll gyf ȝe romani haue empire aboue ye warld force al peple man th •• llit ȝour seruitude bene canderit romani sone eftir thair cuming albioun nothir thy glore ȝi • calamite bene sa notable knawin yocht thow punys yt thy presonere ye deith memory sall sone euanys ȝit thow suffer returne realme salbe ane perpetuall example thy mercy emprioure incontinent gaue pardoun grace baith hym wiffe brether delyuerit thaym bondaige sone efter faderis conuenit fell syndry communicationis concernyng ye capitane caratak mony thaym thocht takyng hym na le honorabyl romani takyng kyng syphax scipio persis l paulus ye taking ony othir vincust kyngis ye romani decernit thairfore ane triumphe geuyn ostorius caratak commandit returne scotland▪ leiffand eldest brothir douchter pledge mony prodigeis vncouth meruellis war sene albion ȝeir yat caratak faucht romani ane gret battall horsmen war sene arrayit ye feild sone eft huge noyis murdir athir syde iunit togidder bot thay euanist sa suddanly na maner signe apperit ye feild quhare thay war first sene nycht afore battal apperit wache ane multitude wolffis tuke ane thaym war wache away brocht hym thaym nixt wod bot morrow al sone lycht apperit thay brocht hī agane ony harme body carryk ane child borne ane rauyn heid thir vncouth signis apperit nales terrour admiration ye pepyl deuinouris interpret thaim signify gret trubyll dangeir appering caratak heid realme nochtheles seing hym returne fra rome ony displeseir thay begā interpret thaym ane othir face pepyll reiosyng caratakis returnyng ressauit hym excellent honouris conuoyit hym town carryk town cōmand empriour restorit hym brygance kyle cunyngham caratak past remanent liffe tender amite romani ony vncouth domistik weiris baith brethir douchteris war send hame hym fauoure empriour caratak leiffit two ȝeris efter gud peace deceissit xxi ȝere regne ane prince mair vailȝeant fortunat dayis geuand ingyne curage defend realme subdittis fra seruitude romani institute thaim ī gud manerꝭ tyme mony nobyll clerkis persiꝰ iunenale senica pepyll began al partis warld ryis sicker faith crist vane ydolatreis superstitionis put downe sa endis heir thrid buke heir begynnis feird buke croniklis scotland ¶hovv corbrede vvas maid kyng scottis hovv pichtis rebellit aganis romani slevv ostorius thair capitane ca primo caratak beād yi maner deceissit beryit wt funerall triumphe carryk ane riche precius sepulture wes maid hym hiear pillaris rysyng ye samyn euir wes sene afore hꝭ eternal glory prīce na ayris bot ane douchter succeid realme wes trublit sic infirmite yat scho deceissit ane virgyne eftir hir deith corbreid ȝoungest brothir caratak wes maid kyng eldest brothir deceissit schew afore passand uespasiane rome yi corbreid wes fers ingyne nocht far differēt fra brothir caratak maneris ye beginnyng empire went ilis ro 〈◊〉 quhare punist mony kir schrewis thair attemptatis rewardit thaym yat fand defendouris ye cōmon weill large cōmoditeis quhill corbreid wes geuen maner iustice romani began decay britane pychtis eftir creation • hair new kyng conkist hope recouer thair liberte slew mony ye romani heir yair skatterit throw cuntre thay traistit eft deith caratak na recounteryng foundin thus nane romani eschapit war nocht thay hapnit haistelie reskewit support thair strenthis nochtheles mony principall capitanis wer slane ostoriꝰ inpacient suffer yir iniuris come ane haisty weil arrayit army aganis pychtis followit sone ane sore battal fochtin sic cruelte slauchter romani wer neir discomfist ostorius ruschit sa fersly forwart haue maid thaym support wes euill woundit narrowly eschapit vntakin nochtheles nycht seuerit thaym lamentable slaucht ilk side followit cōtinewal incursiōis reif slauchter chance succedit throw fame victory come sindry cumpanys pepill pychtis gaue occasioun fecht aganys romani bot skarsly wes ye battall iunyt quhen pychtis left ye feild fled thay bene discomfist yat fyne thay mycht draw romani said place quhair thair ambuschement wes laid thay deuisit sa succedit eftir ye romani following maner wer slane al sone ostorius wes aduertist heirof fled gret dredour tentis wrait claudiꝰ emprioure pichtis wer rebellit mycht na way haldin vnder romane lawis claudiꝰ maid vow punys pichtis ī sic maner thair name memorie sall peri albioun bryng purpos effect send britane two romane legionis nochtwithstanding ye cumyng thir legionis pychtis grew ilk day insolent aganis romani finalie suddan irruptionis slew two capitanis romane sodiouris quhilkis wer assemblit afore mak incursionis cuntre partit thair spulȝeis amang thair fallowis concurrit thaym said bergane ¶ostorius trublit heuy curis doloure risyng woundis gat last battall deceissit gret consolatioun ennymes ¶hovv manlius vale •• capitane britane vvas discomfist pichtis hovv didius vvas send place messaige send pichtis corbreid ansvver ca ii ostoriꝰ beād decessit wise manliꝰ ualēs wes maid capitane romani britane com mony auful legionis aganis • pichtis followit • ne scharppe bergane fochtin lang tyme doutsum victory ¶and quhen ye pychtis stude maist danger come haistelye iiiic men kendill quhen na man beleuit thair support quhais cummyng romani war put flycht battal wes slane iiim romani twa thousand pichtꝭ claudius aduertist thꝭ vnhappy chāce falling romani britane send aulus didius two romane legionis succeid place yi aulus cummyng albioun • romani small felicite maid hym thairfore reuenge iniuris done thaym persewit pychtis quhare euir thay mycht apprehendit deith ¶and first callit romani afore reprochit thaym thay failȝeit thaym self war nocht sa walkrif prouident al materis thay suld haif ben eftir takyng caratak meru • llit eik thay wer sa far degenerit fra romane glore schamfullie ouirthrawin thair febyll ennymes finalie prayit yam beleif nocht thair discomfitoure cummin ony manheid virtew thair ennymes bot onlie de thair awin necligence • euth prayt thaym obedient thair capitane haue na occasioun thaym lei curage romani maid incontinent thair solempne vowis reuenge al iniuris done thair ennymes pychtis first brut thir nouellis wer effrayit nochtheles memorie yi recent victorie thay began tak gud curage send incontinent thair ambassatouris corbreid kyng scottis schawing yocht thay haue laitlie cōquest two victoreis romani ȝit said romani hatrent afore intendis cum awfull incursionis pentland purposyt eftir distructioun pychtis inuaid scottis ye maner thairfore desyrit said corbreid send support tyme occurre present dangeir erar afore pyssance wer brokin quhen landis wer wais • mycht mak na support wes answerit corbreid yat knew weill didius wes cummyng albion na gud mynd hym realme intendyng nocht onlie keip landis conquest afore romani bot al augment samyn new regionis landis ȝit becaus wes conf • derat romani wald na wayis inuaid thaym battal bot gyf thay first inuadit hym wes oblist yairto cōtract maid afore caratak nochtheles defence realme pepil suld cum within ane certane day al power erar mak impediment romani inuaid thaym ony battall ¶hovv cartumandia quene scoti • vvas beriit quik hovv scottis pichtis faucht aganis romani vvith vncertane victory▪ vvar cōstranit take peace deith didius ca iii al sone thir oratouris war depeschit corbreid went ane army brigāce didius heiryng cummyng chargit hym ane herald depart haistelie thairfra allegit wes prouince land romani grā • onlie caratak duryng lyfe certifying hym gyf wer rebelland charge suld 〈◊〉 ennyme romani • • ing force boundis realme scarslye wer thir wor •• said quhen tithingis come cesius nasica lieutenant didiꝰ wes entrit ane army brigance corbreid incontinent gaderit pepyll ane gret strenth traisting na le honour keip subdittis perell wirk dā mage ennymes syne wen • epiak consulit maist dangerus mater uenisius husband cartumandia gud moder ¶this uenisius wes ane man hie ingyne wes lang tyme defendit fra iniuris nychtbourꝭ auctorite romani ȝit becaus saw thair tyrany proud dominioun sa importabyll rebellit come opinioun natiue prince cartumandia quene scottis spous said uenisius rycht sorowfull thir feliciteis dayly succedyng corbreid dredand hir punyst 〈◊〉 scho treasonabilly randrit caratak afore romani tuke hir husband freindis crafty slychtis held thaym preson ¶corbreid mouit thꝭ offence come epiak eftir put ye said uenisius freindis liberte commandit • woman c •• tumandia buryit quik ¶ 〈◊〉 cumpany scottis tyme followit vnwarly chase romani thay wer beltrit euery syde ennymes afore thay wist slane discomfitoure maid remanent scottis within thair municionis strenthis effrayit thay mycht scarsly haldin fra fleyng fyft day eftir romani went forwart assailȝe munitioun scottis thair horsmen bot wes sa circulit ilk side within ane mo y• na horsmen mycht inuaid thaym na passage bot ane part quhilk maid thaym flaikis scherettis treis ¶nochtheles quhen thir romani knew scottis pychtis wer within thre mylis thair army thay left thair purpos incontinent cesius nasica capitane romani broch • army weil arrayit feild abaid styll quhill cummyng thair ennymes ¶on tothir syde confyderatte pepill mene scottis pychtis went fast forthwart quhen thay saw thayr ennymes sycht thay wer aynd • uir thay come ony straikis ȝit thay iunyt ye occasion ye sonne faucht continewally quhill thay wer senerit cummyng nycht romani fl • thair • n • • confiderat kyngis montanis ☞ mene tyme didius romane legate send ane herald cesius leutenand schew gret trubyll amang brytonis walis thairfore commandit hym make sum honest way peace scottis pychtis landis conquest afore sa huge dyffyculte war nocht schamefully tynt thir nouellis maid cesius defaik sum part curage confiderat kyngis brokyn recent bergane send thair ambassatouris nixt morow cesius haue peace lamentyng huge murdir calamite fallyng baith thair armyis last battall▪ schew thairfore sufficient yneuch romani haue confiderat kyngis thair freindis tymes cumyng thay war sa obstinat na thyng mycht vyncus thaym duryng thair lyffe ¶cesius hauand honest occasioun treit peace confiderat pepyll set ane day common materis said day peace fynaly tretit betuix romani scottis pichtis vnder thir conditionis ¶the romani sall keip landis thaym conquest afore peace ony ferder conques sall nouthir inuade scottis pychtis battall le scottis pychtis inuade thaym fyrst ¶the pychtis sall leif thair awin lawis conkist thayr kyng regne aboue thaym afore payand auld tribute wageouris camelon iurisdictioun blude sall onely romani ¶na franchemen brytonis ar fugitiue fra romane lawis sall resset amang scottis pychtis ¶the scottis sall reiose frelye thayr landis vse thair awin lawis ¶prouydyng wayis thay support nocht inhabytantis ile man vyttallis wappynnis iniuris laitly thaym done romani ¶and fynally sayd scottis sall nouthir support pichtis britane▪ gyf ony thaym happynnis rebell aganis romani ȝit inuade thaym battall sa lang thay abaid fayth romani ¶the peace beand confirmit sort partyis returnit hame ☞ peace indurit ony violatioun sa lang didius capitane brytane saxt ȝeir efter deceissit london ¶hovv • anius vvas maid capitane britane deith▪ hovv svvetonius successour • put ile man sak hovv brytonis maid nevv rebellyoun romani syndr • prodigy meruellis sene albioun ca iiii didius beand deceissit said cōmand nero emprioure send brytane ane new capitane namit ueranneus quhen ueranneus vysyt sindry prouincis britane come camelon maid sacrifice honoure goddes uictory claudius emprioure quhilk laitly deceissit de • ficat romani ueranneus rycht desyrus equale antecessouris glore cheualry socht mony occasionis moue battall nychtbouris ¶so hapnit certane hieland theuis scotland tuke ane pray guddis pychtis landis ueranneus traistyng yi sufficient occasioun moue battall • ocht na redres reasoun ye peace afo • e contrakkit bot send ane multi •• de pepyll ony mair tary landis scottis frequent incursionis brocht away ane gret pray men guddis thaym pentland scottis mouit outrage ruschit haistely harnes followit ythand heirschippis • • chter • thir side myddis trubyll ueranneus deceissit last wourdis war sa full vane arrogance glore wrytis tacitus beleuit hym self sufficient gyf leiffit two ȝeris mair thā haue subdewit boundis albion romane empire ¶efter deceis swetonius ane humyll man send place quhylk efter cuming renewit peace albianis quhen reparit iniuris quhare thay complanit maid hym 〈◊〉 pa ye ile man 〈◊〉 full vailȝeant pepyll generall resse • thaym ha •• 〈◊〉 • ebellit aganis romani cumyng said ile fand ane strange gyse battall arrayit aganis hym ¶fyrst stude ane cumpany wod wemen arrayit furius habyte sandis▪ hair hyngand ouir thair ene armyt fyre brandis thair handis efter thaym stude preistis namyt druydes heuand thair handis heuyn makand maist terribyl cursyng romani myddis thaym stude ane band armyt men reddy fecht romani wa • mair astonist vncouth sycht furius wemen preistis ony terrour armyt men nochtheles hortatioun thair capitane thay went forthwart displayit baner fynaly baith thir wemen preistis war discomfist ȝoldin swe • onius efter victory garnyst strenthis ile garnison romani maid plane euersioun woddis quhare preistis vsi • thair sacrifice honour thair goddis ¶quhen swetonius dantit ile man maner aduertyst france rebellit thairfore peacyfy trubyll pullyt vp salis ar • yuit bartanȝe brytonis herand departyng thocht tyme ganand recouer thair lyberte rebellit motiue thair rebellyoun • uiragus thair last king left two dochteris emprioure herytouris kyngdome ryches traistyng saif thaym fra trubyll way howbeit thyngis succedit contrar beleif realme gouernit romane capitanis hou • put seruitude bene 〈◊〉 pres battal wyf uoada bet straikis baith two dochterꝭ deflorst britonis opprest thir iniuris dreidand ylk day mair displeseris follow maid plane rebellion socht support partis quhare thay mycht mony vncouth meruellis war sene tyme albion occiane see apperit bludy mony deid bodyis cassyn brayis thairof wemen ȝeid wod declarit terribyll thyngis cum ymagis claudiꝰ beside camelon fel dros ymage uictory fell fra alter hir bak scho bene vincust spaymē said thir prodigy signifyit gret dammage apperyng romani pychtis quhylkis war camelon othir munitiōis thair beside herand answer wer ereckit esperance better fortoun nocht maid priuat cōspiration aganis ye romani bot slew mony thair wageouris afore thair rebel lyon patent agit romani quhome y• pichtis maist hatrent war slane gret nowmer resydew chasit al boundis geuyn thaym lang seruyce fynaly thir agit romani fled ane auld tempyll within boundis berwik quhare thay war al slane inhabitantis region petus cerealis lieutenant swetonius desyryng support thir agit capitanis come ane legioun romani ane cumpany horsmē nochtheles legion discomfist hym self chasit ye romane tentis nixt nicht fled cattus procuratour brytane quhilk tyme kent al sone cattus aduertist trubyll ylk day rysyng brytane fled feir lyf france ¶of complaint maid voada quene britonis corbreid message send cattus cattꝰ ansvver syndry incursionis maid scottis romani first cumyng murrayis scotland ca v voada quene britonis opprest dayly iniure romani send hir secretar hir brothir corbred kīg scottis complenyng hir mesirie trouble hir dochteris deflorit hir self sa schamefully doūg romani pacience mycht nocht auaill bot onely ane place new iniuris sūtyme wes bot ane king ī britane bot thā rang two kyngis legat romane ꝓcuratour ane hauand power distroy thair blude othir deuore thair substance man reput maist nobyll amang romani mycht defoule monyast wemen make maist herschyppis pepyll becaus na thyng mycht suffyce satefy insaciabil lust auarice romani scho requirit hir brothir suffer nocht hir onely syster schamefully doūg hir dochteris defould punition finaly schew britonis ye infinite harmes done thaym romani war rebellit throw quhylk mycht haif better occasion inuaid ye romani battall tyme ony othir tyme afore corbreid mouit pieteous complaint send ane herald cattꝰ romane ꝓcuratour quhilk laitly returnit britane cōmā ding redres al offēcis done sist failȝeing yairof declarit hī ennyme romani tymes cumyng answerit cattꝰ na thyng pertenit corbred quhydder rycht wrang war done uoada al ane vane foly corbred sen bot ane rud barbar mā seme •• rius ī romane materis pertenyng na thyng chargis forthir gyf ony displeseir war done uaoda quene britonis samyn sall • ikit doubyll iniuris romani wald nocht dedenȝe thair maieste satefy desyre barbar pepyll ony othir sort tuke na regard quhidder war freind fo quhat mycht corbreid mouit outra • eous answer maid new band confideration pichtis within schort tyme efter confiderat kyngis rasi • ane army 〈…〉 men yt mycht foūdin within thair realmis syndry ireland men come thair support slew ye romani al partis quhare thay mycht apprehendit ony r • nsom piete iurnay thay tuke berwik quhilk maist populus town region quhē thay slane romane sodiouris foundyn thair intyll thay kest downe wallis thairof onto ground inhabitantis ile man heirand thir nouellis thocht tyme ganand recouer thair strenthis sone efter pepyl brigance▪ carryk kyle cunyngham come thaym past arrayit battall throw syndry prouincis romani ceissyng fra na maner cruelteis mycht deuisit thaym town carlell nocht saffit fra cruelte efter tane ciet •• ani thairof war slane y• strang wallis thairof equat ground wemen duryng fury war sa desyrus reuenge cruelteis done romani thay bure armour wappynnis tyme ane pepyl namit murrayis discendyng almane blude doung thair natiue regiō romane weris come skatterit syndry cumpanyis ye mouth ryne quhare thay pullit vp salis thair capitane rodorik seik ane new habitation last efter thay bene lang trauellit wylsum see inhibit land france brytane thay arriuit forthe quhilk ane arme ye see deuydyng pentland fra fiffe pichtis ressauit thaym ye mair plesandly thay apperit strang bodyis▪ support thaym aganis thair pissant ennymes war nocht discendit thair linage blude bot al war sworne sa far thair power mycht reuenge iniuris done thaym romani rodorik brocht pentland murrayis maner went ye confiderat kyngis thaym lamentit sore tyranny romani quhilkis onely desyre dominioun he subdewit ane large part almany nocht thirllit pepyll thairof importabyl seruitude bot subieckit thaym romane lawis siclike ye murrayis quhom capitane w • r doung thair natiue landis constranit becaus thay mycht suffer na seruitud seik new habitation alwayis wes ane gret consolatioun hym murrayis yat thay fauour goddis wer brocht thay landis quhare thay mycht reuenge ye iniuris done thaim thair ennymes thir mo • iuis desyrit confiderat kyngis suffer murrayis pa formast support thair peple desyrit gif hapnit thaym thair manheid cheualry ding romani scotland grant yame wiffis yat thay mycht incres vnder ane blude scottis pychtis contrar gif hapnit thaym slane thay tuke na cure thair deith swa thay sufficientlie reuengit iniuris done thair proude ennymes thir desyris ye murrayis wer acceptabill confiderat kyngis yat thay vnderstude thaym enragit maist cruell hatrent aganis romani yair fore condiscendit thair peticionis traisting yair incredible man heid strenth wirk sum hie displeseir thair ennymes ¶of ye orison maid voada quene britonis confiderat kyngis▪ hovv scho vincust romani finaly slevv hir self deith kyng corbreid ca vi cōfiderat kyngꝭ reiosyng ye cummyng murrayis yi maner went forthwart deligence meit uoada y• vailȝeāt quene britonis quhilk wes thā gaderit ane huge noumer britonis abidyng thair cumyng al sone uoada vnderstude hir bruthir corbreid kyng pychtis wer cumin wt thair armyis scho went forthwart meit thaym eftir maist tender hertlie embrasyng ilk syde uoada said yame yi maner bene borne maist vailȝeant campionis ane man mycht nocht ha • e sufferit sa mony cruell intollerable iniuris ar done romani nochtheles quhat sume • ir ymage nature he formit gyf ȝe concurre reuenge cōmon offence done w thir romani yat ar sa vailȝeant aganis wemen sa cruel thair subditis sall sone se quhat vassalage may done ladyis quhen extreme danger occurris yocht may wayis deuoid wiflie ymage ȝit sall want mannis hardyment bot sall fecht formest bront vm armyt ladyis quhilkis ar sworne reuenge cruelteis done romani sall pa formast battall feir deith bludy woundis sal nocht othir wemen vsis affrayit ony woundis tane geuyn ennymes haue na mercy thaym yat he inuadit freindis sic odius slauchter cruelteis thir odius tyranni nakit vode piete he slane sa infinit noumer pepill deflorit sa mony honest virginis matronis thay knaw nocht thaym self beleif men borne wemen arme ȝow motiuis maist vailȝeāt kyngis aganis ȝour cōmon ennymes sic curage ȝe sall se ladyis haue afore ȝow beleif nocht bot sicker victory ye romani ar sa effrayit thay cō fide na thyng sa mekle yair fleyng haist ȝour army al deligence auēture sū new power come nocht cattus ye romane procuratoure throw quhilk salbe ye difficyll resyst fynaly beseik ȝow rander nocht ȝoure self ȝour wiffis barnis scharp bargane romani quhē uoada endit orison confiderat kingꝭ apprisit hir wisdom curage cattus aduertyst thir nouellis wes effrayit nochtheles come forthwart arrayit oistꝭ meit albianis thay na thyng eschewit cummyng incontinent baith armyis iunyt first cummyng horsmen romani wer discomfist sone eftir ye futemen samyn maner follow • ane miserable slauchter flearis cattus euill woundit yi battal eschapi • fled france albianis proud victory partit spulȝe rich f • ild amang thaym slew ye romani al ꝑtis quhare thay mycht apprehendit battall wer slane writtis cornelius tacitꝰ ixxm romani xxxm albianis cruel slauchter romani wer brocht sic calamyte ye 〈◊〉 nocht suetonius romane legatte come haistelie fra france thair support albianis bene perpetuallie deliueryt romane iniuris suetonius come britane twa legionis xm wagiouris sindry nationis tuke purpos ꝑsew albianis new battall uoada heiryng returnyng suetonius britane send britonis cum hir ony tary day p̄fixit come hir ane huge army britonis scottis pychtꝭ murrayis deuidit sindy buschementis atanys reiosyng thair recent victorie thay occasioun ganand season distroy y• romani wiffis quhlkis come thair husbandis y• custome wes thay dayis wer set cartis bordouris campe beir witnes quhay didde maist vassalage quhen britonis scottis pychtis murrayis wer ord • rit gud array quene uoada nocht vnworthy noumerit amang maist douchty campionis ruschit army hir two armyt dochteris schew hir cū myn amang sa mony vailȝeant capitanis onlie defend hir realme • rich bot reuenge ye mony scham full vnworthy offencis done hir romani na lytill indignatioun hir mynd romani enragit ī vnbridlit lust estait virginis matronis wer left yame vndeflorit forthir scho schew goddis quhilkis ar iust punysaris wrangis wer presentlye cumyn beir witnes ye iniquiteis done romani he recentlye punist thaym last battall wt schame slauchter becaus thay mouyt iniust battal aganis fre peple restis nocht said scho bot onelie fecht aganis thay miserabil catiuis wer saiffit thair schamefull flycht fra last battal yocht suetonius yair new capitane may exhort thaym battall ȝit may restore sen thay ar vincust yair curage spreit ȝe considir said scho ȝour vincust discomfist aduersaris aganis quhō ȝe suld fecht wil ȝe considir ȝour awin pissance ye occasioun battal ȝe sall thynk honorable othir victorius battal elli al atanis de▪ nobil men suld cheiserar de honestly schamefulto leif othir side suetoniꝰ ceissit exhort army battal yocht gret confidence thair manheid requirit thaym regard nocht vane mynassyng barbour pepill amang quhom wes noumer wemen men thay wer al bot ȝoung febill vnarmy • pepil ony cognossance cheualry mycht thairfore esalie discomfist fra thay haue prouin manheid scharp swerdis romani • hocht said army wes bot noumer glore • uld follow gyf thay sa sufficien • pepill vincust sa huge multitude • arbour ennymes finalie prayit thaim weild thair sweirdis • artis maist ferslie murdir thair fayis haue na sycht spulȝeis quhil victory wer cleirlie conquest eftir quhilk thyngꝭ mycht succeid thair plesour thir wourdis capitanis mouit armyes brym ardent desyre battall agit knychtꝭ lang experience vse na le confidence thair māheid virtew thā victory bene p̄sent thair handis tothir syde albianis confidyng huge multitude armyt men sound trūpet gaif signe iune followit ane bludy terrible battall bot last albiants wer vincust chasit put flycht gret slauchter ye slauchter followit thayr army wes circulit euery syde wt sic multitude cartis discomfist pepill na place fle yt romani slew wemen yi battal ony piete ransoun yi battall wes honest bot rycht vnplesand romani ye maist part thai • army wer tynt battall wes slane tacitus writtis lxxxm albianis murrayis maist part wer slane thair capitane rodorik▪ quene uoada scho suld nocht cum quyk hir ennymes handis slew hir self▪ baith hir dochteris wer tane brocht armyt thay facht su • tonius eldest hir dochteris wes maryit apon ane nobill knycht romane blude namyt marius bereft hir virginite afore wes maid kyng britonys auctorite cesar marius eftir coronatioun went kendale ane part britane liand fornens annandale brigance namyt land eftir name west maria say westmurland kyng corbreid brokin sorowfull battall returnit residew army scotlād gaif murrayis quhilkis eschapit feild landꝭ liand betuix spay innernes quhilkis lādis wer callit eftir yame murray land auld inhabitantis thir lādis namyt uararis wer expellit becaus thay wer ane seditious pepill geuyn ciuill weris dissentioun thaym self thair nichtbouris ony defence realme mur • ayis wer maryit scottis virginis grew vnder ane blude amyte scottis corbreid past remanent dayis ony weris ye romani wer irkit ciuill battallis wes gret difficulte hald south partis britane thair opinioun cause thay persewit scottis pychtꝭ mony ȝeris eftir nobil prince brokin dammage ȝeris deceissit donstafage xviii ȝeir regne wes beryit amang remanēt sepulturis progenitouris first ȝere empire uespasiane emprioure fra incarnation lxxi ȝeris ¶of syndry nobyll clerkis hovv peti • paule vvar martirit hovv dardānus vvas maid kyng scottis slane tyranny ca vii mony nobill clerkis flurist tyme itale statius persius plutercus faith christ began spreid fast al ꝑtis throw preching haly apostolis peter paule quhilkꝭ gaue thair hale attendans gud hyrdis instruct yair flok sicker faith ony respect rich feir thair liffis quhill last thay wer baith slane rome wickit nero peter wes hyngit feit place rome callit mont auri paule hedit werd ane place rome callit porta hostiensis king corbreid left behynd hym thre sonnis ȝong nane thaym mycht succeid crown thair namys wer corbreid tulcane brekus first thaym wes nurist britane ant u • ada vailȝeant quene britonis sic courtlye maneris hauyngis wes callit corbredus galdus ȝit amang w al pepill componit honest callit galdis nobillis eftir ye deith corbreid croun mycht remane hail galdus perfite age maid dardā nu kyng wes nepot king metellane dardānus wes sa large stature wes callit gros kyng wes rycht plesād nobillis afore wes kyng rycht tender kyng corbreid baith weir peace pepil beleuit yat suld haue followit ye maneris otheris wyse kyngis progenitouris becaus wes ane lusty person fair vissage body wes gre • umlie luffit amang pepill nochtheles mynd wes geuin maist effeminat vice apperit end lyfe ye begynnyng empire vsit counsal nobillis wes noch • far discordant fra ye maneris ane gud prince bot within thre ȝeris eftir left thyngis pertenand iustice slaid euery kynd vice counsall certane wikkit schrewis familiaris tuke officis concernyng publik ministratioun iustice fra wyse nobil mē gaue yame vicioꝰ rebaldis yat assistit insolence lust wyse virtews personis na le hatrent yan suspitioun ¶at last quhen waistit substance tresour assistance thir vnhappy lymmaris quhilkis na sycht honour bot allanerlie yair singular auantage become sa auaritious desyryng vthir mennis guddis ony conscience reason yat slew vane causis ane nobill mā namit cardorus quhilk wes gret iustice last kyng corbreid na occasion sla innocent mā bot allan • rlie becaus repruuit hꝭ vice mony otheris nobillis innocent men wer slane hym samyn maner thir doyngis maid hym odius nobillis commonis ¶at last •• st extreme b • synes • distroy galdus two b • ethir traistyng becaus crown pertenit thaym eftir deceis stabill • ame sicker firmance • ym ayrꝭ effect send ane seruand namyt carmonak▪ quhilk wes corruppit money sla galdus two brethir ile man ¶carmonak instruckit maner come sayd ile fynaly quhen socht lang tyme ane ganand oportunite sla galdus tane waytand ane secrete place drawin swerd quhare beleiffit galdus cum brocht gret iustice ile accusit sa scharplye reuelit quhat sort instruckit sla galdus brethir al sone schawin treasoun put deith nobyllis herand treasoun conspirit aganis dardannus thay haittit hym afore inhumane cruelteis maist seand hym geuyn slauchter kyngis sonnis first thay slew al thaym fauourit hym ¶in mene tyme rais ane man vyle obscure lynage namyt conanꝰ quhilk promouit gret rich honouris assistance dardannus maid hym gaddir pepyl grete nowmer support tyrane aganis nobyllis bot last tane thaym hyngit ane iebait incontinent thir nobyilis come ane army aganis odius tyrane maid galdus thair capitane ¶dardannus aduertist heirof seand na refuge wald haue slane hym self bot stoppit familiaris esperance better fortoun last brocht afore galdꝰ slane heid efter schorne fra body borne ane staik throw army gret schame body cassyn ane maist vile closet ¶this ende maid odius tyrane dardannus fourt ȝeir regne sext ȝeir uespasi • ne empriour fra incarnatioun lxxv ȝeris ¶hovv mony romane capitanis thair febyl administratiō vvar interchangeit britane hovv galdus vvas maid kyng scotti • hovv vvas discomfyst petulius ca viii romani tyme began decay albion necligence febyl capitanis dammage cyuyll weris swetonius legat brytane arrogance cruelte vsit britonis deponit petranius turpilianus mair mercyful capitane send place turpilianus cumyng britane mesit seditioun trubyll amang romani rand • rit thair prouynces ane new capitane namyt trebellius maximꝰ ane man slaw curage hauand lytyll experience cheualry ¶this trebellius seand gret sedition trubyll apperand ryse throw lang peace army randerit samyn ane othir capitane namyt uectius uelanus quhylkis samyn maner dantit brytonis mair amite kyndnes ony auctorite ¶and tyme galdus quhylk sall oure hystory nixt followyng ☞ ¶efter deith dardannus ye nobyllis set ane counsal • said galdus baith rychtuous ayre ye crown ane maist excellent person dotat sindry virtewis hie prerogatiuis thairfore crownyt hym fatall chiar marbill galdus eftir coronatioun maid sacrifice goddis felicite fallin hym syne gaif thankis nobillis remanent pepill promittit gouern realme consultatioun maist prudent nobil men thairof throw quhilk wan gret fauour luf pepil wes ȝoung flurisāt age nocht vnlyk corbreid vailȝea • fader ¶forthir wes nobill anciant blude baith parentis modir wes kyng • pychtis douchter discendyng lan • lynage kīgis quhair throw na • hyng failȝeit hym mycht conques fauour pepil▪ begynnyng empire set hym punys ye wickit consalouris dardannus quhome realme wes misgouernit brocht gret tr •• le ¶sic thyngis done past throw sindry boundis realme maid sic punitioun trespassouris stabillit realme gret tranquillite ye mene tyme come hym murrayis schew thaym reiosit dardannus ye inuasour common weill wes distroyit cummyng murrayis acceptabyll kyng thay brocht syndry oppressouris theuis iustyce quhylkis war sone efter punyst deith nocht lang efter ane counsall set douns • afage quhare mony nobyll actis war deuysyt commoun weil ye wyckit law ewin quhar • wyffis commonis fre nobyllis abrogat annullit ȝit could nocht purches remanent cursit lawis kyng ewin reuocat ye ȝoung nobyllis war repugnant thairto ¶quhyll galdus geuyn sic besynes come nouellis hym ane new capitane namyt petulius cerealis send uespasiane ane army brytane recouer landis tynt afore neclygence febyll capytanis purposit cum haistely annandale brigance ¶galdus richt astonist thir nouellis howbeit walde proclame na weiris quhyll war mair surely aduertist send spyis explore counsall romani thir spyis returnit diligence schew romawar cummyng baith mers berwyk mair awfull ordinance euer sene afore albioun bestya • l dreuyn away cornis insycht • rynt ane gret nowmer pychtis quhilkis inuadit romani defence thair awin guddis slane ¶the scottis richt affrayit thir nouellis said brytonis war vnkynd quhylkis wald aduertis thaym cummyng romannis consyderyng thay laitly faucht neir vter exterminioun thaym self defence onelye sayd brytonis nochtheles galdus set hym • romani afore thair cū myng realme assemblit ane strang cumpany nowmer fyfty thousand men scottis micht • eir armour war absent day quhen galdus passand forthwart maner app • ru syndry vncouth meruellis sycht ane egyll flew day gret laubour aboue army nales terrour admiratioun pepyll interprete scottis suld distroyit egyll quhylk ansenȝe romani nochtheles galdus requi • thaym haue gud esperance interpret ye said day suld put romani gret lauboure ane armyt knycht sene fleyng ye air quhen floyn round army suddanly euanist sicht lift apperit dirk full clouddis dyuers fowlis fell air full blude place quhare battallis efter iuni • galdus nochtwithstandyng thir sorowfull vncouth prodigy apperyng sa suddanly ye face army allegit thay sygnifyit gret felicite pepil perswadit thaim pa forthwart gud esperance victory ye mene tyme come nouellis romani war enterit brygance mair pissance euir thay come afore thay boundis purpos nocht onely fecht bot plane cō ques sit downe thay landis thay sic confidence thair cheualry māheid na power erdly creatouris mycht impesche thaym fra thair purpos galdus na thing affrayit thairof thocht meit romani sic hard cheualry lernit eldaris trastyng efter sa mony happy chancis fallyng romani yat fortoun ye instabyll gydar mortall creatouris sall sumtyme bryng romani hyd wachyng ruyne goddis oft tymes ar sene fauorabyll pepyll iustly defendis thaymself fra iniure ennymes sum men perswadit kyng inuade nocht haistely ennymes bot tary ane pepyll suffer resydew folkis returne hame fyne ye romani micht constranit throw laik vittallis outhir depart brigance elli trubylli • hunger othir incommoditeis counsall weil apprisit ye nobyllis ȝit mony thaym dred thair vailȝeant pepyl defaik curage lang tary ye scottis thair first assemblance he maist curage spreit ar brokin na thyng mair lang tary thir reasonis na thyng sa gud inuaide thair ennymes quhyll thair fury indurit galdus nobyllis followyng last opinioun rasit army brocht samyn thryd day efter sicht romani grete multitude syngulare manheid romani sa oft assailȝeit frequent victoryis maid scottis sa astonist thair esperance victory turnit ī maist drery sollicitude ȝit hortation thair prudent capitanis thay enforsit thaym self new curage maid inuocatioun thair goddis send thaym victory incontinent baith armyis iunit vncredibyl fury silurianis mene men carrik▪ kyle cunynghame battall quhare galdus faucht sa vailȝeantly richt wing romani nere discomfyst ☞ ¶quhen petulius aduertist thairof send ane new legioun romani thair support ¶thus war sylurianis ouir set ☞ ¶thair followit ȝit ane cruell terrybyll bargane vntellabyll murdir capitanis faucht sic yre thay pretermittit na thyng mycht pertene forcy campionis petulius ȝit ythandly went romani quhare thay faucht supportit thaym new power quhare thay failȝeit quhyll petulius fast f • army wyse beheld galdus fechtand gret manheid spreit amyd fois incontinent enkendelit mychty curage desyrus conques sum hye honoure notabyll souerayne vassalage tuke purpos outhir slay galdus magre pissance put hym flycht bot rais ane battall mair vehement afore mony maist vailȝeant forcy 〈…〉 amang ye scottis 〈◊〉 perseuerand manheid deith war slane defence thayr prynce galdus euyll woundit face montit hors departit fra • eild resydew scottis disp • rit fleyng king fled heir thair thair best refuge chais followit romani • ic yre scottis war slane partis quhare thay war tane battall war slane xij thousand scottis vi thousand romani galdus euyll woundit wyse colleckit residew army returnit ane castell leuynok romani abaid remanent ȝeir epiak subdewit bundis brygance ony trubyl battall thair empire ¶hovv nobyll lady vodicia inuadit romani vvith ba • tall hovv scho vvas fynaly slane hir army discomfist ca ix petulyus legate brytane rycht insolent efter vyctory desyrand na le • ik empire romani succeid equale glore antecessouris rasit campe subdew remanent boundis brigance brygandis ythand incursionis lycht battallis refusit lang tyme weris defendit decreit parliament efter flauchter sa mony vailȝeant scottis feild ye romani plane battall ieoperde realme vndir chance ane battall quhyll romani inuadit brygance maner uodicia ȝoungest douchter uoada quhylk deflorit schew romani exilit wraith marnis hir gud brothir reuenge pollution hir body othir intollerabyl offencis done hir modir uoada assemblyt ane army brygandis brytonis inhabitantis ile man come awfull battall romani quhen thay beleuit na thyng le hir inuasion first cummyng army hard ane huge dyn noyis sound pepyll ylk ane exhorting othir battall incontynent come sa thik schoure arrowis dartis romani lyft micht sene aboue thair heidꝭ· thus war ye romani sa astonist yt thay knew quhat ī suddand dāger done nouthi • knew thay quhat ennimes thay war dyd thaym awfully assa • lȝe ȝit thay sufficient manheid fecht aganis sa gret multitude vncouth strange pepyll cummand thaym vntymuslye within nycht quhyl romani war affray thair ennymes ruschit ylk syde sic hardiment curage thay brak trinschis romani enterit perforce apon thayr tentis quhare maist vailȝeant forcy campionis amang romani war slane thus romani bene vterly distroyit brygandis perpetually delyuerit seruytude uodicia war nocht petulius come mair haistely thair support petulius met extreme dangeir sa prudently byrnand flammys pyk roset brintstane quhylkis preparit aganis sic occurryng ieoperdijs withstude fayis quhare gretest noyis herd dang thaym force rage flambꝭ fra tentis bot uodicia sa craftely exhortit hir army aganis petulyus scho oft tymes renewit battall thā bergane sa cruell al ye nycht followyng nocht sufficient schaw ende thair laubouris spryng day uodicia discomfist hir cumpany put flycht petulyus efter victory dredand sum hyd dangere occurryng inhibit folkis follow ony forthir chace ¶uodicia prouoket ylk day mair iniuris past epiak brynt said town mony agit knychtis wageouris romani fy • e scho mycht reuenge iniuris romane garnysoun quhilk scho mycht nocht reuenge petulyus petulyus punys thir offencis send ane legioun romani put uodicia hir army flycht nochtheles scho fynaly tane accusit quhy scho durst pretend sic thyngis aboue spreit wemen scho answerit scho thair ennyme wald haue slane hir ennyme laikit na gud wyll howbeit hir power failȝeit na thyng mair hatrent prosperite romani gret cruelteis done thaym hir hir freindis romani tary slew hir ¶in mene tyme petulius aduertist ye ile wycht kent schyre rebellit maryus chasit apperit thus plane rebellyoun britonis le trubyll war mair haistelye dantit ¶thir nouellis mouit petulyus returne brytane quhare small deficulte dantit brytonis romani abaid brygance behynd petulius war geuyn mair keip landis afore conquest persew pepyll new conques ȝeir followyng petuliꝰ deceissit▪ ¶hovv iulyus frontinꝰ vvas maid capitane brytane message pychtis thair ansvver hovv said iulius inuadit scottis vvith gret iniuris ca x efter deith petulius ane vailȝeant knycht namyt iulius frontynus send albion two legiōis plesandly ressauit maryus ¶iulius efter cummyng brytane went throw romane prouincis persuadit britonis mony reasonis perseuere opinion romani ¶als sone pecifyit thaym al trubyll began desyru • fame glore antecessouris war afore tuke purpois subdew last ilis albion romane empire howbeit thay war oft afore assailȝeit bot neuir vincust bring purpos effect left marius behynd hym ī kent hald brytonis vnder romane lawis syne came ī brygance ane gret army ȝit passage dyd na iniure trubyll pichtis beleuit thaym fra scottis war vincust sone ouirthrawin 〈◊〉 iulius maner na lytyll effray amang scottis ye name gret renown estimatioun amang scottis iulius cumyng brigance vesyit ye munitionis quhare romane sodiouris lay exhortit thaym perseueir ī gud curage thair manheid virtew mycht happyn haill ile albiō cum vndir empire romani sic thyngis done send letteris pich • desyryng yat thay romani mycht incres togydder vndir ane freinschip amyte sumtymes remembrit thaym ye mysery trubyll fallyng thaym weris led afore aganis romani haue na cumpany scottis commandit ye empriour outhir distroy thaym • l vterly▪ elli thyrll thaym perpetuall seruitude pychtis thair desyris gret suspitioun answerit thay gret admiration • e quhat motiue romani mycht haue ony iust occasyoun battall aganis scottis quhat suld moue thaym nocht content empire warld seik last ilis occiane see reif fra ye albianis thair natiue lyberte le thay insaciabyll auaric • war set reif fre realmes ony reason hauand na feir dredour • goddis punist thair insufferabyll iniquiteis thir causis thay wald cum battal aganis ye romani al thair power support thair confiderat freindis defence thair realme lyberte ye nocht proffitabyll thair commoun weil bot thay war al bound thairto • ic contract mycht na wayis dissoluit iulius contemption answer mair fers properant aganis scottis come kyle carrik cunynghame quhais pepyll war mair strāg ony pepyll faucht afore aganis romani galdus astunist new ordinance romani nochtwithstandyng heuy woundis gottin last battall gaderit folkis boundis vndir dominioun defend realme ¶than followit continewall scarmussyng lycht hors ony greit slauchter galdus noy woundis set hym erac yrk romani lang tary inuaide thaym battall followit thir incursionis mony syndry chancis fortoun sumtyme romani vincust sū tyme victorius quhyll last scottis frequent slauchter thayr vailȝeant capitanis war attenuat brokyn galdus noy woundis gottyn last battall sa wery mycht nocht office ane forcy campion bot brocht hors lytter argyle within dayis efter romani come carrik kyle cunynghame slew iii thousand scottis remanent vincust chasit efter victory romani returnit thair tentis ¶hovv iulius agricola vvas send britane frequent victoriis maid scottis pichtis hovv subdevvit sindry thair landis romane empire ca xi▪ nixt wynter iuliꝰ frontynꝰ fell gret infirmite īmoderat flux catter generit wak humouris becaus ye air nubilus donk throw cōtinual schouris rane sleit procedyng hycht montanis gret multitude fludis lochis aboundyng regioun infirmite incressit ylk day vncouth intemperat cauld mycht curit na ingyne art medcine domiciane empriour aduertist vehement dolour causit hym returne ī italy recouir heil new air fude send iuliꝰ agricola ane maist vailȝeant capitanis come afore dayis britane succeid place tyme men annandale slew ane gret nowmer romani bordouris brigance throw samyn victory persuadit pychtis brigandis ye silurianis rebell aganis romani agricola aduertist thir attemptatis rasit army come pentland mair diligēce thā ony man presumit efter tane garnist ye strenthis thair cuntre wageouris come camelō caranach kyng pychtis aduertist cumyng gaif hym battall nochtheles fynaly discomfist army efter discomfitoure caranach fled fyffe quhilk ane plenteous regioun lyand betuix two firthis tay forth full woddis lesuris ualis gret proffet baith corne bestyal ar mony louchis full syndry fysche regioun bair woddis ye theuis war sūtyme sa frequent samyn yt thay micht na way dantit quhyll woddis war bet agricola efter past victorius army annandale inhabitantis thairof knawyng cumyng met hym thair scharpest maner nochtheles thay war fynaly chasit slane ye remanent thaym yt eschapit war slane thair wyffis ye first nycht thay come hame agricola proude victory past ye ile mā quhilk rebellit mony ȝeris afore aganis romani tuke lytyll laubour quhen stuffit munitionis thairof roman sodiouris returnit brygance leuand army wynter schelis ¶the nixt symer come throw brygance carrik kyle cunyngham quhais passage maid pepyll sa astonist thay left thair townis desert fled montanis ¶in symer followynge brocht syndry nobyll men albioun afore hym exhortit thaym polecy cyuyll maneris thay mycht haue templis biggyngis romane fassion put thair sonnis wyse preceptouris efter end romane weris thay micht ryse virtew eloquence gud hauyngis thus past agricola wynter seasoun instruckand prince albion sic thyngis apperit thair commoun weill thrid ȝeir efter come striuelyng quhilk callit thay dayis dolorus montane inhabitā ti thairof hard syndry tymes ane dolorus lamentabil cry quhilk come illusioun wickit spreitis • essauyng pepyll vane superstitioun quhen agricola saw ye castell striuelyng set sa strāg 〈◊〉 reparit biggit • crafty sumptuus lauboure yt apperit vnwynnabyll nocht lang efter byggit ane bryg ouir forth transportit army morrow laid sege ye castell montbennart traisting haue found kyng pychtis bot pychtis war astonist cumyng romani thay left castell come gret diligēce vnder nycht cast ye bryg stryuelyng lairly biggit romani ye said romani mycht inclusit betuix tay forth ony refuge agricola weill aduertist thairof returnit fra sege montbennart followit sic diligence ye pichtis thay war constranit geif battall nochtheles thay war fynaly vincust thair kyng karanach chasit watter tay quhare gat ane bait eschapit remanent pychtis feir victory war ra • derit thair munitionis strenthis agricola past throw boundis fyffe fothrik erne sumtymes biggand sumtymes castand strenthis cuntre quhare plesit ¶hovv kyng pychtis send ambassatouris scottis desyryng support aganis romani hovv agricola inuadit scottis baith see land hovv kyng pychtis vvas slane sedition army ca xii karanach kyng pichtis brokyn last discōfiture fled dunde quhare sumtyme ane strang castell bot wes cassyn ye tyme kyng robert brus becaus micht keipit fra inglismen sal efter schaw pychtis conuenit said castell exhortit karanach thair kyng haue na disperation howbeit pepyll war brocht gret afflictioun trubyll gret nowmer thaym ȝit lyue baith vnbrokyn weris sufficient gyf y• goddis war propiciant dyng ye romani albion mycht happyn romani prowd insolent efter sa mony hie victoryis may fal quhen thay beleif leist sic inuy fortoun vincust pepyl quhom thay held vilest reputatioun instabyll goddes turnis suddand quhirle ye gouernance mortall creaturis scho he rasi • mony othir realmes gret feliciteis afore romani dominioun brocht thaym quhen thay war thair hie souerane honouris fynall rewyne nocht thairfore supponit empire romani sen began mortal pissance sall perpetually indure bot necessar sumtyme haue rewyne yocht thir sic persuasionis pichtis war apprisit thair kyng ȝit nane thaym mycht rais spreit curage ony gude esperance aganis romani bot traisting thair mai • ste pissance sa montit aboue y• hycht naturale chance na pepill may resist thair eftir lang cō sultatioun wes concludit send ambassatouris galdus haue support aganis extreme dangeir apperand baith thair realmes accordyng band sa mony ȝeris continewit betuix scottis pychtis galdus glaidlie condiscendit thair peti • ionis na le indignatioun aganis romani thair wrangus conques maid thaym pychtis scottis thairfore determit erar haisart realme extreme ieoperde army leif ilk day ithand displesour finalye subdewit seruitude quhil cō fiderat kyngis wer geuin yi sort resist thair ennymes silurianis plane rebellioun slew romani quhare thay mycht apprehendit onlie recouerit thair munitionis bot brynt thair cornis vittallis except sa mekill mycht caryit thaym yat fyne na thyng thairof suld remane ye proffet thair ennymes agricola weill aduertist thir motionis come haistelie silurianis dantit punyst yame maist rigorus wyse nocht lang eftir wes aduertist ennymes wer gaderit gret buschementis vncertane quhat effect aganis romani incontinent followit thaym gret violence chasit thaym ouir clyde riueir diuidit ane lytill space fra ye riueir leuin quhair yay fal baith nocht far fra othir ye ireland seis nocht far fra said riueir leuyn ane castell strang strenth ane crag ony artificiall laubour namyt pepil auld cleuch bot callit dunbrito • say castel britonis alwayes wes stuffet men vittallis mycht na waye tane agricola occupyit thir siclik besynes ouir past ye fourt wynter spryng ye nixt ȝeir causit romane nauy quhilk abaid ordinance ile wycht cum lochfyne beside argyle ennymes mycht vnderstād na landis seis fre fra romane dominioun ¶and quhen brocht army ouir clyde fand thair men lenax ane pepill vnknawin afore romani tuke purpos subdew thaym romane empire mene tyme gat writyngis yat pychtꝭ wer rebellit becaus dred gret truble ryse bot gyf ye samyn wer ye haist • lie dantit left first purpos come pentland ane legion romani dantit pychtis nixt symer began serche hauynis portis argyle othir ilis thair wt schippis come land gait ouir riueir leuyn tak ye munitionis strenthis cuntre romani wer first irkit scharpe difficill passage full bre • thornis thair gret impediment bot quhen thay cōsyderit ye virtew manheid thair anciant faderis nathyng apperit difficill thaym sa curage ay incressyng thay dantit na le difficyll passage cuntre pepill thairof finalie returnyt huge pray men guddis thair tentis sic thyngꝭ done galdꝰ maid ane conuentioun athole pepil vnder empire abiding ye cummyng kyng pychtis yat fyne baith yair armyis beand iunyt togiddir thay mycht ye esalie resist romani war pychtis cumand ouir montanis granȝebane quhilkis rynnis fra fut de castell dunbritone wer nocht fiue mylis fra army scottis quhen thay vnhappy chāce wer deuidit 〈◊〉 two factionis faucht amang thaym self ye gret murdir baith 〈…〉 ane vane cause kyng pychtis seyng lamen • abil cais ran feirslie co • armour amang preis quhair thay wer maist keinly fechtand haue put thaym sindry wes slane thair vnknawyng quhat wes re • dew pychtis quhilkis war left lyue fra vnhappy bargane k • awing ye slauchter thair kyng skalit returnit hame ¶hovv galdus pecifyit seditioun amang pichtis hovv faucht aganis romani vvas discomf •• ca xiii galdus heirand deith tender freind kyng pichtis become rycht sorowfull cō st • anit hym superseid army aganis romani nochtheles callit nobillis ane counseal quhare schortlie detestand ye inopertune seditioun rysyng amang ye pychtis prayit thaym ripely auyse realme mycht defendit sa hie dangeir thairto approchyng eftir diuers opinionis wes decretit resist romani erar frequent incursionis yan set battall fra ony forthir conques tour prudent men sal pa ye pychtis peacifi • thaim al seditionis ambassatouris sall pa irelād norway denmark seik support aganis romani counsall ambassatoris wer send pychtis schew ye sic dammage cruelteis ꝓcedis ciuil weris yat na realmes may stand sicker firmance quhare induris finalie pichtis wer aggreit amang yame self al debatis garnardus maid kyng place karanach afore deceissit pychtis wes deuisit send thair ambassatouris norway denmark ye effect afore said quhil sic thingꝭ wer done pychtis galdus assemblit ane army fra boundis realme diuidit diuers buschementis quhais wisdome ithand ieoperdis romani wer stoppit symer followyng fra ony forthir conques scottis wynter following wes sa tempestuous na weris mycht sustenit ye nixt symmer quhilk wes vii ȝere weris maid agricola come ane gret cūpany ireland men galdus garnardus athole quhair thay wer present ye tyme al nobillis baith thair realmes ye tothir side agricola knawing▪ weill ordinance scottis pychtꝭ diuidit army thre battallis abidyng thair cummyng galdus weill aduertist quhat sort agricola purposit inuade chā git haistely purpos come within ye nycht • ne strang legio • romani quhilkis wes far fra army scottis slane wache legioun fechtand ferslie within thair tentis quhen suddanlie agricola weill conuoyit exploratourꝭ come strang buschemētꝭ baith futmē hors men thair bakkis nochtheles battal wes fochtin gret crueltie slauchter sydis quhyll romane baneris schynyng ye cleir morrow schew agricola wt al army arrayit fornens thaym battall incontinent confiderat pepill gaif bakkis fled throw desertis mossis thair best refuge ¶hovv sindry almanis danis come support scottis pichtis hovv ye romane nauy perist pentland firth ca xiiii yi vnhappy battall confiderat kyngis wer brokin thay defendit thaym self yair bestiall guddis al symer following mair frequēt incursion yan ony set battall abidyng cumyng of▪ danys norowanis thair support bot romani ilk day feirs insolent frequēt victoryis traistīg na thyng possibil resist thair souerane virtew come throw wod calidon purpos serche last boundis albioun becaus thay wer stoppit strait groūd yairof thay come ouir watter awmond set thair tentis nocht far fra dū keld quhair tay rynnis deip furdis almane seis reueir beside dunde two mylis braid deuidyng fiffe fra angus ye pichtis effrayit cummyng romani sa far within thair landis brynt ane riche town namyt inchecuthill quhilk stude apon riueir tay samyn suld na refuge yair ennymes fled thair wiffis child guddis ye motanis grandȝeben ye samyn tyme arriuit forth ane cumpany almanꝭ namit usipianis banist thair natiue landis slauchter ane romane capitane othir pepill vnder band becaus thay bure extreme hatrent aganis romani thay wer plesandlye ressauit ordanit haue certan landis thair habitatioun beside y• murrayis thay wer baith blude nocht lang eftir arriuit firth tay ane vailȝeant capitane namyt gildo xm danis support y• scottis pichtis thir danis wer plesandlie ressauit garnardus kyng pychtis cōmon weil wes approcheand hie dangeir galdꝰ rycht glaid reiosyng cummyng gildo come dunde gyf thankis hym remanent folkis yt come support thair freindis eft maist • lie embrasing galdus said wyse haue na litil caus ioy maist vailȝeant gildo seing sa mony fair lusty personis cumyn • ruble albioun defence pychtis thy anciant lynage w thair confyderat brethir standyng sic extreme dangeir ꝑell abaid mony dayis ȝour cuming ar mair reiosit thairof may schawin tyme randeris thy pepil infinite thankis thairfore thy cūyng sic esperance rasit curage beleif ȝour support vincus ennymes banis yame furth 〈2 page missing〉 brigandis perpetually seruytude gif fortoun bene propiciant nocht traistit bot quhilkis ar mair vailȝeant sal recouer liberte first metyng traist nocht bot romani may vincust quhat nowmer yame bene laitly slane wod calidon beleue ȝe virtew romani al gret tyme battal thair lust ī tyme peace thay conques honour ciuil weiris dissension thay turne vice thair ennymes ye glore thair army quhilkis gaderit dyuers pepyll vnder dyuers myndis sall thairfore skaill al fast syndry quhē aduersite occurris thay assemblit togidder ī thair maist prosperite traist ȝe franche men 〈◊〉 britonis quhilkꝭ ar ane g • et part thair army sal haue ony othir affection faith thair ennymes bot inuade thaym quhen thay se occasioun traist na thing bot dreid terrour ar sa vnsicker bā dis luf yt quhen ar remouit put asyde extreme hatrent sproutis thair place mony persuasionis apperis w haue victory ye romani he nocht thair wiffis present exhort thaym curage ȝit thair agit faderis reproche yame fleyng yame he ony certane cuntre habitation le reft thairfore ye goddes punitioun thair iniquiteis he laitly randerit ane certane yame vagabound vincust oure handis astonist pray ȝow vane visage schynyng gold syluer quhilk may nocht defend wound ȝow lat w fynd handis ye bront ennymes ye britonis sal knaw thair caus battall gallis sall remember thair anciant lyberte al pepyl vncouth nation sal leif yame thair first iunyng na occasioun remanis dredour castellis ar left thayme wast townis quhare thair agit capitanis dwelt betwix euyll obeysance iniust empire ar brocht seruitud heir ar ȝour capitane army wyn glore rich ȝondir ar ȝour ennymes put ȝow surfet tribute elli condampne ȝow wynnyng mettellis sū othir kind punition y• quhilkꝭ salbe ꝑpetuall ȝow ȝour posterite le thā ye samyn recouerit battal quhen ȝe thairfore ar pa fortwart remember baith ȝour eldaris past afore ȝour posterite successouris cum ¶of orisō maid agricola army huge victory fallyng romani discōfitour scottꝭ ca xvi efter orison galdꝰ followit army gret noyis clamoure desyre battal tothir syde yocht agricola beheld army richt impatient lang tary ȝit said yame followꝭ ye viii ȝeir gud cōpanȝeonis sen ȝe felicite romane maieste trew faithfull laubouris he conquest annādale ye ile man carrik kyle cunynghame wt mony othir regionis quhilkis war neuir subdewit knawin afore romane empire ȝe haue sustenit na le fortitude aganis ȝour fais pacience laubour almaist aganis nature ȝe haue na caus penitent ȝour capitane penitent ȝow gud men armis ȝe haue subdewit may boundis albion ony armyis afore haue wō mair honor thā ony othir capitane afore haue socht ye last boūdꝭ albiō rehers fame • theris bot persit y• samyn strang army camp quhen ȝe gud cōpanȝeonis war oftimes wery ouirpassing difficyll montanis mossis fluddis regioun gret compassion knew euery ane ȝou ȝour voce criand quhen sal ennymes haif curage quhē sall thay meit w thay ar cumand furth thair dennis quhare thay war hid may ȝour manheid virtew sene euery thyng salbe plesand thaym yat ar victorius vnplesand thaym yt ar vincust na litil honour apperis w quhylkis he ouirset sa mony strait montanis woddis fludis dangerus firthis region sa sall ane vassalage souerayne honour howbeit dangerus withstand fersly oure ennymes put thaym flycht yocht mony placis cuntre vnknawin w he na gret plenty vittalis ȝit laik na manheid curage quhylk lyis haill frute glore armes forthir sa far pertenis thynk nothir capitane army syker geuis thair backis ennymes thairfore honest deith better schamefull lyf hele honour ar situat baith ane place forthir war na gret schame honoure howbeit war defait heir ye last outmaist partis warld gif ȝe war assailȝet vncouth strange ennymes suld exhort ȝow fecht vassalage othir vailȝeant pepyll haue e ȝour honoure knaw thir pepyl standis face arrayit aganis ȝow ar nocht bot refuse thay febyl catyuis quhilkis war discomfist laitly within nicht ȝour onely noyis clamoure thay ar maist febyll bodyis amang ye brytonis remanis caus sa lang lif maist forsy strang bestis thair awin ieoperdyis ar oft slane maist cowart febyll bestis saiffis thaym self dā geir fleis quhen thay heir y• sound ony cumpanyes sa vailȝeant britonis ar slane nane thaym ar lyf saif thay onely yt cowart flicht he debaitit thair miserabil lyuis wald p̄tend na resistence war thay ar tane refuge quharthrow ȝe may haif honest victory pa gud companȝconis throw ȝoure ennymes fynis li ȝeris weir solempne day may put kalender▪ end ȝour weris sa nothir ȝour lang tary rebellioun ennymes may impute ȝoure necligēce skarsly orison endit quhē baith ye armiis byrnād desyre battall iunit agricola arrayit folkis sic crafty ordour howbeit thay wer le nowmer thair ennymes thay sall nocht assailȝeit nothir ane syde othir galdus na le prouidence arrayit formest part army ane hye mote discomfis wingis ye romane army▪ exhortit thaym schyll voce perseueir ythand bergane outhir conques immortall glore perpetual seruitude yat thair last day quhilk thay mich • wyn outhir honour schame first battall fochtin dreich albanis danis norowanis schot ane huge nowmer arrowis ganȝeis thair first contering nochtheles romani eschewit samyn thair targis bowman efterflicht arrowis faucht wt swerdꝭ lytyl buklarꝭ ȝit ī day mair semād nychtboure weir ony defence realmis throw quhilk oure pepyll he gret dammage quhen thay meit ennymes vncouth realmes battal speris quhilkis stude nixt bowman brount galdus tuschit furthwart atanis bure mony thair ennymes mony bludy woundis thair backis followit byllis axis lang swerdis ledyn mellis sic slauchter ye romani bene vtterly discomfist wer nocht ane band almanis quhilkis war send la • tly britane come y• haistely thair support attour agricola sa circumspect stuffit army thir almanis al partis quhare saw ony danger oc ••• ring albianis seyng thaym 〈◊〉 • heir thair sa cruelly ouirset war astonist nochtheles seyng na r • fuge bot thair handis thay ruschit al togidder ane knot ony feir deith woundis delyueri • mynd fecht thair realme lyberte ye deith followit ane sorowfull battall confiderat pepyll facht mair force craft cheualry mony thaym sloppit throw y• body fel downe aboue thair slaatis otheris offerit thaym self wylfully slane otheris efter thay eschapit thair ennymes slew thaym self place quhare thay faucht bludy ouercouerit leggis armis wappynnis skatterit throw al boūdis thairof baith ye armyis faucht perseuerand hatrent quhyll nycht constranit thaym seuer confiderat pepyl thair freindis quhilkis war left lyue efter vnhappy battall fled nixt montanis quhare thay biggit fyr • oui • pa nycht come thaym gret confluence men wemen seik thair freindis mony sorowfull sychis murnyng teris incontynent galdus thir dolorus spr • ichis cryis sall nocht patent ennymes commandit army schout schyl noys sang quhyll wemen war expellit fra camp confiderat kyngis seyng morow thair power sa brokyn yt thay mycht nocht renew battall cōmandit thair folkis returne hame left behynd thaym ane huge fyre birnand bald vehement flāmes said montanis heuyn thair ennymes mycht haue na presumptioun thair departyng vnhappy battall war slane xii thousand romani xx thousand scottis pichtis mony othir pepyll come thair support gyldo ye vailȝeant capitane danis ruscha • ouir feirsly ennymes slane ye samyn maner ye maist part cumpany ¶hovv agricola reparit nauy pa • ilis albioun brint syndry schippis danis vncouth meruelli • sene albioun deith agricola ca xvii day followyng vnhappy nycht maid ye discomfiture scottis patent thair ennymes thair camp void plenist nocht bot deid bodyis ony quhisperyng montanis quhare maist gild hard afore romani traisting thir tythingꝭ procedyng sl • cht inhibit ony • hir chace • •• proud efter efter thir feliciteis commandit vailȝeant chosyn men serche ye woddis strenthis espy gyf ony hyd wachyng enimes war within samyn ane certane romani followīg last coūsal followit sa vnwarly thay war slane morrow agricola seand army sa brokin micht nothir renew samyn ȝit pa ouir ye mōtanis granȝebene extreme dangeir past victorius army angus quhare abaid al ye nixt wynter mene tyme aduertist maist part nauy lost ye resydew thairof brokyn gret calamyte arriuit argyle agricola mouit nocht contenance thir nouellis fermely beleuit army smale calamyte delyuerit othir trubyll apperyng thairto inuy fortoun efter sa lang prosperite victoryis incontinent reparit schippis wt new marineris otheris quhilk sicker experience al dangeris firthis occiane see cōmandit thaym war fecht aganis chance fortoun pa samyn way thay ȝeid afore ilis albion nauy prosper wyndis arriuit finaly mouth tay brynt flo • danis quhylk lay ye said firth wynter afore syndry meruellis war sene albion afore last battal galdus faucht romani mony byrnād speris war sene fleand air ane gret part wod calidon apperit birnand nycht howbeit na thyng apperit thairof day ane flot schyppis sene ayre ane schoure stanis athole siclike angus ranit paddokis ane monstoure borne inchecuthyll doubyll membris men wemen sa abhomynabyll fygure distroyit ye pepyll thir vncouth wonderfull meruellis maid pepyll astonist thay war interpret syndry facis sumtymes ye gud sumtymes euyll empriour domiciane heirand thir hie vailȝeant dedis agricola rycht sorowfull mynd hauand na lytyl dignatioun fame ane priuate man suld obscure imperiall estait thairfore send haisty writtingis hym returne al excusatioun ceissing rome ressaue ye gouernance ane new ꝓuince namyt syria vacand deceis actilius ruffus last legat thairof agricola sone efter cumyng rome poisonit inuy said domiciane empriour ¶hovv tribellyus vvas send britane hovv romani fell gret diuisioun amang thaym self huge victory gottyn thaym galdus ca xviii efter ye deith agricola gneus tribellius maid capitane brytane fan • romani gret felicite howbeit samyn schort tyme indurit ane gret contention rais betuix new capitane tribellius ane othir capitane namyt tribellianus quhilk yame suld haue maist auctorite aboue army first autorist ye army cosing agricola secund autorist empriour efter lang contentioun tribellianus departit ane nowmer chosin men france galdus knawyng weil yi seditioun amang ye romani come ane army scottis pychtis angus quhair new capitane trebellius wes residew romani tyme trebellius astonist suddane cummyng tocht al thīg wes done erar manheid gud werkis ony consultation nochtwithstandyng army bure hatrent aganys hym went • orthward displayit baner last army seand hym nocht • ye chargis ane vailȝeant capitane dischargit auctorite 〈◊〉 sysynnius quhilk wes brod • r trebellianus afore rehersyt 〈◊〉 •• uerne thaym maist 〈◊〉 auenture sysynnius refu • • charge said gyf •• ssauit auctorite sic extrem • dan • eir suld occasioun gret diuisioun truble within army quhill romani wer sic deba •• galdꝰ come arrayit hoist en sycht romani suddane cumyng galdus mycht nocht array thaym thair best auyse nottheles baith armyis iunit birnand desyre ilk syde confiderat pepill faucht perseuerand manheid quhill last sysynnius woundit ye deith fled feild mony othir romani hym incontinent army romani gaif bakkis fled ye nixt wod quhom followit scottis thair confiderat freindis ithand slauchter quhill last galdus dredand sum dangeir fall thair continewal feirsnes callit yame sound trumpat standart nocht le thay wer sa far enragit hatrent aganys romani thay couth nocht brocht yairfra quhil nycht bereft thaym lycht ye confiderat pepill passit nycht followyng gret ioy blythnes dansyng singyng playing siclike wes vsit thay dayis morrow preistis come processioun thair maist reuerend habitis gaif thankis goddis quhilkꝭ eftir mony calamyteis sustenit thaym mair ȝeris continewall battall grantit ani ane honest victorye thair ennymes ¶hovv romani vvar doung partis scotland syndry tymes vincust vailȝeant galdus ca xix romani brokin maner seyng na sickirnes abide angus aganis sa feirs cruel ennymes rasit thair tentis come within nycht inchecuthill quhen thay transportit residew thair army ouir tay thay brak brig thairof thayr ennymes suld nocht follow▪ galdꝰ aduertist thair fleyng partit riche spulȝe wes gottin yi last feild amang army efferyng thair manheid vassalage morrow tuke consultatioun quhat wes best done consultatioun wes concludit scottis sall persew romani dyng thaym furth partis albioun scottis incontinent ruschit harnes army pychtis cō curryng thair opinioun followit romani ye iniuris oftymes done thaym suld ani sufficientlie punist last quhen thay wer cumyn inchecuthill thay fand brig bet returnyt thairfore dunkeld quhair thay transportit thair army ane brig • romani heirand thair eūyng ordourit thaim self gud array chesit ane new capitane namit chelius gouerne thaym maist dangerus battall sone eftir baith ye armyis iunyt faucht lang tyme vncertane victorie quhill last romani wer vincust chasit ithand slauchter quhill thay wer dreuin wod calidone battall wer slane vm romani iim scottis thair confideratis syndry cumpanyis britonis eftir victorie come galdus al sone wes schawin walis romani wer twyis vincust scottis pychtis incontinent princis britane maid rebellioun eftir thay slane romani al ꝑtis quhair thay mycht apprehendit thay send ambassatouris galdus mony riche iowellis schawyng thaym reiosit eftir sa lang rage fortoun aganis hym began victorius fortunat mene tyme romani send thair ambassatouris marius king britonis lamentand heuy iniuris done thaym scottis pichtis schew gif thay gat nocht support tyme thay suld schamefully doung boundis conquest sa gret difficulte afore romani mariꝰ answerit throw rebellioun britonis sindry partis aganis hym stude ī daylie feir lyfe attour ȝoung wenchis gestouris cō moun pepil sang daylie • allattis derisioun skorne romani yat way knew quhay wer freindis fayis hym britane attoure domiciane empriour wes haitit cruell slauchter senat cietezanis rome nocht apperit bot ciuill battallis thus mycht na support come britane thir causis mynd wes set erar keip ane part hym albion sicker firmance yan schamefully tyne hail empyre thairof answere maid na lytyll affray amang romani mene tyme wes schawin ye galdus wes within ten mylis fra tentis romani ane army baith men wemen yat mycht beir wapinnis dyng ye romani boundis empire ye romani feir cuming left wod calidon fled brigance galdus weil aduertist quhat passage ennymes wer departi • set maist diligēce follow yair bakkis yat mycht distroy thaym ony recouer afore thay gat ony support fra rome voyage galdus left segyng castellis strenthis stuffi • romani come gret deligence brigance thair • hym ane huge nowmer pepyll si • haitit romani reiosyng atanis said galdus brokin sa mony calamiteis truble wes neuir disparit bo • euir reseruyng hym pepill better fortoun galdus ressauit thir pepill plesand visage persuadit thaym haue gud esperance wes nocht passand battall bot erar sic • er victorie hard fortoun sa lang rageand aganis hym pepill wes brokin▪ thairfore traistit behynd sa mony cruell extorsionis done ennymes haue sumtyme ane glorius victory thaym romani seyng confiderat pepil cum brigance sa hie curage spreit wer affrayit nochtheles confidyng na thyng mair surele thā yair handis thay went forwart thayr best array sayng day wes othir gait thair triumphant glore perpetuall schame ilk ane exhortit othir haue hope victory sen thay wer fecht aganis ane vane barbar peple haif memory gret manheid virtew yair eldaris respect thair cōmon singular weill erat de ye battal thā incurre schame dishonour ya • mycht neuir eftir away quhil romani wer exhortyng thaym 〈◊〉 • ith thir siclike wou • dis come haistely ane heuy schoure arowis ganȝeis schot thaym thair ennymes ye mene tyme ane cumpany britonis quhilkis wer laitlie send marius support romani come scottis pychtis mony romani fleyng thir britonis de fakit curage otheris seyng na remeid tuke spreit gret force ouirset wyngis quhair wemen faucht galdus rycht circumspect werkis send ane cumpany fresche men thair support quhom romani wer dreuin sum part abak wemen wer cruel thā ony men quhen thay saw thayr ennymes vincust thus romani bene inuadit ilk syde wer nocht thay thair tentis yair bakkis mony thaym perseuerit battall wer slane otheris fled thair tentis▪ quhom scottis followit sa fast thay slew thaym heir thair kes • thaym fowseis intendyng filling fowseis deid bodyis make ane reddy gai • thair tentis nottheles romani defendit thair tentis incredibyll laubour manheid wald suffer thair ennymes entre thaym quhill nycht seuerit thaym ylk syde ☞of message send romani confiderat kyngis thair ansvver hovv cōfiderat kingis gaif peace romani ca xx scottis nochtwithstandyng cumyng nicht went nixt wod bring treis fyl fowseis quhare tentis romani lay otherꝭ maid syndry instrumentis breke thair trinschis otheris wacheit nicht stop yame fra fleing abaid cumyng ye day byrnand desyre ¶the romani seyng morrow sa gret ordinance reddy atanis inuade thaym desyrit assuuerance wache send oratouris confiderat kyngis treit peace part scottis said na conduct suld geuyn romani na alliance maid thaym bot victory vsit maist rigoure romani fled yair tentis slane thair slauchter al othir pepyl may take exampil odious baith goddis men inuade realmes pepyll occasioun iniure otheris said best vse thair victory mesure ouir insolent proud yi felicite sen euery pepyll ar thirlit sic vncertane lawis fortoun eftir aduersite cumys ꝓsperite • fti • ꝓsperite cumys aduersite • reason romani suld herd yair ambassatouris saiffit law pepill last counsal wes apprisit incontinent come four honorabil men fair vissage cloithit thair maner na le precious semand abulȝemē ti fell kneys afore confiderat kyngis al sone thay wer •• sit ane thaym quhilk charge wes committit said wyse romane army capitanis dantouris warld desyring ȝour amyte freindschip inuincibill kyngis requiris ȝou humilie grace quhom thay haue thi • mony ȝeris persewit auful kene battall traist fermelie na thyng mycht haue cumyn glore marciall dedis sa hie ȝour honour mair worthy haue memory haue ambassatouris romani quhom kyngis realmes bene subdewit de • eckit ȝour feit humilie desyryng grace ȝe haue vincust w grant lyfe deith dependyng ȝour handis hatrent goddis quhilkis ar commouit aganis w iniust battall haue led aganis ȝow use sic victorye ȝe thynk respondent ȝour honoure vincꝰ ȝour ir • sen ȝe haue vin • ust w dantouris warld gyf ȝe nocht refrane ȝoure ire sla w haue • deseruit ¶nochtheles sen ȝe quhilkis ar heir farrest nuyk warld precellis pepill manheid virtew vnderstand ye na thyng may schaw ȝour humanite mair mercyfull eftir sa huge victory knaw hatrent goddis knaw ȝour cheualry desyris peace vnder quha • conditionis ȝe pleis galdus maid answere yame said ye sottis pychtis last pepyll warld sen thair first begynnyng desirit na landis bot thaym onlie y• wer geuin thaym beniuolence goddis faucht neuir bot yair pure defence romani wer knawin thaym first cursit reuaris realmes insaciabill auarice eftir yt thay maid weir britonis ane hundreth fifty ȝeris sindry chancis fortoun quhen thay subdewit warld maist part albion gret dāmage pepyl thairof thay ar vineust ye pepyll quhome thay held maist rude febill finalie dreuyn esperance better fortoun thair last refuge within thair tentis ane notabill exempill tymes cummyng vnsicker bene ye stait man chance fortoun yocht sindry nobyll men army counsallit victory vsit thaym maist rigour traistyng thair iniuris na othirwayis eschewit ȝit wald propiciant thynkand sufficient baith y• tyme present cū ye ambassatouris romani dantouris warld wer deieckit feit humylie desyryng mercy nochtheles plesit hym weill cō sent confiderat bruthir ye king pychtis gyf peace vnder thir conditionis romani sal pa boundis pertenand scottis pychtis rander munitionis pledgis guddis reft fra thaym duryng ye weris sall gyf thair gret ayth neuir inuaid scottis pychtis bot euir stand thair gud freindis tymes cummyng romani ressauit peace maner departit ony forthir iniure ¶hovv strenthi • scotland vvar recouerit fra romani conditioun peace deith galdus ca xxi gneus tribellius ye romane army nowmerit quhen agricola left lx thousand men bot tyme throw frequēt victorijs maid thaym thay war skarsly xx thousand left lyue efter thair departyng boundis scotland quhilkis war garnist afore romani war randerit scottis pychtis efter galdus skaillit army went epiak quhilk principal ciete scotland began institute pepyll ciuill maneris ye fyne y• na mā realme occasiō sleuth sall vse reiffis cuntre send superflew pepyl wageouris brytonis syne rewardit nobyllis ylk ane efter thair vassalage prouyn weiris galdus went throw boundis realme entres ī ylk town ye pepyll met hym wt sound trumpat clarioun honour louyng quhyll pepyll war geuyn laude magnyfye thair prince maner rais gret cōtentioun betuix scottis pichtis certane debaitabyll landis lay betwix thair realmes contentioun rais euyll dedy men mycht suffer na peace▪ bot • cht occasioun breke cunire nochtheles two confiderat kyngis met fynaly togidder wod calidon pecifyit debaitis amang thaym self galdus ragne mony ȝeris efter gret felicite occupyit pepyll virtewis laubouris exercition deceissit epiak xxxv ȝeir regne maist vailȝeant prince yat euir rang aboue scottis fra incarnatiō god iciii ȝeris fra ye begynnyng ye warld vmiiicii ȝeris body buryit besyde epiak funerall pompe gret lament pepyll quhome ane maist precius sepulture rasit quhilk ingrauyn recouerit realme souerane man heid fra romani mony huge pillaris war rasit sepulcure testify precellent virtew glore cheualry yat memory sall neuir peri decreit parliament cōmandit landis namit afore brigance salbe callit tyme cūmyng galdia becaus nobyl prince maid ane end weris thay partis dayes region callit galiudia corruption langage say galloway history sa far haue schawin carratak corbreid galdus kyngis scottis drawin sum part fra vulgar croniklis sum part fra corneliꝰ tacitus haue nocht onely writtyn sentence bot al wordis ye redaris baith romane story scottis may vnderstand ylk history concordant othir knaw testimoniall oure ennyme vailȝeantly nobyl elderis he fochtis realme aganis romani mair pruffe heirof haue inserit eloquent orisonis galdus agricol • word ī word cornelius tacitus rehersis thaym quhat sumeuir werkis sa endis heir fourt duke thir croniklis heir begynnis fyft buke croniklis scotland ¶of vicius kyng lugtak hovv vvas slane vnhappy lyfe tyranny ca primo vailȝeāt prince galdꝰ endit maner afore rehersit succedit sonne lugtak ane odius mischeuus tyrane al far haitit pepyll vice fader luffit virtew far different fra fader baith maneris ingyne geuin eys lust slew mony ye riche men cuntre na othir caus bot allanetly confiske thair guddis gaif ministration iustice maist wrangus auaricius men specially sic men yat war geuyn cōques guddis hym ony reason sycht iustice followit continewall reiffis al partis realme put punitioun gretest schrewis maist autorist virtuous personis maist ouirthrawin odius tyrane persewit nobyllis vane causis sum thaym banist othiris slew micht conques thair landis guddis sic affectioun reiffairis oppressouris namit thaym brethir counsalouris wrytyngis luffit nane sa weill hym culd fynd ingyne reif subdittis remanent dedis vnhappy lyfe ar sa dedestabyll thay ar mair worthy hyd dreuyn ony mannis eiris vnbridillit lust fulȝeit anttꝭ hꝭ douchteris systerꝭ sister douchteris penitent na thing bot mycht nocht suffice cōpleit lust thaim horribyll dedis war sufferit twa ȝeris nobyllis bot na thyng mouit thaym sa mekyl scornefull detractioun quhilk callit thaym auld dotand fulis nane sa familiar hym fidlaris bordellaris makerellis gestouris siclike men vile estimatioun cled thaym publik auctorite beleuyng thyngis succede weil thair gouernance bot cruelteis foly mycht nocht lang vnpunist sone eftir ane counsal set hym doū stafage punis syndry men repreuit vice mene tyme rais sic debait betuix hym nobillis slane cursit cumpany quhome gaif baith gouernance body realme thrid ȝeir regne buryit ryche pompe dounstafage bot bodyis vnhappy counsalouris war left feildis deuorit houndis ¶of king mogallꝰ hovv come vvith ane army aganis romani orisone maid sepulture galdus ca ii lugtak tyrane endit ī maner mogallꝰ maid king nepote galdꝰ gottin douchter mogallus efter coronation set hym follow wisdome
