maneris galdus gudschir kepe faith promis romani britonis peace afore contrackit pepyl mycht leif quiete ony seditioun reparit euery thing afore mysgidit tyrane lugtak restorit relygyoun goddis samyn cerymonis thay war fyrst institute traistyng fra gottyn beniuolence goddis quhilkis war ennymes pepil abhomynabil life lugtak al thingis suld succede ye better scottis began rise ylk day esperance better fortoun seyng thair kyng follow ye behauyngis gudschir galdus reddy reforme al enormyteis realm nocht lang efter come ambassatouris fra pichtis mogallus desyryng support aganis romani brytonis quhilkis war laitly cumyn fyre swerd pentland slane ane gret nowmer pepyll defence thair awin guddis siclike men galloway annandale complanit ane huge pray guddis war tan • romani thair landis mogallus hauand ingyne na le geuyn cheualry werkis peace reiosit haue occasioun battall mycht sum notabyll vassalage comparit vailȝeant antecessouris nochtheles send ambassatouris desyryng • edres dammage thaym done thir ambassatouris gat nocht bot ane answer full hie contemptioun skorne mogallus tuke goddis wytnes baith ye faith prompttit hym romani wa • brokyn message cōtempnit sone efter rasit army come galloway quhare visy • e sepulture galdus gudschir quhen maid certane cerimonis efter custome thay dayis fel kneis said vailȝeant inuincibyll prince quhilk efter sa gret aduersite fortoun recouir realmes scottis pichtis huge difficulte dang thy pyssant riche ennimes fauoure goddis thir boundis na le honoure manheid thy natyue pepyll quhylkis wirschyppit lyue mair reuerence lufe thā may tauld fallis kneis lamentabyll voce thy eternall sepulture last refuge w extreme neid besekyng hū ly thy funerall goist helper aganis ennymes quhom thou sumtyme maist vailȝeantly vincust thir boūdis prayis gif thow he ony auctoryte afore goddis thy syngulare virtew schawin w erd suffer nocht w thy posterite ouirthrawin dyspytefull ennymes quhylkis inuadis w tytyll battall ☞¶suffer nocht thy fame vailȝeant campyoun decay amang w vyctory thy iniust ennymes sen thay ben sa oft vincust thir boundis dreuin thy syngulare manheid implore thy mercy thair last refuge quhairthrow thy name emparyng sall na wayis bot euir indure terroure thy fais ¶als sone mogallus maid prayer galdus maner army began enbras ymage maid thair prayer thairto happy passage returnyng thair iurnay wod wemen sic war inflammit diuine spreit skurgit yame self make thaym seme mair religious aduise druydes solempne preistis afore rehersit thay maid solempne cursynis romani violation thair faith band afore contrackit ¶hovv confiderat kyngis come vvith thair armyis aganis romani orison maid mogallus lucius anthonius thair armyis hovv romani vvar discomfist capi iii mogallus come lang eftir annandale meit unipane king pichtis abaid cū ming ane weil arrayit ost pichtꝭ al sone baith thair armyis assemblit togidder thay went baith westmurland cumbir quhilkꝭ war prouinces romani first thay brocht ane huge pray men guddis fra samyn resydew mycht nocht tursit put fyre inhabitantis feir thir iniuris fled ȝork complanit lucius anthonius roman • capitane cruelteis done scottis pichtis lucius thā assemblit ane strang army went forthwart greit ordinance • ant ennymes mogallus seing ennymes sicht callit men standart said maner fynd na thing vailȝeant campionis bringis nobyll mē soner louyng glore resist ye iniure ennymes fechtand yair realme liberte deith thay nocht subdewit schamfull seruytude may weill prouyn baith example vncouth pepyll syngulare virtew vailȝeant antecessouris remember quhat manheid wysdome kyng edere supportit cassibilane king britonis quhen iulius romane consull doungin albion quhilk cōquest na le honour self thā posterite siclike nobyll caratak na le decorit virtew merit louyng quhen fechtand sa oft tymes syndry chācis fortoun mycht neuir vincust yocht ane hard fortoune brocht presoneir rome treasoun cartumandia ȝit inuincibyll spreit defendyng ay realme last dayis haldy • yairfore sic reuerence dredour amang ennymes finaly restorit baith realme honouris exampyll othir efter hym haue excellent fortitude aganis trubyl siklike corbreid bruthir defence liberte faucht sa cruelly aganis proude romani brocht thaym sic irrecouerabyll afflictioun slauchter thay mycht neuir inuade realme duryng lyffe ¶remember alsua gudschir galdus maist vailȝeant prince euir afore dayis howbeit inuadit perpetuall trubyll fechtand nocht aganis romani bot aganis fortoun sa oft vincust chasit army brokin ilk calamite īcressing aboue othir ȝit mychty curage perseuerit ay hope better fortoun quhill last lang battall virtew aganis vnhappy infortuniteis ouirthrew fortoun conquest mercyall prowes manheid sa interminabyl victory glore vincust ennymes iii syndry battallis brocht thaym fleing thair tentis sic subiectioun mesiry quhare thay culd nocht content afore • aill boundis warld mycht nocht • defende thaym self within thair sorowfull tentis throw quhilk gat excellent glore neuir afore succedit leuand crea •••• hauand ambassatouris romani quhome al kingis realmis subdewit deieckit feit desiring grace mair witnes heirof place quhare thir romani war defait callit galloway fame illuster werkis sall neuir euanis bot ay remane recent memorye forthir mair strang mair pissant fais war mair glore succedit hym pepyll heirfore ȝe gud cumpanȝeonis quhilkis ar ye posterite thay forcy cāpionis sumtyme faucht aganis romani ye said galdus remember ya • ȝour battall day aganis yame quhilkis he afore sa oftymes bene vincust ȝour cheuelry remanis lyue ȝour mercy consider weill quhat ȝe ar ȝe ar victouris vnbrokin curage defendouris ȝour realme liberteis wyffis barnis natyue guddis ar fecht na ambutioun auarice bot allanerly cōstant virtew consider al quhat schame • thinke romani may noch • vincust sen thay haue bene • oft defait traist fermely virtew fortoun ȝoure handis ȝoure eldaris· pa forthwart vailȝeant campionis victory present ȝour handis put ȝour vincust fais flicht thingis sal follow ȝe pleis gyf ȝe haue curage ¶mogallus thir wordis inflammit ye myndis army battall ¶on tothir syde lucius anthonius na le diligent perswadyng romani vehement orison vailȝeantly exemple imitation thair forebearis remember thaym quhat difficill laubouris thay led battallis vincust thair forcy strang ennymes remēbring thaym al thay war fecht aganis ane barbar pepyll virtew mouit battall wodnes fury quhilk baith thair manheid reason confundit mouand thaym battall fuliche hardiment thairfore quhen maist dangeir occurritt hay war sone discomfist brokin desirit yame al haue confidence ye romane virtew take na feir thair bludy cruell vnarmit ennymes deuidit amang thaym self perpetual sedition nocht assemblit luf weill thair self bot onely hatrent thair fais ¶take ȝoure wappinnis said sicker esperance victory ȝe sall conques infinite glore straik recouir landis tynt afore sleuth gneus tribellius ¶skarsly war thir wordis said quhen baith armyis iunit mair ardēt ire thā may tauld romani schot yair dartis ye cōfiderat pepyl yair arowis ganȝeis stanis quhen ye wemen quhilkis gret nowner army cassin incredybill multitude stanis thay tuke thair awful wappinnis faucht aboue cruelte men ruscheand thair fais ony feir woūdis deith strenth ground na le support oure folkis impediment oure fais thay knew nocht ground fell sumtymes swardis mossis sūtyme well eys throw quhylk thay war oft tymis deuydit thair fechting ȝit battal cruelly fochtin partis specially myddis quhare capitanis inflamit curage thair army romani contending saif thaym fra thirlage barbar pepyll scottis keip victory gotin manheid thair eldaris efter lang lauborius battall thay left thair swerdis faucht schort dagerꝭ becaus sa innowmerabyll slauchter sidis nane armyis appering geif place othir capitanis athir syde war penitent thair army iunit day last scottis pichtis innatiue ferocite began put thair ennymes abak nocht thay war discomfist bot eschewing sum thing fury battall becaus thay mycht na forthir resist ye multitude thair ennymes quhill lucius beheld sa hie dāgeir appering folkis exhortyng thaym renew battall gat sic ane straik ane arow yt mycht na mair tary bot fled feild incontinent army fled ye nixt woddis ane cumpany thaym war stoppit cum thair fallowis nocht knawyng quhare fle war slane scottis becaus thay wald nocht takin presoneris ¶hovv adriane empi • ioure come britane biggit ane strang vvall saif britonis romani fra scottis pichtis hovv returnit frāce left victorine capitane britane ca iiii sonne fast tendyng occasion quhen confiderat pepyll sound trūpat colleckit residew thair folkis fra chace passit remanent ye nycht incredibyll blithnes syngyng dansyng karolyng spring day thay gaderit ryche spulȝeis slane men mene tyme quhen two kyngis war takand consultatioun weill thair army schawin ane cumpany romani quhylkis war eschapit fra last battal war within twa mylis thair army gāgand wyll nocht knawand quhat cuntre partis thay mycht maist esaly fle incontinent ane band scottis went thaym left none thaym lyffe thay refusit takyn ¶on morrow confiderat kyngis maid sacrifice gyse thay dayis thair goddꝭ ye victory fallyng yame syne tuke diligent examynatioun quhat personis dyd maist vassalage last battall rewardit thaym thairefter ¶lucius anthonius vincust maner send emprioure adryane schawyng quhat trubyll laitly fallyn brytane weris scottis pichtis desyring hym send haistely support britane otherwayes ye romani salbe schamefully doung boūdis thairof elli subdewit seruitude barbar peple adriane empriour dant rebellioun come ane huge army albioun eftir cumyng wes aduertist ye scottis cruelte afore wer cumyng ye romane landis ceissyng fra na maner cruelte mycht deuisit ye inhabitantis thairof adriane astonyst rycht desyrus reuenge thir offencis come ȝork▪ quhare remanit remanent army britonis quhill wes prouidit twa monethis vittallis pa scottis pychtis sone eftir rasit campe gret difficulte brocht ye samyn 〈◊〉 tyne four • day eftir come landis quhilkis wer waistit scottis becaus fand euery thing yat mycht nurys army distroyit began inquire quhat lyfe condition thir pepill bene maid sic extorsionis ronane landis wes schawin thay wer ane rude vndantit pepill lay thair furth wynter nocht withstanding ye cauld frostis stormꝭ lay sic strenthis mossis thay mycht persewit extreme dangeir thair inuasouris thir causis left purpos pa ony forthir keip thaym fra incursionis ennymes tymes cumyng beildit ane huge wall fail deuait rycht braid hie maner ane hill fra mouth tyne fornens almane seis flude esk fornens ireland seis wal lxxx mylis lenth said croniklis dike wes begun adriane endit seuerus romane emprioure callit wal seueir bot followyng ueremond callis wal adriane fra first foundoure sone eftir adriane past westmureland walis quhare wes aduertist new rebellioun maid aganys hym inhabitantis ye said lād nochtheles behauit hym sa prudently mater principall mouaris yairof wer punyst cuntre restorit opinioun eftir come london kent rewardit nobillis britane thair faith obedience kepit romani sic thyngis done returnit france lucius anthoniꝰ quhilk wes yan trublit gret infirmite left uictoryne ī place uictoryne eftir ye departyng adriane stuffit castellis strenthis britane new munition vageouris resist violence scottis pychtis followit mony ȝeris eftir gret tranquillite amāg britonis ¶hovv scottis pichtis partit ye landis • ond vvall adriane hovv kyng mogallus vvas degenerit corruppit lyf slane tyranny ca v scottꝭ pychtis partit amang thaym al ye landis brytane lyand beȝound wal adriane maner landis fornens ireland seis wer geuin scottis landis fornens almane seis pychtis strenthis liand nixt ye wal adrian war gar • yst gret munitionis keip countre fra iniure ronis bot returne historie resydew mogallus lyffe quiete ony vncouth domestyk weiris nochtheles huge victory romani maid hym degenerit fra virtew maist detestabyll vicis sa geuyn auarice lust eild eschamyt na maner vice oppressioun done aganis liegis defloring wyffis nobyllis cōmonis ony schame respect thair estait nocht onely deforsit virginis matronis bot annullit constitutionis lawis maid punitioun sic horribyll dedis attour aggrege tyranny gaue lycence theiffis reuaris take gudis thair nychtbouris gif thay wantit punitioun slew riche men cuntre vane causis cō fiscat thair gudis first kyng statute ye gudis banist condampnit personis confiscat kyngis vse ony respect thair wiffis child dettouris afore tyme gudis landis possessionis condampnit ꝑsonis come ony pley fre dispositioun thair wyffis childrē law quhilkis schawis weill ye cursit auarice mogallus ȝit obseruat ony reuocatioun regioun ȝit horribyl dedis tyrane mycht nocht lang vnpunist nobillis commonis impacient suffer sic tyrannyis conspyrit aganis hym instruckit certane men wait ganand place tyme slauchter mogallus knawyng nobyllis cōspirit aganis hym maner tuke consultatioun certane iuglouris quhylkis war richt frequent thay dayis fle ye ilis dissimill passage went bed sonar wont bene strikin suddane infirmite sone efter armyt hym halkrig bow arowis fled two seruandis nixt wod left behynd hym residew cursit cumpany ane tyrane doi confidis creature nobyllis war conspirit aganis hym beand aduertist fleig followit hym sa scharply finaly comprehendit slane xxvi ȝeir regne fra incarnation cxlviii ȝeris anthonius pius beand emprioure phiacus albus regnand aboue pychtis heid mogallus borne ane staik nyxt towne quhare ane multitude pepyll war gaderit perpetuall schame deuysit pepyl yt body suld cassyn ye houndis reuanus beistis nochtheles nobyllis mouit ye worthy dedis galdus gudschir cōmandit heid body buryit amang kyngly sepulturis progenitouris schameful vnhappy end maid mogallus degenerat fra virtew antecessouris ¶of syndry nobyll clerkis vicius kyng conaru • hovv vvas degradit auctorite seruādis hingit thair vvickit counsal ca vi era deith dardānus thir day war mony excellent clerkis ī syndry ꝑtis ye warld quintiliane oratoure serapio medcinar philo iow philosophour oratour cayus pleniꝰ secundus wrait hystory naturall xxxviii bukis na le treuth eloquence cornelius tacitus writar hystoryis quhom haue followit werke cecilius plenius secundus oratoure suetonius tranquillus▪ ptolomeus maist excellent ī mathamatik quhilk brocht cosmography ptolomy afore rehersit ane better knawlage mony new additionis l apuleus oratour aulus gellius plutercus cheronius philosophour thay dayis war excellent poetis iuuenale sillius italicꝰ mercialis mony othe • tyme ye romane princis persewit cristen pepyll gret cruel • e brocht gret nowmer • ha • marterdome nocht knawyng quhat constance reli • ioun cristin faith quhilk 〈◊〉 ay strenthy 〈◊〉 ꝑs • wit tyranny agmen • na thyng sa nickle scharp persecutioun bot retur • quhare left historie mogallus mycht weill haue bene noumerit begynnyng empire amang maist nobill princis bot ī ye end wes nothir worthy kyng ȝit ane leuand creature deseruit weil ye end gat forthir sonne conarus quhilk succedit eftir litil better toun maneris instrukit hꝭ men hid wachyng sla fader vnnaturall cruelte succedit ye crown begynnyng empire dissimilit vice quhilkis wes naturally inclinit al sone realme wes stabillit hym sicker peace waistit al publik rentis ꝑ • enand crown infamit lust gaue braid landis rich maist vile diffamit creaturis becaus thay louit corruppit maneris vice▪ counsall thir wickit schrewis gouernit realme detestyng nobill virtewis men realme set hym induce peple superflew riatus bankettis contrar temperance antecessouris last quhen waistit treasour substāce mony schāful wayis cōuenit nobillis ane counsal ye quhilk schew lang orison honest triumphant cheir hous na litill glore suld geuyn thairto becaus rentis treasour wes nocht sufficient sustene samyn vsit desyrit ane geneall stent tane throw ye realme ilk person eftir faculte sustene hous seruandis accordyng estait riall honourꝭ wes answerit nobillis yt thay mycht nocht gyf ane haisty deliuerance sa gret ane mater becaus desirit certane thyngis quhilkis wer neuir desyrit ony othir prince afore cause thay suld degestlie auyse schaw hym thair mynd concernyng morow thir nobillis ye nycht followyng conuenit thair secreit counsall becaus thay fand kyng euill gouernance thay concludit degraid hym auctorite kyngdome morow thay cōuenit thair kyng coū sall said hym thay na litill wounder ye rentis pertenand ye crown mycht nocht suffice al weill hym hauand realme ony trudill peace othir maist nobill princis progenitouris afore baith weir peace nobill galdus recouerit realme desyrit neuir stent thaym na maner chargis sustenit aganis hꝭ ennymes knawyng weil odius pepyl seik ony new exactionis thaym ȝit gouernance conarus vnlyke nobyll galdus galdus counsall prudent men remouit prouocatioun lustis fra army othir thingis yat micht maik thaym effemynate geuand lauboure defend subdittꝭ resist ennymes contrar conarus drownit ī lust passing life amāg maist vyle abhomynabyll creaturis pretendyng ay gouerne realme quhen hieast besynes occurrit • e thair vnhappy counsall disherysing nobyllis realme maik vp myscheuous lymmarꝭ fynaly efter sa mony importabyll wrangis done hym socht ane thyng richt vncouth odiꝰ thaym ane preparatyue othir kyngis successouris tymes cumyng seik new exactionis thaym thair rich guddis micht cum fynaly hā dis bot vnhappy counsalouris mysgidaris ye realme sall nocht onely frustrate thair intentionis bot brocht sic estait thay sall myster lytyll reward ryches fra hym tymes cumyng thay war profoundlie resoluit baith degraid hym kyngdome honouris punys hꝭ wickit consalouris deith pepyl vile obscure lynnage may take exempill abuse realmes kyngis kyngis may vnderstand quhat dangeir thaym iniurius tyranni thayr subdittis conarus heirand thir wourdis said dar ȝe mischant fulis pretend sic thyngis aganis seruandis treason ȝ • haue deuisit aganis sall turne dammage ȝour self ȝe sall punyst maist cruell maner may deuisit nobillis answerit vnworthy yair kyng sufferit realme distroyit insolence vicious lymmers incōtinent rais ane huge noys clamour amang thaym ye mene tyme certane wycht rank men tuke hym myddill bure hym perforce ane quiet chalmer quhare remanit ye residew dayis miserie seruandis yat wer occasioun corrupit lyfe nurisand hym vice wer tane hynggit iebaittis thay deseruit ¶hovv argadus vvas maid gouernou • scotland duryng tyme conarus presoun lyfe gouernance ca vii conarus beand degradit yi maner ye nobillis chesit argadus capitane •• yle gouernour ye realme sa lan • conarus wes presoun argadus ye begynnyng auctorite tuke gret laubour ornament commoun weill stanchit thift reif slauchter othir sic exhorbitant crime meruellus craft prudence hauand sic moderatioun semyt nothir slaw ȝit cruell administratioun iustice throwe quhilk wes traistit ane myrrour virtew nobill princis ȝit oft occurris gud forton turnyt mynd fra iustice set aside al gud maneris gouernit realme quhen hieast chargis occurrit domistik counsall nurist seditionis intestyne betuix ye gret princis realme cause thaym haue may erandis hym maryit prince fiffis douchter affinite yair drew pychtis freindschip yat mycht • e y• strang amang awin pepill nobillis impacient suffer vicis callit hym ane counsall quhare wes scharply repreuit chosyn gouernour thair auctorite virtew apperyng hym suld make hym nocht onelie follow vicious tyranny conarꝰ quhom yai depriuit detestabil dedꝭ bot al mary wt vncouth blude thair auyse gidyng realme priuat counsall gret dammage common weil he tynt schamefully gud 〈◊〉 conquest afore beginnyng auctorite argadus heirand hym reprochit wi • e▪ ȝet furth mony terꝭ desirit nobillis haue hym excusit ya • tyme yair beniuolence nocht punys hym accordyng demeritis promittit amend al enormiteis done hym quhat sort thay plesit nobillis mouit humyll wourdis continewit hym still auctorite kest al counsalouris presoun argadus correckit nobillis maner gouernit realme gud iustice na thyng tymes cū myng concernyng publik materis without consultatioun nobillis becaus diuers townis cieteis realme ouir large preuilege administratioun iustice minist mony yair prerogat • uis commandit thaym punis na thyng bot small crymes hie offencis replegit gre • iustice maid extreme deligence serche theuis reuaris oppressouris speciallie thaym mayd heirschippis argyle ilis othir partis adiacent ay quhare thay wer apprehendit thay wer hyngit ony mercy iebaittis commandit personis ony office auctorite hym abstene fra sic thyngis mycht mak thaym inebriat dronkin cause thaym haue sum preeminence wisdome aboue commonis commandit al scudlaris tauernaris dronkartis othir siclike vile pepill deuisit lust ony necessar sustenance men exilit within ane certane day day beand run commandit thair guddis confiscat quhare euir thay mycht apprehendit finalie commoun pepil sum part beniuolence argadus sum part thir institutionis wer reformit gudde maneris quhill last conarus lang se • knes malancoly quhilk tuke incarceration deceissit xiiii ȝeir regne anthonius aureliꝰ beand empriour ¶of kyng ethodius first hovv pecifyit ilis hovv scottis pichtis brak dovvn vvall adriane faucht aganis ye romani vvith syndry chancis victory ca viii eftir deith conarꝰ nobillis generall cōuention maid ethodiꝰ kyng wes nepot mogallꝰ gottin sister ethodius eftir coronation rewardit argadus gouernour landis rich gud ministration iustice duryng tyme maid hym generall lieutenand realme yi nobill prince past ilis pecifyit debaitis returnyng ī albion wes aduertist romani brokin ye wal adrian place thairof he beildit gret strenthis treis stanis deuaitis samyn maid mony heirschippis landis scottis pychtis quhom ane gret nowmer wer slane defence thair awin guddis ye remanent discomfist al sone ethodius hard thir nouellis send ane herald uictoryne desiring redres maid within xv dayis certificatioun gif y• samyn wer nocht done within ye said tyme suld recouir samyn force battal answerit uictoryne last pray guddis takin romani recompens syndry othir heirschippis maid afore scotis pichtis thay war ane seditious pepyl confiderat dāmage thair nichtbouris apperit cleirly becaus thay brak first y• said wall adrian beildit syndry strenthis fornens samyn trubyll romani britonis ony sycht peace afore contrackit ethodius mouit answer send ambassatouris kyng pichtis desyrit hym cum folkis agane ane certane day recouer thair guddis tane romani kyng promittit reddy desyrit romani weil aduertist thir materis prouydit ane huge ordinance battall aganis thair ennymes confiderat pepyl rasit thair armyis day prefixt brak wall adrian mony partis enterit maist cruell heirschippis slauchter landis romani ye nycht followyng romani slippit y• tentis scottis pichtis come baith mers berwyk draw thaym romane landis confiderat kyngis weil aduertist thairof come gret diligence ye morrow rescours thair landis incontinent baith ye armyis ruschit togidder faucht syndry chance victory rycht wyngis war victorius ylk syde left wyngis discomfist myd batallis faucht ythandly quhyl nycht bereft thaym thair sycht sa • aith said battallis seuerit thair awin wyll ony victory morow al wemen yat followit scottis pychtis battal seyng feild desert gaderit spulȝeis slane men returnit samyn scotland battall sa sorowful ȝeir nixt followyng quiet ony motioun weiris ¶hovv victorine vvas depriuit auctoryte calphurnius agricola send place hovv calphurnius reparit vval adrian returnit rome ca ix victoryne seyng army brokyn ī maner wrait aurelius emprioure▪ schew trubyll fell romani last battall euery circumstance afore rehersit ☞ ¶the emprioure traistyng trubyll fallyn romani febyll curage victoryne depriuit hym auctoryte send calphurnius agricola quhilk • epot iuliꝰ agricola afore rehersit place calphurniꝰ cumyng ī britane assemblit ane large power britonis romani ȝork inuade confiderat pepyll first maid sacrifice goddis haue victory ennymes syne rasit camp come beȝond wall adrian quhare fand frequent weiris al landis waist ony cornis frutis townis brynt scottis na lugeyng suld remane thair ennymes calphurnius nochtwithstandyng thir direptionis went forthwart army inuadit baith mers pentland irrecouerabyl skaithis slew inhabitantis thairof al partis ony mercy ranson sic thyngis done returnit ȝork remanit thair wynter followyng resyd • w army makand prouysion 〈◊〉 scottis pichtis agane nixt symer mene tyme 〈◊〉 • etteris welche men syndry othir pepyll brytane wer reb • llit said rebellyoun mony cieteis townis stude opinioun romani brynt heryit inhabitantis thairof •• uelly slane calphurniꝰ dreidand tyne landis conquest afore sa huge difficulte persewt new rowmis left ye scottis pichtꝭ maid hym diligence renew wall adrian samyn mycht ane targe tymes cū myng aganis violence scottis pychtis sone efter gat syndry craftismen clenge fowseis repair said wall partis touris bastailȝeis rysyng strangest maner mycht deuisit quhen wal reparit partis left ane band weirmen debait ye samyn fra violence ennymes went resydew army welche men thay na le diligence met hym arrayit battal nochtheles thay war fynaly vincust chasit skarsly battall pecifyit quhen haistely followit ane othir rebellyoun ile wycht inhabitantis thairof come proude baner aganis romani war vincust maner afore cō fiderat pepyll seand brytonis dantit wyse held thaym thair awin rowmes ony inuasyoun romani dreidand ye samyn chāce victory calphurniꝰ agricola afore iulius agricola quhilk subdewit sa mony regionis scottis pychtis romane empyre calphurnius heirand thir exploratouris confiderat pepyll war skalit ony molestatioun done pepyll maid hym mei al seditionis gif ony war rysyng amang brytonis quhen pecifyit thaym debaittis returnit command anthonius commodus empriour rome ¶hovv trebellius vvas send britane vvas vincust scottis pichtis rebelliō britonis aganis hym message send empriour ca x efter departyng calphurniꝰ ane new capitane namit p trebellius send brytane emprioure trebellius gouernit brytane mair beniuolence fauoure ony auctoryte vsit counsall britonis hie besynes gret honour lucius kyng britonis cōmendyng hym oftymes wrytyngis emprioure baith luffer commoun weil rome ennyme thaym hatit ye empire thairof trebellius come sic fauour lucius kyng britonis thir cō mēdationis beleuit na thing micht succede dāmage britane began thairfore schaw fenȝeit mynd man insaciabyll auarice slew mony riche men britane confisk thair gudis otheris banist ye effect thir cruelteis maid hym sa odius bene oftymes inuadit slane war nocht ythandly supportit said lucius confiderat pepil knawing hatrent britonis aganis trebellius thocht tyme expedient reuenge auld iniuris efter thay gaderit ane army prouysyoun mycht deuysit thay brak wall adriane quhilk reparit afor calphurnius▪ wrocht intollerabyl cruelteis britonis obeit romani trebellius mouit thir displesouris went ane army horsmen futemen aganis ye scottis pichtis first iunyng ye britonis frenche men quhilkis wer ane gret part army left hym throw quhilk esaly vincust army put flycht yocht ye victory succedit scottis pichtis battall ȝit innowmerabyl slaucht maid thaym al well romani trebellius dyscomfyst maner colleckit resydew army returnit ȝork scottis pichtis become richt insolent efter victory reuenge ye slauchter sa mony ȝeris maid thaym thay slew al presoneris quhilkis war takin yi last feild come new army pepyl yt dwelt westmureland kendale inuadit yame sic cruelte yt thay war disparit refuge howbeit trebellius gretumly commouit thir offencis durst nocht assaylȝe ennimes battall▪ na le suspection aganis ye britonis aganis scottis pichtis nochtheles frequent ieoperdyis slew ennymes ay quhare mycht apprehend thaym ony miseration ye samyn tyme rais mekyll trubyll britane ye cōmonis seing thaym ylk day mair iniurit ye scottis pichtis ony esperance redres chesit caldorꝰ ane vailȝeant knycht pichtis blude thair capitane thair rebellion mony ȝeris accustomit thair manerꝭ hauand na thing mair hatrent tyranny romani trebellius knawing ye gret dangeir appering trubyll tuke lang consultation quhat industry laubour mycht best resist thairto efter degeist aduisement tuke purpos fecht britonis gif thair power war midli • scottis pichtis ye samyn mycht dantit gret slauchter romani britonis becaus thair army colleckit commonis wer astonist cūmyng nochtheles impulsion caldorus thair capitane thay iunit thair ennimes gret ferocite spreit followit ane bludy terribyll battall fochtin wt doutsum victory bot last ye britonis war vincust caldorꝰ eschapit yi battal wt certane freindis returnit ī pentland reiosing ī mynd sa mony romani britonis wer slane industry mony nobillis britane wer thꝭ feild aganis y• roman howbeit thay wer cloithit vnder landwart habyt quhen thay saw romani rageand fury sla sa mony ye cōmonis thay discouerit yame self romani traistyng becaus thay wer nobillis ye erar saissit tane presoneris quhen trebellius wes aduertist thay dissimulit thair habyt wer caus rebellion gart hing yame presens al pepill iebai • cruelte maid trebellius •• cht odious ye britonis morrow thay tuke al mony romani hangit thaym samyn maner trebelliꝰ dreding gret dangeir apperyng al partis 〈◊〉 emprioure trea ••• britonis iniuris done sco • ti pychtis desyrit support send haistely elli ye romani suld doung schamefully britane comodus anthonius empriour dant yi rebellion britonis scottis pychtis send ane vailȝeaunt knycht namyt pertenar britane quhilk eftir cumyng dantit ennymes romane empire mair beniuloēce ony preis army howbeit ane certane thaym yt wer smal reputatioun wer punyst ye deith eftir yi rasit camp combeȝond wall adriane quhare inuadit scottis pichtis heirschippis slauchter bot quhen suld haue ꝓcedit forwart gat writyngis commodus emprioure wes slane treason famyliaris sone eftir returnyt rome quhare wes chosin emprioure eftir coronatioun trebellius wes send agane britane ¶hovv argadus lieutenand kyng ethodius vvas slane army discomfist ilis syndry lavvis actis maid ethodius slauchter ca xi quhil sic thingis wer done britane succedit gret trubyll ethodius scotland sindry gret clannis ilys reuenge ye slauchter thair freindis quhilkis wer slane argadus quhen wes gouernour ariuit wt ane gret power argyle maid slauchter heirschippis partis thairof ony miseratioun estait ethodius punys thir attemptatis send argadus lieutenand ane cumpany chosyn men argyle come ane army baith scottis pichtis wall adriane fecht roman britonis gyf thay wald inuaid hym clannis ye ilis knawyng cumyng argadus conuenit suddanlie wi • h thair capitane meit hym left two ireland men quhilkis come thaym spulȝe hid vnder craggꝭ couis land take argadus gyf thay mycht sū auātage al sone thir ireland men persauit argadus cumyng thaym thay ruschit al atanys apō hym ane schout argadus seing hym inuadit athir syde turnyt dredour maist fury faucht incredibill manheid deith wes finalie slane ii thousand men army residew put flycht kyng ethodiꝰ become rycht displesant clannys ye ilis offence come sone eftir xx thousand men argyle clannis ilis aduertist cumyng pullit vp salis haue fled ye ilis nochtheles thay wer dreuin agane argyle contrarius wyndis kyng ethodiꝰ knawyng thaym disparit men nocht abill vincust hie dammage slauchter pepil brak thaym mair wisdome ony violence battall brocht thaym sic necessite thay wer cōstranit falt vittallis seik peace quhilk wes grantit thaym vnder thir cō ditionis ye principall capitane twa hundreth quhom ye kyng wald cheis thair cumpany salbe deliuerit vnderly ye wil hym nobillis ye remanent return hame thair swerdis ilis thir clannys men ilis seyng na refuge tuke peace samyn condition deliuerit sa mony kyng plesit quhilkis wer iustifyit pu • deith residew seyng thair capitane thair freindis slane come ane huge nowmer stanis becaus thay wantit thair swerdis kyngis army rammist wod creaturis haue reuengit ye slauchter yair freindis nochtheles ane gret end thaym litill lauboure wes slane ye remanent put flicht ilis dantit maner ye britonis leuand seruitude vnder romani ethodiꝰ realme ī peace ony vncouth domistik weiris mony ȝeris eftir eftir yt visit boundis thairof chesit sindry prudent men iugis administratioun iustice subdittis suld nocht dull approchyng age sleuth gaue ingyne huntyng wes lernit ȝouth commandit lawis maid afore nobill antecessouris concernyng hūting obseruit first cōmandit yt na haris slane quhen thay ar lyand clubbis arowis dartis ony siclik instrumentis ȝit tane nettis girnis becaus haris wer oftymes murdrist sic maner ony game commandit al gyf ye haris forrun hundis lang renk na forthir persewit siclike na man sla ane baggit hynd ȝit thair calffis wes defendit al sla ane hair ony othir ingyne chace hundis na huntyng vsit duryng season wynter ueir season erd ouir couerit snawis deir ar constranit discend fra montanis planis serche thair fude oftymes murdrist ony game thir lawis wer maid ethodius detestit na thyng mair honorabill game huntyng quhilk wes ordanit nobillis gentill men distroyit sic febill slychtis solace attoure quhen yi prince vakit fra hūtyng wes geuin honest pleseiris nurist hym crafty menstralis sortis bot last wes treasonably slane vnder nycht ane menstrale ilis quhome gret delite menstrale wes fynalie tane kyngis gard quhen wes accusit quhy slew hꝭ natiue price yat wes familiar tendir hym answerit slew king becaus king slew mony freindis afore argyle sen condingly reuengit ye slauchter freindis quhilk wes determyt mony dayis afore vehement affectioun satifyit vailȝeant deid desyrit leif na lāgar bad thaym vse quhat cruelte thay list offence curage na le reddy sustene deith thā sla kyng attoure thair na kynd deith sa cruell deuysit hym mycht cause hym repent kyngis slauchter sen samyn he cōdynglie reuengit slauchter deir freindis skarsly wer thir wourdis said said menstrale quhen body wes drawin sindry wyld hors ethodius wes slane xxxiii ȝeir regne beryit dunstafage amang sepulturis ꝓgenitouris regne come empire seuerus emprioure ¶ 〈◊〉 mony nobyll clerkis hovv 〈◊〉 tuke faith crist vici • u kyng satrahell deith ca xii yi tyme fluryst mony nobill clerkis ī sindry par • warld galian • ipocrates medcinaris appollonius oratoure quhilk wes martyrit gentylis makyng ane orisone louyng ye glorius virgine mary mony pepill began tyme detest errouris gentilis tuke sicker faith crist luciꝰ kyng britonis heirand romani vnder trebellius myraclis religion cristin faith send writyngis elethuriꝰ quhilk wes xiiii paip fra sanct peter gyf cristin faith hym pepill sone efter come britane two haly men fugatius damanius quhilkis brocht said lucius pepill sacrament baptyme put doun al vane superstitionis idolitrys ȝeir britane tuke faith crist wes fra incarnatioun ane hundreth lxxxvii ȝeris bot wil return history eftir deth ethodius sonnis wer tender age yat thay mycht nocht succeid thairfore satrahell brothir wes maid kyng satrahell wes ane man sle fals ingyne geuin sic cruelte treason slew fenȝeit causis mony freindis ethodius defraude ayris crown wes vnmerciful commonis nobillis yat spulȝeit thaym baith yair guddis landis mony yame vane causis put deith thus grew ilk day rycht odius baith cō monis nobillis sone eftir followit discord dissension domistik weris amang freindis nychtbouris gret dammage common weil thir mony othir damagis apperyng plane exterminioun pepill come throw sleuth imprudence yi vnhappy tyrane durst nocht cum lycht punys trespassouris becaus pepill hym extreme hatrent cursit tyranny quhil last wes slane ane famyliaris within nycht fourt ȝeir regne ¶of kyng donald first hovv britonis vver inhibit romani haue ony kyng thair blude hovv thay solistit scottis pichtis assist thair rebe • lion ca xiii satrahell slane yi maner donald brothir ethodius first wes maid king ane iust humyl prince rych • far discordand fra maneris last tyrane nocht geuyn slychtis falset bot settand mynd mei contentionis truble amang liegis quhen peacifyit realme debaitis began vesy boundis thairof makand residence oftymes honorabil castellis nobillis doyng iustice subdittis ony respect party punyst crymes efferyng ye offence thairof throwe quhilk pepill wes wyld vndantit afore necligence euill princis wes brocht ciuill maneris abyll withstand thair ennymes quhen dangeir occurrit nobil prince ane gard chosyn men reddye chargis baith tyme weir peace tyme lucius kyng britonis deceissit romani eftir deith knawyng kyngis britane wes occasioun sa frequent seditioun tymes bygane inhibit ony thair blude suld regne tymes cumyng throw quhilk gret trubill succedi • britane fulgencius quhilk wes discendit ye blude riall britane rycht cōmouit noblis thairof suld disherist ye crown conuenit mony nobillis thair ane counsall complenyt ye gre • tyrannyis done romani plane euersioun thair natyue lawis liberte thair virginis wedowis matronis fulȝeit insaciabill lust romani thair guddis escheitit new tribute exactionis ilk day desirit beside mony othir infinite oppressionis last nobill blude disherist crown thairfore gyf samin wer nocht haistely reparit na nobill blude bot onlie cōmonis suld left britane ¶ britonis mouit yir reasonis set ane day meit hym thair best maner inuade romani sone eftir fulgencius send ane herald donald kyng scottis schawyng ye rebellioun britonis aganis romani desyryng support expell thaym albioun ye samyn mycht done yat tyme le truble ony tyme afore empriour wes agit brokin sa mony calamyteis wist nocht quhat wes done toure sa mony pepill wer rebellit aganis hym france almanȝe eist partis warld na help mycht send fra hym britane ¶ kyng donald reiosyng thir tithyngis glaid haue occasioun battall becaus pepill mycht nocht leif ciuil weris amang thaym self quhen thay haue na externe weris othir pepil promittit cum ane prefixi • day wt power inuaid romani pychtis ꝓmittit thair support samyn maner ¶fulgentius knawyng punytioun scottis pychtis maid effec • foresaid come ane army britonis wal adriane fornens irelād seis brak doun ane gret part thairof agane cuming scottis pychtis thay na le deligence met britonis al sone albianis mengit thair armyis togiddir thay come forthwart ȝork traisting haue found trebellius othir sindry romane capitanis last quhen thay line lang tyme sege town vnderstude ye principal romani quhō thay desyrit maist fled kent thay left • ge maid incursionis heir • chippis slauchter pepill obeit romani ye commonis astonyst thir cruelteis nocht power resist past confidera • kyngis thair plesand maner ressauit thaym wt 〈◊〉 portis thair town thair armyis wer lugit vtouth town lang ony thyng mycht gottin 〈◊〉 • ai • sustentation thay went othir placis ay makand siclike heirschippꝭ afore nocht ceis •• ng fra thair cruell fury quhill ••• allerable cold stormys wynter constra • thaym skaill 〈…〉 hame ¶hovv seuerus emprioure come ••• tane reuenge ye opp̄ssio • done romani hovv britonis fled • otland hovv scottis pichtis •••• tand support britonis vvar •• scomf • st ca xiiii trebellius impacient suffir thir offencis wrait seuerus emprioure britonis nocht onlie wer rebellit▪ bot al he inuadit romane landis sic cruelti • heirschippis yat wes necessar othir send ane new army elli cum hym self britane seuerus emprioure glaid haue occasioun battall mycht cōques siclik honour subdewyng britonis afore subdewyng baith eist north partis ye warld tuke wayage ane hors litter come finalie gret lauboure dylygence howbeit agit pynit ye gout britane brocht hym baith sonnis anthonius geta fyne mycht draw thaym fra corrupit sensuall plesouris merciall werkis cumyng britane gaderit ye residew romani new army inuaid britonis fulgentius remanent britonis opinion astonyst suddane cummyng emprioure ane huge power send oratourꝭ excuse thaym desyrit peace empriour dipeschit thir oratouris plane repuls fulgentius frustrat desyris conuenit nobillis ane counsall perswadyng thaym lang orisoun recouer yair liberte re • ore blude royall britane crown reuengeyng ye intollerable outragis sa mony ȝeris done romani declarit na thyng mycht moue hym take maist dangerus mater hand bot onlie recouer ye liberte britane banis vncouth blude fra ye croun yocht persuadit thaym sumtyme battall sayng romani wer ane army gaderit diuers opinionis myndis mycht yair fore ye soner vincust fra scottis pychtis quhilkis wer maist ennymes romani wer cumyn thair support ȝit thocht mair proffitable brek ye romani smal incursionis thā ony set battal traistyng gyf goddis wer propiciant britane mycht perpetuallye deliuerit romane seruitude britonis mouit thi • wourdis come britane thair wiffis child guddis montanis beȝond wall adriane ye mene tyme fulgentius gaderit ane cumpany noblest britonis opinion purpos erar defend thaym self inuaid thair ennymes sone eftir scottis pychtis come hym reddy assailȝe maner ieoperdeis yair common weill seuerus empriour knawing wayis albianis left na thyng vndone yat mycht pertene prouisioun ordinance quhen al thyngis wer prouidit desyrit left ȝongest son namyt geta gouerne britonis vnder romane lawis come al ordināce ȝork quhair wes ressauit gret honour triumphe eftir intres went templis maid salutationis goddis syne past castell quhair trebellius wes sindry romane sodiouris tuke lang auisement ye barbar pepill mycht best dantit nocht lang eftir rasit campe come forthwart displayit baner ye britonis quhilkis wer fulgentius opinioun seyng na refuge • uk purpos fecht aganis romani othir de maist vailȝeantly elli leif victory honour ȝit quhen thay saw thai • ennymes sic multitude pepill sycht thay changit purpos nochtheles thay iunyt maist fury faucht lang tyme vncertane victory quhill last thay wer vincust scottis pychtis put flycht samyn maner fulgentius wes brocht feild freindis esperance better fortoun scottis pychtis eftir discomfitour gaderit residew thair army returnyt hame vnhappye battall wer slane scottis pychtis britonis xxx thousand ¶of gret cruelteis done seuerus emprioure aganis nobyllis britane▪ vveris aganis scottis pichtis hovv anthonius reparit vvall adriane empriouri • deith ca xv scottis pichtis brokin yi calamytye send ireland norway denmerk support freindis resist romani fulgentius tothir syde ceissit hyre pepill ya • mycht get money eftir battall empriour seuerus past throw boundis britane slew nobillis thairof quhom mycht apprehend hauand miseratioun onelie commonis thay offence bot followit thair maisteris al sone reparit dammagis done necligence febyll capitanis retournyt ȝork left army thair wynter schelis nixt symer scottis pichtis seand na support come fra ireland set thaim era • defend thair awin▪ inuade thair ennymes fulgentius brytonis stude opinioun esperance better fortoun fled scottis pichtis sone efter seuerus emprioure rasit campe come beȝonde wall adriane throw quhilk empriour began nocht allanerly fauoure crystyn pepyll bot al inhibit ony persecutioun maid thaym kepit crucifix maist secret partis chalmer ¶in samyn tyme plotinus mony othir clerkis syngular eruditioun sum gentilis sū thaym crystyn pepyll first tyme scottis began leir theologe haly writ clerkis quhilkꝭ war send uictor pape thair eruditioun albion ☞ ¶of kyng ethodius secund hovv nobyllis fyndyng hym • nabyll gyde realme gouernit samyn thair auctorite gret 〈◊〉 ca xvii donald deceissit maner ethodius secund name sonne ethodius first maid kīg nurist ile man vnder wyse preceptouris thairof howbeit vncertane quhat maneris wald incres quhen put lyberte quhen declarit kyng frely delyuerit preceptouris apperit dull ingyne mair abyll gadder rich insaciabyll auarice gouerne ane realme becaus nobyllis pers • uit hym euyll gouernance thay gydit realme thair prudent constitutionis gude iustice followit prudent men put euery schyre baith punis criminall personis kepe pepyll ony extorsionis sic diligence maid yat misdoaris war punist na man punist bot according lawis defendit samyn speke ony criminall personis iugement spake said personis war reput participant thair cryme attoure quhare ony trubyll apperit seditioun samyn haistely • sit britonis leuit al tyme gude peace vnder trybute romani durst pretend na rebellyoun aganis thaym seuerus emprioure tuke sic pleggis thaym afore deith thay war constranit leif peace siclike scottis pychtis duryng tyme ethodius nothir tuke iniure romani britonis quhyll last kyng ethodius slane gard xvi ȝeir regne becaus ouir mekyll geuyn auaricious gadering sa endis heir fift buke thir • roniklis heir begynnis sext buke croniklis scotland ¶hovv athirco vvas maid kyng scottis hovv nobyllis conspirit aganis hym cursit tyrannyis hovv slevv hym self disperation ca primo nocht lang efter slauchter ethodius nobillis cō uenit publik coū sall maid athirco sonne ethodius afore deceissit kyng yocht ȝoūg ȝit dispēsit ye nobillꝭ notwithstādyng age apperit begynnyng empire prudent gratius subdittis delytyng doctrine letterit mē sic knew haly wryt hystory progenitouris weill exercit werslyng othir corporall exercition cumyng ingyne strenth body sa lyberal yat tyistit pepyll fauoure ȝit grew nocht virtew grew age efter yat roung viii ȝeris become ylk day mair vnplesand ay ye mair vicious yat procedit ȝeris▪ like ane monsture degenerat fra al honest exercitionis geuyn vnsaciabyll auarice doyng ylk thyng mair ire dredur thā beniuolence gud counsal thus tint auarice al freindis yat conquest afore liberalite nocht onely īuoluit thir crime bot kynd corruppit vice lust yt micht make hym effeminat tuk sic delyte syngaris sportouris menstralis yat eschamit nocht pa sycht al pepyll playing ane flute nobyllis thouch • vnworthy gouernit sic ane monsture desyrit erar schaw hym ane fydlar ane virtuous prince war commouit eik ȝoung mē wykit exempyl war ylk day mair drownit lust dammage thair commoun weill laik iustice seand thair king sa inuoluit euery kynd vyce tuke na solicitude gouernance realme bot gaif occasioun ylk day mair mair aganis hym argyle ane man gret auctorite namyt nathalak quhilk two douchteris excellent beawte athirco aduertist thaym corruppit rutouris ceissit nocht quhyll deflorit thaym baith▪ quhen lust saciat causit mischeuous rebaldis fulȝe thaym samyn maner nathalak herand yir cruelteis done dochteris seirchit ingyne quhat way micht best reuenge samyn ye mene tyme maid consolatioun douchteris knawing weill thair bodyis mair violat thair myndis morrow conuenit freindis ane counsal complanit heuyly ye defloration dochteris incontinent allia freindis ruschit harnes maid solempne votis punis tyrane demeritis morrow mony al ye nobyllis assistit thair opiniō com doūstafage quhare vicius king remanit ye time nois ratlyng armit men maid na lytyl effray amang commonis thayr first cumyng nochtheles fra ye caus wes maīfest yair assēblance pepyl gaderit fast partis assist thaym army thocht nocht baith tyrane worthy degradit auctorite punist knawlege petitionis said empyre kyng nathala • sall haue ane haisty myserabyll end ane maist famyliaris murray nocht content sa general responce prayit hir schaw name specyall suld sla ye kyng scho answerit thow sall sla hym murray began chyde wyche saying thow deuyne nocht bot sayis thow pleis flattery malyce thow sall fals sall refuse na kynd deith attempt sa odius cruelte murray hauand na othir answer richt astonist maid hym return kyng ȝit afore cumyng kyng changi • purpos oft reuoluyng mynd quhat dangeir mycht follow gyf 〈◊〉 ye answer ye wyche schew 〈◊〉 kyng oft musand gud •• yl thairof knawyng weill quhat dāgeir stude gif ye kyng tuke ony suspitioun hym efter lang musyng fullely resoluit erar sla kyng wiche schew ay leif dangeir ly • e last quhē cumyn kyngis secrete chalmer allone kyng▪ began lang circumstance schaw wounderful slychtis operatioun wyche mene tyme king sa trublyt flux wambe cōstranit haistely pa eys al sone murray saw kyng quiet pullit furth dageir draue ye kyng ye hart suspeckand na thyng le thā sic treason kest body closet syne stall away ane priuate postrome first mā schew deith kyng conspiratouris end maid nathalak ye xi ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun iiclii ȝeris tyme galienus maist febil empriour afore hym tyme xxx tyranni inuadit commoun weill rome gret afflictionis ony resistance contrar ¶of kyng fyndok hovv dantit ilis vvas slane tvva men thairof ca iii nathalak tyrane slane maner ye nobyllis send murray pentland bryng ye thre sonnis athirco dounstafage ye eldest thaim namyt fyndok ane lusty vailȝeant prince maid kyng kepit gud peace nychtbouris romani britonis conquest freindis mair beniuolence tha • ony feir mynassyng bot oft fallis amang w lang peace intertenit vncouth pepyll generis ciuill contentionis amang self donald ilis reuenge slauchter nathalak come ane gret power ī murray ro gret heirschippis slauchter pepyll becaus thay fauorit ye slaa • nathalak freind fyndok punis thir attemptatis come haistely ilis faucht donald put hym flycht donald discomfist maner fled see quhare fand ane bait enterit sic multitude folkis scho sank within ane myle land pepil hir perist howbeit men ilis war brokin chance battal thay ceissit nocht fra thair vndantit malyce▪ bot che •• donald quhilk sonne donald afore perist thayr capitane inuadit ye cuntre mair trubyl afore fyndok punys thir conspiratouris returnit ilis slew ye war apprehendit thair opinioun syne kest strenthis cuntre na refuge sall remane thair returnyng donald afore kyngis cumyng fled ireland efter kyngis departing returnit ilis seand cuntre heri •• freindis slane kest hym thyng slycht yt mycht nocht force send ane messyngeir bene penitent offence fyndok desyrit grace kyng mouit piere condiscendit thir desyris sa yt said donald come principal mouaris rebellion wappynnis dounstafage vnderly wyll donald nocht content haue peace maner chesit erar vnderly chance fortoun kyngis wyll thairfore cō plet treasonabyl purpos hym deuysit send two men subtyle ingyne dounstafage await sū ganand tyme sla kyng thir two men fenȝeit thaym gentyll men ye ilis ennymes donald thair first cūmyng thay gat lytyll credence bot last menis carance kyngis brothir thay war admyttit ye kyngis presence maid sa famyliar thay war deput kyng sit baith priuat publik materis last quhen thay persauit carance set slauchter kyng conques ye crown thay opinnit thair mynd hym na thyng suspendit thair purpos bot large ꝓmes tyistit thaym mair samyn within schort tyme efter ye kyng went ane huntung besyde doūstafage sla ane wolf sat ane mote nocht knawing thir lymmaris war set slauchter last quhen faid brocht ye wolf afore houndis skry arais ylk mā went gam thus wes kyng left alone ony cumpany except thir two ilis men thā ane thaym began hald ye kyng talk quhyll tothir tratourusly come behynd hym draue hym throw body ane hountyng staffe al sone thir tratourꝭ slane ye kyng thay left ye staf stikand throw body huntaris returnyng fra thair game fyndyng ye kyng slane followit sa fast slaaris thay war baith takyn • demandit scharp punytioun quhat occasioun thay slew ye kyng thir tratouris spreit lytyll affrayit cōfessit pertly ye cryme schawyng thay war instruckit donald ilis carance sla kyng quhen thay discouerit ye treason said thay war baith put maist terribyll deith ¶kyng fyndok slane x ȝeir regne quhylk tyme floriane empriour body buryit efter vse cristin prince gret lament pepyl ane ryche sepulture nocht far fra dounstafage ¶hovv carāce vvas banist brotheris slauchter donald • cund maid kyng deith syndry nobyll clerkis ca iiii carance secund sonne athirco herand treason sa manifestly confessi • ye slaaris fyndok fled italy quhair wan gret fame honouris weris dioclesiane aurelius empriouris sall eftir schaw fyndok slane yi maner brothir donald ye secund name thrid sonne athirco wes maid kyng prince wes takand auisement nobillis quhat maner mycht maist esalie reuenge slauchter brothir fyndok quhen suddanlie come tythyngis ye said donald ilis wes cumyn ro inuadyng ye pepil thairof heirschippis cruelteis kyng donald mouit thir attemptatis come haiste • ie murray ane certane chosin men commandit generall proclamatioun vnder pa • e deith al sensabill men follow 〈◊〉 • ary cumyn 〈…〉 wes bot ane nowmer▪ partit army ane gret strenth abide ye cumyng remanent army donald ilis seyng kyng small power tuke purpos ieoperd hym ye chance fortoun tary come sa scharp battall kyng ye kyng mycht nocht vse ordinance bowis speris bot constranyt haistelie fecht wt swe • dis followit ane terribill scharp bargane quhil last kyng donald ouirset gret multitude pepyll fechtand aganys hym wes tane wt iim mē army iii thousand slane kyng donald finalie tuke sic malancoly deceissit thrid day eftir wes tane first ȝeir regne thir dayis wer mony clerkis singulare eruditioun quintus tortulianus wrait mekyl aganys errouris gentylis pylocratis bischop ephesei quhais tyme wes gret contentioun concernyng ye cerimonys pasche cipriane oratoure quhilk renuncit errouris gentilis become cristin eftir wrait sindry bukis eruditioun cristin pepill ¶hovv mony haly men vvar martyrit faith crist hovv donald ilis thrid name vsurpit crovvn▪ vvas slane craithlint ca v cristin faith sufferit gret persecutioun tyme mony haly men wemen martyrit cipriane sextus laurence hipolitus barbara cecilia agatha mony otheris throw tyrany decius empriour tyme scottis began rycht profound theologie haly writ doctryne certane monkis quhilkis wer callit thay dayis culdey say honoraris god thā al preistꝭ ye honorit god war callit culder thir prestꝭ general vocis chesit ane bischop haue auctorite iurisdiction aboue thaym wes callit bischop scotland bot return historie eftir deith kyng donald▪ gret truble followit realme donald ilis sa mony nobillis tane last battall held thaym si captiuite nothir thay thair freindis durst attempt ony thyng aganis desiris throw quhilk tuke ye crown nocht onlie habandonit cuntre bot thirllit ye nobillis assistance howbeit thay lay ay wait sla hym quhen tyme place mycht appeir donald knawin yair hatrent aganis hym tuke sic feir lyfe gaif na man credit bot vse tyranni euery man suspitioun dredour thus grew ilk day terribill odius pepill gouernit realme na better ȝeil gat last dredour procedit sa far durst cum na opin place gard armit mē hym halbertis axis inhibit ony othir man beir wappynnis saiffyng awin gard finalie culd nocht satifyit mynde quhill slane thaym suspeckit confiscat thair guddis fauour yame assistit hym intendyng ane bludy monstoure conserue ye crown siclike cruelte gat slew al mony othir nobillis vane causis promoue men vile obscure lynnage rich honouris ony sycht virtew reiosit na thyng sa mekill gener frequent seditionis amang subdittis traistyng thair seditioun haue felicite thair concord haue trubill crown wes said cruell tyrane leuch neuir bot quhē hard discord slauchter nobillis al sone hard ye confiscat thair guddis ony sycht wrang reason sayd oftymes amang familiaris na sycht mycht mair plesand hym se men murdir othir attour slauchter nobillis riche men ar rycht necessar ye tranquillite realmes becaus thay ar ennymes baith kyng commoun weil quhen tyrane roung xii ȝeris maist cruelte aboue pepill ony tityll come enuerlochte purpos pa ilis bot wes slane ye first nycht come yair craith lynt sonne kyng fyndok afore reheirsit xii ȝeir regne craithlynt eftir slauchter tyrane schew ye nobillis put doun tyrane donald ilys restit thairfore ganand occasioun reuenge gret oppression cruelteis done sa mony ȝeris vnhappy counsalouris nobillis glaid tyranni slauchter ruschit haistely harnes slew samyn nycht iic principall assistaris opinioun remanent chasit athole quhilkis wer slane sone eftir pepill quhen thay wer aduertist donaldis slauchter ¶of kyng craithlynt hovv scottis pichtis fell contentioun thair huntyng▪ faucht vvith gret slauchter sydis ca vi donald tyrane slane yi maner crown wes restorit blude athirco ¶for craithlynt son findok becaus slew last tyrane sa vailȝeantlie wes maid kyng craithlynt glaid felicite gaif thankis subdittꝭ detestit lāg orisō afore ye coūsal ye tyrāny donald ilis usurpar crown ony tityll gydyng samyn treason falset reif slauchter nobillis exhortit pepill sen tyrane prudence wes distroyit reiose suffir nane said donaldis blude liue auenture thay nuris sic displesour thaym self thair non aduertence sum tyme dyd king donald fechtand vnwarly ye said donald ye ilis quhair throw ye nobilite scotland oppressit xii ȝeris sic tyrannyis na man mycht resist samyn thir reasonis desyrit thaym assist hym repare oppressionis done cruelte said donald ilis quhilk thyngis beand done materis mycht succede schort tyme thay desyrit nobillis na le mouit excellēt beawte lustynes person wordis swore take part al materis nocht lang efter al ye lynnage donald ilis socht partis slane ony difference thair estait sic thyngis done craithlint chesit wyse 〈◊〉 men iustice throw al boū di • realme syne past ane certane nobyllis montanis grāȝebene pa tyme huntyng mene tyme come hym ye ambassatouris thelargus king pichtis schawing hym reiosit yt ye tyrane donald ye ilis • lane crown restorit natyue blude desyrit thairfore auld band peace renewit weill baith thair realmes thir desyris war plesandly grantit ambassatouris honorably depeschit nocht lang efter certane nobyllis pichtis come hunt kyng granȝebene pichtis thair huntyng stentit strang nettis lesuris medois draue hertis apone nettis thair hundis quhē ye beistꝭ eschapit thay cloithit thaym wt brāchis leuis treis lik stalkaris sine slew deir braid arrowis dartis quhen thay war lyand wery scottis na thyng content game becaus cō trar thair lawis gart remoue thair nettis hunt thair maner takand pray swift hoūdis allanerly pichtis seand thair hoū dis le reputatioun ye scottis baith bewte swiftnes lang renk hardyment desyrit ane certane euery kynd hoūdis geuyn thaym yt samyn micht bred amang thaym self quhen thay gottyn euery kind yairof geuyn thaym thay desyrit thay stale ane certane houndis went ham • ye samyn ony aduise scottis amang thir hoūdis tane said thir pichtis ane quhyte hound plesand mair spedy thā ony othir quhō craithlint ī maist delite maister hūtis astonyst throw ye wantyng hound followit sa scharply yt fand ye samyn sa feruent ī recoueryng thairof yat finaly slane skry arrais efter slauchter maid ye nobillis cōmonis scotland returne ī maist fury reuēge ye pichtis ye samyn maner gaderit tothir syde na le fury resist throw quhilk followit ane haisty myscheuus battall gret slauchter ilk syde nane thaym knawing ye motiue occasion thairof vnhappy bergane wer slane lx scottꝭ gentyl men gret nowmer cōmonis pichtis mo ane hundreth fame vnhappy battall diuulgat cuntre mouit ye freindis thaym war slane seik vengeance mair hatrent afore thus gaderit thay agane al sydis faucht capitane baner ordour cheuelry neir vter distruction thaym baith alwayis ye scottis war discōfist iiim thaym slane iim pichtis slauchter thir two pepyll yt sa lang cōfiderat togidder fra tyme fergus first kyng scottis thir dayis ay risyng vnder ane blude amite kyndnes grew maist hatrent aganis otheris ane sponk small occasioun vnkindnes hrow quhilk nane yame apperit ceis fra vter extreminion othir followit sa mony bludy cursionis day nycht y• na houssis respect age mycht defence refuge contrar thair cruelte slauchter athir syde ☞hovv carance brothir findok returnit italy vvith gret rich ī albion hovv conquest vvestmureland maid peace betuix scottis pychtis ca vii thelargus kyng pichtis richt agit nere consumit ȝeris sorowfull contention fallyng betuyx two pepyll sa lang confiderat cumyn suddane pertinacite vndantit ꝑsonis send hꝭ oratourꝭ craithlint schawand hym na le displesit slauchter trubyll fallyng scottis awin pepyl tendit dāmage baith thair commoun welis attoure na cryme micht impute hym neuir consentit thairto sen ye said trubyll cumyn mair priuat publict auctorite thoucht y• pepyll sa lang confiderat suld put end thair werꝭ haue peace othir gif thay ꝑseuerit ire hatrent aganis othir nocht sal follow bot vter ruyne baith thair realmes ye samyn fall pray romani forthir reddy repair al offence iniuris done pepil scottis desyrit haue peace y• baith ye pepil micht erar returne concord defence thair realmes thā perseueir ī battallis ye finall euersion thaym baith scottis war sa impacient ye recent slaucht maid thaym pichtis yt thir oratouris micht skarsly purches licence schaw thair message nochtheles thay gat finaly presence▪ schew yair desyris craithlint maner afore rehersit answerit king craithlint na thing micht cū sa displesand hym suddane trubill fallyng amang▪ thay pepil quhilkis he bene lāg confiderat togidder ī amite blude youcht peace war mair plesand pepill thā battall ȝit ye recen • slauchter sa deip ingrauin ī thair breistis yat thay refuse gif peace nochtwithstandyng wald gif awin auctorite thre monethis trewis yt nobillis baith thair realmis may ꝓfoūdly resoluit pa repas decerne quhat done trewis tane maner war plesant kyng pichtis beleuyng thairthrow put ane end thir debaittis displesourꝭ following ye ȝit nochtwithstanding thir trewis sindry incursionis war maid athir syde quhill sic thyngis occurrit betwix scottis pichtis carance secund brothir findok quhome schew banist afore slauchter wā gret honouris ī italy carāce efter proscripption ane man armis romane weris howbeit nane knew nobil blude▪ wan sic fame manheit • proues na capitane repute mair worthy haif chargis empriour nocht lang efter carance send dioclesiane empriour ane flote schippis defende costis normandy picardy fra iniure saxonꝭ franche men othir pirattis quhylkis inuadit samyn frequent iniuris cumyng wald noch • ieopard hym aganis ennymes quhil thay war ladyn ful rich guddis fyne fra pray war tane mycht enrichit thair ȝit becaus nothir delyuerit pray thairof ye empriour capitanis haldyn suspect persewit deith al • one carance vnderstude empriour mouie sic hatrent aga •• pullit vp salis come 〈◊〉 weirmen rich 〈◊〉 seis westmureland ane 〈◊〉 britane nocht far fra lā •• scottis pichtis traistyng haue sum rescours thaym aganis romani sone efter set army land smal difficulte gat pepyl thairof randerit hym sic thingis done send oratouris craithlint nepot schawand youcht banist suspitioun slauchter brothir fyndok inuy wikit personis brocht gret misery trubyl thairthrow ȝit innocent thairof gouernit hym sa wysly efter syndry chargis geuyn hym empriour send ane flote schippis pecify occiane seis samyn he gret honour rich ȝit becaus empriour mouit aganis hym inuy detractourꝭ cumyng sic army ryches westmureland yt he brocht ye inhabitantis thairof opinion thus ferme esperance gif scottis pichtis wald cō cur hym ding romani albion power romani dayly wastit britane sa gret rebellyon maid aganis thaym partis thay mycht send na support britane thus mycht scottis pichtis haue ane ganand tyme dyng romani britane kepe hym thair natyue blude empire thairof swa thay wald remoue hatrent sedition rysyn amang thaym haue peace othir craithlynt thocht kyndnes eme carance nocht refusit • hym cumyng britane sa gret pissance reddy support hym ī dangeris thairfore answerit thir oratouris yt mony ȝeris gone forȝet offence gyf ony maid fader reiosit nocht lytyll present felicite fallyng enie carance wald fulfyl hꝭ desyris sa far micht al pointis aganis ye britonis▪ gif micht haue peace pichtis yocht mycht haue nane suld send support ane cumpany chosyn mē bot hꝭ sel • behuuit abide hame defence realme aganis said pichtis carance glaid answer stuffit al ye strenthis westmureland come ane cumpany weill accuterit men yt wa • tir esa nocht far fra wall adriane quhare met craithlint fell kneis first metyng▪ declaring hym mony euydent reasonis innocent fyndokis slauchchter desyrit kyng haue hym na suspitioun yocht bannist inuy hatrent amang vncouth pepell ȝit behauit hym self sic maner returnit albion baith honour hym self freindis craithlynt embrassit enie carance maist tenderly prayit hym stand gud freinde suld leif na thing purpose sen gret honour proffet gif fortoun war propiciant mycht succede samyn promittit gif pichtis weris war nocht impediment hym • uld nocht faill support hym vter pissance carance reiosyng kyngis beniuolence said sufficient army expell romani brytane transfer ye crown thair lynnage scottis gif scottis pichtis wald assist hym finaly prudent industry carance baith thir two kyngꝭ war brocht togidder accumpanyit ane nowmer ylk syd brīg thaym mair sycker concord carance began remembir thaym auld affinite betuix thaym cōmodius contrar violatioun thairof full dammage thaym baith remēberit thaym thair frequent cheuelryis sa lang continewing aganis fury romani britonis defence thair realmis lyberteis sic amite kyndnes iniuris done ony ane thaym war repute equale yame baith thir reasonis necessar thaym othir haif peace othir thair commoun weill elli perseueir battall distruction thaym baith thir siclike wourdis two kyngis war ꝑsuadit haif peace repair iniuris athir syde sone efter viii newtral ꝑsonis gret prudēce war chosyn baith thair consentis quhome peace finaly roborat al iniuris plesandly redressit ¶hovv carance support scottis pichtis slevv bassiane capitane britane tuke crovvn thairof deith hovv crovvn britane vvas restorit romani ca viii nocht lang eft quī tus bassianus capitane britane rasit camp inuade ye said carance cummyn ȝork thre gret buschementis scottis pichtis otheris freindis gottin samyn randerit hym ony offence inhabitantis bassianus nochtwithstandyng ye frequent rebellion maid aganis romani partis ȝit reuenge attemptatis done carance rasit army par • samyn within ye nycht betuix two mossis ane strait groūd carance nocht x mylis fra hym weil aduertist doyngis come forthwart samyn maner gif hym battall morrow bassianus arrayit folkis exhortit thaym remembir thay war fecht defence equite aganis certane fals conspiratouris specially aganis ye treasonabil murdresar carāce maist odius creatour god detestabil offence forthir prayit thaym haue respect ye romane virtew quhilk he ben ay sa gret estimatioun baith afore immortall goddis men thay mycht haue reward victory nocht infinite ryches bot perpetuall louyng thair posterite othir syde carāce na le diligēt exhortīg hꝭ army battal sayng yair ennymes gret disauantage fecht thaym becaus ye maist part yame wer britonis hauād na le hatrent aganis romani he wald leif yame quhen thay saw ony dangeir occurryng thairfore victory wes present thair handis gyf thay manheid prudence ferslie ruschit yair ennymes al sone baith armyis blast trumpat iunit britonis left ye romani went thay bene fleand gud array nixt hyll romani seyng thair sydis nakit fleyng britonis wer astonist▪ myndfull yair sing • lar weill ony glore victory finalie thay wer sa deieckit thair curage thay wer put flicht quhom followit carance army maist hatrent slew yame ay quhare thay wer 〈◊〉 bu • ony miseratioun carance •• sa huge slauchter maid chace▪ callit folkis • ound •• umpat standart yi battall • er slane quintus bassianus capitane britane hirciꝰ procuratour mony othir nobillis commonis thair blude residew britonis quhilkis wer escuapit fra battall wer randerit carance gaif pledgis noblest wer yair realme▪ nocht within xx ȝeris aboue lx ȝeris trew subdittis tymes cumyng al sone praye guddis fallyng chance battall wes deuidit amang victoriꝰ pepill carance past london quhair wes ressauit gret reuerence tuke ye sceptour diademe britane contrar empire romani eftir yat wes maid tributar iulius iiicxlvi ȝeris carance crownit yi maner held iim scottis pychtis continewally hym maner ane gard remanent scottis pychtis returnit hame richit spulȝe last battall carance princely reward thair laubouris gaif landis lyand betuix wall adriane ȝorke namyt westmureland cumber thair perpetuall dominioun throw liberalite come gret hatrent baith romani britonis howbeit wes oftymes assailȝeit thaym wt scharp battallis ȝit wes victoriꝰ iornays brukit ye crown britane crafty prudence quhil last wes slane vii ȝeir regne alectus romane capitane alectus eftir slaucht carance set extreme besynes bryng britonis agane romane lawis quhē saw thay mycht na wayis brocht thairto cruell hatrent thay aganis romani maid laubouris haue thair beniuolence finalie applaudit yair opinioun tuk crown britane contrar auctorite romani ȝit rang na better fortoun dyd carance wes slane samyn maner asclepiadotus thrid ȝeir regne eftir quhais deith ye crown britane wes restorit wes afore romani ¶of gret cruelte done dioclesian emprioure aganis cristin pepyll hovv coell vincust romani cōquest crovvn britonis hovv vvas alliat vvith constantius empriour natiuite gret constantyne ca ix dioclesiane emprioure yi tyme vassalage constantius maximianus galerius dantit warld sindry chance battall wes first romane emprioure yt wes adorit kingly reuerence afore thay dayis emprioure vsit nocht bot salutationis emprioure causit riche perle precious stanis set schone mair taikin insolēce ony ornament afore yat tyme wes na difference betuix empriouris vthir pepil except rob ryal dioclesiane wes sa odious bludy tyrane xviim men wemen wer martyrit hym defence cristyn faith cruelte nocht onlie enragit eist west partis warld bot al britane aboue thir cruelteis infinite nowmer yame wer condampnyt galionis wynnyng querrellis mynis hym also wer brynt innoumerable bukis cristin faith contenand euangellis crist ye actis epistillis appostollis traistyng thairthrow faith crist suld vterlie expire throw quhilk ye cristin faith ouirthrawin wt new scurgis perseuerand cruelte wes neir perist mony haly relligious men feir thir cruelteis fled desertis elraige placis quhair thay wer exonerit truble leiffit ane haly lyfe dispitfull tyrane dioclesiane eftir sindry triumphis maid rome victoryis diuers pepill warld wes trublit punition god mony vncouth infirmiteis slauchter sa mony innocent pepill become furious salonas slew hym self drynk vennome xx ȝeir regne exampill na man put confidence felicite eternall lyue vane fauour assentatioun pepil quhil sic thingis wer done dioclesian coel discendyng anciant nobill blude britonis wes solistit thaym rebel aganis romani asclepiadotus aduertist heirof met hym ye army romani othir stude opinioun followit ane aufull dangerus battall lang fochtin doutsum victory bot last ye romani wer discomfist asclepiadotus thayr capitane slane coel eftir victory wes maid kyng stabill ye realme hym sicker peace cō mandit generall edict romani otheris thair opinioun slane quhare euer thay mycht apprehendit constantiꝰ emprioure meit rebellioun come britane mony romane legionis aganis quhome went kyng coel ane army britonis defēd realme liberte nochtheles wes vincust army put flycht morrow constantiꝰ wes informyt britonis kyng coel wes natiue prince britane discendyng lang progressioun blude ryall thairof thairfore cōmiseratioun send ane herald hym schawyng gyf wald randerit othir briton kingis wer afore romani suld sufferit remane hꝭ auctorite kyng coel wes tyme trubillit gret infirmite cumyn surfet cauld walking weris aganis romani constantius heirand infirmite past mak hym consolatioun eftir maist tender embrasyng said constantius continewit kyng coell auctorite tuke douchter helene ane virgyne maist excellent bewte mariage ¶this affinite maid romani britonis beleue ane finall end al thair weris sic thyngis done cōstantiꝰ went vesy romane strenthis britane nocht onlie reparit yame quhare thay wer ruinus bot stuffi • thaym new prouisioun men vittallis syne commandit cietezanis euery town quhare come obeysant kyng coell duryng hꝭ life becaus wes freint • senat pepill rome▪ schort tyme eftir constantius ane sonne gottin new affinit • namyt constantyne quhilk 〈◊〉 singulare manheid prudence succedie eftir faderis deith 〈◊〉 imperiall wes 〈◊〉 priour gaif peace catholike kirk dotat mony riche templis landis iowellis hortatioun ye haly paip siluester returne mat • iall dedis yat constantius afore tyme britane constantius eftir ye deith dioclesiane h • uand britane france spanȝe peacifyit empire gaderi • ane army expell scottis pychtis westmureland cumber quhilkis wer geuyn thaym afore king carance eftir cummyng ȝork wes aduertist yat scottis pychtis wer stronglie gaderit resist hym becaus knew thay micht abyd lāg togi • der thocht best brek thaym lang tary samyn effecte abaid still sindry romani ȝork cōmandit ye britonis pa hame reddy return quhen thay wer chargit finalie quhen remauit certane dayis ȝork geuand extreme deligence brek pichtis fra scottis tuke sic malācoly becaus mycht nocht bryng purpos gude fyne fel ane hait feuer ye vii day eft deceissit quhais powder wes gaderit ane goldin veschell mony smelland odouris brocht funerall triumphe rome yi cōstantiꝰ haue schawin wes rycht thankfull cristin pepil nochyeles sindry britonis traistyng hym persew faith crist wc sic cruelie dioclesiane afore come scotlād quhare thay wer plesandly ressauit craithlynt ordanit maik yair residence ye ile man kirkis ereckit thaym catholik maner deuyne seruice yus wer auld rytis cerymonis gentilis quhilkꝭ indurit thay dayis abrogat first bischop wes amang thaym ile wes ane britone namit amphibolus quhilk prechit euangellis throw boundis scottis pychtis nocht onlie remouit al vane superstitionis bot laid sickir foundement ye cristin faith craithlynt kyng scottis dotat kirk singular deuotioun mony iowellis precious ornamentis gold siluer maid ane alter copper craftely closit lokkis quhilk wer gaderit ye rentis mali sindry lādis quhilkis wer geuyn king sustentatioun diuyne seruice wes ye first kirk wes dedicat amang w catholik maner first sait bischoppis callit sodoren howbeit ye reason thairof tynt roust ȝeris quhilk distroyis euery thyng craithlynt passyng tyme maner religious ciuil materꝭ wes ane nobill prince finalie deceissit xxiiii ȝeir regne ye first ȝeir empire gret constantyne empriour fra incarnatioun iiicxxii ȝeris fra beginnyng ye warld vmiiiiclxxxx ȝeris fra ye begīnyng ye realme scottis viclv ȝeris ¶hovv fyncormak vvas maid kyng scottis octauius kyng britonis hovv herculeꝰ romane capitane vvas slane octauiꝰ romani vincust hovv ye scottis pichtis come support octauius▪ chasit thraherus france ca x craithlynt deceissy • wyse succedit cosyng fyncormak thay wer brethir sonny fyncormake wes crownit first ȝere gret constantyne quhais tyme rais gret trubil albion ye cōmonis britane hauand extreme hatrent aganis tyranny cayus herculeꝰ capitane britane chesit octauius prince walis thayr kyng cayus herculeus dant yi rebellion rasit camp aganis octauius bot last wes slane army discomfist octauiꝰ traistyng na thyng sa gud vse victory maist rigoure come london eftir gottyn strenthis thairof randerit hym slew sindry nobill men britane thair assistance romani syne persewit romany deith quhair euir thay mycht apprehendit constantyne empriour punis rebellion send ane vailȝeant capitane namyt traherꝰ mony legionis britane quhom octauius wes put flycht ch • sit amang scottis traherꝰ insolent eftir victory chargit fyncormak send octauius ye inuasour romane prouince boūd hym punist rebelliō uthirwayis suld repute ennyme ye senat pepil rome wes answerit fyncormak yat resset nocht octauius iniurious romani bot allanerlye auld amyte betuix scottis britonis attoure mycht obscure honour maieste condiscend sa manifest prodition randir man ennymes yat socht refuge hym forthir gyf traherus inuadit hym onelie ye cause suld resist best way mycht bot ȝit gud wer afore mouit weir degeistely avise quhiddir romani he gottyn mair schame honour mair proffet skaith thair weris aganis scottis al tymes bygane traherus na thyng satifyit answer come al ordinance ȝork quhair wes aduertist fyncormak wes gaderit lxm scottis pichtis britonis support octauiꝰ nochtheles went forwart quhill come sycht ennymes fyncormak quhen baith ye armyis wer arrayit otherꝭ sicht send ane herald inquiryng traherus quhat mouit hym occasioun iniuris inuaid cōfiderat pepil thay wer ennymes romani traherus maid litill answer thairto bot cōmandit scottis pychtis pa haistely landis pertenand romani pay ane ȝeirly tribute yair procuratour ye senat pepill rome thocht expedient ony tary de liuer octauius punyst conspiration othirwayis thay suld haue sone experience quhat foly contempne empire romani fyncormak hauand thir chargꝭ dyffyance come forthwart army followit sone ane dangerus battall alwayis romani bene victorius wer nocht ane multitude landwart men hapnyt come rynnand doun ane hyl driuand away yair bestial fra dangeir ennymes apperit romani thay wer cumyn thair bakkis romani wer finalie discomfist battal wer slane xvm albianis xvim romani chace continewit fyncormak octauius romani quhill thay come ȝork quhair ye two kyngis wer plesandly ressauit ye nobillis britane octauius restorit crown thairof ¶the nobillis britane 〈◊〉 fincormak assistance 〈◊〉 octauius said feild •• ndis westmureland cumbe • clame kindnes thairof perpetually sweir neuir cum ye contrar thairof traherus knawyng na place sicker remane ī britane eftir victory fled ī france ☞ hovv octauius vvas put fra crovvn britane traherus romane capitane hovv said traherus vvas slane octauius restorit croun· fyncormakis deith ca xi romanꝭ vincust yi wise ane coū sal wes set ȝork quhilk ye nobillis britane cō cludit defēd yair realme libertie fra iniure romani suffi • na vncouth blude beir auctorite tymes cumyng aboue thaym attoure wes concludit extend marchis britane wal adriane expell scottis westmureland cumber nocht withstandyng aith promyse maid thaim afort quhil sic thīgꝭ wer done britane octauiꝰ come xm britonis scottis pichtis dwellyng westmurland bot last wes discomfist army put flycht mene tyme traherus capitane britane quhilk wes chasit schew afore france returnit two romane legionis xxm wageouris britane quhome octauius wes discomfist destitute support freindis finalie octauius hauand na confidence scottis pychtis violatioun faith come mouth number▪ quhair pullit vp salis went norroway traherus eftir yi victory ilk day incressit sic pissance britonis wer randerit hym nottheles exercit gret crueltes al nobillis cōmonis britan finalie restorit crown thair romane empire quhen stablit realme maner throw corruppit insolence eft sa hie felicite become maist vicious tyrane y• euir ony charge afore ī britane inuadit ye nobillis cōmonis thairof ithand heirschippis slauchter throw thir tyranny followit sic rebellioun aganis hym al partis wes finalie slane octauius heirand slauchter traherus returnyt fra denmark britane persewit romani sic cruelte yat na kirkis sanctuariis mycht refuge thaym maid distributioun officis auctoriteis freindis nobillis thocht maist expedient keip subditiꝭ iustice defend thaym fra iniure romani youcht seyn dyl ar found mē insolence quhē thay find felicite efter trubyll ȝit octauius alterit sic maner quhare sumtyme maist fals treasonabyll werkis become maist faithfull nobyll prince sone efter send ambassatouris kyng fyncormak sindry iowellꝭ desiring hym haue na respect ye offence maid hym aganis scottis pychtis tymes bygane bot leif amyte freindschip hym britonis tymes cumyng haif sicker kyndnes content westmureland cumber war perpetually annixit empyre scottis pychtis samyn maner carance gaue thaym afore kyng craithlint mony ȝeris efter octauius gouernit britane gud iustice quhill last sa brokin frequent weris randerit strenthis realme haue peace romani eld content pay auld tribute followit sicker peace mony ȝeris efter amang scottis pychtis brytonis albioun quhilk tyme fyncormak richt illuster glore cheuelry cyuyll materis lang infirmyte generit catare deceissit xlvii ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun iiiclviii ȝeris ☞hovv heresyis arrius vves condampnit hovv ireland tuke fayth crist hovv romak fethelmak angusiane contendit crovvne hovv romak vvas maid kyng slane efter tyranny ca xii tyme cristin faith apperit rise gret dignite nochtheles cursit heretik arrius began poyson vennymus doctrine saying crist nocht verray sonne god coequall coeternall fader bot different fra hym substance efter degeist consultatioun opinionis war condampnit counsall nicia mony othir vane errouris quhilkis wyl rehers tyme ☞ haue maid thꝭ trāslatiō mair pleseir lawir mē thā ony vane curius clerkꝭ quhom heresyis begynnis ☜ ¶ireland tyme tuke ye faith crist ane womā ye pychtis blude quhylk instruckit quene ireland faith scho instruckit hir prince kyng sa within schort tyme regioun
