thairof tuke faith mony othir pepyll ye eist west partis warld tuke faith samyn maner bot wyll returne hystory ☞ ¶fyncormak left behynd hym two sonnis eugenius xviii ȝeris age ethodius nocht ane ȝeir age thir sonnis fyncormak ye lawis afore rehersit micht nocht immediatly succede crown thairfore ane counsall set argyle theis kyng quhilk day comperit romak fethelmak angusiane cō tending crown thay war nepottis craithlint gottyn sindry brethir thre nere equal ȝeris freindis gudis romak clamit crown maist nobyl▪ cumyn ye blude ryal scottis bot al pichtis thairfore mony nobillis assistyng opinion augusiane clamyt crown consent fethelmak alledgit wes ane man reason experience wisdome thā wes romak wes abillar thairfore ye ministration realme mene tyme romak gaderit ane band armit men sla two cousyngis traisting ye esalie succeid crown thus rais na thing bot ire hatrene amang thre cosingis euery ane thaym cruellie set otheris slauchter lauboryng draw moniast nobillis thair opinioun alwayis maist nowmer nobillis assentit augusiane romak wes ane man mair ferocite wisdome cōtrar • u • iane wes reasonable ha •• nd nocht sa mony subtel fals 〈◊〉 romak nobillis seyng thaym abil na wayis b • • ht concord tuke final purpois deuide realme betuix thaym ȝit otheris prudēt men thocht samyn vnproffitable mycht rais perpetual seditioun dammage thair commoun weill finalie romak impaciēt lang tary birnand desyre haue crown gaderit ane army pychtis come arrayit battall aganis augusiane othir cosyng fethelmak augusiane send oratouris kyng pychtis praying hym foster na seditioun amang scottis pychtis solist cosing romak erat concord battall sen mycht haue thyng accordyng reason ony plee kyng pichtis thynkand thir desyris reasonabil tuk purpos returne hame nochttheles euill counsall freindis abaid gaif vnplesand answere vnplesand answer wes nocht onlie occasioun ye nobillis scotland assist augusiane aganis romak bot al haue pichtis extreme hatrent sone eftir angusiane aduertist romak lay wait slauchter gaderit ane army purpos erat end mater swerd ay leif dā geir lyfe romak impacient lang tary met hym maner followit ane sorowfull battall nochtheles augusiane wes discomfist baith hym self cosing fethelmak chasit ye ilis findyng na securite thair thay fled ireland augusiane doung albioun sort mony nobillis assistit romak declarit hym kyng ȝit ye custom tyranny conquest ye realme wekitlie gouernit maner nane familiar hym bot sa mony wer ennymes fyncormak sonnis sic thyngis done maid hym vesy boundis realme doyng iustice maner tyranny romak beand diuulgat throw ye cuntre causit eugenius ethodius sonnis fyncormak fle westmurelād thair finding na securite thay fled ile man followit gret truble scotland proscriptioun slauchter oppressioun nobillis fauorit augusiane ony difference age nobillis impacient suffer sic cruell tyrannyis cōuenit togidder secret writingis redres al oppressionis wrangis done hym syne gaderit ane army sic diligence tyrane romak knew nocht thair assemblance quhill thay wer cumyng hym ane arrayit battall within x mylis romak astonist thair cummyng fled pentland nochttheles sa ferslye inuadit ane buschement scottis followit hym slane syndry otheris scottis opinion ye thrid ȝeir regne heid borne ane staik throw al army mony gentyll men pychtis war slane tyme romak sic fauorit gouernance causit hym rage gret cruelte scottis ☞hovv augusiane vvas maid kyng scottis hovv maximus subdevvit britonis syndry victoryis hovv scottis pichtis inuadit othir vvith set battall hovv baith thair kyngis vvar slane scottis discomfist ca xiii romak tyrane slane maner augusiane returnit albion maid kyng quhyll sic thyngꝭ war done scotland brytonis grew insolent slauchter traherus romane capitane restorit crowne brytane octauius quhylk far run aige throw quhylk thay recouerit baith thayr munitionis landis lyberteis ¶constantius emprioure sonne gret constantyne send ane vaylȝeant knycht namyt maximus brytane dant brytonis ☞¶this maximus sone efter cumyng faucht aganis brytonis put thaym flycht ☞¶be vyctory put esperance subdew brytonis thay war afore seruytude ☞¶octauius kyng brytonis heirand thir tythyngis tuke sic malancoly deceissit thrid day efter efter deith octauius sonne fled ye ile man quhare remanit ethodius eugenius▪ vnknawin quhat brytonis nocht mekyll astonist discomfitoure gaderit ane new army mair pissance afore nochttheles thay war vincust chasit ye maner maximus efter thir victorijs past throw syndry boū dis britane gat mony pepyll randerit opinioun otheris quhilkis war repugnant war put wraik thair str • cassyn quhyll sic thyngis done britane rais gret trubyl scotland nectanus kyng pichtis reuenge slauchter cosyng romak wastit landis scotland syndry incursionis scottis resist violent deceptionis war constranit rise battall aganis pychtis nochtheles pychtis drew ane gret nowmer scottis quhilkis war mouit slauchter romak thair opinioun prouokit residew scottis ylk day battal nochtheles augusiane send ambassatourꝭ thaym schawyng hym desyrus peace geuyn weill baith realmes desyrie thaym deuoid iniutis concur togidder amyte thair faderis afore defēce thair realmis last quhen augusiane saw desyris repellit yt sleuth suld nocht occasioun insolence ennymes gaderit folkꝭ went furthwart gud array efter mony syngulare battallis vailȝeant mē baith ye armyis iunit saucht gret ire hatrent athir syde last pichtis war discomfist mony thair nobillis slane kyng nectanus chasyt quhyll come camelon sone efter cummyng thairto conuenit resydew nobillis ane counsall complanit lang orison baith slauchter cusyng romak ye noblis realme war slane hym desirit ane new army reuenge schameful iniuris done la • tly scottis pichtis mair set kyngis foly plesour thā thair cōmon weill concludit ane new army rasit aganis scottis boundis vnder thair empyre sone efter thay come said army wod calydon augusiane richt prouident 〈◊〉 doyngis knawyng pich • sa awfully gaderit aganis hym▪ assemblit folkis boundis realme erar draw pichtis concord haue battall thaym dred brytonis ꝑswasion romani cū support pichtis ye caus send plesand letterꝭ ye kyng pychtis praying hym remember anciant amyte kyndnes sa lang contynewing betuix two pepyll put end thair weris geif peace scottis ony battal samyn maner war victorius aboue thaym sen peace necessar baith thair armyis maximus romane capitane wirkand ylk day new attemptatis britane purposit al sone he subdewit britane conques baith ye realmes scottis pichtis efter yt thay haue distroyit othir ciuill weris king pichtis cōtempning profitab • l counsal hauand na thing le estimatioun peace rasit army aganis augusiane ye tothir syde augusiane arrayit army becaus necessar othir ieoparde hym ye chance fortoun elli geif backis ennymes irrecouerable schame exhortit mē haue curage set asyd al dredour gif thay ony remembring gret spreit manheid thair eldaris thay may acquite thair deith yocht thay faucht vnfortunat chance battal yt thay de nocht vnreuengit thair ennymes attoure prayit thaym nocht mouit youcht thay fecht aganis pepyll sa lang cōfiderat thaym amite blude sen thay gaue na occasioun battal he left na thing vndone mycht haue recounsalit thaym concord quhilk thay suld beleue y• god luffer peace suld fauour thaym thair iust defence tothir syde king pichtis ceissit nocht solist army battal incontinent ye archearis schot fydis efter thaym followit men licht harnes schot incredibill nowmer stanis ganȝeis corsbowꝭ slongis incontinent thay iunit speris axis swerdis followit ane terribyll battall fouchtyn lang tyme doutsum victory last angusiane seand victory inclyne pychtis raif coit armoure come amang commonis quhare faucht perseuerant hatrent deith scottis traisting thair kyng erat fled slane gaif bakkis otheris perseuerant mair obstinat mynd faucht quhill thay war slane yocht vyctory succedit pychtis ȝit vnplesand thaym baith kyngis war slane feild infinite nowmer nobillis commonis slane ylk side residew scottis pichtis quhilkꝭ war eschapit feild returnit hame wari • thaym first occasioun motyue battall betuix two pepyll sa lang afore confiderit togidder blude amite freindschip ☞ ¶hovv fethelmak vvas maid kyng scottis hovv slevv nectane kyng ef pichtis▪ vvas slane efter thair treason mony nobil clerkis ca xiiii augusiane slane maner fethelmak third nepot craithlynt maid king gaderit ye residew scottis togydder lytyll better fortoun two cosyngis afore secund ȝeir regne rasit army reuenge ye iniuris done pichtis come augus inuadyng ye inhabitantis thairof gret heirschippꝭ cruelteis pychtis rageand hatrent thir extorsionis ruschit ī thair maist fury harnes ye scottis nocht abasit yairof met thaym ye samyn maner put baith thair wyngis flicht sone efter discomfist ye middillward samyn maner gret murdir maid thaym ī al partis nectanus kyng pichtis brothir kyng nectanus afore rehersit brocht feild deceissit ye thrid day efter wound ane arrow scottis insolent efter victory wais • angꝰ fiffe ithand incursionis pichtis brokyn last discomfitoure set thaym erar stop ye scottis fra taking thair munitionis strenthis licht berganis thā ony set battal al thingis mair prudence thay chesit hergestꝰ ane mā sle fals ingyne thair kyng hergestus knawyng pepyll sa brokyn continewal weris mycht nocht reuenge iniuris scottis kest hym thyng slycht mycht nocht force conducit two men pichtis dissimi • fenȝe thaym scottis thay mycht mair esaly wait ane ganand tyme sla kynge scottis thir pichtis war crafty castyng dartis becaus ye kyng scottis tuke delectatioun ye game yall war maid mair familiar hym nochyeles thay socht ay ane ganād tyme place slauchter kyng fethelmak hapnit pa carrik quhare gret sollicitude day euyn went bed cōmandit ane harpar syng ane soft sang draw hym heuy materꝭ sleip al sone fallyn sleip two pychtis afore rehersit conuoyit harpar quhare lay slew hym sleipand bed ye thrid ȝeir regne wache herand granis ane deand man enterit haistely chalmer quhare ye kyng lyand bullerand blude incontinent thay followit slayaris sa scharply yat thay war tane quhen thay confessit ye maner circumstance treasonabyll slauchter thay war punist maist cruelly deith drawin syndry wyld hors slauchter fethelmak hapnit fyft ȝeir constantius emprioure tyme wa • mony clerkis profound euery scyence uictoryne oratoure donatus gramariour preceptour sanct ierome alcinus delphidinis philosophouris mony otheris quhilkis war ouir ꝓlixie rehers ☞ hovv sanct reule brocht sanct androvvis arme scotland▪ hovv kirk sanct androvvis vvas • hergest kyng pichtis▪ louyng thairof ca xv sanct reule haly abbot arriuit tyme albion sāct androwis arme reule ane monk 〈◊〉 borne achaya▪ abbot • n town patras quhare mony religious men war obeysant vnder cure ane thaym yt send constantius empriour • esy blissit reliquies sanct andro quhen said reule done deuotioun maist reuerence cōmandit ane heuynly visioun take arme sanct andro iii fyngaris iii tayis fut pa samyn ye far nuke ye warld namit albion reule monist visioun come said reliquies throw seis mediterrane portingale huge pyne trubyl come throw ye spanȝe franche almane seis arriuit town quhilk callit sanct androwis quhare thay war schip brokin na thyng sauit except ane nowmer haly men quhylkis come said reliquies thir tithingis diuulgat cuntre causit kyng pichtis pepyll cum riche offerandis partis adore reliquies ye haly appostyll sanct andro kyng pichtis pepil war ressault sanct reule fallowis ī thair religious habitis sangis ympnis othir diuine cerimonyis afferit hergestus fell kneis maist reuerence kist thir blissit reliquies gaif palice ryall richely biggit efter ye vse thay dayis sanct andro sanct reule otheris fallowis biggit ane kirk nocht far fra ye said palice dedicat honour sanct andro men sayis ye samin kirk ye standis ȝit cōmon kirk ȝard abbay callit auld tymes kirk sanct reule bot callit auld kirk sanct andro hergest dotat thꝭ kirk cowpis challicis basingis lawaris syndry othir riche iowellis gold siluer remane thair perpetually ye honour deuyne seruyce posterite kyng hergestus succeding efter hym scottis quhen pichtis exilit realme h • sanct andro maist reuerence patroun thair realme abbay kirk dotat efter kyng malcolne ye madyn kyng robert brus rentis landis possessionis mair largely abbay gouernance ane nobil mā iohne hebburne priour thairof ye tyme ye first compiling thir croniklꝭ priour ane wise prelat decorit thꝭ kirk mony riche ornamētis biggit ane wall square stanis ye kirk wall includis kirk sanct leonard quhare nouicis said abbay vthir scolaris lernis thair grāmer logik theology mony othir science naturall morall philosophy he sic continewal exercitiō yt mony resolute profound clerkis risis dayly gret virtew throw samyn kirk war first preistꝭ callit culdeyis bot ar channonis regular efter institutionis sanct augustyne geuand thair ingyne cō tinewall exercitioun letteris professioun thair religioun heirfore gif thow wyl haue respect letteral exercition thow sall fynd thair generall study euery science gyf thow wyll cōtemplatiue thow sal fynd thair maist honorabyll seruyce god heuynly delitious sang ī maist crafty music gif thow wyl haue sicht magnificence curious biggin thow sal fynd nane mair honestee admiration italy france almany biggit curiously nobyll man quhilk deceissit ȝeir afore cumyng thir cronyklis lycht na le dā mage commoun weill spredyng letteris ī realme amāg mony othir honorabyll werkis gretumly louit afore deith maid nepot patrik ane man syngular virtew eruditioun successoure compleit magnificent werkis afore began ¶the ȝeir sanct reule come reliquies sanct andro scotland fra ye incarnatioun iiiclxix ☞hov eugenius vvas maid kyng scottis hovv hergest kyng pichtis vvas confiderat vvith romani distruction scottis hovv maximus capitane britane inuadit scottis vvith gret cruelteis slauchter ca xvi fethelmak slane maner afore rehersit nobillis brocht eugenius ethodius ye sonnis fyncormak ile man quhare thay abaid eschewin fury romak augusiane fethelmak eldest thaym namit eugenius ye first ye name maid kyng maximꝰ capitane britane knawyng ye hatrēt betuix ye scottis pichtis na le desirus distroy thaym baith agment ye glore romane empyre deuisit sic ane subtyll slicht yt mycht first distroy scottis syne ye pichtis▪ wirk mater mair crafty slichtis send ambassatouris hergest kyng pichtis schawyng hym richt sorrowfull iniuris done hym scottis desyrit thairfor confiderat said kyng pychtis aganis scottis quharethrow • mycht happyn pepyl mycht rise sic pissance support romani britonis thay mycht othir thirll scottis maist vile seruytude elli expell thaym gyf thay plesit albyoun conques thair landis rowmes thaym thair posterite kyng hergest plesādly ressauit thir ambassatouris gaue thankis god send hym support sa extreme dangeir aganis cruell ennymes sayd plesit hym weill confiderat romani sa thay wald concurre hym pepyll reuenge iniuris done scottis ☞¶maximus condyscendit thair desyris traisting samyn cum hie felicite romane empyre ¶nocht lang efter concludit conuention hergestus maximus ȝork ye pychtis britonis romani salbe cō fiderat togidder tendir amit • scottis haldyn ennymes thaym all▪ efter conuentioun maximus send ane herald eugenius king scottis chargeand hym redres skaithis done pichtis delyuer mysdoaris kyng hergest punist plesour uthirwayis pepyll suld reput ennymes senat pepyll rome eugenius answerit neuir offendit romani britonis iniuris thairfore beleuit y• romani wald nocht sa wrangus inua • e hym battall reasonabyll motiue occasioun forthir v • derstude romani nocht gottin sic humanite kyndnes pichtis moue ony weir aganis scottis thā present sen thay neuir offendit romani alwayis content baith geif take redres pychtis thay quhilkis inuadis vthir iniuris tymes cumyng punys • cryme requirit forthir gif y• romani aduyse pichtis wald inuade hym ony iust occasion battal mycht na thing le thā cōmend gud actioun god punisar wrangis best mycht defence realme liberte ye romani weill apperis ar na le set exterminioun pichtis▪ scottis maximus efter answer assemblie ane large army romani britonis franchemen enterit westmureland ceissyng fra na maner cruelteis ye inhabitantis thairof garnist strenthis regioun romane sodiouris sone efter come annādale galloway▪ syndry vthir boundꝭ exercing gret cruelteis maner scottis herand sa huge multitude pepyll assemblit aganis thaym war affrayit nochyeles • na vthir remeid thay come partis scotland cō mand eugenius na le mā heid thā ardent desyre resyst yair ennymes faucht romani besyde watter cree quhare put flycht army discomfist sa gret slauchter maid brayis reuer yat fyllit full deid bodyis romani followit sa fast chace scottis quhyll last thay enterit ane new bergane ye men argyle thay war cumyn forthwart support eugenius army knawyng na thyng discomfiture quhen thay saw romani follow sic cruelteis scottis thay ruschit terribyl vissage noyis rummysyng said romani maid sic vndemꝰ slaucht thaym resydew scottis quhilkis war laitly diffait returnit battall chasit romani agane thair tentꝭ inuadyng thaym contynuall slauchter quhyll ye nycht put end thair laubour thꝰ chance battall variant ye first day betuix scottis thair ennymes romani nocht knawing counsall scottis howbeit mony thaym war slane stud houor nocht knawyng quhidder thay wald renew battal ye samyn nicht abyde day ȝit haue thaym reddy aganis chance mycht follow thay stuffit thair tentis maist crafty ordinance eugenius seyng morrow pepyll brokin sic innoumerable slauchter rasi • tentis within ye nycht come carrik quhair tuk lang consultatioun mycht arme hym best aganis al chance battal mycht follow maximus ye morow intendyng persew scottis new battall wes aduertist gret seditioun risyng britane speciallie amang thaym yat dwelt within ye romane prouincis thir nouellis causit hym desist fra purpos returne kent eftir garnist ye strenhis galloway men munitionis vittallis thir wer dedis maximus aganis scottꝭ ye first ȝeris ☞hovv maximus returnit gallovvay reuenge iniuris done scottis aganis pichtis hovv eugenius come vvith lm men resist romani pichtis britonis hovv vvas slane brothir tane▪ army discomfist ca xvii maximus ȝeir followyng wes sa ithandlie occupyir trubill britonis afore rehersit yt mycht nocht returne ye weris scottis nochtheles mony frequent incursionis continewit al said tyme betuix wageouris scottis last quhen scottis assailȝeit lāg tyme howbeit wes vane recouer ye strenthis galloway thay past throwe menteith striuilyng fyffe sindry othir boundis pychtis inuadyng sic cruelte thay wer left desert maximus apperit rycht heuy thir offencis howbeit na thyng wes plesand hym heir scottꝭ pychtꝭ inuadyng othir baith thair mischeiffis finalie come galloway wt purpos pa throw remanent boundis scottis wes eugenius nocht far fra romani abidyng cummyng pepill quhom comperit gret cōfluence sensabil men wemen nowmer fifty thousand pepil rycht desirꝰ fecht criand atanis huge noys othir de elli haue victory thay wer cruelly slane al ꝑtis quhare thay mycht apprehēdit romani ony mercy ranson nochtwithstāding thair gret curage thay wer sumpart astonist herand ye romani cummyng thair landis multitude pissance pepill euir wes sene ony thair boundis afore ȝit otheris hauand romane tyranny dispite wer rasit maist fury regardyng na thyng thair life defence thair liberte eugenius gret curage dissimulit contināce wer affrayit na thīg le romani deuidit army thre battallis richt wyng wes geuyn brodir ethodius left wyng doalꝰ capitane argyle myddilward wes hym self thir battallis wer arrayit sic craft ye place quhair battall wes set beleuit nocht onlie haue riuer munda deip ony furd bakkis army thay suld fecht refuge bot al haue ye sonne gangand siclik yair bakkis thair ennymes micht nocht hald vp thair eyn reflixioun contrar beymis thair sycht sic thyngis done eugenius went ane hie mote callit army standart said yi maner eldaris began realm continewall laubour brocht samyn honour day forcy campionis commandit thair posterite defend thair realme liberte quhilk maist dulce heuynly treasoure ye erd aganis al inuasouris hauand esperance victory quhen tyme wes fecht aganis yair ennymes na thing thā yair handis obeysant wyse nobill capitanis realme quhais auctorite prudence bene sicker targe baith thair guddis landis liffis aganis preis dangeir ennymes eldaris ar passit afore w wer ay obedient cōmand thair nobillis yocht thay haue touchtin oftymes sindry chan • battall aganis dantouris warld ȝit thay wer finalie victouris nowe mon fecht maist vailȝeant campionis sic manheid curage eldaris faucht afore w ellꝭ mon tyne oure realme liberte thirlly • maist vile seruitude wyll oure ennymes ¶now approchis maximus cruell vnmercyfull ennymy reif baith landis guddis gyf support nocht oure self grace god oure manheid sa ful fals ingyne slychtis confiderat pychtis al weill perditiō thaym w intēding yair throw bryng haill empire albioun howbeit samyn wes neuir hard afore vnder romane obeysance ¶the pychtis mischant foly passis battall support thair profest ennymes quhilkis ar rycht desyrus reif fra thaym yair kyngdome honouris thay come aganys w quhilkis wer ay thair protectouris sen first thair realme beganne vncertane quhat mischeif thir pychtis bene abusit nocht knawyng irrecouerabill dāmage yat fal yame euersioun thair common weill liberte youcht thay knaw thay gyf attendance thairto ȝit sa far pertenis actioun consider ennymes ar fecht aganis w quhome neuir offendit iniuris throw quhilk thair werkis salbe vnchancy mair odious god contrar remember ȝe ar resist thair inuasioun ȝour pur • defence ar fecht ȝoure realme liberte ar posteritie thay forcy campionis sumtyme maist gloriously chasit romani thir boundis cumyn sic poynt mon othir vincust suffir extreme miserie seruitude elli victouris stabill oure landis w glore honoure permanent eys beseik ȝow gud companȝeonis vnuincibill manheid faith virthew ȝour eldari • thair paill goist • quhilkis defendit ȝoure realme liberte thir dayis suffir nocht ȝow thair sonnis rest spul ȝeit ȝour realme liberteis gudis ȝit taikin catiuis vnderly thair tyrannyis gyf hapnis ȝow aduers chance quhilkis god defend de sa far ȝow acquit ȝour deith thynk better de honestlie leif schame knawe ȝoure self dotat incredibill manheid virtew heritouris ancyant lynnage al weill ȝour nobill faderis wisdome cheualrye thair landis nocht gaderit diuers nationis bot ane pepill vnder ane mynd seruandis eternall god geuis victory iust pepill reward thair virtew fals wrangus pepil schame discomfiture slauchter belt ȝow thairfore lusty gallandis manheid wisdome haue victory quhilk sall nocht fail succeid gyf ȝe constant curage haue na thyng bot schamful fleyng dredour inuaid ȝour ennymes siclik cruelte thay intend inuaid ȝow skarsly eugenius rasit spreit army hortatioun quhen maximus apperit sycht army come forth wart deligence wes beleuit come sone eftir sonne risyng ye scottis wer astonyst huge multitude ennymes nochtheles seand na refuge thay de • mit assailȝe extreme ieoperde army sone efir thay arrayit thaym thair bakkis sonne glance beymys thairof suld nocht impedimēt thair fechting skarslie wer thay weil arrayit quhē thay ruschit forthwart thair ennymes feirs rynnyng wes impediment maximus deuore nochtheles seand tyme sa schort exhortit army remember ye romane virtew affrayit barbar pepil quhom thay recently discomfist incontinent baith armyis sound trumpat iunit huge nois clamour sidis first contenyng wes cruelly fochtin wes vncertane quhat ꝑty maist dangeir succedit followit sindry chancis fortoun scottis ye faucht richt wyng vnder ethodious wyn na le honour glore set pychtis fornence thaym chasit thaym throw watter dune quhair mony yame ouirset slik glar yairof wer slane proud insolent glore thay bene sicker victory thay stragulit fra yair fallowꝭ cassin spulȝe throw quhilk mony thaym wer slane eftir ane romane legioun yat wes send maximus support said pychtis last wyng quhair doalus faucht scottis met franchemen britonis almanys quhair yai wer slane fechtand perseuerand manheid deith defence thair realm romane army command maximus ruschit myddill warde quhair eugenius faucht nobillis wery neir vincust multitude yair ennymes howbeit mony thaym feirsly repugnāt quhil thay mycht failȝeit na thyng yat pertenit forcy campionis ¶the nobillis faucht eugenius army seing victory inclyne romani desyrit eugenius saif hym flycht better fortoun incōtinent thay raif coit armoure par force mak hym vnknawin nochtheles abaid fechtand perseuerand malyce aganis romani wes slane ye thrid ȝeir regne quhil sic terrible murdir wes maid ī ye army scottꝭ al yair careage mē wer left keip thair bestiall vittallis hauand na armoure bot swerdis defend thaym seyng sa mony nobill men slane pietuꝰ commiseratioun ruschit thair ennimes wer al slane fechtand deith quhill romani wer followyng chace gre • ire hatrent yi maner thay fell ane vncouth maner bergane agit febyll personis yat war left hame vnfensabil bodyis rycht desyrus heir quhat chance fallyn thair sonnis come place quhare battall bot quhen thay saw sa pietuous lamentabyl slauchter maid thair sonnis freindis thay ruschit thair ennymes lyke •• riꝰ creaturis regardyng nothir life reason aige wemen come efter terribyll noyis rummysching wod rageand beistis set romani nochtheles baith aigit men wemen war fynalye slane romani passit nycht followyng sa huge feir dredoure na trinchis walkyng mycht sufficient munitioun thair army hyllis vali lesu • resoundit ye nicht maist terribyl spraichis ȝammeryng pepyll deidthr • w nocht hard bot ho • rybyll murnyng sobband deand pepyll cryand ane vengeance romani pychtis • uhais treasonabyll slychtis huge murdir maid thaym morrow maximus partit spulȝe feild amang army maid deid bodyis buryit schaw hym nocht degenerat fra romane mercy maid thaym war left lyffe sair woundit curit maist crafty surrigianis ¶amang quhome ethodius brothir eugenius tane▪ curit reuth maximus woundis▪ ¶hovv scottis gret cruelte pichtis vvar exilit albion hovv ye abbay cokil vvas foūdit ca xviii scottis discomfist wyse kyng eugeniꝰ found slane quhome maximꝰ gart bury funerall obsequies syne went victorius army throw syndry boundis scotland gat mony ye inhabytantis thairof randerit plesit pychtis desyryng vter exterminioun scottis tuke hie displeseir said scottis war sufferit wise leif albioun maximus maid hym mei thair indignatioun saying pertenit romane maieste haue na le mercy thair subdittis ferocite aboue thair conspiratouris rebellis ¶it alsua pr • pir romani conques pepyll mair beniuolence tyranny na thing micht degraid mair romane glore vse cruelteis thair subdewit pepyll becaus scottis war sufficiently punyst thair rebellyoun thair kyng slane thair army dyscomfist thair strēthis tane wald inuaid thaym na forthir punytyoun le thay conspirit new rebellioun ¶the kyng pychtis nobyllis na thyng satyfyit answer bot erar mouit mair indignatioun desyrit maximus mony gret perswasionis sla scottis euery part quhare thay micht apprehendit saying thay war thair profest ennymes borne thair vter exterminioun▪ reiosyng onelye murdir romani othirwayis romani thair confiderat freindis mycht haue na sicker felycyte albioun pychtis seyng thaym frustrat thair desyris began conuert thaym mair slycht fynalye corruppit maximus large money quhylk mouis mortall creaturis maist terribyll fellonyis purchest scottis monyst vnder pane deid pa albioun ane prefixt day thair landis rowmes mycht cū pray romani pychtis day byrunne scottis war exilit cōmandit vnder pane maist cruell punitioun neuir returne albioun ¶be proscriptioun sum thaym went ilis otheris ireland orknay france italy norroway denmark ¶efter proscriptioun men come syndry ladyis scotland arrayit thair dule habit doloure thair husbandis quhilkis war slane last battall desyrit maximus lamentabyll regrait suffer thaym leif catyuis resydew thair miserabyll lyfe within thair natyue land pray thair husbandis fynaly buryit thaym graif bot thai couth purches nocht thair dolorus teris bot plane repuls sa ladyis gentyll wemen war exilit samyn maner men thir doingis war occasioun maximus detest inhumaniteis cruell maneris pychtis pychtis rageand ylk day mair cruelte efter day generall proscription murderit scottis quhare thay micht apprehendit ony piete ransoun miseration thair estatis quhyll sic deligent serchyng maid partis cartandis quene scottis two madynnis ane seruand found sepulture hir husband eugenius neir consumit murnyng teris becaus scho prynce walis douchter scho brocht maximus ony displesoure maximus remembryng ye vnsicker stait man hauand compassioun hir sorrowfull chance met hir honest maner maid hir al consolatioun mycht prayit hir gud confort suld treit hir fy • tymes cummyng sone efter cloithit hir honest semely abulȝementis gaif hir town carrik syndry rentis possessyōis sustene hir ryal estait nochtheles cartandis nocht vnknawand fra quhat hie felicite scho deieckit plesandly ressauit ȝok seruytude quhen scho returnand said town carrik scho tane gait ane cumpany romani pychtis nocht onelye spulȝeit hir hors clethyng money iowellis bot al hir seruandis slane▪ hir madynnis fulȝeit maximꝰ aduertist outtrage c • issit nocht quhyll mysdoaris war punyst hir guddis restorit syne preseruit hir mony dayis efter fra iniure ennymes ¶on morrow pychtis come maximus complanyng heualy thair men war slane perswasyoun ane catyue womā ennymy thaim said thay deseruit othir kyndnes romani fechtand ye deith amplyatioun thair empyre aganis pepyl quhylkis thay war confyderat thay dayis desyrit thairfore cartandis suld exylit brytane amang hir freindis ¶ cartandis heirand thir wourdis said scho bot ane miserabyll • reature nakit hir husbād freindis wald mair miserabyll gif scho beand deiecki • fra hie felici • e repute sa vnworthy scho mycht nocht sufferit leif amang hir ennymes bot commandit leif dayly schame amang hir freindis howbeit war mair plesand hir scotland praying vailȝeant pepil slane hir husband duryng hir sobir lyfe leyf honoure ony pryncely estait fynaly quhen scho desyrit outhir put haistely deith elli sufferit leif scho desyrit scotland sic commiseratioun • ai amang romani mouit hir comploratioun scho licent contrar mynd pychtis remane scotland quhare scho lyst rentis possessionis effering hir estait sic thyngis done preistis monkis religious personis scottis blude war erilit maner scotland throw quhylk mony thaym come ilis byggit abbay colmekill quhare mony deuoit personis remanis ȝit oure dayis uncertane quhidder samyn mair plentuous haly wemen men quhilkis leiffis deuoitly thair secret housis quhare throw happenit abbay howbeit began soberly deuotioun pepyll princely rewardis maid cōmoun sepulture mony ȝeris ef • er scottis kyngis yocht ethodius brothi • eugenius otheris presoneris scottis war euyll woundit battal ȝit thay war exilit efter yair curing ye samyn maner sworne nothir pa ireland orknay ilis con • ranit thairfore pa norroway ¶ ȝeir scottis war exilit albion weris romani fra beginning warld v thousand vcxlvii ȝeris fra incarnatioun god iiiclxxix ȝeris fra begynnyng scottis albioun viicxii ȝeris secund ȝeir iuliane emprioure quhilk namit appostita becaus othir empriouris afore hym war catholik pryncis ane heretike ¶of syndry maru • lli • sene albioun hovv sctottis fled ireland ilis returnit scotland vvith gret povver▪ hovv thay vvar discō fist slane ca xix ȝeir eugenius faucht romani war sene mony vncouth meruellis albioun gret terroure ye pepyll ye nycht apperit mony swerdis wappinnis birnand air bot last thay ran al togidder ī ane gret bleis euanist sicht watter dune ran full blude brais schane nycht bene full ythand fyris ¶ mony small foulis fell ayre maner ane schoure incontinent come ane huge multitude rauynnis deuorit thaym howbeit deuynouris wod wemen schew thir vncouth wonderfull prodigy sygnyfyit exterminioun scottis ȝit thay war haldyn derysyoun pepyll inhybit geif faith sic fretis ¶ sic felicite succedyng romani scottis beand exilit albioun gyllo capitane ilis aduertist proscription ethoditis norroway esperance returnyng sic desyre recouer realme yat come ane gret power ī argyle ye mene tyme folkis wyde skatterit thair incursionis spulȝeis hapnit aduenture cum ane army pychtis laid defence ye cuntre quhome thay war finally chasi • slane thair schippis galȝeonis war brocht ye nixt port resist residew scottis▪ gyf thay happinnit returne ony new army men ilis brokin wyse dowbyll calamite baith slauchter tynsall thair schyppis na pyssance pers • w thair ennymes ony forthir battal residew scottꝭ eschew ye ire hatrent romani fled ireland pi • tuisly cōplanit afore kyng pryncis thairof yt thair kyng eugenius slane thair freindꝭ sumtyme maist vailȝeant marcyall dedis banyst albion tyranny romani britonis pychtis quhais cruelteis war sa odiously schawyn thaym yat na estait aige war sauit bot dreuyn preis battall vncouth realmis leif ī powerte seruitude thus thair nobyll anciant realme sa lang defendit vailȝeant • āpionis thay dayis brocht vter exterminioun insaciabyll auarice romani geuin pray britonis pichtis reward thair falset • reason desirit thairfore luf tendernes nature crafty modir creatouris he ordanit ye parētis haif thair child support thaim aganis thair vnmercifull ennymes scottis sumtyme descendyng thair blude reiosyng realme scotland aboue viic ȝeris nocht brocht vter confusioun romane weris sen thay ar cumyng thaym thair sycker anker last refuge extreme neid pryncis ireland mouit commiseratioun sorrowfull chance fallyng scottis thair natyue pepyll send x thousand irelād men thaym albion recouer thair realme army come carrik▪ kyle cūnynghame ceissit fra na maner cruelte britonis pychtis war found thay boundis herdur stane brothir hergest kyng pychtis afore rehersit beryng sa gret cruelteis done pichtis come haistely ane army inuaid ye scottis nochtheles put flicht army discomfist scottis tuke aduysement quhat wes done sum allegit howbei • victory succedit assailȝe nocht ye chance fortoun ony forthir bot efter plesand victory returne ireland riche spulȝe • n guddis takyn thaym said battal erar kepe thaym ane better fortoun abyde manifest foly y• romane pissance quhylk sa hye syngulare preemynence baith ryches cheualry na pepyll mycht resist thairto otheris said best follow fortoun recouer remanent landis reft fra thaym sen thair begynnyng succedit sa happy chance thair end suld follow mair prosperi • e oft tymes sene ye gret multytude pepyl bene vincust men thairfore ī esperance bett fortoun best rais thair curage outhir recouir thair natiue realme atanis de last opinioun apprisit scottis ireland men tuke full purpos recouir remanent landis pertenit thaym ony tityll law albion last quhen thay fochtyn maist rageand fury aganis thair ennymes na better fortoun succedit thaim thā succedit afore ye men ilis thaym eschapit vntakyn slane romani princis nobillis ireland richt affrayit thir tithingis cōuenit ane coū sall haue consultatioun scottis mycht restorit thair realme romani best resistit quhen thay saw na sufficient remeid samyn thay set asyde othir materis concludit send thair oratouris haue peace romani ambassatouris y• come effect war reprouit marimus quhy thay supportit scottis aganis romani consydering na realmes erd saif ireland war fre romane weris thay dayis ȝit peace grantit thaym vnder thir conditionis ye princis nobillis ireland sall resset na ennymes romani within thair realme tymis cumyng thay sal make na support thaym mouis ony weris aganis ye romani thair confiderat freindis na theiffis lymma • ꝭ ireland sal cum erandis tymis cummyng albiou peace ratifpit maner followit na trubyll efter albioun ireland ¶and sa endis heir sext bu • e thir croniklis heir begynnis seuynt buke croniklis scotland ☞¶hovv maximus cōquest lyberalite crovvn britane hovv slevv gratiane emprioure vvas slane theodosius ca primo maximus hauand trubyll ennymes dantit partis sicker peace make prudēt maneris mair patent schew hym sa beniuolus pepyl y• na man denyit presence hym ī dayly fallowschip mony gret nobyllis brytane tretit thaym sa plesandly syndry thaym war drawin fauoure quhen ceissit fra publict materis gaif ingyne tornamentis warslyng▪ othir knich • ly exercitioun britonis become sa liberall gaue ane day amang thaym mair thā tribute britane mycht extend ane ȝeir weirmen knichtis campe war perswadit take part liberalite aganis quhat sum euir ieoperdeis y• mycht fall maximus knawyng myndis army geuyn sic feruent amyte hym▪ set ane conuentioun ȝork partit y• landis partenand sumtyme scottis amang pichtis britonis sic thyngis done garnist al strenthis britane men munitionis vittallis syne callit afore hym freindis men army quhō knew maist fauorable desiris demandit thaym quhat ingyne wayis mycht maist easely conques crown britane britonis knawyng imperial lynnage liberalite hie manheid craft cheualrie creat hym kyng yocht paulus diaconus writtis wes maid kyng contrar wyll follow auctouris afore rehersi • erar vncouth historicianis ualentiniane empriour knawing yt maximꝰ vsurpit ye crown britane send diuers capitanis armyis dant rebellioun last quhen persauit ye said maximus inuincibill battal mony capitanis armyis discomfist slane condiscendit lychtly haue peace said maximus thus wes maximus sufferit empriour reiose crown britane quhilk gouernit xvii ȝeris efter truble hauand hale empyre albion vnder dominion quhilk hapnyt neuir afore leuand creature pichtis sic familiarite ye strangest thaym wer chosin capitane army maid sodiouris sindry castellis britane quhen come yair lādis clotthit mantil bordorit gold silkin flouris eftir thair gyse▪ thaym desyrit nocht bot ane smal tribute ane memorial yat thay wer tributaris hym name romani pychtis britonis deliuerit thꝰ al deidly feir scottis maximus na le luf yan vehement affection reiosit scottis yair auld ennymes wer exilit albioun put vter rewyne quhen maximus gouernit crown britane certane ȝeris gret manheid prudence began insaciable auarice couate haill empyre warld conqueir samyn went france eftir stuff •• strenthis britane strang munitioun wageouris cumyng france wes tenderlie ressauit certane legionis romani quhilkis wer ennymes graciane emprioure bure hym deidlie hatrent becaus vncouth barbar pepill reuerence romani maximus fauo • mene ye romani france gaderit ane army al pissance mycht assemble suddane incursionis slew graciane empriour xxix ȝeir empyre eftir slauchter maximꝰ went throw almany italie feir onlie fame cōstran •• peple pay hym tribute▪ nochttheles wes finalie slane theodosius emprioure al sone romani quhilkꝭ wer left ī frāce knew ye slauch • er maximꝰ thay tuke continent sonne namy • uictour spulȝeit hym baith auctorite lyfe paulus diaconus writis lenth life graciane theodosius empriouris ☞¶hovv octauius vvas maid kyng brytonis hovv mercius victoryne vver send albioun dant britonis hovv pychtis vvar thirllit gret seruitude hovv thair kyng slevv hym self ca▪ ii romane princis beand deuidit maner amang thaym self octauius sonne octauius kyng britane afore rehersyt returnit britane fled schew france eschew tyranny maximus quhen subdewit britane opinion clamyt crown pertene iust heritoure discending blud tyall thairof lang progression promittit gyf thay condiscendit opinion deliuer thaym romane seruitude suffer nane bot yair natiue blud regne aboue thaym tymes cumyng britonis mouit reasonis rycht desirus recouer yair liberte maid hym kyng romani quhilkis kepit strenthis munitionis britane wer repugnant thir doyngis thus apperit gret contentioun britonis set defend octauius ye romani keip britane vnder empyre theodosius empriour rebellion britonis wes occasion empriour send new capitanis mony romane legionis dantye britonis bot quhē fand thay mycht nocht ouirthrawin force armes gaif thaym peace vnder yir conditionis octauius sall remane kyng britane duryng lyfe amyte romani munitionis strenthis britane kepit ye romani administratioun iustice ye theodosius quhome list depute samyn paying siclike tribute ye empriour thay payit afore maximus thus wes britane maid tributar afore romani nocht lang eftir two capitanis wer send mony legionis britane ane namit marcius mak residence londoun othir namyt uictoryne remane ȝork gouernance thir two capitanis followit mony ȝeris eftir gret affliction ye albianis uictoryne conuenyt ye pichtis ane coūsal repruuit yame vsyng thair awin lawis cō temptioun romane auctorite thai bene fre pepil nocht astric kit empriouris seruitude eft sindry consultationis maid actis nane pichtis sall regne eftir hergest na ministration iustice maid thair awin lawis bot onlie romani said romani haue aboue thaym tymes cumyng auctorite lyfe deith gyf thay wer found repugnant thir constitutionis punyst deith hergest kyng pychtis thirllit thus vile seruitude latter age wes penitent weris maid afore aganis scottis seyng eftir thair proscriptioun sa intollerable calamyteis apperyng bai • h peple present thair posterite becaus couth nocht put remeid yair vehement dolour slew hym self uictoryne knawing vnhappy end hergest cōmandit na pychtis blude vsurpe crown tymes cumyng ye nane yani • beir office auctorite vnder pane deith chargis obseruat quhilkis thay wer thi • lli • maximus quhen exilit th • scottis yus wes ye realme pichtis spulȝeit thair natiue lawis subdewit romani maner prouince siclik ye realme britonis ye pichtis hauand chargis uictoryne derisioun wer rycht impaciēt suffir ye crown reft fra yair natiue blud maid dur • ꝰ ye son hergest thair kyng uictoryne mouit thair rebellion thocht best dant yame afore thay gaderit ony pissance come haistely pentland gret ordinance ¶the pychtis camelon thair new kyng heirand cumyng uictoryne began garnys thair town prouisioun nochtheles soner thay • raistit romani beltit thair town strang seige tuke finalie force armes towne wes tane king durstus send rome vnderly iugement romane senatouris principal mouarꝭ rebellioun wer scurgit wandis throw ye town camelon pychtis dantit uictoryne maner wer cōmandit pay ȝeirlie romane thesaurer ye fourt part frutis growand thair landis feird part thair bestial vnder pane deith • hocht ye pychtis sa insolen • eftir eiection scottis albion yat gyf thay wer nocht dantit tyme mony hie offencis mycht ryse thaym albion thir importable chargis thirllye thaym maist vyle seruitude send thaym britane othir realmes wy • mettellis querrellis mak tyld aboue thir calamyteis thair come thaym ane mair insufferable iniure deuisit finall distruction thair realme▪ within schort tyme eftir thay wer cō mandi • pa yair wyffis child guddi • vnder pane deith beȝond watter forth leif behynd yam • • r berwik pentland galloway striuelyng carrik kyle cunnynghame mekill wod calidon samyn micht perpetually inhabit tymes cummyng britonis toure thay wer cōmandit big ane heych dike fra abircorne dunbriton deuide thaym fra britonis gyf ony pychtis transcendit dyke punist na le thay offendit aganis ye maieste romani pychtis greuit thir mony othir intollerabill iniuris began lament yair sorowfull chance fallin thaym thair awin offence ☞ rasy • thair eyn ye heuyn humyly praying ye mercifull god deliuer yame romane tyranny ☞ ¶of ethodius brothir eugenius afore rehersit gouernance denmark successioun hovv rome vvas tane gothis hovv syndry spulȝeis thairof fell fergus secund ca iii quhill ye pichtis wir punyst thir mony othir afflictionis ye scottis wer vagabound banist vncouth realmes thair wyffis child sum thaym leuand laubour thair handis otheris beand wageouris men army vnder sindry princis capitanis ye warld ethodius brothir eugenius banist haue schawin wyfe albioun wes plesandly tretit kyng denmark gat certane landis quhair remani • wife quhom gat ane sonne namyt erthus thus erthus eftir ye deith fader ethodius maryit ane nobill lady namyt rocha douchter rorik quhilke wes gretest prince danis vnder kyng gat hir ane sonne namyt fergus secund quhilk recouerit realme scotland sall schaw fergꝰ flurisand ȝouth past cōmand kyng danis ane cumpany chosin vailȝeant men alarike kyng gothis quhilk tyme wes passand huge army confound distroy ye empire romani fergus wes rycht glaid woyage bure extreme hatrent aganis ye romani becaus slew eldaris elli banist thaym fra thair natiue realm vncouth regionis fynalie eftir mony battallis fochtyn sindry chancis fortoun betuix romani gothis radagasus principal capitane yi army beād slane infinite nowmer pepill romani siclike brokin wt thair army pissance ane strait seige wes laid rome said alarik kyng gothis romani debaitit town lang tyme sindry ieoperdyis quhil last thay laikit vittallis throw quhilk wes sic hū ger amang thaym thay abhorrit nocht eit ye flesche men othir sindry forbodin metis deploratioun yi calamyte • oce sayis sanct ierome astonisis sobbyng cuttis wourdis ye town tane tuke al ye warld vincust hunger yan swerd found lyue within samyn sa far sprang hungry raige constranyt pepill eit abhominable meitis mod • r sparit nocht swelly ye frute hir awin bowellis thus wes rome fynalie expugnant gothis ye first day apprile fra begynnyng romulus imiclxiiii ȝeris fra ye incarnation god iiiicxii ȝerꝭ al sone rome wes tane gothis ceissit fra slauchter pepill fra spulȝe • ng tempillis appostillis peter paule throw quhilk mony pepill fled thairto wer sauit thair guddis liuis rome sumtyme lady warld wes spulȝeit thus cruelte gothis spulȝeis deuidit ryte armes amang gothis said besyde mony ryche iowellis precious geir fell fergus ye secund ye said spulȝe ane kist wes geuyn hym full bukis quhilkꝭ brocht italy incredibill laubour deligence almany send remane colmekill mony othir cronikillis historyis scotland vncertane quhayis impulsioun procedit said eneas siluius quhilk wes send legat fra eugeniꝰ fourt paip kyng iames first tuke purpos pa ilis scotlād se gyf mycht fynd ony werkis titus liuius quhilk wer distroyit tyme cruell weris italy notabill thingis bene distroyit battall • oust • ȝeris nochtheles fra said eneas knew passage dangerꝰ becaus kyng wes slane left purpos samyn maner rycht desirus knaw quhat bukis bene quhais fame wes sa diuulgat partis maid 〈◊〉 deligence last fyue auld bukis wryttyn romane letteris war brocht w abirdene industry ane bobyll man maister iohne campbell thesaurer kyng ȝeir god ane thousand v hundreth xxv ȝeris quhilkis war nocht bot brokyn leiffis thaym braider palme ane mannis hand writtin craftly rude hard parchement bot yai wer sa blynd mycht nocht reid ilk tent wourd quhiddir thir bukis wer ane part thaym wer distroyit said werꝭ italie gyf yai wer brocht said abbay vncouth strange placis vncertane ȝit testimoniall thaym red ye samyn fynd thay soundit mair eloquence salustius liuius ¶forthir tyme wes brocht w messengeir ye werkis ueremund archedene sanctandrowis▪ contenand historie realme fra first begynnyng thairof kyng macolme cāmores tyme quhilkis authouris haue followit maist wyse bischop william elphinstoun end thꝭ quhat sumeuir werk bot wyll retourn historie ¶fergus sonne erthus departit rome alarik thre dayis eftir wes put sakke went hym expugnation sindry othir townis italie nocht lang eftir wes ordanit pa certane schippis sicil ye mene tyme rais sa vnmerciful tempest hym wes dreuin force contrarius wyndis agane italye narrowly eschapit lyfe ¶at retournyng alarike wes deceissit athalphas maid kyng gothis generall capitane thair army quhome fergus become sa beluffit singular manheid virtew al sone italye wes dantit gothis wes sufferit returne hame mony danys denmark full ryches treasoure gottyn said weris ☞¶of syndry clerkis sanctis flurising vvarld first message send pichtis scottis ca iiii mony nobil clerkꝭ flurist tyme ye warld claudian poete writtar sum part hystorie apollinaris confoū dar heritikis wer emposionit porphirius martyn bischop turuyn france mony resolute haly men amang w wes thai dayis sanct nin • ane first bischop galloway quhair biggit ane kirk ye honour sanct martyne eyme ya • dayis wes al sāct ambrose bischop myllane quhilk brocht sanct augustine faith sacrament baptisme augustine first begynnar chānownis regular quohom ar mony abbayis ereckit warld magnificence syndry pryncis ordour bene xxx papis besyde mony byscoppis nobyll prelatis quhais nowmer may comprehendit imitation ordour rais ye eremitanis quhilkis ar incressit incredibyl nowmer howbeit thay sūfferit gret afflictioun gentilis thair thaym day europe aboue two thousand iii hundreth abbayis beside thaym ya • ar affrik egipt augustyne nocht onely commendabyll institutioun religious maneris bot al syngulare eruditioun euery kynd science skars xx ȝeris age quhen red rethorik cartage lernit baith philosophie mathemathik ony preceptoure ¶efter come myllane quhare prechyng sanct ambrose ressauit cristyn fayth sa proffitabyll thairto vincust put ane c syndry opinionis herisis wrait sa huge nowmer bukis na age man may suffice reid yame deceissit lxxx ȝeir age thir dayis al basilius first begynnar monkis cirillus byschop ierusalem sanct ierome pape quhilk translatit bybyll ebrew latyne mony othir volomes samyn maner werkis hald •• sic reuerence pape damasus thay war commandit red amang othir deuyne seru • ce bot wyl returne hystory pychtis seing thaym ylk day • ir tormentit romane • u •• yrkit importabyl seruytude send thair secret messengeris scottis quhilkis war exilit ye ilis▪ ireland norway desyryng thaym returne albion recouer thair realme ꝓmyttit thair gret aithis othir restore scottis thair realme landis elli fecht thair support deith aganis romani britonis quhen fergꝰ hard thir desyris pychtis send b • aduyse kyng denmark traist seruandis al partis quhare ony scottis war explore thair myndis towart quhē fand thaym ane mynd recouer thair realme reuenge iniuris done thaym romani britonis cōducit ane gret nowmer schippis weirmen part ryches wan weris italy part support gudschir roryk cum albioun ¶hovv gratiane king britonis mercius romane capitane vvar slane constantine put mercius place deith secund message send pichtis fergus hovv come albioun vvas aggreit vvith pichtis recouerit realme ca v duryng tyme gratiane brytone consent mercius romane capitane tuke ye crown brytane trubyl sone pecifijt sic contention rais betuix thaym ylk ane thaym slew othir romani rycht sorrowful deith thair capitane chesit constantyne aduyse honoriꝰ empriour succede mercius place constantyise nocht ane man nobyll blude ȝit mercyal werkis al sone chosyn capitane▪ went frāce ane army delyuer samyn fra iniure gothis swi ••• quhar • vincust ane nobyl knycht namyt constantius slane al sone uyctoryne knew slauchter mercius constantyne went london garnist strenthis brytane wi •• strang munition weirmen set ingyne mony wayis hald brytonis opinioun honorius empriour empyre romani inuadit grete rebellyoun al partis pichtis seyng britonis haldyn gret difficulte opinion romani beleuit fermely gyf scottis war brocht agane albion concurryng thair support recouer thair liberte thir causis yai send thair secund message fergꝰ schawyng sa gret trubyl britane amang romani na tyme mycht cum sa ganand recouer realme sone efter fergꝰ pullit vp salis▪ arriuit murray quhare set army land fame cumyng diuulgat throw albion causit scottis partis conuene hym thair wyffis chyldren ye maner thair ennymes bene chasit vincust thay war remane perpetually thair natiue landis ony forthir trubyll come syndry pychtis gret cūpanyis fergus thankyng hym syngulare lufe recouer natyue realme cumyn albion nocht astonist wynter stormes dangeir feis quhen passage bene maist parellus desyrit hym set syde iniuris gif ony war tymes bygane betuix scottis pichtis thay mycht new confiderat efter tennour ye auld peace prayit hym imput na falt thaym ye wekit offencis committit aganis nobyll kyng eugenius progenitour bot imput ye allanerly thair fore eldaris quhylkis • uld nothi • tyme haue experience dissait romani ȝi • vnderstand quhat vengeance calamyte apperyng thaym weris maid aganis scottis quhen thay beand dissauit plesand wordis romani dāmage thair commoun weill brocht thaym self intollerabyl seruitude throw quhylk thay war sa cruelly punyst yat euery kynd deith wes preferrit romane dominion answerit fergus wald gladly haue peace amyte pichtis siclyke condicionis thay war afore confiderat progenitouris wald ieoperde hym self thaym battall contrar romani britonis thair auld perpetual ennymes▪ fecht deith thair commoun weill reuenge iniuris done thaym swa said pichtis wald plesandly depart thair wiffis child guddis landis quhilkis war treasonably reft afore fra scottis ye auld iniuris ye said pychtis thocht thaym sufficiently punist iust punitioun god thair offence • n thay war nocht onely reft spulȝei • thair natyue landis bot thirllit maist vyle intollerabyl seruitude pichtis content thir desyris creat ane kyng set ane day meit fergꝰ day affixit scottis pychtis war confiderat togidder efter ye auld band maist souer way yt mycht deuysit sic thingis done fergus ressauit al landis strenthis war reft fra progenitouris afore romane weris sone efter past ane honest cumpany argile quhare crownit fatal • chiar merbyll ȝeir fergus recouerit realme x • v ȝeir efter scottis war expellit albion fra incarnation iiiicxxii ȝeris fra first begynnyng scottis vii hundreth lv ȝeris xviii ȝeir honorius emprioure ¶hovv romani fechtand aganis scottis pichtis vvar seuerit ane schoure hayll syndry vassalage done vailȝeant grahame vvall abircorne lynage allya vvith kyng fergus ca vi victoryne cōmouit scottis war brocht agane yi maner albioun assemblit ane army come ȝork efter cūmyng send ane herald pychtis sol ••• ad thaym mony large ꝓmyssis dissolue ye band maid lait •• scottis last seyng 〈◊〉 cum lytyll effect began 〈◊〉 pichtis fals maynswo • ne pepyll wrokyn thair rebellyoun come ane army lm men throw kendell mers pentland gret dā mage pepyll thairof set tentis nocht far fra camelon fergus aduertist ye cumyng romani maner baith kyng pichtis war gaderit ane gret army come ouir forth within ye nycht set tentꝭ nocht far fra ennymes wt delyuerit mynd assaylȝe yame brek day romani tothir syde knew weil ordinance scottis pichtis▪ thrid vigill maid thaym reddy battall faucht confiderat kingis besyde watter carron battall rycht cruelly fochtyn sa gret multitude pepyl slane yat said watter ran mony mylis purpoure stremis seis quhill thir armyis war fechtand maner vncertane victory come suddanly ane scharp schoure sa full haill sleit ye nane thaym mycht knaw ane othir throw quhylk yai war constranit seuer mair yrkit saciat otheris slauchter thus war baith armyis sa brokyn mony ȝeris efter nane thaym micht inuaid othir battal uictoryne morrow seyng army brokyn returnit kent left behynd hym mony sodyouris ī pentland kepe samyn maner prouynce aganis scottis pichtis confiderat kyngis cō mandit residew thair pepyll quhylkis war left lyue returne hame becaus yai fand yame self vnabyll renew battal thay set thair ingyne saif baith thaym self thair landis ane better fortoun sone efter thay conuenit argile se quhat wayis thay micht best resist thair ennymes reuengyng iniuris thaym done lerne thair pepyll art cheualry thay war mony ȝeris abusit ony exercition thairof efter syndry consultationis scottis seyng pichtꝭ mair nowmer micht nurist ī angus fiffe striueling stratherne sufferit thaym remane athole beȝond hyllis granȝeben quhyll thay mycht sum better fortoun recouer resydew yair landis quhilkꝭ war reft fra thaym tyranny ramanis pychtis spred fast athole maid syndry strenthis polecy 〈◊〉 mene tyme uictorine capitane britane cōmandit britonis general edict byg ye wal betuix abircorne dunbritane staik ryse thair strāgest maner saif thaym fra inuasion scottis pichtis big yi dike war assemblit mony craftismen al partis syndry weirmen fai • thaym quhyl ye dyke byggit ye mene tyme quhē thay war biggād maist besaly come ye vailȝeāt grahame quhais dochter • yit kyng fergus slew ane gret nowmer thir weirmen bygging dike ye remanent put flicht incōtinent fers incursiō brocht ane huge pray men gudis fra ye britonis scottis landis grahame discēdit ane anciant hous dē mark gottin ane nobyll lady yat samyn cuntre ane ye scottis yat banist ethodius albion efter ye proscription scottis maryit ane virgine ye blude rial denmark quhom gat ane dochter maist excellent bewte quhilk geuyn fergꝰ mariage fergus gat hir iii sonnis afore cumyng albion quhais name war eugeniꝰ dongarus constancius quhome salbe history followyng uthir sayis grahame ane bryton quhilk eschewyng romane tyranny fled • ng scottis efter banist thaim denmark gret ennyme romani seyng thaym regne sic tyrāny auarice aboue thair subdittis always quhat sumeuir hous lynnage discendit treuth ane mā hie curage spreit baith weir peace strangest ennyme romani britonis grahame discendit surname grahamis ¶of syndry consultationis maid ye scottis thair defence aganis ye romani britonis hovv victorine conquest crovvn britane▪ hovv vvas punist yai • fore ye deith ca vii britonis brokin syndry battallis maner ceissit mony ȝeris efter fra batall content defend yair win landꝭ tyme come infinite nowmer scottis frāce spanȝe almany italy othir ꝑtis quhair thay war wageouris king fergꝰ traisting becaus sa huge rebellion wes maid realmes aganis romani recouer thair landis albion fergus reiosing thair cumyng went thaym ī carrik quhare faucht ye romani gat na le displeseir gat afore throw quhilk cōstranit leif carrik returne argyle▪ quhare remanit wynter followyng ane conuentioun maid hym nixt symer quhylk syndry noblis perswadit rais new army resyst uyctoryne cumyn galloway erar ieoperd hym extreme dangeir battall dayly leif sic afflictioun ¶otheris sayd best tary nocht fecht romani becaus thay war twyis dyscomfist aduenture gyf thay war dyscomfist thryd tyme thair realme suld pray thair ennymes ¶best thairfore ceis fra battall▪ quhyll thair pyssance war conualescit quhylk thay mycht mair abyll resyst ☞ ¶attour sa frequent rebellyoun maid aganis romani partis uyctoryne mycht nocht lang abyde brytane ¶and thairfore sen empyre romani apperis sa manifestlye declyne ¶it may happyn uyctoryne constranit fle brytane scottis pichtis may haue ane ganand oportunite recouir thair realme ony gret dā geir last counsall apprisit sa concludit scottis pichtis sall inuaid thair ennymes mair scarmussyng plane battall mene tyme honorius emprioure tuke gret suspitioun aganis thꝭ uictorine traisting suld vsurp crown britane thus demit mony pepyll empriour suld exone • uictoryne al auctorite britane al sone uictorine aduertist thairof tuke crown britane incredibyll fauoure army part britonis assistit • 〈◊〉 bot otheris followit 〈◊〉 dioneth sonne kyng octauius afore deceissit apperit thus gret seditioun britane nochtheles honoriꝰ empriour seyng sa gret trubyll rysyng brytane send ane vailȝeant knycht namit heraclius dant thayr rebellyoun quhais cummyng maid britonis otheris assistit uictoryne sa astonist • yat yat brocht uictoryne bound heraclius mony otheris quhilkis war mouaris thair rebellioun sone efter uictoryne send rome mony otheris opinioun punist ye deith thus britane brocht agane heracliꝰ romane empire ☞¶hovv placidus romane capitane vvas discomfist vvith army scottis pychtis hovv kyng fergus recouerit hi • landis conditioun peace 〈◊〉 romani cyuyl religious industry vveil pepyll ca viii heraclius quhen brocht britane maner romane opinioun command honorius returnit rome went affric dant ye rebellion athalꝰ tyranne left behynd hym britane ane man febyl curage namit placidus quhylk throw auaryce found richt vnabyll gouerne ony prouynce fergus knawyng weill febyll curage placidus thocht ye tyme ganand recouer landis reft fra hym afore romane weris sone efter come ane army carrik abydyng cummyng kyng pychtis army al sone scottis pychtis war met togydder thay went throw carrik kyle cunynghame galloway ceissing fra na maner cruelte thaym obeyit empyre romani maner thay come pentland mers berwyk left nothir romani britonis placidus capitane brytane herand thir attemptatis come ane huge army pentland ye scottis pichtis nocht affrayit cuming met hym gret fury followit ane terribyll fair battall first ye horsmē romani war discomfist sone efter remanent legionis war • opprest ythād schot arrowis yat thay gaif bakkis maner ane sorrowfull slauchter maid flearis placidus narrowlye eschapyng ly •• e fled ȝork confiderat pepyll insolent efter victory tuke purpos sege ȝork nochthel • thair army sa brokyn thay war constranit desist placidus na le astonist mony othir afflyctionis fallyng romani syndry ꝑtis ye warld last discomfitoure dred britane suld pa fra romane dominioun gif britonis mouit ony new rebellyoun thairfore began seik peace pichtis scottis peace fynaly tretit vnder thir conditionis al lā dis munitionis reft afore fra scottis pychtis romane tyranny salbe restorit thaim agane na incursionis heirschyppis sall maid tymes cumyng scottis pichtis romane landis romani sall stand cōtent landis conquest ye britonis sall nocht inuaid ye scottis pichtis ony weris ī tymis cumyng al sone ye confiderat kyngis ressauit thair landis rowmes maner thay gaif thair exact delygence instruct thair pepyll plesand cyuyll maneris ony thirllage seruytude thā fergus incres scottis danis otheris yat come hym recouer thair realme vnder ane freindschip blude gaif syndry lā dis realme amang thaym throw quhilk mony landis realme tynt thair auld name callit efter name new possessouris ¶and becaus name euery land scotland ar weill knawin scottis wyll schaw na thynge thairof fergus reparit kirkis war failȝeit necligence pepyll feft syndry preistis rentis possessionis deuyne seruyce brocht monkis war banyst agane realme treti • thaym gret reuerēce instruct pepyll faith biggit abbay colmekyll dotat syndry landis rentis possessionis commandit samyn tymes cumyng ye commoun sepulture kyngis succedyng efter hym feft al certane funerall obsequies done ȝeirly thair saulis fergꝰ geuyn al weill cyuyll religious maneris reparit strenthis lyand bordouris fornentis ye brytonis quhare ordanit agit sodiouris remane perpetually defence thairof ye cōmoun purs ☞¶of deith placidus • message send castius capitane britane fergus fergus ansvver hovv romani vvar discomfist castius slane ca ix quhen fergus recouerit realme maner restorit pepyl thair anciant hono • ri dignite deceissit honor • u emprioure efter quhom succedit theodosius quhilk send ane nobyll man namit ualentiniane italy repare dammagis done cyuyll weris ye mene tyme placidus capitane brytane deceissit scottis pychtis traistyng haue gud occasyon deith placidus inuaid britonis peace dissoluit deith come west mureland cumber vthir regionis war tane fra thaym afore romane weris • eissit fra na maner cruelte thaym obeyit romani mony brytonis fled castius maid capitane brytane efter deith placidus castius dredand ye thyng come efter dioneth sonne octauius afore rehersit suld vsurpe crown brytane assistence scottis pychtis marijt fergus syster send fergus chargeand hym ane herald gyf desyrit peace leif auld landis marchis pertenand eldaris inuaid na otheris gif desyrit nocht bot battall maid hym vnderstand samyn ennymes yt dang eldaris albioun thirllit pychtis seruitude charge answerit scottis pychtis thay wald haue na peace 〈◊〉 romani quhyll westmure •••• cumber war restorit •• aym munitionis 〈…〉 thairof ¶castius greuit answer come forthwart army quhen cumyn throw romane prouynces nocht far fra westmureland aduertist yat dioneth cū mand ane gret power wal • support scottis pychtis brytonis knawyng ye feirsnes cruelte welchemē war astonist thir tythyngꝭ▪ nochtwithstandyng hortation castius thay rasit yair spreit▪ come thrid day efter rycht desyrus battal thair ennymes sycht dioneth confiderat pepyll mengit thair oistis togidder weill arrayit battal quhen suddandly baith armyis iunit faucht lang doutsum victory quhyll last wageouris faucht wyngis lycht armour gaif bakkis followit • huge affray amang romani samyn ye mair e • kit slauchter castius thair capitane incontinent myd battall fled quhome followit scottis pichtis welchemen lang chace murdir ȝit becaus thay keipi • na ordoure thair chare thay gat mair skaith thay thair ennymes romani discomfist wyse colleckit resydew thair army togidder past walis left behynd thaym al strenthis cuntre ony defence ☞hovv maximiane capitane britane come vvith huge army aganis scottis pichtis fergus orison army hovv baith kyngis scottis pychtis vvar slane▪ thair army discōfist romani ca x dioneth efter discomfitour romani tuk ye toun britane inuadit pepyl thairof gret cruelte slauchter obeit romani thus apperit britane bot gif trubyll war mair haistely dantit pa fra dominion romani tyme france ane nobyll man namit etius▪ general capitane thairof auctorite emprioure etius heryng britane nakit support send desyre brytonis ane vailȝeant knycht namit maximiane dant trubyll appering welschemen scottis pychtis maximiane come sone efter ane army albion quhom brytonis ressauit gret triumphe prayt god send hym ane gud fortoune aganis ennymes maximiane knawyng mair trubyll apperyng rebellyon dioneth▪ ony vthir danger occurring blude ryal brytane thocht lang tary impediment weris come army maist delygence ȝork sone eft come westmureland confiderat kyngis heryng cumyng come thair armyis ye maner ye mene tyme come thaym dioneth king britane power walis spring ye day quhen al thair power mengit togidder fergus callit thaym sound trū pat standart said wyse wald wise freindis yi battall quhilk ar leid aganis oure maist dangerus ennymes war fo • htin sa huge mā heid curage spreit samyn may ȝour honour proffet hie pleseir glaidnes suthly wyll ȝe ponder mater wysely ȝoure myndys bene sa lang distra • kit fra eys sa occupyit ythand exercitioun cheualry suld ereckit ī gret esperāce victory seyng ȝour ennymes sicht quhom ȝe sa oft afore discomfist chasit semi forcy campionis euir beleif ye best haif excellent fortitude aganis quhat sumeuir aduersite may occurre fortitude hie souerane virtew perswadis euery nobyll man impulsioun nature resist aduersite virtew mair renownit resist iniure ennymes thā inuaid thaym ony iniure yt wrāgusly iniurit he ay gud esperāce bett fortoun follow thus incressis strang esperance iust querall growis prudent contrare ya • doi wrang iniurius hym self he na esperāce gud fortoun follow maximꝰ sumtyme capitane britane treasonabyll slychtis confiderat pichtis na le ye exterminion thaym thā scottis end thairof schew thay slew gudschyr eugenius mony ȝour nobyll eldaris put thaym sic affliction thay war mony ȝeris exilit regioun throw quhylk conquest hayll empyre albion nocht cōtent felicite thirl • ye pichtis auld cōfiderat freindis contrar band ꝓmes vyle seruitude nochtheles end alliance schew said pichtis quhat dā mage cummis confiderat treasonabyll pepyll contemption thair trew freindis bot last ye pichtis penitent importabyll iniuris done w began youcht lait prudent brocht w agane realme sone efter cummyng vincust oure feirs ennymes small difficulte ar thir vineust tyrannes returnit inuaid w aduyse maximiane thair capitane wald restore thaym thair curage quhylk thay tynt afore slauchter thair capitane castiꝰ thay charge w war vnder thair dominioun pa cūber westmureland quhilkꝭ pertenis w iust tytyl thir reasonis thynk suld repugnant thair chargis bot al persew oure iust action aganis thaym al pissance heir fore awalknit vailȝeant campionis tak ȝour wappinnis gud curage spreit thynk na gret difficulte occurris vincus thay febyll creaturis quhilkꝭ sa cowartly gaue place afore ȝoure armoure pa forthwart ioly cōpanȝeonis haue na le memory ȝour honour iniuris done ȝour ennymes conques sic glore ȝour posterite imitatioun ȝoure dirtew may lerne fecht vailȝeantlye thair realme al sone fergꝰ said thir wourdis gaue ane signe sound trumpat iune tothir two kyngis pychtis britonis vsit na le hortatioun thair armyis incontinent baith armyis iunit first counteryng ye romani wer neir discomfist sa huge nowmer arowis ganȝeis come thaym ye lyft mycht skarslie sene aboue thair heidis maximiane seyng first bront romani dangeir send ha • stelie ane legioun fresche men thair support wes battall renewit cruelly fochtin 〈◊〉 last wyngis ro •• ni multitude pepil ouirset thair ennymes fornens thaym confiderat pepill britonis faucht vnder dioneth maid lang debait bot last wageouris ye faucht ye vter skirtis romane wyngis come ye battall quhair thay wer fechtand yair bakkis confiderat peple howbeit thay wer affrayit yi suddane terrour ruschit togidder ane knot stout curage fecht ye deith maist forcy strang capitanis pepill rycht desyrus reuenge thair deith becaus thay saw na othir remeid maid thaym maist violent force rusche throw thair ennymes quhair thay wer slane gret murdir thair ennymes quhill ye romani wer besalye geuyn stop forcy irruptioun nobillis forsaid mony remanent scottis come feirslie throw thair ennymes wer sauit • air flicht ȝit chais followit fa cruelly romani wer sauit quhome thay mycht apprehend bot last ye nycht put end yair laubouris vnhappy battall wer slane fergus kyng scottis xvi ȝeir regne durstꝰ kyng pichtis ye nobilite baith yair realmes dioneth prince walys euil woundit wes brocht see port nocht far fra ye feild quhair gat ane bait fled walis ¶hovv romani vvrocht gret iniuris scottis pichtis hovv maximiane vvas alliat vvith dioneth princ • vvalis tuk crovvn britane cōtrar auctorite romani ca xi eftir mischeuoꝰ battall sic terroure rais throw ye landis scottis pychtis nocht wes traistit bot vte • exterminioun baith yair realmes becaus thay na esperance support thair maist forcy campionis beand slane thay thoch • na thyng sa gud fle vncouth realmes maximiane think best vse ye present fortoun occurrit ceissit fra na maner cruelte yt mycht • euisit galloway annandale mers pentland sic rage fyre swerd yat na estait wes sauit fra fury pepill yat fled kirkis sanctuaryis wer slane ony sycht god town camelon mony othir nobill cietris townis scottis pichtis wer tane cassin ye ground cruelte ceissit • quhil last ye scottis pichtis war dreuin schamefully ouir ye wal yt ryn ni fra abircorn dūbritō sworn neuir returne beȝond samyn ane part romani gaif counsall maximiane sen scottis pychtis wer sa brokin tyme mycht haldyn na pepill faith peace distroy thaym •• etly elli banis thaym albion utherwayis na thīg mycht done efferyng ye cōmon weill romani maximiane refusit counsall wynt wes approcheyng throw quhilk army behuuit rest thair wynter schelis becaus na vittallꝭ wer amang scottis pychtis sus • ene army sic vehement cauld thair montanis na craft mycht withstand ye samyn wes weil thair army abyde ye nixt symer attoure becaus welschemen nerrast nychtbouris rebellit aganis hym wes necessar dant thaym first auenture gyf persewit ye scottis pychtis leuand behynd hym sa perrellus ennymes dāmage proffit mycht cum weris thir causis returnyt victorius army ȝorke quhair remanit wynter brocht vittallis ꝑtis sustene ye samyn spring ȝeir ra • tentis come displayit baner aganys dioneth walis wes haldyn kyng britonis fornentis ireland seis mene tyme maximiane wes aduertist writtingis yat bonifacius slane twa romane capitanis affrik yair army discomfist throw quhilk affrik wes wist fra romane dominioun ye said bonifacius maid king thairof attoure franchemen quhilk wes ye tyme ane pepil almany wes cummyng ouir ryne entrit gallia quhilk wes callit eftir france cruelte thā euir wes hard afore cōquest ye landis orliance paris maid ane kyng thair win blude throw quhilk appe • landis callit ye tyme gallia suld cum vnder dominioun franchemen maximiane knawyng sa mony rebellionis ꝑtis aganis romani thocht best rebel samyn wyse tuke crown britane contrar romane auctorite pecify realme hym al debaitis ya • mycht strang aganis romani gyf thay list inuaid hym tuke eldest douchter dioneth namit othilia ī mariage dioneth gat kyng fergus sister two douchteris ony mayl childrin secūd douchter namyt ursula wes maid ane nun fyne ye scho suld haue na succession yi affinite sic tendernes inccessit betuix maximiane dioneth ye said dioneth wes sufferit haif gretest empyre nix • maximian britane ¶of kyng eugenius secūd gret vassalage done maximian ī britane france hovv vrsula hir fallovvi • vvar maryit ca xii sic thingis done britane residew scottꝭ quhilkꝭ wer eschapit feild afore rehersit conuenit argyle maid sonne eugenius secund kyng fra ye incarnation iiiicxxx ȝeris fra begynnyng realme scotland viiclx ye feird ȝeir ualentiniane empriour eugenius began administration realme piete tuke bonis fader fra ye place quhair thai wer beryit romani betyit thaym funerall triumphe ye abbay colmekil fergus wes first kyng scottis yt wes beryit colmekill thairfore wes cal lit eftir ye cōmon sepulture al scottis kyngꝭ vnto kyng macolme cā moris dayis quhilk biggit abbay dunfermelyng perswasioun sanct margaret quhare mony scottis kyngis bene beryit sen syne kyng eugenius rycht desirus recou • r ye landis reft fra fader romani britonis wrait name pepill fra sexte sextene ilk town yt mycht beir armour wappinnis nochtheles seing thaym quhen • aiwer g • derit small nowmer pissance suꝑsedit purpos quhill ane tyme ganand youcht scottis pychtis wer brokin yi wyse feblit yair pyssance 〈◊〉 maximiane send thaym peace 〈◊〉 desirit becaus yi maximiane saw empire romani persewit al ꝑtis set besynes haue ane ꝑt thairof▪ tuke ye crown britane fauour beniuolē ce ye pepyl sone efter coronation past bertanȝe left behynd hym gud fader dioneth ane legion pepyl gouerne britane fynaly dantit ye bertonaris sic importabyl affliction thay wer randerit dominion maximiane tuke scharp segeing syndry townis sic lay ye see costis bertanȝe sone efter come al army ane strāg town bertanȝe namit redoun quhilk kepit sulpicius ye name ualētiniane empriour quhē maximiane seigit yi town lāg tyme micht get na way force armꝭ kest hym inuad ye cuntre mair rubbery thā honest weir ye mene time ye ber taneris gat sic ꝑswasion etiꝰ capitane fr • nc • yt thay rebellit aganis maximiane 〈…〉 recouerit al thayr strenthis townis bot slew al weirmen quhare thay war ap • hendit maximiane mouit thir iniuris returnit al army ye said town redoun▪ efter mony scharp assaltis hym tane▪ euery pepil foūd • ny miseratiō sla • e banist ye 〈◊〉 tuk extreme yre aganis yanie violation yair faith etiꝰ seing france ythandly inuadit • e ye burgūdianꝭ send britane bryng ye legion yt left thair maximiane support hym ī weris britane left nakit support gaif occasion scottis pichtis inuade ye britonis becaus thay • aid ye opinion maximiane finaly quhen yi maximiane cōquest bertāȝe slane ye maist • al ye pepyl yair ȝit yt 〈◊〉 ane pray franchemē thair nixt nichtbouris brocht ane gre • nowme • pepyl britane inhabit ye said cūtre sū authouris writis thair come ane cm men britane inhabit ye lād bertanȝe conanꝰ conanus ane tender freind dioneth maid king bertanȝe sa yi land • ynt ye auld name ar •• rica callit bertanȝe fra thir britonis yat come inhabit ye said land thā conanꝰ king bertanȝe knawīg yt euery pepyl failȝeis ye age mā gif thay haue na succession send ambassatouris ī britane haue wemē thair wiffꝭ ambassatourꝭ yat come yi effect gat consent nobyllis britane yat al dochteris sisterꝭ anti ꝑtenand blude brytonis yat war thā bertanȝe suld pa yame en haist togidder ursula nun quhilk tane ye abbay quhare scho ꝓfest put • chip ye remanent hir fallowis yat lynage dioneth suld faill becaus hir othir sister othili • quhilk mari • maximiane afore deceissit • ny chyldrin yocht passage thir wemen vnplesand ye britonis▪ ȝit come efter gret felicite ursula hir cūpany quhen thay suld haue passit bertanȝe tempestious streme seis thay war dreuyn na lytyl dangeir thair lyuis mouth ryne quhare thay landit becaus thay sic trubyll seis • ay tuk purpos pa bertanȝe land othirꝭ authourꝭ say thay tuke thair voyage rome perswasion haly nun ursula war tane ye hūnis quhoin thay war al slane becaus thay wold consent polution thair bodyis kirk thairfore syngis ȝeirly dyuyne cerimonyis thair glore louyng ¶hovv confiderat kyngis come vvith gret armyis aganis britonis eugenius orison gret heirschippis maid britonis hovv gallio r • uenna • vvas send support britonis vassalage ca xiii eugenius knawing brytane continewal weris destitute romane sodiouris cōuenit durstus kyng pichtis ane counsal quhilk efter lang cō sultatiō cōcludit maik weir aganis britonis sic prouidence y• na aduertence suld maid thairof quhyl thay war arrait thair realmes ☞ sone efter ane day assignit baith thair pepyl conuene xl dayis vitallis vthir necessaris thair best maner day prefixt come gret multitude pepyll boūdꝭ realme ye wo • calidone eugenius seing freindis subdittꝭ gaderit yi maner said fallowis nane amāg ȝow vailȝeant campionis wyll degestlie consider baith ye materis ꝑten w ennymes bot sall thynk tary vnproffitable w day consideryng hie importable iniuris done thir mony • eris w romane tyranny vailȝeant nobill fader ye recouetar realme slane aboue infinite calamiteis sufferit w ȝe se carrik kyle cunnynghame galloway mony othir landis realme fallin pray romani youcht ye battall strikin afore fadir aganis maximiane wes infortunat w wes nochtheles rycht vnplesād sorowful • ays forthir calamyteis fallyng battall he nocht beleif feblit ȝour curage bot enkendil lit samyn reuenge ye auld iniuris done sa mony ȝeris aganis w progenitouris romani britonis vnderstand al mekll pissance minist romane weris sa far ar romani brokin yair pissance hatrent fortoun quhilk intēdꝭ bring yair empire nocht throw quhilk tha • nocht onl • e odius pepil bot al inuadit cruell weris thair prouincys fallyng praye ennymes partis uandalis he tane fra thaym affrik uisigothis spanȝe franchemen burgundianys he tane ye maist part gallia namit france hūnis he pānonia mysia thracia macidon pepyll yt eist ꝑtis warld he recouerit thair lyberte elli randerit thaym self ennymes romani rome sūtyme lady warld he bene twys tane gothis heryit brint forthir romani ar brocht sic calamyte yt thay haue na landis empyre day▪ saif italy britane quhilk nakit garnison weirmen weris maximiane forthir thair na romane capitane wyll may bring ony support aganis w britane drery nakit al support sa disparit sall erar ane pray obstakyll ȝour weris nedis nocht heirfore vailȝeant capitanis exhort ȝow battall sen knychtly curage mair aboū •••• failȝeis ȝow syckerly • hair ane mair huge pray abydyng ȝow euir apperyng afore de chance fortoun ony ȝour eldaris occasioun moder werkis ar done offeris hir wylfully ȝow perswading impedimentis tary battall set asyde exhortis ȝow follow hir aduenture gyf ȝe tyne hir ȝour febyll eurage ȝe sall nocht wyn hir agane howbeit ȝe wald mouit pray ȝow ceis fra ȝour honest vassalage ony band yt ȝe haif maid maximiane thir romani britonꝭ he inuadit w mony cruel inuris sen ye said band maid sen ennymes he ceissit inuaid w brekyng said band may ony thyng le • inuaid thaym maner belt ȝow thairfore lusty gallandis manheid tak ȝour wappinnis honest interpris follow 〈◊〉 spreit curage ȝour eldaris ȝe sal nocht • aile glore victory army thir word •• war inflāmit battall promittit ieoperd thaym self al maner dangeir yat thay mycht reuenge iniuris done thaym affliction romani quhylk richt patent maid ye remanent wordis eugenius haue mai • credit ylk man schillnoyis bad rais thair ansenȝeis proceid forthwart pichtis ye samyn maner war inflāmit battal exhortation thair kyng continent ye confiderat pepyl inuadit ye britonis fyre swerd partis quhare thay come chasit ye britonis pentland mers berwyk galloway annandale yairefter thay past kendale cumber westmureland ȝork tuke munitionis strenthis cuntre quhē thay spulȝeit townis thay slew al ye cietezanis thairof left na britonis lyue except thaym war sauit flycht apperit thus britane cū haistely vnder empire scottis pichtis gif samyn war mair haistely resistit britonis impaciet suffer yir displeseiris send thair oratouris ye empriour ualentiniane promittit thair ꝑpetuall subiection hym sa yat wald support thaym aganis thair vnmercyfull cruel ennymes ualentiniane • ycht desyrus keip britane vnder empyre send ane nobyl capitane namit gallio • euēnas mony
