legionis pepyll yair support scottꝭ pichtis knawing cummyng new army left th • landis brytane quhylk war laitly heryit dystroyit thaym syne returnit hame thay thocht profytabyll ieoperd thaym aganis ye romani knawand frequent battallis afore past thair gret māheid cheualry romani thair cumyng albion followit lang chace scottis ye watter forth mony thaym slew haisty scharmising becaus thir romani micht mak lang tary albion extreme dāgeir appering frāce inuasioun syndry pepyll thay gart repare haistely wal afore rehersit betuix abircorne dūbritane gret expensis rasit ye samy • faill deuat stanis xii cubitis hicht viii cubitis breid mony strang touris rising sydis thir touris bastailȝeis war doung togidder sic thingis wald nocht byrne saif britonis fra thair ennymes hicht thir touris thay set fyre pānis aduertis cuntre quhen dangeir occurrit thay come ye defence heirof quhen fyre sene war punist deith ¶hovv ye scottis pichtis kest dovvn ye vval abircorne▪ vvrocht gret cruelteis ye britonis ye message send britonis etius▪ ansvver▪ ca xiiii britane brocht maner romane seruitude gallio reuennas returnit france • uhais departyng gaif occasion confiderat kyngis inuaid brytonis mair cruelte afore kyng eugenius assemblit pepyll afore hym sumtyme inflā mit thaym huge ire aganis • hair ennymes sumtymes prouokit thaym esperance pray ryches gottin thair ennymes kyng pichtis ceissit exhort pepyll maner promittit publik edict geif yt capitanry camelon first past ouir wal abircorn britonis knawyng weill assemblance scottis pichtis come arrayit thair best maner defend wal afore rehersit put ane gret nowmer weirmen bastailȝeis touris thairof resyst inuasioun ennymes aganis quhom send vailȝeant grahame ane cumpany scottis pichtis armyt corsbowis slonges handbowis al sone grahame doung brytonis fra wal incontynent come masonnis wrychtis mony otheris craftismē syndry instrumentis kest dyke vnto ye groūd ane gret • ād britonis maid yame withstand ye euersyon wal bot thay obstinate fechtyng war slane otheris knew ye cruell furye confiderat pepyll gaif bakkis confiding na thyng mair thair flycht quhill sic thingis war done ye wal abircorn thair come ane othir cumpany pichtis fiffe peatland dyd mair cruelteis brytonis quhare thay come thā thir scottis pichtis come afore thaym al sone baith thir cumpanyis war assemblit togydder nocht fyre slauchter quhare thay come inhabytantis affrayit thir cruelteis fled thair wiffis barnis guddis beȝond watter tyne incontinent gudis betuix tweid tyne general proclamation ye two kyngis war denuncit frely eschetit pray thair army followit mony schamefull abhominable dedꝭ persuasion ire hatrent auarice skry terrible noyis arrayis furye weirmen ceissyng fra na maner cruelte throw ye landis betuix ye ireland seis ta sayde y• almane seis tothir britonis feir thir importable terrouris reparit wall adriane huge lauboure expensis confiderat pepil knawyng becaus wynter wes approcheyng thair army mycht nocht abide togidder ceissit fra seging ye said wal sat doun thair wyffis child landis wer conquest tyme richt battall britonis dreidand ye scottis pichtis cumyng ye 〈◊〉 ueir inuaid yame 〈◊〉 afore send thair ambassa • ouris etius quhilk wes capitane france said desyrit support aganis confiderat pepill alwayis yi etius send na support ye britonis vncertane quhidder wald send nane becaus fauorit nocht emprioure ualentiniane purposit vsurpe crown france gyf mycht nocht mak support ye said britonis feir scharp battall ennymes aganis hym ¶hovv conanꝰ prince vvalis exhortit britonis tak peace vvith scottis pichtis vvas slane hovv ye britonis efter slauchter faucht amang thaym self ca xv wer oratouris britonis returnit repulse etius britane followit syndry consultationis amange thir britonis sum gaif counsall inuaid scottis pychtis al weil see land defēd thair liberte quhilk wes laitlie recouerit deith nocht onelie bryng men bot fensabill wemen defence thair realme conuene deligence wal adriane erar ieoperd thaym extreme daungeir suffer sa continual heirschippis slauchter tak peace howbeit wer necessar ony inhonest conditionis mene tyme conanꝰ prince walis discending lang progressioun ye natiue kyngis britane said britonis maner necessar pepill wyse faderis gyf thay intend othir mak cōques keip yair awin rowmis fra iniure fayis haue respect baith thair pyssance season occurris ye tyme sa lang suthlie wer supportit romani wer sufficient defend realme aganis vnmerciful fayis socht na peace ye treasonable scottis pychtis bo • allace oure realme abidis ane othir chance ar attenuat brokin tyranny ye proud maximiane quhilk he bene noysum w thā ony ennymes mycht haif bene quhen auarice socht empyre warld ar sa waistit maye haif na cōfidence victorie gyf fecht awin pissance haue na esperance support romani sen ar insufficiēt awin power resist ennymes ī tymes cūyng may plesādly debait sic perrellus auenture • yir cruell tyranny ennymes nocht brokin lang • ꝭ laubour distres he nothir dreid god man deith reuengit iniuri • done thaym sa mony ȝeris afore w amang thaym na deference age kynd man wife equale rageand battall ony mercy thair cheualry nocht bot wod fury thay reiose na thing sa mekill murdir agit men barnis siclik febill personnis sic insaciable thrift thay eschame nocht drynk ye blud yair ennymes delitis ī nocht bot thift slaucht thairfore mon othir haue peace yame elli suffer thair importable cruelteis yan afore yocht peace rycht schamefull w ȝit better haue pacience ane tyme lois realme liberte schame say thir wourdis na desyre conques honouris bot onlie ye singulare affection yt beir vnto ȝour cōmon weill auyse thairfore quhidder samyn mair frutefull noysum thairto britonis war rycht cō mouit conanꝰ persuadit yame peace said thay wald haue na amite scottis pychtis ye sindry cruelteis done yame thay knew al sayd thay spak nocht thair cōmoun weill bot onlie fynd sum occasioun slychtis vsurpe crown britane last quhen nobillis tane lang consultatioun mater oftymes lamentand thair vnhappy chance knawyng estait man sa miserable tendis swiftlie ruyne ony hycht counsall obstinat oportune pepill thay finalie concludit assemble thair ordinance baith men sensable wemen inuaid scottis pichtis cō uene ane prefixi • day place conanus rycht sorowful thir doingis ischit fra counsall sayng tak eternall god witnes assent nocht furius sentence beleuis na thyng mair anciant noble realme britane cum irrecouerable dammage throw sic fuliche coūsal dayis ane certane britonis heirād conanus regrait thair doyngis yi sort said thy auctorite sall nocht pissance stop yi sentence efter thay pullit furth yair swerdis thay draue hym throw body skry arrais haistelie efter slauchter freindis conanꝰ socht slayaris yair maist furye throw quhilk peple wes deuidit twa partis mycht nocht pecifyit auctorite ye nobillis quhill ane huge nowmer wer slane athir sydis ¶of gret vassalage done nobyl grahame vvallis abircorne adrian▪ hovv scottis conquest landis betuix tyne humber epistyll send britonis etius ansvver ca xvi al sone ye fame wes brocht london scottis pychtis maid cruell incursionis ye landis britonis ane huge feir terrour went throw ye ciete quhen britonis wer takand thair consultatioun youht wes vane thay suld dres al materis come vailȝeant grahame ane cumpany chosyn men wall abircorne brak doun partis halelie left na thyng thairof standyng remanis nowe thir dayis cause yi wall wes callit eft grahamis dike sic tyngis done grahame went wall adriane fornens ireland seis kest samyn maner slew al ye weirmen wer laid defence thairof ye residew britonis heirand nocht bot murdir rūmissyng deand pepill sauyt thaym self flycht ye wall adriane bet doun ye groud maner scotꝭ desiring na thyng mair reuenge ye iniuris done afore britonis ꝓclamit generall edict na fensabill bot agit febill personis saiffit bot edict wes nocht obseruat far enragit wes ye army cruelte thay past fyre swerd throw boundis •• betuix tyne humber wrocht ye inhabitantis thairof sic heirschip slauchter thay wer othir 〈◊〉 chasit cuntre yir ••• yngis schawin nobillis britane london mouit thaym se • k new remeid aganis thair ennymes finalie quhen thay lang auysit yi mater wes concludit • send two syndry ambassatouris expedition thair materis ane thaim pa ye cōfiderat kyngꝭ scottis pychtis gif thaym frelie landis liand beȝond humber large soumys money swa thay wald condiscend peace desist fra truble thaym tymes cumyng • cund ambassat pa etius capitane france▪ deplorand thair calamyteis epistill ☞ ¶to etius thryis consul regrait britonis ¶quhē forbearis first rāderit yame romani yai traistit mony reasonis yt senat pepill rome wes port sicker refuge pepill cūyng vnder thair empire bot yair posterite iresonable slycht maximiane agane cōmon weill ar sa brokin strenth continewance yair opinioun ar bot ane facill pray ennimes throw quhilk apperis othir romani ar degenerat fra manheid illuster dedis thair eldaris elli thair braid empyre vengeance god begynnis declyne geuyn pray euery pepill nochtheles gif fatale chance tyme weirdis couatis realme dissoluit fra amyte freinschip romani constraning w seruitude othir barbar peple cure nocht quhat pepill haue dominioun w sa eschew tyranny scottis pychtis quhais bludy swerd he wrocht w sic heirschip calamite knawe nocht quhat way miserabill lyuis salbe sauit • en guddis • lost tynt thay haue nowe bet doun ye wallis strenthis quhilkis suld haue defendit w fra thair cruelteis syne entrit ye r • mane prouince al maner cruelteis waistit lādis▪ brint townis castellis bet doun wallis ground slane wyffis childrin agit ꝑsonis besyde infinite othir displeseiris quhilkis may nocht writ doloure residew thaym ar chaist dreuin seis becaus may nocht haue passage throw ye samin ar dreuin agane ennymes handis quhait throw na esperance apperis releif bot othir slane peri fletand seis seikand heirfore gyf thow regardis othir ou • faithful kyndnes ȝit glore romane maieste quhilk bene sa mony ȝeris obeysant suffer nocht w freindis ye senat pepill rome▪ thirllit sic vndantit cruelte ennymes bot send w support ī haist nocht mair cruelly betrasit romani thā tynt barbar pepyll othir wayis sic thyngis sall ane perpetual memory successouris haue na confidence societe romani etius answerit richt sorrowfull romane empyre persewit sa euery hand mycht skarsly defend france fra inuasioun barbar pepyll thairfore mycht send na support ī britane nochttheles exhortit thaym maik best defence thay mycht esperance better fortoun quhen romani pecifyit trubyll scottis pychtis suld condignely punist thair attemptatis ¶hovv britonis vvar vincust maid tributar scottis pychtis▪ conditionis peace geuyn said britonis ca xvii mene tyme quhen answere come fra etius ye ambassatouris returnit fra scottis pychtis schew ye petitionis brytonis war na thyng plesand said scottis pychtis thay wald ceis fra ythand slauchter heirschip brytonis quhill othir thair realme conquest elli frely randerit thaym britonis war richt affrayit thir wourdis nochtheles thay enforcit thaim self curage ruschit haistely harnes detes • yng thair effeminate sleuth quhilk thay gaif audacite thair ennymes tynt ye victory thair cowartry thay conquest afore thair vyctory manheid scottis pichtis weil aduertist yat ye britonis war repulsit etius thair desiris gaderit thair pepil boundis vnder thair dominion come displayit baneris aganis yair ēnymes britonis ī ye samyn maner war aduertist exploratouris yair ennimes war cumand yame sic pissance yat thay mycht resistit bot thā thay begā cur wary thaym gaif thaym counsall fecht aganis sa pyssant ennymes dāmage yair cōmon weil ȝit saif yame fra mair displesour thay send othir ambassatouris ye cōfiderat kyngis desyryng peace afore becaus yai culd purches na peace bot gif thay war randerit wiffis childrin guddꝭ throw extreme ire ta syde disperation ye tothir syde yai maid yame ane consent battal incō tinent blast trumpat baith armyis iunit followit ane maist terribyll bergane britonis delyuerit reuenge thair deith • • de defence yair realm set yair ennymes gret preis mony thaym bure vnto ground ylkane desyring support othir ruschit togidder sa obstinat mynd yt thay semit na thing regard yair deith throw quhilk mony ye scottis pichtis quhilkꝭ faucht ī ye first battal war neir discomfist graham ye • ailȝeant capitane seand freindis extreme dangeir send ane gret cumpany ilis men fra ye carage thair support incontinent ye scottis pichtis war afore woūdit discomfist renewit battal ye britonis ouirset multitude ennymes ruschyng apon thaym sydis disparit victory fled ane mo nocht far fra feild cariage men seyng ye battal discōfist left thair cariage slew thair ennymes heir thair quhare thay war tane ouirset ye mossis battall war slane iiiim scottis britonis xvm prince nobillis britane war sa halely slane battall yt residew brytonis mycht mak na defence yair realme thairfore generall consent thay send thair oratouris victorius kyngis humely desyring peace vnder quhat conditioun thay plesit confiderat kyngis na le mouit sorrowfull chance fallyng britonis ye present calamyte fallyng thaym self cōdiscendit haue peace vnder thir conditionis brytonis tymes cumyng sall ressaue na romane capitane armyis aboue thaym britane sall suffer na • omani gallis saxonis ȝit na ethir pepyll ar ennymes scottis pichtꝭ pa throw thair lā dis thay sall nothir treit peace alliance ȝit make weir aganis ony pepyll cōmand confiderat kyngis thay sall fecht quhē thay ar chargit support scottis pychtis aganis pepyl al ye landis lyand beȝond humber sal remane ꝑpetually vnder ye empire scottis pychtis brytonis pa samyn thair wiffis chyldrin gudis ony tary finaly thay sal pay lxm pundis amang thair weirmen ȝeirly tymes cumyng xxm pundis confiderat kyngis maner tribute securite heirof thay sal geif ane c men oistage wyll confiderat kyngis ilk man na eldar xxx ȝerꝭ na ȝoungar xviii ȝeris gif ony thir pointis war brokyn ye peace dissoluit ye self peace ratif ••• maner ile albion brocht better quiet afore britane tane fra ye empire romani maner maid tributar scottis pichtis iiii clxxxxvi ȝeris efter ye iulius cesar maid first tributar romani quhilk ye vii ȝeir kyng eugenius fra incarnatioun iiiicxxxvi ȝeiris fra empyre brutus first kyng britane ane mvic iii ȝeris fra then britonis began declyne baith thair manheid landis honouris knaw weil hystory haue schawin maximus romane capitane britane octauius dioneth kyngis britane al cumyng saxonis albioun quhilk intend schawe richt discrepant fra croniklis brytonis maid galfrede ȝit thair suld nane haue admiration thairof authouris follow eutropiꝰ paulus diaconꝰ beda ueremundꝰ othir mair recent expert hystoricianis concordis galfrede nouthir narratioun hystorye ȝit dait ȝeris think thairfore mair sowndand verite follow mony prouyn attentyk authouris discriptioun oure historye concurring hystorye romani baith narratioun dait ȝeris follow said galfrede writand ony testimoni othir authouris▪ syngular awin opinioun ☞ mony nobyll clerkis sanctis sindry partis vvarld syndry prodigy meruellis sene albion fy •• akco •• e ca xviii mony nobyl mē war thir day anselmus philippus hilarius amang w wer ī thay day palladius quhylk send celestine pape confound ye heresy pelagius risyn syndry partis albion palladius first byschop bure authorite amang scottis creat ye pape byschoppis afore hym war creat votis allanerlye monkis preistꝭ namyt culdeis palladius purgit ye scottis pichtis mony vane superstitionis ritis gentilis vsit thay dayis thairfore callit ye apostyll scottis deceissit ane town mernꝭ namit fordoun quhare blissit body restis ȝit haldin gret veneration amang ye pepyll banis war laitly translatit ane nobyl man williā scheues archebischop sanct andros put ane syluer cais mony solempne cerimonyis fra ye incarnation god ane miiiiclxxxxiiii ȝeris palladius maid sanct serf bischop send hym orknay instruck rude pepyll thairof ye faith al gaif sacrament baptem teruanus maid hym archebischop pichtis tyme send fra pape celestyne sanct patrik ireland defend ye samyn fra heresy pelagiꝰ throw quhilk crystyn faith began incres ireland albion mony meruellis war sene syndry partis albion afore britonis faucht aganis scottis pichtis mone beand ī opposition quhē maist round apperit suddanly war foure nukit ȝork war mony schouris blude ☞ branchis leuis treis war strokyn thonder wederit mony partis albioun ¶the merkat gait lōdon raif ane huge gaip mony housis besyde sank pepyl preichit thir signis cum dammage ye britonis nochtheles wes mesit ye preistis quhilk cōmandit na credence geuyn sic fantasyis said fynmakcoule sonne coelus scottis mā thir day ane man huge statoure xvii cubitis hycht ane gret huntar rycht terrybyll huge quantite pepyll quhome ar mony vulgar fabyllis amang w nocht vnlyke thir fabyllis ar rehersit kyng arthure becaus dedis nocht authorist autentik authouris wyll rehers na thing thairof bot declare remanent geistis kyng eugenius othir nobyllis ☞ ¶and sa endis heir seuynt buke thir cronyklis heir begynnis aucht buke croniklis scotland ☞¶hovv mony romane prouinces fell pray syndry pepyll hovv syndry realmis began thairthrovv ca primo quhen britane westane maner fra empyre romani maid tributar scottis pychtis uandalis gothis hunnis franche men maid gret slauchter spanȝe affrik italie almany france throw quhilk apperit manifest declinatioun romane empire sindry realmes ye variant chance fortoun succedis franche men quhais begynnyng vncertane come ouir riuer ryne past throw ane gret part gallia▪ quhilk wes eftir callit france thir franchemen eftir yat thay tane orliance paris thay sat doun besyde reueir sane 〈◊〉 thay chesit ueremond king maid first foundemēt y• nobil realme france throw quhilk wes cōmandit landis lyand betuix mouth ryne hillis pirrony deuidyng france fra spanȝe ta syde fra ye montanis sauoy occ •• ne seis tothir side suld callit france yi tyme genferik began realme uādalis affrik wes first kyng rang aboue pepill quhais posterite na better chance end beginnyng thair empire yai began tyranny slauchter innocent pepill siclike thay wer inuadit baith extern weris cyuyll battall fynaly brocht ane myserabyll end visigothis astrogothis ane pepyll borne ꝑdition romani began regne tyme italy spanȝe tyme began hūnis regne pānonia becaus thay grew vnder ane blude auld inhabitantis ye cūtre callit gari ye cuntre callit ungaria mony vthir infinite cumpanyis barbar pepyll went throw warld yat tyme persewand romani malyce throw quhilk hapnit yat na man mycht trauall thay dayis extreme dangeir yair lyfe quhen passingeris war inqirit quhat yai war gif thay answerit thay war freindis ye senat pepyl rome demandaris said thay war ennymes yt caus yai war spulȝeit yair geir lyuis siclike gif yai answerit thay war ennymes romani demandaris wald allege thaym freindis sa thay war spulȝeit slane ye samyn maner sic thyngis maid gallis quhylkis war ye auld inhabitantis france astonist intercommon romani franchemen britonis quhilkis war laitly syttyn bertanȝe knawyng trubyll ye romane weris sufferit na vncouth blude cum within thaym thay knew nocht quhay freindis fayis ¶hovv conanus exhortit britonis recouer thair liberte message send scottis pichtis britonis hovv noblis commonis britane inuadit othir battall ca ii nobyllis brytane brokyn frequent weris seyng na pepyll trubyl held thaym quiete certane ȝeris paying iustly thair trybute victorius confiderat kyngis sa past x ȝeris euir ye britonis began ony rebellioun aganis scottis pichtis mene tyme rais new trubyll kent conanus sonne conanꝰ quhilk slane afore schew conuenit syndry nobyllis brytane secrete messingerꝭ ane counsal within ane wod said maner ȝe se wise freindis pepyll sumtyme sa pissant vailȝeant deidis cheualry haldyn reuerence pepyl maid tributar scottis pichtis infinite calamiteis dayly wrocht w ¶ quhat may allace caus afflictioun nocht bot awin sleuth quhilk haue failȝeit sa far self brokyn gyle maximiane yat maist febyl creaturis he tane ȝok apon nek may sone cōsider far bene degenerit fra curage nobyl eldaris quhilkis sumtyme dang ye scottis albion youcht yi last vnhappy battal strikin w x ȝeris ago aganis scottis pichtis war constranit huge slauchter oure nobyllis seik peace mair necessar yan honest ȝit ye tyrane maximiane put pissance cōualescit ar rissyn britane mony rank forcy ȝoung men reddy al laubour ieoperdes quhais vnbridillit insolence salbe mair noysum w ony cruelte ennymes gif suffer ye samyn dul sleuth haue plente ryches strenth na thing laikis bot curage baith vincus ennymes delyuer w barbar seruitude remēber thairfore vailȝeant campionis ye illuster dedis ȝour eldaris deuoyd ȝow sleuth belt ȝow gud hoip gladnes virtew sic thingis ar ye souerest way bryng ȝour materis gud fyne ȝe may resembyll anciant excellence ȝour ꝓgenitouris sic wyse ye nocht onely ȝour ēnymes bot al othir pepyl may vnderstand ȝe ar mair geuyn virtew glore battall ony feir deith nobyllis britane thir wourdis war drawin sindry opinionis sū thaim furius vult continence desyrit nocht bot battal otheris mair prudent dred gif thay mouit weir yi sort yair sonnis quhilkis lay hoistage suld slane wald nocht consent thairfore battall fynaly quhen thay put day mony altercationis thay seuerit ylk syde ony effect thair purpos nocht lang efter confiderat kyngis wer aduertist thir consultationis maid amang ye britonis begā punis thair plegis syndry afflictionis maid thair ordinance inuade britonis brekaris thair faith promys ȝit afore thay rasit yair army thay send ambassatouris britonis espy myndis thair nobyllis cō monis thir ambassatouris thair cumyng ī britane schew yame send fra victorius confiderat kyngis exhort britonis perseueir band afore thair faith promis prayit thaym geif na credit thaim yt persuadit yame vane reasonis rebellyon aduenture gif thay sa thay laborit mair thair awin dammage proffit attoure thay brocht certane chargis fra confiderat kyngis said britonis certification gif ye samyn war nocht obeyit thay sall inuadit mair awfull battall afore chargis war brytonis sall hald na publik counsal parliament amang thaym tymes cumyng aduyse ye confiderat kyngis thay sal keip auld conditionis peace poyntis afore contrackit thay sal ressaue agane thair auld plegis delyuer doubyl al mony new plegis ye samyn britonis greuit thir importabyll chargis thocht first extreme chā ce battal erar assailȝeit sa schameful conditionis peace obseruit thairfore thay ruschit ane mynd maist cruelte harnes war nocht thair noyis dyn armoure wes haistely mesit ye nobyllis cōmonis brokyn thair purpos wise maid ane lamentabyl regrait amāg thaym self febyll cowarty thair nobillis throw quhilk thair cōmon weil put gret affliction nocht lang efter followit amāg thaym ane mair sorrowfull contention afore cōmonis im ••• cient suffer vncouth seruitude •• schit harnes plane rebellyon thocht distroy ye nobyllis britane becaus thay war degenerit fra virtew thair eldaris thirllit thaym ye empyre barbar pepyll pley fynaly discussit swerd cōmonis rageand maist fury faucht aganis nobyllis mair hatrent ordour cheualry war discomfist incredibyll slauchter cruelte cōmonis nocht dan • bergan sone eft thay ruschit agane tyll harnes faucht aganis thair nobyllis lytyl better fortoun thā afore throw quhilk thair pyssance sa brokyn thay durst remane thair awin housis bot fled thair wyffis chyldrin montanis maid frequent heirschippis noblis last thay war constranit athir sydis haue peace nobillis micht leif industry cōmonis cōmonis ye authorite prudence nobyllis thir cyuyll weris hurt ye realme britane na le dāmage tyranny maximiane afore quhen maid nakit baith weirmen pepyll ¶of syndry afflictionis plagis quhilkis fell britonis thair iniquite corruppit lyfe deith kyng eugenius ca iii followit thir cyuyl battallis gret mortalyte hungir cōtinewit thre ȝeris togidder amang ye britonis followit incredybyl plente wt mair habūdance fouth euir rememberit ony tyme afore throw quhylk rais vncouth lust pomp myscheif amang ye pepyl euery ane thaym geuyn mair tyl riatus surfet glutony yair wambe ony virtew thair eldaris throw quhilk thay become sa vicious sa corruppit life na pepyll gud maneris mycht leif amang thaym nocht onely sanct bede testifijs war ye temporall estait drownit thir vicis bot spretuall estait samyn maner terrybyll pest glutony hurt brytonis mair yair virtew guddis glore army euir dyd ony swerd afore schortly reward glutony thair come thaym sa huge mortalyte quyk skarsly sufficient bury deid youcht thay war maist cruelly punist wyse nothir feir deith p̄sent calamite micht draw thaym fra thair inhansit synne ☞¶and thairfore thair vicis quhylkis thay war drownit sa myserably occasyoun thay war efter conquest saxonis tynt baith thair ryall maieste crown sic displesoure thay micht neuir recouer agane yair anciant honouris quhill brytane sic trubyll scottis pichtis wer gud peace geuand thair attendance efter sa lang weris decore thaym self rich faith honest institutionis gaif thankis god yat causit thaym perseueir gud felicite yair ennymes sic displeseir iust punytioun thair demeritis thay micht nothir defend thaym self inuade thair nychtbouris thairfore traistit landis betuix humber franche seis cum haistely vnder thair perpetuall dominioun kyng eugenius hauand na weris ennymes maner brocht realme mair honour thā euer afore deceissit ye xxx ȝeir regne quhilk fourt ȝeir leo empriour fra incarnatioun iiiiclxi ¶of king dongard secund orisone maid conanus britonis hovv thay send ambassatouris androenus king bertanȝe support aganis scottis pichtis ca iiii eugeniꝰ deceissit maner ony ayrꝭ body brothir dongard maid kyng dōgard wes nocht far dyfferent fra maneris brothir eugenius richt desyrus peace▪ nocht detestyng weir quhen necessar becaus na occasion weris send prudent men syndry partis realme minister iustice reparit failȝeit castellis strenthis realme quhare thay war ruinus decayit samyn micht reddy aganis quhat sumeuer chā ce mycht fall knawyng weill al realmes pepyll sa thirllit mutabilite fortoun thay mycht nocht perseueir lang tyme quiet attoure becaus peace engeneris ryches rich engenerꝭ insolence▪ insolence geuys occasion battall began haue gret felicite succeding empyre suspition traisting na thing mair surelye battall succeding efter sa lang peace thairfore garnyst ye munitionis bordouris maist weirly ordinance na le dylygence weir war instantly appering sic thyngis done dotat ye kirkis palladius otheris colleigis mony riche lādis rentis sustentation deuyne seruyce cōmandit kirkis sanctuaris realme sicker refuge crimynal personis duryng thair resydence samyn nocht withstandyng quhat sumeuer offence lese maieste committit thaym attoure dotat ye kirkis otheris priuilegis eikit thaym ryall magnificence mair ampyll boundis thay war afore quhill sic thyngis war done scotland ye britonis lamentit thair sorrowfull chance seand thaym self trybutar last pepyll warld sa thirllit seruytude thay nothir durst ȝit mycht resaue strangearis amang thaym ryche thaym sic chance marchandyce thair eldaris afore aboue thir calamyteis thay war punyst thair wickit synne swerd hūger deith efter mony sorrowfull afflictionis thay maid generall processionis al partis thair realme prayit mercyfull god delyuer thaym al trubyl plaigis fallyng yame thair iniquite thay micht recouer thair anciant fame honourꝭ fynaly thir britonis war sa penitēt thay maid yair solempne votis atanis amend thair lyuis desist fra thair synnis delyueryng thaym fra iniure seruitude ennymes conanus quhylk maid ye orisō afore britonis traisting haue oportunite moue ye nobyllis recouer thair honoure liberte said maner wordis said ȝour last counsall mouit ȝour myndis wyse brytonis battall contrar ȝour dispitfull ennymes nocht bene necessar day mak orison ȝe micht nocht onely haue doung ȝour ennymes al boūdis ȝour realm 〈◊〉 al mycht haue baith ȝoure realme extendit ye auld marchis ȝour pepyll dwellyng vnder natyue kyngis britane ony iniuris ennymes ȝe ar brokin swerd hunger pest mony othir calamyteis▪ he gud experiēce quhat myscheif vengeāce sorrow fallis mortal pepyl corruppit lust nocht hauād god institutionis reuerence ȝour pissance tymes bygane mair ampyll strang howbeit ȝoure myndis war nocht geuyn deid schew regard quhat precius treasoure lyberte ȝit quhat honoure recouer ȝour realme bot aduer • fortoun ȝe mair prudent he recouerit ȝour curage attempt sic thyngis bene maist expedient ȝour cōmon weill ye desyre ȝour anciant honouris lyberte enforcis ȝou assa •• ȝe ȝour cō moun weill chance fortoun wyll degeistly ponder mater sall knaw oure ennymes incressyng awfull ylk day mair repugnant weil se yairfore na thing may seme w le ouirpas dayis miserabyll sleuth quhilk ye end nocht bot schame sen reason ar geuyn riatus vicius leuyng quhilk al vengeance sproutes displesour mā lat w returne god fontane mercy grace pray hym put ane end afflictioun wraith realmes failȝeis sa fauour mercy pepyl conualescis quhen thay ar penytent ¶and sen haue sufferit gret punytyoun iustlye deseruit iniquite lat w haue sicker confydence god pardoun offencis mercy changeand drery life better fortoun tyme sall wyrk thingis weil gyf mei ire god repellis nane seikis hym quhat euir sufferit ony aduersyte forton fechtand iust battall bot gyf cum throw folye thairfore gif worthy callit posterite thay vailȝeant campionis quhylkis vincust sa oft scottis pychtis lat w assailȝe may best recouer landis reuenge cruelteis done sa mony ȝerꝭ w sycker confidence vyctory sen fortoun changit oure curage oure ennymes dullyt lang sleuth maist ar fecht iust battall aganis oure peruerst ennymes ☞ orison conanus mouit sa pepyl thay run haistely harnes wer nocht syndry prudent men schew euydent sygnes thay war nocht sic pyssance tyme thay may withstand thair ennymes without thay support othir cuntreis thus cōcludit send ambassatouris androene kyng bertanȝe quhilk bot fourt persoun fra conane first kyng ye blude▪ schaw hym intollerabil iniuris done thaym scottis pychtis desyre support aganis thaym recouer thair landis nocht lang efter conanus guytellyne byschop london wer send ambassatourꝭ androene king bertanȝe support britonis aganis confiderat pepyll ¶of deith conanus▪ orison maid guytellyne king bertanȝe hovv constantyne son vvas send vvith ane army britane maid kyng thairof ca v quhen conanus guytellyne war departit maner pa king bertanȝe conanus corruppit ayre seis fell ane feuer deceissit betuix britane bertanȝe guytellyne rycht sorrowfull deith arryuit ī bertanȝe burijt hym funerall triumphe syne past resydew cumpany kyng androene bertanȝe said hym maner wer caus cumyng quhat vnknawin maist inuincibyll prynce bene necessar begin orison ane othir maner yt mycht ye samyn haue drawin mair fauoure compassion trubyll bot sen knaw sic thyngis ar rycht patent afore thy sycht wyll declare effect message schort wordis scottis pichtis maist cruell pepyl erd quhen thay knew w nakit weirmen romane soudiouris inuadit w realme sic cruelteis swerd fyre thay put w boundis lyand betuix ye wal abircorne tyne ȝit nocht saciat thir attemptatis▪ thay brak downe ye wal adryane come sic rageand fury aganis pepyll yat thay semyt subdew brytane thair dominion fynaly thay subdewit samyn without recouir gif yai possedit sufficient nowmer pepyl al weil inhabit land cō ques samyn quhen pepyll war brokyn thir mony othir skaithis couth fynd na support romani thay concludit erar ieoperde thaym self maist dāgeir thā dayly leif sic displeseir sone efter forcy vnabasit cā pionis thay come aganis thair ēnymes delyuerit mynd othir delyuer thaym sic insufferabyll displesouris atanis de efter syndry chancis battall war fynaly vincust strangest capitanis tane elli slane▪ ennymes efter vyctory mair insolent thā afore desyryng na le deuore blude conques realme wrocht w ylk day mair dispitfull cruelteis quhyll last war sa brokyn oure substance strenth war constranit haue peace thaym mair necessar proffitabyl cōstranit ye samyn gif ye noblis sonnis realme plege obseruyng al pointis efter tenour ye peace yame contrackit last pepil thirllit ilk day wt new intollerable opp̄ssion war penitēt yir cōditionis peace succedīg apperit euersion thair common weill throw quhilk rais ane odius contention betuix nobillis commonis quhilk nocht endit huge murdir sydis efter slauchter followit gret derth pouerte amang w bot succedit plente ye moder insolence quhilk mair scaithfull w ye hunger afore precedent throw huge plente generit ane terribyll pest greter mortalyte pepyll euir remembrit afore britane ȝit thir calamyteis trubyll put nocht w sic afflictioun furius cruelte scottis pichtis quhome new extorsionis dayly deuysit w new plegis commandit geuyn new tribute sa surfetly tane guddis ar confiscat 〈◊〉 bodyis pynit ¶and schortly fynd na securite lyfe quhare ennymes he dominioun thir greuous intollerabyl displesouris na le sorrowfull inuyncybyll prince w may nocht schawin indignatioun fynaly war sa brokin thairwith war constranit knaw god seyng iust punition war fallyn sa mony calamyteis oure wekit offence thus determit delyuerit mynd sa far may done ingyne man amend offencis haue done baith god man traistyng fra haue pecifyit ire god yt euery thing sall succede desyre thir motiuis maist inuyncibil prīce haue tane purpos delyuer w seruytude recouer realme honouris ȝit becaus ar brokyn sa mony ȝeris pyssance strenth may attempt sic materis▪ cūmyn thairfore humly praying haue compassioun sorrowfull chance fallyng w thy progenitou • is▪ quhilkis ar put sic punytioun may make na defence aganis oure vndantit fais le thā thow support w thir thy vailȝeant pepyll quhilkꝭ beand grātit sal delyuer w schortly dishonour fallyng w thir syndry ȝeris awin defalt nane bot thow dar oppone thaym aganis cruelteis scottis pychtis understand heirfore thow sall nocht defend vncouth housis bot onely felicite thy awin realme quhais crown natyue youcht empyre brytonis sumtyme deuydit two realmes britane bertanȝe remanis nane lyue sa neir blude thow succede thaym baith contempne nocht occasion sa plesandly offerit support mater pertenis na le thy self w thow may regne haue empire baith realmes gud felicite kyng androene answerit na le sorrowful calamyteis fallyng ye britonis hym self nochtheles chance warld sa mortall pepyll ar oftymes deieckit fra hie felicite ī supreme misery fra supreme misirie exaltit agane maist prosperite nature he subd •• men sic lawis thair estait nocht mortal sumtyme he experience gud fortoun sumtyme euyll forthir thocht britonis war worthy louit becaus thay na le curage thair aduersite thā fortoun respōdent yair desir • cummyng britane schew hym sa agit yt mycht nocht sustene ye charge weris nochtheles suld send sonne constantine ane ȝoung vailȝeant prince power yat mycht prouide britane support thaym aganis scottis pychtis quhen promittit support causit bischop gwytelline pa town redone mak residence quhill army wer reddy pa hym incontinent king androene cōmandit schippis land cum ane p̄fixit day ye port sanct maclouius thair patronis marineris thair best auyse al sone thyngis wer dewlie prouidit cōstantine pullit vp salis finali • arriuit britane quhair wes ressauit wt incredible triumphe ioy pepill traistit gret manheid prudence recouer thair realme liberte nocht lang eftir ane counsall wes maid nobillis britane quhilk constantyne wes maid kyng sworn fecht ye cōmon weil realme deith ☞ hovv dongard kyng scottis come vvith gret povver aganis constantyne king britonis orison army hovv vvas slane britonis discomfist ca vi constantyne king britonis sone eftir coronatioun cō mandit generall edict sensabil ꝑsonis cōuene ye xl day eftir hūber prouidit thair best auyse obey ye cōmand yair capitane pepill sic ardent desyre recouer thair liberte wes absent prefixit day al inflammit • ni sic curage strenth pissance thay semit alluterly distroy scottis al sone kyng dongard wes aduertist rebellioun britonis cōmandit thair pledgis slane maist deligence assemblit ane army boundis vnder hꝭ empire come ȝork quhair spreit na thyng affrayit abaid cumyng britonis ¶on morrow knawyng spyis ennymes wer within foure mylis rasit tentis come haistelie ennymes sycht quhilkis wer liand nocht far fra montanis humber nixt morrow dongard went ane hie mote said armye followis ☞ suld na admiration ȝow gud cōpanȝeonis youcht britonis haue left ye feildis quhair thay suld haue fouchtin fled ye montanis humber thay bene sa febill ingyne nature yat howbeit thai mak gret bost mannassyng thay wer maist vailȝeant aganis thair ennymes ȝit thair spreit curage sone dekeyis quhen thay se thair ennymes sycht dantit thaym afore ȝe haue experience facill britonis bene moue new trubill full wyndis vane behechtis ȝe knaw soft thay ar execute thair interprisis thay come w yi last day schynand armour wappynnis desyring battall thay wer haistelie inuaid w criand frequent vocis quhen sall oure ennymes cum quhare ar thay fled quhare ar thay hyde bot ar dent desyre battall forȝet thay ar fled montanis discomfist onlie sycht nochtheles gyf thay retourn gyf ȝow battal traist nocht bot sicker victorie ȝe ar fecht aganis fals treasonabil pepil brekaris thair faith band youcht thair pissance sum part ekit ȝit thair curage na mair ereckit afore beleif ȝe constantyne quhylk brocht ane vncouth realme maid kyng brytonis may quickin curage spreit thaym ar geuyn onely bordellis sensualiteis surfet nurysyng thair wambe accustomat afore ye iunyng battallis fle beleif ȝe yt yat may resist ȝow quhom thay haue found sa oft victorious traist fermely gud companȝeonis houndis ar nocht sa dreidfull haris wolffis ye schip ȝour visage thaym noc • • asit thir arrowis dartis • anȝcis othir munitionis ȝ • se thair army becaus ye samyn may nocht vsit strenth body craft ingyne quhylk nocht amang fayis sen ennymes bene febyl effeminat ꝑsonis sic ordinance salbe mair impediment thaym proffit quhen thay fle le haistely cassyn fra thaym nochtheles beseik ȝow haif na le sicht materis pertenand ȝou • ennymes ȝour self gif ȝe intend fecht pa nocht fra disciplyne cheualry gyf ȝe happin follow chace ennymes war yat ȝe follow array ordoure aduenture gif ȝe stragill fra ȝour fallowis ȝe fall pray ȝour vincust ennymes gret dishonour schame pa forthwart lusty gallandis assailȝe gif brytonis decide richt battall swerd pa forth wart trew knychtis quhome dekeyit neuir manheid wysdome pyssance ¶and knaw well ye sal condingly reward nobyll vailȝeant men maist rich punis febyll cowartis torment schame skarsly thꝭ orison endit quhē britonis war sene descend arrayit battall planis ¶than dongard gret curage spre •• arrayit army commandit na prisoneris spulȝeis tane quhyll feild war clerely discomfist maist desyrit na gentyll mā suffer hym self tane cowartly prisoneir continent baith armyis iunit huge noyis clamoure confiderat pepyl assailȝeit thair ennymes sic cruelte yat thay put baith ye wyngis flycht bot myddylward maid resistence quhare kyng constantyne faucht maist vailȝeantlye prolongit battall kyng dongard ernystly beheld euery part quhare king constantyne faucht fynalye enkendlit hye curage sum notabyll vassalage richt desyrus sla kyng constantyne fury accumpanyit ane nowmer chosyn men ruschit fersly amang thickest preis britonis quhare fecht na le manheid cruelte deith falt support borne ground dynt speris slane becaus wald nocht tane mony scottis astonist suddane slauchter kyng tuke ye flycht otheris affrayit bot mair feirs rasit reuenge slauchter perseuerit contyne wall battall deith pychtis maner faucht gret manheid curage end battall ȝit vyctory vncertane quhill mydday ye britonis wer discomfist put bak ☞ vnhappy battall wer slane britonis xvim scottis pychtis xiiiim kyng dongard wes slane fyft ȝeir regne ye viii ȝeir leo emprioure fra incarnation iiiiclxv ȝeris ☞hovv cōstantine first thrid brothir eugenius vvas maid kyng scottis vnhappy lyfe tyrāny hovv constantyne kyng britonis vvas slane gile pichtis ca vii scottis pichtis wer sa brokin sorrowfull victorie thay micht nocht follow lang chace britonis returnyt hame ye body king dongard buryit funerall triumphe colmekill sone eftir ane conuention wes maid constantyne brodir doungard maid kyng sonnis kyng dongard wer tender age thay mycht nocht immediatlye succeid crown constantyne wes rycht discrepant fra ye maneris virtew brodir wes borne sensual pleseir yan ony gouernance ane realm wes ane rauisar virginis fulȝear matronis gret nurisar fauorar detractourꝭ wes ay trist sorowfull amang nobillis come bot sendyll thair cumpanyis contrar reiosit schew hym triumphant prince amang fydlaris sangstaris siclyk men vile reputation youcht wes lik cōstantyne kyng britonis name ȝit far discordāt fra hym ī manerꝭ constātine king britonis na le religioꝰ ciuyll gouernance recouerit realme britonis decorit notable maneris bot constantyne kyng scottis wes sa degenerat ignobill thyng semand ane kyng quhen nobillis desyrit hym reuenge slauchter kyng dongard brodir said knew weill eneuch quhat wes done cōcerning publik administratioun nedit na ingyne bot awin beir chargis realme finaly gouernance maid folie patent gaue peace britonis small tretie ony consultatioun nobillis remittit nocht onlie tribute britonis bot randerit thaym sindry strenthis bordouris wes sindry thingꝭ importable thair cōmoun weill wer nocht nobillis withstude insolence tyme last quhen mater wes brocht sic poynt nocht apperit bot rebellioun aganis hym al partis dougall galloway ane man gret auctorite schew mony reasonis quhat infinite trubill wer appering cuntre gif wer inuadit domistik ciuill weris yan speciallye sen britonis he laitlie recouerit thair realme rysyng ilk day pissance hauyng ane ȝong prince richt fers desyrus glore reddy quhen saw occasion inuaid ye scottis pychtis battall atour britonis kepit neuir gud peace thair nychtbouris bot quhen thai dred thaym maist al pychtis wer ane pepill full slychtis inclinand ay quhair thay beleuit victorie follow bot cōstantyne kyng scottis wes bot ane effeminat glutoun luffit na mā virtew honeste bot onlye thaym wer geuyn yair sēsualite lust wambe thus apperit nothir abill priuat publik administratioun thairfore ye ire seditioun yt wes amang thaym wes first mesit abid ane ganād tyme euery thyng may done wisdome ¶the pepill obeyit thir persuasionis dougall howbeit mony yame wer variant thair opinioun rycht cōmouit realme wes sa mony ȝeris misgydit wickit tyrane pychtis seyng ye kyng scottis drownit vice maner ony signe virtew apperyng dred britonis suld incres thairthrow fers insolent inuaid thaym reuenge auld iniuris thairfore said pichtis tuke purpos thyng slycht thay mycht nocht • e force instruckit certane men quietlie sla constantyne kyng britonis men wer subornat effect come britane wer haldyn natiue pepill thairof last thay come ye kingꝭ court quhair thay vane assentationis subtell behauyngis gat sic familiarite kyng thay purchest credence sindry maist graue materis last watād thair tyme quhen kyng wes quiet thay come hym sum hie besynes wer done slew hym suspeck na thyng le thair treason kyngis gard herand rūmissyng granis ane deand man ruschit haistely ye chalmer quhair thay fand ye kyng slane bullerand blude nochtwithstandyng brym furie thay followit sa fast thir pichtis thay wer baith ta • kin cruelly put deid slauchter constantyne kyng britonis happinnit xv ȝeir constantyne kyng scottis quhilk lityl better fortoun othir constantyne kyng britonis wes slane ane gentil man ilis defowlyng douchter eftir yat gouernit scotland vnworthely xvii ȝeris ☞¶of kyng congallus administration hovv monk constā tiu vvas maid kyng britonis hovv vortigern slauchter said constantius tuke crovvn britane ca viii constantyne king scottis slane yi maner nepote congallus sonne king dongard wes maid king yi congallus wes man hie ingyne al abill weir peace ȝit ī ye beginnyng regne schew hym geuin halelye peace maid hym repare thyngis done necligence constantyne eme sū gaif hym counsal reuenge ye slauchter fadir dongard nochttheles becaus wes bot ane ȝoung prince nocht stabillit empyre supersedit sic hie materis quhill ane tyme ganād occurrit finalie sic iustice throw al ꝑtis realme ye wes brocht gud tranquillite peace quhill congallꝰ wes geuin werkis iustice wyse uortigern ane man gret slycht autorite amang britonis tuk purpos conques crown bring purpos effect tuke constantius sonne constantyne kyng britonis afore rehersit relygyon quhare profest monk efter fader fand hym vnabyll regne assistence syndry gret princis brytane uortigern maid constantius kyng britane slycht ꝓcedit auarice uortigern traistyng becaus monk na experience warld mycht haue gouernance ye realme cōques gret rich vnder empyre efter yat enrichit guddis distroy said constantius vsurpe crown britane ȝit couir slicht war geuyn allutterly common weill maid peace scottis pichtis causit ane hundreth scottis pichtis come london remane ane gard cōstantius haue body keping last quhen uortigern gaderit gret treasouris vnder empire constantiꝰ thocht tyme conuenient tak crown quietly seducit ane certane scottis pichtis gret soumes money sla ye king promyttit gif thay brocht mater effect reward thaym condingly thair laubouris scottis pichtis blyndit auarice geuand ouir haistely credence slew fynaly kyng constantius al sone uortigern knew kyng slane far abydyng end mater ruschit fersly secret chalmer quhare kyng lyand deid baith ī blude incontynent tuk slay aris kyng slew thaym haistely thay suld nocht schaw perswadit thaym sla kyng incontinent began lament kyngis slauchter na thyng war sa displesand hym kyngis deith deith mony infinit harmys sall haistely follow dammage commoun weill ¶incontinent uortigern socht resydew scottis pichtis partis town howbeit thay war innocent treason gart haue thaim strang presoun syne maid hym burye kyng ¶on morow come freindis fauouraris quhylkis war corruppit money stretis quhare mais • confluence pepyll complanit treasoun scottis pichtis quhilkis slew king committit thair kepyng maid ye realm sa far ī yan • e ane heid purpos apperit othir deuide britonis amang thaym self elli make al landꝭ vnder thair empyre falt ane kyng patent iniure ennymes heirfore gif odius cruelte war nocht condinglye punist mai • displesouris sall follow haistely gyf mair may euersion thair cō moun weill necessar war thairfore punis remanent scottis pichtis thay war na le criminall principall personis yat tane hym hait blud put deith quhen mouit pepil maist cruelte aganis thir innocent men tuk thaym pryson quhare thay war put thaym deith ¶this punytioun maid scottis pichtis causit uortigern haldin amāg ygnorant pepyl fader defendoure thair realme ¶nochtheles couer dissait h • desyret thaym haue respect thair commoun weill ☞and suffer nocht ambrosius sonne kyng cōstantyne regne saying yocht richtuous ayre crown brytane ȝit sa febyll tender age infinite harmys sall follow realme ye empyre non age last quhen thay cōcludit ye ambrose sall maid king vortigern demādit yame quhō thay wald make kyng incontinent pepyll huge noyis clamour declarit hym king al sone uortigern maid kyng wyse stuffit al ye castellis strenthis london gret munitionis weirmen syne cō mandit ane certane familiarꝭ freindꝭ quhome promouit afore rich honourꝭ wait hym • nd incontinent set hym sla y• freindis lynage kyng constā tyne sum thaym vane causis banist otheris cōfiscat thair guddis▪ punist thair bodyis ye deith ¶hovv ambrose vter sonnis kyng constantyne fled bertan • e hovv gvvytell prince vvalis vvas slane scotti • army discomf • st ca ix throw feir thir cruelteis ambrose uter sonnes kyng constantyne come walis quhare thay war kepit vnder wyse p̄ ceptouris fled bertanȝe mene tyme scottis pichtis war aduertist ye schamefull murdir yair freindis maid lō treason kyng uortigern impacient thairfore suffer iniure thay enterit haistely ane army brytonis landis inuadit samyn gret cruelte fyre swerde brytonis opprest thir afflictionis disparit support nocht power resist left thyngis behynd thaym mycht nocht tursit fled within ye cuntre uortigern herand thir cruelteis done pepyl knawyng gret hatrent nobyllis brytonis bure aganis hym persute aganis sonnis constantyne began nature ane tyrane haue ylk mā dredour becaus durst nocht ieoperde hym self battall send gwytell prynce walis ane army reuenge ye iniuris done scottis pychtis gwytell dreidand rewyne brytane gif scottis pichtis war nocht haistely repressit went forthwart wt army conuoyit samyn landis britane quhare ye scottis pychtis war gaderit array inuadyng cuntre syndry incursyonis incontinent displayit baner set sa haistely thaym thay war put flycht vc thaym tane quhame gart iustefy theuis confiderat kyngis mouit thir iniuris come ane new army maid britonis richt astonist nochtheles gwitel exhortit thaym battal saying scottis pichtis war ane pepyll mair accustumat reiffis slauchter wiffis harnis ony marcial dedis gettis na victory bot febyl myserabyll creatouris brytonis inflāmit gret curage thir wordis went forthwart set yair tentis beside ye tentꝭ yair ēnymes followit thā frequent skarmyssing sumtymes syngular battallis betuix vailȝeant men last baith armyis impatiēt sustene athir iniurꝭ ruschit fersly togidder faucht lang tyme vncertane victory quhyl last ye middilward quhare cōgallus faucht neir discomfist gallanus kyng pichtis faucht rycht wyng seand cōfiderat brothir sic dā geir come ane cumpany chosyn men maid ye britonis faucht fornens cōgallus richt astonyst scottis youcht thay war neir vincust afore fra thai war supportit maner ruschit new curage thair ennymes fynalye put baith wyngis britonis flycht al sone pychtis saw victory inclyne scottis thay tuke haistely tentis brytonis suld na rescours thaym efter ¶thus war brytonis slane ony refuge partis quhare thay fled war fynalye randerit scottis pychtis confiderat kyngis gaue spulȝeis presoneris conquest tyme frelye amang thair army becaus thay faucht sa vailȝeant lye day sic thyngis done confiderat kyngis went forthwart thair victorious army take remanent strenthis bordouris ¶in battal war slane twenty thousand brytonis gwytell prynce walis mony othir nobyll men britane bot scottis pychtis war skarsly iiii thousand slane ¶hovv vortigern send ambassatourꝭ almany fe vvageouris support hovv hengest orsus come britane vvith x thousand saxonis thair cruelteis vassalage done aganis pychtis ca x▪ brytonis efter present discomfitour conuenit quhare vortigern wes london aduise quhat craft ingyne dangerus battal led aganꝭ yair cruel ennymes efter lang consultation becaus na sicker way couth deuisit delyuer pepyl fra extreme dangeir appering kyng uortigern nakit counsall hauand sa mony scharp aduersarys baith hame feild tuk purpos depart britane sum vncouth realme nochtheles freindis thocht vnworthy yat suld pa fra hi • souerane dignite hauand ȝit na experiēce aduersite ane myrrour derision ēnymes best thairfore thay allegit assailȝe vter fyne materis mair honest hym vincust iust defence victorius wrangus action youcht vincust one battall ȝit na disperatioun suld follow thair rich gold sufficient brytane nocht dant thair ennymes chance battall bot al ding thaym albion quhare mycht thair sa plesand sa cōmodius sicht yair cōmon weil se ye cruel saxonis scottis pichtis fechtand distroyand othir liberte allanerly brytane nane othir way mycht cruelte thair ennymes best dantit uortigern apprisit counsall send ambassatouris money almany fe wageouris defend realme aganis ye scottis pichtis amang saxonis two brethir namyt hengist orsus dyscending anciant blude region richt vailȝeant dedis armis desyrus na thyng mair glore honouris thir two brethir herand desyris ambassatouris tuke wageis come britane x thousand weil exerrit vailȝeant men thir saxonis war mair plesandly ressauit uortigern baith self realme approchyng sa hie dangeir last quhen rewardit thaym money ryches causit cōmonis remane thair tentis nobillis remane nixt townis quhyll thay war refreschit thair trauell walkyng ye seis belyue two armyis war prouydit ane saxonis ane othir britonis come forthwart sic diligence yt thay war past humber euer scottis pichtis war aduertist ony cumyng saxonis britane scottis pichtis yat dwelt tyme britonis landis war suddanly affrayit cumyng saxonis becaus thay war nocht power resist sa huge army ane certane yame saif fit thaym self flycht remanēt fel pray thair ennymes sa • oni traistyng al thingꝭ ye better succeid gyf thay gat ye first blude slew prisoneris tane thaym tyme ony miseration estait age nocht content murdir maid scottis pichtis betuix humber tyne thay went mers pentland inuadit pepyll thairof gret cruelteis fyre slauchter traisting fra ye pichtis war brocht fynall exterminioun landis pertenand scottis mycht mair esy pray pichtis affrayit thir cruelteis send thair ambassatouris congallus kyng scottis desyring hym cum al power haist resyst thair ennymes quhylkis war nocht gadderit febyl brytonis bot maist cruel saxonis skarsly message maid scottis quhen tythyngis come brytonis saxonis arrayit battal war cumyn ī pentland puttand pepyl partis quhare thay cum heirschip slauchter kyng pichtis impacient suffir thir iniuris assemblyt pepyll maist diligence met ennymes aduyse scottis hengist gouernour army vnder uortigern arrayit ye samyn sic maner inuadit ye pichtis iii battallis ani ¶thus war pichtis sa ouirset multitude ennymes yat thai war put flicht day maid ye saxonis mair reiosit thā britonis hengist beheld britonis fechtand day mair febilly thā ony othir pepyll ye caus tuke ferme purpos conques thair realme efter scottis pichtis war doung boundis brytane ☞ secund message send pichtis scottis hovv scottis pichtis faucht aganis ye saxonis britonis vvar discomfist▪ ca xi pichtis brokyn maner send thair secund message cōgallus desyryng haisty support aganis ye saxonis quhen thir ambassatouris schawin congallus cruelteis done saxonis britonis thay desyrit hym nobillis suffer nocht pichtis thair auld confiderat freindis distroyit thair cruell vnmercifull ennymes aduenture thay brynt sone eftir flā mys quhilk ye pychtis ar presentlie consumyt congallus mouit cōmiseratioun ye trubil fallyng confiderat freinds pychtis seand truble le wer resistit approching haistelie scottis cōmandit fensabill men within realme meit hym south part wod calidon xx day eftir twa monethis vittallis vnder pane deith edict gaderit xlm men strang weil armyt deuise come sone eftir ennymes sycht hauand hym confiderat freindis ye pychtis al sone army saw yair ennymes nowmer ordinance euir thay saw afore thay fled sindry partis eschew present dangeir confiderat kyngis send incontinent thair capitanis tak ye flearis quhilkis wer apprehendit put deith iebattis exempill otheris thair fleyng thir punitionis dredour fleyng scottis army wes set asyde al sone hengist saw confiderat kyngis sycht exhortit army fecht saying speciall fauour goddis wes arrayit fornens thaym pepill quhilkis wer sa lang ꝑpetual ennymes britane quhair throw thay mycht haue sufficient occasion reuenge auld iniuris conques baith thair rich landis thair pleseir na peril wes dred materis behuuit succeid gret felicite becaus yai wer fecht thair gud actioun aganis ane fals wrangus peple famous theiffis reuaris inuasouris vncouth realmes ye victory sa far ony cognosance lang experience battall thair fayis suld nocht fail gif bakkis al sone thay feill preis violence saxonis britonis ye victorie thairfore mon quhair goddis he ordant hengist thir wourdis inflammyt ye myndis saxonis gret rage cruelte aganis thair ennymes britonis ereckit curage exemple saxonis desyrit battall tothir syde confiderat kyngis ceissit nocht mony plesand persuasionis exhort thair folkis battall sone eftir baith ye armyis iunyt quhen suddanlie come thaim frequent schouris arrowis ganȝeis schot euery side incōtinēt thay ruschit togiddir scharp swerdis speris byllis maist hatrent bot ȝit na party semyt haue victorie quhill last britonis ye faucht ye rycht wyng aganis ye scottis wer put flycht suddanlye come ane huge schoure haill obscurit air sic terrible cloud mirknes bene nycht throw quhilk baith ye armyis wer sa astonyst yat yai knew nocht quhedir wes best fle follow hengist astonist vncouth wounder gaderit folkis sound trumpat standart schoure • ceissit quhen scottis pichtis traisting yair ennymes vincust fell chace britonis array maid slauchter spulȝe thair maist furie hengist seand britonis vincust cōfiderat pepill geum spulȝe slauchter 〈2 page missing〉 rum togiddir array confiderat kyngis put remeid thir impedimentis curage spreit yair army suld dekay lang tary cōmandit ilk man wyn al mony scherettis ground mycht beir mak ane gait throw mo assailȝe thair ennymes sic thyngis done confiderat kyngis rasit thair tentis maid thaym reddy battall aganis nixt morow beleuing yat micht nocht inuaid tentis ennymes extreme dangeir thay come throw mo ane quiet gait ane hill stude aboue yair ennymes sum thaym stude ye face hill yat thay micht cast doun cragis stanis amang oist futmen strenth hyl gaif gret curage folkis assail • e sic thyngis thay beleuit mycht 〈◊〉 array thair ennymes • ast seyng saxonis britonis wald nothir ische fra thair tentis ȝit gyf signe battall iune thay deuisit ane new vncouth slycht astonis yair ennymes ye nycht following thay brocht ane huge multitude • face hyll fornentis thair ennymes becaus yi haddir nature dry takꝭ sone fyre yai maid sindry faggottis thairof eftir yat thay put thaym fyre thay slang thaym ouir hill incontinent thir faggottis wer dreuin preis wyndis amang ye tentis ennymes quhilkis gret terrour wer effrayit stra stikkis quhare thay lay tuke fyre brint infinit pepill thair army thā rais ane huge nois clamour sum dredyng ye hid watcheing ennymes ran haistely defend ye trinchis yair tētis otheris maid yame slok ye flāmis ay incressyng preis wyndis finalie faggottis fell sa fast heuin blesand togiddir flāmis na man wist quha • wes done throw rei • men beistꝭ quhilkis ane gret multitude wes thair tentis throw feir lowe smouk vnder nycht capitanis wes sa trubillit thay concludit erar assailȝe thair ennymes extreme ieoperdyis battall cowartly brynt ye deith incontinent thay ischit fra yair tentis past arrayit battall planys hengist seyng folkꝭ mycht nocht weil haldin within thair tentis gaderit saxonis sound trūpat standart abaid cumyng day scottis pychtis traistyng thair ennymes brokin effray left ye strenth quhair thay stude come arrayit planys reddy gyf battall bot quhen thay fand thair ennymes gud array thay supersedit thair purpos quhill cumyng day morow congallus exhortit folkis consider quhat glore honour bene cōquest virtew forcy dedis thair eldaris desyrit thaym obscure thair recēt sleuth ye fame sa nobill campionis prayit thaym keip honour yat thair eldaris wan think na thyng wes sa schamful gyf backis yair ennymes thirllit ȝok seruitude na thyng wes sa honest othir haue victorie thair eldaris afore elli fecht glore manheid deith hengist maner ceissit persuade army pa forth war • wt hie curage distroy yair ennymes quhilk beād done thay micht reiose residew thair dayis ony dangeir weris skarsly wer yir wordꝭ said quhē baith ye armyis iunit ye first metyng baith ye saxonis britonis bene discōfist wer ane buschemēt iiim fresche men come haistely ane wod quhare thay wer hid hengist yair support thir fresche mē come wt gret noyis clamour ye bakkꝭ scottis thus wer confiderat pepill inuadit euery syde thair gret terrour ȝit ye truble arrais yat euery ane yame wes impedimēt othir ye weilding thair wappinnis followit diuers chancis fortoun ye pichtis souerane manheid put ye britonis ye faucht fornentꝭ yame flicht ꝑseuerit ī sic furious rage chace aganis yame ye mony britonis wer dreuin eschape thair cruelte ī ye nixt riuer quhair thay perist otheris tane ye gait war slane bot ye scottis quhilkꝭ war inuadit thꝰ aithir side saxonis eftir lang ꝑseuerance battall wer finalie vincust slane cōgallus euyl woundit brocht feilde freindis nixt montanis saxonis eftir victory scottis tuk purpos ꝑsew pichtis thay vincust said britonis nochtheles cumyng nicht thay supersedit yair purpos ye morow thir pichtis dreidand inuadit saxonis morow gaderit thair cofferis cartis wanis othir thīgis quhilk mycht weil tursit ye tyme put yame fyre yt fume reik thairof mycht obscure ayre quhill thay war past dangeir sic thyngis done ye pichtis returnit hame ye residew scottis quhilkis wer eschapit feild ¶hovv hengist vvas maid protectour britane hovv brocht son occa vvith xm saxonis resist armyis ambrose vter hovv vortigern come ane bāket vvith hēgist▪ mariit roxena doucht ca xiiii hengist efter syndry chancis victory fallyn last feild began nowmer army fand confiderat pepyl fled iiiim saxonis slane syne returnit ye residew yairof ȝork cōmandit yame reddy resist yair ennymes gif ony new trubyl apperit incontinent returnit london take consultation uortigern noblis quhat done concerning ye weris scottis pichtis tymes cumyng ¶uortigern ressauit hym gret reuerence honoure proclamit hym protectour realme pepyll power auctorite vse al townis strenthis rich thairof pleseir sine cōmandit publict playis maid throw ꝑtis britane general procession geif louyng god excellent victory fallyng hym aboue ennymes entrete hengist mair pleseir gaif hym pepyll lycence make adoratioun ydolis efter maner gentilis ye mene tyme schawin uortigern ambrose uter ye sonnis kyng constantine war makand gret puruiāce bartanȝe recouer ye crown britane thir tithingis maid uortigern affrayit ane ꝓphecy suld slane ambrose nochtheles inquirit hengist quhat ingine power micht best resist army ambrose hengist glad trubyl promyttit tyll resist army ambrose uter gif wald suffer ye saxonis quhilkis dwelt ȝork schire cū see camp fornens france castellis strenthis cuntre deliuerit folkis mycht mair esaly resist ambrose uter quhen thay landit al sone thir petitionis war grantit hengist desyryng na thing mair haue ye britonis vterly distroyit yair realme mycht fall pray hym saxonis instruckit ane man almany bene ane britone cum uortigern dissimilit wordis saying laitly cumyn fra pētland quhare saw na thyng bot knychtis schynyng armour trumpattis soundyng gold •• stremaris reflirand aganis 〈◊〉 schortly pepyll regioun reddy maist weirly sort cum haistely britonis almane subornat wise said hēgist thair ane c ȝoung vailȝeant men scottis sworne ane mynd distroy na sicht yair lyuis sa thay mycht bring thair purpos effect thay held hym pyllar britonis syndry thir personis wer cumyn ye tyme london execute thair myndis thairfore na place mycht souir hym bot quhē beleuit leist sum thir men sworne effect foresaid sal wair yair lyuis hym yocht eschape ane force abyde chance residew becaus scottis pichtis traistis quhen slane delyuerit trubyll uortigern astonist fenȝeit slycht demandit hengist quhat done hengist apperit richt effrayit maner nochtheles syndry saxonis quhilkis war instruckit ye said hengist prayit uortigern gud comfort youcht war inuadit euery syde ennymes suld souir saxonis defend hym al weris ye confiderat pepill quhilkis he prouyn ye chance battall fechtand vnhappely aganis w sal neuir attīpt ane thing mair thair dāmage thā inuaid thy pepyll iniuris prouoke w agane battall gif ambrose uter come beleuit huge pepyll south partis realme siclike confiderat pepyll intendis north partis thairof sal occa ye sonne hengist quhilk ane vailȝeant knycht exercit cheualry sen first ȝouth cū ane new band saxonis throw quhilk thow salbe souir fra inuasion may follow thy realme occa sall resist scottis pichtis north orsus ye army cumyng ambrose bertanȝe hengist sall remane ay thy self keip thy body fra treason britonis gif ony yame fauour ambrose wald pretend ony rebellioun aganis thy auctorite quhilk way thow sall haue mery dayis ony feir ennymes uortigern knawīg na othir way apperand dant ennymes partis becaus mony noblis britane haitit maneris maid gret instance hēgist send sonne occa cum haistely britane ane band saxonis resist ennymes hengist wirk purpos dissimilit mynd slicht maid hym withstand kyngis desyre saying 〈…〉 dāmage haue baith hym self sonne sa far distant fra ye gouernance landis possessi •• nochtheles lang instance • 〈◊〉 othir britonis quhilkis war mair set ye kyngis foly pleseir thā ye cōmon weil condiscendit desyris within dayis efter occa arriuit britane xm saxonis sat northumberland wyffis barnis reddy fecht aganis pepyll lyst inuade thaym hengist knawing cumyng sonne new army saxonis desirit king uortigern cum se wife child frendis quhilkis war reddy al seruice chargis wald command said suld rais army gret curage gif wald ye honoure decore thaym presence uortigern richt glad ye cumyng new band saxonis condiscendit desyris beit mony nobyllis war richt heuy tuke na lytyl suspitioun sa huge nowmer saxonis war cumyn ī britane aganis yair cōmon weill▪ fynaly uortigern come ane certane nobillis towquhā castel quhare plesandly ressauit feistit maner delytis plesouris micht deuysit hengest set hym prolong banket within nycht yt kyng mycht takin ye wynis incōtinent roxena ye douchter hengist scho instruckit went kyng ane coupe ful mychty wyne said drink ye kyng uortigern drank mychtely coupe quhen embrasit hir armis set hir nixt hym self banket efter lang cō monyng fel blind raige lust quhilk thing nocht onely occasion efter adultry bot al tine kingdom incontinent throw birnād flame new lust nothir respect law god ȝit law matrimony afore contrackit lauchfull wife mair delay tuk said roxena wife syne gaif hengist ye landis kent castellis w • munitionis pertenyng thairto sone efter saxonis sat samyn yair wiffis childrin put auld inhabitantis thairof sic thingis done uortigern returnit new quene london repudiat lauchfull wyfe ¶hovv vodyne bischop london vvith mony preistis vvar slane tyranny saxonis hovv hengist maid self kyng kent hovv vortigern vvas depriuit vortimer sonne maid king britane ca xv vodyne byschop london ane mā singular deuotioun life aduyse uortimer went familiarly uortigern schew yat done ane cristin prīce departing fra lauchfull quene takand ane othir womā wife quhais fader hengist duke saxonis baith ennyme cristin faith set delyuerit mynd conques crown britane said sen sa done suld sone haue experience quhat dāmage suld follow pepill nocht onely euersion ye cristin faith britane bot al translation nobyll realm britane quhilk brocht hail vnbrokī vnder mony nobil prī ci day ī ane vncouth blud said uortigern haue failȝeit nocht prudent quhē brocht saxonis first brytane support aganis ennymes first begynnyng foly bot semit mair imprudent quhē tane immoderat lust doucht roxena knaw weill end empire salbe terribyll bot gif offence mair haistely reparit god yairfore sa far may sall put remeid thairto hengist heirand ye sound lamentabyll regrait come sectet chalmer quhare repreuit hym quhy maid sa heuy cheir tyme mariage persuasioun ane prophane man fenȝeit lyfe incontinent slew haly man uodyne mony othir preistis relligious ꝑsonis hym tyme▪ attempt ane thing audacite seirchit uortimer ye deith uortimer knawyng euyl mynd aganis hym fled quhare thocht expedient ye mene tyme hengest send secrete writingis sonne occa cōmandyng hym abstene fra ony forther iniuris scottis pichtis suffer thaym peciably reiose landis beȝond tyne prouiding always yt strenthis betuix tyne humber weill garnist mē vitallis forthir cōmandit hym seik sum occasion quhare throw micht sla al noblis ye cuntre quhare haue sic respect ye cōmon weill saxonis ye britane micht cū sumtyme vnder yair empyre occa knawing ye mind fader tuk first ȝork mony othir strenthis munitionis ye cuntre fader deuysit slew mony noblis baron fenȝeit causis quhen accusit uortigern quhy dyd sic cruelteis noblis answerit instruckit fader yt thir noblis quhilkis hym war slane wer ennymes ye king becaus saxonis mair reuerence thā britonis yir noblis intendit haue rāderit ȝork mony othir gret strenthis munitionis brytane scottis pichtis wer put remeid mair haistely yairto al boūdis britane geuyn keping suld haue bene gouernit prudently gif ye samyn bene purgit fra inuasouris thair cō mon weill sic doingis suld cū efter baith ye gret proffet ye king honour realme cruelte saxonis ylk day mair incressing aganis ye britonis maid uortigern na lytyl cōmouit mair yt considerit yame dayly seikand occasion conques realme quhē could find na sicker remeid aganis ye said dangeir began drery contenance deplore mysfortoun sum familiaris gaif hym counsall dant cruelte saxonis quhill mycht pley aduenture britonis brokin yair iniuris war brocht sic calamite yt thay mycht nothir haue sufficient pyssance distroy thair ennymes ȝit defend thair realme kyng uortigern hauand britonis na le suspition thā saxonis becaus odius yame baith supersedit attempt yi gret mater certane dayis ¶in mene tyme ye britonis brokin intollerabyll iniuris sustenit mair cruelteis saxonis euer thay sufferit afore ony othir pepyl ¶and aboue thir skaithis followit othir syndry outtragis mair odius importabyll thaym hengist left kyng uortigern come ye resydew saxonis kent generall edict chargit al britonis pa samyn within ane schort day vnder ye pane deith ¶the day byrun slew baith commonis nobyllis ony fauoure mercy ransoun yat ganestude command al wayis y• saxonis enragit sic inhumane cruelteis yt kirkis sanctuaris kent war suspendit crystyn blude nunnis religious weirmen war tane force thair abbayis constranit mariage pollutioun thair bodyis lordis britane commouit thir sorrowfull iniuris maid ane conuention london quhare thay repreuit uortigern put saxonis secret counsall knawyng thaym bot ane hethyn pepyll leuand efter lawis gentilis nocht brocht brytane beir gouernance realme bot onely sustene weris aganis thair ennymes ¶attoure thay schew vnprudent sa far enrychit ye saxonis landis rentis auctoryte dystructioun realme legis nocht onely repudiat wyfe bot aganis institutionis crystyn fayth maryit ane woman quhylk ryte gentylis fynalye becaus deseruyt haterent god syndry abhomynabyll cruelteis fallyn realme foly necligēce exponyng baith thair pepyll common weil extreme dangeir thay degradit hym auctoryte send hym walis quhare remanit mony ȝeris efter prysoun thay suld nocht without ane heid yai maid sonne uortime • kyng ¶hovv scottis pichtis vvar confiderat vvith kyng vortimer aganis saxonis discomfist occa northū berland hovv hengist occa vvar vincust ī kent doung britane hovv kyng vortimer vvas slane poison ca xvi uortimer maid king thꝭ maner thocht na thing sa honorabyll inuade saxonis ennymes god strang battal ye samyn mair felicite send ambassatouris ye confiderat kyngis quhilkis ye saxonis maist hatrent schaw yt iniuris done thaym saxonis▪ procedit kyng uortigern ony aduyse nobyllis ¶for yocht saxonis war enrichit lādis rentis uortigern ȝit al ye noblis brytane war ennymes thaym knawing yair myndis set vter euersion thair realme lyberte apperis weil yair cruel dedis excercit laitly na le blasphematioun god thā martyrdome crystyn pepyll becaus yir mony othir importabyl cruelteis wer cumyn necligēce uortigern assister yair opinion ye noble he degradit auctorite maid vortimer son kīg forthir yai schew uortimer he maid gret ordināce battal expel ye saxonis albiō desirit yair fore ye cōfiderat kingꝭ set asyde iniuris concur yame resist ye cōmon trubyl appering al ye pepil albion ꝓmittit gif yai wald support ye britonis extreme dangeir geif ye landis beȝond hū ber ony pley ī tymes cumyng thair perpetual empyre consent nobyllis cōmonis britane congallus kyng scottis heirand thir offeris said thir ambassatouris vnderstude weill quhat dangeir ye realme britane stude treason saxonis ennymes cristyn faith richt sory thairof knawing na thyng bett gif thay war nocht resisti • tyme ye catholik faith suld expire britane yocht ye britonis he bene gret ennymes pepyll ȝit maik labour manifest baith ye cōmon weil britane heil cristyn faith suld rais army concur thaym aganis saxonis ye deith swa peace war ratifyit sic maner amang thair pepyll debaitis micht ceis landis beȝond humber neuer reclamyt tymes cumyng britonis thir ambassatouris beand depeschit siclyke answere pychtis returnit vortimer bād peace ratifyit sone efter amang ye britonis pichtis scottis incontinent thay ruschit al togidder harnes aganis saxonis scottis pichtꝭ come maist hatrent aganis saxonis dwellyng betuix humber tyne quhen thay war inuadyng thir saxonis maist cruelteis culd deuisit thay persauit occa cummand displayit baner aganis thaym occa seand ennymes appeir sic strenth multitud yt micht weil geif thaim feild▪ wist quhat done nochtheles y• lang tary suld febyl curage folkis maid ane sygne soūd trumpat iune first metyng equalye fochtyn sydis bot last saxonis hauand na pyssance resist sa gret preis • ennymes fornens thaim began geif bakkis occa stoppit thair fleing sa far mycht sumtyme mynassyng sūtyme respect honouris nochtheles ye feir deith mair pissant amang abasit pepyll ony charge capitane maid thair discō fitour richt patent occa seing nane vthir way saif lyfe fled mouth hūber quhare gat ane bait come thamis nowmer personis scottis pychtis vsit vyctory gret cruelte saxonis saiffit nane perseuerit fechtand battal ylkane began exhort othir follow fast ye chace thay mycht reuenge cruelteis sa mony ȝeris done thir saxonis alwayis gret nowmer saxonis war slane ye battall bot mair nowmer thaym chace mene tyme uortimer rycht desyrus recouer lyberte realme rasit baner croce commandit crystyn pepyll follow thus gaderit ane army lxxx thousand men al weil preistis relygyous men temporall estaitis ye samyn slew xm saxonis gat sa huge victory thaim y• kent schire mony othir boundis adiacent war recouerit brytonis landis lyand betuix tyne humber restorit scottis pychtis ¶hengist occa come feild resydew thair vincust army fled northumbirland purpos remane yair quhil new power come thaym almany nochtheles thay war doung thay boū dis scottis pichtis chasit mouth humber quhare thay fand schippꝭ returnit certane nobyllis samyn blud saxony kyng uortimer sa mercyful efter yi victory yt brocht lityl cruelte remanent saxonis bot sufferit thaym returne yair awin cuntre otheris quhylkis war bot commonis war sufferit remane kent thair wyffis childrin lauboure land vnder seruytude britonis roxena douchter hēgist sufferit becaus scho child remane ye toure london certane keparis wait hir uortimer set hym purge realme al heryseis brocht saxonis repare kirkis laitly bet thaym sindry britonis war constranit cruelte saxonis make sacrifice ydolis mony thaym fell agane herysy pelagius purge sic arrouris war send brytane france twa haly byschoppis germanus lupus desyre kyng uortimer fynaly brytonis war found repugnant gud religioun war othir slane banist realme sa mony wald nocht abiurat reuoik thair arrouris war brint uortimer recouerand ye realm britane bringand samyn sicker faith leuit certane ȝeris efter richt plesand god subdittis bot last poysonit roxena otheris nobyllis brytane applauding hir opinion ☞hovv britonis efter deith kyng vortimer fel gret disputatioun quhay suld kyng hovv vortigern vvas restorit crovvn britane ca xvii efter deith uortimer ane conuention maid londō quhare nobyllis tuke lang consultation quhiddir uortigern suld tane prysoun restorit auctorite honouris afore gif ye sonnis constantyne suld brocht bertanȝe succeid ye crown sen thay war maist natyue thairto sū alliegit yt uortigern penitent offencis done hym aganis thair cōmon weill knawis lāg exꝑience quhat heuy dāmage iniuris he fallyn laitly pepyll hꝭ necligence vnbridillit lust alliegit sen ane prudēt prince vnbrokyn trauell weiris suld restorit crown na thyng mair hatrent thā treason saxonis knew weil realme suld gouernit specially sic extreme dangeir apperit baith franchmen britonis saxonis thairfore maist abyl sustene thair chargis gif war sworne neuir admit ony vncouth blude brytane sustene yair weris inuade saxonis maner violence gif thay returnit albioun sonnis constantine brocht bertanȝe succeid crown britane thay semyt vnganand thairto thay war ȝoung experience cheualry nocht abil sustene sa gret chargis apperit thā aganꝭ yair ēnymes ī al partis ye frenchman quhilkis laitly cōquest realme gallis callit france richt desirus conques realmes war cōfiderat ye sonnis cōstantyne cū britane abiding bot sufficient occasioun inuade samyn siclike iniuris tytyll conques ye saxonis wald throw quhilk ye cummyng kyng constantinis sonnis britane na le suspitious ye cumyng saxonis otheris thocht rycht suspitius restore hym ye crown quhom thay afore degradit yair auctorite mycht happyn thay quhilkis war opinioun suld othir slane returnyng elli exilit ye realme bot ȝit last opinion reieckit vniuersal vocꝭ al noblis saying uortigern ane man peace desyre vengeance set erar amend offencis done aganis weill su • dittis reuenge ony iniuris done hym nocht vnknawyng proffitabyl thay noblis war commoun weill quhilkis depriuit hym auctoryte gaif sonne uortimer mair abyl gouernance thairof ¶efter lang consultatioun uortigern tane pryson restorit gret triumphe crown nocht onely remyttit al offencis • atrent quhylkis tuk aganis nobyllis quhen thay degradit hym auctorite bot al resauit thaym gret beniuolence rewardit thaym richely yair gud myndis ¶hovv hengist occa returnit vvith nevv povver saxonis britane slevv mony noblis thairof tuk vortigern prisonere hovv vortigern vvas banist vvalis hengist maid kyng britane ca xviii uortigern efter restitutioun crown brytane garnist strenthis realme gret ordinance aganis quhatsumeuer aduenturꝭ mycht fall held strang bandis weirmen hym na le cost thā bene presently fecht ēnymes behad hym sa prudently baith nobyllis commonis wyst nocht quhat honour • pleasour thay mycht hym nocht lang efter renewit p • ace confiderat kyngis samyn maner maid afore kyng uortimer sonne quhyll uortigern geuyn sic materis tithyngis come hengist arryuit thames hauand hym sonne occa two brethir incredibyll nowmer saxonis dyd na iniuris offentis inhabytantis cuntre uortigern astonist ye dāmage appering pepil cumyng yir saxonis cōmandit nobyllis brytane meit hym haistely yair power kent withstand hē gist quhylk cumyn sa awfull army purposit othir subdew cuntre empyre elli put samyn irrecouerabyll heirschip quhais inhumane cruelteis beyng nocht haistely repressit na sicker lyfe mycht pepyll pryncis britane hering thir tithingis come haistely uortigern fensabyl pepyll vnder thair boundis hengist knawyng ye myndis britonis mouit extreme hatrent aganis hym thocht nocht expedient tyme ieoparde hym chance battall sen thay war delyuerit fecht defence thair realme lyberte deith mycht nocht haue victory large murdir pepyll thir reasonis set hym ye thyng slycht quhylkis mycht nocht force army send ambassatouris uortigern saying nocht cumyn britane defraud gud sonne uortigern crown britane mai • dete precius hym ony othir thyng erd ȝit set defraud ȝoūg infant gottyn roxena hꝭ douchter bot erar support thaym baith punis thaym yt slew nobyl prince kyng uortimer poison attoure aduertist afore cumyng almany yt gud sonne uortigern brocht sic infirmite lang incarceratioun mycht nocht leif ane ȝeir yairfore cū myng kepe ȝoung nepote vndefraudit crown britane forthir gif yir materis war plesand ye britonis suld haistely returne agane almany elli remane quhare thay plesit sa yt thay wald suffer army cum kent nocht reiose ye landis thairof bot allanerly recouer ye gudis quhilkis thay left behynd thaym thair departyng forthir desyrit kyng uortigern gif war plesand assigne ane day place intercō moun thir hiear materis concernyng perpetuall amyte kyndnes peace betuix saxonis britonis gif thay list set day▪ suld cū yair sa mony thay thocht neidfull armit vnarmit thair pleseir quhen ye nobyllis tane consultation certane dayis quhethir thir desiris hengist suld repulsit nocht thay war deuydit syndry opinionis mony thaym lang experience knew weill falset slichtis beleuit nocht bot treason hyd vnder
