dissaitfull wordis thairfore thocht samyn refusit otheris dreidand ferocite manheid saxonis thocht thair realme ouirbro • yn weiris suffer ony new affliction thairfore concludit meit gyle falset siclyk slychtis hauyng na confidence wordis bot laboure maist craftely caus hym depart britane amyte freindschip spare nothir labour expen • ꝭ bring purpos gud fyne gif wald na way depart wt beniuolence inuaid hym maist cruelly dyng hym thair boundis perforce deuysit effect ane cūpany maist forcy vailȝeant men haldyn reddy aganis quhatsumeuir aduēture mycht fall quhyl thay saw quhat purpos fyne mynd delyuerit ye metyng uortigern hengist intercōmoun hie materis deuysit thay thocht honest sa kyng uortigern hengist met fra yair armyis equale cumpanyis sydis wappynnis mony ye noblis condiscēdit last opiniō traisting fra hengist ressauit guddis left behynd hym kent last departyng yat suld depart britane pleseir ȝit syndry othir pryncis britane mycht nocht satifyit yair mynd suspeckand ay sum hyd treason vnder thir desyris hēgist becaus cumyn britane sa awfull power nochtheles x day efter fynaly set hengist uortigern baith sworn cum allanerly xxx maist noblis baith yair armyis ony swerd dagere thair cumpany intercommoun materis ye effect foresaid place quhare thay cōuenit far fra salisbery ane hyll callit ambry quhen thay war cumyn ye samyn deuisit hengist ylk saxon ane dagare hyd vnder sleif sla noblis britane quhen thay saw ganand occasion quhen thay war yair maist ernest cōmonyng hengist maid ane signe ye saxonis thay ony tary slew nobillis britane come conuention except ane namyt heldolus quhilk pullit ane dagger fra ane saxoun samin slew sindry saxonis deliuerit hym self yair handꝭ treasoun kyng uortigerne wes takin brocht schamfully ye army saxonis hengist deliuerit maner al feir ennymes come kent remanēt britonis rycht astonist cuming eftir petuous lamentation slauchter yair nobillis maid yame maist hatrent reuenge ye samyn nocht le seand na man able tak yi charge hand thay supersedit yair purpos retournyt hame gret displeseir uortigern traisting dayly de mannassyng saxonis deliuer hym self present dangeir randerit hengist mu •• tionis strenthis realme huge treasour gold siluer ī cōpositioun ranson quhen wes deliuerit bondage way past ye residew britonis thair wyffis childrin walis quhair pepil discendyng ye britonis blude mony ȝeris eftir succedit remanent landis britane ȝeid vnder empyre saxonis ye vailȝeant dedis hengist schawin almany causit ane multitude pepil cum britane greter noumer afore cōmonis wiffis childrin inhabit ye land throw quhais cumyng hengist grew sic pissance britonis wer na power cōpair saxonis britane hengist seand uortigern put fra ye crown banist ī walis thocht best stable crown hym set ane conuentioun saxonis lōdon maid hym self king syne cōmandit cuntre neuir callit tymes cūyng ye realm britonis bot ye realm saxonis ye realme wes callit hengist land pepill hengistmen bot corruptioun langage realme callit inglād ye pepill inglishmen samyn decreit wes cō mandit yt na britonis suld found walis within xx dayis eftir proclamatioun vnder pane deith siclik yt na mā suld leif ye faith crist ony cerymoneis efter rite crystyn pepyll vnder ye samin pane day byrun gret murdir punicioun maid al yame y• war repugnant proclamation p̄latis war slane ye alter kirkis brint bede sayis baith ye publict priuate housis war bet ground tyranuy saxonis ȝit yair ane othir thing mair miserabyl yame al thir calamiteis sa far enragit ye cruelteis saxonis yt na men durst bury ye cristin pepil mony miserabil britonis war takin ye montanis seikand thair fude ransoun fauour mercy slane▪ otheris fled cuntre otheris baid styll britane amang desertis montanis samyn ay feir thair ennymes ¶hovv vortigern demandit prophete marlyne end lyfe marlynis ansvver hovv ambrose vter come vvalis brint vortigern vvith sonne rich ca xix al sone saxonis conquest britane maner thay garnyst strenthis thairof al ꝑtis men munition vittallis vsit cursit ritis paganis aberand fra ye cristin faith makand odoratioun ydolis thay wer institute yair first errouris throw quhilkis kirkis sum tyme reuerence amang cristin pepill blude yair cursyt sacrifice wer defowlit thair ennymes suld inuaid thaym vnprouisitlie thay laid ane strāg garison armit men • en bordouris partis thair realme brocht ilk day new pepil almany expel ye scottꝭ pychtis ye landis yt lay betuix hūbir tyne uortigern spulȝeit croun seing ennymes multiplie baith hame feild siclik saxonis franche men haitit hym na le britonis wes sa disparit corruppit life yat beleuit na support god ȝit othir mortale creaturis recouer realme thairfore set ingyne haif knawlege thingis cum response ꝓphettis vse disparit pepill extreme dangeir refuge incontinēt brocht afore hym ane prophet namyt merlyne inquirit hym quhat suld end empyre lyfe merlyne wes gottin fame wes conmixtion ane deuill forme man ane lady britane wes lernit wichecraft rais wekit spretis familiar cōmonyng yir narrationis knew mony thingis cum al sone vortigern brocht yi merlyne afore hym inquirit quhat suld end werꝭ gyf mycht recouer crown britane finalie quhat suld ye end son hym self gyf ony blude suld regne behynd hym britane gyf mycht haue ony skaith werꝭ ambrose franchemen merlyne answerit pertlie thir petitionis baith vortigern hꝭ childrin within schort tyme suld vincust ambrose uter sonnis constantyne suld brynt treasour • gudis prophecy merlyne wes weill prouin end empire sone eftir ye said ambrose uter come bertanȝe walis ane army reuenge slauchter kyng constantius yair brothir quhilk wes slane dissait said uortigern al sone uortigern hard thair cuming▪ assemblit ane gret power hauand na confidence prophecy come arrayit oist aganis ambrose uter left behynd hym son treasour ane castell walis traistyng gyf suld peri mair honest de fechtād battall aganis ennymes ony othir wayis skarslie wer armyis iunit quhen mony yame faucht ye first wyng uortigernis army come ambrose thus succedit victorie ambrose ony straik uortigern seyng army vincust raif hꝭ coit armour faucht incredible cōstance fyne mycht haue deit amang cōmonis escheuit ye fatall necessite deith quhilk wes schawin hym afore prophecy merlyne nochtheles wes brocht ye feild freindis hope better fortoun ye samyn castell quhair sonne treasoure wes left afore battall ambrose hauand victorie wyse followit uortigern beltit ye castel strāg sege howbeit mycht tak haistlie ȝit yt army suld nocht dangeir throw lang tary brocht mony huge sillis treis nixt wod syne fillit fowsis trinchis ye said castel samyn eftir yi kest birnand faggottꝭ gret multitude treis within castell throwe quhilk fyre grew sa bald ye castell wes within brynt wes resoluit powdir accordyng prophecy merlyne ¶of syndry illusyonis dissaitis euyll spretis ca xx declare quhat ꝓphete bene yi merlyne gottin fame wes ye deuill gif sic generatioun possible nature man ꝑtenis litill ye purpos quhilk tuke hand nochtheles becaus haue fallin cōmoning sic detestable cōuersation deuillis nature man writ sū thingis yat happinnit nocht lang afore makyng buke ȝeir god imiiiiclxxxvi ȝeris certane marchādis wer passand betuix forth flanderis quhen haistelie come sic ane thud wynd yat sail mast • aikillis wer blawin brym • throw quhilk schip beleuit nocht bot sicker deith patroun thairof astonist sa huge vncouth tempestis aganis season ye ȝeir becaus wes sanct barnabyis day quhen seis apperis calme rageand traistit ye samyn erar cumin illusioun deuil ennyme man violence weddir mene tyme ye voce wes hard ane woman ye schip wariand hir self ye instant hou • scho wes conuersit ane deuil ymage ane man schew deuill vsit hir yat mane • mony ȝeris afore thairfore besocht ye pepill cast hir seis hir deith remenant pepill schip mycht de sauit cōmand ye patroun ane preist w • hir ye heuy cheir cōmandyng hir mak confessioun hir abhominable lyfe haue cōfidence god quhais mercy synnis ar purgit quhen synnar he repentance teris quhen yi woman wes makand hir confessioun gret repentance preist sycht al ye pepill ane vglie cloud ane crak fyre • eik flew schip fell doun ane vennomus stink seis incontinent tempest ceissit ye marchādis arriuit ye port quhair thay desirit ony forthir trubill yi time happinnit sic ane like exempill ane town gariach nocht fourtene mylis fra abirdene ane child gret bewte complenit ye bischop abirdene wes trubillit lang tyme ane deuyll forme woman apperandly fayrest creature euir saw lyfe quhylk come hym quhen durris wyndowis bene closit syne tistit hym voluptuous brasing hir plesoure departit ay brekyng ye day ony noyis yocht assailȝeit mony wayis delyuerit hir ȝit couth fynd na remeid bischop astonist illusion cōmādit thꝭ ȝoūg child resort hym sū othir placis mair feruēt fasting prayer afore quharthrow mycht happin deuyl mycht vincust leif hym tymes cumyng bischop deuysit sa come efter ȝoung child delyuerit illusion ye maner nocht lang fra tyme happinnit ane thyng nocht vnlyke ye samyn illusioun land mar schawin w syndry yat saw samyn ane madin nobill blude excellent bewte efter scho refusit mariage mony nobyll men fell abhominabyll conuersation ye deuyl hir freindis seing hir wamb rise commandit hir schaw ye deflorar hir chastite quhome scho answerit yt ane lusty child apperit vsit cū hir nicht sumtyme ye day howbeit scho wist come departit hir freindis richt desyrus knaw maner scho reuelit war aduertist last madyn lay hir chalmer yt deflorar madin cumyn incontinent thay come huge licht torchis candellis bed quhare scho lay fand hir armis ane maist terribyl monstoure mony pepyl ran se ye sicht amang quhome ane preist gud lyfe spreit quhilk seing ye remanent pepyl astonist tuk na feir bot abaid styll redand euangyll sanct iohne namit principio quhen red verbum caro factum est deuyll flew away horribyll cry bure bed rufe hous hym thrid day efter woman delyuerit ane monstour mair terribyll visage euir sene ony pepyll afore meidwiffes brint samyn suld nocht remane dishonour hous becaus thir illusionis deuyllis war sene oure dayis haue collecket thaim buke reidaris may vnderstand sic illusionis deuyllis may forthir tuiching ye propheciis marlyn howbeit mony thaym verifiit ī dayis wyll leif thaym discussit theologis quhidder thay suld abrogat haue faith wyl stand content obey thair conclusionis writ furth vailȝeant deidis nobyl men haue begun returne oure hystory quhare left ¶hovv ambrose vvas confiderat vvith scottis pichtis▪ hovv slevv hengist dang saxonis britane hovv tvvo systeris vvat mariit confiderat kyngis syndry haly men ca xxi efter deith uortigern ylk day come ambrosius mair confluence pepil throw quhilk sa strang ane army tuke purpos recouer realme ye samyn mair plesandly gat scottis pichtis becaus thay extreme hatrent aganis saxonis cōfiderat hym mene tyme gret nowmer britonis come hym quhilkis war banist afore hengist amang scottis pichtis ambrose seing ylk day sa gret multitude pepyll cumand hym ane mynd recouer thair realme went ane hie mote quhare micht sene complenit treasonabill deidis uortigern aganis hous constātine dāmage britonis yair common weill lamentit huge cruelte saxonis done aganis god man throw quhilk enflammit pepyl sic desyre recouir yair lyberte reuenge iniuris done thaym thay ane consent war delyuerit follow baner aganis saxonis cause yair purpos mair stablit thay maid hym king britane fra incarnatioun god iiiiclxxxxviii ȝeris efter • uortigern uortimer son rong xvii ȝeris britane ambrose maid kyng maner begā put pepyl sic ordour lernit ye weris france come forthwart displayit baner aganis ye saxonis vi day efter met hym loth kyng pychtis conrannꝰ lieutenand cōgallꝰ kyng scottis ane gret army ambrose rycht glaid thair cumyng ressauit yame gret beniuolence promittit quhen micht haue oportunite recōpence yair kindnes incontinent ambrose rasit tentis come thre battallis scottis pichtis britonis ane place 〈◊〉 mahesbel hengist 〈◊〉 thair ane army saxonis abiding thair cumyng quhill ye tea • baith ye armyis war stā dyng thus athir sicht followit frequent preiking skarmussyng syngular battallis athir syde quhil last yai iunit togidder quhē thay fochtyn lang vncertane victory pepyll bertanȝe frenchemen fechtand aganis myddilward saxonis new ingyne practik battal dyd yame gret trubyll scottis pichtis brokyn bath ye wingis thair ennymes sic maner yat ye standartis britonis pichtis scottis war cumyn throw saxonis met togidder incontinent ye saxonis gaif backis hengist seing na way renew battall mon • hors last man yt fled army ambrose seyng feild discomfist followit maist hatrent hengist ran hym throw body ane speir residew saxonis astonist slauchter fled occa sonne nixt montanis efter victory ambrose come victorius army london maid ye saxonis soudiouris quhilkis war left defend ye town sa affrayit quhen thay hard hengist slane army discomfist yt yai oppinnit portis fell kneis petuisly desyring grace ambrose put ane buschement armit men portis y• na • suld depart quhyll tane aduisement quhat done incōtinent past castell nobyllis quhilkis war left defend samyn hengist seyng hym cum victory wyse fell kneis afore hym said ye goddis he geuyn ye maist inuyncybyll prince licence punis w thy plesour becaus thy manheid fortoun inuinsibill nochtheles gif lefull ȝoldin miserabyll creaturis dei • ckit extreme rewyne hatrent goddꝭ implore mercy grace afore ane victorius campioun quhen lyfe deid handis lawly beseikis ye happy victory fallyng strang battall richtuous prince realme suffir w thy benyng grace returne nakit wappinles scurgit wandis gyf thy pleasoure awin regioun gyf thow wyll condiscend thairto thow sall put memory maist honest victory aganis sa pyssant ennymes bot al thy mercy geuin desolate pepil ambrose mouit yir wordis wrocht na iniuris saxonis bot tuk castel sufferit yame pa hame thair guddis sone efter generall edict al fensabyl men saxonis wer cōmandit pa almany bot ye remanēt baid styl labouraris ye ground cōtent pay tribute ambrose ressaue ye cristyn faith efter victory al britonis yat war exilit syndry partis ye warld eschewyng tyranny saxonis returnit britane thā kyng ambrose cōmandit al kirkis reparit ye preistis religious men restorit yair liberte rowmes throw quhilk ye cristyn faith gret veneration throw ꝑtis britane ymageris ydolis put ydolis quhare thay war app̄hendit brokyn general processyon maid syndry dayis ye pepyl kirkis housis decorit flouris claythis arres tapestreis stretis resounding heuynly noyis melody maist delicius musik ye cō solation reiosyng pepyll ambrose schaw beniuolence mair feruent cōfiderat pepyll brocht loth king pichtis conrannꝰ gouernour scottis within london leuand thair armyis nocht far fra ye samyn feistit thaym certane dayis maner dāteis mycht deuisit quhen rewardit thaim rich iowellis afferit commandit thaym assent nobillis honorit amang pepyll defendouris recoueraris realme sic thyngis done new peace maid betuix thaym vnder thir conditionis al landis liand beȝond hū ber suld pa perpetual dominion scottis pichtis ony clame britonis ī tymes cumyng ye saxonis haldyn ēnymes thaym baith gif ye saxonis returnit ony part albion albianis equale mynd suld cōcur togidder resist thaym thir cōditionis peace wer better kepit affinite yt followit efter ambrose two sisteris quhilkis ye eldest namit anna maryit loth kyng pichtis ȝoungest namit ada maryit conrannꝰ ye fyne yt albanis suld haldyn togidder vnder ane blud amite withstand saxonis ada partit child within two ȝeris efter scho come scotland deceissit sa ye affinite ceissit betuix ambrose conrannꝰ bot anna bure vnto loth kyng pichtis thre sonnis modreid walwane thamete sall efter schaw britonis scottis pichtis stude mony ȝeris gud amyte concord ony iniure ennymes mene tyme part saxonis quhilkꝭ wer sufferit remane vnder tribute tak crystyn fayth maid priuate sacrifice ydolis war brynt quhē knawin samyn tyme cōgallꝰ kyng scottis vexit lāg infirmite deceissit ye xx ȝeir empire buryit ye abbay co • mekill tyme war mony haly mē syndry partis ye warld remigius byschop remens quhilk gaif ye sacrament bapteme clodouius king france clodouius biggit ane kirk sanct genouefa hallowar paris yai day war amang w colmane medane modane gret precheouris syndry britonis wer martyrit afore tyme albion cruelte saxonis throw quhilk mony yame fled ī scotland amang quhom patriciane ane mā singular deuotion quhilk eft bischop ye ile man deceissit ī ye tyme cōrannus quhilk salbe nixt history sa endis heir aucht buke thir cronyklis heir begynnis nynt buke croniklis scotland ¶of kyng conrannus hovv maid lavvis punis extorsionis hovv occa passentius arriuit vvith nevv povver saxonis ingland hovv thay vvar vincust ambrose ca primo congallus burii • maner brodir conrannus wes maid kyng sonnis congallꝰ war sa tendir age thay mycht nocht succeid ye lawis afore rehersit yair namys wer eugenius conuallus kynuatillꝰ wer send nurist vndir wise preceptouris ye ile man conrannus eftir coronatioun na truble suld ryse amang legis ouir lang peace went throwe boundis realme executioun iustice punist mony cryminabill personis accordyng thair demeritis quhen wes passing throw ye cuntre wise wes aduertist sindry cōmonis wer sa opprest tyranny nobillis yat thay durst nothir cōplene ȝit follow thair • ctioun afore iustice thairfore yi nobill prince punis sic extorsionis done pepill cōmandit certane exploratouris pa throw al boundis realme serche quhair ony sic suspitius personis wer yat baith thair namys 〈◊〉 crymis writtin kyngis •• lls gif ony thir personis wer found criminabill eftir quhen thay wer accusit ye kyngis aduocat thay wer punist deith thus wer cō monis mony ȝeris eftir deliuerit oppressioun nobillis maner iustice conterfaitit ȝit dayis said yat conrannus vsit quhen counsall sat ony part realme outhir p̄sent elli ī ane wod huntyng nocht far fra yame mak officiaris ye auctorist quhen wes hūtis athole far fra montanis granȝebene slew ane hart lang chace fand ane huge multitude serpentis wambe ye gret admira • io • pepil ye hornis ane hart ar ane singular remede aganꝭ ye bit serpentꝭ chasis al vthir venimꝰ beistis quhil sic thyngis war done scotland ambrose kyng britonis fell ane dwynand seiknes namyt ethik feuir quhilk body wes pinit sa remeid medicyne mycht haue na rest wes disparit lyfe occa passentius ye sonnis hengist aduertist infirmite fallyng ambrose beleuit gif wer deceissit recouer ye realme ingland thairfore gaderit ane huge power support princis almany returnyt ingland yi tyme uter prince walis brodi • ambrose wes gret doloure malady flure vehement thrist feuer throw quhilk britonis wes desolat apperit ony capitan • sustene weris aganis saxonis nochtheles ane conuentioun wes set noblis auise quhat wes maist dāgerus • eftir lāg consultatioun thay wer deuidit sindry opinionis ambrose seyng thair cōtrarius vocis sa hie dangeir apperand realme tuke na solicitude infirmiteis bot causit hym self tursit apon ane litter betuix twa gret hors syne past forthwart aganis ye saxonis send ambassatouris solist scottis pychtis cōfiderat freindis cum maist deligence samyn effect ¶bot afore thair cumyng iniuris cruelteis saxonis wer sa importable yat ambrose wes cōstrenȝeit fecht thaym youcht wes maist vneis maledy ȝit laikit na thyng mycht pertene ane forcy campioun rais spreit army maist curage yair first ionyng britonis wer sumpart put abak gret slauchter maid yame nochtheles ambrose traistyng na thyng mair honest yan de gif yat wer chance amang vailȝeāt knychtis went ye army exhortyng thaym perseueir ythand battall remembir quhat excellent palme glore wes abidyng thaym gyf thay force armes dang yair ennymes deceissit defence thair realme liberte faith britonis rasit hic spreit curage wourdis ruschit maist furie battall finalie put thair ennymes flycht quhome followit ye britonis lang chace maid gret slauchter ambrose seyng nycht fast approche inhibit chace brocht army soūd trumpat standart ye britonis duryng nycht stude arrayit battall morow thay partit spulȝe thairof rite armes ȝit quhen thay began nowmer thair army thay fand mair slauchter succedyng thaym saxonis howbeit thay victorie ambrose fyndyng army brokin wyse dred gyf ieoperd thaym ony forthir aganis saxonis na felicite follow thairfore skalit army tuke four monethis trewis saxonis occa aduertist scottis pychtis wald cum support ambrose send brodir passentius bryng ane new army almany sum auctouris sayis quhen passentius wes passād almany contrarius windis wes dreuin irelād quhair wagit ane huge multitude weirmen returnit thaim britane occa nochtwithstandyng yi strāg army brocht britane cumyng brodir thocht ye chance battall aganis britonis rycht dangerꝰ duryng empire ambrose yairfore instruckit ane saxon quhilk perfite language britonis sla ambrose saxon yt wes subornat hꝭ slaucht wes ane mōk namit coppa fenȝeit hym ane medcinare hauand remeid aganis maner infirmiteis last wes brocht kyng quhair lay gowntoun eftir lang cōmonyng promittit gyf kyng certane drinkis quhilkꝭ suld baith recouer heil deliuerit al maladie quhen coppa wes cōmandit ye kyng mak drynkis vsit first day bot delicious seropis maid soft spycis liquouris plesand mouth throwe quhilk gat credence vse eftir quhat drinkis • e list ¶at last coppa watand tyme poyson ye king gadderit sindry herbꝭ inducyng men sleip meddillit ius thairof vennome quhilkis maid ane serop brocht ye samyn ye kyng saying drink sall mak conuales deliuerit al dolorus infirmite ambrose hauand na suspition tuke ye drynk wes cōmandit coppa tak rest fyne vennom mycht skail throw ye vanis body quhen fand kyng sleip cōmādit ye chalmer kepit ony noyis ye mene tyme stall away nixt wod quhare fand part saxonis waitand swift hors take hym away quhen ambrose vnhappy sleip skaillit vennom throw ye vanis body gaif ane litill sobe deceissit vii ȝeir regne body wes buryit abbay stenthend quhilk wes biggit hym afore inmemore ye nobill men yat wer slane treason hengist ☞ gret cruelteis done occa britonis hovv scottis pychtis vvar frustrat thair voyage gret meruelli • sene albion interpretatioun yame marlyne ca ii ambrose deceissit haue schawin britonis maid sa huge lament deith ye saxonis wer aduertist yairof occa glaid thair dolorus cheir knawing deceis ambrose ye lang infirmite fallyng kyng uter na pissance britane resist aganis hym tuk purpos oppres britonis afore thay wer assemblit ye maist cruell maner mycht deuisit mony britonis abasit cruelte fled ī walis oth • rꝭ fled scotland otheris remanit still britane thirlli • seruitude plesour saxonis ¶in mene tyme ye scottis pychtis come strang army britane support ambrose expell saxonis samyn bot quhen thay wer aduertist ambrose deith wist gyf wer slane treasoun saxonis deuision britonis amang thaym self vnknawing quha wes freind fa yai returnyt hame gait thay come ¶at tyme wer sene mony vncouth meruellis albioun wer interprete merlyne gret terroure pepill ane firy comeit wes sene mony terrible bemes ane crownit dragoun wes sene birnand lift grene treis tuke suddand fyre brynt auld treis wer afore cuttit fra ground flurist bure leuis reueir thamys apperit bludy ane well sprang vp myddis ȝorke sic haboundance blud stretis wer repleite thairof kent ane child leuch motheris wambe thir meruellis interpretatioun merlyne causit britonis cum battal aganis saxonis merlyne interpreit yi comeit king ambrose crownyt dragoun uter brodir blude signifyit bludy swerd aganis saxonis ye fyre signifyit ye vter exterminion saxonis ¶uter gaue sic credence yir interpretationis merlyne tuke crownyt dragon army bure birnand gold ane feild asure coloure lyft wes callit thairfore uter pendragon pepill ☞hovv vter vvas maid kyng britonis hovv vvas discomfist saxonis chasit vvalis hovv saxonis britonis vvar agreit ca iii nobillis britane tuk sic persuasion merlyne prophecy thay come uter walis maid hym king sine cō mandit pepyll reddy ane schort day pa saxonis kyng uter efter britonis war gaderit day prefixit gaif charge battall nathaliodꝰ ane mā vyle obscure lynnage mair familiarite thā virtew nobyllis britane tuke na lytyll indignation ane mā nocht perregall thaym lynnage pissance preferrit thaym honour dignite said kyng imprudēt empire beād stabillit decore ane man small lynnage sa hie chargis thair contemptioun iugi • thairfore gif sicker peace trubyl ennymes magnifye men small lynnage honourꝭ aboue yame ȝit becaus thair cōmoun weill approchyng hie dangeir thay put sylence sic materis counsall prudent men nathaliodus nochtwithstanding indignation yir nobillis aganis hym tuke peirtly ye charge wēt forthwart proud baner aganis saxonis occa aduertist exploratouris quhat ye britonis intendit brocht forthwart army diligence followit sone ane battal richt vnplesand britonis gothlois prince cornewal impacient suffer nathal • odꝰ p̄ferrit hym cū ye feild oist left remanent army britonis reddy ressaue ye iniure ennymes thus war britonis fynaly discomfist occa nochtwithstāding thꝭ discomfitour brocht army sound trumpat ye standert inhibit ony ferther chace maid britonis traisting gothlois fled onely slycht inuaid ye saxonis quhen saw occasioun gothlois seand ye britonis put flicht yt suld ane pray ennymes fled within ye nycht ye nerrest way mycht ī cornewal occa ye morrow seyng ye campe desert vnderstude ye britonis war discomfist send ane herald uter chargeing hym pa walis ye britonis vnder pane deith leif ingland quhilk conquest swerd inhibite hym saxonis uter reuoluyng dangerus doutsum renew battall aganis saxonis knawing realme bot ane facil pray inymes gif thay feirsly ꝑsewit begā detest ye dāmage al weris āswerit herald wald leif hatrent aganis ye saxonis haue peace nocht feir thaym bot onely remoue trubyl pepyl mycht leif peace desyrit occa sen na gret occasion werꝭ betuix hym britonis put fyne yairto ī tyme cumyng forthir wald content ye foure prudent men wer chosyn ylk syde euyn debatis betuix yame ye britonis saxonis micht incres togidder vnder ane perpetuall amite tymes cumyng occa knawing thir offeris procedyng mair febyll curage ony mā heid tuk peace glaid cheir reiosit sen victory chance battall vncertane yt realme ingland sa esaly conquest efter peace maid maner landis ingland liand fornence ye almane • sall pa tymes cumyng vnder empire saxonis residew regioun callit britane remane vnder empire britonis wes afore athir pepill leif vnder ya • r awin lawis throw yi peace baith pepill incressit togiddir polecy rich ony iniuris otheris ye saxonis leuand thair hethin lawis ye britonis eftir ye cristin faith ȝit mony thaym wer intricat pelagius herisyis aberrād fra sicker faith ¶hovv vter slevv prince cornevvall▪ gat arthure vvyfe hovv • oth kyng pichtis clamit crovvn 〈◊〉 britane hovv britonis vvar put 〈◊〉 thair herisyis hovv terdix 〈◊〉 come occa vvith nevv povver saxonis▪ hovv saxonis vva • vinc • st myrakyll ca iiii thys tyme uter king britonis wes degenerat fra virtew maist schamefull lust surfet ydelnes exces plesoure regnand amang britonis wes occasioun nocht onlie adultry bot al slauchter throw quhilk succedit mony terrible weris ye gret affliction pepill schort tyme following uter maid ane riatꝰ banket londoun ȝuyll day quhilk nobillis britane thair wyffis wer present amang quhome wes ane lady gret bewte spous gothlois prince cornewell uter rauist bewte lady send cubicularis riche iowellis solist hir plesour gothlois knawyng uter effeminate desiryng defoule bed fled haistelie hir cornewell quhome uter followit gret power hauand na sycht grauiteis princelie estait finalie lady gat hir ane sonne namit arthure quhilk succedit hym eftir sal schaw sic thingis done uter segit castell quhair gothlois wes slew hym eftir castell wes tane alliegeand fled fra nathaliodus quhen britonis faucht aganis saxonis howbeit mynd wes sla gothlois mycht reiose wyfe frelie tymes cummyng sum men writtis uter wes transformit craft merline gothlois similitude way gat arthur nochtwithstandyng quhat sumeuir way wes treuth uter gat hym ane othir mannis wyfe al sone arthure wes cumyn perfite age uter gaderit nobillis britane ane coūsall causit yame sworne euangell suffer nane othir regne britane behynd hym bot arthure sonne quhilk thyng rasit ye pychtis gret hatrent aganis uter loth kyng pychtis wes impacient rycht cōmouit arthure gottin adultrye suld preferrit childrin gottin lauchfull bed iust heritouris crown britane ¶nochtheles quhen kyng loth pychtis assailȝeit lang brek uter mynd mycht na wayis samyn supersedit purpos quhill saw seasoun expedient mony britonis frequent conuentioun saxonis left rycht faith maid adoratioun ydolis utheris followit errouris pelagius set thaim distroy cristin faith britane throw quhilk thair errouris wer sa gret baptysme wes inhibit mony othir artikillꝭ ye faith prelatis britane hauād gret displeseir yt yir errouris wer sprong sa hie amang yair pepill brocht sāct germane sanct seueir britane quhilkis finalie haly lyfe continewall precheyng kythit mony mirakillis maid britonis penitent yair errouris return ye trewe faith crist thir haly men also purchest licence occa preche amang saxonis sic thingis done britane arriuit ingland twa nobill men namit tardix kenrik new armyis saxonis al yir saxonis wer plesandlie ressauit occa bot kentik wes ane scharp persew ar cristin men wes slane eftir cōmonis ingland becaus gart sanct germane ly yair ane euill nycht cumyng thir saxonis ingland wer rycht suspicious kyng uter maid hym beleue occa wes irkit peace seikand new occasioun contrar peace afore contrackit inuaid britonis yair fore send ane herald till occa exhortyng hym keip amyte peace afore contrackit britonis • stene fra thyng yat mycht gener occasioun discord betuix two pepill caus thir saxonis laitly cumyn ingland returne almany utherwayis litill tranquillite apperis betuix two pepill tymes cumyng occa thocht uter ouir proud desyre sic thyngis inhibit hym ressaue freindis hym plesit ingland nochtheles answerit wes al weill set keip band betuix ye two pepil uter neuir sen peace wes contrackit iniure britonis thus mycht britonis haue na sufficient causis lament nochtheles vnderstude weil kyng uter wes seikand occasioun moue weir betuix britonis saxonis cōmandyng hym ressaue na saxonis ingland bot send yame schamfullie agane almany howbeit saxonis come nocht ingland cōmand britonis ȝit wer depart thair pleseir wes thairfore eschewit uter nobillis fuliche chargis bring nocht yame self fra sicker eys maist dangerus fall sen thay first socht occasioun battall thay suld haue quhil ane yame wer vterly distroyit uter nobillis britane rycht astonist answere send thair secund ambassatouris occa large soumys gold rich draw mynd fra battall occa resauit gold contemption maid ambassatouris returne hame ony answer ye britonis mouit thir iniuris seyng na bandis peace mycht hald saxonis freindschip maid thair ordinance yair best maner battall beliue ye peace wes geuyn vp sydis loth kyng pychtis knawyng thir weris risyng betuix saxonis britonis offerit wilfullie cum al pepil support occa aganis ye britonis becaus thai intendit defraud sōnis ye crown britane quhilk ꝑtenit yame iust titil send ambassatouris conrannus king scottis cōcur hym y• samyn effect bot conrannꝰ refusit saying wald nothir violat peace maid afor britonis ȝit support ye ennymes god aganis catholik pepil britonis knawing ye ordinance pichtis saxonis aganis yame complenit thair haly bischopis germane seueir yir bischopis cōmandit yam assemble yair army commit yame god gif thay sa thay suld faill haue victory thair ennymes britonis howbeit thay na lytyll •• ir thir saxonis come thir haly bischopis ī arrayit battall q • hen thay wer deuyne ser •• ce pasche day tithingis come ye saxonis pichtis wer cumand arrayit battall incontinent commād uter ylk mā past best 〈◊〉 ▪ sanct germane promysit 〈◊〉 • echt first battall preistis saxonis pichtis knawyng yair febyl ordinan • e presumit bot victory war thairfore mair ꝓperant battal sanct germane bure ye baner exhortit pepyl wt gret noyis pa forth wart first iunyng preistis cryit ane hie voce alleluya incontinent ye reflex ye voce resoun • agane ye rochis quhare thay iunit sic preis yt yair ennymes beleuit bot al ye montanis craggꝭ wer tūbland yame attanis incontinent thay fled ony mair debait ye nixt riuer quhare mony thaym feirsnes fle pe • ist maner battal victory rehersit lenth sāct bede becaus come mirakill sanct germane ¶hovv occa nathaliodus inuading othir battall vvar baith slane vvith xvm britonis hovv ȝoung occa vves maid kyng ingland▪ ordinance aganis scottis pichtis hovv thay vvar vincust kvng vter slane poysoun ca v britonis proude victory tuke na sicht ye weil yame self hatrent saxonis gaif yame yair auld corruppit vicis sic riatus surfet y• yaī spendit sumtyme twa sumtyme thre dayis interruption thair bankettis throw quhilk thay war degenerat fra vailȝeant pepyll maist schamfull drunkettis prelatis othir kirkmen richt sorrowfull thir vicis yair pepyl ceissit cō tinewally preche sayng gif yair vicius lyuis war • amendit thair realme sall fall pray yair ennymes thir haly bischoppis cō iecturit sa followit occa withī schort tyme eft inuadit yame battall slew nathaliodus lieutenan • uter xvm britonꝭ nochttheles followit sa feirsly ye chare yt slane mony vailȝeant capitanis hym britonis war sa brokin battall yt thay ceissit tymes cumyng inuade ye saxonis efter slauchter occa ye saxonis maid occa brothir sonne king ingland becaus loth king pychtis supportit britonis ī last battal certane prisoneris pichtis takin ye feild schew y• saxonis maid yair ordināce inuade pichtis ȝit dredand ye scottis suld cū thair support thay brocht ane nobyl mā namit colgern ane new power almany ꝓmittit gif distroyit ye pichtis geif hym al ye lādis yt pichtis reiosit beȝond hūber becaus ye said pichtis war cōfiderat afore wt yame contrar thair bandis faucht laitly britonis thair cōtrar sone efter colgern arriuit northūberland inuading ye cuntre importabyll cruelteis inhabitantis yairof impaciēt sustene sa hye iniuris faucht aganis hym gret fury nochtheles yai war discomfist al sone occa knew ye cumyng colgern tuk peace britonis come gret army aganis ye pichtis last cruelte done colgern northūberland mouit ye confiderat kingis cū al pepil vnder yair empire reuenge ye samyn ȝit quhē yair army cumyn sicht ēnymes saw sa gret multitude pepil aganis yame yai wer affrayit specially rehers britonis quhilkis come thair support sayng ye saxonis war huge bodiis stature sa pissant battall yt oftymes yai put thair ennymes flicht yair terribil visage thir wordis maid ye army sa astonist ye mony yame fled ony tary war schame cōstranit yame abide ye morrow ye cōfiderat kingis seing yame sa abasit callit ye noblis baith ye armyis said yame maner▪ meruel gud cōpanionis quhy ȝour proud curage bene sa dekeyit yt mony ȝow yt ar yi pissant army apperis onely sicht ēnimes affrayit sa degenerat fra māheid yt ȝe seme disparit ony dangeir appering saxonis ar sic virtew strenth bot othir pepil may dant yam • victory ȝe haue experiēce yt ye said saxonis bene oft vincust ī albion gret triū phe honour thay war vincust king uortimer chasit hym britane yai war vincust also ambrose becaus thay durst meit hym ī plane battal apperit thay slew treason britonis quhilkis mony ar wagiouris saxonis he bene oft discō fist ȝow mony ȝeris maid tributar ȝow na thing restis thairfore forci cāpionis mak ȝow affrayit attour sen ȝour action iust ȝour aduersaris wrāgusly inuadīg ȝow may ȝe beleif ony othir thing bot victory gif ony effrayis ȝow gret magnitude strenth saxonis thay ar euyl iugeis na pepyl ar ī erd mair stature strā gar bodyis ar scottis pichtis gif ȝe le spreit curage saxonis ar may impute nocht bot ȝoure awin sle • th ȝour bodyis ar na le stature strenth yairis thus suld nane ȝow accuse nature gif ȝour curage nocht corespondent ȝour bodyis sen nature he maid ȝow strang lusty delyuer bodyis reddy sustene labouris nocht remanis bot deuoid al schameful cowardy following manheid virtew ȝour eldaris remembring na thing may succede mair ȝoure schame dāmage myserably vincust bringand ȝour self ȝour wiffis child landis vnder seruitude ennymes sa far pertenis deuore beleif bot sall ieoperd lyuis defēce ȝow yat ennymes may vnderstand quhidder ye noblis scottis pichtꝭ ar mouitmair scham dredour defēd yair realme extreme dāgeir thir wordꝭ ye army inflāmit birnād desire fecht mony yir capitanꝭ schew yam neuir purpos fle ȝit ony thīg cōr • ar ye mynd yair prīce skarsly war thir wordis said quhē baith ye armyis iuni • faucht incredibyll hatrent doutsum victory bot last ye cō fiderat pepil ouirset multitude ennymes gaif bakkis quhom followit saxonis inuading yame ythand slauchter quhill ye nycht put end thairto morrow ye kyng scottis ye residew army returnit galloway kyng pichtis pentland efter victory occa slew scottis pichtis found betuix tyne tweid garnist strenthis thairof strang munitioun wageourꝭ maid colgern prince northumberland defend ye samyn aganis inuasouris efter victory scottis pychtis kyng occa come victorius army aganꝭ ye britonis becaus thay supportit ye scottis pichtis contrar yair band schortly dang thaym 〈◊〉 ingland walis repa ••• strenthis partis ingland sumtime makād scarmussing britonis scottis pichtis caus pepyll vnderstand thay mycht nocht leif exercition weris kyng uter tyme fe • l ane feuer desyrit ane seruandis bryng hym ane drink clere watter fra nixt fo • tane slokin vehement thrist incontinent ane saxone instruckit effect gaue hym ane drynk enuenomit poyson sone efter deceissit xviii ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun vcxxi ȝeris ¶of romane boece vverkis martyrdome institutionis ordour sanct benedict▪ hovv super • levv rentis makis euyll religious men hovv loth kyng pichtis clamit crovvn britane ca vi▪ thir dayis boere romane senatoure rycht expert theology philosophy mathematik syndry othir science wrate excellent werkis trinite siclik logik rethorik geomatry arsmetrik musik astronomy sa ꝓfoundly werkis ar ȝit gret admiration pepyll last slane reuēna theodorik king ostrogotis mony othir haly men thay wald applaude herisy arrius bot cruelte nocht lang vnpunist iustice god theodorik deceissit sone eft miserably name gothis put memory ye said boece fallowis e • kit ye nowmer sanctis yir day sanct benedict quhilk institute ye ordour monkis yocht begun afore basilius orient becaus irkit wt frequēt cūpany pepil come cassinū quhate trāslatit ye tempyll appollo ī ane abbay ordour dedicat sanct iohne ye baptist sic felicite he succedit ordour yt thairof he bene xxiiii papis iclxxxviii cardinalis othir p̄latis innowmerabil amang w siclik armony riche abbayis ordoure men gret deuotion howbeit yai wald haue bene mair religious deuot gif yai bene • wt le magnificence prince ye superflew rentis yir abbayis geuyn magnificence princis inducis religious men mair sleuth sensuall lustis ony feruent deuotion bn̄dict deceissit cassinū fra ye incarnatiō vcxviii ȝeris▪ quhate buryit scolastica sister ye tyme iustyne empriour tyme brigida haly virgine hauād bot xiiii ȝeris age dedicat hir virginite god confirmit bischop ilis ile man scho bure ane leddern belt aboue ane quhyt kyrtyl ane vale ouir hir schoulderis haldin gret reuerence scotland ireland hir singular halynes quhome ar mony kirkis regioun scho deceissit xviii ȝeris conrannus buryit ireland ī ane town namit dune howbeit sum scottis haldis scho lyis abirnethy tyme sanct geberine scottis mā quhilkis fled frāce brethir sisteris eschew cruelte saxonis efter bischop remens quhare kithit syndry myrakyllis tyme institut processioun gang dayis france thre dayis afore ascension day mamercius byschop ueen ressauit scotland conuellanꝰ abbot colmekyll conuellanus ane prophete schew mony thyngis cum concernyng ye exterminion pichtis britonis schew al gret felicite cum scottis inglismen war conuertit sicker faith schew al gret calamite fal ye nobillis albion bot gif yai haistely amendit thair corruppit lyfe conuellanꝰ tyme arthure quhilk kyng britonis efter deith uter quhil sic thingis wer done amang ye scottis loth king pichtis send ambassatouris britonis clamand crowne britane lawis vsit albion quhen ony man marijt ane virgine child suld succeid heritage micht iustly pertene hir becaus marijt anna ye syster ambrose uter quhilkis war deceissit lawful ayris alliegit ye modred wal wan hꝭ sōnis gottin anna suld succeid iust tytyl crown britane nochtheles ye ambassatouris war depeschit britonis displesand answer gat na thing thair desiris ¶hovv saxonis vvar sindry tymes vincust maid tributaris kyng arthure hovv occa arriuit vvith nevv povver northumberland chasit arthure vvali • hovv ye surfet cheir ȝule vvas euyll institute hovv pychtis britonis vva • agre • ca vii schort tyme efter king arthure gadderit ane army brytonis faucht aganis saxonis nocht x mylis fra london dantit yame sa huge victory thay war maid tributar thirllit seruitude vnd empire britonis proud victory come london quhare thay remanit syndry monethis makand thair ordinance aganis saxonis dwelland beȝond humbir quhilkis war confiderat tyme pichtis iniuris redressit al sydis kyng arthure cumād maner ȝork arrayit army maid ye prīce bertanȝe lieutenand fecht aganis pichtis cumyn afore ane gret power samyn support battallis fynaly arrayit maist awful ordinance iunit togidder faucht vncredibill hatrent quhil last baith pichtis saxonis wer discomfist quhome followit britonis inuadyng yame cōtinew slauchter quhil yai come ȝork quhair mony thaim wer ressauit arthure hauād sa frequent victorie saxonis layd ane sege aboute ȝork quhen bene thre monethis samyn reddy rāderit laik vittallis wes aduertist yat occa quhilk wes chasit afore almany wes returnit northumberland newe power saxonis colleck •• ye pychtis agane hym mair ardent furie battall afore becaus vnderstude sa gret nowmer fayis reddy inuaid left ye sege forsaid fled army walis leuand behynd hoell duke bertanȝe ane ꝑt army withstand ennymes duryng wynter seasoun schort tyme eftir returnit lō • nt furie saxonis quhilkis wer cumyn kent otheris regionis thair vsit sic liberalite wyn fauoure pepill sumtyme laikit money necessare vse nixt symer rasit camp come forthwart aganis colgern occa quhilkis wer makād gret heirschippis sindry partis realme finalie dantit thaym sindry victoryis tuke ȝork thrid day eftir returnyng treason ane briton quhilk wes h • ldin ane saxon town quhome brocht gret nowmer britonis within ye said town vnder • ycht sa quietlie wes tane ye sodiouris yairof cruellie slane remanent pepill wer sauit mercy nixt symer ouirpast • e frequent skarmussyng betuix saxonis northumbirland britonis ȝork yi ciete wes rycht populus nixt wynter mony nobillis cōmonis britane quhilkis wer geuin yair lust sleip riatus bankettis sensualite confidyng thair victorie bygane thair present strenth said ye surfet cheir vsit ȝit amang inglismen scottis xiii dayis togiddir eftir cristinmes wes institute tyme kyng arthure nochtheles euer yat schamfull glutony first began corruppit sa ye ingyne inglismen scottis dayis cristis natiuite thay arre mair geuin voracite yan virtew▪ thair wambe deuyne seruice throw quhilk solempne feist sum time sic deuotioun reuerence amang oure anciant faderis sa corruppit like vnto feistis gentilis maid honour bachus flora priapꝰ quhilkis wer deuisit ye lust plesouris men wemen ony gud religioun nixt symer quhen arthure wes cumyn humbir inuaid saxonis fand army sa effeminat soft thay wer nocht able sustene laubour siclik weirly besines thay wer afore throw quhilk mony ȝeris eftir thay lytill displeseir yair ennymes na esperance victorye quhil loth kyng pychtis wes confiderat kyng arthure maner arthure suld reiose croun britane duryng lyfe eftir deith sonnis loth sall succeid pichtis concur britonis aganis saxonis tymes cumyng al landis quhilkis ye pichtis micht cōques beȝond hūbir pa vnd yair dominion attoure modred kīg lothis son sal mary ye docht gawolane gretest prīce vnder ye kyng britane ye childrin gottin betuix yame nurist thair gud schyr gawolane yat gawane brothir modred sall remane continewall resydence kyng arthure tretit accordyng estait ¶hovv scottis pychtis vvar confiderat vvith kyng arthure aganis saxonis hovv saxonis vvar vincust albianis doung albion ca viii peace roborat maner afore rehersit kyng arthur desyring banis cristis ennymes albion solistit confiderat kyngis cum ane prefixt day concur hym defence cristin faith quhilk day britonis scottis pychtis conuenit togidder vnder ane mynd purpos kyng occa aduertist heirof rasit cāpe met albianis maist cruel wise quhen battalles war arrayit athir syde colgern prīce ye saxonis northumberland come ane sweift geldyng pychtis repreuand thaym thair vnfaithfull mynd considering thay ressauit pepyll frendschip kindnes quhilk war laitly yair deidly ennymes bure armour aganis thair anciāt freindis lang afore thaym confiderat ȝit gyf thay pa forthwart day support britonis thay sal haue sum experience quhidder thair awin falset faith saxonis war maist abyll haue victory pychtis na thing mouit yir wordis displayit thair baner faucht incredibyll hatrent aganis ye saxonis followit ane terribyl bergane scottis y• faucht richt wing slew childrik cheiftane saxonis fornentis thaym put yat battal flicht colgern quhilk faucht ye left wyng aganis ye pichtis richt desirus conques glore ruschit sa fei • sly aganis loth king pichtis yt dang loth frome hors nochtheles loth reskewit pichtis colgern inuadit yame sa cruelly brocht speris ground slane myddyl ward seing baith thair wingis discomfist gaif backis quhome britonis followit lang chace murdir occa euil woū dit fled ye feild amang ye horsmē quhē saw na place sicker defēce gat ane schip fled almany remanēt saxonis brokin slauchter seyng na rescous randerit thaym kyng arthure vnder thir cōditionis thay sall ressaue ye faith crist leue tributar vnder hym geif yir cō ditiōis war acceppit leif yair wappynnis guddis behynd yame depart ye cuntre within ane certane day sa mony saxonis micht get schippis afore ye said day fled almany quhen ye almanis saw yame return sic misery trubyll thay maid thair solempne aithis reuenge schamful eiectioun thaym britane quhē euir thay mycht haue sufficient oportunite part saxonis fenȝeit yame take faith abidyng ane better fortoun otheris war slane becaus thay wald nocht renunce thair ydolatrie ☞hovv scottis pichtis come vvith xx thousand men support kyng arthure aganis saxonis hovv saxonis vvar discomfist ca ix quhill saxonis war banist thirl • • seruitude maner king arthur set hym repare ye kyrkis enormiteis done ȝork saxonis wrocht gret cruelteis ye ȝeir followyng aduertist yat saxonis inhabit ile wicht otheris kent war assemblit togidder makand grete cruelteis heirschippis ye britonis landis repres thir attemptatis arthure went ane gret power london bring purpos ane better fyne solistit eugenius sonne congallus afore rehersit modred sonne loth cum xx scottis pichtis support arthur knawyng 〈◊〉 gret dammage come • epyll tyme bypast riatus surfet cheir maid hym withstand thair insolence yat na occasion suld appeir effeminat army schort tyme efter tuke ye ymage blissit virgyne mary ansenȝe went forthwart hope victory modred gud fader gawolane richt desyrus wyn honour went afore army britonis vm horsmen saxonis knawyng arthur within foure mylis thair campe send thair ambassatouris desyring hym pa n • forther geif thaym licence pa albion yair guddis iniure britonis al sone arthure condiscendit thir petitiōis thay desyrit iii day tre • bot denyit arthure tra • • prouin efter sum hyd treason vnder yair desirꝭ noch • theles promyttit pa lytill forthir ye day britonis bean • aduysit quhat suld done mater beleuand na thing le treason saxonis set modred gawolane becaus thay war certane mylis fra kyng arthuris campe slew ane gret nowmer thairof remanent chasit y• tentis britonis arthure incontinent callit afore hym ye ambassatouris saxonis said wald nothir heir thair desyris tymes cumyng ȝit haue peace yame life becaus thay treasonabylly inuadit pepyl vnder cō monyng peace skarsly war thir wordis said quhen xl ye nobyllest men amang saxonis come kyng excuse treason recently committit saying done ȝoung men aduise thair nobillis arthure presumand na le treason vnder last message thā vnder first commandit thaym remane styll campe ye first messingeris syne rasit army within ye nicht come arrayit thre battallis ye saxonis thay war aduertist cumyng saxonis war gretūly affrayit knawyng nothir quhat done ȝit quhat answerit thair ambassatouris mene tyme modred gawolane inuadit yame sa properant diligence y• mony thaym war discomfist thay mycht cū array quhom followi • arthure sic rageand fury nane yame war saiffit quhare ya • mycht tane throw quhilk nocht hard bot rūmissing • pepyll partis thairabout campe repleit deid carionis • ludis rynnand bludy • remes seyis battal wa • slane • huge nowmer saxonis▪ apperandly thay mycht neuir recouer ye dāmage thairof ȝit haue pissance resist britonis tymes cumyng thus wer saxonis thirlit seruitude afore bot ye nobillis wer licent pa almany scottis pichtis abaid certane dayis lō doun returnyt hame richely rewardit kyng arthure displeseir thair weris ¶hovv tonset chancellar scotland vva • slane vvrangus administration iustice king conrannꝰ deith iustiniane empriour▪ prudent constitutionis fame cheualry syndry captiuite • rome ca x sic thingis done britane arthure realme scottis wes gouernit gret felicite iustyce kyng conrannus quhil last dāmage lang age syndry displesouris followit realme thair ane mā pure lynnage namit tonset wes maid chancellar king conrannus bot mair set kingis proffet ony iustice geuand mynd hale industry punys men extreme rigoure conques money kyng conrā nu ingyne syndry kyngis ar thaym maist fauour reuerence couth maist craftely escheit guddis ye pepyl proffet tonset efter syndry wrangis oppressionis done hym ye kyngis auctoryte callit afore hym certane merchandis fore ī murray smal vane causis put thaym deith misdoaris syne confiscat thair guddis kingis b • huffe nobyllis murray cōmouit thir oppressyonis done thair freindis marchātis foresaid ruschit haistely harnes slew tonset ī plane iugement▪ quhare doyng mair iniure iustice pepyll skryrais efter slauchter maid thir men serchit maist diligence thay disparit men fled montanis traistyng na grace remeid bot gyf thay dyd sum gretar cruelte redeme ye first commoun opinioun ȝit dayis thairfore concludit sla kyng delyuer pepyll extorsioun done hym quharethrow thay mycht conques fauour commonis restorit thair peace schort tyme efter donald capitane athole richt familiar kyng knawyng conspiratioun send secret seruant caus thir lymmaris cum inuerloch quhare ye king resident tyme promyttit thaym support accomplis yair intēt fynaly ressauit yame gret humanite inclusit yame thair swerdis wappinnis ane secrete chalmer quhare kyng vsyt solitar syne departit town knawin na thyng thairof kyng last enterit ye chalmer quhare yir lymmaris war waitand slauchter al sone saw thaym▪ fell kneis desyri • grace nochtheles yir limmaris ony myseratioun slew hym xxxv ȝeir regne quhilk xvi ȝeir empire arthure twenty ȝeir iustiniane emprioure fra incarnatioun v hundreth xxxv ȝeris body brocht colmekyll buryit amang anciant sepulturis forebearꝭ iustinian ane ye nobyl empriouris afore dayis causit romane lawis constitutionis colleckit togidder sic reason eloquence fame gret admiratioun pepyll iustiniane pecifyit mony landis pertenyng romane empire delyuerit affrik fra uandallis italy fra gothis dalmasia fra tyranny mundus cheualry ane richt vailȝeant capitane callit bellisar delyuerit rome fra tyranny theodorik kyng ostrogothis efter yat segit mony ȝeris bellisar faucht mony strang battallis defence rome aganis totylla king gothis bot last bellisar fell gret infirmite sa rome fynaly tane said 〈◊〉 kyng gothis wallis 〈◊〉 bet ground capitol • mony othir housis priuat publik maner ci • tezanis thairof slane ane p • rpetua • l memory pe • yll lytyl confidence suld felicite mā rome distroyit maner fra incarnatioun vcl ȝeris tane first gawlis brint distroyit quhen began first fluris lang efter distroyit alarik king gothis ye maner tane athalphꝰ quhilk rang efter • larik sone efter tane agane gensiricus king uandalis put na le rewyne cartage afore romani town quhilk bene decorit sa mony vailȝeant deidis dantar al pepyl sa oft tane ba • bar pepyll schawis weill na thyng sycker bot fragyll mortall warld bot wyll returne history quhare left ¶of kyng eugenius thrid lavvis conrannus vvyfe hovv scho • led vvith hir sōnis ingland king arthuris fame cheualry round •• byll hovv britonis contra • thair • mi maid cōstantine prince britane ca xi conrannus slane said eugenius ye sonne congallus maid king mony freindis courannꝰ gaif hym coū sall begynnyng empire punis slauchter eme yt otheris mycht tak example tymes cumyng sla ane kyng eugenius na thyng mouit thair counsal onely left slayaris hym vnpunist bot al put thaym secrete counsall thairfore suspeckit faderis slauchter conrannus wyfe suspeck hym ye samyn maner fled hir child regiman aydane ireland quhare scho remanit certane ȝeris deceissi • hir first sonne regimā bot aidane remanit kyng ireland weill tretit mony ȝeris efter kyng eugeniꝰ schaw hym plesand ye begynnyng empire sat oftimes iugement cause hym appeir benigne pepyll quhare ony personis war condampnit wranguislye gaif thaym lycence appeill othir iugis supportit indegent pepyll commoun gud quhen thay na guddis follow thair action lawe commandit na man call ane pupyll iugement afore lauchfull age na wedow drawin ane mile fra hir dwellyng place iugemēt maid al gret punition theuis ressettouris kepit gud peace pichtis britonis nychtbouris sum auctouris writtis y• arthure thir dayis dantit scotland iseland orknay dēmark swethrik spruse ȝelād gotlād hollād braband flanderis picarde normandy bertanȝe france maid al ye pepil yairof tributar hꝭ empire elikwyse subdewit grece peirse araby egipt affrik spanȝe finalie vincust lucius romane emprioure singular battall historie sall haue faith thaym ar anctouris thairof knaw ferme lie arthure deceissit tyme iustiniane emprioure quhen ye gothis burgundianis uandalis othir nationis inuadit ye romane empire thairfore apperand sen sa mony sindry pepill maid diuers weiris amang thaym self tyme thay micht gaderit vnder ane mynd fecht aganis arthure attoure thair wes yi tyme maist horrible weris betuix gothis franchemē ye historicianis wrait thair weris maid na mentioun arthure nochtheles sen ar set mynnis na mannis honour fame fynd arthure wes glore marcial dedis na le vailȝeant ony othir princis britane • ikit realme equaly polecy rich writtin arthure tuke gret delectatioun werslyng strang kempis hauand yame sic familiarite yat quhen vsit dyne tak consultatioun weris gart thaym sit hym maner ane round crown ye nane yame suld preferrit tyll otheris digni • e quhilkis seit wes callit round tabil youcht vailȝeant dedis wer worthy haue memorie ȝit vulgare fabillis quhilkis ar fenȝeit samyn he violat thair fame makis thaym haue le credence britonis insolent lang peace vnder ye empire arthure wer penitent contract maid afore loth king pychtis think nocht profitabill thair weill yat vncouth blud suld regne aboue thaim desyri • kyng arthure schaw thaym quhom thocht maist abill succeid arthure bad thaym cheis ane thair general vo • yat wer wyse discendyng blude riall • britane thay bot delay namit constantyne ye sonne cadorus prince cornewell quhil • ▪ wes admittit arthure declarit prince britane nocht wes kyng bot iust heritour • succeid eftir deith throw quhilk come vse eldest son kyngis wer callit prince realme constantyne declarit prince maner apperit mony euident signes wyse gracious ye pepill conquest ane gud name amang britonis ☞ message send pichtis britonis thair ansvvere▪ hovv kyng arthure vvas slane vvith mony nobyllis brytane scottis pychtis hovv guanora vvyfe vvas brocht angus▪ hir sepulture▪ ca • amyte fel albianis battal ca xii tyme deceissit loth king pichtis quhom ye landis wes afore namit pentlād wer namit lowthiane eftir deith modrede kyng pychtis send ambassatouris kyng arthur nobillis britane saying wes nocht semyng princis violat yair faith band interuentioun sum leifful cause band maid betuix hym kyng arthure wes nocht vnknawin thaym quhilk he ratifyit nane suld regne behynd arthure britane bot ye sonnis loth anna wyfe ye heritouris discendyng thair successioun becaus • ame wes constantyne prince • cornewell wes namit thaym • succeid ye crown britane cō trar thair band faith afore contrackit requirit kyng arthure gyf na aduertence iniust persuasioun pepil quhilk he na respect religion picte bot onelie cause hym distroy baith ye law god man thairfore prayit hym perseueir ye band afore cō trackit na punition cum pepil iustice god violation faith promys wes answerit ye nobillis britane yat ye band betuix arthure loth wes maid bot duryng langar leiffar thaym twa sen loth wes deceissit ye band wes dissoluit ī ye self attoure thay violat nocht yair faith howbeit thay maid cōstantine ane nobill man blud riall britane yair price becaus na thīg semyt kingis mair keip yair realme prouidence wisdome come nocht vnder empire vncouth blude attour suspitius ye britonis suld cū vnder dominion pichtis▪ sen yai bene ay thair auld ennymes answer rehersit pichtis maid yame detest treason britonis penitent yt thay supportit yame subdewyng saxonis nochtheles yai tuke consultation quhat best done fynaly ane cōsent concludit inuade britonis bring thair contrar pepyll ye war yair ennymes ȝit afore thay attempt mater thay thocht ganand assailȝe ye mynd scottis saxonis fand thaym reddy assist yame peace weir eugenius grantit mair plesandly thair petitionis yat britonis ressaui • rebellis realme arthure seand peace geuyn vp betuix hym pychtis garnyst ye strenthis realme syne come aue huge pepyll aganis scottis pichtis traisting howbeit saxonis returnit britane thay suld esaly vincust sen thay war sa oft brokyn discomfist weris nochtheles ane strang army scottis pichtis war assemblit afore cumyng humber place quhare yai ben ay maist fortunat win quhen battallis war arrayit otheris sycht bischoppis prelatis scottis pichtis britonis come mediatouris desyryng thaym remember dangerus war thair commoun weill vnnaturall perseueir battall sen thay war ordanit nature leif togidder within yat ile debait yame fra inuasion othir strange pepyl attoure thair cyuyll battallis contentionis amang thaym self suld occasion saxonis returne albion thay reiose na thyng mair subuersioun albianis modred eugeniꝰ mouit deuote wordis thir prelatis condiscendit put ane end thair weris gyf britonis wald stand ye band afore contrackit bischoppis answer went arthure brocht mynd peace bot ye freindis constantyne war nocht onely repugnant thair petitionis bot al gaif vnplesand wordis said becaus confiderat kingis denuncit first weris arthure nocht honour desist thairfra al bot foly thaym persuaid peace quhen army war arrayit otheris sicht bot gif war wirk sum prodition vnder colour peace skarsly war thir wordis said quhen huge noyis clamoure rais sydis sone efter baith ye armyis iunit mair cruelte euir hard ony warld afore place quhare thay iunit ful mo marces sa vnplesand britonis yt thay mycht nocht weilde thair ordinance wappynnis thay desyrit throw quhilk battall prolongit sa huge multitude pepyll slane ryuer humber ran full bludy stremys seyis ¶quhill armyis war fechtand maist raige maner ane pichtis instruckit nanys cryit schyll voce fle fle arthure slane nobilite britonis ¶this cry rasit scottis pychtis mair spreit afore maid britonis sa astonist na auctorite sound trumpat mycht garre thaym tary bot haistely left thair wappynnis fled thair best refuge ¶in sorrowfull battall slane scottis pichtis twenty thousand modrede kyng pychtis noblis baith thair realmys slane britonis bertona • come thair support thritty thousand amang otheris slane kyng arthure walwane bruthir modrede kyng pychtis quhilk faucht day lu • le kyng arthure aganis naturall bruthir ¶on morrow spulȝe kyng arthuris campe partit amang confyderat pepyll ryte army ¶guanora quene brytane spouse kyng arthure tane mony ladyis knychtis dependyng hir tyme ¶the hors ryches cofferis gottin hir fell pray scottis bot hir self hir ladyis knychtis▪ fell pychtis brocht angus ane castell callit dunbarre quhilk na thyng remanis bot prent wallis quhare thay leiffit remanent dayis thair lyfe ¶in memorye heirof megyle ane towne angus ten myle fra dunde • mony anciant sepulturis gret reuerence pepyll specyally sepulture guanora tytle wryttyn thairapon schawis ☞ ¶all wemen strampis sepulture sall ay barrant ony frute thair wamb syclyke guanora ¶and quhydder verite nocht latte thaym schawe he experience thairof bot ane thyng knaw ¶all wemen abhorris strampe sepulture sayd gal fride writare ye history britane modrede arthure faucht nocht humbir bot town gwyntoun come ye f • ild lyue guanora displesei • enterit religioun quhilkis ar far discrepant fra hystory haue writtin nochtheles follow ueremond turgot otheris mony autentyke authouris quhilkis writis trew deidis nobyll men ony fictioun ¶attoure quhare euir maist dāgerus battal strikin sic displesour come efter ye briton scottis pichtis huge • auchter mony ȝeris efter thay mycht nocht recouer dammage thairof ¶hovv constantine kyng britonis 〈◊〉 • • modrede vncouth • e • uellis sene albion hovv eugeniu • gaif syndry landis vvith army nobyll men hi • realme hovv con • tā tyne kyng britonis vva • maid monk ireland eugeniꝰ deith ca xiii brytonis efter discomfitour slauchter kyng arthure maid constātyne quhilk declarit prince afor kyng brytane constantyne na succession modrede suld clame ye crown britane slew sonnis modrede presence thair moder quhilk douchter gawolane throw quhilk successioun modrede fa • lȝ • thir afflictionis fell albianis fra incarnation vcxlii ȝeris xxiii ȝeir ye empire arthure y• viii ȝeir regne eugenius mony vncouth meruellꝭ war sene afore last battall albioun herbes war sene ȝork full blude ane calf found nocht far fra camelon two heidis ane lam siclik dowbyll nature sonne 〈◊〉 mydday apperit bludy lift schane two dayis cōtinewally ful sternis piottis nicht crawis faucht ye rauynnis maid vncredibyll slaucht euery syde bot wyl returne history kyng eugenius efter returnyng scotland nowmerit residew army rewardit richely ye freindis thaym war slane feild caus thair vailȝeāt deidis remane ī lang memory gaif yame landis syndry army yair posterite may vnderstand thay war decorit nobyll kyngꝭ yair vailȝeant worthy deidis eugenius sic victorius virtuous deidis conquest ane gud name haldyn na lytyll veneration amang pepyll gouernit yame tymes cumyng mair beniuolence thā rigour iurmi • ik duke saxonis aduertist intollerabyll slauchter britonis come ane huge nauy pepyll ingland quhare smal labour subdew king constantyne chasit ye remanēt britonis walis constantyne fyndyng na securite lyfe walis fled ireland quhare leuit certane ȝeris wyfe child vnknawin amang indegent pure pepyll almous al sone knawin persuasion monkis schoif held ane abbay samyn cuntre quhare leui • ane deuote lyfe slane efter scottis eikit nowmer martirꝭ memory heirof mony kirkis amāg w dedicat hym ¶this iurmirik howbeit nocht institute ye sicker faith sufferit ye euangel crist prechit inglysmen maid ane band peace betuix hym ye scottis pichtis quhilk endurit end lyfe eugenius hauand gud peace residew dayis deceissit xxxiiii ȝeir regne buriit colmekyl fra incarnation vclxviii ȝeris ye vi ȝeir tiberius secund name emprioure ¶of kyng convvallus lavvis deith ye cumyng sanct colme scotlund sanct mungo ca xiiii▪ eugenius buriit colmekyll brothir maid kyng ane prince rycht catholyke commandit principall castellis townis realme payntit sygne croce pepyll thairthrow mycht haue remembrance quhat cruell pane doloure saluioure sufferit thairon ane syluer crucifix borne ay afore hym quhare past▪ kyst afore montit hors wryttyn goldyn letteris crucifix th • glore crystyn pepyll inhibite paynt graif signe croce ony pament kirkis pepyll suld nocht trampe ye samyn neuir sene kirke bot heid discouerit maid mony lawis liberte haly kirke y• dang ane preist suld want hand slew ane preist suld brint guddis confiscat teindis euery frutis grew ye ground suld geuyn ye kirke war cursit auctorite ye kirke suld banist fra gud cumpany nane reuerence na lawis patent hym na faith geuyn dispositioun dotate kirkis riche iowellis possessionis sustene deuyne seruyce gaif vicaris personis certane croftis landis lyand kirkis caus thaym mair feruent thair residence deuotioun thus ye crystyn faith honorit partis realme fame catholike prince causit sāct colme ane mā syngulare lyfe cum ireland albioun mony relygyous pepyll quhais cumyng gret confluence scottis pichtis ye grete felicite swei • ne thay fand preching gaderit syndry monkis quhilkis wa • tyme vagabound throw realme put yame syndry abbayis quhilkis war foundit afore conuallus lang efter come lowthiane quhare purgit brudeus kyng pi • htis pepyl fra pelagius herisyis tyme sanct mungo haly byschop glasquew quhilk gottin sanct thanew douchter loth kyng pichtis opprest contrar hir wyll eugenius last kyng scottis mungo heirand sanct colme preiche afore brudeus rauist spreit deuyne wourdis followit hym dunkeld quhare conwallus beildit ane riche abbay afore bot magnificēce princis maid ane bischoppꝭ seit craftely biggit wt square polyst stanis quhē thir two haly men remanit vi monethis dunkeld thay departit hame sanct mungo returnit glasquew sanct colme ireland schew ye princis thairof plesandly tretit amang scottis pichtis quhat feruent desire thay preching bot ane thing thair aboue meruellis sene hym afore conwallꝰ kyng scottis nochtwithstanding princely estait rich quhilkis suld induce hym mair pleseir virtew na le religious ony othir prelat kirkman realme prouyn virtew haldyn sic reuerence amang pepyll yt na persone durst iniurius othir ȝit speik hym ony detraction throw quhilk al vicis pepyl yocht thay war naturally inclinit thairto war dan • mair virtew ony rygour ȝeir followyng sanct colme returnit albion brocht hym son conrānus namit aidane quhilk fled afore schew ī ireland eschew ye wraith eugenius cumyng ilis aduertist conwallus deceissit x ȝeir regne body cumand gret lament pepyll buri • colmekyl thairfore went abbay funerall obsequeis deuote maner ¶of kyng kynnatyll hovv resignit crovn aidane orison maid sanct colme hovv scottis pichtis faucht amang thaym self vvar agreit sanct colme ca • v conwallus deceissit maner ane counsall set argyle fra oure redēption vclxxviii ȝeris quhilk kinnatyll brothir conwallus afore rehersit maid kyng kynnatyll na man beleuit ressauit colme aidane gret humanite prayit aidane gud curage within schort tyme suld reiose crown scotland haue sic succession suld delyuer ye realme mony displesouris ȝit vncertane tyme quhat deuyne reuelation prophecy mycht schaw sic thīgis within dayis eftir ane imoderat flux catterre fel throte chaftis causit hym resigne gouernance realm aidane sāct colme seand hym approche extremis deith exhortit hym haue thing contemption saiffing felicite heuyn quhare haistely pa kinnatyl deuotely obtemperand sanct colme randerit saule god feird moneth regne body buryit colmekyll ane cōuention maid sone efter argyle quhilk aidane maid kyng sanct colme becaus present conuention put diademe kyng aidanis heid said nobyllis wyse ¶it nocht neidfull maist nobyll men exh ••• ȝow ony gret deuotion sen ye sa • nyn incressis dayly apperis amang ȝow ȝit thynk nocht vnganand exhort ȝow obeysant ȝoure prynce aidane vnder ane mynd assent brocht solempne auditour industry bot erar prouysyoun god offyce sall gouerne ȝow equale iustice peace • delyuer ȝow trubyll quhen occurris ȝour part salbe thairfore • leif togydder vnder hym • gud mynd beniuolence stāding sa content ȝour awin guddis ȝe couat nane otheris remembryng sindry beneficis geuin ȝow ineffabill gudnes god quhilk he instruckit ȝow blissit lawis maid ȝow deir pepil fortunat ȝow haif ane prince singular virtew quhais prudence ȝour faith salbe sic kir ȝour cōmon weill put profet sic felicite gyf ȝe obeysāt hym na ennymes sall appeir aganis ȝow contrar quhilk god forbeid gyf ȝe declyne constitutionis god rebelland ye ministeris iustice gif ȝour prince aidane vnmindfull giftis god abusand ye administration realme thā sal nocht faill cū ȝow sindry plagꝭ ciuill contentionis quhilkis sal gyf occasioun ȝour ennymes inuaid ȝow ȝour vter exterminiō le ȝe amend ȝour demeritis tyme prouide thairfore ȝe nocht sa insolent eftir hie chance prosperite ȝe incur ye hatrent god exponand baith ȝour singulare cōmon weill extreme dangeir ye pepil beyng exhortit yir wourdis promittit thair faithfull obedience kyng aidane sic thingis done sanct colme returnit ye ilis aidane went galloway quhare iustice dantit part theuis quhilkis infestit cuntre repres vthir enormiteis done realme set ane conuention nobillis sindry partis thairof quhilk prudence sanct colme wer deuisit sindry thyngis cō mon weill throw quhilk gret tranquillite succedit mony dayis ef • ir nochtheles chance man oft occurris pepil he prudence mak yame stand lang felicite certane nobillis quhilkꝭ mycht nocht lang suffir peace fell ī ane hie contentioun huntis interuentioun ane caus nocht throw quhilk followit haistly gret slauchter slayaris knawyng yame feirslie socht rigour iustice hauand na refuge eschewe kyngis lawis fled brudeus kyng pychtis al sone kyng aidan wes aduertist yairof send ambassatouris ye kyng pichtis requiryng hym tennour confideratioun deliuer thir men iustice brudeus mouit cōmiseratioun picte thir banist men refusit desyris frequent message excusit thair iniquite thus maid iniuris otheris occasioun battall aganis hym self ¶kyng aidane becaus thir rebellis wer nocht deliuerit pleseir send ane cumpany armyt men angus inuaid ye cuntre displesouris yat thai micht scottꝭ quhilkis wer send behalf brocht ane huge pray guddis angus slew thaym maid obstakill pychtis vnpacient suffir iniure recompensit ye samyn siclyk heirschippis slauchter ye scottis fury rage insolence ylk day incressyng maid debait finalie decidit ye swerd sone eftir thay gaderit baith ye sydis striuelyng quhair thay faucht togiddir gre • murdir youcht ye victorie succedit ye scottis ȝit wes vnplesand arthurus eldest sonne kyng aidan prince scotland wes slane feild thus tuke ye scottis heuynes dolour slauchter pleseir thair victorie sanct colme • rand vnhappy battall come kyng aidane repreuit hym smal occasioun mouit battal confiderat freindis throw quhilk wes cause nocht onlie maist lamentabill slauchter bot al bringyng mony pepill schamefull vter pouerte thairfore declarit gyf ye sam •• wer nocht hastely reparit blude iustice god suld cruelly punist aidane affray yir wourdꝭ prayit sāct colme schaw quhat way mycht amend offence hym cōmittit haly man seyng aidane penitent cōmiseration went brudeus kyng pychtis schew vnprudentlie yi vnhappy bergane wes begun quhat mischeif wes follow baith ye pepil 〈◊〉 thay perseuerit battal aganis othir thir wourdis brudeus cō di • cendit haue peace thus wer ba •• h y• kingis content ye sāct colme iuge debait euin •• ci thocht best finalie baith thir kyngis wer aggreit brocht prudence samyn tendernes thay wer afore within schort tyme haly man sanct colme returnit ilis fell ane gret infirmite immoderat flu • caterre quhilk followit end lyfe ☞¶hovv saxonis deuydit ingland seuyn syndry kyngdomes▪ hovv pichtis saxonis vvar confiderat togidder▪ discomfist scottis britonis orisoun maid kyng aydane army hovv said aydane vvas vincust saxoni • sonne slane ca xvi quhen ye saxonis doung britonis walis punist thaym ilk day new afflictionis yai deuidit realme inglād seuin sindry kingdomes▪ fyne yt britonis mycht neuir haue place recouer yair ald rowmes maid seuin sindry kingis amang quhom wes ethelfreid kyng northumberland quhilk ane singulare malyce aganis al britonis becaus wes rycht desirus eik empire solistit brudeus kyng pichtis inuaid scottis promittit gyf wald inuaid thaim battall sen ye iniuris done pepill wes nocht redressit support hym power mycht battall wes nocht persuadit ethelfreid ony affection pichtis bot onlie haue thaym brokin scottis mycht ye esalie conques thair realme brudeus refusit ye first tyme rais ony army aganis confiderat nichtbouris nochtheles inoportune sollicitatioun nobillis condiscendit thairto motiue yi battall becaus guddis reft afore fra pepyll scottis war nocht restorit contract proportit kyng aydane meit baith treason pichtis saxonis confiderat malgo kyng britonis maner gif saxonis pychtis inuade brytonis kyng aydane sall cum thair support gif pichtis saxonis come scottis kyng britonis sal support yame yat samyn maner▪ saxonis weil aduertist cōfideration draw ye scottis fra thair rowmes mak thaym laik vittallis enterit ye pichtis ye britonis landis kyng aydane sone efter assemblit pissance realme come samyn support britonis saxonis pychtis nochtwithstandyng cummyng maid yame eschew battall lang tary abiding cumyng syndry othir saxonis thair support suddanly apperit sycht cenlyne king west saxonis new garison support thair army scottis britonis howbeit thay war affrayit thair cumyng thocht best sen na help apperit bot thair handis meit new army west saxonis fynaly put thaym flycht slew cutha sonne cenlyne efter victory scottis britonis reiosit sic excellent mirth vsit thay dayis mene tyme north saxonis ye residew yair folkis quhilkis wer laitly discomfist come scottis britonis new battall thus war scottis britonis sa affrayit y• na noyis word thair army kyng aidane knawyng scilence na sygne audacite bot erar de • eckit mynd said maner quhare gud companionis ȝour knichtly curage • quhare ȝour inuincibyl sprei • ȝour glaidnes euanist afore ȝe vincust ac ȝe defate sicht thir febyll ennymes sen ȝe merciall prowes he put sa vailȝeant pepyll afore flicht lat neuir ȝour strang army randerit ēnymes lat neuir ȝour fais haue glore ȝour cowartry ȝir haue victory debait return heir fore hartly freindis ȝour anciant virtew curage vnderstand ȝour ennymes inuadis ȝow wrang persute motioun treasonavil ethelfred yairfore exerce ȝoure wraith cruelie hym sen first rute al trubyll ȝe sall haue quhat plesand reward may geif ȝow gyf ȝe haue victory quhilk ī ȝour handis thir wourdis war skarsly rehersit quhen saxonis fechtand rycht wyng war put abak incontinent ethelfred come ane chosyn cumpany ī yair support exhorting thaym tak na affray thair febyll aduersa • quhome thay sa oft vincust afore brudeus fechtand ye richt wyng pichtis maist vailȝeant capitanis left wyng p •• scottis gret afflyctioun nochtheles scottis perseuerit ythand battall quhill thay saw ye myddyll ward quhare britonis faucht discomfist thay gaif backis quhome foll • wit pychtis saxonis lang chace ¶in battall war slane brennius thane ye ile man dongarus thrid sonne aydane mony nobyllis commonis sydis kyng ethelfred loist ane eyne brudeus euyll woundit mony nobyllis slane defence ☞¶hovv saxonis pychti • vvar dyscomfist northumberland scottis brytonis deith sanct co • sanct • dane▪ vengeance come saxonis dingyng sanct austyne syndry haly men ca xvii ethelfred na thyng satifyit yi victory scottis britonis deglaston come nixt symer ye pichtis ī galloway purpos othir bring ye vte • heirschip elli bryng samy • vnder thair dominion aidane weill aduertist thair mynd send britonis cum support syne went power mycht get galloway fand cumyng pychtis saxonis besy • thair incursionis array incontinent set thaym array •• battall mony thaym slew remanent put flicht nycht following come ye army britonis mengit baith armyis togidder al sone ye • ychtis saxonis wer aduertist • hairof thay set thaym strang bus • hementis keip entres straitis annandale thus wes na way passage ye army scottis britonis bot onlie pa throw dangerus riuer sink sandis sulloway britonis scottis seand thaym inclusit yus al sidis parkit yame haistelie amang strenthis cuntre thay wer samyn remane syne rasit yair army nycht quhen yair fayis suspec kit na thīg le thā yair remouing▪ com ouir sulloway ye maist ꝓperāt way thay mycht northumbirlād left behynd yame ane huge fyre birnand al nycht yair ennymes suld haue na presumptioun thair departing thair cumyng northumberland thay inuadit pepill thairof maist cruelte fyre swerd saxonis pichtis knawyng thair pepill northū berland opprest violence left galloway huge pyne co • thair ennymes sycht morow baith ye armyis rageād • ist hatrent aganis othir iunyt togi ••• saxonis sic incredible furye ruschit battall aganis scottis ony sycht deith mony thaim wer doung dynt swerdis ground ȝit becaus fr •• ch men come placis quhair thay wer slopit victorie wes l • ng vncertane chance fortoun newtrale quhil last aidane othir vailȝeant capitanis began rais folkis hope victorie spretit yame sic curage yat thay perseuerand fechting put ye saxonis pichtis flicht▪ maid mair slauchter thaym cha • e▪ wes first battall nycht afore battall sanct colme wes abbay colmekill schew ye brethir thairof ye king aidane wes fecht ye morow cō mendit hym army thair prayaris na dout bot ye prayer yi haly man wes richt supportable kyng aidane samyn houre victore fell scottis reuelit brethir said abbay gart thaym gyf louyng thairof god eftir yi victorie kyng sound trumpat gaderit folkis standart eftir gret apprisyng thair manheid gaue ye tent part ye spulȝe gottin feild repare kirkis scotland▪ send ye banaris saxonis pychtis san • colme remane abbay colmekill memorie excellent victorie battall wes slane cenlyne king west saxonis culyne qu • itelyne principall capitanis schort tyme followyng sanet colme brokin lang infirmite deceissit wes buryit ye said abbay howbeit otherꝭ auctouris schawis hym buryit ane town ireland namit dune quhare haldin gret veneration sepulture ar grauin thir versis ¶sanct colme▪ sanct patrik▪ brigitta pure thir thre dune lyis ī ane supulture kyng aidane leuyt schort tyme behynd sanct colme deceissit xxvii ȝeir regne tyme mawricius emprioure fra incarnation vicvi ȝerꝭ thꝭ tyme wes institute sanct gregoure ye procession callit latania maior sanct markis day implore mercy god aganis ane terrible pest quhilk rais rome inundatioun tibir gregour send inglād twa haly men namyt austyne millite bring saxonis cristin faith ye saxonis bure sic hatrent aganis britonis inglismen thay wald heir na doctryne precheing yame yairfore wes necessar thir two haly men suld cum ingland instruk saxonis ye cristin faith finalie quhen haly man sāct austyne wes precheand ye saxonis myglinton thay wer nocht onlie rebellād precheing bot contemptioun thay sewit fische talis abi • ement otheris alliegis thay dang hym skait rumpillis nochtheles derisioun succedit thair gret displesoure god tuke thaym sic vengeance thay thair posterite lang talis mony ȝeris eftir memorie heirof ye barnis ar ȝit borne myglintoun he samyn deformite bot ye men hauād experience thairof fleis toun tyme thair birth eschapis yi malediction ye way nochtheles thir haly men perseuerit sic feruent precheing mony saxonis ressauit sacramēt baptyme ethelfred kyng northumbirland heirand sa gret noumer saxonis conuerti • cristin faith become rycht sorowfull votit hym thair perpetuall ennyme yi tyme wes scotland thre haly men oure natioun baldreid dunstane connall first wes ane excellēt doctour deceissit ye basse ane strang castall within see parochinaris auldham tynnyngham prestoun contendit quhilk thaym thre suld haue body decore thair kirk finalie thay wer cōtent superseid yair debait quhil nixt morow consultit bischop morow thay fand mirakill god thre •• thre bodyis na thyng discrepāt fra otheris quantite coullour arrayment cōmand bischop ilk parochin tuke ane yir bodyis thair kirk sa body haly man lyis mirakill thre kirkis secound dunstane wes eme king aidane bot contempnyt warlde wes ane religious man thrid connall wes discipill sanct mungo buryit inchynnane nocht far fra glasqw quhair haldyn gret veneratioun pepill ☞ kyng kenneth eugenius fourt hovv kyng
