britonis vvas doung realme saxonis recouerit samyn hovv ethelfred kyng northumberland vvas slane▪ sindri haly mē ca xviii ane cōuention wes maid argyle eftir deith king aidane quhilk kennethkeir son cōwallus afore rehersyt wes mayde kyng deceissit ye fourt moneth eftir coronation eftir deith eugenius fourt name sonne aidane wes maid kyng said sanct colme schew afore deith kyng aidane •• mony othir sonnis elder eugenius ȝit nane thaym suld reiose crown scotland bot onlie eugeniꝰ quhilk wes prouin weill eftir ye residew sonnis wer slane sindry chancis battal eugeniꝰ wes sa institute ȝouth doctryne sanct colme wes geuin erar defend awin thā inuaid otheris wes ane iust vertuus prince trew subdittis ryche displesant misdoaris cōmandit idill pepil iuglaris menstralis bardis scaffaris othir pa realme elli fynd sum craft wyn yair leiffyng punist thift na le cruelte reif slauchter maid regorꝰ punition nobillis▪ quhen fand yame oppressouris pure subdittis contrar tretit yame gret reuerence honouris quhen fand thaym virtewis ten • ȝeir regne cingell kyng west saxonis ethelfred kyng northūbirland come ane gret army aganis cadwallo kyng hi • tonis chasit hym scotland nochtheles abaid schort tyme 〈◊〉 bot past bartanȝe quhare gat sic support kyng thairof returnyt walis nocht onlie recouerit realme bot slew gret noumer saxonis yi tyme reidwald kyng eist saxonis ethelbreid kyng south saxonis com gret armyis aganis ethelfreid kyng northumbirland put thaim afore gret affliction taikyng cristin faith thir armyis faucht togidd wintringham quhair ethelfreid wes slane maist part pepill last wourdis wer yir de leuit protectour religioun goddis ennyme cristin pepil thir wourdis randerit vnhappy saule pyne succedit place ane cristyn man namyt edwyne ethelfreid vii sonnis namyt eufreid oswald oslaws oswan offas osmond osyk thir vii brethir detestand treasoun pychtis thay come nocht support thair fadir fled eugenius quhair thay wer plesandlie ressauit tuke cristyn faith thair sister ebba eschewyng pollutioun hir body gat ane bait deuyne mirakill come helpe man heid humbir quhair scho wes professit nun deit ane haly virgyne ¶sic thyngis done kyng eugenius reparit al ye kirkis realme quhilkꝭ wer afore distroyit cruelte saxonis stuffi • strenthis bordouris strang munitionis mē vitallis deceissit xv ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun vicxx ȝeris buryit colmekyll tyme bonifacius bischop come ane cumpany haly men italy mouth tay ¶sum authouris sayis chosyn pape efter sanct gregoure wylfully renunsit paperie come scottis yocht nocht nowmerit amang legend papis ȝit fynd hym ane man syngulare lyfe doctrine place quhare landit first scotland ereckit hym ane kirk honour sanct petir ye appostyll efter went ane town namit tullyne thre myle fra dunde quhare rasit ane othir kirk siclike name sanct petir foundit kirk restynneth quhilk ane abbay channownis regular efter went throw syndry partis scotland quhare precheit euangellis ¶at last come ro quhare perseuerit end lyfe buryit rosmatkyn tyme haly man bischop sanct melok ane gret precheour buryit sanct boniface ¶and tyme gilliam columbane scottis dyscending nobyll blude thairof thair syngulare haly lyfe war haldyn gret reuerence amang frā chemen ¶this ylk tyme pape boniface dedicat temple goddis callit pantheon honoure blissit virgin mary ye moder god sanctis ☞¶of vicius tyrane kyng ferquhart hovv slevv hym self haly man fiacre▪ ca xix eugenius deceissit haue schawin thre sonnis ferquhart▪ fyacre doneuald▪ ye eldest ferquhart maid king thir thre sonnis eugenius geuyn yair ȝouth ye haly man sanct conane bischop ile man ferquhart doneuald proffitit na thynge ye said ile traisting letteris vnproffytabyll thair estait thrid bruthir fyacre geuyn contemplation tuk purpos eschew ye cumpany men warldly digniteis make hym vnknawyn pepyll tuke ane pure habit departit scotland france quhare leiffit ane solitar lyfe gat ane croft geuyn hym sanct pharo bischop melden ane chapell ereckit hym▪ quhare leiffit residew dayis said wemen gangis chapell wyl othir blind wod empire ferquhart throw lang peace rais gret deuision amang nobyllis gret dammage realme ¶this kyng sa neclygent sowpit maner vice yat gaif na labour mei seditioun amang nobyllis traisting sa lang trubyll slauchter endurit amāg nobyllis na rebellyon suld rise aganis hym throw quhilk realme put gret mischeif becaus yi trubyl come throw necligence yi vnhappy tyrane hatit reput maist abhominabyll pepyll throw quhilk come sic infelicite nothir reuerence god sicht cōmoun weil ¶and vse tyranni dred men man hym reuerence nobillis hauand gret displesour realme mysgouernit hym maner conuenit amang thaym self reparit iniuris aduyse beleuit nobillis becaus thay saw sa mony enormiteis ī hym yt suld fall pelagius herespis howbeit othir scottis kyngis afore hym war neuir attētit sic thingꝭ thair suspition ye mair vehement accumpani • wt britonis ye samyn errouris last aspyit makand derision ȝoung child war brocht ye font haue baptisme yat ye pepil maid thair confession preistis ye nobillis mouit detestabyll werkis send ane herald brīg hym thair counsal knaw gif sic thingis war deuulgat hym • aith becaus thay fand hym rebelland thair chargis thay tuke hym force ye castell quhare put hym pryson incontinent thay tuke consultatioun quhidder suld degradit haldyn perpetual pryson efter lang aduysement concludit continew hym styl prison send ambassatouris france bryng fyacre secound son eugeniꝰ scotland ressaue ye crown thairof gif thay micht persuaid hym na reason said effect desyre clotarius king france interpone auctorite caus fyacre send scotland ressaue ye gouernance thairof ambassatouris quhilkis war send effect come finaly quhare fyacre contemplatioun bot ȝit afore yair cumyng aduertist ane visioun thair desyris besoucht god suffer hym nocht frustrat heuynly plesour solitar contemplation god hard prayer quhen yi ambassatourꝭ brocht presēce apperit yair sycht sa ful lipper repute thaym maist horribyll creature erd ambassatourꝭ seing sic point demandit hym cauldly gif couate return ī scotland quhare mycht purgit malady natyue fude schew thaym send ye nobyllis scotland prouide hym necessaris samyn fyne fyacre quhilk na mair respect honouris maist abhominabyll pestilēce answerit beleue ȝe knaw haue tane fra cū pany warld ane solitar life howbeit sorrowful malady suffer erar emendatioun lyfe induceing humillyte ony vyce nature sufficience pure sell sobir herbis quhilkis prepare hā dis standis sa content thairwith desyre na warldly dignite thairfore returne hame bid brothir noblis haue sycht god religioun iustice arme yame virtew quhilk may vincust na irruption violence ennymes vnderstand brocht sic estate wyll god ane priuate life maist ganand ¶fyacre ane syster namyt syra quhilk heirand hir brutheris halynes come hym melden quhom • scho professit nun mony othir virginis samyn mynd perseuerit gud relygyoun deuotioun end thair lyfe ☞¶the nobyllis scotland knawyng thir ambassatouris estate fyacre chesit foure men gouernouris ye realme quhill thay war mair profundly resoluid concernyng gouernance yaitof samyn tyme ferquhart vexit malancoly seiknes prisonyn • suld nocht remane pyne slew hym self • xii ȝei • regne fra ye incarnation vicxxxii ȝeris ¶of kyng doneuald▪ deith edvvyne kyng northumberland hovv eufred osrik kyngis northumberland vvar punist thair ••• ā ny done cristin pepyl▪ hovv king osvvald conuertit saxonis faith crist ca xx ferquhart ye tyrane slane said ane counsall set argyle ye quhilk doneuald thrid sonne eugenius maid kīg doneuald following gouernance fader reparit placis quhilkis wer dekeyit afore neclygence ferquhart ¶at tyme cadwallo kyng brytonis penda kyng south saxonis war considerat togydder slew edwyne kyng northumberland come gret cruelte throw mers berwyk tuke syndry landis fra dominioun pychtis pychtis hauand na power resist thair c • uelteꝭ send king doneuald support becaus thay ga • na support thay war opprest importabyll iniuris▪ kyng doneuald •• ād deith edwyne send considerat brothir cadwallo kyng brytonis praying hym admyt eufred sonne kyng ethelfred crown northumberland quhen samyn grantit eufred left remanent brethir scotland admittit half crown northumberland othir half geuyn ane fals vnhappy man namyt osrik thir two kyngis northumberland war fynaly confyderat togidder affinite osrikis douchter geuyn • eufred mariage 〈◊〉 ye catholik faith become maist odious tyranni persewaris goddis seruantis fylland cuntre full fals errouris gentilis throw quhylk syndry pichtis fell said errouris quhill last correctioun bischoppis thay war recounsallit faith cadwallo kyng britonis rycht displesit eufred osrik quhylkis war promouit hym empyre northumberland war fallyn sic errouris thay desyrit erar heritikis cristin pepyll send preistis purge thaym thair errouris bot thir preistis returnit euyll doung na thyng sped yair purpos c • istin princis albioun heirand contemption send othir messingeris thir two kyngis scharp wrytyng afore bot thir preistis mair contemptioun war slane rage cruelte thir dispitfull tyranni grew sa gret cristin pepyll dwellyng besyde yame war martyrit except sa mony wer sauit flycht pryncis albioun mouyt thir cruelteis tuke purpos punys thaym maist rygoure bryng samyn gud fyne thay maid cadwallo penda generall capitanis thai • • gaderit ane gret multytude brytonis pychtis saxonis hauand na thyng mair hatrent errouris gentilis osrik eufred knawing • ū myng sa mony pryncis aganis yame rasit pepyll vnder thair dominion faucht aganis said princis britane nochtheles yair army discomfist thair self tane prisonerꝭ within dayis efter thay slew thaym self disperatioun battall nane found sa cruell aganis osrik eufred oswald thair bruthir cause maid kyng northumberland kyng oswald efter coronatioun send kyng dowald desyryng certane precheouris send scotland conuert pepyl faith kyng dowald send request ane mā na le grauite erudition namit cormane quhen cormane prechit lang tyme amang northumbrianis sa cu • ius theology sermon apperit mair vane ostentatioun pryde ony doctryne pepyll fynaly returnit scotland schew prelatis thairof yat northumbrianis war sa dull na doctryne mycht proffit thaym war nocht onely repugnant command bot contempnit ye samyn contrar yair lawis constitutionis prelatis heirand thir wordis tuke syndry consultationis quhat best bring thair pepyl thair arrouris sum men thocht expedient send cormane agane northumbirland mony otheris doctouris spare na lauboure weill crystyn fayth plesour thair freind kyng oswald traisting continewall labour yt ye northumbrianis micht bro ••• faith yocht sic thingis micht nocht haistely done otheris said gif northumbrianis mycht • ny way haue bene recoūseld ye faith thay wald haue dene brocht cormane erar ony othir becaus richt resolute deame letteris ane profound clerk sen doctrine na thing aualit necessar send ony othir doctouris ye samyn effect aidane haly bischop said maner bring men fra errouris reduce yame sicker faith thynk expedient wise faderis schaw sic thingis ye begynnyng may persuaid yame feruent luf god quhen precheour he maid ye pepyl desyrus heir sermon tane yair beniuolence preche first foundment ye cristin faith ony ostentation arrogance nocht inuoluyng pepyl sic difficil materi • may apprehendit yame ye ingyne men nocht drawin haistely fra euyl accustome siclik thay lerne science virtew proces tyme lernis maist facil materis first way traist thair science ye mair imprentit thair breist heirfore gif reuerend byschop cormane obseruit rite ye begynnyng obstenit fra curious questyonis faith dout nocht bot pepil suld haue bene obeydient commādemētis thairfore sen na thing sat • fyit desyre kyng oswald thynk samyn cumyn na le defalt doctoure pepyll thir causis best ȝit send ane new pr • cheoure northumberland sal first precheing geif thaym mylk efter geif yame mair ferme • ude othir wayis thay wyl neuir brocht ye faith bischoppꝭ apprisit coūsal wt ane mynd send hym self yi charge northumberland refusit ye charge bot come glaid king oswald quhais cumyng sic confluence pepil conuenit constranit preche outwith ye kirkis throw multitude pepyll come prechyng alwayis becaus aidane nocht ye langage saxonis gret impedimēt preching nochtheles kyng oswald langage baith scottis saxonis interprete prechyng ye pepyl throw quhilk thay war haldyn baith gret veneration cō uertit viim saxonis within dayis cristin faith saxonis thā wer callit inglismen northūbrianis chesit aydane yair bischop becaus thay saw ylk day thair deuotion incres gret mer preistis come support aidane thay biggit sindry kirkis northumbirland dedicat yame honoure god virgyne mary throw quhilk said regioun grew na le catholyk ony othir prouince ingland tyme penda king marchis tuke purpos inuade kyng oswald conques realme oswald withstande inuasioun assemblit ane large nowmer pepyll slane army discomfist oswald haly lyfe myrakillis eikit amāg ye nowmer sāctis slauchter xii ȝeir empire dowald quhilk leuit nocht lang efter deith xv ȝeir regne perist ī lochtay quhare hapnit ane fisching seruantis solace body found creparis buryit colmekyll fra ye incarnation vicxlv ȝeris ¶of vnhappy ꝓphete machomete fals lavvis sindry haly men kyng ferquhart extorsionis done aganis pepyll miserabyll end ca xxi tyme deceissit ye warijt creature machomete quhilk tyme kyng ferquhart got tyn ane ydolatour vncertane arraby persy moder ane catholyk woman hismaelitis ¶this machomete instytute ȝouth baith hethyn crystyn lawis ¶and becaus thocht nane thaym accordyng plesoure maid ane fals supersticius rite richt warijt mankynd quhen cumyn mā ni age conquest leuyng thift pikary mariit ane wedow namit cadigane quhome conquest gret rich landis possessionis come syndry chā ci sa gret estimatioun amang ye pepyll araby maid lawis gouern thaym iustice wes instruckit ane cursit monk namit sergius quhom colleckit lawis fra institutionis syndry pepyll ratifyis sacrament baptisme haldis crist borne ane clene virgyne commendis psalmis euangellis say thay war mendit alcorane alcorane maner ane bybyll gaderit hym mony fals institutis lawis ¶he ratifyis circumcision iowis doi denyis trinite sabellianis doi denyis ye fader coequale sonne ennomianis doi sayis haly spreit ane creature macedonis doi schortly lawis maid sensualite man throw quhilk drew syndry pepil opinion corruppit faith machomete spred asia affrik mekyll europe begā fra ye incarnation vicxxxv ȝeris tyme war france mony haly men fursius stoilanus uulcanus brethir gottin ye blude rial scotland ireland amang w war tyme connane columbane cromane domiane mony otherꝭ history tuiching sanct colme kyng aidane • nct aidane mony othir haly 〈◊〉 afore rehersit colleckit sāct 〈◊〉 bot wyl return history▪ efter deith kyng dowald 〈◊〉 brothir sonne ferquhard sonne kyng ferquhard afore rehersit maid king ane man hie ingyne bot efter coronation alterit fra ane liberall humane prince maist insaciabyl bludy tyrane quhē auctoure▪ liberal aboue power gaif guddis support madynnis yair mariage • c cōmiseration euery persone yt deieckit fra gud fortoun ī powerce conquest gret fauour pepyll iugit thairfore ane nobyll prince al sone clothit publik auctorite become ane oppressour pepyl full auarice like ane bludy fleschour ennyme religion comparit iustly ane insaciabyl pul • clamit agane guddis quhilkis gaif afore auctorite hꝭ nobillis said thay war bot lent fynaly slew thaym ye war repugnant wayis elli confiscat thair guddis held thaym prysone opprest riche men realme confiscat thair guddis vane causis time war two haly men namit finnane colmane haldin amang scottis gret veneration thir haly men herand cruelte done bludy tyrane come ȝele iustice persuading hym amend life last finding penitent na wayis thay denuncit hym cursit vnhappy man tuke litill indignatioun thairof assistance vicious lymmaris quhilkis war reddy intertene hym insolence tuke plesoure thris ylk day far wambe surfettis delycius cheir yt micht deuisit make hym inebriat drūkin othir vice worthy rehersit mouth sa insaciabill yt na foule ye ayre fische seyis rest schamefull glotony ȝit na thing maid hym sa odius ye pepill rebellioun aganis censuris haly kirke amāg mony othir enormiteis fukeit two douchteris slew wife becaus scho detestit vice pepill seing hym perseuere sic horribill tyranny gaderit deliuerit mynd put hym deith nochtheles thay war inhibit sanct colmane quhilk schew deuine prophecy gif amendit haistely life suld punist ye iustice god weill prouin within ane moneth efter king hū tand ane wolf fellis quhē scho sarit ye hoūndis scho ruschit king bait hym ye syde fynaly kyng fell ane maist vile schameful maledy vncertane quhidder come bit ye wolf ony othir occasioun ane vennomus humour eit consumyt ye inwart membris hꝭ body intollerabill pyne lymmis feit secreit membris vile • eroure wer dissoluit wambe throw immoderat voracite wes swolin bene edroppit quhen continewit two ȝeris infirmite abhominabill creaturis become penitent saying bene obedient counsall colmane nocht bene deuorit horrible malady etin vile wormes iust punition god vncouth importabill doloure schawis nowe mony gret offencis baith aganis god man destitute remeid without mercy ye thir wormes yt ar bred flesch schawis maist horrible vnhappy creature mene tyme ran hym seruandis inquirit gyf desyrit ane preist heir confessioun said bring bischop colmane al sone colmane wes brocht hym affoilȝeit first cursyn eftir hard confession ꝑsuadit gud curage haue hop god quhais mercy wes mair yan ony syn yt mycht god said turne ȝow ȝe salve saif kyng ferquhart rasit hope thir wourdis fell kneis askand mercy pictuus teris ressauit blissit body crist sone eftir wes brocht hous quhare lay vile claithꝭ nixt mote quhair gaif gaist xviii ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun viclxiiii ȝeris samyn ȝeir sanct aidane bischop northūberland deceissit quhais place succedit fynnane quhilk deceissit sone eftir ye samyn maner eftir deith succedit bischop colmane quhais haly precheing gret multitude saxonis wer brocht cristin faith colmane past throw al ye kirkis amang saxonis precheing wourd god wes translatit cathedrall kirk lyndefern ¶of kyng maldvvine hovv vvas slane vvife vvife brint gret mortalite rage pest syndry pa • ti vvarld▪ hovv ye scottis vvas preseruit fra ye samyn ca xxii ferquhard deceissit yi wyse maldwyne son dowald wes maid king wes ane deuote price tuk peace pichtis saxonis tuke sic deligence administratioun iustice pepil leuit iniuris thus succedit al thyng plesandlie begynnyng empire last rais ane seditioun betuix men leuenax argyle drew mony ye nobillis forttifying thair debait becaus ilis rais argyle galloway rais leuenax mony heirschippis followit sydis kyng maldwyne punis thir extorsionis come ane army aganis principall mouaris thairof ceissit nocht quhill thay extreme rigour iustice wer punyst deith thus trubill wes fulischelie begun wes dantit haistelie maid name maldwine sa feirful nobillis na seditioun followit thair eftir duryng empire nocht lang eftir kyng went colmekil vesy sepulturis eldaris reparit said abbay new biggynnis fra ground dedicat honour god sanct colme tyme rang ane terrible pest gret mortalite pepill sindry partis warld ceissit nocht quhill ye pepil continewall prayar fastyng gud werkis peacyfyit ye wraith god scottis thir dayis knew na maner hait feuer wer preseruit fra samyn tēperance thair mouth cruel pestilence rang neuir amang scottis quhill thay left hailsum temperance yair eldaris maid thaym self reddy • aue al infirmiteis colman bischop lyndeferne seand ane huge multitude saxonis peri pest returnit ilis quair biggit ane abbay dwelt brethir end lyfe eftir ye departyng colmane ye northumbrianis support pychtis maid • eitschippis scottis kyng maldwyne ceissit nocht quhill samyn wer recompensit siclike displesoure baith pychtis saxonis cause incurrit thair extreme hatrent followit perseuerand malyce gret heitschippis slauchter sydis quhil last kyng maldwyne wes slane within nycht wyfe suspitioun adultry xx ȝeir regne fra incarnation vicxxxiiii ȝeris yi cruelte wes lāg vnpunist ye nixt morow vnhappy womā wes tane wt hir cōplicis brynt cruelly deith eugeniꝰ ye fift ye message send edfred king northūberland peace takin thairefter hovv king edfred vvas slane eugenius vvith xxm saxonis haly man sanct cuthbert ca xx • ii maldwyn slane haue writtin nepote eugeniꝰ fift wes maid kyng send ambassatourꝭ edfreid kīg northūberland desirand peace edfreid heirād ye desiris eugeniꝰ fenȝeit ane luffar peace howbeit mynd wes geuin na thyng mair thā battal nochyeles gaue trewꝭ xii monethis ye fyne yt mycht duryng ye season mak ꝓuision al thingis necessar weris ye trewis wes geuin vnder thir cōditionis scottis sal repair al enormyteis done saxonis pichtꝭ redres maid al sydis gif scottis inuadit ye pichtis saxonis tymes cumyng ye peace dissoluit ye saxonis pychtis fre inuaid scottis notwithstāding ony cōtract peace maldwyne suspeckit dissait saxonis maid gret ꝓuisiō battal sine garnist al ye str • bordouris mē munition vittallis aganis al dāgeir yt mycht fall ische tent moneth edfreid send ane buschement saxonis ye scottis landis eftir yt thay slane ane gret nowmer scottis yai returnit gret pray mē guddis northūbirland sone eft ambassatouris wer send eugenius edfred desyring redres quhō answerit yt wald īuade ye scottis mair trubil thā afore oni redres eugeniꝰ seād ye peace violat wt ye trewis besocht god ye punisar wrāgꝭ turne ye dāmage following ye weris yame gaif ye first occasion battal finalie heirand yt ennymes wer cū galloway gaderit ane gret power preuene yair cūing ȝit afore cūing ye saxonis pichtis wer liand ye seige donskene ye strangest castel galloway ī yai dayis edfred haisty cūing scottꝭ wes cōstranit leif ye seige met yame ye riuer lewis ī galloway quhilk ye tyme inudation • n • wi boldin aboue ye brayis scottis seand yair ennimes sicht maid aithꝭ neuir pa ye feild quhil ane yam war lyue without thay victory 〈◊〉 battallis iunit haistely equale hatrēt edfred exhortit men remēbir yair anciant virtew vincus yair ennymes violent force siclik eugeniꝰ ceissit pa folkis exhorting yam schaw yair inuincibil curage y• yai micht reiose ye palme victory quhill ye saxonis scottꝭ war fechtād thꝰ maist fury ye pichtis fled ye nixt mote ye fleing pichtis deieckit gretūly ye curage saxonis yai dred ye yir pichtis suld cū yair backꝭ nochyeles kīg edfred exhortit folkis ꝑseueir ythand battal quhē spekand maist specialy rasit vp visour ye mair feruēt ī speche īcōtinēt doūg throw ye heid ane ganȝe quhare face bair fel ye groūd ye saxonis seand yair king slane gaif backis quhō followit ye scottꝭ wt lāg chace draue yam ye riuer lewis quhare mony yame perist yame tane battal wer slane xm saxonis edfred yair kīg scottis vim yt residew yair army euyll woūdit ye saxonis northūberland discōfist battal bot al mony al othir saxonis ingland quhilkꝭ come yair support brudeꝰ kīg pichtis knawing hym self odiꝰ baith scottꝭ saxonis seand ilkane yame brokin wt otheris weris come wt ane new army ye northūbrianꝭ subdewit yam ony recouir war sāct cuthbert durhame supportit yame mirakil yi haly mā schew edfred afore yi battal yt suld fail euersion realm subdittꝭ gif inuadit īnocēt pepil wrangꝰ weris ye pichtis ceissit fra īuasion northūbrianis quhil last yai fell cōtention amāg yame self ye spulȝe fallin yame frequent heirschippis ye said pepil throw quhilk yai war brokin finaly cōtent haue ye lādis berwik peceably tymes cumyng inuasion northūbrianis king eugenius efter yi victory returnit hame fra then ye saxonis began ilk day decline northūberlād mycht recouer yair honouris mony ȝerꝭ eft eugeniꝰ leiffit lang eft yi victory deceissit ye ferd ȝeir regne fra incarnation viclxxxviii ȝeris ¶of gret trubyll done sarazenis cristin pepyl king eugeniꝰ ye vi actis vncouth meruellis sene albion ca xxiiii yi tyme arriuit ane huge nowmer sarazenis egipt sicil affrik ye gret dāmage cristin pepil eft deith eugeniꝰ ye v eugeniꝰ ye vi son ferquhart maid king sa weill institute ȝouth reuerend bischop namit adānane yt held religion ī gret reuerēce held peace wt ye northūbrianis▪ bot ȝit nathing micht ꝑsuade hym cōfiderat pichtꝭ bure yame ī extreme hatrēt becaus yai faucht treasonably aganis ye scottis afore ī support saxonꝭ kepit yair faith ye northūbrianis nochyeles tuk trewis wt yame ane ȝeir al sone ye trewis war rūning send ane herald denūcit weir yame ye haly bischoppis sāct cuthbert sanct adānane went ambassatouris draw yir two pepil cōcord becaus yair labourꝭ war frustrat ya • went yair prayeris beseking god sēd cōcord ye ii pepil said yir haly mē gat grāt god quhō al empire thocht mā ar subieckit baith ī peace weir ye scottis pichtis sal meit aganis othir wt hail power yair realmes sa lāg eugeniꝰ leiffit yus continewit ye witis betuix scottis pichtis ony gret dāmage baith thair realmes ye end eugeniꝰ life quhilk wes ye x ȝeir regne fra ye incarnatiō viclxxxxviii ȝeris body wes buryit colmekil mony vncouth meruellis wer sene tyme albion ane flote schippis wes sene maner ordinance riuer hūbir suddanlie euanist sicht gret noyis armor wappynnis wes herd ye kirk camelon last boundis scotland wes ane schoure blude sindry landis pychtis ye mylk turnyt blude cheis siclik ī lū pi blud corne wes bludy • eruest yir meruellis quhē yai war diuulgat maid pepyl affrayit ☞of ye vicius tyrane amberkeleth deith kyng eugenius vii hovv scottis pichtis vvar recounsalit togidder affinite▪ slauchter eugeniꝰ vvyfe vii haly virginis dotat ye kyng pichtis ab • rnethy ca xxv efter ye deith eugeniꝰ ye vi amberkeleth son elli nepote eugeniꝰ ye first maid king king alterit manerꝭ fra gat auctorite afore electioun semit defēdour ye pure pepyl kirkmen nochtheles fra clothit auctorite apperit ane vicius monstour drownit ī lust auarice effeminat lyfe garnardꝰ kīg pichtis seand schameful monstoure vse na thyng semand ane prince tuke occasioun inuade scottis traisting fynd sufficient tyme reuenge iniuris done pichtis maid gret heirschippis slauchter ye scottis landis amberkeleth febyll curage sall nocht moue ennymes hye attemptatis assemblit army resist pichti • 〈◊〉 •• cht durst skarsly confide noblis vse tyranny quhilkis leuis ay vnder feir dreid ȝit went forth wart displayit baner come first nycht watter tay efter supper past furth ye glomyng eis two seruandis mene tyme schot throw heid ane arrow quhom vncertane deceissit secound ȝeir regne burijt colmekyll nobillis lytyl cōmouit deith yt thair army suld nocht peri falt ane heid maid eugenius vii name kyng eugenius bruthir amberkeleth ane man gret body gud conditionis becaus vnderstude hꝭ army brokin lang weris tuk peace nichtbouris pichtis causit redres maid aithir syde mene tyme ye two kyngis war confiderat affinite spontana douchter garnard kyng pichtis geuin mariage king eugenius ye ȝeir following two brethir athole quhilkis wer conspirit ye kyngis deith slauchter thair fader slew lady gret wt child ī sted eugeniꝰ scho lyand bed quhen happenit away eugeniꝰ murmour pepyll lang tyme suspeckit hir deith constranit thairfore schaw ye pietuis maner hir slaucht murdresarꝭ last war takin put cruelli deith eugeniꝰ gaif hym religius ciuyl materꝭ causit al ye mercial dedis ācecessouris put cronykillis rais knichtly curage posterite ī desire honouris laude causit thir cronikillis keipit ꝑpetually abbay colmekyll expert hystoricianis sustenit thair cōmon purs writ dedis scottis bot othir pepill ye chance tyme occurrit eugenius reparit syndry kirkis realme gret reuerence byschoppis prelatis thairof e • kit yair patrimony syndry possessionis landis rentis perseuerit gud peace pichtis saxonis deceissit xviii ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun viicxvi ȝeris tyme doneuald haly man quhilk leuit ane sobir lyfe ogylny sex mylis fra dunde haldyn amang pichtis gret veneratioun said yt vii douchteris quhilk leuit wt hym gret pēnance beir breid wattir thay eit neuir bot ani ye day residew thairof occup • ī continewal labour orison eldest douchter maȝot maid inhibitation wyld geis eit hir faderis corne thay obeyit hir haly monitionis yairfore wyld geis neuir sene eft ye groūd thir haly virginis efter deceis thair fader knawyng na securite leif desertis sum defendouris thair chastite come garnard kyng pichtis desyring sum place quhare thay mycht leif ane solitar lyfe honour god garnard cōdiscendit yair desyrꝭ gaif yam ane hous abernethy certane rentis takin vp ye nixt lādis thair sustentation quhare yai leif fit ane deuote lyfe war burijt ye rute ane ayk quhilk haldin ȝit gret veneration amang pepil abernethy ī ye tyme ane ciete pichtis decorit ye first seit bischoppis thair realme bot efter sa distroyit brint weris scottis yt come neuir agane first stait thir virginis war tyme conrānꝰ wt sanct brigitta ye cōmonis haldis bot ye tyme eugenius ye vii perseuerit gud peace garnard visyit oftymes yir vginis wt liberalite guddis resignit ye crown mordak quhō salbe nyxt history ¶of king mordak vverki • deith iiii sindry pepil albion gret mirakill • sanct niniane sanct bede ca xxvi noblis efter ye deith eugeniꝰ chesit mordak son amberkeleth kīg ane humyll liberal prince tuk gret labouris caus al pepyl yt albion leif togidder amite concord maid peace betuix ye pichtis britonis remanent kyngis ingland tyme sanct bede remembris foure syndry pepil war albion cōfiderat togidder peace richt different thair manerris langage institutionis▪ say ye britonis scottis pichtis saxonis quhilkis war callit inglismen becaus ye wordis bede ar corespōdent history haue inserit yame heir followis ye nation pichtis confiderat saxonis tyme reiosyng ꝑticipāt ye vniuersal kirk peace catholik verite scottis quhilkꝭ īhabit britane wer sa cōtēt wt yair awin boūdꝭ yt yai wrocht na iniuris slichtis cōtrar saxonis suppos ye maist part britonis ane natural hatrēt aganꝭ inglismē sindry suꝑstitionis ȝit repugnance ye law god mā yai mycht optene yair purpos desyrꝭ yocht ye britonis sūꝑt fre ȝit yai ar thirllit sū part inglismen thairfore mony yame baith noblis commonis insolence felicite lang peace ar mair geuyn contemplation bukis religion ony cheualry dedis armis quhat end sall cū thairof sall appere sone oure posterite yir ar ye last wordis ye history writtin sanct bede fra ye incarnation viicxxxi ȝeris bot wil return history kīg mordak reparit mony abbayis kirkis ī realm quhilkis war distroyit afore ye weris eldaris foundit ye abbay quhittern quhare blissit byschop sāct ninian kithꝭ daily miraklis thā euir sene ony othir sāct ī albion king mordak deceissit ye xvi ȝeir regne▪ fra incarnation viicxxxi ȝerꝭ sāct bede callis quhit • ern pythynnia callis ye bischop yt succedit īmediatly eft sanct nimane •• ta bot ȝit necessar say gyf ony bischop yair seit ī quhit • ern yai ȝeid sone ye vse yairof ye ilis obeyit bischop galloway sodoren quhilk principale seit ye ile man vnto ye tyme king malcolme ye iii ī tyme ye abbay quhittern first institute bot restorit ye bischoppis galloway sāct bede deceissit sone eft ye cōpleting ye history britonis buriit durhame▪ fra ou • redēption viicxxxiiii ȝeris ane cōtenion ȝit betuix italianis albianis cōcerning place quhare sanct bede borne ye italianis sayis borne ianis buriit samyn sepulture yair ȝit ī gret veneration quhat sumeuir place deceissit gottin treuth maid lang residence quhē grew age northumberland vsit oftymes melros quhilk ane abbay gud religious men scotland deceissit ye tyme king ethfyne quhom sall nixt hystory ¶of king ethfyne hovv maid foure regentis gouern realme gret cruelteis done donald ilis▪ deith kyng ethfyne ca xxvii mordak buriit colmekyll ane conuention maid noblis ethfyne son eugeniꝰ vii maid king ethfyne ane man geuyn iustice peace kepit band maid afore britonis inglismen pichtis mordak eugeniꝰ▪ purgit realm al misdoarꝭ set labour baith ye defence liegis honoure religion thus grew ye scottis rich honest maneris theuis reiffaris sawaris displesour amāg ye noblis cōmonis put punist iustice fynaly ha • din ī sic reuerence dredour virtew yt na mā durst mycht say reason ony displesand wordis hym quhil last fel ī age ye gaif ye administratioun realm iiii regentis decret coū sal quhais name war donald thesaurer argyle collane thane athole mordak thane galloway conraith thane murray yir regentꝭ gidit ye realm wt sic iustice gidit afor ye kīg ilkane yam labourit sa besal • yair freindis yt yai na respect iustice throw quhilk ye noblis othir ȝoung men returnit thair ald insolence gret dāmage polecy cōmon weill thair realme donald ye ilis ane man strang body ingyne na thyng set virtew held ane cūpany vagabūd lymmaris hym maid ythād reiffis heirschippis ye cuntre ony punition yocht mordak ane foure regentis chosyn gouern realme ȝit wald punis yir cruelteis done donald vncertan quhidd iunit hym blude participant hym proffet reiffis cōmonis brocht uter heirschippis powerte complenit mordak maist lamētable wise desyrit restitution thair guddis becaus kyng tyme extreme malady nane put remeid thair displesouris commonis opprest thir sorowis seand na remeid rasit thair handis heuyn complenit thair miserijs amang yame self bot ay mair thay complenit mair cruelte followit donald apperit thus na esperance tranquillite quhill last kyng ethfyne deceissit xxx ȝeir regne burijt colmekyll ȝeir god viiclxii ȝeris ¶of kyng eugenius ·viii hovv vvas slane tyranny euyll counsalouris hyngit iebatis ca xxviii efter ye deith ethfyne eugenius ye viii son mordak maid kīg ye beginnyng semit ye mair plesand yt ceissit quhill thꝭ donald complicis war punist deith presence pepyll thair demeritis ȝit kyng nocht full sithit iustice bot mair rigoure punist mordak deith becaus alliat ye sayd donald participant hym treason sic thingis done kyng eugeniꝰ accusit ye remanēt regētis dowald collan cōraith becaus thay mycht haue sauit ye pepil fra trubil done yame found necligent thairintyl ye kingis infirmite thay payit gret sowmis ye kingis proffet ī redemption thair lyuis throw yir punitionis ye realme pecifiit al ꝑtis king sic dredour pepyll yt na rebellion apperit rise amang ye cōmonis tyme pepil beleuit haue got tyn ane gud prince quhen eugenius began regne aboue yame bot oft occurris ye ingyne mā mair procliue reddy euyl werkis thā gud thꝭ eugeniꝰ hauād empire vnder lāg peace sleuth fel maist schamful vice rageād ī mair lust semit ony man ane fulȝear virginis nobill matronis deliting na thing mair thā bordellis tauernis▪ luffit nane bot yame ye couth bring hī moniest cōcubinis nurꝭ ī new lu • plesour throw quhilk īcressit ylk day mair vice become sa auariciꝰ yt regardit nothir ye law god mā slew sindry trew mē hꝭ realm baith spiritual tēporal vane causis cōques yair lādis rich sustene ane cūpany vicius līmaris hym bot cruelte viciꝰ dedis war lāg vnpunist ye noblis seād yt micht refrenit fra sic enormiteis schā full werkis seand yt nothir ye censouris haly kirk god reuerēce cōspirit haistely aganis hī slew hym ye tolbuth quhare ꝑsewād ane trew mā ye deith awin geir sine tuk familiaris quhilk assistit vnhappy dedis hingit yam iebatis ye gret plesour ye pepill end maid eugeniꝰ ye viii ye thrid ȝeir regne body ordanit cassin ī ane closet elli deuorit hundis rauēnous beistis nochtheles ye sic thingis suld succeid na le scham ātecessorꝭ thā posterite bodi licēce noblis wes brocht colmekil buriit amang ye sepulturꝭ othir kīgꝭ ¶of vicius kyng fergus thrid hovv vvas slane vvife hir orison maid counsal hovv scho slevv hir self ca xxix fergus thrid yat name son kyng ethfyne maid king efter deith eugenius viii nocht far discrepant fra maneris eugenius ye viii become ane drunkin glotoun sic effeminar lustꝭ necleckit administration realme tuke plesoure nane bot • udlaris insaciabyl drū kettis sic vicius detestabyl personis hatit virtius pepyll ane grete nowmer huris followyng hym held thaym sic familiarite hym lichtlijt contempnit awin wyfe brocht hir sic penurite scho constranit serue othir nobyl wemē hir sustē tation woman impacient suff • r sic iniuris come syndry tymes kyng prayit hym amend life gif desyrit haue lang empire schew gif continewit adultre sall nocht eschew deuyne punitioun quhen leist wenit kyng na thyng regardyng hir wordis ceissit nocht ylk day rage mair insolence last quene • hir self defraudit det matrimony thocht bettir hir wedow leif dayly cō temptioun amang thir concubinis fynaly scho slew kyng sleipand bed thrid ȝeir regne body brocht morrow counsall hous serche diligent inquisitioun quha durst attempt sa gret cruelte mony kyngis freindis seruy • ouris comperit iug • ment sorowful chere desyring werkaris thꝭ cruelte serchit maist diligence becaus na man suspition quene persew hir husband ony displesoure mony ye kyngis familiaris wer tane scharp questionis demandit syndry punist importabyll tormentis quene heirand thir innocent men punist crime yt scho committit come haistely counsall said wyse ¶i knaw nocht tender pepyl quhat conscience accusis quhat deuyne vengeance esfrayis syndry thochtis al day nicht bygane mynd body aflocht specially sen hard thir innocent men sa cruelly tormentit gif ira nocht bene mesit sum temperance wrocht self maist schameful displesoure kyngis slauchter deid conscience ꝑsuadis heil saule schaw verite thir innocēt men nocht punist cryme yt cōmittit understand thairfore yt thir men ȝe accuse ar innocent deith scho slew kyng fergus cursit handꝭ la • nycht impacience ire lust quhilkis ar two maist sorrowful broddis amang wemē defraudit lawfull bed vsyng īmoderat lust othir wemē thus quhen na esperance ȝit persuasionis apperit recounsall hym desyris sic huge bryme fury rais quhil tyistit cruelte thynkād mair plesand remoue occasion adultry destitute husband leif perpetually defraudit bed iniurit thir spous brekaris assoilȝe heirfore thir men ȝe accuse deith punys quhilk ye onlie werker yi murdir salbe na gret laubour yat fellony sal tak punition self skarslie wer thir wourdis said quhen scho presence pepill thay mycht aduert dang hir self ane dager hert fell doun deid afore pepill mony peppil gret wonder hir cō stance louit hir conscience becaus scho reuelit ye hyd treason delyuer ye innocent men fra yair deith slew hir self preuene ye schame displesoure yt wes apperand hir otheris thocht nane hir doingis apprisable bot repugnāt ye law god nature saying wes nocht leifful ony ꝑsō reueil yair awin ȝit othir mennis treasoun maist detestable innaturally sla thaym self quhill pepill wes disputatioun body fergus wes cōmandit nobillis brocht colmkill quhair wes buryit fra incarnatioun viiclxvii ȝeris body quene becaus scho slew hir self wes inhibit lye cristin beriis ¶of kyng soluathius hovv dan •• svndry gret lymmaris realme deith mony haly men ca xxx fergus buriit yi wyse soluathius sonne eugenius ye viii wes maid kīg ane noble prince abill tyll haue done mony nobill actis realme gyf weirdis bene propiciant thrid ȝeir regne tuk ye gout throw vehement cald consauit afore hunting infirmyte fel sare iuncturis lethis body yat mycht nocht chargis pertenand ane gud king cōtine wit hym end lyfe becaus kyng wes vexit sic infirmite mony gret trubillis followit realme first trubill rais banꝰ capitane ye ile tyre gaderit ane cumpany lymmaris tuke strenthis ilis callit hym self kyng nocht lang efter come mony lang faddis kyntyre lorne maid heirschippis slauchter al partis quhare come king commouit thir attemptatis send douchquhall capitane athole culane capitane argile certane chosin men ilis yat small impediment put banus cumpany flicht draue thaym lang chace ane strait coif lorne within ane crag aboue ane riuer deip ony furdꝭ coif na passage thꝰ behunit thir men yt fled coif returne samyn gait thay come banus cumpany dreuin coue aduenture maid hym returne come bot fand gait closit ennymes nocht yeles socht mony way eschew quhen passit day sindry opinionis finding na thing proffitable arrayit ane wache within nycht defence cumpany finalie wes dreuin sic penurite becaus na vittallis sustene hym yt send messengeris desyring licence depart ilis lyfe saif last seand nocht elli bot repuls desyris arrayit folkis come aganis douchquhall culane ye brekyng day wes slane cumpany ane notable exempill tymes cumyng quhat frute followis rebellioun aganis yair prince eft yi victorie douchquhall culane went ye ilis pecifyit cuntre tru • yll thay plesit nocht lang efter rais ane newe trubyll galloway gyllequham son donald quhilk iustifyit schew eugenius viii nochtheles trubyll pecifyit smal labour fra heiddismen quhom ye first occasioun rais war punist tyme rais gret seditioun betuix saxonis ingland bry • oni walis multitude kyngis syndry lawis lang peace rich generit discord pich • war cyuyl debait amang thaym self thus sa gret sedition amang albianis thay micht inuade thair nichtbouris kyng soluathiꝰ duryng tyme realme gud tranquillite prudent industry nobyllis boundis thairof weill obeysant empyre wt na le iustice passit proper persoun throw realme deceissit xx ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun viiiclxxxvii ȝeris thir day war mony clerkis singulare eruditioun lyfe macharius bischop abirdene quhom • cathedrall kirk dedicat diuinicꝰ archedene congane dunstane abbotis thir mony othir thair disciplis war precheouris lanternis haly kirk sum authouris writis thir haly men war othir kyngis day bot vary na thing fra first purpos following ueremond campbell baith history dai • promittit sa endis heir ix buke thir croniklis heir begynnis tent buke croniklis scotland ¶of kyng achaiꝰ hovv agreit nobillis contentionis message send princis ireland thair ansvver hovv mony ireland men perist seyis hovv scottis ireland men vvar aggreit ca soluathiꝰ beand deceissit wyse▪ achaius son ethfyne maid kīg prince ye begynnyng empyre set hym mei discord seditionis amang nobillis traistit na thyng sa plesand felicite realm bryng nobyllis commonis concord trubyll beyng mesit apperit ane othir greter motioun betuix ireland ilis ane cumpany ireland mē maid certane heirschippis kyntyre incontinēt ye pepyll ilis ruschit haistely harnes slew ane gret nowmer thir ireland men ¶than achaius preuene trubyl mycht follow last bergane send ambassatouris ye princis ireland schewyng hym aduertist ireland men fra quhome scottis tuke thair beginnyng purposit cum haistely inuade realme gret dāmage two pepill quhilk he bene sa lang togiddir confiderat vnder ane blud amyte schew wes na sufficient cause battall nychtbouris freindis inuaid othir battall howbeit ilk theif reif othir thairfore gyf ireland men wer mair desirus peace weir glaid keip ye auld band hail scottis wald perseuere kyndnes thaym contrar gif yai desyrit battall erar peace nocht resolute quhat wes best done desyrit thaym degest counsall auise quhat trubill sorow mycht follow thair weris sen peace wes finalie necessar auyse quhiddir wer mair plesād afore weris eftir mair profitable haue peace quhen n • displesoure wer precedent quhen baith yair realmes wer brokin athiris iniuris princis ireland nochtwithstandyng yir humyl wourdis answerit thai suld sustene chargis sa vailȝeantlie yat na aduersite sall follow thairfore yai wald haue na peace scottis quhill iniuris done thaym kyntyre wer redressit reuengit wt mair skaith thay wer al profundlie auisit quhat proffit dammage mycht follow yair weris prouisioun thyngis necessar aganis quhat sumeuir chance fortoun yat mycht follow youcht yir weris wer litil proffet ȝit yai war sa accustomit thairwith yt thay wald vse ye samyn thair elderis afore quhen yir ambassatouris wer returnand ye ireland seis scotland ye scottis traisting na thing le yan battall irelād ane flote irelād men arriuit ye ilis ceissit fra na maner cruelteis inhabitantis thairof last quhen thay heryit ye cuntre makand thaym returne hame ladyn infinite guddis sic ane storme rais violence ye heuin yat thaym eschapit vnperist ye seis kyng achaiꝰ heirand yi calamyte fallyng ireland men iust punitioun god thay inuadit realme within trety peace concludit assailȝe yam na forthir sic desyris beleuit thaym sa brokin yi forsaid trubil yt thay suld seik peace hym ye kyng cō iecturit sa followit ambassatouris ireland come hym inuerlochte cōfessand manifest punition fallyng yame iustice god ye wrangis yame done scottis prayit achaius gif peace yame quhilk thay refusit fore gyf thair insolence thir ambassatouris answerit achaius youcht irelād men wer obstinat mycht vnderstand yair proffet quhill thay sufferit affliction refusit oftymes sic thīgꝭ bene maist proffitable yam ȝit wald repugnant reason sen sawe thaym yat wer ennymes yat tyme iustice god punyst yair offence exempil al pepil quhat vengeance fallꝭ yame yat inuadis yair nychtbouris iust tityll battal heirfore schaw hym seruād crist quhilk cōmēdit peace sa gretumlie ye weil mortal pepill wald set asyde baith recent ald iniuris haue peace yame youcht yai deseruit ye ambassatouris depeschit yi maner returnit hame reiosing ye peace grantit yame ye scottis wer vnglaid yairof hauād experience lāg vse quhat dammage pleseir may follow weris vncouth realmes ¶hovv kyng charlis send ambassatouris confiderat vvith scottis pichtis thair orison maid k • ng achaius orisoun maid aganis thaym culmane ca ii ye mene tyme charlis mayne kīg frāce romane empriour set mynd wt vter power distroy ennymes cristin faith eft yt vndstude inglismē victorie britonis brocht sic insolence yt thay trubillit baith ye almane franche seis sūtyme exercyng sic cruelteis heirschippis france ye marchandis mycht haue na passage see land dant insolence inglismen yat yai •• nocht haue power inuaid •• anche almane seis tymes cummyng kyng charlis decreit hꝭ nobillis tuke purpos cōfiderat scottis pichtis vnder yi • conditionis al oft inglismen • ūis 〈◊〉 • ne army france ye sco • ti pichtis sal inuaid ingland gif inglismen inuaidis scottis pichtis ye franche • n ye maner sall inuaid ingland dres mater wer • ēd ambassatourꝭ frāce kīg achaius quhen yai wer brocht presence ane thaym said yi maner rycht illuster prince wer nocht charlis mayne ye glore protectoure catholik religion aganis sarazenis knawis experience franchemen fauorit thy pepill nocht send w sic thingꝭ wil desire yi tyme fame thy gud name wart cristin faith eik thy beneuolence schawin marchandis cuntre quhen thay trauel yi • boū dis mouit w ambassatouris kyng charlis cum confidence beleif vnknawin thy hienes ī qhuat extreme dangeir catholik pepill he stand thir mony ȝeris italie france spanȝe cruelte sarazenis ennymes god quhat nowmer pepill bene slane thairwith quhat lādis townis brint brocht vter euersioun quhat nobill cietezanis bene brocht importable seruitude becaus sa gret trubill risis daylie aganis cristin pepill maist catholik prince charlis he votit hym deith defence thairof aganis ennymes god desyring na thing ardētlie yan bring mind • ic fyne cristin pepill may deliuerit fra truble sarazenis kirk men restorit thair first institutioun dredis na thing sa mekill empeschit fra hailsū purpos seditioun risyng amang cristin princis diuers pepepill saxonis frisonis normannis inglismen quhilkꝭ ar saxonis blude he manifest tyranny conquest realme britane inuadyng ye pepill baith see land vntellable cruelteis dant thair attemptatis abandoun thaym tymes cumyng thay sall nocht inuaid france thy realme sa bludy incursionis thay afore kyng charlis frāce deliuerit mynd nobillis desyris confiderat thy pepill vnder sic fallowschip franchemen sall support scottis scottis frā chemen gyf happynnis inglismē inuaid ony thaym thus may iniure inglismen maist auaricius pepill ī • rd best eschewit baith pepill thir reasonis beleue ȝe maist vailȝeant pepill quhom god he defendit sa lang vnbrokin fra ȝour riche strang ennymes fauorable thir honorable desyris kīg charlis support w al weil aganis inglismen aganis ye ennymes cristin faith cōmodite heirof sall finalie succeid na le ȝour weil thā ouris ambassatouris eftir orison wes ressauit ye kyngis palyce honour magnificence mycht deuisit mene tyme rais ane strang disputatioun amang nobillis quhiddir wes proffitable nocht cō moun weill scotland confiderat ambassatouris desyrit france mony noblis wer variant thair opinioun yair fore thir ambassatouris wer send pa thair tyme huntis othir nobillis quhill counsall wer resoluit difficill mater culmane capitane mar said ye coūsal yi maner haue na admiration maist nobil prīce howbeit thy pepill desirꝭ cōfiderat france beleuand na thyng sa gud sa honest sa plesand thair cō moun weill confiderat maist riche pepill yi day europe throw societe alliance ye scottis sall rise gret fame reuerence partis ye warld nochtheles cōmodite plesour yt cumis apperꝭ yi band salbe lityl estimatioun respect heuy irrecouerable dā mage ye sal follow thairthrow w eftir ye mischeuꝰ end opinioō sall schaw posterite far p̄sent dayis wer aberrand fra yair cōmon weil ī making yi bād wt frāce quhat othir frute may haue cōfiderat france aganis ingland daylie nychtbourꝭ quhais freindschip wes maist plesand w bot onlie mak nixt nychtbouris strāgest fayis freindis seuerit fra w ye braid seis quhais plesoure man moue battall contrar nixt nychtbouris ieoperd bodyis landis gudis extreme dangeir ye weil yame quhilkꝭ ar far seuerit fra support heirfor thīk sen ye mater sa hie apperād mair singular dāmage thā ony cō modite suld sa ꝓfoūdly resoluit yt seik na sic colourit honour improffitabil glore yt may ꝓuoik nixt nichbouris frequēt werꝭ caus w tyne schamefully landis liberteis quhilkis bene sauit sa mony ȝeris afore nobyl antecessouris quhat may deuisit mair skaithfull fre pepill ieoperd yair realm quhe yai haue peace apon ye chance battal thirle yame wylfully seruitude vncouth pepil gif frāchemē brek ye band cōfideration within ye fury battal mouit v yair cause sine ꝯfiderat wt nichtbouris dayly ennymes leuand ye hail preis batal w sal ye gret dāmage iniuris sustenit weris aganꝭ inglismē thā redressit▪ haue rich strenth recouer yir displesouris franchemē efter yt ar brokin yair werꝭ brocht neir vter exterminion attour gyf happin brocht sic calamite yt gudis ar waistit pissance brokin franchemen cō fiderat inglismen contrar sal resist inglismen quhome sall accuse violation band betuix w france siclik gif confiderat deuisit france salbe ī dayly bergan ennymes sendyll haue cōsolation freindis sall haue frequent weris ennymes 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 neuir fynd 〈…〉 bot throw lang passage dangerus seis▪ na marchādice salbe brocht w frāce spanȝe almany bot tollerance ingl • smen yus sal ou • marchandis destitut thay sall haue na res •• port quhen dangeir stormis inuadis yame yus sall thay othir peri fal • refuge ye stormy seis elli tyne thair schippis guddis rāderit yair ennymes handis thir reasonis apperis nobill prince quhat skaith dāmage sall follow cōfiderat france best yairfore ꝑseueir ye auld band pichtis britonis inglismen eldaris afore quhil • knew al ye frute y• mycht cum thaym ony bād france sen vailȝeant nobill eldaris mycht neuir fynd ye band france proffi • abill thair cōmon weill think • e suld leue ye samyn maner ya • na cōfideration maid wt new vncouth pepyll le thā wylfully list ieoperd realm lyuis gudis ony respect awī weil ye luf allanerly frāce ¶of ansvver maid last orison • biane hovv france scotland vvar perpetually cōfiderat hovv • ichtis refusit confiderat vvith france article contenand • band betuix scotland france ca • ii sindry noblis tuke gret indignatioun th •• wordis culmane thay thocht baith necessare honest thaym haue societe band france 〈◊〉 ane nobyll man namit aldiane cap • tane ye ilis said wyse gyf foure pepyl dwellis albion namit brytonis▪ scott • saxonis pychtis • icht leue togider vnder ane • nd peace 〈◊〉 miche fickeris leue ī peace wt inglismē tēnour yair 〈◊〉 faith think counsal geuyn culmane war vnproffitab • l ȝit suld refusit thā micht haue na occasion motiue seik cōfideration vncouth pepyl bot sen thair neuir found na pepyl mair falset treason thā scottis pichtis britonis he found saxonis think necessar othir haue cōtinewal weir aganis na le falset weir inglismen elli confiderat pepyll yt may support w aganis thair perpetuall inuasion quhidder ac thir doingis faith desait quhen ye britonis brocht saxonis thair realme defend yame fra yair ennymes eft yat thay tretit yame ye maist tender maner yai miche rewardit yame gret honour rich yir treasonabil saxonis turnit yair myndꝭ fra amite feid hatrēt • hew yam self maist ennymes brit •• quhare thay suld haue bene •• r protectouris bure armour wappinnis aganis ye said britonis nocht allanerly inuadit yam infinite slauchter bot spulȝeit yame thair realme honouris quhat band cōfideration he haldin thir saxonis peace pepyl ī tymes bygane thay ly ay wait tak yair nichtbouris auantage • ny respect faith band tyme accu • ri quhat misery trubyl fallyn britonis dissait saxonis oftymes he ye saxonis brokin quhen beleuit leist peace betui • w pichtis • thay ar contending amang yame self mair treason falset th • n honest weris thay haue slane sa mony kyngis 〈◊〉 northumberland yat skarsly may ane mā found y• da • ressaue 〈◊〉 yairof oswyn king northūberland within thir ȝeris slane oswane osw • ne o • ik mony othir kingis northūberland ye samyn maner war ay fynaly murdrist thair successouris attour inglismen he na • e contention al ꝑtis quhare ya • haf thair dominion thā ya • haue northūberland kirkmē p̄latis feir yir cruelteis done saxonis quhilkꝭ ar callit inglismen he left yair cathedral kirkis abbayis fled vncouth regionis ye caus yt thay inuadit w tyme cumis na reuerence yat thay haue god yair faith bot deuisiō amāg yame self dout bot al sone thay ar pecifyit ciuil debaitis yai sall inuade w nochtwithstandyng ony band maid yame heirfore dan • thir attemptatis inglismen find na thing sa expediēt ꝯfiderat wt ye pepil yt may chaistefie yame maist esaly he fortoun geuyn baith heft blaid mater w ar cumyn ye oratouris france offering wylfully yt maist proffitabil w lat w hei • fore cōfiderat yame yat he france spanȝe mekil almany vnder yair empire may sic cōmoditeis refusit wise men may ye band france offerit frely deny w ye last pepil ye warld sen thay thair faith god mā he sa brai • empire landis ye warld na thing may sa hailsū ꝓffitabil yairfore w ye bād frāce gif ressaue plesādly sal haue sa mony freindis yairthrow yt ye passage marchandis wt al kind marchādeis salbe sicker frequēt w ony dāgeir seis ennymes heirfore nane beleif y• wil cōsidder yi mater degestly bot sa •• think ye 〈…〉 quhilk ane faithful pepil riche potēt baith see land mair proffitabil w th • ̄ ony band inglismē nane sa mischane trow amāg ȝow bot knawis ye inglismē na le set vter ꝑditiō scottis thā britonꝭ equale desire cōques ou • realm heirfor gif intend eschew ye hatrent maist feirfull ennymes gif intēd honour ye faith crist quhais defence ye franche mē beris yair armour wappī ni gif haue mair respect verite thā falset gif labour ye fame honour nation▪ gif wyl defend realme bring tranquillite peace finaly gif wyl mak defence liberie liuis quhilkis ar maist dere mā lat w plesandly ꝯfiderat frāce ꝑseuere yairintyl hau cōfidēce yt ye said band sal defēce w tymes cūing defend realme bot al resist iniure inglismē richt cōmodius proffitabil albiane yi orisō drew mony ye pepil opinion achaiꝰ seand noblꝭ plesādly resoluit ꝯfiderat frāce cōmandit ye ambassatourꝭ ye morow heir hꝭ answer incōtinent thir ambassatourꝭ war brocht within ye kingꝭ palice feistit maist triumphāt cheir ye micht deuisit yā y• noblis cōuenit ane coūsal ye quhilk ꝯcludit send guilliā brothir kīg achaiꝰ mony othir noble prudent men mak said band th • ̄k ye kyng frāce yt desirit bād scottis aboue al othir pepil albion attour ꝯcludit sēd iiiim mē furnist al necessaris support king charlis aganis sarazenis incontinent achaiꝰ callit afore hym yir ambassatouris said maner si • thingis ȝe desyrit 〈◊〉 charlis ye 〈◊〉 catholik king ar ye ennymes 〈…〉 faith ambassatouris 〈◊〉 reiosit yi answer gaif ••• king • haius nobillis • yne went hungꝰ kyng pichtis▪ desyrit confiderat ye samyn maner hym pepyl 〈◊〉 desyrit afore achaius ye king pichtis thankit kyng charlis beniuolence said ye mater sa hie yt micht discussit • egeist aduisement presently sa far reasoun mouit intelligence thocht yair band proffitabil sen thay war sa far seueri • fra support yairfore yair band refusit aduenture pepyll cū sic dāmage throw ye said band y• ye samyn micht neuir recouerit • u returnit ye ambassatourꝭ bu • expedition yair erādis achaius within ane moneth efter guill • ā wt yir ambassatouris frāce togidder iiii clerkꝭ maist erudition prudence namit clement iohne 〈◊〉 rabane 〈◊〉 ī fran •• ye ordinance wei • men afore cohersit yai war al plesandly res • uit king charlis 〈◊〉 ordinance leif wagis amāg ye 〈◊〉 army frāce sone eft ye 〈◊〉 scotland war schewin achaiꝰ writingis desiring ye frāchemē scottis cōfiderat yame yair posterite articlis follow •• ¶the amite cōfideration franchemen scottis maid euir baith pepyl present cum ¶the iniure inglismen done ony thir pepill salbe haldin cō moun thaym baith ¶quhen franchemē ar inuadit inglismē ye scottis sal send yair army ī defēce frāce sa yat yai supportit money vittallꝭ frāce ¶quhen scottis ar inuadit inglismen franchemen sal cū apon thair awin expens thair support ¶gif ony priuate publik person yir confiderat pepil supportis inglismen aganis ony ane yame wt counsal money vittallis remane amāg yame ye tyme battal ye doar thairof salbe hal • tratour ennyme thaym baith nane yir ii pepil sal tak peace truis wt inglismē auice otherꝭ thir cōditionis peace roborat maner foresaid salbe writtin ꝑchemēt interchāgit selis king king remane ī scotlād frāce ꝑpetual memory yi lyig yame yair posterite yt ye noblis scotlād salbe mair mindful yi p̄sēt lyig ye kīg scotlādis armes quhilkꝭ ye tyme ane reid lyon rāpand ane feild gold eikit ane double tressour contrar lyllijs including ye lyon partis signify said lyon armyt ye lylly rich france confiderat samyn perpe • ually signify yt al ye kingꝭ scotland sall • echt vailȝeantly yair realme liberte yair religion innocence perpetually support frā chemen aganis ennymes ¶hovv pape leo ye thrid florē tinis vvas restorit thair honour liberte kīg charlis sindry abbayis foundit scottis guilliam hovv vniuersite paris began scottis louyng samyn ca iiii efter yt ye band roborat maner foresaid betuix scotland frāce scottis guilliā remanit mony othir scottis cōtinewal residēce wt king charlis ī al weris conquest māheid prowes sic fame yt callit ye knicht reproche al weris gat sic ryches lādis yt gretuly renownit amāg ye princis frāce ꝓsperit al weris dantit mony sindry pepil saxonis hungarianis normānis efter y• yai wer rebellād king charlis wald ressaue lawis yi guilliā wan excellēt honouris ye tyme ye king charlis restorit pape leo ye thrid seit eft yt doung rome iniure romani wan also gret fame quhen said charlis passand throw tuskany restorit ye town florāce yair anciāt honouris eft yat distroyit gothis brocht ye florētinis agane ye said toun reparit new wallis kirkis institutionis yat ye cietezanis yairof micht leif ī liberte yir mony othir honorable actis war done tyme italy othir partis warld scottꝭ guilliā howbeit yai war ay done vnder ye name kyng charlis king charlis remanit lang italy bot left ye charge guilliā al materis thocht expedient▪ sic ꝓuidence chargis cōmandit said king charlis yat eikit ye senȝory florence wt sindry townis yair dominion ye florentinis yir humaniteis done yame scottꝭ guilliam tuk ye reid lylle na thing different fra ye lylle france bot cullour yair armis ane memorial y• yair town sum tyme distroyit gothis restorit frēchemē yai ordanit eik publik playis maid yair town florēce quhilk ane lyon crownit mony solempne cerimonijs yai cōmandit al quik lyonis nurist ȝeirly yair said town ye cōmon purs becaus ye samyn ye armis scottis guilliā said ye florentinis he ane ꝓphecy sa lāg lyonis leuꝭ florence sa lang ye lyon florence beris yi crown yair ciete sall neuir subdewit vncouth empire yir mony othir cerimonijs war institute guilliā afore returning italy france▪ ȝit quhat sū euer way yir playis war institute ī florence yai ar ȝit ȝeirly vse efter samyn rite yai war first deuisit guilliā eft īfinite labour tane king charlis weil cristin faith grew ī age becaus na succession body geuin al day cheualry neuir frute mariage maid crist ayre foundit mony abbayis baith italy almany dotat thaym riche landis rentis hospitalis cristin pepill nuris thaym virtew letterature nane abbottꝭ ye said abbayis bot scottis mē allanerly witnes heirof ar ȝit mony abbayis almany na thyng changi • fra ye institutionis thay war first deuisit kyng charlis schort tyme afore ye guilliam cumyn ī age held hym ye two scottis clerkis iohne clement ī gret familiarite yai war send scottꝭ guilliā said mak ye band frāce yir clerkis wer sa syngular • rudition science yt yai gat ane place geuyn yame ye king ī paris wt certane lādis sustene yair estait instruct ye nobil childrin frāce sindry science thir mē come sa frequent cōflu • nce pepil al partis desyrus haue lette • yt • chort tyme yair exact diligēce erudition ȝoung childrin ciete paris maid ane solempnit • niuersite resolute mē al sciēce king charlis hauād gret de • ectatiō y• letteris began fluris realme industry thir two scottis • cōmandit ye clement suld remane principall regent paris iohne colleig pa pauy • e town lūberdy spreding letteris ye samyn throw yi smal begynning rais scule paris quhilk he tyme sic f • uth • rudition yt he na compai • ī erd▪ ar ꝓcedit sic nowmer doctouris ī theology canon law medicine sa gret nowmer philosoph •• rꝭ oratouris yt al pepyl quhare mē trauellis he experiēce yair yair cōtinual exercition cōtending quha salbe maist resolute • euery science yair ye sloure theology yair al maner philosophy eloquence fouth yair ar prouin oratouris ane multitude ȝoung childrin weill institute ī letteris diligence yair p̄ceptouris ye place sa cōmodius y• nocht • • yair quhilk nature he ꝓducit ye weil mā yi nobil vniuersit • yt sa worthy louit ī euery w •• ld suld honorit w youcht 〈◊〉 sū part ī aberden tuk 〈◊〉 first • rud • tion yi foresaid vniuersite paris yairfore wyl haif na le reuerēce l • f thā y• barn he natiue mod bot wyl return ye remanēt geistis achaiꝰ ¶hovv scottis pichtis vvar confiderat mariage▪ slevv athelstane king ingland put army flich • king hungꝰ lavvis liberte kirkmē deith kyng charlis king achaius sindry nobill clerkis ca v scottis irkit frequent iniuris pichtis ye fyne weris set ane conuention pichtis redres skaithis sa far micht euery side ye quhilk thay war fynaly agreit al debaitis samyn suld perpetually endure▪ hungus kyng pichtis gaif sister fergus • ane mariage king achaius quhilk ane sonne hym namit alpine athelstane kyng ingland rycht desyrus eik boundis realme come ane army landis mers berwik pertenād pichtis alliegit samyn ꝑtene empire reft afore fra northumbrianis iniure pichtis quhen ceissit fra na maner cruelte heirschyppis said landis returnit gret pray guddis northumberland▪ dant ye rebellion certane inglismen quhilkis war laitly conspirit aganis hym hungus king pichtis impacient suffer thir iniuris send ambassatouris achaiꝰ desyryng support resist ennymes achaiꝰ sone eft send xm chosin mē king hūgꝰ ye said effect hungus rasit army northumberland inuadit sindry cruelteis returnit gret pray guddis lowthyane king athelstane dant attemptatis come louthiane mair diligence thā beleuit followit hait fute pichtis ¶in mene tyme ye pichtis set thair tentis besyde ane burne nocht two mylis fra haddyngtoun war aduisand amang thaym self ye spulȝe laitly gottyn thaym northumbirland suld partit richt armes traistyng na thyng le cumyng inglismen ¶athelstane weill aduertist counsall pichtis come forthwart arrayit oistis cōmandit opin proclamation na pichtis saiffit pichtis astonist cry seand sic multitude pepil aganis yame began muse quhat chance fortoun suld thairefter follow nochtheles cōmand hungus ylk man ȝeid array traistyng curage pray quhylkis war laitly • eft last iornay suld occasioun breke array thair ennymes tuke aduysement al ye day thay micht best eschew dangeir appering yocht armyis euery syde stude maist awfully arrayit otheris sicht ȝit nane • yame durst inuade othir ye day nycht followyng pichtis concludit assailȝe chance battall othir haue victory elli ani de morow efter thair first sleip thay went yair confession prayaris askit help crist sanct • thair patron support yame speciall pepyll aganis yair ennymes kyng hū gꝰ beand sleip apperit ye appostil sanct andro bad hym gud cō fort hauand gud hope god suld haue ye morow ane glorius victory inglismen said yat ane schinand croce sene ye lift straucht aboue army pichtis onlik ye samyn croce yt appostil deit croce vanist neuir ye lift quhil ye victory succedit pichtis kyng hungꝰ awalkynnit sleip fand hꝭ army behalding croce gret adm • ration incōtinent callit yame standart schew visioun yame al circūstance afore rehersit incōtinent rais ane huge noyis clamour throw al ye army scottis pychtis inglismen war richt affrayit noyis mair affrayit seand ye croce schinand awfull bemis ye lift apperi • yame ane euyl signe ye brek ye day kyng hungus arrayit folkis sound trumpat gaif ye sygne iunyng criand schyll voce sanct andro patron help scottis pichtis rasit thir wordis come thair ennymes sic fury thay war finaly vincust gaif backis quhome followit scottis pichtis lang chace maid mair slaucht thā maid afore ye battal prysoneris quhilkis wer tane afore inglismen seand ye scottis pichtis victorius inuadit yair ennymes wt mair cruelteis thā yair maisterꝭ yt wan ye victory sa far enragit yi slauchter ye skarsly al yi army ingland war left vc men liue kīg athelstane ye first iunyng wes schot throw ye body ane spere slane sindry noblis inglād place quhare slane callit ȝit athelstane furd king hungus efter yi victory sound trū pat callit mē ye standar • stud al ye nicht arrayit quhill ye morow thā partit spulȝe ye feild rite armis kīg athelstane burii • funerall triūphe ye nixt kirk sic thyngis done kyng hungus al victoriꝰ army • bair fute ye kirk sanct andro thāk god appostyll glorious victory maid solempnit • ote yt posterite sall vse na ansenȝe tymes cumyng quhē tyme battal occurrit bot ye • ro • e sanct andro custome remanit ye pichtis bot al wt scottis efter ye exterminion pichtis yi victory ye scottis gat riche spulȝeis enymes bot al gret rewardis hungus returnit hame gret honouris hungus excellent victory b • ildit ye kirk sanct andro maist richely magnificence 〈◊〉 mair nowmer preistꝭ deuyne secuyce gaif mony 〈◊〉 io • • llis gold syluer • ye ymage crist xii app • st • llis fyne gold syluer • ane ye said kirk perp • tual memory victory gaif ye te • n • maner frutis growand within realm sustene kirkmē cōmandit nane yame sūmond iugement ony prophane temporall iuge ȝit b • pu • ist deith nochtwithstanding quhat sumeuir cryme yame cōm •• thir priuilegis war nocht •• ng obseruit amang ye pich • istpunc 〈◊〉 war abrogat kyng feredeth quhilk ye feird king pichtis immediatly succeding efter hungꝰ attour feredeth tuke rich iowellis geuyn afore kirk proper vse cōmandit ye kirkmen leif content sic • bir frutis thay afore ye empire hungus thus war ye kirkm • n •• fra thair liberteis possessionis geuyn yame afore hungus yair landis geuyn familiaris noblis cōdiscendit weil yairto traisting thing geuyn ye kirk na le tynt thay war fallyn pray yair ennymes thir excorsionis done aganis kirkmen succedit grete infelicite pichtis caus yat thay war brocht within ȝeris efter v • er exterminion sal sone heir ¶kyng achaius realme ī gud peace deceissit ye xxxii ȝeir regne fra redemption viiicxix ȝeris buryit colmekyll thir dayis ye nobil historitiane paulus diaconꝰ quhilk eikit viii bukꝭ romane empriouris ye history eutropiꝰ paulus maid ye hymne sāct iohne vt queāt laxis thꝭ tyme isward wrat ye buk callit martyrdome lege • sāctis amang w war thay day geruadius glaciane modane medane gret doctouris mē singulare erudition ye tyme king achaius ye romane empire wes deuidit ī two senȝorijs kyng charlis wes empriour west part warld constantine empriour eist quhais auctorite ane conuention nere iiic l bischoppis decerne gif ye ymagerꝭ sāctis suld honorit kirkis finaly generall ••• rit statute yt ye ymageris sāctis ye kirk rome vsis sall honorit reuerence al partis ony deuinite war hid yame bot represent figoure god sanctis tyme kyng charlis empriour na le preeminent glore mercial cyuyl dedis • c • issit aquisgr • ny xlvii ȝei • regne france xvii ȝeir empyre aboue romani fra incarnation viiicxv ȝeris kyng connal • u c deith ca vi eftir deith achaiꝰ succedit brothir sonne cōuallus alpyne sonne achaiꝰ wes tendir age yat micht su • ceid crown cō uallu • wes rycht tenderlie belouit hungus kyng pichtis •• set laubour hald scottis pychtis amyte concord eftir auld hand thairfore sa lang thir two kyngis leiffit na thyng wes done othir weir peace auise othir throw quhilk • aith thair realmes wes gret tranquillite rest duryng thair tyme last kyng hungus worn lang age deceissit eftir quhom succedit ye crown pichtis dorstor lorgus conuallus leiffit nocht lang eftir kyng hungus deceissit ye v ȝeir eftir wes buryit 〈◊〉 colmekill ☞ kyng dongallus hovv punist certane cōspiratouris hovv alpyne prince scotlād clamit croun pichtis nerest heritour thai • to▪ pichtis ansvver hovv ye scottis cō cludit moue vveir ye pichtis denying croun ca vii conuallꝰ decei • sit maner succedit cousing dongallus sonne soluathius afor reheirsit syndry scottis seand prince inclinyt iustice maid hortation alpyne sonne achaius tak ye crown traisting extorsionis • e thaym cōmonis suld vnpunist ye way becaus wes nocht sa deligē • thay desyrit thay come hym awful mannassyng swore gyf tuke nocht haistely ye crown thay suld slay hym alpyne astonist lyfe come ane gret nowmer pepill argyle take crown nochtheles dredand gret trubill appeir ye realme rebellioun fled two tendir seruitouris kyng dongallꝰ wes sa plesandlie ressauit dongallus promittit gyf pepill wer content exoner hym crown fauour said alpyne desyrit na thyng sa • ekill felicite achaius hous alpyne gaif hym thankis said wald ressaue crown sa lang cōuallus wes lyue schew gaderyng pepyll trubyll apperyng cuntre wes nocht mouit bot treason certane conspiratouris quhilk wald haue slane hym gif nocht assistit thaym tyme thrid day eftir come messengeris fra thir conspiratouris dongallus excusyng thaym putting al treason alpyne nochtheles ye king gaue litil faith thairto maid sic deligence come thir conspiratouris quhen thay beleuit na thyng le cuming punist thaym si • rigoure realme wes brocht mony ȝeris eftir gret tranquillite quhill sic thyngis wer done amang scottis eganus secound sonne hungus kyng pychtis slew bruthir dorstorlorgus mak hym self kyng eganus stable crown pichtis hym cōuenit nobillis gret liberalite de • faderis treasoure guddis amāg thaym haue thair fauoure veneuolence syne maryit brenna brotheris wife doucht ye king marchis ye fyne yat brenna suld degradit hir estait rial hir fader cōmonit slaucht gud sonne eganꝰ sic feir lyfe vse tyranni yat come neuir •• cht ane gard armyt men wald nothir suffir wyfe ten • freindis cum presence quhill gard ripit thaym se gyf thay ony wappīnis hid sū quie • place traislyng wes eftir prouin sum quiet personis • tand ay wait inuaid hym ye slauchter bruthir cōiecturit sa followit wes slane b • cuna wyfe slepand bed amang army • gard reuenge ye slauchter hir husband alpyne heirand slauchter two 〈◊〉 ony succession yair bodyis liue 〈◊〉 ambassatouris ye princis pychtis clamand ye crown pichtis iust nerest • 〈…〉 king hungus gottin inter fergusiane al othir childrin hungus beand deceissit ony succe •• ioun quhilk 〈◊〉 wes cum ••• deuyne puru • ance two pepil sa lang inuading othir continewall weris mycht finalie cū • e inseuerable cōmixtioun blude vndir empire ane kyng pichtis knawing • l desyris • ir ambassatouris ches •• ane man gret prudence auctor •• e amang thaym namit fer • deth kyng alpyne suld haue na place clame crown al sone yi • ambassatouris wer cumyn camelon quhai • feredech nobillis wer assemblit ye tyme began propone yair message desyring ye • rown pichtis deliuerit alpyne sic gild noyis rais counsall silence wes put thir ambassatouris answer geuin ya • feredech ye pichtis wald suffi • na prince vncou • h blude regne aboue thaym wer accustomat transfer ye crown yair realme fra ane hous ane othir thay thocht expediēt wes inhibit ye samyn lawis depriue thair kyng lyfe youcht alpyne wes nepot hungus gottin sistir fergusiane ȝit sen wes gottin vncouth blude mycht na wayis succeid ye crown lawis yair realme dongallus heirand answer send ye secound message pichtis certification gif tha • refusit wald inuaid thaym battal al sone ye pichtis wer aduertist ye cumyng yi secound message thay send certane armit men stop yair cūing inhibit yame pa ony forthir vnd pane deid ambassatouris affrayit thir wourdis denuncit battal ye pichtis name dongallꝰ alpyne incontinent thay returnyt ye samyn gait thay come eftir thair returnyng ye nobillis scotland cō uenit carrik kyng dongal auise • battal suld led aganis ye pichtis yi cōuention nobillis cōcludit ane mynd • eopard yair lādis liuis guddꝭ ꝑsu • e alpynis rycht othir haue hym kyng pichtis elli al attanis de incontinēt ilk ane yir two pepil maid yair ordinance inuaid othir diuers myndis intentionis pichtis desiring suffer na vncouth blude regne aboue yame ye scottis defraudit yair iust heritage dongallꝰ makīg gret deligence assembil pepil aganꝭ ye pichtꝭ c •• e ye watter spey gat ane cobill pa ouir ye famyn bot last force streme wes borne downe watt perist ye vi ȝ • ir regne fra ye incarnation viiicxxx ȝeris wes buryit colmekill ¶of kyng alpyne hovv slevv feredech kīg pich • hovv b • udꝰ kē neth kīgis pich • vvar baith slane brudus ye • e • r maid kīg hov kīg alpine vvas slane▪ ye scottis discōfist ca viii dongallus perist maner alpyne son achaiꝰ wes maid kīg al sone wes crownyt set deligence ꝓuide al thingis necessar army aganis pichtis feredech king pichtꝭ ceissi • ye samyn maner mak ꝓuision ordinance battal traistyng deith dongallꝰ sum bett chance follow weris tary tuke purpos ane cūpany chosin men pa angus quhare ye remanēt army pychtis wes cōmādit cōuene ȝi • afore cumyng scottis wer campit ye place quhare cōuētion wes set began sege castel forfair ye thrid day eftir kyng feredech come ane army weil arrayit restēnoth incontinent baith ye armyis iunit ye first iuning ye rych • wyng scottis wes neir vincust ye mene time fidenoth thane athol com iiiic fresche mē ī yair support yus wes ye battal renewit huge slaucht ony signe fleing howbeit ye chance wes rycht doutsū sū tyme ye ansenȝeis wer left yam suld haue past afore defence thairof sum tyme saiffit agane ye wageourꝭ last kīg feredech • ye myddil ward pichtis approcheand discōfitoure ruschit wt sic farde amang ennymes yat wes excludit fra awin folkꝭ quhen saw na way eschew faucht wt ꝑseuerand manheid deith wes slane mony othir nobill mē fechtand ye maner ye deith residew pychtis na thyng astonist slaucht perseuerit continewal battal quhil nycht bereft thaym ye sycht yus wer baith ye armyis brokin cōstranyt discōfist pepil return thair tentis ye pichtis knawing yair kīg nobils ye maist ꝑt thair army slane left ye woundit men behynd yame yair cariage fled hame ye nerest way thay mycht scottis wer sa brokin yt yai fled maner wer nocht wes schawin alpyne yt ye pichtis wer fled left yair cariage behynd yam▪ yir nouellis causit y• pichtꝭ abyde array quhil ye nycht wes gone▪ morowe certane spyis wer send furth serche ye wodis montanis fand yair ennymes fled ye scottis reiosyng victorie partit ye spulȝe fallin thaym ryte armes ye body feredech wes bur • solempne cerimonijs ī forfair scottis eft yi victorie fand thrid part yair army slane wes cōstranit yairfore inuaid ye pichtꝭ erar frequent skarmussyng ony plane battall nochtheles thay come sone eftir angꝰ brocht ye samin ane huge pray cornis guddis athole ye remanēt put fyre yir othir frequent heirschippis angus wes left waist ye pichtis resist yir iniurꝭ chesit brudus son feredech king quhilk febill soft administration wes haldin ī derision yan honour pepil wes slane ye first ȝeir regne ane fenȝei • sedition amang ye pichtis eftir slaucht brudus hꝭ brodir kēneth wes maid king lityll better chance yan brudus eft ya • wes cumyn angꝰ ane army pichtis tuk sic feir • eand hꝭ ennymes fornentis hym yt h • • aif cote armour fle • fra army ye nixt montanis quhare schamefully slane ane landwart mā knawing quhat ye remanent pichtis knawing g •• difficulte meit yair ennymes ane • chesit brudꝰ ane feirs vailȝeant prince yair king yi brudus eft coronation send ambassatouris kīg alpine desiring iniuris redressit athir side peace renewit efter ye auld bād 〈◊〉 ye two pepyl wes answerit • e alpine wald haue na peace quhil ye crown pichtis wer geuyn hym iust heritour yairof brudꝰ seing yt scottis war set ꝑseueir battall aganis hym send oratouris gret sowmes money confiderate edwi • e king ingland haue certane wage 〈◊〉 ingland resist ye scottis • ing edwine ressa • yi money promittit quhat day brudꝰ lyst assigne cū support sindry ye pichtis reiosit answere • raisting support inglismen v •• cu ye scottis otheris thocht lytyll confidence geuyn yame becaus ye said pichtis slew athelstane king ingland mony noblis afore lowthyane ye mene tyme ye scottꝭ heri • al angꝰ fra ye fute granȝebene ye watter tay brudꝰ reuenge 〈◊〉 cruelteis send ane herald kīg edwyne desiring army send haistely resist ye scottis answerit kyng edwyne yt sa impeschit ciuil weris amāg awin pepil yt micht mak na support hym ye tyme al • equestit lowis king frāce na iniure scottis support na pepyl yair cōtrar nochtheles wald ye said brudꝰ suꝑseid hꝭ battal quhil ye nixt ȝeir suld gladly cū support brudꝰ • okit wyse begā detest ye treason inglismē notwithstanding repuls cō mandit al fensabil mē realme meit hym ye viii day efter followyng vittallis necessar thair sustentation ye fute ye calidon wod ye pichtꝭ war enrag • sic hatrent yat yame wer absent ye day place assignit brudꝰ seing yame assēblit sic hatrent come ouir ye brig dūkeld angꝰ ye nicht afore ye battal wise coū sal agit knichtis causit al ye cariage men wemen yat come army stand arrayit battall lynnyn claithis aboue yair bodyis siclik wappinis armour yai micht get ye tyme▪ sic thī gi done put ane c horsmē gouerne yame ony noyis ye nixt wod cōmandit yat nane yame cū sicht quhyl ye battallis war iunit king alpine yi tyme ane castell quhilk stude ane mote far fra dunde besyde quhilk ane plane lyand ye north quhare ye army scottis lay ye tyme alpine beheld pichtis ye castell heid quhare cumand forthwart ī array incōtinent arrayit ye scottis exhortit yame lāg orison schew yame vailȝeand battall fei • schame bot luf yair cuntre sum notabyll vassalage rusche feirsly yair ennimes traist fermely ony dredour deith haue victory reward yar labouris • n thair quarell iust ye pichtis war sa desyrus battal yat afore ye soūd trūpat thay iunit faucht sic incredibil fury yt ye richt wing scottis vehemently trublit alpine seand yame abasit come ane cū pany chosin men yair support throw quhilk sindry scottis returnit fra yair fleing set yair ennymes mair cruelte thā afore mene tyme ye cariage mē wemē quhilkis war hid afore ī ye wod began schaw yame yai war mouand forthwart cū yair backis quhais sicht ye scottis war sa affrayit yat ony forthir debait yai gai • backis quhom followit ye pichtis lang chace slew al scottis quhare yai micht apprehendit ony mercy ransoun yi policy slicht cariage mē wemē hyd vnder couert haue schawin mair discomfitour ye scottis feirsnes
