strenth pichtis ye horsmen pichtis followit sa fast yat yai saiffi • na scottis ye micht ouirtakin yi battall tame king alpine brocht handis bound ye nixt village quhare heidit ane hewing • iiij ȝeir regne fra ye incarnation viiicxxxiiii ȝerꝭ ye place quhare king alpine heidit callit ȝit pasalpine yt say heid alpine efter yi huge victory scottis king brudꝰ returnit camelon king alpinis heid put ane staik hyeast part thair wallis ane signe victory ¶hovv kenneth ye secoūd vvas maid king scottis ye deith brudꝰ kīg pichtis hovv donskene vvas maid king hovv ye heid king alpine vvas brocht scotland▪ hovv pichtis vva • discomfist ca ix scottis efter yi vnhappy battall fled angus argyle maid kenneth sonne alpine king ye pichtis richt insolent proud efter yi huge victory scottis cōuenit camelō gaif louing god mony solempne cerimoniis prayer al sone ye suffrage done yai maid yair aithis ye haly euangellis neuir ceis fra battal quhil ye scottis wer alluterly distroyit maid ane statute quhat euir war yat labourit haue peace trewis ye wickit scottis sall heidit sindry ye pichtis thocht yir votis vnplesand said best vse victory mesoure nochtheles sa mony war yi opinioun war chasit gret displesour ye tempil quhare thay cōuenit ye scottis manassing pichtis war deiecait bot erar inflāmit hie curage traisting na lytyl felicite follow yam ī plane euersion pichtꝭ weil apperit yair proud insultatiō eft yi ꝓsperite ye nixt symer ye pichtꝭ cūand ane army aganis ye scottis fel debait amāg yame self ane thīg nocht yus yair army deuidit ī sindri factionis fel iniuriꝰ wordis ī sic slaucht yat ye samyn micht stāchit quhil ye nicht seuerit yame yan brudꝰ tuk lang cōsultation yi discord micht best pecifut nochyeles quhē tane gret labour brīg noblis cōcord seād yam coūsalabil ye cōmon weil cōstranit return hame residew army fell sic malancoly within dayis efter deceissit ye pichtis yat thair common weil suld nocht peri falt ane heid chesit donskene brothir king brudꝰ afore rehersit yai • kyng yi donskene maid concord amang pepil redressit al iniurꝭ quhare micht mene tyme certane vailȝeant scottis think richt vnworthy ye king alpinis heid sul • stand ane staik fen • e • yame pichtis thay ye lāgage come camelon marchandis quhare thay remanit certane dayis al sone thay saw thair • yme ya • tuk ye heid come away ī yair cuntre▪ king kēneth ressauit faderis heid solempne processiō send colmekil buryit ye remanent body syne rewardit thir men yt ieoperd yame sic honest vassalege riche lā dis efter yi settand ingyne defence realme put strang ••• diou • al strenthis • ornentis y• bordouris pichtis cōmandit • ꝭ folkꝭ dayly exercit ī cheualry reddy aganis euery trubyl yt mycht occur ȝit mony noblis war mair set defend thair awin p • rsew ye pichtis ye gret 〈◊〉 y• fel yame yi last batt •• l otheris thocht best dissin •• 〈◊〉 ane tyme▪ • e • fra inuasion 〈◊〉 pichtis quhill ye scottis war con •• le • thair pissance recouerit persew crown pichtis reuenge slauchter kyng alpine •• er power scottis yi last opinion howbeit ya • war small wi • er war apprisit kenneth becaus saw sa hye dāgeir appering realme pecifi •• sedition amang noblis intertenit yame merualus affection kindnes followi • thre ȝerꝭ frequent incursionis ony gret slaucht ye fourt ȝeir kēneth maid ane cōuention noblis tuk lang consultation micht optene ye crown pichtis reuenge faderis slauchter schew mony reasonis na tyme 〈◊〉 dul sleuth sen thay war born cheualry ye season expedi •• rais thair army ye pichtis obtene ye crown thairof quhilk he bene sa mony ȝerꝭ iniustly haldin fra yame ȝit quhē kēneth maid al ye instance mycht persuade noblis battall thay micht ꝑsuadit na mair purpos thā samyn bene yair vter cōfusion ye recent slaucht king alpine othir noblis slane hym afore ye pichtis drew al thair mynd fra battall kenneth seing yt noblis na persuasion war abyll solistit battall deuisit yame ane vncouth slicht neuir hard afore ony mannis age conuenit noblis ane counsall abuyse certane othir h •• ar materis feistit yame within palice solempne banket quhil far run within ye nicht sone eft thay went yair chalmeris within palice quhē thay war fallyn ꝓfound sleip kē neth causit sindry men cled wt fische skynnis pa beddis quhare thir lordis lay yan ylk lordis bed past ane yir al ane set hour ylkane yame ī thair hand ane club muscane ire quhilk kest ane vncouth glance y• fische scalis ye myrk yair othir hād ylkane yame ane bugil horn spake sa voce throw ye samyn ye yair voce apperit like ye voce ane mā ye noblis quhare yai lay ī yair beddꝭ war richt astonist yi vncouth sicht knawing quhidder ye visionis dremis yai kepit silence yan thir men spak throw ye bugyl horn heuy basse voce nocht semand 〈◊〉 mortall creaturis schew thaym angellis send cōmand god noblis scotland caus thaym obey desyris thair prince desyris war sa iust yt pychtis repuls thairof sall cum sic vter rewyne yt na engyne pissāce mā suld resist thairto al sone thay said thir wordis ylkane yame hid thair staffe vnder yair claithis inuoluit thair fische skynn • togidder ye fyne yt thay thair lycht micht euanꝭ baith atanis nobillis seand vncouth visioun war astonist tuke lytyll rest residew nicht morow efter thair conuentioun ylkane schew othir thair visionis seand ye samyn apperyng vnder ane tyme maner thay concludit na fantasy bot ane heuynly visioun send thaym syngular fauour god aduertis thaym gyf thay war respondent thairto yair sickir felicite yat haistely follow incontinent thay schew kyng thay war monist ye angellꝭ obtemper wyl al chargis thairfore ferme constance thay wald perseueir battal aganis pichtis king answerit siclik visioun angellis apperit hym howbeit durst schaw samyn aduenture pepyll suld deme hym glorius wa • sa familiar god yt angellꝭ suld aduertis hym thingꝭ cū nochttheles se • thay war admonist samyn maner wald reueill vision apperit haue ane gud fyne noblis condiscendit mynd generall edict cōmandit al fensable ꝑsonis ye realme cū ane certane day place affixit wt vittallis wappin • al thingꝭ necessare aganis y• pich • ꝭ yi edict assemblit striuelyng ane army scottis mair multitud pipil thā euir sene afore thai boundis kyng donskene meit battall scottis gaderit ane army baith inglismen pichtis come within ye nicht betuix ye scottis yair awin landis skarsly ye day brokin quhen baith ye armyis inflāmit birnand hatrent iunit ony soūd trumpat pichtꝭ gat gret skaith yair haistie vnauisit rinning yair ennimes nochtheles thay gat mair skaith inglismen thay left army pichtis ī thꝭ extreme ieoperde fled ye nixt mōtanis reird noyis rising fleing inglismen maid ye pichtis affrayit king donskene nochtwithstanding disceyte inglismen exhortit yame return▪ thay answerit thair custome vse geif battall capitane array pichtis apperit offerit yame wylfully slane yair ennymes ꝑtenit al ye craft weirfair quhē na esperāce victory apperit schaw battal scottis seand ye myd battal nakit ye wing quhare yir inglismen suld haue foch • reddy ressaue iniure ennimes ruschit forthwart sic preis yt ye pichtis war cōstranit geif backꝭ thā kēnethꝭ army followit yame baith wt futmen horsmē cōmādit nane saiffit reuenge ye slaucht king alpine noblis quhilkꝭ war slane eft yt thay war ȝoldin ye chace ꝑseuerit quhil ye pichtis war dreuyn ye watter forth quhare mony yame perist ye remanēt wer slane yame y• followit kīg dōskene efter yt ye battal discōfist born away ane swift hors kēneth dreidand sū hid treason follow slycht thir inglysmen quhilkis war nocht far fra thair army brocht folkis sound trumpat standart stude ya • nycht arrayit battal morow partit spulȝe fe •• rite armis returnit hame ¶of message send don • ene kenneth ansvver orison maid donskene kenneth ansvver hovv pichtis vvar discōfist kyng donskene slan • ca x king donskene eftir battall send oratouris kēneth desyryng peace kenneth āswerit wald gladly geif peace sa yt crown pichtis quhilk pertenit hym iust title war geuyn • hym▪ nochtheles pychtis refusit geif peace yat sort repulse thairof gaif occasion scottis inuade thaym mair cruelte afore nixt ȝeir kenneth come ane army fyffe angus maid inhabitantis yairof sa astonist yt thay war sworn leif vnder empire lawis sone efter kenneth tuke thair ••• enthis garnist thaym maner syne rasit camp come striuelyng tak ye samyn maner quhen brocht ye pichtis thairof domi • ion tythingis come yt scottis quhilkis war left behynd hym fyffe angus war slane treason▪ kenneth incontinent left y• sege striuelyng returnit fiffe quhare fyre sw • rd left na pichtis y• micht tane lyue exempyll tymes cumyng quhat frute succedis mortall pepyll violation thair faith kyngis quhyl yir siclik inhumane cruelt • war done amang scottis pichtis kyng donskene conuenit fensabyll personis realme ony difference ky •• 〈◊〉 baner othir reuenge ye cruelt • • done scottis ani • e pichtis ī iurnay come 〈◊〉 scon • quhare ane riche abbay channonis regular • kyng kenneth al army afore yai • cuming ye morow quhen baith ye armyis war arrayit othir sicht kyng dōskene desyring erar seik peace quhyll • lude prosperite seik efter vincust▪ send ane herald kyng kēneth desyring licence cōmon hym afore battallis iunit certane matteris concernyng na le ye weill scottis thā pichtis kenneth refusit nocht cōmonyng belyue two kyngis accumpanyit ane nowmer noblis come fra thair army ane place deuisit king pichtis said maner cūmis inuincible prince kenneth propiciant fauourꝭ god yt ye kyng pichtis quhais pissance he ay bene equale scotti • humylly cumyn efter sa mony chancis battall desyring peace he bene al oft victorius scottis bene vincust thaym ar cumyn fynaly point yat othir man haue peace vnder quhat cōdition • thow lift elli force w ꝑseueir battall baith perditioun w ȝow ȝit thair bene syndry thyngis yat suld persuade w put ane end thir weris ony ferthis inuasion baith new auld affinite pepyll sa lang continewyng togidder vnder ane blude amyte antecessouris al frequent cheualry baith oure pepyll sa oft ieoperd extreme dangeir aganis ennymes fynaly ye vter euersion w baith quhilk sall nocht fa •• gif cōtinew battall cum w ennymes seand w brokin • thir iniuris sal expel w albion gret dishonour schame yair na occasiō battal forȝe haue ye rich treasour pichtis recompensatioun slauchter kyng alpyne nobillis bot al ȝe haue treasour rich scottis quhilkis thay tynt afore industry kyng feredech thir reasonis best wer scottis pychtis leiffit content awin landis rowmys oure eldaris afore treit peace chance battall dou • sum oftimis fortoun geuis victorie thaym ar maist approchant perell na thyng yairfore sa gud sa sickar peace yt ī thy handis bot victorie power fortoun quhais instable fauoure haue sufficient documen • t yat scho conuertis oftymes hie glore miserable estait ȝe may se w desolate seikand peace quhilkis within thir ȝeris vincust al ye army scottꝭ quhat y• beleif fortoun propiciant scottis scho he bene pychtis he scho promittit ȝow sickir victore quhilk scho neuir ony pepill afore quhat pepil he scho dissauit smyland visage quhen scho semi maist fauourable scho maist dred heirfore vnderstand peace thy gret honoure better afore battall esperance victorie duryng battall auenture gif aduersite followe thy preeminent glore magnitud merciall dedis chance forton sall •• key irrecouerable dāmage attoure yt may haue peace na le necessar w yan proffitable thy pepill ar content fyffe angus pa vnder perpetuall dominioun scottis fyne yat may reiose remanent landis realme time cuming thy fauour peace quhilk waye thow may conques interminable honoure ony dāmage eftir following namit yt posterite maist vailȝeāt prince euir rang aboue scottis thir wourdis answerit kenneth howbeit fortoun na le vnstable ye stait man vnsicker yocht werkis exercitionis subieck variant chance fortoun may prouin mony exemplis oure eldaris ȝit thir present besynes fortoun apperis sorowfull pichtis scottis becaus thay ar cum ane wrangꝰ action defraude scottis ye crown pychtis pertenand thaym iust title thus he ye scottis iust cause persew yair rycht battal sen yai may optene na othir way attoure baith recent auld affinite sa lang continewing betuix two pepill suld moue ye pichtis gif thay respect thair reuerence faith suffir succeid ye crown thairof sen pertenis iust heritage quhilk way baith pepill may haue pepetuall peace vnder ane kyng lawis ony promis fiffe angus quhilkis ar lādis inhabit pepill forthir wer rycht vnmercy full gyf wald nocht gyf peace pichtis samyn maner pichtis gaif peace afore scottis quhen thay wer brokin weris bot ye mat ane vter point ye pichtis ar sworn solempne atthis neuir gif peace w scottis ye maner sworn neuir gif ȝit tak peace pichtis quhill ye crown pichtis geuin ye iust heritour yairof gif thow desiris peace exoner ye crown pichtis deliuer handis al ye strenthis yairof generall cōsent al ye pichtis may declarit kyng gif thir desyris semi importable pichtis force thaym perseueir battall aganis w quhilkis ar preparit maist wei • ly ordinance inuaid yame traisting esperance iust persute haue victorie two kyngis seuering maner ony expedition yair desyris returnit yair tentis incōtinet rais ane hidous clamour reird baith armyis desyring ye rycht de ••• swerd 〈◊〉 chance fortoun list gif kenneth exhortit folkis assailȝe feirslie thair ennymes ꝑseueir feruent battal y• 〈◊〉 may discussit ye day quhiddir scottis • abandoun ye pichtis pichtis ye scottis ye reward victorie wes ye realme pychtis • petual honour dominioun aboue yair ennymes cōtrar yair fleyng sal follow ye rewyne yair realme gret murdir schamfull exterminioun baith yame self yair posterite thir wourdis beand said kēneth arrayit battall doubill wyngis euery ane thaym put archearis cors • owis nixt yame stude ye speris pikkis behynd yame stude swerdis byllis axis ye rycht wīg wes maid ane nobil capitane namit bar ye left wyng dongallꝰ ye myddill ward wes donald ye kyngis broder▪ behynd yame stude kēneth ane gret buschemēt horsmē reddy support yame al dangeir incō tinēt thonderād preis trumpat baith armyis • unit rais ane huge reird clamour maid mony ye pichtis affrayit yt thay apperit afore yai assailȝeit ye chance battall f • e nochtheles donskene exhortit yame assailȝe thair ennymes gret spreit sūtyme reprochit yame yair febilnes sumtyme rasit yair spretis n • w curage promitting gret rich lādis reward yair laubourꝭ followit sone ane terrible bergane ye wemē seing yair husbandis wōdit gaif sic horrible spraichis yai wer impediment yan support ye • echtaris yan wes ye richt wyng pichtis quhare gretest multitud wemen faucht de • eckit put flycht kenneth send ane buschemēt fresche men ye bakkis yame wer fecht ye myddilward yus wer ye pichtꝭ sloppit huge slaucht becaus yai na hope victorie ȝit power resist yai slāg yair wappīnis fra yam tuk ye flycht sa huge pepil wer slane ye place quhare thay first iunit sa huge noumer armour wappinnis ye scottis yair chace wer cōstranit pa ouir innoumerable carionis wappinnis deid pepil throw quhilk sindry scottꝭ wer brokin fra array thair fallowis dreuin amang gret buschementis pichtis quhair yai wer cruelly slane kenneth knawing dāmage sound trūpat callit folkis ye standart eftir yt arrayit sindry buschemētis maist ganād men ye chace gaif yame capitanis cōmandit yame follow thair ennimes gud armour saif nane y• micht apprehē dit yan kenneth passit ye residew yat day nycht following w • ane cū pany chosin men capitanis glaidly obeyit ye empire kēneth slew lang chace ye pichtis yt thay micht ouirtak king donskene ane cūpany pichtis fled ye watter tay abaid yair sa lang ane bait yt slane al hꝭ cūpany said y• pichtis renewit battall ye day vii tymes aganis scottis war ay discomfist ¶hovv svverd cote armour king donskene vvar send colmekyl orison maid king kenneth noblis hovv pichtis vvar slane banist scotland hovv ye dū barris tuk thair begynning ca xi efter victory ye scottꝭ partit ye spulȝe yi battal rite armis sēd ye swerd cote armour kyng donskene sanct colme remane colmekyll perpetuall signe thair victory ye morow al ye noblis scottis come kenneth reiosand victory desyrit tak rest eft sa gret labour suffer hꝭ army return hame bot kenneth thocht ꝓffitabil ceis quhil put ane end hꝭ werꝭ incōtinent callit al noblis afore hym said yi maner ye deuore ane forcy cāpion gif intendis vse victory ye weil army • eis fra battal quhil haue • amite vicust ennymes elli brocht yam sic ruyne y• yai micht neuir recouer gif ony mā wald suffer ennyme quh • brokin neir vincust rest quhil may recouir strenth iugement suld ane thing richt dām • gius hym self ye dāgeir presently appering ye pichtis • brokin weris brocht sic state y• yai may distroyit 〈…〉 ȝit war ane thīg 〈◊〉 abhominable inuade thaym sic cruelte gif micht ony maner way brīg yam sicker amite freindschip cōsidering yai ar enragit aganis w displesouris yame done nochtheles yir pichtis ȝe knaw ar subtel desiris na thing mair vengeance w posterite ye caus yai sall neuir deuoid yair hartis sa lang yai leue yir importable cruelteis done w yus may na amite freindschip drawin ī tymes cūing betwix w pichtis sic cruelteis ar exercit euery side ye yai cā redressit gif ȝe haue sicht yair fore singulare weill na thing sa gud seif nothir man wif barne pichtis blude lyue aduenture yat sic posterite rise thaym sone efter sall baith reuenge thair faderis slauthter bryng oure realme greit dangeir yi opinion ye king yocht cruel found sindry reasonis richt proffitable ye weil scott • incōtinent sic cruelte bludy rage maid pichtis partis ye nane yame left lyue camelon othir strenthis except iim ꝑsonis quhilk fled ye inglismen yan kenneth partit ye landis pichtis amāg noblis sycht yair meritis prowes namit al ye landis▪ montanis riuaris yi region new name ilk land tuk ye name efter ye possessour ye tyme ye fyne yt auld name yir lā dis suld peri memory pichtis bar noble mā gat singular vassalage prouyn last feild ane strang castel lowthiane namit dūbar fra name rais ye hous surname dūbaris quhilkis ar gret renoun honour yir dayis hous come ye erl • marche continewyng lang ꝓgression thair sonnis • enois heritouris said hous 〈◊〉 ar hous mony nobill clerkis doctouris clothit thair notabil virtew prelacijs honouris thir dayis sic thingis done kenneth went mony army • mē sege ye town camelon sindry pichtis fled yair •• ffis child traisting becaus town wes strenthe haif ane sickir refuge first ane herald past camelon assailȝe gif pychtis wald randir town becaus thay refusit ane strait sege wes laid thairto quhilk mony monethis eftir cōtinewit ye scottꝭ war sa irkit sege thay serchit mony ingynis wyn town finalie yai brocht ane gret multitude treis 〈◊〉 • renchis fowsyis yairof mene tyme cie • ezanis began laik vittallis send thair oratouris kenneth desyryng thre • ayis trewis thay mycht tak ••• sement amang thaym self concernyng ye randeryng ye town kenneth hauand na suspicion dissait consentit yair desiris cōman • • army ceis fra segyng ye • duryng thre dayis e • tir followyng mene tyme ane certane pychtis ischi • ye thrid vigill ane auld port quhilk wes oppinnit mony ȝeris afor • first slew ye wache scottis syne come gret affray kyngis tentis maid ithand slauchter sa lang ye nycht endurit fled incontinent ye town nochtheles scottis followit thaym sic slauchter thay town wer nocht thay wer stoppit ganȝeis arowis stanis sch • ye touris camelon yi 〈◊〉 mussing wer slane yan vi • scottis nochtheles kenneth maid ane new wache • ordour afore becaus ye pichtis violat thair faith hym maid ane solempne aith neuir seuer fra town quhill wallis thairof wer equate ye ground youcht assailȝeit tak town sindry ingynis ȝit na thing yairof come til effect pychtis sa vailȝeantly resistit sege continewit styll foure monethis ony interruption throw quhilk sic miserable hunger rais amang cietezanis thairof thay abhorrit eit maist vile abhominable metꝭ yocht thay wer sic • xtreme rage hunger ȝit thay slew yame gaif counsall rander town last town beyng ouirset wery ithand persute scottꝭ yair fowsyis fillit wod othir sindry stuf wallis kenneth send vic men ye nixt wod mak ledderꝭ thir mē returnit ye ye morow went vnfrayit curage ye wallis finalie entrit sindry partis thairof sindry abuschemētis cietezanis astonist yi suddane irruptioun scottis nocht power resist left ye wallis faucht sa lāg ya • • icht perseuerant hatren • ye deith finalie wer slane ony mercy ransoun nobillis commandit cast ye town leif na pychtis lyue within sa myn preistis matronis virginis childrin come afore kenneth pietuous cheir desiring grace bot ye fury scottis wes sa gret thay ony miseration wer al slane eftir yi ye wallis housis castellis kirkꝭ wer brint brocht ye ground town sum tyme sa honest remanit nocht haistely bot powder w • calsay quhilkꝭ sum thing r • manis ȝit thir dayis samyn tyme madyn castell edinburgh wes garnist wt strāg soudiouris pichtis nochtheles pychtis within dredand si • lik subuersioun thaym wes laitlie camelon left castell desert fled northūbirland yus failȝeit realme pychtis albioun thair pepill brocht nocht eftir thay roungin samyn imicli ȝeris ȝeir thayr exterminioun albioun wes fra incarnation viiicxxxix ȝeris fra first cumyng scottis albion imiiiicxxi ȝeris fra begynnyng ye warld vimxxxviii ȝeris ¶of vncouth meruellis sene albion hovv chiar marbyll vvas brocht argyle scone lavvis maid kenneth cōmon vveill scottis deith ca xii samyn ȝeir apperit twa cometis rycht horribill sycht man ane apperit sonne risyng heruest othir schane ay eftir ye sonne gang ueir oftymes wes sene nycht twa battellis armyt men fechtand togidder birnand speris ayre al sone ane yame wes vincust tothir sone euanist quhen bischop camelon wes doand diuyne seruice pontifical staf tuk neid fyre mycht nocht slokynnit quhil wes resoluit nocht fair day lycht besyde camelon sic noyis reird armyt men wes hard pepill wer astonist durst remane thairabout thir meruellis wer interpret sum tyme gud sum tyme euill pepil ye deuinouris plesit quhen kēneth distroyit pichtis conquest thair realme yi maner brocht fatall chiar merbill argyle gowry quhilk chiar said afore wes brocht spanȝe irelād symon brek ireland fergus first king argyle quhare remanit ay quhill thir dayis becaus last victorie pychtis happinnit nocht far fra scone ordanit ye said chiar remane perpetuallie said abbay scottis kyngis resaue thair diademe samyn ye pychtis banist scotland maner seyng ye inglismen mycht na wayis persuadit ciuill weris amang thaym inuaid scottis went denmark otheris serching gyf thay mycht ony way get support recouer thair realme fled norroway otheris remanit ingland seikand thair leuyng cheualrye frute thair handis kenneth kepit subditis eftir exterminioun pychtis sicker peace duryng lyfe ane nobill prince worthy haue indifficient glore wes geuin na le polyce ciuyl maneris yan cheualrie drew ye confusit lawis scotland ane cōpendius volumen abrogat al thaym wer vnproffitable maid new lawis mair expedient quhilkis sindry remanis • followis ☞in ilk schire realme sal ane man law decide doutsū materis quhen thay occur yair sonnis sal lern lawis yair tendir age ¶the lawis constitutionis realme salbe kepit onlie thaym gif ony thaym conuickit falset ony othir cryme lese maieste thay sall hyngit ane iebat ¶he yat conuickit thift salbe hangit makis slauchter sal heidit ¶ane woman conuickit ony capitall cryme salbe drownit buryit quyk ¶he blasphlemys god • sanctis blasphlemys ye kyng capitane sall want toung ¶he yat makis ane lesyng dammage nychtbour sall ty • e sw • rd exilit fra gud cumpany▪ ¶al ꝑsonis suspeckit ony cryme sal suffir ye inquest vii wyse mē •• xixiiixv sa furth od noumer ¶all reuaris oppressouris inuasouris othir mennis landis sal heidit ¶all vagaboundis fulis bardis • udlaris siclik idill pepill salbe brint cheik scurgit wi • h wandis bot gif thay fynd sum craft wyn thair leuyng ¶the wyfe sal nocht punist hir husbandis iniquite bot ye man salbe punist ye cryme •• fe gyf knew cryme gif scho • e nocht wife bot concubyne scho salbe punist samyn pu • itioun man deseruis cryme ¶he reuisis ane virgyne • ot gyf scho desire hym mariage salbe heidit ¶he yat fulȝeis ane mannis bed salbe put deith woman le scho • eforsit ¶he deforsis ane wom •• salbe heidit woman sall 〈◊〉 na skaith bot declarit innocent ¶gyf sonne iniurius fader wourd deid membir yat fatlȝeit quhiddir fut toung hand salbe cuttit fra hym efti • punitioun salbe hingit ane iebat body sall remane vnburyit aboue erd ¶he yat ane manslayar borndum vnthankful fader sall succeid na heritage ¶iouglaris wichis makaris priuat patronis deuyllis salbe brint deid ¶na seid salbe sawin quhill purifyit fra noysum granis sufferis land fyld guld siclik vnproffitabyll wedis▪ sall pay first falt ane • cōmoun gud secound falt x oxin thrid tyme salbe faltit landis ¶gyf thy companȝeon freind slane ye feild salbe buryit thy ennyme left sepulture ¶ane beist found gangand wil salbe geuyn awnar serchoure theuis elli preist parochyne quha withhaldis thre dayis salbe accusit thyft ¶he yt fyndis nichtbouris gei • sall inqui • e opin proclamation ye awnar thairof othir wayis salbe punist ane theif ¶he strikis colligit •• iugement sall tyne action gyf actor par • salbe absoluit fra petition ¶quhē vncouth • fechtis amāg thaym self gif ane thaym happenis slane vncertane quhat kow maid ye slauchter kow yat homyll sall beir wyte awnar thairof sal recompens ye dā mage kow slane nychtboure ¶ane swyne yt etti • hir gris •• salbe • • deid hir flesche forbodin ¶ane swyne yt eit • corne wortis othir mennes landis salbe slane ony redres awnar ¶al othir beistis yat • ittis mennis corne gres salbe poyndit quhil awnar thairof redres skaithis thaym done ¶altaris kirkis ymagis sanctꝭ▪ oratouris chapellis preistis ecclesiastik personis salbe haldin reuerence ¶festuall solēpne day fasting vigillis othir cerimonyis kirk salbe obseruit siclik kirk he institute yat hurtis ane kirk man word deid salbe punist deith sepulturis salbe haldin ī reuerence ane croce set yame yt na man stramp thairon ¶the place quhare ane mā slane buryit salbe vii ȝeris vnteild ¶the corp ane deid man salbe buryit effering gudis gyf ane noble man gret actis cōmoun weill body salbe buryit funeral triumphe yi maner two horsmen sall pa afore hym kirk ane arrayit best claithing berand hꝭ armour wappynnis ane quhite hors othir sall pa dolorus weid ane blak hors quhē ye corp enterit kirk ye man ye blak hors sal turn bak ye altar lamentably deplore ye deith maister sal depart samyn gait come yi othir sal offir hors armour wappynnis ye preist bury hym ī magnificēt sepulture custome burying nobyll • n abrogat efter pepyl redemption thairof yai payit vpund preist ye kirk yi nobyll king kenneth thir mony othir institutionis gouernit pepyll ye end lyfe gud peace felicite iustice translatit bischoppis se • e • irnethy kirk sanct • eule quh • lk namit efter ye kirk sanct andros ye bischop yat succedit efter yi cit • e callit gret bischop scotland realme scotland wes nocht deuydit diocises bot ilk bischop gif foūd gud life resauit oblatioun quhat sumeuir place come yi custome indurit ye kirk scotlād vnto tyme king malcolme ye thrid quhilk monist sall efter rehers vision institute ye sete murthak callit abirden yi seit sāct andros he bene haldin gret reuerence fra first institution thairof thir dayis quhome he bene mony nobyll byschoppis singular crudition lyfe nowmer xxxvi bot wyll return history kenneth eikit boundꝭ realme fra almane seyis besyde northumbirland ye ireland seyis beȝond ye ilis deceissit fortiuiot flux cater xx ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun viiiclv ȝeris body buryit colmekyl amang anciant sepulturis othir kingis ¶of vic • u king donald hovv osbret ella vvith gret novvmer inglismen vvas discomfist hovv xxm scottis vva • slane kyng donald tane inglismen britonis message send scottis osbret ansvver ca xiii kenneth ye nobyl prince deceissit 〈◊〉 wise hꝭ brothi • 〈◊〉 fift 〈◊〉 maid king 〈◊〉 different fra 〈◊〉 othir skarsly roung 〈◊〉 • eris quhen abhominabyl • lust multitude 〈◊〉 riatus sur •• maid pepy • effemin • geuyn mair sensual ples • uris thā ony defence realme na dāmage war appering ennymes thus temperance auld faderis set aside 〈◊〉 vi • brocht amang pepyll mony • f noblis sic war luffa • • irtew dete •• ing gret indigna •• thir schamful • neris ye kīg 〈◊〉 pepyll ay risyng mair dā mage cōmon w • il went 〈◊〉 exhortyng hym remembir • uhat miserable mischeuous end •• llowis vile sensuall 〈…〉 publik priuat personis bene 〈◊〉 samyn quhat pest • lence 〈◊〉 dangeris succedis thairthrow 〈…〉 quhat crymes schamful 〈◊〉 men ar dreuyn occasion 〈◊〉 lustis yairfore prayit hym 〈◊〉 respect singulare 〈…〉 weill remoue suspect 〈◊〉 personis cūpany 〈…〉 hym erar ane wyse prince 〈◊〉 brothir kenneth effe ••• • mon • oure like sardan apalus quhilk • int lyfe empire • ssirianis becaus ay accumpanyit wemen • ir ••• kyll geuyn lust quhen ye noblis scotland schawin yir siclike wordis thair prince seand na emendation ly • e bot hatrent dayly rising aganꝭ 〈◊〉 thay left thair purpos thus pepyll vicius leuyng thair prince degenerat euery vice▪ reason turnit dissait iustice rang iniquite yi mene tyme ye residew pichtis quhilkis fled • mang inglismen • rand insolence scottis tuk desyre reco •• r thair realme albion solistit osbret ella two gret prince ingland moue weir aganis ye scottis promitti • • obey thaym thair posterite gif said prince wald restore thaym thair landis albion osbret ella men hie ingyne prudence knawing quhat detestabyll vicis scottis war effeminat refusit nocht thir desyris pychtis ȝit yai wald schaw yame ennymes scottis quhill contentionis war pecifyit amang thair nobillis quhen ye samyn war dressit maist prudently thir foresaid capitanis osbret ella come ane army inglysmen britonis ¶and efter thay set thair tentis mers berwyk thay send ane herald kyng donald chargeand hym restore landis laitly tane fra pychtis othir wayis inglismen britonis suld na le ennymes hym pychtis afore donald astonist message knawyng nocht quhat done began serche quhare mycht best hyde hym eschew fury ennymes ȝit fynaly hortatioun nobillis suld nocht cowarty expone realme extreme dangeir commandit pepyll vnder dominioun conuene certane day place ordinance necessare resist thair ennymes ¶kyng donald accumpanyit nobyllis commonis sort gaif osbret ella battall iedburgh ¶in battall danis war dyscomfist gret slauchter chasit montanis ¶donald rycht insolent efter victory beleuing hym self formelye • lyueryt truble come mouth tweid victorius army fand thair two schippis ladin winis vittallis othir thingis necessar sustene army inglismē kyng donald tuk finaly yir schippis smal labour partit spulȝe rich yairof amang weirmen spulȝe yir schippis mair noysum scottis thā war yair ennimes donald geuyn sic voracite lust wambe corruppit army detestable maneris ȝoūg men following maneris kyng donald fillit army full bordellis tauernis huris followit dising carting▪ yame come cōtention slauchter thus war ye army maid ane gadering licherus pepyl ony ordour cheualry osbret heirand y• scottis geuyn sic immoderat plesour lustis come yame ane new army quhen thay beleuit na thing le thā cumyng slew thaym nakit armour full wyne sleip thair beddis skry suddanly vprais throw terrible • ūmyssing deand pepil awalkynnit army miserabyl affray followit sone ane lamentabyl murdir scottis sum contending bot vane euaid yair ennymes otheris slane bebait otheris fled quhare thay micht best ☞¶in vnhappy bergane war slane xxm scottis king donald tane full wyne sleip led throw cuntre ane derision al pepil hym tane ye remanēt noblis y• war left vnslane put prison yair tentis spulȝeit maid pray inglismen britonis ye fame vnhappy battall maid ye remanent scottis na le dolorus thā yair realm fallin ī pray thair ennymes sum began wary fortoun otheris traistit al thir mischeuis fallin vengeance yair vnhappy kyng cursit counsal otheris ran throw stretꝭ inquiryng yame yt thay met quha tane slane quhat inglismen intendit eft yi victory last heirand ye inglismen war cumyn ī lowthiane ye britonis ī galloway ceissing fra na maner cruelte y• micht deuisit yai war mair affrayit thā euir ony pepyl afore ye spraichis lamentabyl cryis wemē heirand ye miserabyll slau • hter thair freindis husbandis af •• ayit cuntre ȝāmering sa huge yt apperit othir reuenge ye iniurꝭ ennymes ȝit defend yair realme throw quhilk al ye boundis scotland fra humbir striuelyng ouir riddin nothir man wyfe page left lyue y• mycht ouirtakyn inglismen britonis belyue thay maid yame reddy cū fyffe angus ye capitanis ylk region mesit trubyl sa far thay micht amang ye pepyl al sensabyl men yt yai culd gaddir yai stoppit certane dayis cumyng ennymes ouir forth osbret incontinent stuffit certane schippis xm chosin men cum ouir forth ye mene tyme rais sa vehement storme y• vm thaym perist residew mast • ikyll returnit land osbret • army greit dangeir mycht nocht tur • see come brig striueling conuoy army land gait fyffe ye scottis send thair oratouris osbret desyring peace said • tenit vailȝeāt cāpionis hauīg victory debai • inuaid vincust pepill new iniuris yair kīg captiue yai • noblis beand sa miserablie slane remembring yame y• scottis war vincust mair thair awin sleuth necligence ony manheid inglismen al fortoun sa vnstabil yat oftymes scho takis fra mortall pepyl victory yat scho geuis thaym le thay vse mair mesure al na glore micht succeid hym howbeit vincust febil pepil quhilk set tak peace vnder quhat condition plesit nochttheles gif wald na wayis condiscend peace ya • suld prefer honest deith schamefull lyfe osbret degeistly auisit thir petitionis cōtent haue peace scottis vnder yir conditionis yt al landis conquest fra scottis tyme sall remane vnder perpetual dominion inglismen britonis na forthir conques maid scottis remanent land reft fra pichtis sal remane afore vnder ye emp • sco • ti watter forth sall marche betuix scottis inglismen ye eist partis salbe nam •• ay f • thyne furth ye scottis see ye wat •• r clide dūbartane salbe marche ī ye wast partis betuix ye sco • ti britonꝭ yi castel afore thꝭ day callit al • luch thā namit dūbritane yt say castell britonis salbe imput treason gyf ony scottis mē pa ouir forth foūd ony lādis ꝑtenand inglismen britonis gif ony scottis dreuyn ye said landis thay sall depart within thre dayis efter without yai haue impediment thay sall • ur na thing realme bot vittallis watter thay sall 〈◊〉 na strenthis fornens britonis inglismen thay sall pay ylk ȝeir ane pund britonis quhill xx 〈◊〉 war outrunnyng obseruation thairof sall geif lx yair noblis sonnis reman • plage osbret commandit thair oratouris gif peace vnder thir conditionis war thocht heuy cum agane new message ¶of orison maid calenus▪ hovv scottis tuk peace vvith inglismen britonis hovv kyng donald vvas put prison vicis slevv hym self syndry meruellis sene albioun ca xiiii mony scottis thocht peace sorrowfull vnder yir cō ditionis otherꝭ thocht realme sic dangeir y• peace wes necessare ī quhat sumeuir sort micht thus thay bene deuidit syndry factionis war nocht ane agit man namit calenus thane angus quhylk vii sonnis slane king donald last battall pecifyit yame maner fynd croniklis ye vailȝeant▪ galdus souerane quhais singulare preeminence glore armes landis brigance war callit galloway brocht romani quhilkꝭ war • antouris pepyll sic extreme calamite thay socht peace vnder quhat cō ditionis plesit thay mycht eschew irrecouerabyll dangeir thā appering yair army youcht slane yame ony mercy rāsoun • ne bot smal outrage dishonour ye residew romane pepyll heirfore gif ye romane army dep̄st wt euil fortoun hauād nobil men singular prudence counsal thā ar amang w submittit thaym haue peace ye wyll thair • nnymes becaus thay micht na othir wayis aschew dā geir •• curring think thairfore suld eschame sen ar vincust realme standing extreme dangeir king noblis tane haue peace wt ennimes quhat sumeuir sort may ȝit micht cōmon weil quhilk he bene sa vailȝeātly debaittit day haue defēce ony othir way think suld erar ieopard w extreme dangeir battall seik sa sorrowfull cōdition peace forthir micht lyuis wylfully offerit deid delyuer realme pepyl fra ye schame trubyll appering suld ye first yt suld wylfully offer hym self sacrifice y• behalf bot sen ar cumyn sic calamite affliction y• force haue peace vnder quhat sumeuir cōditionis may tyme elli tine realme fechtand fulichely ennymes ye deith best yairfore haue peace saif realm quhilk he bene syndry chancis fortoun sa vailȝeantly defendit esperāce greter prosperite y• ȝe may sū tyme reco • er landis reft fra ȝow iniure ennymes gif ȝe othir wayis ȝe sall tyne ȝour self ȝour wiffis childrin realme ony recouer noblis coū sal send ambassatourꝭ haue peace britonis inglismen ye maner afore rehersit peace beand ratifyit donald send ī scotlād rāsonit gret sowmes money ye britonis inglismen sat • eacia billy ī sindry braid boū dis scotland britonis gat al ye landis fra striuelyng ireland seis fra watter forth clide cu • bir strenthis thairof inglismen gat landis betuix▪ striueling northū berland thus clyde marche betuix scottis britonis ane syde watter forth namit ye scottis se • marche betuix yame inglysmen ye tothir syde striuelyng cōmon marche thre pepyl▪ scottis britonis inglismen castel keping kīg osbret quhilk reparit new munitionis nochtwithstanding ye rewyne thairof maid afore scottis quhen thay spul • eit ye pichtis yair realm yi osbret cunȝeouris within castel quhom ye striueling money tuk begynning inglismen beildit ane brig stane ouir ye watter forth ye middis yairof stude ane ymage ye crucifix vnd ye samyn thir versis ingrauyn fre marche passingeris may ken scottis britoni • inglismen pychtis seand thir thre pepyll brocht concord dred suspition yat inglismen britonis quhilkꝭ war afore thair freindis suld becum thair ennymes desire yair landis yairfore saif yair lyuis thay f • ed thair freindis norroway denmark otheris quhilkis na refuge war slane inglismen end pichtis quhilkis fled ingland efter ye expulsion yame fra yair realm ye tyme king donald quhylk brocht hame yocht vnworthy gret triumphe remouit virtuous nobil men cumpany fell vicis afore youcht importable aduersite • el hym ylkane aboue othir ȝit nane thaym ȝi • gud coūsal micht draw hym fra corruppit lyfe quhē tint tane half realme sleuth tothir half • •• dit fait iustice na thing appering mair cleirly thā exterminion realme continewall seditionis dayly rising ye samyn h • tane nobillis realme suld tint foly put ward quhare within day efter slew hym self disperation vi ȝeir regne fra incarnation viiiclx ȝerꝭ mony meruellis wer sene tyme albion thair ane child ī lowthian vi monethis auld schew • moder within schort tyme ennymes sall haue empire dominion lowthiane counsallit hir thairfore fle yairfra • xin 〈◊〉 thair pasture tuke ane vncouth cowting schot ha • stely deith fi •• found deid ye see syde 〈◊〉 forth lytyll different fra ye ymage man galloway ane huge multitude serpentis fell ye ayre suddandly war resoluit corru • tion gret mortali • e men beis • • aymen coniecturit thir meruellis ye empire king donald end mischeif ¶of king constantine secound▪ lavvis heuy regrait maid euanus ilis folkis▪ hovv ye said euanus vvas punist rebellion ca xv donald tyran • slane haue wrytyn cōstantine secound name sonne kenneth maid king beginnyng regne tuke labour recouer ye landis quhilkis war 〈◊〉 afore fra scottis sleuth 〈◊〉 donald nobyllis knawyng thaym brokyn dāmage weris afore past wald assist hym quhil corruppit maneris quhilkis war brocht amang pepyll insolence king donald war first put thyngis brocht estait thay wa • afore tyme kenneth kyng constantyne dres thir materis conuenit nobillis ane counsall • one quhar • publik auctorite maid thir lawis vnder writin ¶in first cōmandit kirkmē wait diligently diuine seruice thay sall abstene fra prophane labouris leue con • ent patrimony pertenand thair kirkis yai sall preche worde god ye pepyll thay sall leue ye samyn maner • thay teche pepyll fyne yt thay may mair esaly serue god thay salbe fre tymes cū myng al chargis pertena • ye weris thay sall nothir nu • hors houndis thair plese • r thay sall beir na wappynnis decide prophane actionis ¶and gif thir kirkmen failȝe nocht thair deuore cris ••• pepill thinkis reasonable thay sal pay first falt gret sowmes money secound falt gif yai amend nocht thair life yai salbe degradit thair preisthe • ¶ȝoung childrin salbe refrenit fr • lustis nurist rude meit sall eit bot ani day abstene fra al thingis 〈◊〉 may mak thaym drunkyn ¶ane chyld ane •• dyn yt fu • dyn drunkyn salbe pu • ist ye deith ¶ȝoung men salbe 〈◊〉 swift rynnyng w •• slyng • ith corshow hād • ow casting 〈◊〉 hald yame fra 〈◊〉 thingis 〈◊〉 makis yame thay • al sleip burdis hard beddis mak thaym abell suffir distres kyngis weris nane thi • thingis wer inhibit agit men bot allanerlie eschew superflew mony coursis ☞it wes cōmandit ye decreit tauerneris drunkattis bordallaris prouocaris pepil intemperat diet lustꝭ sall pa cuntre within ane certane day vnder pane deth thir lawis ye pepill wer maid within schort tyme lichorus glutonis temperat men soft bodyis reddy suffir laubouris effeminat creatouris maid wyse manly campionis followit sone eftir gret felicite realme throw wyse prudent administratioun kyng constantyne first trubill rais tyme wes euanus capitane ye ilis pepill he bene ay sa peruerst insolent ingyne sen thair first beginnyng thay may nothir sustene lang peace weir quhen thay ar waistit lang weris thay think na thyng sa displesand thaym battall laubouris haue peace vter deligence eftir lang peace thay flow rich incressis ilk day sa insolēt yt thay may nocht suffir equale administration iustice seikis frequent occasion othir haue weir ennymes ellꝭ haue weir amāg yame self maner euanus ilis irki • lang peace gaderit ane c • pany siclik līmaris hym self castell dunstafage wes keping lang orisoun cōplenyt afore thaym continuatioun lang peace vncouth pepill he brocht nobillis seruitude constantyne yair kyng wes ane dum seuere vnmercyfull prince proffitable cōmonis yan noblis he maid certane lawis execute equale pure riche ony reuerence estait he richit familiaris vane coulour iustice putting nobillis gret punition thus wes na place left gentill men nobillis sustene thair lyfe sic honour yair eldaris afore contrar men vile obscure lynnage ar daylie promouit rich honouris na man micht leif strait lawis bot gif yai pa thair tyme innocence churlis doi quhilk na gentill hart mycht suffir heirfore nobil men sal nocht haldin vnder sic perpetual seruitud▪ churlis sall nocht tymes cuming haue occasioun insolēt proud best conspire aganis constantyne othir tak hym elli inuaid hym al ye power thay mycht quhilk beand done thingis micht succeid thay plesit ilis men rycht desirus haue thair renȝeis fre thay mycht iniure pepill afore ony punitioun assistit opinioun solistit ye pepill murray ro cathnes rebell aganis thair prince nochtheles treason wes sone discouerit kyng causit hym ane cumpany chosin men cum haistely dunstafage quhare yi euanus hapnit • yme tuke hym sindry complicis hingit thaym iebaitis becaus sindry gret princis ye cuntre wer participant treasoun thay wer tane samyn maner put strang presonnis quhil ye kyng mycht haue degeist consultation quhat punition wes efferyng thair offence ¶hovv gadanꝰ king danis send tvvo brethir hungar hubba vvith gret armyis inuaid scottis▪ hovv said hubba vvas vincust▪ army put flicht ca xvi al sone yi trubil wes peacifyit yi wyse followit ane othir gretar motioun stair mā he neuir experiēce aduersite yan quhen ye samyn leist apperis gadanꝰ kyng denmark come ane army first aganis scottis syne aganis inglismen motiue weris wes becaus ye residew p • chtis quhilk •• ed denmark quhen thay wer doung albion ye weris scottis resignit hym al richt y• yat micht haue yair realme ī albion ye caus send ii brethir hūgar hubba ane flote dani • albion finalie arriuit 〈◊〉 euir brute thair weris come eris scottis eftir thair arriuyng thay inuadit pepill sic cruelteis thay wer con •• anit saifte thair lyuis seik new habitatioun mene tyme wes thay regionis ane huge noumer haly men quhilk prechi • daylie scripture euang • llis pepill bot thay wer inuadit sic slauchter cruelte danis yt maist part yame fled adriane bischop scotland ile may eschew ye dangeir appering may ane ile betuix fiffe lowthiane ī ane abbay monkis bot nothir ye reuerence yi religious place ȝit ye innocence thir haly men micht saif thaym thay war al slane vncouth punition torment thir haly martyris sanct adriane fallowis ar haldin ȝit gret venecation inglismen scottis dayly myraclis kithi • yame • king constantine seand y• furius cruelte danis ylk day mair incre •• ing thocht mair expedient assailȝe chance fortoun quhil pissance haill quhen attenuat frequēt displesouris yairfore cōmandit pepyll mete hym thair best maner agane ane certane day place day byrt • n come ane army aganis danis fand yame • ampit fiffe liand two mylis syndry deuidit ye watter leuyn watter boldin thair cumyng sic violent schouris yat mycht riddyn efter inundatioun thairof followit sa meruellus serenite gai • occasion constantyne inuaid danis battall becaus nane thir two armyis danis micht support othir constantyne come arrayit battall aganis hubba quhilk capitane danis ye southe syde leuyn ye danis sa feruent desire fecht yt thay micht na wayis haldin within yair tentis hubba maid hortation superseid yai • fury quhil thay micht haue rescours freindis nochyeles yai war sa fers yt thay come array without aduise hubba thair capitane aboue thair harnes cote armouris bordourit reid sylke schinand meruellus brichtnes stok swerdis quhom na armour micht resist yir danis apperit richt terrible yair huge bodyis▪ nochtwithstanding baith ye armyis iunit faucht incredible fury last y• danis ouirset multitude pepil war sa inuadit ilk side yt yai micht resist slang haistely yair wappinnis fra yame fled mony yame fleād yair tentis war slane otheris war ca • fowseis thair deid carionis maid ane gait scottis cum yair tentis sū thaym perist riuer otheris craft swomyng wer sauit hubba swame throw ye riuer ony ꝑel wes humber rycht reiosit yat brodir hubba eschapit baith dangeir ennymes y• riuer incōtinēt armit hym wt gret ire reuēge y• slaucht folkꝭ hovv king cōstantine vvas slane army discomfist danis ca xvii scottis wer sa insolent eftir victorie yat yai tuke lityll sollicitude thocht residew thair battall wes led aganis danis bot na aduersite mycht follow euery thyng wer dantit thair onlie virtew yai thair ennymes contemption spendit two dayis dansyng reuellyng singing ony sycht cheualrye sa far procedit thair foly yt thay kest cauillis quhay suld haue ye maist riche presoneris amāg danis na otherwayis victorie bene present yair handꝭ aboue insolence ȝoung agit nobillis fell contentioun maist outragius wourdis aganis othir agit men desiryng preferrit reason yair lang experience age ȝoung men reason thair manheid ȝouth reddy assailȝe perellis bot thayr wes na sermone amang thaym yair army suld arrayit ȝit quhat wayis thair ennymes suld vincust last quhen watter leuyn wes fallin kyng cōstantyne brocht ouir army fecht ye residew danis ye danis hauād sycht ye gouernance thair battal yan ony spulȝe arrayit yair army sort ye rycht wyng wes hubba vim danis left wyng wes buernus inglisman quhilk wes banist ingland pollution osbret ye kīg inglandꝭ wife come battal aganis scottis y• residew pichtis quhilkis war banist afore albion myddylward hūgar ye remanent danis exhorting yam pa battal gud curage schew ile albion wt ye rich frut yairof suld reward thair victory ꝯtrar gif yai war vincust nocht micht follow bot deid slauchter yame ꝑpetual schame inflam yame mair fury swore neuir return tentꝭ without victory causit yame al sworn ye samyn wyse tothir syde king cōstantine put ethus brothir ye richt wīg dūcane thane athole ye left wing xm mē ilkane thair battallis arrayit hym self ye middilward ye residew scottis sine began mak orisoun army first gaif thākis god yi victory recently fallin pepil exhortit yame fyle schamfull fleing ye glore yt yai conquest afore yair māheid virtew prayit yame haue na feir yair ennymes▪ yai wer bot corpolent bodyis ony virtew micht thairfore sone vincust gif thay war inuadit ye samyn maner thay war afore finaly requirit yame ryn ouir feirsly ī battal bot erar suffir yair ennymes cū yame beleuit said ennymes rage ire ryn sa fast forthwart yat yai suld wery brokin eui • yai come straikis bot cōmand constantyne wes rycht noysum tyll • olkis bald sp • eit feirsnes suld haue bene ekit hortatioun yair capitane wes gre •• mlie menist yi cōmand constantyne folkis vsis quhen thay ar fecht cum sic faird noys thay rais na le thaim self hie • urage astonisis thair ennymes dredour ye danys • ūd • trumpat went forthwart nochttheles yai wer expert cheualrie fra thay saw thair ennymes nocht mei • thaym thay sum tyme abaid sum tyme went forthwart esy pais schowtand thair ganȝeis dartis tothir syde scottis schot yir danis arowis sloung stanys belyue baith armyis iunyt faucht incredibill fury quhyll last scottis wer put flycht quhom foll • wit danis lang slaucht chace vnhappy battall wer slane xm scottis amang mon • othir presoneris kyng constantyne wes tane brocht ane coue besyde see quhare wes heidit xiii ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun viiiclxxiiii▪ ȝeris place quhair wes slane ȝit callit ye blak coue ane memorie wickit deid ¶of king ethus actis hovv osbret king ingland vvith mony othir pepyl vvas slane cruelte danis▪ sindry meruellis sene albion▪ deith ethus ca xviii yi vnhappy battal sic miserabil skaith followit scottis yt bene ethꝰ brothir kīg cōstantine happinnit saiffit hꝭ fleyng ye name memory scottis bene endit yi day ī albion ye residew scottis quhilkis eschapit fra vnhappy battall cōuenit scone maid ethꝰ kīg mony vncouth strāge meruellis war sene yi tyme albion ane multitude fische sene forth tane half yame aboue ye watter na thīg different fra y• figour mā callit ye pepil bassinatis thir fische he blak skynnis hingand thair bodyis quhilk sumtyme ya • couir yair heid yair cragis euyn yair schulderis quhen thir fische fletis seyis yai signify gret infortuniteis mortall pepyll ye lochis riuaris stude frosin fra ye beginning nouember ye end aprille eft quhilk followit ane thow sa cō tinual ythand raynis • leit snawis yt al ye planis stude ful watt thā followit sa infinite nowmer padokis yt ayre infeckit ye gret dāmage pepyll ane comite sene fyrie bemis risyng afore none schane moneth aprile pepyll astonist sic vncouth meruellis beleuit gret affliction cum yame danis efter yi victory come louthiane chasit inhabitantis thairof northūb • rlād fauch • yair aganis osbret king ingland support bruernꝰ quhilk banist schew afore fynaly yai slew ye said osbret plane battall put folkis flicht efter slauchter yai went bludy swordis throw boundis ingland ceissing fra na maner cruelteis cry • yn pepyl throw quhilk mony haly men sufferit matyrdome amang quhom ane haly man sanct edmond king northfolk southfolk quhilk slane yair tyrāny ye remanent kīgis ingland faucht certane ȝeris eft syndry chance fortoun aganis y• danis finaly al ye inglismen yt dwelt fornens ye almane seyis war outhir slane thirllit seruitude danis ȝit thair cruelteis war lāg vnpunist yai war dantit ye vailȝeant alarude quhilk succedit eft kīg eldrede ye realm northfolk southfolk yi eldrede vincust ye danis frequent battal▪ slew baith hungar hubba restorit ingland ye auld liberte bot wyl return ye remanent geistis king ethꝰ said prince sa swift yt mycht tak ane hert ane hoūd force speid nochtheles quhat sūeuir giftꝭ nature followit hym apperit richt vnabil gouern ye realm quhen micht haue recouerit sober besynes fif louthiane othir lādis tane fra scottis iniure inglismen britonis tuk na regard thairof hauand mair sicht lust thā ony cōmon weil ye realm ye samyn suld haue bene reformit ane better chance seruit hꝭ vnbridillit lust ony respect ciuil religius maneris yocht rycht agil deliuer body mony othir giftis god nature abusit yame sa yt na thing semit hym ī gouernāce ye noblis knawing corruppit manerꝭ noysū ye cōmon weill abyll gener displeseir amang ye pepyl yt ye realm suld cū mair affliction misgouernance yai maid ane quiet cōuētion amang yame self take ye king ye fyne yt yair intētion suld diuulgat afore come effect thay come haistely quhen ye huntis ye wod calidon tuk hym force armit men prison quhare deceissit thrid day efter malancoly secound ȝeir regne fra incarnation viiiclxxvi ȝeris ¶of king gregoure lavvis hovv recouerit sindry landis realm discōfist herdeut vvith al ye army danis▪ hovv rasyne gret capitane danis vvas slane inglismen ca xix ethus beand yus miserably deceissit ī prison gregoure sonne cōgallus yat tang afore kyng alpine crownit scone bot two monethis age quhen fader perist spay yi gregoure efter coronation knawing weill deuine helpe targe sicker munition kingꝭ realmes quhilk na kyngdomes may stād ony tyme permanent thairfore yat mycht begyn empire wt mair felicite set ane conuention nobillis forfair agmentation deuine seruice kirkmen mycht mair frely geif thair attendance ordoure thaym gud religion statuit publik parliamēt kirkmen salbe perpetually exonorat weris tributis publik exactionis ar put pepyl hym successouris tymes cumyng thay sall drawin afore prophane iugis▪ bot allanerly submittit thair ordinat iugis gaif power bischoppis realm decide afore yame al actiōis ꝑtenād faith body power baith caus ye pepyl keip yair faith ꝓmittit yair nichtbour punis yarne violation yairof gaif al power ye said kirkmen make lawis constitutionis weill cristin faith discus al debaitis cōcerning oblationis teindis testamentis obligatiōis legasi • īterprete ye lawis punis manesworn pepyl blasphlemaris god sanctis cur al pepyl rebellād yair cō stitutionis inhibit yame cum quhare deuyne seruice done yt al personis quhilkis war cursi • yame suld brouk na heritage hard ī iugement bot exilit gud cū pany na faith geuyn deposition witnes cōmandit yt al • prince succeding efter hym sall mak thair aith efter yair coronation defend ye honour liberte haly kirk kirkmen sall mak na derogation constitutionis kirk gregoure ane naturall inclination seruice • god sa graue sententious lāgage yat al wordis dedis apperit thay ben pasit iust balance sa institute ȝouth yat leuit al day ane heuynly life skars fude sleip ony lust cōuersation wemen gyne na le geuyn polecy administration iustice cheualry ye first iornay yat maid fiffe recouir • fra tyranny danis pichtis quhais cumyng pichtis quhilkis war left danis • habit ye said land war sa astonist knawing huge hatrent ye scottis b • aganis yame y• yai fled louthiane gregoure fyndand fiff • desert maner brocht scottis syndry partis realme inhabit ye samyn efter yi come louthiane brocht ye samyn maner dominion sine went ye mers quhare syndry cūpanyis pichtis danis war assemblit geif hym battal nochthelis ye danis • sa gret multitude scottis ī thair sycht fled berwik quhare syndry othir danis wer yai • opinion efter yai went northū birland fand syndry danis laitly cumin yair support ye inglismē quhilkis war yat tyme b • rwyk hauand na thing mair hatrent empire danis randeri • town berwik scottis gregoure resauit ye town gaif lycence inglismen depart remane thair pleseir slew danis quhom fand ony mercy ransoun quhen garnist town necessaris keping thairof come army northumberland e • k ye samyn empire scottis mene tyme war two armyis liand northumbirland ye tane danis far fra ȝork yi • othir inglismen xx mylis fra campe scottis herdeut prince danis heirand y• sa mony danis war slane berwik maid aith reuenge thair slauchter sic cruelte y• na scottis salbe left lyue albion brīg purpos effect come displayit baner far fra samyn place quhare y• scottis war liand yair tentis gregoure seand ennymes arrayit afore hym tuk purpos haue maid ane orisoun army afore y• iunyng quhen suddāly rais sic noyis clamour amāg yame desyre battall yat mair necessar array yame exhort thaym battall nochtheles besocht yame reuenge ye shamfull slauchter kyng constantyne slane treasonably eft yt tane incōtinēt ye scottꝭ • uschit forthwart na le māheid thā preis come sa fersly thair lang speris yair ennymes na laseir schote thair dartis efter ye speris come residew scottis lang swerdis • illis axis sic ire yat yai nedit na hortation thus war y• danis vincust chasit nixt montanis scottis followit na le cruelte ye chace thā yai faucht afore ye battall maist violent irruption thay braik trinschis come perforce within ye tentis ennymes quhare ane huge slauchter maid morrow herdeu • colleckit ye residew army seand yame slane thā lyue tuk purpos pa rasyne gret maister danis ingland bot skarsly army gane xl mylis quhen sicker tithingꝭ come y• rasyne slane army discomfist inglismen mair derisioun heid borne ane staik throw syndry townis cieteis ingland apperit thir nouellis ye proude empyre danis • ast tending rewine herdeut richt astonist knawing quhat done becaus ennimes war liand hym euery syde parkit army ane st • ate place purpos remane quhyll war fynaly aduertist quhat ye remanent danis intendit ¶hovv gregoure recouerit syndry lā dis realme▪ slevv constantine kyng britonis hovv scottis britonis inglismen vvar confiderat aganis danis ca xx efter victory danis northumbirland come vnder ye dominion king gregoure al ye inhabitātis yairof maid tributar hꝭ empire sone efter skalit army come berwik quhare tuk aduisement quhat ingyne micht bring maist felicite realme begynnyng nixt symer rasit campe aganis britonis quhilkis ye tyme gret boundis scotland quhilk iornay succedit hym na le felicite thā othir done afore aganis danis ye britonis attenuat brokin • e frequent weris danis delyuerit al dāgeir apperīg gaif ane huge sowme money ye said danis tuk trewis yame xx ȝeris nochtheles ye danis abaid schort tyme thꝭ peace bot inuadit ye britonis mair cruel iniuris thā afore ye britonis seand na band amite faith micht continew ye danis ythand iniuris sēd yair ambassatourꝭ kīg gregoure ꝓmitting renunce al ye landis y• pertenit ye empire scottis sa yt wald support yame aganis ye danis gregoure knawing gif thre pepyll albion scottis britonis inglismen war ꝯfiderat vnder ane mynd pissance na vncouth pepyll war dred cōdiscendit yair desyris yus war scottis inglismen britonis fynaly agreit al debaitis al lādis tane afore fra scottis yair weris rāderit plesandly gregoure ye realme scottis dela •• auld marchis ye peace tretit maner apperit na le terribil ye danis thā plesand ye albianis bot indurit schort tyme ye proude felicite fallin inglismē victory danis slauchter allarudꝰ yair capitane gaif occasion britonis brek yi bād laitly maid scottis sone efter cōstantine king britonis began penitēt yi bād maid scottis recouer ye saidis landis empire come ane army ī annādale yus ye peace desoluit betuix scottis britonis ye britonis sēd tyl inglismen support becaus thay war frustrat thairof yai tuk ane huge pray gudis annandale wt purpos pa ye samyn ī walis kīg gregour aduertist yir extorsiōis met kīg cōstātine louch mabē quhare cruelly fochtyn al sidis last cōstantine seand ansenȝe ereckit sa per • curage desiri • ruschit wt maist feruent curage defence thairof quhare fechtand mair respect honour thā lyfe slane efter quhais dei •• followit sa huge slauchter strāgest campionis brytonis gaif bakkis war sa brokin affliction yt thay come maist hatrent baith danis scottis na thing luffit inglismen nochtheles thair realme suld nocht faill thay chesit herb • rt quhilkis brothir constantine afore slane thair kīg send yair oratouris king gregour desiring peace saying violation band betuix thaym scottis insolence constā tine quhilk punist iustly hꝭ offence gret dāmage britonis sen iustly punist offence na occasion apperit dissolue band afore contrackit betuix scottis britonis atto •• e yai schew yt thair kīg herbar • ane luffar peace desyris na thing sa mekyll leue amite nichtbouris scottis message answerit king gregoure wyse nothir luffe faith peace ȝit reuerence band aith he mouit ye britonis seik peace • w sen thay ony respect thair faith band come annandale wirkand importabyll iniuris b • ony occasion scot • bot becaus yai ar sa brokin ī thair pi • sance thay may party tyme w knawand na thing better vter exterminion thair realme gif thay perseueir ony forthir wt weris aganis w yairfor schaw ȝour kyng herbart wyll haue na peace hym treasonabyl pepyl quhil y• str • munitionis cumbir westmurland rā derit handis ye said herbert sworn neuir reclame ye saidis landis tymes cumyng lx nobyll men geuyn plege obseruatioun thairof kyng herbart seand hie dammage approcheand realme dreidand gif perseuerit battall ye fynal euersion realme subdittis condiscendit aduise nobillis fulfyll thingis yai war desyrit gregoure al sone plegis war geuyn maner britonis left cumbir westmureland past walis thā gregoure went carlyll quhare assemblit nobyllis ane coū sall said maner patent yneuch quhat felicite cumyn realme propiciant fauour god sen began honour hym trew religion faith sa far he nocht onely restori • w ony gret slauchter peryll lādis tane sumtyme fra eldaris iniure danis inglismen britonis bot al punising yair iniquiteis he brocht thair nobyl lā dis northumbirland cumbir westmureland iust conques handꝭ haue optenit grace fauour god mair thā beleuit landis recouerit dyuers boundis inglismen brytonis falling ī pray w rite b • ttal haue honest victory triumphe ennymes land glore posterite cōtrar fais he tint schamefully landis yat thay wrangusly cōquest bot 〈◊〉 vincust battall chasi • doung fra thair rowmes inuadit vncouth domistik weris 〈…〉 nocht assailȝe chance fort ••• ony forthir w auentu •• yai bring thaym self irrecouerabil dā mage schame • britonis • e fauour god awin man heid sa vincust yat yai wilfullie he exil • thaym self na bett chance he succedit danis bot doung yair boūdis schamefully condigne slauchter maid thaym iniuris wrocht afore w cumbir westmureland northū birland munitionis thairof maid pray w desyrit heirfore forcy campionis sen ȝoure prouin virtew manheid quhom god standis sa propiciant persuadis ȝow nocht rest victorie▪ ȝit stand cōtent yi pray beseik ȝow follow vehementlie thing ya • offerit ȝow prouidence god na villagis rude pepil ar assailȝeit▪ sen ennymes apperis na partis maist strenthy wallis townis ar taikin weris danis ar vincust fled kent inglismen sa astonist thay haue left chargis battallis landis resist thair ennymes lat w heirfore pa recent victorie ȝork quhare na greter laubour afore howbeit mair riche pray guddis abidis w aboue yir proffettis gyf al chargis wy • lie sall conques infinite glore honour oure posterite thir ar materis wald persuade ȝow ye fyne ȝe may reuēge ye iniuris done ennym • ye indifficient honouris hie felicite may succe • ȝow thir wourdis ilk man maid prouisioun sic thyngis • maist accordīg weris mene tyme come gregour ambassatouris • llarud kyng ingland reiosand yat inuincible curage dantit ennymes sa vailȝeantlie reuengit ye slauchter cōstantine kyng scottis danis support wer dreuin albioun desiryng hym thairfore renew ye auld band peace inglismen scottis beand cōfiderat togidder vndir ane mynd may resist b • tter inuasion danis gif thay return sumtyme albioun kyng gregour assentit thir petitionis followit • kir peace ratifyit vnder mane • ▪ scottis sal perpetuallie reio •• al boundis northumbi • land 〈◊〉 ony infestatioun inglismen 〈◊〉 cuming gif danis moue weir aganis ony ane thir two pepil ye iniure salbe repu • cōmoun thaym baith baith pepill concur equalie defence yairof attour nothi • inglismen scottis sall inuaid otheris gyf ony theuis ingland mak thift reif within ye landis scottis peace sall dissoluit thairfore bot baith theif resettoure salbe deliuerit quhair cryme cōmittit ☞hovv king gregoure come ireland reuenge certane iniuris done • gallovvay▪ hovv dantit samyn vvith syndry victoris▪ vvas gouernour thairof mony ȝeris▪ louyng deith ca xxi peace ratifyit maner forsaid gregoure beleuyng haue put fyne al weris wes constranit new trubill ireland renew samyn ireland men come ane gret flote galloway tuke ane gret pray men gudis ye boūdis yairof ye motiue yair weris yai allegit ye men galloway spulȝeit two schippis dublyne efter yt samyn wer arriuit yair watteris al sone gregour aduertist yairof followit gret • ligence yir ireland men yai herand cumyng war sa affrayit yai sped yame gret deligence ī yair cuntre incōtinent gregour follwit yame ane army ireland maid al prince yairof▪ astonit cumyng schort tyme afore cumyng ye king ireland▪ • e • e • cissit left behynd hym ane ȝoung child namit duncane succeid crown throw deith princis ireland war contending amang thaym gouernance realme war deuidit two opinionis brennus prince ye • faction cornelius tothir war ye scottis tynnand throw cuntre sa awfull incursion fyre slauchter apperit without thair fury war mair haistely repressit ane gret part ireland suld distroyit mene tyme sidry nobyl mē irelād labourit mak concord amang foresaid princis yt realme yair dissention suld ieoperd extreme dangeir becaus sic thingis culd nocht dressit thay tuke • rewis betuix yame certane monethis resist thir cruelteis thir two prīcis foresaid come huge • rmy riuer bane set • thair tentis two syndry cū panyi • nocht far seuerit fra othir▪ ye • yll quhare thair tentis lay sa strenthy yat na army micht cum yame industry ingyne man keipand gud array done irelād men ye fyne ye king • rego •• army production lang tyme suld laik vittallis nochtheles yair slichtis war vincust wisdō gregour ye scottis brocht sufficient vittallis breid cheis sustene yam l day vnderstud weil quhare euir yai com yai micht haif fouth watter thair drink gregour seing yt micht weil īuaid ennymes tuk ꝯsultation certane dayis quhat done ye mene tyme send iim mē ye bak mont fut within ye nicht ye fine yt al sone yai saw gregour inuading ye tētis ireland mē yai suld cast doun cragꝭ stanis yair bakis▪ quhilk way ye ireland mē suld othir suffir ītollerabi • dāmage elli ꝯstranit geif batal quhe socht lāg auisement quha suld tak yi charge hand • nane sa abil yairto kēneth thane carrik▪ yi kēneth come ouir riuer bane within ye nicht bak montane foresaid ane difficile strait gait morow al sone ye ireland mē maid yam al yair power resist ye inuasion gregour yair fel sa huge cragis stanis • n yair bakis vnprouisitly behynd yame yat yai war constranit leif yair tentis fle eft ye im yam war slane ony straik incontinent scottis followit lāg chais brocht ane huge nowmer prisoneris kyng gregour ye mene tyme ye tentis brennꝰ war tane hym self foūd slane straik ane stane corneliꝰ tothir capitane heirand sic displeseir fallyn cumpanion fled al folkis dublyne gregoure seand beginning succeid sic felicite cōmandit folkis scharp incursionis bring ye bestial gudis yat thay micht get thair sustentation abstene fra fyre slauchter cōmādit thaym na iniure agit men wiffis barnis bryng rank men quhom thay fand thair gai • presoneris mony yir ireland pepill seand ye kyng mercyfull randerit thaym yair munition guddis wer plesandlie ressauit gregoure seand army weil stuffit vittallis na iniure ennymes apperand laid ane strait sege town dongard eftir yt lyne certane day ye sege thairof wes randerit him▪ nochtheles tuk bot ane sobir money fra ye cietezanis ī redēption yair lyuis guddꝭ quhē gregor lyne iii day dōgard left ane buschemēt mē keip ye said toun past wt remanent army sege ye toun pontꝰ becaus wes randerit hym ony straik cō mandit na pray guddis tane fra thaym wes gregour reddy pa sege town dublyne quhen • ithingis come hym cornelius tothir capitane wes cumand infinit noumer pepill nocht ten mylis fra army gregour heirand thir nouellis left purpos arrayit folkis nixt planis ye morow apperit thre battallis ireland men sycht ye first wes lycht bodin men arch • aris castaris dartis slongis▪ secound wes stout men armit coitis mailȝe lang swerdis▪ thrid battall wes cornelius nobillis irelād sworne fecht manheid curage deith armit lang swerdis billis axis ledyn mellis gregour seand ordour ennymes aganis cōmandit ane buschement lang speris sette archearis quhome mony ireland men wer borne dynt thairof ground cornelius seand folkis put abak yi way cōmandit gret clamour cut speris quhen wes rasyng visare heumōt exhort folkꝭ eirnistlie fecht wes hurt face ane speir constranit pa feild throw quhilk remanent army gaif bakkis followit slauchter chace▪ wes afore battall continewit still thaym quhill yai wer chasit within ye wallis dublyne ireland men wer sa brokin battall thay mycht assembill na army tymes cumyng aganis scottis morow gregoure beltit town dublyne strang sege town wes sa gret noumer pepill wes constranit seik peace sum thaim alliegit honest wes ische ieoperd thaym extreme chance fortoun subdewit empire scottis otheris seand gret trubill slauchter wes cumand yame last battall dred gyf yair nobillis wer presentlie distroyit se vter euersion yair realm thairfore send bischop cormach ane man singulare prudence kyng gregour desiryng hym haue miseratioun thaym thair town saif thair ȝoung prince duncane quhome ye crown ireland iustlie pertenit schew vailȝeant campionis suld haue respect weill thair honour proffet al wes na honour mak conques ane ȝoung knycht town wes cōmand ye cuntre thairfore prayit hym auyse quhiddir wes erar office ane kyng defend rycht princis townis se thaym brocht vter euer •• oun▪ kyng gregoure answerit cuntre gide samyn iustice attour na inglismen britonis danis without cōduct salbe ressauit ireland • elandmen swore glaid cheir fulfyll thir poyntis plesādlie becaus gregour wald nocht vsurp ye vale quhare slane fechtand deith ye vter distructioun fay buryit colmekyl ix ȝeir • egne fra ye incarnation ixcl • viii ȝeris yi ilk ȝeir deceissit edmond king englād efter quhom succedit eldrede ¶of king duffus▪ hovv vvas 〈◊〉 vvith gret infirmite vvichecraft hovv punist certane conspiratouris vvas slane ca iiii efter deith kyng indulphe ane conuentioun maid scone quhilk duffus sonne malcolme ye first wes • king culyne son indulphe maid prince scotland lord cumbir duffus efter coronation went il • callit afore hym th •• thairof maid ai • h gyf thay dā tit theuis within thair boundis punis thaym na le principall misdearis thanis ilis dreidand seue • tie king tuk mony sornaris vaga •• ndis lymmaris cu • tre put yame deith thus war remanent thir 〈◊〉 pepyll constranit fle ireland elli seik sum craft wyn thair leisting ȝit syndry nobyllis tuk indignation thair freindis quhilkis war cumyn nobyll blu • e suld cōstanit seik yair leisting vile craftis cōmonis quhilkis war borne seru • tude war preseruit yame ī honouris dignite thocht thairfore ye kyng vnworthy regne aboue yame murmuration ilis bot syndry partis realme mene tyme king duffus fell ane heuy maledy vnknawin medcinaris yai day onely trublit ylk day new dolour bot resoluit ane continewal sweit micht get na rest sleip attour maledy ye mair admiration aynd proceding fra vitale spreitis schew hꝭ blude dew proportioun soft pul • nochtwithstandyng grew sa leyne yt body semit haistely euanis medcinaris disparit lyfe knawyng na remeid aganis infirmite began plesand wordis mak hym ꝯsolation sayng suld reuert spring ȝeir quhen euery thyng natural influence conualescis kyng disparit finaly heil send al capitanis ye tribis prayit yame haue sic sicht thair honor cōmoun weill nochtwithstandyng infirmite realme micht gouernit ī peace iustice capitanis ꝓmittit al thingis desirit nochtheles thair rais ylk day continewal slauchter reif 〈◊〉 partis realme mair trubil may rehersit ye medcinaris inhibit yir displesouris schawin kyng auenture tuk sic malācoly yairthrow mycht haisty deith ye • ne tyme rais ane murmour amang cōmonis kyng wes nocht trubillit natural infirmyte bot onlie deuilry craft wichis quhilkis gret noumer wes fore ane town murray al sone kyng wes informyt heirof send sindry wyse craftye men serche th • verite thairof yir men quhilkis wer send yi effect schew thaym send treit concord betuix ye king ye murrayis euin thay entrit ye castell fore schew doneuald capitane thairof ye cause yair cumyng prayit hym serche deligently gif sic thingis ye fame schew wes verite capitane gat finalie experience treasoun ane soudiouris quhilk douchter principall wiche lamen gart hir reueil quhat hous town wichecraft wes vsit thā kyngis seruandis ane cumpany soudiouris enterit samyn hous quhare thir wichis wer fand ane ymage wax maid similitude duffus drepād ane treyne speit afore fyre fand ye wichis infundyng certane liquor ye ymage othir charmes vsit ye effect soudiouris tuke thir wichis incōtinent brocht thaym ymage castell quhair thay confessit sa lang walx meltit afore ye fyre king duffꝰ wes resoluit perpetual sweit sa lang thay ȝet said liquor ymage suld neuir sleip fra walx wes meltit away ye kīg suld de ye wichꝭ wer demādit quha lernyt thaym sic craft quha solistit thaym samyn thay answerit thay craft ye deuyl bot murrayis solistit thaym sla ye kyng ye ingyne ye capitane brak ymagis brint thir wichis said ye samyn nycht yt thir wichis wer tane wyse ye town fore kyng duffus wes deliuerit maledy nocht onlie tuk gud rest ye nycht bot wes restorit heil neuir bene vexit ony infirmyteis ye morow come murray punis certane rebellis ye conspirit aganis maieste maid sic deligēt persute thaym ro caithnes othir partis quhair thay fled yt thay wer finalie brocht fore iustifyit amāgis quhom wer slane sindry kynnismen freindis doneuald capitane said castell fore howbeit thay con • irit mair otheris yair awin persuasioun executioun iustice mouit doneuald sic hatrent ye slauchter freindis determit gyf mycht fynd sufficient oportunite sla kyng nochtheles dissimilie ire ane time▪ wyfe seand hym ilk day melancolius demādit ye cause displeseir last lāg franyng wyfe schew quhat schame ye king done hym faithful seruice puttyng freindis maist vile deith yi wife wes ane woman vnmercyfull cruel • e hauād na le hatrēt yan hir husband aganis ye king sindry hir freindis wer iustifyit ye samyn maner throw quhilk hir vēnomꝰ ire wes boldin euery day wt mair indignation knawing quhom scho micht opin ye samyn bot quhen scho vndstude hir husband ye samyn intentioun scho exhortit hym gud cheir ꝓmittit fynd ye way iniuris mycht best reuēgit sayng king wes oftymes familiarly lugit yame mycht • saly punist doneuald wes inflāmit thir wourdis aboue hatrent abiding na thing b • sufficient oportunite sla ye king becaus ye king wes depart ye morow doneuald set hym deligēce bring cursit purpos effect nycht following al sone kyng done deuotion wēt hꝭ chalmer fel sleip yan wes yi • euald sa enragit wt cruelte yt mycht get na eis quhil cursit mynd wes fulfillit incō • inent callit ye kingꝭ cubicularis ane bāket f • istit yame cōtinewallie quhil yai wer • ane ye wynis sa sop •• yt thay wer cōstranit tak rest hauand na suspitioun yi treason de • isit ye kingꝭ deith doneuald seyn • ye cubicula • sleip send four seruandis quhilkꝭ wer corruppit afore hꝭ money ye kingis chalmer finaly slew hym brocht body ony noyis ane postrain tw • mylis fra ye place quhair wes slane ane burn buryit ye myddis yairof quhair ye streme vsit pa syne put ane gret stane aboue body yat na thing suld appeir hid ye said place thir tratouris ye slew ye king fled ī orknay yt ye dee • corp suld schaw slayaris haldin amang w yt ye body ane slane man bledis afore ye slaa • quhiddir ye trew lat yame testifie yt he experiene thairof doneuald eftir ye slaucht ye kyng cause appeir innocēt yairof past residew nycht ye kingis gard schawing ye gret humaniteis done sindry tymes ye king ye morow skry r • amang ye familiarꝭ sayng ye king wes slane bed bullerand blud ye bodi tane away quhair na mā wist doneuald heirand ye noyis come ye chalmer ye remanēt cubicularis knawin na thing treason becaus saw bed bludy slew ye cubicularis yai bene gilty yairof ran vp doun ye castel like ane furiꝰ mā se gyf micht se ony taikin ye kingꝭ slaucht last fand postra •• opin iugit tha • •• ckirl • e yt ye cubicularis slane ye kīg yai ye keyis ye castel yair kepyng ye noblis richt astonist come haistely seyis terribil deid hauand admiration yt ye bodi wes tane away ya • ▪ hꝭ slaucht nochtheles sindry yame tuk suspitioun y• yi cruelte wes done doneuald becaus maid deligence serching ye auctoris treason aboue ye • oure iust affection sone eft yai returnit hame sex monethis eftir nothir son mone stern wer sene ye heuin bot ye lift ouircouerit ꝑpetual cloud ye gret trour ye pepil ¶hovv culyne prince scotland punist ye slaucht king duffus sindry vncouth meruellis sene ī albion ca v culyne prince scotlād lord cūbit rycht astonist yi perpetuall dirknes continewyng sa lang ye gret terrour pepill demandit noblis quhat mycht cause yairof quhom wes answerit yai beleuit god wes sa cō mouit ye slaucht ye nobill king duffus yat gif ye samyn wer nocht punist haistelie maist terrible vengeance wes follow thair realme incōtinēt culyne cōmandit general prayaris • asting done throw partis ye realme maid solempne aith neuir ceis quhill punist ye tresonable slaucht duffꝰ nocht lang eft come murray cūing maid ye murrayis rycht effrayit doneuald knawyng hym self gilty treason fled mouth tay • uhair pullit vp salis pa ī norroway wt hym ye slayaris kīg duffus ye mynd al cursit tyrānis natural inclination dreidꝭ euery creature schawis yame self criminabil othir vult cōtinance he ay sic • eir yair life y• yai gif na man credence bot eschewis al famꝰ cūpany cōfidis ī na thing sa mekil mirknes fleyng samyn maner doneuald schew fleing ye hid treason yt na man suspeckit gif abidin ye kīgis cūing yus wes brocht sic miserie yat quhair wes repute sū tyme familiar ye kīg lu • fer hꝭ cōmon weil wes haldin maist odius treasonabil cowart ye pepil seing hym fle suspition ye said treason prayt god send vengeance cūpany quhilk followit sone eft culyne heirand deꝑting tuke ye castel fore fand ī doneualdꝭ wife thre douchteris eftir lāg inquisition scho cōfessit al ye maner deith body wes hid ye myddis ane streme wt circūstance said ye morow quhen ye pepil wes passād tak vp ye boby duffus tithingis come ye doneuald wt cōplicis wes schip brokin tane ye pepill punist offence sone eft cōmād culyne wes brocht iugement wife iiii seruādis put cruellie deid yair body quarterit hūgin sīdry townis yi realm exampil al pepil quhat iniqi te sla ane kīg ye takaris doneuald cōplicis wer onlie rewardit richely bot exemit fra al publik exaction tymes cuming sic thingꝭ done ye body kyng duffus wes tane vp brocht wt gret solēpnite colmekil quhair wes buryit said youcht kīg duffꝰ lay vi monethis vnd erd body wes al fresche cullour hide first hour wes hid fra body come aboue ye erd ye wedd chāgit maist serenite ane brig ye samin place quhair body wes hid beside quhilk ane abbay cestiꝰ ordour namit kyllos dedicat ye virgyne mary mony vncouth meruellis wer sene yi tyme albion hors eit yair awin flesche ane woman wes deliuer hir birth quhilk nothir eyne nose▪ fute ane sparhalk wes strāg • la • ane howlat maist wound nothir son mone sterne apperit sycht vi monethis bot y• lift ouircouerit perpetual dirknes haue schawin ¶of king culyne vicius life trubyl fel realme hi • euyll ministration ca vi doneuald slane yi maner culyne wes maid king ye ferd ȝeir king duffꝰ fra ye incartion ixclxxii ȝeris ye pepil beleuit y• suld haif bene ane nobil prince seand hym begyn sa souerane iustice howbeit litill virtew wes sene eft gouernit ye realm aduise noblis bot geuin rage ȝouth maist insolēt corruppit lyfe throw vice gaif occasion pepill grow wildar vnd empire yan euir ya • war vnd ony othir price afore finalie ye realme wes brocht sic poynt ye theuis reuaris • clik pepil wer onlie vnpunist bot greit
