estimation sa gret truble rais ilk day ye • untre ye gif ye samyn wer haistelie punist ye realme apperit cum vter rewine quhē culine rep̄ • ye yir mony othir enormiteis com yrow misgouernāce▪ maid litill excuse bot said ȝong mē wer lik ī ꝯditionis agit ꝑsonis yairfor ȝouth behuffit haue ane cours quhill wer stabillit proces tyme suld bedā • ouir gret seuerite bot moderat accordyng season yairof attour antecessouris indulphe duffus wer ouir se • eir administration iustice apperit ye end yair empire quhen thay intendit vnd culloure iustice oppres yair noblis conqueir yair landis guddis yai mouit thair noblis rebellion finall distruction yame self better wes yairfore regne fauoure beneuolence aboue noblis regne mānassing terrour▪ y• na othir way mycht nobillis haldin hꝭ opinion yocht answer king culyne wes vnproffitable cōmoun weil ȝit na man durst oppinly repreue euery man cōmendit gouernance speciallie yai y• haiti • iust pru • ēt men ye noblis seand ye kingꝭ familiaris ilk day insolēt na thyng done ye vtilite ye realme drew thaym fra ye court otheris bane flatteraris nurisari • vennom ȝoung ꝑsonis set yarne cō • inew ye king voluptuous life inducyng al thingis yt mycht affeminat mynd maist schameful vices▪ quhil last yi vnhappy prince wes brocht sic miserie yt sicht na thing bot onlie sensual plesouris cherist nane bot maist vicius vile lymmarꝭ nocht onlie deflorit sindry vncouth virginis matronis bot al fulȝeit awi • sisteris douchteris religious wemen also ane cūpany vicius herlottis thai na othir thing bot espyit quhair yai micht se ony plesand virginis matronis ye yai mycht aduertis hym yairof finalie thay wer ay brocht hym othir weir peace ȝi • ane thyng followit miserable al sone ye king tane lust pleseir yir virginis causit vnhappy seruitouris deflore yam eft ye maner gif ony cōplanit yir odius cruelteis yai gat na othir amendis bot yair leggis army brokin yocht yi effeminat mō stour waistit body ouir frequent cumpany wemen ȝit tuke pleseir se familiaris conuers yame opinlie sycht wes abusit yi maner thre ȝeris continually throwe quhilk grew onlie ane defamit creature bot throw misgouernance rais al maner truble displeseir subdittis • reuaris sornaris oppressouris rais sic pissance yat na man durst punis yame gif ony man maid hym resist yame cōplene wes sone eft slane ellꝭ guddis confiscat bigingis brint nocht onlie temporal men bot al spretual wer heryit ye maner yair guddis ornamētꝭ tane force throw quhilk ye cōmonis landwart pepill leiffit mony ȝeris gret oppression miserie kyng culyne last throw surfet vnbridillit lust fel ī ane maist vile schamful infirmite nature slidyng ony pleseir ꝑsauyng throw maledy body visage grew ilk day attenuat leyne yt past ye residew dayis gret dishonour schame noblis nochtwithstādyng heuynes maid ane cōuention scone depriue hym auctorite cheis ane new kīg▪ al sone culine knew quhat wes diuisit aganis past ane quiet cūpany scone ye mene tyme cadardꝰ thane meffen met vnhappely ye gait slew becaus deflorit doucht afore end maid ye vicius tyrane culyne accordīg hꝭ cursi • lyfe▪ ye v ȝeir hꝭ regne fra ye īcarnation ixclxxvi ȝerꝭ wes buryit colmekill king kēneth ye iii gouernāce▪ • ison maid ye noblis▪ hovv cōstranit yame bring sindry theuis iustice ca vii culyne slane said kēneth bruthir kīg duffus wes maid king ye beginning empyre gret laubour bring ye pepil quhilk wes growin wyld necligence culyne virtews leuyng ane thyng daylie practicat amang w first ye noblis syne cōmonis followis ye maneris king gif ye kīg virtews ye pepil imitation inclinis virtew quhen vicius ye pepil ye samyn maner followis vicis king kēneth yt suld detest ye schamefull deformiteis otheris quhilkis wer apperād ī schew y• pepill ane chaist pīrce skairs fude liberal meik al doyngꝭ hating al scurrilite banist tauernaris drūkartꝭ scaffaris vane flecheouris hous nuris • concord baith vncouth domistik pepill▪ far haitit al sedition yat punist ye mouaris yairof ye deith sic affection ye cōmon weil yt na mā wes sufferit abid hꝭ court bot sa mony sufficiēt virtew craftis wyn yair leuing yus wer subdittis nothir effeminat lāg sleuth ȝit irkit exercition gud werkis yi prince virtews gouernaunce wes reput maist worthy regne aboue pepil tuk purpos pa throw boundis realme punition theuis cūyng lanerk come sindry subdittis cōplanit mony importabil iniuris wrangis done yame sindry līmaris ye cuntre al sone thir lymmaris wer aduertist yat ye king wes sit iugemēt execution iustice ya • fled assistence ye noblis ilis ye king rycht cō mouit yt wes stoppit •• nobillis iustice supersedit displeseir ane tyme ye ȝeir nixt following maid ane general cōuētion hꝭ noblis scone ye nycht afore conuention hid ane noumer armit men ane quiet chalmer nocht far fra ye place quhare y• counsal wes set cōmāding yame secreit quhil yai wer warnit execute chargis cō mittit yame ye morow noblis wer ordourit yair conuention yair awin placis ay nerest ye king yai wer blud auctorite ye mene tyme yir armit mē yschit ye chalmer quhair yai wer hid stude ye counsall kēneth seand yame astonist said yi man̄ howbeit ȝe breid yt new gyse iugement aboue auld custome oure eldaris wy • e freind • succeid ȝour displeseir feir thir armyt men yt standis ȝow ȝit gif mind quhilk set na thīg mair yan ye cōmon proff • ȝour realme ȝow ar ordanit ony dāmage ȝow ye nobilite scotlād bot onlie ye • ckir targe cōmon weil beleue wyse freindis yt ony treasonable slychtis he brocht yi ga •• ȝour • distruction sen ȝe ar ye onli • esperāc • realme yairfore vnderstand thir armit men schawis na mannassing bot defence ȝour singulare cōmon proffet yair sindry euil • isposit ꝑsonis yi realme ay repugnāt ye weil yairof geuin thift reif slaucht birnyng siclik importable extorsionis ye pepil ȝe knaw quhat enormiteis he bene • baith ye tyme culyne begynnyng empyre ꝑpetuall euersion cōmonis ȝit ȝe knaw cōmonis thayr continewall laubour sustenis w ar richelie cloithit he al kynd costlie meitis yai ar purelie arrayit le •• skars fude sen haif al ye frute yair labouris think quhen thair guddis ar saif ar saif quhen yai ar heryit put pouer •• nane w ar eys thay wirk youcht ydill cōtine wa • ••• bour wynnis w rich ye frute • yair laubouris cumys w • ocht yame self thairfore quha • euis yame reuis w quha nu • isi • euis ī yair dāmage ar ennymes w cōmon weil yir reaso •• al sic importable iniuris inno • ent pepil suld inhibit onlie suld desyre sic thingis done 〈◊〉 ȝe suld desyre yame sume maner gif ȝe affeckit othir weil yi realm ȝour self ȝour wi • fis child deuysit ȝe remembir lane • k purge yi realme al misdoaris yat ye cōmonis noblis may nurist tymes cū yng peace tranquillite ȝit thir misdoaris cōtemption auctorite cōpe • iugemēt youcht knaw na thyng bett yair cōuoying away assistence gret men ȝit suꝑsed yi offence quhil oportunite occurrit howbeit mony ȝow wer sic kerlie informit wer ꝑticipant yait k •• h conuoyit yame fra iustice attour ye frequent message send betuix ȝow yir theuis makand 〈◊〉 • lig • ̄ce til bring yame iustice he maid ye mat credible noctheles quhat sume • ir way ye mat standis haue remouit suspitioun gyf haue ony aganis ȝow▪ haldis ȝow yi tyme fauoraris lymmaris bot erar defendourꝭ realm praying ȝow gif ȝe haif ī time bigane bene sleuthfull yan neid wes repair errouris ye ȝe may appeir luffarꝭ ȝour singulare cōmon weil first wyll y• ȝe bring yir theuis rebellis iustice y• yai may punist according yair demeritis promit ȝow ȝe sall deliuerit gard quhill se yame put deith ye haistelie y• ȝe put thir chargꝭ execution ye haistelie sal ȝe deliuerit boundage richelie rewardit ȝour laubouris noblis heirand yir wourdis fell kneis praying hym remyt offence done aganis maieste ꝓmittit onlie al chargꝭ desyrit bot remane quhair plesit quhill yair freīdis brocht yir mi • oaris rebellꝭ iustice sic thingꝭ • ne ye kīg brocht • nobillis str • ng gard ye castell bertha castell slude ap • n ye wait tay wes sa straitlie keippit yai dayis within wach wache yt na man gat ysche entres speciall licence ye kyng al vagabound ydil pepil quhilkꝭ wer f • nd ye gait wer brocht suspition castel ye noblis mene time wer occupyit reding historyis wes v •• sic hant dyse carus ar vsit finalie yai maid sic way extreme deligence yair freindis yai • c yir maist notable theuis wer brocht ye castell ber • ha hing • iebaitis yair bodyis inhibit tane doun gif exampill otheris quhat frute followys sic 〈◊〉 sic thingis done ye noblis wer deliu • rit exhortit ye kyng suffer nocht pepill iniurit sic oppressouris tymes cumyng scottis remanit mony ȝeris eft sicker peace ¶hovv ye danis inuadyng ye scottis vvith gret cruelteis vvar discomfist king kēneth hovv ye hayis tuk yair first beginning armes ca viii danys ilk day rageand ī hatrēt becaus th • muir sufficientlie reuengit frequent murdir maid yair freindis weris scottis arriuit wt ane gret flor albion wer determi • wes weil prouin ye end thair weris quhat sumeuir part albion yai arriuit remane thair continewall residēce othir force armes subdew ye realme yair empyre elli al atanis de yi flo • e danis arriuit ye reid brayis angus quhare standis ye abbay abi • brothok dedicat honour sanct thomas canterbery eftir ye ordour sanct benedict part ye danis gaif counsall land yir partis bot erar pa ingland ye scottis yat regioun wer rycht vailȝeant frequent battallis oftymes gret dāmage afore ye danis sen yi landis quhair thay wer new arriuit wer plenteus treis yan cornis wes proffitable ieoperde yame sa smal regionis contrarye landis ingland liand ye south wer riche pepill thairof geuin na thyng le cheualry mycht yairfor esaly subdewit forthir gif thay couat ony riche landis albioun ony extreme dangeir eftir following best wes pa kent otheris said yai wer arriuit 〈◊〉 albion onlie cōq ••• landis 〈◊〉 reuenge iniuris done scottis quhilkis wer ane bludy p • pill mair curius defence othir mennys guddis yair awin wes prouin ye last battal f • uchtin northumbirland quhen yai come support inglismen yairfore al sone yai ar cumyn kent yai salbe cōstranit fecht aganis inglismen bot aganis scottis contrar gif yai abaid scotland yai suld fecht • ne • lie scottꝭ yus wes best inuaid ye scottis first quhen ye scottis wer distroyit pa th • n recent victorie ingland commit ye remanēt chargi • chance fortoun danis wery lang truble seis applaudit yi last opinion landit finalie besyde montros onlie tuk ye toun bot slew al pepil tane brak doun wallis thairof ye groūd sone eftir yai come throw ye remanent boūdis angus ye firth tay ceissyng fra na maner cruelte yt mycht deuisit ye peple effrayit yir displeseiris com kyng kēneth wes striuelyng occupyit ī ministration iustice beleuyng na thyng le yan sic irruption ennymes inuaid realme eftir schort aduisement yat realme suld patent extorsionis cōmandit general edict al fensable personis meit hym ane schort day finalie ye day affixit come ane army ye mouth erne ye morow wes schewin y• ye danys wes cumyn ouir tay liand wt ane strāg sege ye castel • tha sic insu •• e • able cruelte ya • na kynd pepil townis ki • ki quhair yai wer maisterꝭ wer sauit king mouit yir iniuris rasit army maist deligence 〈◊〉 hꝭ ennymes ye nycht f • llowing come loncarte quhilkis ane town far fra tay ye • ni na thyng affrayit cumyng arrayit yame battal yan kēneth arrayit folkꝭ ane ganand pl •• e moue noblis hir curage spreit aganis yair ennymes dischargit yame mali dewiteis aucht hym v ȝeris cum syne promittit oppin proclamation gif ilk man ye brocht hym ye heid ane dane x • • ellꝭ land perpetually respondent yairto ef • ir maid orison god send army gud forto • theis erar māheid honour perseueir battall ye deith yan tane fleand schame displeseir scottis rasit yir wourdis 〈◊〉 esperāce victorie arrayit th • ym 〈◊〉 gud ordour malcolm duf pr • ce al scotland lord cūbir wes arrayit ye rycht wyng dūcane thane athole ye left wyng ye myd battall wes kyng kenneth tothir syde ye danis wer arrayit • ye fut ye hill far distant fra ye scottis ye armyis • ude lāg arrayit otheris sycht quhill last ye scottꝭ ouir feirs desyrus battall come incredible schoure dartis arowis ganȝeis ye danis▪ 〈◊〉 impacient sustene yi inuasion scottꝭ come forwart gret noy •• incōtinent baith ye armyis iuny • ony signe 〈◊〉 ▪ faucht sa fei • slie ye nane yame mycht sustene preis othir youcht lang bargane followit vncertane victorie ȝit na thyng wes impedimēt scottis yan yair desire haue heidis danis erar yan victory quhē yi knawin danis yai cryit schil voce othir haue victory al atanis de incontinent yai ruschit sic properant fard ye baith ye wingis scottis wer put flycht nochtheles ye myd battall resistit vailȝeantlie hail preis ennymes stud • army ī extreme dangeir mony ye scottis fled wer cruelli • slane danis day bene ye vter exterminion scottis wir ane land wart man namyt hay two sonnis strang rude bodyis howbeit thay wer maist nobill curage come haistelie support kenneth nobillis eftir thay wer neir vincust yair ennimes hay hauand na wapinnis bot ȝok ane pleuch seand myddilward quhair kenneth wes fechtand aganis ye danis nakit baith wyngis thocht na thyng sa honorable de vailȝeantlie amang sa mony nobill men▪ wes ane strait passage nocht far fra ye battall quhare gret noumer scottis wer slane miserabill • e • l • yng hay traisting na thing sa gud • stop fleyng scottis • aid strait passage two sonnis slew baith danis scottis quhom fand fleand ȝok ye mene tyme ane certane scottis quhilkis wer richt forcy vailȝeant cryit schill voce gud scottis men return • renew battal defence ȝour kyng realm auise quhiddir honest ieoperd ȝow wt gud chance defence ȝour prince schamfullie murdrest ȝour fleing hay two sōnis n • mit said ȝokis ple • ch ahaid strait passage con • ranit scottis quhilkis wer fleand return battal aganis yair ennymes ye danis astonist yair returnyng trai •• ing sum new army cūing yair • akkis le • chase scottꝭ maid yame return yair fo •• ꝭ yan ye scottis quhilkis war vincust afore war rasit wt new spreit curage ruschit feirsly yair ennymes pu • yame flicht gret slacht maid ī ye battal bot mair ye chace ye scottis gat thꝭ day ane gloriꝰ victory danis ꝑseuerant fechting ye noblis scotland ye mid battal ye deith▪ ȝit maist hono • succedit hay sōnis helpit win ye fe • ld eft yt discomfist ye scottis past ye nicht efter victory wt singing dansing incredibil blithnes ye morow kēneth gaif ye maist part al ye spulȝe yi battal hay sōnis ye remanēt yairof war deuidit rite armes amang scottis sic thingis done kē neth returnit ye castel bertha cōmandit yi hay sonnis clothit riche claithꝭ follow ye said castel bot hay na thīg desiring yairof come wt ii sōnis • yair auld rusty habit strinklit wt dust sweit battal samyn maner yai faucht reddy quhat chargis micht ye kingis pleseir ye pepil richt desirus se hay sonnis quhilkis yair singular māheid saiffit ye king ye realme stāding maist dāgeir ennimeis come gret multitude cō uoyit yam vphalda • ꝭ ye realm ye kingis palice hay accūpanit wt huge pepyll yi wise enterit ye kingꝭ palice b • rād ye ȝok schulderis ī ye maner faucht aganis ye danis sone eft ane couns • l set scone ī ye quhilk hay sōnis war maid nobil dotat yair singular virtew prouin ī yi feild wt sindry lādis sustene thair estait said yt askit fra ye king certane lādis quhilkꝭ knew richt plentuous afore liand betuix tay arole gar al mekil yairof ane falcon flew ane 〈◊〉 hād scholichtit ye falcō flew ane toun iiii mylis fra dūde callit 〈◊〉 lichtit ane stane quhilk ȝit callit ye falcon stane sa gat al ye lādꝭ betuix tay arole vi milis lenth iiii breid quhilk lādis ar ȝit inhabit posterite attour nane vailȝeant dedis suld peri bot ay remane recent perpetuall memory king kenneth gaif hym thre reid scheildis ane feild syluer beir maner armis place ye ȝok signify yt promouit fra smal obscure lynnage gret honourꝭ rich lādis attour yair rikit armes y• figour ye ȝok wt quhilk helpit ye scottis ī yair maist neid yi hay ar descendit mony nobyll vailȝeant men ay defēdouris yi realme quhais hous decorit sic auctorite yt constabill scotland ¶hovv king kēneth slevv ye prince scotland yat son micht succede ye crovvn ye message send sanct edvvard king kēneth kēneth •• orisoun maid noblis ca ix efter thir discōfitouris danis followit sindry cōtentionis yi realm ye men ilis tuk ane huge pray gudis ro nochyeles yai war al tane slane pepil ye cuntre al sone yi trubyll pecifijt followit ane othir angꝰ mernis greter motiō yair ane mā namit cruthneth quhilk gaderit kyngis • li ye landis angus liand betuix south esk north esk ane doucht namit fenel quhilk ane feirs vndantit mā hir son namit cruthlint yi cruthlint come ye castel delbogyn quhare gud schir insolence fel sic debait ane caus nocht ye ii seruādis war slane hym self narrowly eschaping wt hꝭ life • e • ft com fethircarn quhare met moder schew hir • iur • laitlie done hym scho na thing mesi • ire bot inflāmit hym sa • ar yt gaderit ane gret cumpany pepil ye mernys returnit within ye nycht said castel onlie slew gudschir bot left nane liue within ye said castel ye morow brocht ane gret pray guddis angus men angus impacient suffer thir heirschippis rais gret cū panyis maid heirschippꝭ slaucht mernis ye samyn maner • yng kenneth knawing • acill ye ingyne pepill wes rebellion quhen na punitioun wes maid thair eft beleuit gif thir attemptatis •• er nocht haistelie danti • sedi • ioun suld rise haistelie dāmage realme thairfore summond al yame yt wer suspiciꝰ cruelte baith ye mernis angus 〈◊〉 cōpeir scone ye xv day • ftir following vnderly ye law vnder panys rebellion becaus yai comperit kyng followi • yame sic diligence y• yai war al tane brocht donsi ••• ane cruthlint ye principall monaris • rubil war put deith yi executiō iustice brocht kyng kēneth knew fauour pepil wt sic affection ye nane yame wald heir suff •• ony detraction hym followit gret tranquillite quhil last ye xxii ȝeir regne prince sa lang decorit iustice cōmittit • ne maist schamfull slauchter quhilk appe • mair sichty yt life reput afore maist innocent geuyn ye cōmon weill ye blind immoderat affection yt son occasion yt slew poison malcolm duf prince scotland lord cū bir yt malcolme son • ht succede ye crown scotland ȝit na man beleuit ye sic cruelteis committit hym becaus al othir wayis apperit ane iust prince king kenneth efter deith malcolme prince send sindry kirkis funerall obsequies saule micht refrene fra teris quhen herd name spokyn nochtheles syndry ye noblis suspeckit hym ye princis deid persauyng hym dissimulat dolour exceding ye iust affection mynd ȝit becaus al thingis ar vncertane pepyll left yair suspition ye mene tyme sāct edward quhilkis efter martyrit stepmoder esculda send hꝭ ambassatouris kēneth schawing hym richt commouit deith malcolme prince scotland nochtheles sen pepyl ar mortal desirit yt two realmes micht ꝑseueir athir frēdschip efter ye tennour ye auld peace • heis ane • thir prince cūbir yat war wise • uri sar peace betuix ye two pepyl kē neth answerit na thing penitent ye band maid betuix inglismen wald ratify apprei • ye samyn tymes cumyng ye election ye prince schew yat wald conuent noblis morow cheis said prince prayit thai • fore thir ambassatouris return agane ye said morow yt thay micht heir quha war declarit prince scotland lord cumbir kēneth callit noblis ane counsall scone said wyse gif ȝe haue sicht ye weil realme ye tranquillite ye pepyl yairof lang perseuerāce tymes cumyng discreit wyse faderis necessar haue allanerly respect administration gouernance realme tymes bygane bot al ī tymes cumyng specially concernyng institution ȝo •• prince ȝe man consider quhat maneris quhat gouernance auctorite ••• cernis ane prince ingyne maneris al pepil ar mutabyl corespondent season occurris oftymes succeding worst new maneris requiris new lawis thairfore discrepant iustice concerning ye reparation errouris vse ye thing amāg w quhilkis institute reason lawis vsit al othir realmes yocht auld ritis war sum tyme plesand oure eldaris ȝit thay ar found vnproffitabyll ane law maid efter fergus ye first yat becaus sonnis maynus ferlegus war abyl gouerne realme yair tender age yat nerrest thair blud abyll iustice ye tyme suld king quhilk beand deceissit ye son king afore deceissit gif war abil suld succeid ony pley defendit samyn law eschew incōuenientis yat na chyldren tendir age sal succeid yocht law found proffitabyl sindry tyme apperis iugement contrarious noysum ye cōmon weil nurisand extreme hatrent amāg nobyl men ferithais secoūd king yat rang efter fergꝰ slane ferlegus howbeit said ferlegꝰ banist samyn caus endic ••• dayis misery thus succedit doubyl • aith ferlegus banist ferithais slane siclik cursit law followit displeseir realme quhē reuther maid king gret murdir baith scottis pichtus euerson thair cōmon weil quhilk brocht sic calamite efter murdir maist forcy campionis nobillite scottis pichtis war othir banist put seruytude youcht realme restorit auld stait ȝit followit frequent slauchter ye maist nobyl vailȝeant men realme throw quhilk onely realme haldin perpetual trubyl bot maist tender cosingis cōstranit suspition fecht amang yam self empire oftymes iust heritour crown slane men obscure lynnage brocht gret rich bot mony nobyll men put murdrist forthir throw yi cursit law al vailȝeant men war degenerat cowardis humyl men bludy mōstouris iust mē auaticiꝰ tyrānis liberall men gredy reuaris chaist men lichorus vela • inuading pepyl maist odious cruelteis amang othir skaithis quhilkis may nocht rehersit displeseir ȝoung chyldren quhilkis iust tytyll ye crown war murderit thaym realme gouernance quhen thay desyrit mercy yair faderis armes quhat cruelte quhat detestabyl fellonyis bene hard ony realme comparysoun sic thyngis bene done motioun cuesit constitution▪ thairfore maist prudent faderis prouide aboue thyngis cursit law quhilkis kingis son disherist iust heritage abrogat becaus samyn sa iniurius he nuri •• amang ȝow mony vnthankfull displeseiris contrar law god man irrecouerabyl dammage he brocht ȝour common weil neir vter euersyoun ¶suffer heirfore nane othir bot kyngis sonne regne aboue ȝow tymes cum sa lange he ane lyue efter vse • thir landis son ye king may immediatly succede nochtwithstāding quhat sumeuir age quhare throw ȝour cōmon weil may appeir gouernit nocht auctorite ane man bot haill pepyl ye fyne yat kyngis son may haldin tymes cumyng mair veneration ȝe mair luffit deir hym ¶hovv ye auld lavvis vvar abrogat kenneth cōcernyng ye election kingis n • vv lavvis contrar yame institute vision yat come hym • bed deith ca x quhē kenneth endit orison certane familiaris come amang ye noblis desi • ing yame cheis malcolme ye son • ē neth lord cūbir yt mycht ye way ye better cū ye crown efter faderis deid quhē ye noblis wer aduising degestly yi • er kenneth inquirit yame quhom thay desirit lord cumbir regent ye bordouris betuix inglismen scot • ye samyn tyme war ii nobil mē gret auctorite ye counsal yt ane namit cōstantine son kīg culme yi othir namit g • ime neuo king • ffus quhilkis war • ust heritouris ye crown efter kē neth ye auld lawis nochthelis feir yair liffis thay said wyll mak quho •• list prince cūbir bot al abragat ye auld lawis creat new institutionis ꝯforme purpos plesit ye residew ye noblis following vocis thaym declarit malcolme ye son kenneth lord cūbir howbeit ȝoung vnabyl beir ony auctorite ye morow yir ambassatouris ingland war depeschit ressauit ȝoūg malcolme mak obedience king edward ye landis cū • ir sic thingis done king kēneth aduis • noblis abrogat ye auld l • wi concernyng ye creation yair king maid new lawis maner followis ☞the king beand deceissi • eldest son eldest nepot notwithstāding quhat sumeuir age of▪ youcht war born efter faderis deith sal succede ye crown ¶the nepote gottin kingis son salbe preferrit nepot • gottin kingis douchter ¶on samyn maner nepote gottin ye kingis bruthir salbe preferrit ye nepot gottin sister ¶the samyn lawis salbe obserui • amāg al otheris noblis yi realm succession thair heritage ¶quhen ye king ȝoung ane nobil man gret prudence auctorite salbe chosin gouernour ye realme quhil ye king cumyn ye age xiiii ȝeris quhilk ȝerꝭ beand •• trun king salbe fre gouerne realme awin auctorite ¶all othir heritouris sal succede yair faderis heritage efter ye ysche xxi ȝeris within ye tyme thay salbe gouernit yair curatouris quhil ye ȝeir run thay sal admittit clame thair heritage ☞¶kenneth trai • ing realm sta • illit hym posterit • thir lawis gouernit commonis gret iustice 〈◊〉 noblis donatioun landis guddis fauour youcht rep • richt happy sindry opinio •• ȝit maist vnhappy hym self euir dredand mynd yat ye innocent slauchter malcolme duf quhom afore poisonit suld 〈◊〉 sū tyme licht wes sa ful susp • tiō yt beleuit quhen • ny man r • undi • fallow thay spake euyll hym geuyn nature ylk creature yt quhen gylty ony hor • ibyll cryme impulsion cōscience īterpret euery thing yt se • sū terrour self samyn maner yocht kēneth realme gud tranquillite ony inuasion ennymes ȝit gret trubyll mynd last quhen lyand bed hard ane voce apperit sū vision say hym maner kēneth beleif yt ye cursit slaucht malcolme duffe hid god thow vnhappy tyrane quhilk desire ye crown he slane ane innocent inuading thy nichtbour treasonabill murdir quhilk thow wald haue punist maist rigour gif bene done ony othir person thy self yairfor thow he incurrit sic hatrent god yt baith thow thy son salbe haistely slane sindry thy noblis ar • spirit thy deith traisting quhē thow yi son ar slane reiose ye crown yair pleseir ye king sa affrayit voce yt past ye remanent nicht wt gret noy displeseir morow maid confession gud repentance 〈◊〉 ane haly byschop namit mou • ane confessit ye cryme ye samyn maner done moueane heirād hym penitēt ꝑsuadit pēnance said yocht offēce odius god mercyful finaly king kēneth coūs • l yi haly mā begā sindry werkꝭ piete left nocht vndone ye pertenit ane • rist • prīce last wēt fordoun quhilk ane town mernis quhare palla • ius ye blissit appostyll scottis lyis haldin ī gret veneratiō quhen done pylgrymage come ye castell fethircarn lugit fenella lady yairof yi fenellla ane tender cosingnace malcolme duf afore slane kēneth al cōstantine grine quhilkis sum titil ye crown attour scho extreme hatrent aganis kēneth ye slaucht hir son cruth • ynt quhilk slane afore iustice womā rageant ire aganis kēneth causis aforesaid couth rest bot deuisand alwayis scho miche maist esaly sla kyng becaus scho knew mynd kenneth geuyn magnificent bygyng polesy scho brocht hym ane toure ye said castel quhilk thekit copper win maist subtyll muldry sindry flouris ymagerijs ye werk sa curius yt excedit al ye stuf yairof toure apparalit inwth riche tapestreis gold sylk behynd thaym war crosbowis bendit ganȝeis reddy schute middes thꝭ hous ane ymage bra maid ye similitude kenneth ane goldin apill hand sic ingyne yt al sone ony man maid hym throw yi apill ye hand ye ymage wrying samyn drew • ituppis crosbowis vp ani schot hym yt threw ye apill al sone kenneth brocht toure ī maner foresaid na thing knawing ye treason deuisit subte • womā ye duris beand closit nane hym bot yi lady began eft yt visijt sindry meruellis wtin yi toure inquyre quhat yi ymage apyl sygnifiit yi ymage said scho maid similitude ya • ye pepyll may vnderstand quhat reuerence affection bei • yairto yi goldin apill sa mony precious stanis ord • nit geuyn ye signe lufe yairfore ressau • maist hartly ben • uolence • king threw apyll haue tane • ▪ ye thrawīg thairof drew vp • e tituppis ye crosbowis incōtinēt ane yame schot throw ye body fenella seand ye king slane lokit ye dure rā ye ȝet quhare scho gat hors fled away ye king • seruā dis abaid lang cūing quhil last yai brak ye dure fand bullerand ī blud king kenneth slane yi wise ye xxv ȝeir hꝭ regne fra ye incarnatiō im ȝirꝭ ¶of king constantine ye iiii sindry meruellis sene albion hovv cō stantine malcolme cōtendit crovvn hovv inglismē danis vvar aggreit malcolme lord cūbi • hovv constantine kēneth recountering othir set battalvvar baith slane ca xi kēneth slane yi vncouth wondful slicht cōstā tine son kyng culyne com ane gret power freindis scone tuke crown yi tyme war sene mony meruellis albion stanis ranit baith france albion ane infinit nowmer fische foūd deid ye sandis buchquhane pair corruppit pestilentius odour infeckit ye aire ye gret morta •• te pepill▪ ye mone sene terribyll bludy ye frute cornis throw insufferabil heitis ye symer failȝeit al • ti ye realme sone eft followit sic derth ye war ye fische sw • ne wt mair habundance y• ȝei • thā thay war wont ye pepil bene uterly perist ye scottis astonist thir othir vncouth plagis dred gret calamiteis cū yame gif yair lyuis war ye mair haistely amen ••• yocht ye nobil precheourꝭ mo •• ane medane blaane mony othir excellent doctouris exhortit dayly pepill penāce yair 〈…〉 na p̄ching feir terribil plagis nicht caus yame detest yair cursit lyuis bot ylk day offending god mair offence throw quhilk intollerabil affliction ilk day aboue othir come ī scotland w • sene eft malcolme son kēneth prīce cūbir heirand ye cōstantine maid king aganis lawis laitly maid fader gaderit freindis ane coūsall aduise quhat way micht best recouer ye crown sū yame thocht best feil ye mindis noblis yai procedit ony forthir aduenture quhē beleuit • rast delyuer hym al dāgeir bring hym self gret trubil heuy dāmage baith priuat cōmon weill otherꝭ coūsal hym inuaid cōstātine war maid strāg ī auctorite cōstantine sindry hym ye tyme quhilkis wald leif hym bot brīg hym boūd ennymes quhē yai saw tyme malcolme following yi last counsal come wt xm mē louthiane ye tothir syde kyng cōstantine gaderit ane army sic pissance yt chasit malcolme cūbir thꝰ malcolme comin maist schamful ꝯfusion war kēneth bastard br • thir come wt ane gret power striueling stoppit ye army cōstā tine pa ouir forth thꝰ rais gret derth hūger ī baith ye armyis king cōstantine la • k vitallis micht follow fortoun bot constranit wt gret indignation skaill army thꝰ ye realme deuidit sindry factionis followit sa yt hand incursionis heirschippis slauchter al ꝑtis yairof yt micht haue bene sufficient document al pepil vē geance sorow fallis ciuyll weris landwart pepyll weris war brocht sic pouerte heirschip th • ir la • w • le • 〈◊〉 〈◊〉 finaly 〈◊〉 trubil rais sa fast • n othir y• infinite slach • e • •• extorsionis war done al maner cruelte yt micht deuisit ony esperance bett fortoun quhil ye scottis war sic trubil sāct edward kīg inglād neir vterly opprest werꝭ danis ꝯstranit redeme ye liberte pepil wt infinite money becaus yair tyranny ceissit ye way tuke purpos inuaid yam battal solistit malcolme prince cūber cū wt • ne army hꝭ support cūing army ye danis war sa astonist yt yai cōdiscendit haue peace yi maner kīg edward sal pay ane pundꝭ striueling ye danis ye danis sal stand cōtent wt ye lādis conquest afore ye tyme fra inglismen sall inuaid na forthir bot stand gud freindꝭ tymes cūing debait yam aganis yair ennymes quhil ye danis inglismē war yi appointmēt king cōstātine traisting find sufficient oportunite bring ye boūdis scotlād vnd empire becaus ye prīce cūber implicat sic weris danis come xxm mē louthiane quhilk stude ye tyme vnd dominion ye said prince lord cūbir kēneth ye bastard foresaid quhilk left bruthir ye prince cūbir resist ye werꝭ kīg cōstantine come haistely ane army crawmond skarsly war baith ye armyis iunit togidder quhē suddanly rais ane vehement wynd ī ye eist blew ye sand wt sic preis ye face king cōstantinis army ye nane yam micht hald vp yair heidis aganis yair ennimes sa army finaly discōfist eft maist lamētabill murdir maid athir side cōstātine kēneth met togidder singular battall war baith slane kīg cōstātine slane ī thꝭ maner ye iii ȝeir hꝭ regne bur • ī colmekyl fra ye incarnation ane mii ȝerꝭ▪ ¶of king gryme gret trubyll yat fell betuix hym malcolme prince cumbir cōtentioun crovvn hovv thay vvar finaly aggreit ca xii grime nepot king duf heirand vnhappely king cōstātyne kēneth war slane crawmond gaderit ye residew k • ng cōstantinis army come scone quhare crownit tēnour ye auld lawis al sone gryme tane ye crown maner intertenit ye freindis cōstantine maist liberalite pleseir micht ꝯquest fauour beneuolence pepyll mony sindry wayis fynaly stabyll ye crown hym mair sicker firmance rewardit sindry freindis malcolme landis rich otheris quhilkis war hym repugnant cōfiscat yair guddis halding thaym ennymes cōmoun weill malcolme prince cumbir richt sorowfull ye gryme tane crown wise callit freindis ane counsal aduise mater dissimilit mynd regardit power gryme ȝit mony freindis persuadit hym cōtempne hꝭ ennyme sindry ye noblis assistit opinion yairfore coū salit hym contend aganis gryme erar wisdome pissance geuand hꝭ labour gif micht draw noblis fra mynd malcolme thair counsall send secret seruandis ye noblis ye war wt grime▪ prayit yam kepe yair faith promes maid fader kēneth assist sa hym gud mater yt lawis laitly maid cōcerning ye election prīces abrogat ambitiō ye tyrane grime ꝓmittit gif yai abaid opinion gouern ye realm sic felicite yt al occasion debaitis suld mesit yair pleseir mony ye noblis yi message left king gryme solistit thair freindis ye effect othe • ꝭ tuk thir seruandis malcolme send yame bound tratourꝭ gryme quhō put ī prison malcolme mouit wt yir iniuris come wt ane army aganꝭ grime ȝit becaus aduertist ye grime cumād aganis wt mair nowmer pepil thā cōmādit vnd pane deith yt na mā cōmon ressau • wtin hꝭ army quhil yai war first brocht p̄sence yi wes done wisdom malcolme yt army suld • duertist ye huge ordināce aganis • ame nochyeles fame rumat quhilkis incressis ay mair mair fre • ue • passage maid ye thing maist 〈◊〉 hꝭ army quhilk desirit maist hid forthir schawin ye sic • reason ī army y• gif ȝeid forthwart suld fecht na le aganis yame ye war ī army thā aganis ennymes yi rumo• rais marchādis quhilkꝭ mair knawlege chāging yair gudis thā ony craft cheualry yir marchandꝭ becaus gret nowmer yam yi army nakit armour wappinnis desirit licence pa malcolme becaus thair desire denyit▪ yai fillit al ye army ful mur • yng dolour yir wordis dredo• marchādis al ye capitanis quhilkis war ī malcolmis army war affrayit yan malcolme seād capitanis astonist thocht ꝓffitabil • ieopard yame vnd sic dredour y• chāce battal yairfore 〈◊〉 coū sal familiarꝭ eschew ye p̄sent dāgeir sufferit ye marchād pa hame abaid ye watt forth wt certane houshald gent • lmē stop ennymes cū ouir ye watt quhil sic infinite trubyl ī scotland fothadꝰ bischop yairof ane man prouin virtew clemence seād ye pepil infestit thꝰ ciuil werꝭ grime malcolme drawand ye b • dy ye realm ī sindry opinionis went ane cūpany p̄latis solempne ꝓcession vnd yair habitꝭ kīg grime quhom ressauit reuerence inquirit quhat erādis mouit hym cū sic gise quhō answerit cūin seruand crist ye geuar lord peace make intercession ye tyl haue miseration piete ye gret trubil fallin yi realm sen god he maid ye prince thairof sa mony syndry motiuis debait sproutis ī yt sal fail bot gif yow ꝓuide mair haistely remeid haue ane miserabil rewine ye ciuil weris ar sa frequent ī yi realm yt yai haue broch • ꝭ samyn sic calamite yt nocht haboūdis bot cō tinewal reif slauchter baith noblis cōmonis apperādly ye weir dis war determit bring yi realm nocht allanerly mischeuous ꝑsonis limaris ar vnpunist bot autorist yair iniquite nane may remane ī awin hous bot day slane herijt gudis insicht vnderstād surely sa lāg yir odiꝰ ꝯtentionis regnis betuix y• malcolme na iustice polecy sal appeir ī yi realm na trāquillite sal follow na end salbe put sic mischeuis quhill thow finaly agreit wt malcolme ȝit wyl yow plesād stand counsal dout bring al materis gud fine yir reasonis nobil prince haue miseration ye gret trubil falling yi pepil quhilkis ar brokin wt mair calamite thā micht mou • maist cruel tyrānis pietuous teris gif na afflictiō yi realm pepil may moue yt reuth ȝit haue cōpassion yi self quhilk may haue na sicker 〈◊〉 quhē yi pepyl ar perist king gryme mouit yir wordꝭ āsuerit yt wald condiscend haue peace sa war degrading honour kīg ye auld lawis vsit sa mony hūdreth ȝeris ī yi realme thair fore wald seuer ye croun bot fecht ye samyn aganis malcolme al ye war opinion ye end life nochyeles gif malcolme wald skaile army stand cō tent wt ye lādis cūbir wt purpos inuaid hym wt na lāger battal wald heir peace othir wayis suld ꝑseueir ī battal aganis hym quhil ye richt war decernit ye swerd fothadus prait ye king ceis ane litil fra al malice quhil sene ye mynd malcolme micht happin yt micht brīg al materis gud purpos gif ony yame sicht cōmon weill eft yi fothadꝰ went malcolme striueling quhare lāg orison lamētit ye gret trubil falling ye pepil sedition yir ii prīces quhē schawin quhat mi • rabil end micht follow yairapō brocht malcolme sic point yt cōtent pa ī cūbir sa ye king gryme wald skaile army king grime refusit yi appointment traisting ꝑseueir ye empire quhilk socht afore wt sa huge dā geir incōtinent skailit folkis come forfar aduise freindis quhat done yi mater ye mene tyme fothadꝰ ye bischop maid cōcord betuix yame yi maner king grime sal reiose ye crown life eft deith ye crown remane wt malcolme ye nerest blude ꝑpetually ony pley yt foūd efter repugnant ye pointis yi peace salbe haldin ennyme ye cōmon weil attour al ye lādis liand betuix louthiane northūbirlād betuix clid westmureland sal cū p̄sently vnd ye dominion malcolme sall stand gud freind king grime al materis gif abaid yi appointmēt ony thing p̄iudice yairof sall baith tyne ye lādis geuyn hym yi appointment ye crown fra posterite quhē yir ii prince war sworne ī straytest forme ye mycht deuisit obserue al pointis ī yi cōtract yai scalit yair cūpanyis set yair myndis repare ye trubyll falling pepyll yair deuision followit gud peace mony ȝeris efter hovv gret novvmer danis vvar slane slicht inglismē ye orison maid king gryme ye noblis hovv vvas slane malcolme prince cumbir ca xiii quhill sic thingꝭ war ī scotlād eldred maid king ingland deceis brothir sanct edward yi eldred sufferit gret oppressionis danis quhilkꝭ yair weris intendit sit yair wiffis childrē freindis ī realm finaly yai wrocht sic heirschippis cruelteis al ꝑtis quhare yai come▪ yt nothir peace ȝit yair faith afore ꝯtrackit virtew sacrament micht caus yame leif ī peace yus apperit na thing mair sicker thā plane euersion ye realm ingland kīg eldred ceis yi cruelte set ane coū sal noblis ye quhilk deuisit secretly sla al ye danis ye war ingland ane day yi subtell slicht cumin finaly hand war ye danis war aduertist yairof eschewit murdir deuisit aganis yame nochyeles mony yame wer slane ye samyn way ye residew danis quhilkꝭ war eschapit fra murdir mouit ye slauchter yair freindis garnist al strenthis castellis quhare yai ony boundꝭ wtin ingland send sueno king denmark support reuenge ye treason done thaym gyle inglismen▪ quhil sic thingis war done ingland king grime affluēce rich lang peace degenerat fra liberalite chais • lyfe maist corruppit auaricius lyuing quhē slane sindry noblis scotland oftimes occur • ꝭ cō ques yair lādis gudis opprest ye pepil ylk day mair tyrāny ye pepil knawing na mortal iuge aboue hym punis cruelte eft lang regrait insufferabil iniuris sustenit yame fel kneis makand inuocatiō god ye punisar syn haue piete yair affliction change ye realme sū bett gouernance▪ ye noblis hauand gret indignation lyk wise ye trubil fallyng baith yam • yair cōmonis send ane certane g • ntyl mē ambassatouris kīg gryme ꝑsuading hym yair name deuoid hym vnhappy mischeuous limmaris quhō ouir gret cōfidence apperit ye dāmage cōmon weill ane •• ambassatouris quhō ye charge geuyn said yi maner w • quhilkis ar ane part thy noblis ouir trew yi crown ar cumyn ꝑsuad ye gif may ye weil thy self yi realme vnknawin ye richt nobil prince quhat infinite calamite trubil he bene done yir sindry ȝerꝭ thy legꝭ insaciabyl auarice yir vnhappy mischeuous lī mari thy seruādis ye schame displeseir heirof may weill excusit bot redoūdis ay thy maist dishonor sleuth heirfore sen yi pleseir distribute al officis auctoriteis wtin ye realm yow mā respōd ye crimis iniqui • eis done thy secuādis aganis thy legꝭ • bdittꝭ ye swerd geuin y• enriche magnify theuis tratouris ȝit inuaid trew innocent pepill bot punis gilty mischeuous lī marꝭ war bett yi pepil deid ye cōmon voce • thā leif sic dayly trubyll yai leif iniure yame yt suld yair defendourꝭ heirfore exhort yt remoue al yir vnhappy tyrānys thy coūsalouris gouern ye realm cōmon weill wt sic felicite thy eldarꝭ he done afore think vnganand sa lang ar lyue gif yow wyl rewlit w yt thy subdittis suld opprest othir tyme weir peace sen haue bene euir reddy defend yt wt bodyis gudis bot ony regard lyuis yairfor schaw thy self ane iust prince cast yt luffit wt yame quhō yow desiris yi freindis vnderstand y• ane iust kīg makis cietezanis obeisant ony rebellion debait quhē king gryme answerit wt dissimi • fenȝeit wordis yir ambassatouris callit yam ane bāket purpos haue put yame prison nochtheles yai war aduertist yairof fled wt swift hors bertha quhare ye remanent noblis war assēblit ye tyme king gryme mouit thir wordis bot traisting ilk thing succeid sic felicite afore gaif hym lust insolence ceissyng fra frequent exactionis scurge legis quhil last aduertist yt noblis war rebellit aganꝭ incōtinent rasit baner come gret nowmer pepil inuaid yame y• war repugnant yan followit mair trubyll euir sene ī albion ye castellꝭ war cassin doun ye townis brint ye cornis distroyit ye pepyl slane kirkis yair deuotiō sic cruelteis trubil causit malcolme prince cūbir cū inglād fra ye werꝭ danis scotland cumyng al pepyll specially ye hatit grime come hym releiffit ye cruel tyrānijs done thaym said borne weil hym self bot sum part weil freindes cuntre discendit nobyl blude hauand rich manheid support cuntre quhen tyme occurrit delyuer thaym ye odius tyrant gryme quhilk • eand done thyng mycht succede hym plesit malcolme mouit thir ꝑsuasionis come gret nowmer pepyll aganis king gryme al sone gryme aduertist thairof gaderit folkis mycht get tyme fynaly baith armyis set thair tentis fornens othir town auchnabart ye ascension day king grime traislīg malcolme mycht esaly vincust yat geuin mair deuotion thā ony cheualry solēpnite ye day come forthwart al power brek ye day nochtheles malcolme weil informit purpos efter requestit hym howbeit ī vane desist fra battall reuerence ye blissi • day baith armyis ruschi • togidder ye first meting gret slaucht bot last kīg grimis army vincust put flycht said yt king grime tane fechtād gret ferocite manheid efter strikin mony bludy woūdis heid baith eyen war put quhen leiffit certane dayis wyse mesirie dolour deceissit ye ix ȝeir regne buryit colmekyl fra ye incarnation imx ȝeris ¶of king malcolme ye secoūd hovv sueno king norrovvay vvith doubil victory chasit kyng eldred ingland normādy opprest inglismen vvith gret cruelteis ca xiiii malcolme efter yi victory callit sindry noblis quhilkis war takin prisoneris yi time p̄sēce eft yt tretit yam wt gret humanite schew yame yat iust heretour ye croun scotland faucht aganis weil yairof bot allanerly releif ye pepil ye tyrāny gryme ye xv day efter ane ꝯuention maid scone quhare al ye nobilite scotlād beand p̄sent malcolme declarit yt wald ressaue ye croun scotland quhil ye lawis maid afore hꝭ fad kēneth war approbat ye noblis sworn neuir cū ye ꝯtrar yairof sic thingis beand grātir malcolme crownit ye fatal chiar marbil maid sic ꝯcord noblis yt al occasion hatrēt seditiō set aside eft coronatiō delt hꝭ office ꝯcerning ciuil actiōis yan • ye war maist resoluit ī ye lawis▪ othir office ꝑtening cheualry war geuin maist vailȝeāt capitanꝭ throw quhilk followit bett iustice thā sene mony ȝerꝭ afor quhil ye empire scottis gouernit ī yi maner sueno kīg danis ariuit ī britane gret nauy reuēge ye iniu • done afore inglismē yi sueno efter coronation writtin ye history danis wrocht sic punitiō cruelte cristin pepyll yt subdittꝭ war cōstranit renūce ye cristin faith returnit yair auld suꝑstit • oni nochtheles cruelte lang vnpunist eft iust punition god thris tane prison •• ennymes thris ransonit infinite money finaly brokin sa frequent incursionis doung realme alanus king norroway al sone sueno banist wyse come scottis desyring support recouer realme scottis hauand compassion calamite brocht hym first sacrament baptisme finaly supportit hym sic maner r • storit kyngdome sueno sone efter yt restorit realme come ane army danis norowanis suessis gothis uandalis frisonis ingland chasit kyng eldrede northumbirland eldrede band confid • ratioun drew scottis support tuk purpos new curage assailȝe chance fortoun aganis danis proceding heirfore straucht aganis ennymes set ten • far fra ȝork apon ryuer owse ye mene tyme sueno hauand na memory gret humaniteis done hym scottis chargit yame returne hame leif ye opinion inglismē uth • rwayis wald inuade yame battal kīg eldrede tuk herald quhilk come effect kest hym ī • etteris kyng sueno went haistely forthwart weil arrayit battall incontinent baith armyis iunit sa haistely yt nane yame power schote thair dartis ye battal lāg fochtin vncertane victory quhil last inglismen war put flycht king eldrede efter discomfitour fled ouir ye riuer owse ane bait resydew army war othir tane slane eldrede seyng ylk day mair trubyll r • syng realme disparit releif▪ fled normandy quhare sa tenderly ressauit r • chard • k yairof yt marijt douchter emma ga • hir two sonnis alarud edward al ane othir sonne namit edmōd ane mā hie curage strenth body yi edmond gottin eldrede first wyfe afore danis inuadit realme callit irneside becaus exercit cheualry rang xvi ȝeris aboue inglismen sal efter schaw sueno proude thir feliciteis tuk auisement remanent danis ye inglismen mycht maist esaly distroyit micht stabyll realme hym posterite ony impediment inglismen tymes cumy • g nobillis ingland aduertist yi extreme hatrent danys aganis yame fell kneis afore sueno exhortīg hym haue mercy yame sen thay war ane anciant pepyl sum tyme maist pissant baith see land prayit hym suffir yame remane lyue vnder quhat seruitude pleasit thay desirit na castellis townis rich bot leif thair wiffis chyldren vnder seruitude howbeit sueno nature maist cruel ȝit vsit victory le indignation inglismen purposit cō mandit yame mony ȝeris eft beir na wappinnis bot vse husbandry othir labouris vnder seruitude danis honoryng hym thair iust prince mene tyme commandit yame bring al thair gold siluer iowellis wappinnis armour aganꝭ ane prefixit day rander thair townis castellis munitionis hym yat thay mycht keipit tymes cumyng danis gif ony danis war repugnant yir materis punist deith inglismen war finaly sa brokin ylk trubil • ising aboue othir thay fulfyllit thir chargis pointis thus ye croun ingland cōquest danis eftir ye first conques maid saxonis fra tyme uortigern vcxxix ȝeris sueno rang eft gret tiranny aboue inglismē reft fra thaym yair liberte sic maner wald suffer nane yair blude beir auctorite honouris within ingland preistis prelatis nocht onlie wer degradit yair benefice bot cassin presoun danis put yair roumes inglismen opprest sic miserabil calamiteis began lament yair vnhappy chance wareand yame self thay chesit erar haue deit quhen thay mycht leif sic daylie oppressioun tyranny vnmercyfull ennymes ȝit sueno wes na thīg mouit yair lamentable regrait bot thirllit thaym thay lamentit new importable seruitude ingyne tyranni ay sic condition ye thay se thair subdittis liegis deieckit supreme miserie truble ye thair vnmercyfull tyranny ragi thaym new iniure finalie ye inglismē wer brocht gret calamite miserie danis yat ilk hous ingland wes constranit sustene ane dane yt ye samyn mycht ane spy ye kyng aduertis hym quhat wes done said hous quhilk way ye king mycht knaw sone quhare ony rebelliō wes aganis hym yi spy wes callit lord dane quhilk tane ane ydyll lymmer seikis leuyng othir mennis laubouris ☞ hovv olauus onetus come scotland vvith gret army danis hov • kyng malcolme vvas dyscomfist ca xv▪ inglismen opprest maner spulȝeit thair croun rich sueno stable hꝭ realm thocht expediēt tak peace nychtbouris normannis britonis scottis vnder yir conditionis nane tham support inglismen aganis danis aboue yir cōditionis send herald ye normā ni chargeand thaym send kyng eldred two sonnis hym ingland ellꝭ distroy yame yt na successiō yam sal remane life impedimēt ayris tymes cūing becaus nane thir cōditionis wer obseruit garnist al ye strenthis realme fo • nens normandy strang munition vittallis maid prouision inuaid ye scottis ye fyne mycht bryng purpos esaly effect cōmandit olauus onetus lieutenantis cū haistely scotland ye pepil yt thay mycht get inuaid ye scottis sone eftir yir forsaid capitanis arriuit wt ane gret army ye mouth spayand iādit sic awfull ordinance▪ ye inhabitantis fled thair bestiall wiffis child yair best refuge danis eft yair cumyng brint ye kirkis templis townis murray slew al ꝑsonis quhom thay micht apprehend tuk al ye strenthis murray except thre castellis allanerlie yat say elgen fore narne last ye danis laid ane sege castell narne traistit quhen wes tane perforce tothir two castellis randrit ony straik ye mene tyme thir danis wer aduertist yat kyng malcolme wes cumand forthwart al ye army scotland gif yame battall incontinent yai left sege ye castell went na le curage aganis ye scottis victory bene present thair handis sone eftir come ambassatouris malcolme thir danis inquiryng quhy yai inuadit landis ony occasioun▪ skarslie yir ambassatouris done yair message quhen yai wer slane • e cruelte danis kyng malcolme mouit cruelte cōplenyng ye law pepill br • kin slaucht ambassatouris corne nycht gret malācolie • ane medow besyde killos gret •• yi clamour wes ye nycht amang army desyring battal reuenge cruelteis done danis nochtheles fra yai saw ye danis morow noumer pepill better ordour yan yai sene afore thay began decay yair curage tuk solicitude saif thair liuis yan inuaid yair ennymes malcolme seing yame astonist • red gif desyrit thaym fecht yt thay suld othir fle elli repugnant chargꝭ yairfore ȝeid ane mote quhare callit nobillis ane coūsall detesti • yair cowartdris thay beand sa vailȝeand hame quhen na danger occurrit ye first sycht yair ennymes astonist quha • thīg said he mouit ȝow gude freindis pa sa suddanlie fra office vailȝeant campionis deuoidyng ȝour anciant fortitude ony experience battal gif ȝe dreid yir bludy furiꝰ pepil ar disparit haue victorie ȝour manheid curage yan ar ȝe nocht worthy sōnis tha vailȝeant campionis ye vincust yir danis loncarte cheualry kenneth fader fynd gret multitude danis vincust albion ye interminable glore eldarꝭ quhat schame displeseir he succedit • ni thair weris mouit aganis w sa infinite noumer thaym ar buryit albion may callit iustlie sepulture danis sū yame ar slane ȝour day othirꝭ ȝour eldaris bot yir danis yat ar fecht aganis ȝow ar nocht sic manheid strenth yai yt wer vincust afore loncarte heirfore ȝour curage suld nocht decay bot incres ye ye ȝe ar fecht nocht onlie aganis residew vincust danis bot aganis ye brekaris ye law god man ȝour virtew ꝑseuerant constance sall schaw sone gif ȝe fecht ȝour eldarꝭ afore quhat folie wes danis inuaid w ony occasion iniuris quhy sonȝe ȝe maist vailȝeāt cāpionis quhy pa ȝe nocht forthwart gret spreit na place nowe tary auise bot gif ȝe haue sycht ȝour fragill bodyis quhilk sal sone peri wt schame yan ȝour singulare cōmon • l noblis mouit thir wourdis yt yai suld nocht appeir cowartis began exhort thair folkis battall incōtinent rais sic noys rageand fury yair army yt thay ony sycht pissance thaym self thair ennymes ruschit ordour ye danis olauus onetus seing thaym cum sa furiouslie met yame arrayit battall followit sone ane trible battall fochtin incredibyl manheid gret murdir baith sidis na thing pretermittir y• micht pertene athir side forcy campionis ye scottis cō tending defend thair landis liberteis ye danis saif yair liuis bot last ye scottꝭ war put flycht king malcolme euyl woūdit hꝭ hewmond doūg sa fast hꝭ heid yt micht na way ꝑt yairfra • hyeles bro • ye feild deid hid ī ane wod quhil sū part • ualescit sone eft retnit hame ¶hovv castell name vvas tane soudiouris thairof treasonably slane danis hovv ye danis vvar discomfist murthlak ca xvi danis efter victory think ād proffytabyll leif murray quhyll war pecifijt yair dominion gaderit spulȝeis feild returnit sege castell narne mair pissance thā afore yi castel stude ye tyme al within see beildit strang touris wallis na le crafty thā curius lauboure ane strait passage maid ingyne man maner ane brig throw quhilk men micht pa ye samyn land ye soudiouris quhilkꝭ war left ye said castel heirand kīg malcolm wes discōfist randerit ye castel ye handis danis vnder condition yai sal leif thair armour wappinnis behind yame depart yair life remanent gudis laif notwithstanding ye danis cōtrar yair faith ꝓmis hangit treasonably al personis quhō yai • within ye said castel thus narne ye strangest castel murray tane ye danis sa garnist yair industry yt semit vnwī nabyl ye soudiouris elgyn fore heirand yi treason done danis left castellis desert fled king malcolme ye danis reiosyng thir feliciteis traisting haue sicker dwelling murray send yair wiffis child norroway denmark cum haistely scotland mene tyme yai scurgit sindry ye scottꝭ sic war waik fehyl bodyis constranit yame scheir thair corn king malcolme dredand danis new cumyng pepyll mair pissant come begynnyng nixt symer gret multitud pepil mur • hlak ane towne mar quhare first foundament kirk abirden nocht far yat tyme fra ye sicht danis quhē suddāly baith ye armyis war astonist sicht othir ye scottis hauand experience ye cruelte done afore danis war affrayit ye danis ye maner yai war seuerit fra yair schippꝭ becaus yai knew • ye ground thay dred mair yt hid waching thā ye opin violēce yair ēnymes last baith ye armyis hortatiō yair capitanis iunit wt birnād hatrent al sydis first bront thre vailȝeant campionis kenneth ilis gryme strathern patrik dūbar yat ylk ruschand ou •• feirsly yair ennymes war slane gaif occasion sindry scottis fle ȝit ye place quhare yai fled sa strait yat na pepyl mycht fle esaly throw ye samyn yocht malcolme withstud ennymes ꝑseuerant māheid ȝit dreuyn abak bene fleand ye place quhare faucht semit ay mait strait difficil throw syndry fowleis watter fail quhilk maid afore nichtbore weir attoure mony treis war hewin liand thortwart ye land stoppi • baith entres passage gait myddis quhilk ane chapel dedicat ye honour sāct molok malcolme dreuin maner abak rasit hā dis heuyn said gret god virtew rewardar piete punisar synne thy crist • n pepyl defendourꝭ natiue rowmes grā tit thy beniuol • nce quhilkis ar na • mortal help inuadit treasobil iniure danis recurris extreme necessyte praying haue compassion miserable chance remoue mercyful lord yi schameful te • rour fra pepil thow modir god ye sicker refuge mortall pepil yair distres thow sanct molok quhom yi chapell dedicat help sall big ane cathedral kirk ī ȝour honour ane memorial yat realme wes saiffit ȝour support skarslie wes orison endit malcolme quhen ane part ye noblis said cōpanȝeonis▪ god wil yt return renew battall ennymes • ry noyis ye army yir wourdis rais curage ay incressing sayand schaw pertlie ȝour visage debait ȝoure land liuis quhilkis ar maist deir euery creature ī erd incontinent al ye scottis return • bene miracle maid incredible slaucht yair ennymes • sycht yair liuis bleidād •• ye mene tyme kīg malcolm come wt ane buschement apon one 〈◊〉 quhilkis wes yan prāsand throw ye feild bene sicker victo • heid nakit heumond finalie straik onetus fra hors amang futmen quhare wes slane ye residew danis seand yair capitane slane ceissit fra ony thir persecutioun ye scottis yus succedit gret blithnes scottis e • treme desolatioun danis ȝit battall continewit lang • hir side quhil last ye danis wer put flycht mony yame slane tane olauus heirand colle • g slane fled ane cumpany danis murray kyng malcolme knawing ye maist vailȝeant campionis army slane ceissit fra ony forthir persute danis deu • dit spulȝeis feild amang men syne went angus quhare remanit residew ȝeir takand cōsultation sic materis pertenit cōmon weil recoueryng murray fra danys ¶hovv camus prince norrovvay cumand vvith ane store dani • angus vvas slane army discomfist king malcolme barre hovv surname keithis tuke thair begynnyng ca xvii sueno kyng danis inglismen heirand vnhappely ye danys faucht murthlak yat yi present aduersite suld nocht deiect ye glore danys mak ye name scottis ouir glorius deuisit two nauyis gret noumer danis cum scotland ¶the first wes deuisit cum furth thamys ingland othir cum denmark ane vailȝeant knycht namit camus admiral baith flotis nixt ȝeir camus come yi nauy ī ye mouth forth beside sanct eb quhare wes stoppit mony dayis land last prosper wyndis pullit vp salis arriuit reid bra • angus landit men cūtre mycht gaderit resist hym camus eftir yat wes lādit yi maner went ye nixt mote reiosit wes landit place quhare danis wrocht afore sindry iniuris cassyn doun ye town montros tra • stit thairfore felicite succeid remanent viage sone eftir rasi • campe went throw angus ceissing fra na maner cruelte ye micht deuisit kest doun kirkis templis cieteis townis ony miseratioun quhare come sic thingis done went brechin quhare sum tyme wes ane strang castell ane kirk dedicat honour trinite becaus castell micht haistely tane yai enterit baith ye town kirk sic cruelte yt thay left ane stane thairof vncassin downe camus rageand wt yir siclik cruelteis baith aganis god mā finaly aduertist yt malcolme cū dunde ye power scotland incontinent fled ye see far fra balbrid quhare vsit na le cruelte afore ye pepyll king malcolme desyring delyuer realm fra tyranny danis come wt arrayit oist ye town barre two mylis fra balbrid tuk lytyll rest ye nicht army fecht ye morow defence thair realm liberte morow callit hꝭ noblis standert prayit yam consider thay war fecht aganis ane pepyll blyndit auarice seikand thair leuing iust battal bot reif pykery onely ennymes cristin faith bot inuading īnocent pepyl ony occasion battall set distroy ye trew faith albion al remembir thay war defendouris thair awne realme ordanit god punis ye cruelte danis yairfore prayit thaym pa forthwart sic manheid curage yat yai may othir de honorably elli haue victory maist vailȝeantly ye tothir syde camus exhortit ye danis battal sicker hope victory remembir yai behuiffit outhir de miserably ane vncouth realme elli haue victory immortall honour sone eft malcolme come arrayit battal aganis ye danis ye mair audacite curage yt afore experience yair cruelte ye ingyne nobyll men ar sic faculte y• mair yai haue experience honest materꝭ mair risis thair curage sū notabyll vassalage ye two armyis birnād athir hatrent ruschit finaly togidd wt maist cruelte throw quhilk followit sic slauchter yt ye burn lochte ran bludy stremis ye almane seys ȝit nane yame semit geif place othir sindry war sene yat day strikin throw ye body fehtand sic cruelte yt yai fell erd sic grip yair ennymes yt yai seuerit quhil yai deceissit baith togidder throw quhilk apperit yai faucht na le ire gud wyll quhil last ye danis war vincust camus chasit ye montanis scottis followit hym wt sic fury yt finaly slane signe heirof ye place quhare slane callit ȝit camustane principal slaar thꝭ camus ane ȝoung man namit keith quhilk singulare vassalage prouyn yi feild gat certane landis louthiane callit keith quhais hous decorit gret honoure callit marschellꝭ scotland quhom ar discendit mony nobyl vailȝeant men ay defendourꝭ yi realm sen thair first beginning ane othir cūpany danis fleand ī ye samyn maner war slane abirl • non iiii mylis fra brechin quhare ane gret slane ingrauyn wt crafty letteris aduertꝭ ye passingerꝭ ye anciant illuster dedis done eldaris aganis ye danis ye residew danis quhilkꝭ eschapit feild fled yair schippis schew ye gret infelicite harmes al circūstance afore rehersit thair companȝeonis hovv vc danis vva • slane ye thane buchquhane hovv canu • e come vvith nevv army danis scotland vvas discōfist hovv scottis danis vvar finaly agreit al debaitis ca xviii 〈2 page missing〉 afald cōmoun weill ge • extreme besynes dayis ye kyng suld regne aboue liegis mair beniuolence fauour thā ony extremite rigour yat baronis mycht luf dreid hym ay rising vnder hym amyte concord kirkmen micht leif vnder thair institution fynely yat euery thing suld done na le ye pleseir god ye cōmon weil efter hym succedit ane nobill man gawyne dounbar ane gud prelatis euir realm biggit ane brig ouir dee wt gret magnificēce quhare neuir brig violence watter mycht stand afore foundit ane ȝeirly leuing sustene ye wt mony othir notabil dedis quhilkꝭ war ouir prolixit schaw thꝭ tyme bot wyl return history kyng malcolme efter sa mony cruel battallis led aganis danis gouernit realme mony ȝeris gud iustice maid ane buke callit regiam maiestatem contenand lawis realm • uld gouernit quhat cōmoditeis • al • e geuyn feis chancellar secretar constabyll marschell chalmerlane iustice thesaurer register comptrolla • othir officis hous malcolme bene fame l • uyng nocht behynd ony othir prince euir realme gif sic vir • ew bene ī lat • er age first ȝouth mānis age▪ nochtheles excellent glore ful • eit immoderate auarice oftymes occurris come baith ani eild auarice penitent landis geuyn liberalite nobillis recouer said landis slew banist mony lordis van • fenȝeit c • usis noblis mouit thir iniuris hauand gre • indignation king nocht put handis thair bl • • ot set conques yair landis rowmes fenȝeit causis conspirit aganis hym frequent conuentionis effect kyng malcolme heirād thair cōspiration saif lyfe fled certane familiaris glā mi quhare slane freindꝭ nobillis quhilkis war slane afore hym thir cursit lymmaris efter slauchter fled thair cō plices swift hors▪ howbeit thay war vncertane quhare fle ye groūd sa ouircouerit wt snaw thay mycht knaw gait fynaly thay come ye loch forfare quhilk sum part frosin ye tyme al sone thay war cumyn myddis thairof thay fel throw ise perist miserably yat maner nocht lang efter thay war drawin loch creparis yair quarteris houng vp sindry townis scotland punition thair cruelte yi end maid kyng malcolme xxxi ȝeir regne fra incarnation ane mxl ȝeris buryit colmekyll tyme mony meruellis sene albion ȝule day erd trimblit ane gret rift maid samyn myddis striueling quhilk sprang sa huge multitude watter bure away nixt wod watter forth see sy •• r rais forther land euir sene afore ony tyme mydsymer day callit natiuite sanct iohne boptist sa schill frost ye cornis war slane maid gret derth cuntre sa endis ye leuynt buke yir cro • iklis heir begynnis twelf buke croniklis scotland ☞ kyng duncane hovv surname stevvartis tuk yair first begynnyng hovv makbeth punist sindry enormyteis done king duncani • tyme ca primo malcolme slane haue schawin succedit nepot duncane gottyn douchter malcolm two douchteris quhilkis eldest namyt beatrice wes geuyn mariage abbanath crynin quhilk wes thane ilis west partis scotland hir wes gottin duncane quhilk succedit immediatlie eft ye croun ye secound douchter namit doada wes geuin mariage synel thane glāmis quhome wes gottin ane feirs vailȝeant man namyt makbeth rycht ganand haue gouernit ony realme wer nocht strenth wes geuin oui • mekil cruelte yocht dūcane makbeth wer sister sonnis yai wer 〈◊〉 differēt fra othir ī maneris duncane wes sa mercyfull yat apperit nocht abill punys vice pepill contrar makbeth wes geuin al mekill cruelte dūcane wes geuin piete yairfore ye peple desyrit yair manerꝭ haue bene tempora • otheris duncane begynnyng empire gouern • realme gud peace iustice wes gouernit counsalouris yat gouernit duryng faderis tyme thus leuit cōmonis mony ȝeris ony iniure oppression gret men ȝit feble mynd dūcane quhen wes patent ye pepil wes cause gret seditionis amāg noblis bot occasion danis attempt new weris aganis ye scottis cause thir seditionis rais ye thane lochquhabir namit banquho quhilk wes ye beginnar ye noble surname stewartis realme quhome oure kyng p̄sent lang progression discendit quhen banquho gaderit kingis rentis punist sindry lymmaris ye cuntre sic extreme rigour iustice yt pepil rais aganis hym gret power spulȝeit hym ye money quhilk gaderit afore ye kyngis vse youcht eschapit lyfe ȝit wes euil woūdit last quhen wes curit woundis come kyng desyring iniuris contemptioun done hym punist kyng dū cane dant thir attemptatis send ane officer armes sūmond personis wer suspect mater vnderly ye law agane ane certane day thir lymmaris yat cruelte heirand thaym sūmond▪ contemption slew ye officer becaus ye kingis power wes cū yame punis yair offence yai maid makdowald yair capitane glaidlie tuk charge battall knawing king soft alliegit abill gouerne ane abbay monkis gyde ony band weirmen yi makdowald gaderit ane cūpany mischeuous lymmaris ireland ilis othir regionis yair slew malcolme lieutenand duncane lochquhabir put men flycht kyng duncane astonist slaucht men wes nocht exercit weris ȝit knew sic thingis mycht dressit cōuenit noblis ane coūsal tak punition thir attemptatis eftir sindry opinionis makbeth repreuit kyng dū cane soft gouernance hauand na ingyne punis iniuris • one pepill schew gif ye landis lochquhabir wer geuin banquho▪ yai suld leif nane makdowaldis blude lyue promittit sa followit sone eftir cūing lochquhabir pepil heirand ye fame hꝭ vassalage durst nocht attempt sic thingis yai afore▪ mony yame lef • makedowald come makbeth wayis makdowald wes sa inuadit wes necessar gif battal makbeth nochtheles wes discomfist chasie ane castell lochquhabir makbeth followit hym ye said castel lang sege brocht hym sic miserie yat wes cōstranit ask grace self wyfe barnis becaus gat nocht bot repuls yairof slew first wyfe barnys yt yai suld remane decisioun ennymes syne slew hym self ye maner makbeth enterit ye castell youcht fand makdowald slane ȝit schure heid send castel bertha quhair ye king wes gart hyng body ane hi • tre ilis men maid yair compositionis gret soumes money otheris thaym wer punist deith ye remanent pepill ye ilis mouit slaucht yair 〈◊〉 gaif displesād wourdis makbeth callād hym ane bludy monstour ony mercy makbeth incōtin •• maid ordinance pa ilis punis thaym yair vnbridlit language nochtheles solistation thair freindis ceissit tuke recompensatioun thair guddis ¶hovv edmond irnesyde canute deuidit betuix yame realme ingland hovv sueno king norrovvay come scotland vvith ane army vincust king duncane hovv foresaid sueno vvas efter vincust ane vncouth slicht ca ii skarslie wes ye realme scottis deliuerit makbeth al tyranni quhē sueno kyng danis wes arriuit scotland ane army schaw quhat lynnage sueno wes descendit repeit sum part original sueno first king danis yt rang aboue inglismen thre sonnis herald sueno canute first wes maid king ingland secund kyng norway ye thrid king denmark first wes slane eldred efter yt exilit sueno normandy ye thrid ȝeir eft faderis deith ȝit eldrede reiosit nocht lang ye croun ingland canute kīg danis come ane army inglād reuenge ye slauchter eldest bruther herald slew said eldrede eftir quhais deith sonne edmound irneside come ane army aganis canu • purpos baith reuenge ye slauchter fader recouer croun last quhen ye battallis wer arrayit ī otheris sicht reddy fecht edmond 〈◊〉 afore army desiring fecht canute singulare battall sayng wes mair honour decern ye rycht betuix yam two yan ony murdir pepil yat wer victoriꝰ yame two sall succeid ye crou • ony debait canute wes gīaid condition hauand na le confidence manheid yan othir edmond incōtinent yai come fra yair armyis yair bardit coursouris ran scharp groundin speristik ane aganis othir deith last quhen thay fouchtin lang vncertane victory thair steidis ouirset wery canute said edmond quhilk he sickir experience feirs awful dynt se yow may nocht vincust apperis ꝓpiciant fauour goddis thay yt thow haue ane part kingdome regne region refrene thy swerd cōtent yt croun ingland deuidit sa betuix w yow reiose half thairof hauand equale impire life edmōd glaid yi cōdition peace thecht bett succeid half inglād ony mair dangeir • oꝑd hym self vncertane chance battall traisting sum tyme fy • occasioun recouer ye hail empire ingland litill laubour incontinent thay demontit thair • oursouris embrasit othir • aist tendernes yus wes ye realme • ingland deuidit betuix yame yi maner part ingland fornence france wes assignit canute tothir part edmond mene time enna quene ingland dredand concord na thyng profitable hi • fled normādy hir two sonnis alarude edward quhilkꝭ scho bure ye said eldrede bot returne historie quhen sueno kyng norroway saw brothir eik empire denmark half ingland tuke desyre equale brothir al weil rentis marcial glore bring purpos effect come ane army fisse motiue cumyng wes reuenge slauchter eme camus othir danis slane barre crowdane gēmere youcht sueno wes cumyn said conques fame honour ȝit wes na thing cōparit brothir canut slew innocent barnis wemen agit personis ony difference thair estait kyng duncan • heirand yir importable schameful cruelteis done pepil began ane prudēt capitane oftymes dull sleuthfull pepil ar constranyt necessite becum prudent virtuous kyng dūcane heirand sueno wes cumyng maner forsaid inuaid realme assemblit ane army pepill vnder empire deuidit thaym thre battallis first battal wes geuin makbeth ye secound banquho▪ abaid hym self ye myddilward remanent nobillis scotland syne met ennymes culros quhare baith ye armyis faucht gret cruelte bot scottis war finaly discomfist ȝit danis war sa brokin battall yt thay maid lang chace bot stude al nicht arrayit battal morow quhen thay saw ye feild discomfist na ennymes appere thay ꝑtit ye • ulȝeis rite armes inhibit sl • nakit men traisting conques ye realm wt fauour beniuolence ye pepyl sic thingis done sueno rasit tentꝭ follow ye remanēt scottꝭ becaus aduertist yt king dūcane fled ye castel bertha makbeth gaderyng ane new army resist hꝭ incursionis laid ane strait sege ye said castel al sone king duncane saw hym self beltit ylk syde ennymes send ane officer counsal banquho makbeth cōmanding hym abide inchecuthill quhill send hym othir word mene tyme send ane herald sueno desiring licence hym self • noblis yt within ye castel depart yair lyfe guddis saif yi desirit duncane howbeit knew na thing better thā repuls yairof y• hꝭ ennymes micht haue na othir suspition bot ye castel randerit ony mair delay last quhē sueno desirit ye castel rā decit▪ king dūcane intertene quhil materis war brocht gud purpos promittit send • large prouision vittallis ye castell refresche army yir offerꝭ war plesand sueno bot al army thay bene mony day afore ony fresche vittallis gret penurite incontinet scottꝭ tuk ye ius mekilwort herijs mengit yair wyne aill breid send ye samyn gret quantite yair ennymes sueno army reio • ing yi fouth vi • tallis begā waucht yair maner haue experience quha micht ingorge yair wambe maist voracite▪ quhil last ye vēnoun yir beryis skalit throw partis thair bo • yi throw quhilk thay war resoluit ane deidly sleip yan duncane send makbeth cōmanding hym inuaid ennymes al diligence thay war ane esy point v • cust makbeth mair tary com folkis tentis ennymes first slew thair wache ye remanent yame sowpit wt sleip war al murdrest ī yair beddis sueno brocht nowmer folkis schippis qu • pullit vp salꝭ returnit ī norroway army eschapit nane bot sueno x personis ye marineris mony ȝerꝭ eft na knichtꝭ war maid norroway quhill thay war sworne reuenge ye slaucht yair freindis ī scotland ye remanēt schippis quhilkis war left behind ye danis ye scottis firth within thre dayis eft thair departing raschit ilk ane othir violence ane eist wind sank ye firth quhare thay ly ȝit ye gret dangeir othir schippis yt cumis ī ye samyn quhen ye see flowis thay ar couerit watter quhen ebbis yai appeir sū part aboue ye samyn callit ȝit ye pepil drūlaw sandis ye scottꝭ efter yi victory gat ye spulȝeis ye feild maid general ꝓcessiōs throw al ꝑtis yair realm geuand thākis god ye felicite falling yame quhil ye scottis war yair▪ ꝓcessionis yi wise tithingis come y• ane new flote danis war artiuit king orne ye weirmen cumyng land inuading ye cuntre maist cruelteis dant yir attēpta • wer send ye kingis auctoryte makbeth banquho quhilkis slew ane gre • part yir danis▪ remanēt chasit thair schippis thir danis fled thair schippis gaif gret •• e gold makbeth suffer thair freindis war slane hi • ieoperd buryit sanct colmes inche memory heirof mony auld sepulturis ȝit said inche grauyn armis • danꝭ last peace ratifiit betuix scottis danis ī maner danis sal neuer cū scotland moue ony weir aganis ye scottis thir war ye weris kyng duncane led aganis danis vii ȝeir regne ¶of vveirdis geuyn makbeth banquho hovv makbeith vvas maid thane cavvder hovv slevv kyng duncane make hym self king ca iii nocht lang eftir hapnit ane vncouth wounderfull thyng quhilk followit sone ane gret alteration ye realme auenture makbeth banquho wer passand fore quhair kyng duncane hapnit ye tyme met ye gait thre wemen clothit iuelrage vncouth weid thay wer iugit pepill weird sisteris first thaim said makbeth hale thane glāmis secound said hale thane cawder thrid said hale kyng scotland yan said banquho quhat wemen ȝe sa vnmercyfull sa fauorabil companȝeon ȝe gaif hym nocht onlie landis gret rentis bot gret lordschippis kingdomes geuys nocht answerit first thir weird sisteris schaw felicite apperyng hym youcht happyn ane kyng empire sall end vnhappelie nane blude sall eftir hym succeid cōtrar yow sall neuir king bot ye sal cum mony kingis quhilkis lāg progressioun sall reiose ye croun scotland al sone thir wourdis wer said thay suddanlie euanist sycht prophecy diuinatioun wes haldin mony dayis derision banquho makbeth sum tyme banquho wald call makbeth kyng scottis derisioun samyn maner wald call banquho ye fader mony kingꝭ ȝit becaus al thyngis succedit thir wemen deuinit pepill traistit iugit yame weird sisteris lang eft hapnit yt ye thane cawder wes disherist forfaltit lā dis certane crymes lese maieste landis wer geuyn kīg duncane makbeth hapnit nixt nicht yt banquho makbeth wer sportand g • ddir thair supꝑ yan said banquho thow he gottin yt ye first two weird sisterꝭ hecht restis nocht bot ye croun quhuilk wes hecht ye thrid sist makbeth reuoluyng thingis thay wer said thir weird sisteris began couat ye croun ȝit cōcludit abide quhil saw y• tyme ganād yairto fermelie beleuyng yt ye thrid weird suld cum ye first two afore mene tyme kyng duncane maid son malcolme prince cūbir signify yt suld regne eftir hym quhilk wes gret displeseir makbeth maid plane derogatioun thrid weird promit • afore hym thir weird sisteris nochtheles thocht gif duncane wer slane maist rycht croun becaus wes nerest blud yairto tennour ye auld lawis maid eftir ye deith kyng fergus quhen ȝoung child wer vnabil gouern ye croun n • rrest yair blude sall regne al respons thir weird sisteris put hym beleif yat thrid weird suld cū al wei •• first two attour wyfe impacient lang tary wemen ar specially quhare thay ar desirus ony purpos gaif hym gret ar • ation ꝑsew ye thrid weird yat scho micht ane quene calland hym oft tymis febyl cowart nocht desyrus honouris sen durst assailȝe ye thing wt māheid curage quhilk offerit hym beniuolence fortoun howbeit sindry otheris he assailȝeit sic thingꝭ afore maist terribyl ieopardyis quhen thay sic sickernes succeid ye end thair laubouris makbeth persuasion wyfe gaderit freindis ane counsall innernes quhare kyng duncane happinnit ye tyme becaus fand sufficient oportunite support banquho otheris freindis slew king duncane vii ȝeir regne body burijt elgyn efter tane vp brocht colmekyll quhare remanis ȝit amang ye sepulturis vthir kingis▪ fra redemption ane mxlvi ȝeris ¶hovv makbeth vsurpit crovvn chasit ye sonnis king duncane cū bir hovv punist sindry lymmaris maid lavvis ye cōmon vveil ca iiii al sone dūcane slane thꝭ maner makbeth come ane gret power scone tuk crowne syne chasit malcolme cāmore donald bane • sonnis king duncane cū bir quhare malcolme reman • continewally quhill sanct edward son king eldred recouerit realme ingland fra danis ressauit said malcolme maist tendernes bot donald went irelād makbeth efter yair departing stabyl realme hym sicker firmance maid distribution kingis rentis amang noblis way conquest thair fauoure becaus saw na man oppone thaym hym set gouerne realme iustice punis enormeteis fell febyll administration king duncane ȝit becaus dred gret trubyl follow gif purpos war deuulgat • ome effect deuisit ane subtell slicht bring mysdoaris brokin men iustice solistit syndry liegꝭ large money appele ye theuis quhilkꝭ opprest yame maist barras aganis ane prefixit day quhen thir theuis war enterit barras quhare yai suld haue fouchtin aganis thair nichtbouris thay wer takin armit men hangit iebatis according iustly thair demeritis remanent mi • oaris war dantit sic maner yat mony ȝeris efter al thift reiffis war dantit pepyll brocht gret tranquillite▪ sic thingis done kyng makbeth visyit al boū dis realme haldyn sicker targe innocent pepyll maist deligent punisar al iniuris done aganis cōmoun weil gaif labouris caus ȝoūg men incres gud maneris kirk men thair deuyne seruyce slew syndry thanis cath • e suthirland stranauorne ro becaus gret trubyl rais realm thair sedition brocht galloway gud peace slew ye tyran makgyll quhilk contempnit mony ȝeris afore kingis auctorite attour maid lawis cōmoun weil worthy nowmerit amang nobyll kingis gif succedit crown iust tytyll perseuerit iustice end empire becaus syndry lawis apperis ꝓffitabyl haue colleckit thaym werk mak thaym mair patent followis ☞ within ordouris sall answere afor ane ꝓphane iuge bot salbe remittit hꝭ iuge ordinar ¶the tent part al frutis growyng ground sall geuyn kirk men god salbe adorit oblationis prayer ¶he perseueris cōtemption aganis kirk standyng curst ane ȝeir wyll nocht recounsalit thairto sall repute ennyme cōmoun weill gif perseueir indurat mynd two ȝeris al guddis salbe confiscat ¶he yt maid knycht salbe sworne defend wedois cōmonis pupyllis maid king sal sworne samyn maner ¶the eldest douchter sal succeid heritage failȝeing eldest son gif ony woman mary lord ground scho sall tyne hir heritage ¶na man sall posseid landis rentis officis bigingis ony othir auctorite bot allanerly kynges lycence ¶na office salbe heritage kingis pleseir ¶na man sall sit prophane temporall actionis without commissioun king ¶al cōuention office iustice sal led ye kingis name auctorite ¶he makis band sworne man ony othir man bot allanerly king salbe punist deith ylk man salbe bound defend king aganis al othir leuād creaturꝭ ¶he yt raisis ye kingis liegis salbe put deith guddis confiscat pepyll ar gaderit samyn maner ¶he followis ane man kirk market ony othir conuention salbe punist ye deith without leif industry yt followis ¶ane hors fed cōmonis ony othir vse laubouring ye erd salbe escheat kyng ¶fulis menstralis bardis al othir sic ydil pepil bot gif thay specially licent kyng salbe compellit seik sum craft wyn thair leuyng gif thay refuse yai salbe drawin lik hors ye pluch harrowis ¶howbeit ye son put fee ye land lyfe fader licence kyng ȝit salbe disherist efter gif fader found criminabyl kingis maieste ¶all wemen yt maryit ony fre baron lord howbeit scho haue na barnis hym sal haue thrid land efter deith remanent salbe reiosit airis ¶all gret baronis salbe inhibit mary wt othir vnder pane deith specialy gif thair landis rowmes lyis togidder ¶all armoure wappinnis yat ar borne ony othir effect kingis weris salbe confiscat al othir mouabyll guddis ¶the kingis capitane ye byis ony landis within ye boundis quhare capitane sall tyne baith ye land • ye money siclik gif mary son douchter ony folkis dwellād within boundis sall tyne office sal
