leifful son mawchis bruke office ☞thir siclik lawis war vsit king makbeth throw quhilk gouernit realme x ȝeris gud iustice howbeit samyn cō trar naturall inclination geuyn conques fauoure pepyl stabyll realm hym erar ony sycht cōmoun weill ¶hovv banquho vvas slane makbeth son fleance slane vvalis hovv vvalter son fleance come scotland▪ genology stevvartis ca v schort tyme efter makbeth returnit fra al meiknes innatiue cruelte led wod furyis ye nature tyrānis quhilkꝭ cōquessis landis kingdomes wrāgus titil ay full heuy thocht dredour traisting ilk mā siclik cruelteꝭ hym afor othir forthir remēbring weirdꝭ geuī hī reherlit y• bā quhois posterite suld reiose ye crown lang progression callit banquho son fleāce ane supper purpos sla yame baith howbeit thay suspeckit na thyng le thā treason makbeth quhen bā ket done thocht expedient sla thaym awin hous thairfore eschew al suspectioun cryme yt micht imput hym yairby laid ane band armit men thair gait sla yame baith ar thair returnyng hame thir men y• war laid wait effect slew banquho nochtheles fleance couert nicht eschapit saiffic apperit syngular fauoure god • better fortoun fleāce eschaping • yi wise▪ seing new waching laid slauchter fled walis▪ quhare plesandly ressauit ye prince • hairof maid sa familiar wt ye princis doucht yt maid hir • hyld prince walis finding douchter deflorit persewit • leance sic hatrent finaly slew hym held douchter 〈◊〉 maist schameful seruitude becaus scho cōsentit hir defloration vnc •• th blude last scho deleuerit ane son nam • walter quhilk within ȝerꝭ became ane vailȝeant lusty man greter curage spreit ony man nurist land wart youcht haldin ye prince walis gudschir law estait ȝit ane hye mynd abyll na thyng mair thā attempt gret chargis last fel contention companȝeoun quhilk obiec • hym yt gottin lauchful bed efter mony feirs iniurius wourdis athir syde walter sa impacient slew companȝeon syne fled scotland seik support freindis cū myng happynnit cūpany inglismen yt come scotland wt sanct margaret quhare behauit hym sa plesandly euery sort yt conquest yair beniuolence fauour nocht lang efter send ane gret power ye ilis galloway othir partis scotland punis tyranni lymmaris ye cuntre quhom dantit sic mā heid prudence yat maid stewart scotland ressaue ye kingis mali rentis al partꝭ ye realme walter stewart ane son namit alane stewart quhilk efter passit duke lorane robert bastard son king ingland ye haly land quhare thay mony vailȝeant deidis aganis turki fra incarnation crist ane mlxxxxix ȝeris alane gottyn al • xander stewart quhilk • oundit abbay paslay quhare mony religious men he bene ordour sanct benedict alexander gottin walter stewart dundonald quhilk faucht vailȝeātly ī support alexander ye thrid largis sall efter schaw walter two sonnis ye first namit alexander quhilk faucht ī support hꝭ fader said feild largis secound son namit robert stewart gat ye landis terbowtoun marijt air crukeistoun fra quhō discendit ye erlis leuenax deruly attour alexander stewart ye foundit paslay war gottin sindry othir sonnis iohne iames sindry otheris▪ howbeit thay tuke new surnamis name ye landis quhilkis thay succedit ¶this iohne stewart efter deith brothir iames maryit ayre bonkyl ane virgyne gret bewtie gat hir walter stewart quhilk succedit landis bonkyll rāfrew rothessay bute stewartoun efter yt fad iohne slane falkirk walter stewart marijt mariory bruce douchter king robert bruce quhō gottin robert secound ye name robert secund tuke • sobell mure ane virgine incredibyl bewte douchter schir adam mure knycht place wyfe gat hir thre sonnis thre douchteris ye first iohne stewart othirwayais namit robert quhilk succedit immediatly ye crown ye secound robert erle fif menteith duk albany gouernoure scotland xv ȝeris thrid son namit alexander erle buchquhane lord baudȝenot eldest douchter marijt iames son air william erle dowglas secound maryit iohne dunbar brothir george dunbar erle marche maid erle murray gat hir bot ane douchter quhilk maryit dowglas sa dowglas come erldome murray thrid doucht maryit iohne lyoun quhylk maid efter lord glammis attoure robert first king ye stewartes maryit ewfame douchter erle ro gat hir two sonnis walter erle athole dauid erle stratherne thys walter solistit robert duk albany sla dauid stewart duke ro • hesay efter ye hame cuming kyng iames first solistit ye king sla al duk robertis līnage ye samyn maner ay • raistīg efter slauchter freindis cū crown finaly solistit nepot robert stewart robert grahame douchter sonne sla king iames first quhilk cryme said walter efter cō uickit distroyit sonnis brothir dauid erle buchquhane come na succession thairfore baith thair landis returnit agane crown ony memory thair blude robert stewart duke albany come duk murdo quhilk maryit erle lanox douchter gat hir thre sonnes walter alexander iames duke murdo first two sonnis war slane striueling kyng iames first thrid brothir iames reuēge yair slauchter brint dunbertane efter chasit ireland quhare deceissit ony successioun robert thrid name maryit annabyll drommond douchter schir iohne drommond stobhal knicht gat hir dauid iames first deit falkland othir iames ye first maryit iane douchter iohne bewfuerd erle somerset ingland gat hir two sonnis borne ani alexander iames ye first deit infance secoūd iames secound vi douchteris quhilk eldest maryit dalphyne france secound duke bertanȝe thrid lord feir feird lord dalkeith fift erle huntly sext na successioun iames secound maryit margaret douchter duke gylder gat hir thre sonnis two douchteris first sonne iames thrid secound namit alexander duke albany maryit first ye erle orknayis doucht gat hir alexāder bischop murray nocht lang efter partit hir went frāce quhare maryit counte • bolony gat hir iohne stewart duke albany quhylk mony ȝeris gouernour scotland day thrid sonne iohne stewart erle mar • e slane ye cānogait ī ane baith fatt first douchter iames secound maryit lord boyd quhome go • tin ane sonne quhylk slane lord mongumry ane douchter gregane quhylk maryit efter erle cassellis efter deith lord boyd douchter iames secound maryit lord hammyltoun • e way hous hammyltoun decorit kyngis blude tothir syster maryit lord creichtoun hir come lytyll successioun worthy haue memory ¶iames thrid maryit margaret douchter kyng denmark hir gottin iames ye feird alexander quhilk byschop sanct androis duke albany iohne stewart •• le marre thay deit baith ony successioun ☞¶iames feird maryit margaret douchter kyng henry seuyn • gat hir iames fift quhilk regnis gret felicite aboue w ȝeir translatyng thir cronyklis bot wyll returne oure hystory ☞¶hovv makbeth slevv lordis proffet thair landis guddis hovv biggit castell dunsynnane slevv makduffis vvise barnis orisoun maid malcolme cammore makduf ca vi na thyng succedit happely makbeth efter slauchter banquho▪ ylk man began feir life • rst nocht compeir quhare makbeth thus followit ylk day mair displeseir quhen tyrane persauit ylk man hauand hym dreid began dreid ylk man samyn maner yat way grew maist odius subdittis ay slaing noblis ellꝭ confiscand yair guddis vane causis last quhen gottin gret proffet slauchter proscription noblis began put handis mair pertly thair blud thocht proffet sa sweit yt come hym slaucht noblis mycht desist thairfra doubil proffet yat way first thay war slane yt dred secoundly gat thair guddis sustene ane gard armit mē defend hym fra iniure yam yt suspeckit forthir yt micht inuade ye pepyl mair tyrāny biggit ane strang castel ye hicht dunsynnane ane hyll gowry x milis fra perth yi castel biggit wt infinit expensis na stuf micht carijt ye samyn gret difficulte ȝit ceissit fra ye bigging yairof bot causit al thanis ylk schire big ye said castel yair cours last fel makduf thane fif big ꝑt ye said castel becaus durst cā yi werk auenture ye king put handis hym afore othir noblis ye realme send craftismen al prouision cōmādit yame sa ī absence yt ye king micht haue na occasion mouit aganis hym sone efter makbeth come vesy castell becaus fand makduf present werk said yi mā wyl obey chargis quhill riddin ane mollet brydyl nochtheles sall gar hym draw lik ane auir ane • ar • fra then mycht neuir se makduf 〈◊〉 patience othir becaus thocht power ouir gret elli becaus wes schawin prophecy ye foresaid wichis yat mak duf suld inuaid hym disples • ir oft occurris quhare ony prince takis suspitioun ane smal offence occasion gret iniuris finalie slane makduf sum slycht wer nocht ane wiche quhō gret confidence said put hym feir yat suld neuir slane man yat wes borne wife vincust quhill wod birnane wer cū ye castell dunsynnane makbeth hauand gret cō fidence thir wourdis set asyde feir deith traistit fermely yat mycht quhat plesit ony punition eftir following y• ta ꝓphecy beleuit wes vnpossible vincus hym ye tothir vnpossible sla hym bot yir fals illusionis ye deuil brocht hym vter cōfusion gart rage ithand slaucht subdittis ony feir lyfe last makduf disparit lyfe tuk purpos pa ingland yt mycht bring malcolme cāmore scotland resist tyrā ny makbeth ȝit samyn deuisit sa secretly bot makbeth gat knawlage thairof kingis prouerbe sayis he scharp sycht lang eiris yi makbeth euery gret hous scotland part men quhilkis war corruppit hꝭ money reueil al thingis said done thair housis throw slycht opprest noblis realme thay mycht fulfyl yair attemptatꝭ aganis hym yi tyrane ay ful sollicitude dre • dand haue ane terribil end cruelte cumis impulsion cōscience quhilk bringꝭ euery man yt gylty perpetuall sollicitude ony securite life ye samyn maner makbeth euer ī feir ennymes treasonabyl murdir tyrāny come haistely ane gret power makduffꝭ hous ye men yt hous trais • ing na euyl oppinnit ye ȝe •• incontinent makbeth entrit slew makduffis wyfe hir barnis othir personis yt fand syne cō fiscat makduffis guddis put ye horn makduf banist yi maner fled ī ingland malcolme cā se gif micht find ony way hand reuenge ye slauchter maid sa cruelly hꝭ wife barnis quhē comyn malcolme declarit ye gret oppression done hym makbeth ye said tyrane hatit wt al liegis ye innocent slaucht baith noblis cōmonis sindry othir detestabyl cruelteis worthy rehersit last quhen saw malcolme sich cōpassion sorowis said lang sall thow suffir murdir thy fader othir freindis vnpunist quhen sall thow saciat ye affliction thy realme quhat dāmage haue sufferit thy proscription thow ye tyme sa tender age yat thow mycht debait aganis sa bludy monstoure youcht condiscendit sūtyme election tyrane oure gret dāmage ȝit experience cruelte desyre na thyng mair exonerat thairof ye pepyll murnis accusyng thair wylfull ygnorance consentyng sa hye myscheuis thair awin perdition thair onely esperance traisting deliuerit thair calamite thairfore le thā affliction thy pepil thy awin ꝓscription thy maist ples • ir dre • delyuer thy pepyl tyranny yame dayly sustenit king edward maist humane gracious prince sal fail support ye al pissance thow • esitis becaus realm sūtyme opprest tyranni finaly delyuerit grace god awin manheid yair cruel handis attour gif thow knawis quhat beniuolēce thy pepil he thow may vnderstand sū part thir wordis thy pepyl ar murdrist al partis yi bludy fleschoure ta • ki heid yairfore thow nedis dout bot thy returnyng ī scotland salbe richt plesand scottis men thir cruelteis dayly done w suld lamentit effeminat pepyll bot e • ar reuengit vailȝeant campionis sen thow art nocht sauit fra inuasion thy ennymes bett fortoun bot ordanit deuyne prouydence delyuer thy pepyll afflictionis ¶hovv malcolm cāmore schevv hym self vnabyl kyng syndry vices▪ hovv come scotland vvas maid kyng thairof makbet deith ca vii doucht malcolme gretu • ly commouit • e sindry oppression cruelt eis done scottis ȝit gret prudence dissimulit mind haue better experience makduffis intention say se gif war cumyng samyn effect desyrit gif war cumyn dissait industry makbeth betrais hym put hym ennymes handis thairfore • e answerit richt sorowful ye trubyll fallyng cuntre •• cht haue gret affection thairto ȝit certane irremediabyll vicis following vnabyll • uthir gouern realm releif pepyll ye trubill thay presentlie sustene first immoderat lust abhominabyl fontane vicis quhilk ragi ī sic vndantit renȝeis yat gif wer maid king scottis suld deflore virginis matronis sic maner yat intemperance suld mair importabyll ȝow bludy tyranny makbeth yi answerit makduf ane euyll falt mony nobyll princis kyngis bene disherist tynt baith thair lyfe kyngdomis samyn nochtheles thair gret plenty wemē scotland yairfore wyll thow counsall make thy self kyng sall dres ye mater sa wysely yat thow salbe satifyit thy pleseir thy vice salbe vnknawin said malcolme al maist auaricius man erd wyl seik sa mony occasionis conques landis gudis wyl sla mony noblis scotland fenȝeit causis fyne yat may reiose thair realmes landis guddis yairfore schaw ȝow quhat infinite harmes sal cum ȝow insaciabyl auarice wyl remembir bir ȝow ane fabil ane tod ouirset ane byke fleis continewally soukād hir blud quhē ane passinger gatt demā dit hi • gif scho wald haue thir fleis skalit fra hir body answerit na becaus thir fleis sat hir woū dis war full hir blud fouth yairof sat lytil displeseir gif thay war skalit vtherꝭ quhilkis war mair ȝeuery tume suld licht thair rowmes souk residew hir blude quhilk war vnpro ••• tab • l heirfore suffir remane quhare aduenture sic displeseir fall amang ȝow vnsaciable auarice ȝe sall eftir chace ȝour realme wt schame think yir displeseiris regnand amang ȝow bot small respect sic terrible outragis quhilkꝭ sall appeir sone cumyng answerit makduf ane wer falt ye first auarice rute mischeif ye maist part kyngis ar slane ye cryme nochtheles mak thy self kīg counsall thow sall haue rich • outh yair gold geir ineuch scotland satifie ye thy pleseir said malcolm ful lesingis dissait reiosis na thing sa mekle trais thaym geuis credit traist sen na thīg semi mair ane prince yan constance verite iustice na thing sa vnsemand falset treason lesingꝭ yow may cōsider vnabil gouern ony prouince cūtre sen yow he sa mony rameidis colour ye la •• vicis pray ye hyde colour vice amang laif yan said makduf yi warst falt yair leue vnhappy miserable scottis quhilkꝭ ar scurgit sa mony calamiteis ilk ane aboue othir ȝe haue ane cur • deuyll regnis aboue ȝow ony tityll distroyis ȝow bludy tyranny othir yt he ye rycht ye croun repleit ye treasonable maneris vicis inglismen vnworthy kyng awin confession nocht onlie auaricius geuin vnsaciable lust bot fals ane tratour yat may nocht trow ane wourd sayis adew scotlād banist euir ony confort cōsolation thir wourdis teris fast halit ouir cheikis last quhen wes makand hym depart malcolme tuk hym sleif said gud confort haue nane thir faltis howbeit refusit onlie haue experience thy mynd makbeth he oftymes sic wayis desyrit slaucht slaw yat wes condiscend thy mynd salbe ye deligent fulfill incontinent thay enbrasit othir tuk auisement howe thay mycht prouide materis thair singulare cōmon weil sone eft makduf send letterꝭ nobillis scotland schawing malcolme wes cōfiderat cum haistely scotland prayit yame sen said malcolme wes iust heritour ye croun assist hym may recouer ye samyn ye mene time malcome purchest erle northumbirland cum xm men help hym recouer realme thir tithingis fra thay wer schawin scotland drew ye nobillis two sindry factionis quhilk tane assistit makbeth yi othir malcolme throw quhilk rais aftymes sindry frequent scarmussyng betuix yir partyis ye nobillis quhilkis wer malcolmes opinioun wald nocht ieoperd yame vter chance battall quhil cūyng ingland thair support makbeth seyng finalie ennymes incres ilk day wt pissance fled fi • abaid freindis part takaris dunsīane purpos fecht wt hꝭ ennymes erar fle ye realme schamfullie ony straik freindis gaif counsall othir tak peace malcolm elli fle haistelie treasour gold ye ilis ye fin • yat mycht • ee sindry gret princis ye realme money tak part aganis malcolme nochtheles see confidence ī fretis yt beleuit fermely neuir vincust quhil ye wod birnane war brocht dūsynnane naȝit slane ony mā borne ane womā malcolme following ha • stely makbeth come ye nycht afore victory wod birnane quhē army refreschit yame ane schort tyme cōmandit ilk mā tak ane brāche ye wod yt thay micht come ye nixt morow arrayit maner ennymes sicht makbeth seing hym cū gyse vnderstude ye prophecy completit yt wiche schew hym nochtheles arrayit men skarsly ennimes cassin fra yame branch cumand forthwart battal quhen makbeth tuk flicht quhom followit makduf gret hatrent saying tratour thy insaciabyll cruelte sall haue ane end said makbeth thow followis vane nane 〈◊〉 born ane woman yt may sla said makduf mā schorne moderis w • mbe incontinent slew makb ••• brocht heid malcolme ye end makbeth efter yt roung xvi ȝeris ye begynnyng empire mony p • offitabyl thingis ye cōmon weil bot sone efter illusion deuyllis degenerat fra honest beginning maist terribyll cruelte slane fra incarnation ane thousand lxi ¶of deith edmond canut h • rald hardy canut kingis ingland hovv crovvn inglād vvas recouerit fra danis godovvine vveriit ye innocent slauchter alarude ca viii wyll schaw empire ingland tane fra danis restorit king edward iust heritour yairof quhen canute edmond ꝑtit ye realm ingland betuix yame ꝯcord said ye realm gud peace foure ȝeris nixt following ylkane yame dred ye pissance othir ay desiring haue ye hail empire inglād vnder yair singular dominion ye samyn tyme ane wickit maliuolꝰ mā namit edrik tuk purpos attempt ane hardy vassalage cum ī fauour beleuit ane yir two princis yi edrik delyuerit yi maner haue thankis cō moditeis awaitit quhen king edmōd sittād hꝭ eis ane straik hym throw ye scheir bowellis throw quhilk yi edmond deceissit edrik efter yi schamefull slauchter went canute said hayl king al ingland canut astonist thꝭ salutation began demand mater stude mair diligently • quhē fand king edmond slane treason vnhappy man thocht na thing sa gud geif hym reward according treasonabyll labour gart hyng hym ane iebat canut exonerat yi way fra al suspition edmondis deith succedit beniuolence ye pepyll y• hail empire ingland sone eft ane coūsal set ye quhilk ye noblis delyuerit baith king edmondꝭ lādis ii sonnis edward edwyn ye hādis canut quhom certane ȝeris tretit gret humanites bot sone eft changit purpos thocht sla yame baith yt realm micht stabillit posterite lāg eft send yame valgariꝰ regēt swedrik quiet letteris sla yame baith nochyeles yi regent knawing ye innocent nobyl blude yir ii child mouit sic reuth send yame baith salamon king hungary maid canut vnderstād yt al chargis wer done deuisit eft deith canute succedit son herald namit hꝭ gret swithnes hair fut quhilk reiosit ye croun inglād twa ȝeris eftir quhome succedit brother hardy canut maist vicious proud tyrane yt euir rang aboue inglismē wald nocht suffir ye bonis hꝭ brothir rest vnd erd bot vnnaturall dispit tuk vp hꝭ bonis set heid apon ane hie staik quhair maist confluence pepil wes london kest ye residew body ī thamis maid ane law euery inglisman sall bek discouer heid quhē met ane dane gif ane inglisman ane dane come baith ye brig atanis y• inglisman sal tary quhill ye dane past ouir ye brig inglismen richt cōmouit yir displesād lawis cōspirit aganis ye danis al partꝭ ingland callit al yair wageouris supper slew yame quhen yai wer ful wynis ane nycht hardy canut heirand al mē put doun yi slicht inglismen slew hym self disperatioun thus wes ingland deliuerit fra tyranny danis schort tyme eftir ye noblis ingland send ane gret princis yairof namit godowine quhilk maryit afore canutis douchter normādy bring two sonnis eldrede ingland resaue ye croun yairof yi godowyne becaus maryit canutis doucht thocht cōques ye croun hꝭ awin son yairfore cūing ī normandy deuisit distroy baith ye sonnis eldred poison ye eldest son namit alarude wes slane maner bot edward eschapit mirakil god come sone eftir inglād quhair ressauit ye croun· godowyne seing yt attemptatis com purpos durst return ingland feir ye treason yat aganis ye said edward yeles • edward wes ane man ony rankoure sa reuthful ye pepil yt wes reput ane myrrour virtew quhen godowyne askit grace hym ye slaucht brothir onlie remittit ye offence bot al maid son herald duk oxfurd ȝit yi cruelte done godowyne wes lang vnpunist within schort tyme eftir wes standing ye burd afore kyng edward quhen hard ye • illis lamēt ye deith alarude ye kingꝭ brothir eit ane pece breid said god gif ye breid wory gif euir wes othir art ꝑt alarudꝭ slauchter incōtinent fel doun weryit ye breid ye noblis astonist yi deuyne punition gaif louyng god yt punist yi tyrane cō mandit body berijt vnd ye gallous bot wil return historye quhair left ¶of king malcolme cāmore actis hovv punist sindry cōspiratouris aganis hym • deith king edvvard hovv bastard normandy conquest ingland ca ix malcolme cāmore support edward kyng inglād recouerit realme ye viii ȝeir regne ye said edward wes crounit scone ye xxv day aprile fra ye incarnation imlxi ȝeris eftir coronation maid ane generall cōuention noblis forfair ye quhilk reward al yam yat assistit aganis makbeth landꝭ office cōmādit ye ilk man haif office landꝭ namit eft surname maid mony erlis lordis baronis knichtis cū myng mony yame y• war afore war maid erlꝭ fif mēteth athol leuenox murray cath •• ro angus yir war ye first er • amang w croniklis beris mony new surname come tyme amang w caud loka • gordon seyton laud wawa • e meldrū schaw leirmouth libertoun strachquhen cargill rattray dundas cokburn mirtoun •• eis abircr • lesly mony • thir namis lādis quhilkꝭ gaif namis yair possessourꝭ ye tyme otheris gat yair surnamis • cꝭ stewar • durward banermā mo •• othir ꝓper namis vailȝeant cā p • oni war turnit general surnamis▪ kennedy grahame hay wt 〈◊〉 otherꝭ quhilkis war ouir ꝓlix • 〈◊〉 • oumer yi samyn coūsal kīg malcolm maid mony ciuil religiꝰ la •• 〈◊〉 honor god ꝓffet hꝭ realm gaif makduf erle fif airꝭ becaus prīcipal brigat hym ye realm iii priuilegꝭ • irst▪ y• ye erle fif sal croun ye kīg 〈…〉 ▪ ye erle fif sal strik ye 〈…〉 • attallis quhen ye king 〈◊〉 • pa ennymes ye thrid 〈…〉 haue fre regalite mak officeris within hym replege mē 〈◊〉 neid heis fra ye kingis lawis regalite ordanit al ye said coūsal ye fre baronis sall mak iebattis draw wellis punition criminabyl personis amang mony othir cōstitutionis abrogat al lawis maid makbe • h quhill king malcolme geuyn sic besines tithingis come ye lugtak cumyn ane gret nowmer pepill scone maid hym self kīg resist sic fuliche attemptatis send ye kīgis auctorite makduf erle fif quhilk fynaly slew ye said lugtak set batal put cūpany flicht followit sindry ȝeris eft gud peace quhill last ane gret noumer theuis come ī mar louthiane inuading ye cuntre wt cōtinual heirschip slauchter nochtheles yai war finaly tane iustifijt patrik dūbar ye ilk yan king malcolm y• na virtew suld vnrewardit maid yi patrik erle marche gaif hym ye landis cokburnis peth yi condition yt tymes cumyng ye erlis marche sal purge mers louthiane theuis memory heirof bur • baner ane theuis heid strinklid blud lang efter king malcolme aduertist y• syndry noblis war cōspirit aganis hym deuisit slaucht incontinent ony feir dredour went pertly ye hūting quhare slauchter deuisit drew ye principal mouar yair cōmoning quhil yai war baith seuerit fra al cūpany incōtinent pullit swerd said tratour thow he deuisit deith best tyme debait thy self slaine gif thow dow yi man yt cōspirit aganis knawing hꝭ singular māheid fel kneis desirit grace ye king seand hym penitēt said remit thy offence sa thow attempt na sic treassonabyl dedis tymes cumyng quhil sic thingis war done ī scotland edward king ingland becaus na airis body send hꝭ ambassatourꝭ ī vngary bring hame ye two sonnis edmond namit edwyn edward bot edwyn mony ȝeris afore deceissit yi othir edward marijt agatha douchter ye king ungary quhō ane son namit edgar ii douchteris margaret cristine sone efter edward come wyfe child inglād hꝭ cumyg kīg edward wald haue resignit hym ye croun howbeit refusit saīg wald inhumane take crown duryng • li life heir ane thing admiration al pepyl ane mā refusis ye croun offerit frely hym beniuolēce quhilk al pepyll couatis maist desire regardyng na cruelte yt may fallow fyre swerd succeid ane kingdom ȝit y• felicite yir ii princꝭ succedit lāg inglād edward ungary sone eft deceissit throw quhilk kīg edward hꝭ • le tuk sic dolour yt sone eft deceissit followit thā gret cō tētion ye croun inglād yor ye ꝑ • enit iustly edgar nepot king edward afore deceissit ȝit ye noblꝭ assistit herald erle oxfurd son godowyne afore rehersit al sone herald maid kīg ingland begā gouern ye realm gud iustice ceissing fra al slauchter sindil sene yame ye vsurpꝭ y• croun wrangꝰ menes▪ sufferit al edgar moder sisteris pa liberte al boūdis quhare ya • list howbeit said edgar • ichtwis air ye croun yairfore apperit yt fortoun cōtemptiō beleuyng na thīg micht succeid aganis felicite nochtheles agatha hauand suspition trub • l efter following kepit hir son edgar secretly hir chalmer quhil last kīg herald na besines war hame tuk purpos pa flāderis • reuin cōtrarius windis normādy amang vnfreindꝭ godowyn afore slew alarud quhilk nepot williā bastard normādy al sone p̄sentit ye said duk said wt dissimilit fals mynd yt send othir kingis vsit ambassatourꝭ erādis bot comyn ꝓper ꝑson treit mariage betuix hym ye said duk normādy williā duk normādy suspekand na dissait vnder wordis gaif sic credit yt cōdiscendit geif douchter hym ī mariage belyue ane day set ye mariage maid al solēpnite yt micht deuiset ye gret pleseir al pepyl baith normādy inglād within certane dayis eft king herald returnit new wyf ī ingland hauand hym mony noblis normādy affection apperit new wife nochtheles fra cū myn london cōmandit general edict al ye normanis depart realm within iii dayis vnder pane deith nocht satifyit iniure causit hꝭ vnhappy limaris defoule lady eft yt causit yame cut hir erꝭ send hir agane ī ane fischer bait normādy williā bastard duk normandy mouit • insufferabil iniure arriuit ane army ingland efter cuming brint al schippis yt folkis micht haue na esperance flicht bot outhir vailȝeantly yair hādis elli schamfully de finaly faucht herald townis brig spulȝeir hym baith life kingdome atanis crounit sone eft westmynster eldred archebischop ȝork xxv day december ȝeir god ane mlxvi ȝeris hovv kīg malcolm mariit sāct margare • ressauit al hir freindis ī scotlād hovv sindry armyis ingland vvar discōfist scottis▪ hovv peace vvas maid betuix inglismen scottis ca x edgar seyng ye crown ingland cōquest said ye bastard normandy disparit succeid ony way ye crown yairfor eschew al dāgeir apperīg▪ gat ane schip purpos return moder sisteris ī ungary nochtheles contrar windis arriuit ane part forth callit ye quenes ferry king malcolme quhilk thꝭ tyme dūfermelyng heirand ye cuming yi schip send familiaris se quhat pepyl yai war laitly arriuit watter inquire yame quhat yai desirit al sone vnderstude thay war inglismē discendit king edward quhilk sū tyme hym sa mony pleseiris come ane honourabyll cūpany schip quhare thay war edgar ye samin maner array 〈◊〉 hym moder systeris yair best auise ressauit kīg malcolme maist tendernes brocht within palice schort tyme eft king malcolme seand ye excellent bewte wisdome gud maneris margaret eldest syster said edgar ꝓpo • agatha hir moder haue hir mariage agatha knawing weil hir douchter abyl get sa nobil ane prīce ī yi wa • ld c • n • iscendit glaidly desiris • one efter cōuention al ye noblis scotland efter octauis pasche quene margaret king malcolme war spousit maist triumphe honour yt micht deuisi • williā ye bastard normandy cōquerour ingland heirand yi mariage betuix king malcolme quene margaret dred ye sindry factionis suld follow realme assistence edgaris freindis yairfore banist al ye lynnage blude y• ꝑtenit ye said edgar proscription edgaris
