reliquies quhilkꝭ war haldin gret reuerence amang w ye mene tyme williā ye cōquerour ingland send herald malcolme desiring edgar delyuerit hādis certifying gif refusit suld tak hym force battal king malcolme notwithstāding gret minassing kyng williā ye cōquerour gaif plane repuls desirꝭ said yai war respōdēt equite king williā yi repuls denūcit weir scottꝭ ye mene tyme al ye pepil northūbirland assistit king malcolm yair erlis sister son sone efter kīg williā send ane vailȝeāt capitane ye blud rial normādy namit roger wt ane army ī northūbirlād howbeit abaid schort tyme honour discōfist scottis northūbrianis king williā litil aff • ayit yi discōfitour sēd ye duk glocester wt ane new army ī cūbir aganꝭ quhō war send ye erlis marche mēteith kepit ye boūdꝭ scotlād fra al inuasiō ye said duk kīg williā herād na vassalage done ye said duk sēd ane new army wt mair pissance thā afor ī northūbirlād yi last army ane gret noumer baith scottꝭ northūbrianꝭ war vīcust slane▪ kīg malcolm mouit wt yi • īiurꝭ rasit ane army al pepyl vnd dominion support ye northū brianis followit na le deligēce thā hatrent yi army inglād • infinit slauchter put yame flicht kyng williā na thyng brokin thir displeseris send son robert greter power afore northumbirland quhē remanit lang tyme watter tyne durst assailȝe na thing worthy haue memory maid peace betuix ye two kingis vnder thir conditionis king malcolme sall haue ye part northumbirland quhylk lyis betuix tweid cūbir stane mure sal mak homage kingis inglād ye samyn myddis stane mure salbe ane croce king inglandis ymage ta syde kyng scotlandis ye tothir signify ye tane salbe marche ingland othir scottis yi croce callit recroce say croce kingis attoure uoldosius sonne erle nortūbirland sal haue kyng williamis cosingnais mariage salbe male f • e xx ȝeris eftir following ¶hovv king malcolme dantit sindry cōspiratouris realme gret deuotion liberalite kirk vvith ane complaynt riotus cheir ca xi eftir two kingis wer aggreit maner followit scotland part trubill men galloway ilis rais gret noumer pepil maid gret slauchter heirschippis partis quhare thay come kyng malcolme punys yir attemptatꝭ send walt sonne fleance afore rehersit ane band chosyn men galloway finalie walter dantit thir lymmaris sic felicite yt wes maid stewart scotlād callit stewart surname eftir yat yi truble wes dantit yi wise followit ane othir gretar motion murrayis gaderit yair opinioun ye inhabitantis ro caithnes sindry othir pepill thair nocht onlie slew ye kingis seruandis ministeris iustice bot assistance makduncane maid mair heirschippis slaucht wes hard ony tyme afore punis yir cruelteis wer send makduf ane army mar inhabitantis thairof astonist cū myng thocht na thing sa gud stop inuasioun thair money mene tyme happinnit kyng malcolme cum monymusk gat aduertisyng al ye north ꝑtis scotland ye ilis wer confiderat thir murrayis aganis ye kyng affrayit yir tithingꝭ demandit thesaurar gif ony landis wer yai boundis ꝑtenand ye croun fra wes aduertist yt ye barony monymusk ꝑtenit yairto vowit sanct andro send hym victory last quhen wes cūyng spay fand ennimes gret power yan mycht resist espyit baner mā feir ēnimes trimbla • passand ꝑtlie forward desyrit incōtinēt pullit baner fra gaif schir alexāder carron quhilk gat mony riche landꝭ ye samyn office bot hꝭ name wes turnit eft skrymgeour quhilk discēdit ane nobil hous ꝑseuerand ȝit gret honour vnd ye samyn surname quhē kīg malcolme wes cūing ouir • pay quhair ye armyis wer reddy fecht al sidis thay wer seuerit interuētion prelatꝭ trewis tane vnd yir cōditionis ye cōmonis sal return hame ye noblis sal submit yame ye kingꝭ will▪ yair liuis lādꝭ saif notyeles mony thaym war spulȝeit thair guddis haldyn preson end thair lyfe sic thingis done king malcolme persuasion haly quene gaif hym haill virtew began haly werkis ī sic maner yt excellit othir mē day feruent deuotion sa obedient haly quene left na thing vndone yt pertenit werkis piete ye deuotion thir two haly leuaris brocht mony pepyll thair imitation clene lyf • thay contendit quhilk thaym suld maist feruent luf god agatha hir othir douchter mouit religious maneris example yir two haly leuaris▪ left ye cumpany pepyll went ane priuat solitare lyfe geuand thaym haill thair contemplation said peace maid betuix inglismen scottꝭ edgar went william king ingland quhare gat certane landis sustene estait become sa familiar hym yt haldin hym gret felicite ye • nd lyfe forthir kyng malcolme ceissit imitation wife gud w •• ki gaif extreme deligence recouer ye thing tynt afore necligence predecessouris afore tyme wa • scotland bot foure bi • hoprikis sāct andros glasgew • alloway murthlak sāct andros murthlak stude yat samyn maner thay stand bot galloway glasgew war desert quhil thay war restorit thair auld dignite king malcolme two byschoprikis eikit yame murray cathnes said 〈◊〉 insolence rais tyme amang eldaris quhen maneris langage superflew cheir inglismē come first amang w yat noblis w • nt kyng malcolme lamentit heuely vennomus pe •• burg • fast perdition pepyl prayit hym rem • samyn pepyll micht leif sic temperance thair eldaris dyd afore eldaris eit nocht botanis day desyryng na superflew metis quhilkis war socht curiously see land bot allane • ly desirit sa mekyll nature requirit yair necessar sustentation hauand thair bodyis • hand exercitioun throw quhilk yai grew mair strāg greter bodyis ar thir dayis thay war lyke gyandis gret bodyis gret armes leggis cumand lyke feirs lyonis aganis thair ennymes war astonist thairwith thay passit al strenth man thir dayis king malcolme tuk gret laubourꝭ expell spro • tand pest fra pepyl nochtheles ingyne mā sa vnhappy mair reddy euyl ony gud werkis howbeit scottis war afore content scarsnes knawyng na intemperat riotꝰ surfet ȝit fra thay traistit ye vennomus bait yairof incressit ylk day sa far na thing micht refrene samyn ȝit riotus superflew maneris quhilkꝭ war brocht realme cumyng inglismen king malcolme ar lytyl comparison sic thingis ar vsit dayis thay dayis nature man sa ouerset superflewiteis • pepyll eit bot twyis day bot two 〈◊〉 bot auaricious taist mannis w • mbe sa desyrus na frute growyng vnder heuyn land see may sufficient sa •• fy hungry appetit glutonis na mā sa estimet ȝit cōmendit yat may swellie maist comparit iustlie nature gredy wolffis bot proffettis litill complane wourdis • oust ron sa far may purgit na maner way pepill salbe erar allute • lie distroyit yi vice brocht away ¶of ye deith kīg vvilliam bastard normādy sīdry noble actis done king malcolme deith said malcolme sāct margaret sīdry meruellis sene ī albion ca xii quhil sic thingis wer done scotland kīg william ye conquerour deceissit xx ȝeir hꝭ regne fra y• incarnation imlxxxvi ȝeris left behind iii sonnis robert duke normandy william ye reid face quhilk succedit eft hym ye croun inglād henry bewcleir quhom left gret rich iowellis yi tyme kyng malcolme kest doun auld kirk durame biggit fra ground gret magnificence▪ y• priour yi abbay wes namit turgot quhilk wes eft maid bischop sanct andros wrait liuis sanct margaret malcolme vulgare langage deceissit ī sanct andros body wes br •• ht durame becaus wes prior sumtyme thairof kyng malcolme persuasion turgot biggit ane kirk dunfermelyng quhilk wes ordanit cōmon sepulturis kyngis scotland tymes cumyng attour quhay list knaw lyfe kyng malcolme cāmore blissit quene sanct margaret may returne said turgot quhilk schawis ye samyn lenth amang mony werkis quhilkꝭ wes litill cōmendit abrogat wickit lawe maid kyng ewin ye thrid cō mandit half ane mark money payit ye lord ye ground redemptioun ye womannis chastite honour callit ȝit merchetis wemen law wes nocht vnlik thing wes vsit ane town nocht far fra louane quhare gud man redemit vse wife gret soumes money fra lord ground kyng william ye reid face eftir yt ressauit croun ingland inuadit ye kirk intollerable iniuris reft fra ye samin landis rentis quhilk wer geuyn afore kest doun mony abbayis yai wer alliegit impedimēt huntyng slew al nobillis yat wer repugnant doyngis banist anselme bischop canterbery wald suffir nane lynnage abyde realme becaus repreuit doyngis finalie herand scottis ane gret part cumbir northumbirland rasit army inuadit yame gret slaucht afore ony weris wer denūcit yame last tuk ye castell anwik slew pepil foūd king malcolme resist sic thingis beginning come ane army northūbirland segit ye castel anwik quhen ye castel lāg segeing wes reddy rāde • ane knycht ingland intendyng ane hardy vassalage come ane swift hors castell armour beirand ye keyis castel speir poynt signify ye castel reddy randerit wache seand hym cum sic maner tuke na suspition bot brocht gret noyis clamour ye kingꝭ palȝeon ye king heirand ye noyis come ye palȝeon se cause thairof ye mene tyme yi inglismā held ye keyis king malcolme quhē ye kyng wes lukand maist deligently yairto yi inglismā ran throw ye left e • fled haistelie nixt wod yus wes ye kyng slane myddis army said kyng william inglād changit surname yi hardy knycht callit pers e quhome discendit ane noble hous vnder surname decorit gret honouris callit erllis nortūbirland ye scottis eftir slaucht kyng malcolme skalit fra sege returnit hame buryit kyng malcolme ye abbay tinmouth ingland bot wes tane vp eft alexander son buryit dū fermelyng trinite • ter eftir deith kyng malcolme followit new displeseir edward prince scotland eldest son king malcolm deceiss • throw ane • ond gatt ane scarmus nocht far fra anwik wes buryit dunfermelyng quene margaret heirand ye deith hir husband hir son fel malancoly decessit ye thrid day eft king malcolm wes slane ye xxv ȝeir regne • ra redemption imlxxxxvii ȝerꝭ samyn tyme mony vncouth meruellis wer sene albion inundation almane seis mony townis castellis wodis wer drounit baith ingland scotland ȝeir al ye lādis godowyne spait seis wes couerit sandis yairfore callit godowyne sandis ye pepil beleuit vengeance cumyn hym posterite slaucht alarude ha • f schawin sindry castellis townis murray wer cassin doun ye see fludis sic thundir rais yt baith men beistis wer slane gret housis cassin doun louthiane fiffe angus grene treis cornis tuk neid fyre tyme king malcolme ane generall counsal haldyn clairmont quhilk urbane ye secound ye name institute ye houri matynis blissit virgyne mary said dayly hir louing cōmandit pepyll haue hir speciall remembrance ylk satterday satterday efter gud fryday cristin faith • ynt erdly creaturis saif anerly ye samyn tyme li • ia quhilk ane gret part asia distroyit ye sa • aȝenis ye bonis sanct nicholas brocht ye samyn barre ¶of king donald ye vii hovv sonnis king malcolme fled inglād hovv duncane bastard son king malcolme vsurpit croun vvas slane tyrāny hovv edgar recouerit hꝭ realm ye deith donald ca xiii malcolme vi sonnis sāct margaret edward quhilk slane said etheldred quhilk deit tender age buryit dunfermelyng edmond quhilk renuncet warld leiffit ane haly lyfe ingland tothir iii war namit edgar alexander dauid sū authouris sayis edmond put preson slane oncle donald bane donald schew afore fled ilis eschew tyranny makbeth efter deith kyng malcolme brothir returnit scotland support ye king norroway promittit geif ilis scotland perpetual dominion said king sa optenit croun support donald finaly tuk croun small difficulte pepil detesting riotus intemperat maneris brocht amāg thaym inglismen assentit sone opinioun traistit becaus wes nurist wt thair auld customis gud maneris recouer seuerite temperance thair auld progenitouris al sone edgar bruthir quene margaret wes aduertist donald bane tane croun scottis brocht quietlie hꝭ thre nepotis edgar alexander dauid yair twa sisteris ingland quhen kepit yam certane tyme ane knycht namit organus mouit malice traistyng get reward thairfore accusit hym treason saying nurist sister sonnis douchteris within ingland heritouris crown thairof bot malice wes nocht lang vnpunist said organe wes slane ane freid edgar quhilk assistit said edgar defendit action singular batta • l deith quhen donald resauit ye croun scone fand part nobillis nocht afald opinion hauand beneuolence ye childrin kyng malcolme hym ye cause said amang familiaris eft collation nobillis suld haistelie repent thair doyngis le yan thay applyit yame opinionis bot thir wourdis w • r depar prentit yair myndꝭ yan beleuit ye mene tyme schir dū cane bastard son king malcolme wes send ingland support king williā wt ye reid face put kyng donald fra ye croun king donald aduertist • ūyng met wt ane army quhen ye battallis wer reddy iune mony ye noblis cōmonis scotlād com fra donald schir duncane thꝰ wes donald ꝯstranit flee ye ilis schir dū cane come haistely victoriꝰ army scone tuk crown becaus wes exercit cheualry ony administratioun iustice traistit na thing iust richt bot succedit swerd rycht battal followit infinite trubill deuisionis ye realme donald bane heirand yir diuisionis amang ye lordis solistit makpender erle mernis assist opinion finalie slew kyng duncane slepand bed eftir roung ane ȝeir ane half becaus duncane wes ane tyrane geuyn cruelte blude menit slaucht thocht euil done eftir slaucht donald wes restorit croun quhilk brukit afore schir dūcane ane ȝeir vi monethꝭ sa ye realme wes cōtinewall trubill iii ȝeris thair tyranny ye nobillis socht mony occasionis finis empire ye mene time rais gret slauchteris heirschippis al partis ye realme nochtwithstanding yi diuision trubill amang lordis ȝit weris continewit aganis inglismen howbeit na thing followit worthy haif memorie nocht lang eftir magnꝰ kīg norroway come ane • lote schippis al ye ilis scotland garnist strenthis thairof men munition vittallis maid ye samyn lawis institutionis quhilkis ar ȝit vsit ye ilis scottis hauand gret indignation yt ye ilis scotland suld pa vnd vncouth empire send yair oratouris edgar quhilk wes fourt son malcolme desiring wt gret instance recouer faderis heritage croun scotland edgar sone eftir send ambassatouris hꝭ eme donald promittīg gif wald exoner hym ye croun plesandlie sen pertenit nocht deliuer hym gret lordschippis louthiane yir ambassatouris cruelte kyng donald wer finalie slane edgar rycht desirus reuenge thir iniuris come scotlād ane gret power support william kyng ingland quhen wes cūyng durame gat ane visioun sleip gif rasit baner sanct cuthbert suld haif victorie morow enterit abbay sanct cuthbert quhair gar • deuyne seruice maist reuerence sone eft wes cōmādit vision displayit sāct cuthbertis baner nochtheles kyng donald met hym arrayit oistis eftir lang battall wes chasit ye ilis quhair wes tane finalie brocht edgar put preson quhare sone eftir deceissit edgar eft victory went dunfermelyng holy sepulturis blissit mo •• r sanct margaret remanent brethir syne maid ane conuention nobillis scone quhare • essauit ye croun wes ointit godrik bischop sanct andros ȝeir god imic ane ȝeir sāct margaret purchest schort tyme afore hir deceis fra paip urbane y• • f • er hir al kingꝭ scotland suld ointit thairfore edgar first king scottis ointit yi priuilege cōfermit efter paip iohne secound ye name ¶of ye vassalage done sindry cristin princis haly land hovv mald eldest douchter king malcolme vvas mariit king ingland ye ȝoū gest douchter maryit ye erle bolony thair succession deith king edgar ca xiiii two ȝeir afore ye coronation kyng donald mony nobyll men passit haly land amang quhom robert duk normā dy godofrid duk lorne ye erle blasen ye erle flanderis mony othir princis france becaus thay went inuaid ye sarazenis gaif large feis yair men armis yai gaderit ane army mair pissance nowmer pepil thā euer sene afore yi army went first throw grece cōstātinople▪ sine com throw ye seys callit hellespontꝰ displayit baner litill asia wan ane • rang toun namit antioche ye land siria quhare yai war warnit ane vision sāct andro ye appostil yt ye speir heid ye ꝑsit cristꝭ hart hid vnder ye erd ye kirk sāct peter finaly efter mony strāg townis tane yame yai tuk ierusalē y• heid toun iowry fra redemption imlxxxxix ȝeris becaus ye haly land recouerit yi maner fra sarazenis ye pepyl maid frequent ꝓcessionis throw al partis cristindome geuand louyng almichty god thir happy victoryis fallyng cristin princis efter yi fell ane gret cōtention amāg yame quha suld king iowry ylkane refusit ye honour knawing worthy sustene sa gret charge last general vocis robert duk normādy chosyn king nochtheles becaus aduertist yt brothir king williā ingland ye reid face deceissit ony airis body refusit ye croun iowry traisting mair expedient hym haue ye empire ingland ye duchery normā dy thā kyng iowry yairfore gaif richt yairof ye duk lorane sic thingis done mony yir cristin princis returnit hame robert duk normandy frustrat baith ye croun iowry ingland efter yt refusit reiose ye croun iowry preuenit brothir hary bewcleir ye croun ingland hary bewcleir mariit mald eldest syster king edgar scotlād king edgarꝭ secound sister namit mary maryit eustachius erle bolony • uce hym ane douchter quhilk heritoure bolony maryit efter steuyn erle marche ingland quhilk succedit immediatly croun thairof nepot kīg hary bewclere sal efter schaw yi hary bewcleir gat mald first sister king edgar two sonnis namit richard williā two douchteris namit effem mald bot wyl ruturn hystory ¶kyng edgar beniuolence schawin hym sanct cuthbert gaif al ye lādis colding hame monkis durame gaif ye town berwik canulphꝰ bischop duram becaus canulphus cōmittit sindry treasonabyl dedis aganꝭ king edgar tint • aith ye keping berwik depriuat benefice quene mald efter ye scho maryit kīg hary bewcleir gaif hir singular virtew following ye lyfe hir blissit moder sanct margaret throw quhilk scho ane myrrour gud leuyng pepyl ingland king edgar na vncouth weris trubyl dayis gouernit realme gud peace haldin mair veneration terrour amang pepyl quhil last deceissit ix ȝeir regne dūde burrit dunfermelyng fra redemption im ix ȝeris ☞of king alexander first hovv king dauid brothir vvas maid erle huntingtoun northumbirland vveris maid betuix hary bevvcleir france dolour deith sonnis deith kyng alexander ca xv efter deith kīg edgar succedit ye v son malcolme namit alexander ye feirs becaus dātit theuis singular māheid ye beginnyng regne ye murrayis rossis seing hym cōtinually exercit sic cōtemplatiue materis hꝭ fader mod vsit afore maid diuers • eiffis extorsionis ye cūtre gret slauchter baith men wiffis barnis quhare yai come king alexā der dant yir attemptatis come wt sic diligence thir cōspiratouris yt thay war finaly tane punist deith hꝭ returnyng hame ane womā fell knee afore hym dolorus array cōplening ye baith hir son husband war slane ye maister mernis king alexāder mouit wi • h yi pietuus cōplaynt lichtit doun hors come neuer quhil saw ye erlis son hyngit offēce sic thingꝭ done tuk purpos returnyng repare ye castell baledgar quhilk foundit afore king edgar ī gowry quhair gret multitude theuis vsit remane ye wod inuading ye pepyll oftymes slauchter heirschippis ye king gat certane landis fra ye erle gowry annexit yame yi castel ȝit quhen biging yi castel maist diligence yt theuis tuk sic feir dredand yt ye said castel suld ane aw • ād aganis yame yt ya • cōspirit aganis hym corruppit cubicularis wt money suffer yame ly wait within ane closat yi castel yt thay micht cū nycht sla king quhen sleipand nochtheles sone efter yair cumyng within chalmer king aduertist prouidence god pullit haistely hꝭ swerd quhilk hi • gand bed heid slew first cubicular becaus 〈2 page missing〉 decorit ordoure ci • un singulare eruditioun h • ly lyfe ordoure beg • n sanct robert ye ȝeir fra red • ytion imlxxxv bot sanct barnard deceissit ye abbay clairwall wes buryit said abbay sanct melchiad scottisman bot returne history eftir deith alexander ye first brothir dauid c • inglād wes • rouny • scone ȝeir god imicxx • iii ȝeris gret iustice eft 〈◊〉 coronation ꝑtis real • e na weris duryng tyme kyng hary wes sa pi •• uous sat daylie iugement caus pure cōmonis haue iustice causit ye actionis noblis decidit othir iugꝭ gart ilk iuge redres y• skaithis yt come ye par • hꝭ wrang sentence throw quhilk decorit realm mony nobil actis eieckit vēnomus custome riotus cheir▪ quhilk wes inducit afore inglismen quhen yai com quene margaret ye samyn • noysum al gud maneris makand pepil • ender effeminat fourt ȝeir regne yi nobill prince come visie mad •• castell edinburgh tyme boundis scotlād wer ful woddis lesou • ꝭ medois ye cūtre wes geuin store bestiall ony productioun cornys castell wes ane gret forest full hari • •• ndis toddis siclike maner • stis wes rude day cumyn callit exaltation croce becaus ye samyn wes ane hie solempne day ye king past cōtē • lation eftir messi • wer done maist solempnite reuerence comperit afore hym mony • oung insolent baronis scotland rycht desyrus haif sum plesei • solace chace hundis said forest tyme wes ye kyng ane man singulare deuoit lyfe namyt alkwine chan •• n eftir ye • rdour sanct augustyne quhilk wes lang tyme confessoure afore kyng dauid ingland tyme • wes erle huntingtoun northumbirland religious man dissuadit kyng mony reasonis pa huntis allegit ye day wes solempne reuerence h • ly croce suld gif hym 〈◊〉 day contemplation ony othir exercition nochtheles dissuasionis lityll • alit kyng wes finalie ꝓuokit oportune solicitatioun baronis past nochtwithstandyng ye solempnite yi day hoūtis last quhen wes cumyn throw vail lyis gret eist fra said castell quhare lyis cannogait staill past throw wod sic noyis • yn • achis bugillis yat bestis • er rasi • fra thair dennys wes ye kyng cumyn fute ye crag noblis seuerit h • ir thair fra hym thair game solace quhē suddanlie apperit sycht farest hart yt euir w • sene afore leuand creatour ye noyis dyn yi hart ry • nād apperit auful braid • yndis maid kingꝭ hors effrayit na remeis mycht hald hym bot yer f •• ce ouir myre mo • away ye kyng nochtheles ye ha • followit fast dang baith kyng hors ye ground ye king kest bak handis betuix ye tyndis yi hart haif sa •• fra ye strak yairof ye haly croce slaid incōtinēt hꝭ handꝭ yt hart fled away wt gre • violence euanist ye place▪ quhare springis rude well ye pepyll richt affrayitly returnit hym partis ye wod cō fort hym efter trubyll fell kneis deuotly adoryng ye haly croce cumyn sū heuinly prouydence weill apperis yair na man schaw quhat mater metal tre sone eft ye king returnit castel ye nicht following admonist ane vision sleip big ane abbay chānonis regular ye place quhare gat ye croce al sone awalkinnit schew vision alkwine cōfessour na thing suspendit gud mind bot erar inflāmit wt maist feruent deuotion yairto ye king incōtinent send traist seruandis france flanderis brocht rycht crafty masonis big abbay syne dedicat ye honour yi haly croce yi croce remanit continewally y• said abbay y• tyme king dauid bruce quhilk vnhappely tane durame quhare haldin ȝit ī gret veneratiō yi abbay laitly gouernāce ane gud man den robert bellenden abbot xvi ȝerꝭ delt ylk owlk iiii • owis quheit xl syluer amāg pure houshaldaris indegēt pepyl brocht hame yt gret bellis gret brasyn fount xxiiii capis gold sylk maid ane chalice fyne gold ane eucharist sindry challicis siluer theikkit ye kirk leid biggit ane brig leith ane othir ouir clide▪ mony othir gud werkis quhilkis war ouir prolixt schaw nochtheles sa 〈◊〉 sindry othir prelatis becaus geuyn lust insolence efter yair maner yt left abbay deit ane chartour monk ¶of gret liberalite king dauid tovvart ye kirk dāmage successouris battall allartoun▪ hovv peace vvas maid betuix scottis inglismen ca xvii kyng dauid biggit xv abbayꝭ scotland quhais namis ar halyrudhous kelso iedburgh melros newbottel holmcultrane dū dranane cābuskēneth kinlois dū fermeling holme ī cūber ii nūrijs ane carlele ane othir north berwik foundit ii abbayis beside ye new castel y• tane sanct benedictꝭ ordour ye othir quhit mō ki foūdit iiii bischoprikꝭ ro brechin dūkeld dūblane dotat yame gret rentis landis possessionis sindry prudent mē na thing apprisis gret liberalite king dauid toward ye kirk dotat ye kirk sa richely ye lādis pertenand ye croun yt successourꝭ micht sustene yair riall estait eft hym sa weil yai afore ye caus he bene ye deith mony nobyl princis ī thꝭ realm geuand yame sū tyme occasion bring gret housis nocht cōques lādis sustene ye croun sum tyme inuading ye cūtre cōtinewal stentis importabyl exactionis ye pepyl sū tyme cōstranis yame disparit prī ce inuaid ingland wt battal takand na sollicitude quhat cū yair life sū tyme prentand euyll money aganis ye cōmon weil al yir mischeui • he followit sen syne ī yi realm becaus croun wes left indegent throw ampliation gret rentis ye kirk howbeit king dauid samyn beleuit best ye pepyl war sa symple ī thay dayis thay traistit fermely na man mycht haue sa syngulare fauoure god yt gaif maist rich landis ye kirk thairfore ye wise prince king iames ye first quhen com dauidis sepulture dunfermelyng said ane soi • sanct crown wald mene y• kyng dauid left ye kirk ouir riche ye crown ouir pure tuke fra crown maister iohne mair writis cronikles lxm • scottis quhilk possedit day ye kirk na le dāmage cōmon weil thā perditioun gud religion gyf king dauid consider • maneris nurising deuote religion nothir dotat kirkis sic rich ȝit biggit thaym sic magnificence superflew rentis kirkꝭ thay ar vsit ar occasion euyl prelatis rage maist insolent • orruppit life bot ane sicker n • draw al maner gold syluer thꝭ realm howb • le dāmage w • ld succeid gif abbayis war prouid • yair ordinaris ony dyspensation fra yair habit religious maneris ordinaris thair primat ony exemption y• primat yair coūsal prouincial verite wtin thir lxx ȝeris na maner benificis bot allanerly bischoprikꝭ ȝeid rome sen syne se quhat infinit gold syluer tane thꝭ realm thair continewal promotion thairfore realme salbe brocht sic irrecouerabyll pouerte continewal promotion prelatis within ȝeris salbe ane facyl pray ennymes may sustene sa gret charge tyme weir done afore eldaris becaus nothir spirituall temporall estait within realme he ony affection cōmon weil thairof bot ylk man se • allanerly awin singular way wyl deplore na mair calamiteis succedyng dayly thair imprudence bot wil return histor • quhair left ¶king dauid translatit ye sait murthlak ab •• dene quhare mony nobil bischoppꝭ he bene sall efter schaw kyng dauid ane sonne namit hary gotin haue schawin mald heritour northumbirland cūber huntingtoun yi hary maryit erle warrānis douchter gat hir thre sonnis malcolme william dauid thre douchteris adama margaret mald ye mene tyme king dauidꝭ hous gret displeseir wyfe deceissit hir flurisant ȝeris buryit scone fra redemptiō ane micxxxii ȝeris ye vii ȝeir ye regne king dauid efter hir deith king dauid passit residew dayis ony cūpany wemen quhil sic thingis war done scotland mald douchter hary bewcleir returnit ingland hir husband hary ye fourt ye name empriour deccissit ony airꝭ body hir cumyng inglād hir fader king hary maid ane general cōuention noblis ga • yame sweir defend said mald douchter iust heritour ye croun ingland syne maryit hir gawfrid plantaginet erle angeos quhō scho bure ane son namit hary quhilk wes efter king ingland callit pepyll y• son ye emprice yi time robert duk normādy deceissit ony succession body quhais deith duchery come hary bewcleir brothir yi hary bewcleir deceissit fra redemption imicxxxiiii ȝeris yan succedit gret trubil ingland mald emprice tyme deith hir husband gawfrid plantaginet angeos quhilk tyme gret infirmite hauād hir son hary bot ii ȝeris age mene tyme steuyn erle bolony sister son hary bewcleir gaderit ane gret army cū ingland yt micht cōques ye croun yairof first war vndermynd ye cuntre slichtis desirit ye croun geuyn quhil prince hary war lauchful age succeid ye noblis seād petitiōis reasonable maid hym kīg randerit ye strenthis ye cuntre garnist mē munition vittallis pleseir schort tyme efter king steuin send ane herald kīg dauid scotland chargeād hym cū ony tary ingland geif • ith fidelite homage landis northūbirland huntingtoun cūbir▪ ītimation gif refusit inuaid wt battal king dauid answerit yt gaif aith afore yir lādis mald wife sen lefull violat aith wald erar stand ye faith yt he ꝓmist thā applaud new inuasouris▪ king steuin mouit answer send ye duk glocester ane army ī northūbirland quhilk stude ye tyme vnder ye empire scottis maid incredibyll slauchter heirschippis ꝑtis thairof ye scottis mouit yir iniuris ceissit n • quhil yai recōpensit ye said iniurꝭ ingland ye erlis marche menteth angus went ī ingland ane gret power faucht allirton quhare ye inglismen war discōfist mony noblis ingland wt said duk brocht presoneris scotland king steuyn throw discōfitour cōstranit redeme ye said duk hꝭ noblis huge money payment thair redēption gaif ouir al richt clame yt successouris micht ony way haue northūbirland cūbir huntingtoun nochtheles efter ye redemptiō noblis become penitent yi discharge foresaid come ī northūbirlād quhare maid gret slauchter heirschippꝭ throw boūdis yairof recouer dominion king dauid resist yir iniuris gaderit ane army deliuerit mynd othir expel inglismē al boū dis ꝑtenand empire elli al atanis de eft cumyng roxburch come yt bischop ȝork maid peace iiii monethis vnd yir cōditionis y• inglismen sal delyuer northūbirland fre hary prīce scotland becaus thir cōditionis war kepit king dauid come ane new army ī northūbirlād left na inglismē lyue kīg steuyn reuenge yir iniuris com gret ordinance roxburgh constranit return hame ony inuasion scottis becaus noblis wald assist purpos last peace tretit vnder yir cō ditionis northūbirland huntingtoun sal remane vnder empire hary prince scotland richt moder cūber remane wt hym richt kyng dauid fader thir landis ye said hary successouris sall mak homage al kingis ingland ye tyme ¶of deith hary prince scotland▪ orison maid king dauid noblis hovv malcolm first nepot vvas maid prince scotlād vvilliā secoūd nepot erle northūbirland deith king dauid sindry gret clerkis ca xviii peace ratifijt maner king steuyn returnit kent king dauid cūbir quhare remanit certane tyme reparyng towne ca • lele new walles ☞ ¶thir war dedis kyng steuyn thrid ȝe •• regne iiii ȝeir mald ye emprice come ingland ane army recouer hir heritage left behind hir gawfrid hir husband wt hir ȝoung son angeos hir cū myng baith ye erle ch • ster glacester mony othir yair freindis went hir opinion becaus ye residew ye noblis assistit king steuyn ye decision yi ple • cōtinewit lang weris ingland wt sindry chancis fortoun ye mene tyme hary hir sone maryit elynore quhilk heritour ye 〈◊〉 turing ye erldomes poyteris man throw quhilk supportit come ane gret army ingland nochtheles quhen ye battallis war reddy iune peace maid maner hary sall haue ane part ye landis ꝑtenand croun ingland sustene hym life king steuyn efter deith succeid ye h • le empire ingland yi elynor • maryit afore lewis dalphin frāce partit hym becaus scho cō • unit hym proximite blud scho bure hary ane son namit e •• hard quhilk efter heritour inglād normādy angeos gascunȝe richt • ad heritour duchery turyng poyte • ꝭ man mod sic thī gi done ī ingland hary son kīg dauid scotlād deceissit gret lament pepyll left behynd hym haue said afore thre sōnis smal age buryit ye abbay kelso ye ȝeir fra redemptioun imiclii ȝeris ye deith yi hary richt displesand king dauid ane prince singular virtew gud maneris eft deith hary ye noblis cōuenit f •• th al partis scotland mak •• solation king dauid ye dolour yt tuk ye deith son ȝit becaus hary left behynd hym iii sonnis iii douchteris lyue thay thocht ye realm weil garnist king dauid seing noblis richt dolorus heuy ye deith hꝭ son callit yame ane bā ket said ī thꝭ maner tender freindis ȝour trew faith perseuerand deligēce weil richt patent yi day howbeit na experience tyme bigane bene thairof se ȝour myndes geuyn na le compassion heuynes ony ȝour awin sōnis deceissit ȝe ar cumyn mak consolation dolour haue tane ye deith son becaus may rander ȝow condigne thankis tyme superseid quhill may mair plesandly ynouch confes thing yt baith body saule dettit ȝow forthir concernyng ye mater yt ȝe ar cumyn schawyng ȝour humanyte towart ȝe may haue mynd wordis parentis quhom beleue eikit ye nowmer sāctis ye singular deuote life he institute ȝouth worschip god reuerence quhilk doi na thing ī vane bot euery thīg disponis hꝭ infinite wisdom sū gud fyne quhen cōsidder ye wyse deuote cōmandementis parentis baith aduersite gud chance ar paisit equale balāce fader moder brethir sisterꝭ ar passit fra yi fragil life mā nix • follow sen ar mortale al aduersite suld paciently sufferit w le corruppit lyfe list thirl self eternal deith thīk thairfore yt suld erar reiose y• god gaif ane son hꝭ special fauour quhilk he conquest beniuolence al pepyl gud hauyngis thā sorrow deith▪ quhat iniure 〈…〉 ȝow 〈…〉 haue posse • lang tyme tollerance ȝit beleif sall nocht lang absentit fra •• nne trais • ing hym yat maist pyssant kyng suddanly brocht hym otheris freindis quhilkis ar preeminance glore yan 〈…〉 wer 〈◊〉 sorowfull vail 〈◊〉 ye mercyfull god he geuin w sick •• esperance beleif son passit ꝑmanent glore quhair intend al cum prayis god may worthy quhen • ule • n seuir corporall preson pa felicite quhare traist gone eftir yi orison noblis went thair lugeingis hauand gret admiration ye kingꝭ constant deuotion mynd sone eftir kyng dauid causit malcolme eldest sonne hary afore rehersit declarit prince scotland ye nobillis sworne opinion eftir went north • birland maid william secund nepot erle thairof eftir yi went carlele quha •• maid hary prince ingland • nycht take aith ya • 〈…〉 northumbirland 〈◊〉 hūtingtoun fra empire scottis schort tyme eft king dauid fell • ne heuy maledy quhilk pers • ueris ye end lyfe quhen fand self 〈◊〉 went kirk tuke ye 〈…〉 realm fra corruppit 〈…〉 bot causit seruandis 〈◊〉 virtews occupationis neuir vicious wourd wes hard mouth na insolence within hous na ri • tus banketting surfet collation vsit hꝭ cumpany al wourdis werkis doingꝭ seruād • wer ay direckit sum gud fyne ony seditioun displeseir sic cherite concord seruādis apperit vnd ane mynd amyte tyme kyng dauid wer mony nobill clerkis richard scottisman channoun sanct uictouris abbay quhare wes eftir buryit peter lumbardy doctour theologie bischop paris siclik wes thay dayis graciane gaderit decretis giddir ane volumen ¶and sa endis heir twelf buke thir cronikillis heir begynnis xiii buke croniklis scotland ☞¶of king malcolme madin gret 〈…〉 de • th scotlād hovv king hary tuk malcolme vveris aganis france sindry 〈…〉 aganis malcolme said hary ca primo dauid buryit yi wise • epot malcolme gottin hary sonne •• uād bot xiii ȝeir 〈◊〉 ī age wes maid kyng yocht wes nocht ganand sustene sa gret charge tendir age ȝit apperit maneris virtew ane nobill prince wes nurist fra first ȝouth sa clene haly life yat wes namyt malcolme ye madin first ȝeir empire hary prīce ingland tuke ye croun throw quhilk kyng steuin tuke sic malancoly deceissit tyme wes ane miserable derth throw boundis scotlād sone eft followit ane violent pest howbeit wes contagius ye gret mortalite baith man best mortalite gaif occasioun somerled attempt ane mater hiear besynes semyt estait becaus saw ta half ye realme slane pest othir hunger come ane huge peple co • ques croun slew elli heryit thaym yat • repugnant mynd bot attemptatis 〈◊〉 lang vnpunist 〈◊〉 erle angus slew iim 〈◊〉 chasit hym self ireland▪ hary secound name kyng ingland heirand yat kyng malcolme dantit ennymes sort dred suld gif hym occasioun insolent inuaid ingland battall thairfore counsall nobillis h • send ane herald kyng malcolme chargeand hym cum london 〈◊〉 mak homage seruice hym ye landis cumbir northūbirland huntyngtoun siclik dauid gudschir afore hary first certification gif 〈◊〉 suld tak fra hym said landis kyng malcolme obey • yi charge howbeit wes vnder condition suld nocht preiudiciall liberte scotland king hary weir yi tyme aganis lewis vi kyng france constrani • kyng malcolm pa france yocht kīg malcolme ane saif cōduct pa repas ȝit mycht nocht ganestand kyng haryis charge • tyme attoure wes meik desirus peace battall youcht knew detestable iniurius pa weirfair aganis cōfiderat freind kyng france ȝit thocht becaus wes constranit mycht haue sufficient mater excuse hym self quhen tyme occurrit • obeyit kyng hary pointis 〈◊〉 voyage kyng hary inuadit france gret iniuris seg •• town tullus tuk hym kyng malcolme expeditionis weris 〈◊〉 kyng malcolme suld incurre sic hatrent indignatioun 〈…〉 samyn mycht 〈◊〉 • 〈◊〉 thaym 〈…〉 last kyng hary brokyn gret 〈◊〉 nobillis 〈…〉 ingland 〈…〉 malcolme 〈◊〉 scotland kyng malcolme eftir returnyng 〈…〉 ambassatouris mak 〈…〉 〈◊〉 eftir thair 〈◊〉 ▪ ane 〈…〉 tyme beleuit thairfore kyng france suld haue litill hatrent aganis hym mater fra vnderstude verite kyng hary satifyit yt gaif occasioun seditioun betuix malcolme nobillis tymes bigane bot renew samyn displeseir causit kyng malcolme return agane ȝork eftir returnyng thairto complaynit noblis kyng malcolme reuelit secretis army franchemen na litill dāmage slauchter pepill said thairfore samin wes sufficient reason depriue hym landis cumbir huntyngtoun northūbirland youcht kyng malcolme mony sufficient reasonis declarit yir ymaginationis vane effect ȝit kyng hary afore kyng malcolmes returnyng scotland send wourd nobillis yairof kyng malcolme renuncit clame said landis mak hym odious realme liegis al sone wes returnit scotland mony nobillis conspirit aganis hym segit hym castell bertha howbeit knew na thing yir iniuris wrocht aganis hym slycht inglismen nochtheles fra thay knew verite thay skalit fra sege askit hym mercy kyng malcolme mouit thir iniuris seand landis haldin wranguslye fra hym rasit army inuadit ingland sindry displeseiris last eftir sindry chance battall ane cōuention wes maid carleil peace maid maner northumbirland sall pa vnder empire kynng hary bot cumbir huntingtoun sall remane afore vnder empire malcolme ¶hovv kyng malcolme punist syndry conspiratouris▪ hovv murrayis thair rehellion vvar disherist put murray ca ii trubill beand mesit ī maner afore rehersyt followyt ane othir howbeit wes le motioun angus thane galloway seand attēptatꝭ micht cū effect quhen yai wer quietlie done come ane gret cūpany vsurpe ye croun nochtheles army wes discōfist gilcrist erle angus hym self chasit quhiterne quhare ane girth dedicat ye honour sāct niniant king malcolme wald brek ye girth nochtheles cōmandit ane gard wait angus sa lang quhill come king malcolm dant insolence suld nocht haue occasioun sic attemptatis intymes cuming cōfiscat maist part landis tuke sonne pledge gud reule hym tymes cummyng angus seyng mycht nocht sustene estait quhen landis wer taikin fra hym afore schoif heid halyrudhous deceissit ane channon thairof nocht lang eftir rais ane othir trubil siclik motioun murrayis aduise gildo thair capitane heryit ro bogeall mar gareach buch quhen mernis slew ye kingis seruandis quhilkis wer send inquire ye motiue yair iniuris punys thir attemptatis kyng malcolme send gilcrist erle angus ane army murray nochtheles murrayis put hym flycht kyng malcolme nochtwithstāding yi discōfitour come displayit baner ouir spay dantit ye murrayis syndry victoryis punition thair offencis cōmandit nane thaym saiffit except wyffis barnis agit personis exemple othir subdittis moue rebellyon aganis hym tymes cumyng murrayis beand wyse neir distroyit al partis realme kyng cōmandit new pepyll set thair lā dis inhabitation thairof mene tyme somerled thane argyle quhilk banist ha • e schawin ireland traisting kīg malcolme odius nobyllis cōmonis cruelte vsit aganis ye murrayis thocht expedi ••• assailȝe new chāce fortoun returnit certane nakit mē scotland bot attemptatis com mair infelicite afore vincust hingit ane ie •• cōmand king malcolme ¶hovv byschop sanct andros persuadit malcolme mariage synd • actis done king malcolme deith ca iii malcolme void solicitude charge battall hauand ennymes na partꝭ set engyne gouern realm iustice becaus two sisterꝭ reddy mariage namit margaret adame maryit first duke bertanȝe othir erle holland sic thingis done set ane counsall scone certane materis concerning ye common weill nobyllis beand assemblit rais vp ane man syngulare prudence namit arnald bischop sanct andros said thir wise ane thyng maist nobyll prince wald say commoun weill praying thairfore thy hyenes geif eiris thairto sal pertene na le thy syngulare honour cōmon weil lang ago thow tuk purpos pa thy tyme frute maryage sen thow tuke purpos thi tender ȝouth howbeit ȝele virtew ȝit gif thow geif eiris quhilkis neuir exhortit yt vane purpos thou wyll change thy mynd vnproffitabyll gouernance thy realme quhat thyng may mair honest mariage quhilk institute mynois kyng crete ligurgus kyng lacedemon solon athene howbeit thay war maist cyuyll prudent men thair constitutionis bot allanerly god maist honest proffitabyll nature mā gyf wyse prudent begynnar warld found ony othir thyng mair proffytabyll mariage commandit weill man ¶attoure quhat mair proffytabyll bryngis leuand creaturis ye warld quhat mair naturall coniunctioun male female youcht thow wald allege▪ crist mony othir sanctis leiffit chaist say sic lyfe nocht ordanit publict personis ȝit euery stait bot allanerly religious men precheouris lawis bot thow art chosyn ane othir office say gouerne thy pepyl iustyce leif succession thy body may proffet commoun weill efter thy deith quhat thyng may mair plesand proffitabyll haue ane lady thy fallow quhilk may gei • consolatioun euery doloure aduersite may fall pleseir thy heill mei quhen angir apperꝭ cure thy body refresche thy spreit quhen thow art wery dispair nocht bot sum lady may found rycht aggreabyll thy conditionis othir pryuat personis mycht haue solicitude gret cummer espying sic thingis bot thow suld haue na feir thairof fynaly quhat thyng mair dulce plesand kyngis princis thā haue child thair bodyis quhilkis ar maist necessar thaym weir peace peace thair commoun weill may gouernit maist faithfully thaym tyme weir thay may thair lieutennantꝭ inuincibyl campionis beir sic chargis thay sall na le terroure thy fayis munitioun thy pepyl thairfore said prudent wyse philosophouris men ar nocht cumyn yi warld allanerly yair awin weill bot sum part weill thair freindis thair child sum part weill thair realme cuntre specyally thay ar maid god nature publict personis heirfore sen na thyng sa commendabyll sa honest ȝit sa proffitabyll thaym he publik gouernauce leif successioun behynd thaym commoun weill traist fynaly thow sall nocht ane thyng mair displesand god defraude thy realme successioun quhen byschop arnold assailȝeit thir mony othir reasonis persuade kyng maryage kyng mair repugnant samyn afore institute sa ȝouth dedicat virginite crist nochtheles god prouidit realme suld nocht want ayris gouerne samyn iustice nocht lang efter kyng malcolme fell ane heuy malady noy thairof constranit tak peace nichtbouris mene tyme foundit abbay sanct reule callit sāct andros▪ quhilk biggit se gret magnificence bot dotat small rentis sufficient ynouch sustene diuyne seruyce thairfore channonis said abbay leuit maist feruent deuotioun seruyce god becaus thay na prouocatioun lustis superflew rentis nocht geuyn auarice pleseir bot onely thair contemplatioun ¶he foundit al abbay cowpa • efter ordoure cistius dotat ye honour ye blissit virgyne mary mony landis possessionis ☞ ¶at tyme thomas cantorbury ane man syngulare lyfe deuotioun exilit ingland▪ kyng malcolme fynaly vexit lang infirmite deceissit iedburgh xii ȝeir regne ane come • schane fourtene dayis togydder afore deith lang terrybyll bemis body buryit dunfermelyng fra incarnatioun ane thousand ane hundred lxv ȝeris ☞¶of kyng vvyllyam actis hovv scottis suste •• mair displeseir theuis externe vveris hovv kyng vvyllyam vvas tane anvvik ca iiii malcolme buryit maner dunfermelyng wyllyā brothir callit syngulare iustice lyoun maid kyng efter coronatioun thocht na thyng sa honest recouer landis reft afore fra brothir king malcolme send ambassat • uris kyng hary desyryng northumbirland restorit hym becaus pertenit hym kyndly herytage king hary answerit suld haif al thyngis pertenand hym reason sa wald eldaris afore cum london make homage landis cumber huntyngtoun kyng wylliam sone efter come london quhen maid obedience said landis desyrit northumbirland restorit hym king hary •• sit thir desyris saying landꝭ quhilkis war annerit crown mycht nocht seuerit thairfra ony priuat auctorite nochtwithstā ding promittit conuene nobyllis ane counsall fulfyll desyris gif thay war found reasonabyll quhen tyme occurrit mair expedient mene tyme kyng hary went ane army normandy causit kyng wyllyam mony othir nobyllis scotland pa hym sayd iornay kyng wyllyam wald refuse yir chargis tyme aduenture samyn war occasion repell desyris last quhen taryit lang tyme army na esperance recouer landis desyrit lycence returne hame quhilk beand gret difficulte grantit kyng wyllyam nobyllis come throw ingland ye maist haiste way mycht scotland set ingyne punys cruelteis done theuis tratouris realme act estimatioun maist proffytabyll thyng mycht haue done gyf ony wyse men wyll consydder baith dammage commoditeis realme thay sall fynd skaith dāmage done theuis ar mair displesand skaithful w ony weiris ingland oftimes fynd innocent pepyll passingeris murdryst theuis sobir geir thair vaiage ȝit thir displeseiris ar bot small respect othir crueltris iniuris done thir theuis quhen thay ar gaderit thay birn cuntre slay commonis quhilkis may nocht resist thaym mony othir cruelteis mair insufferabyll w ony vncouth weiris howbeit samyn nocht done sa opinly attour slauchter heirschippis maid vncouth weris ar nocht sa miserabyll vnworthy rehersit thir cruelteis done strang theuis tratouris euery chance battall sum consyderatioun concernyng estait pepyll bot thir bludy fleschouris theuis makis heirschippis slauchter ony mercy quhare thay cum thairfore prudence nobil prince dantyng sic strang lyminaris mair commendit haue slane mony thowsandis vncouth ennymes ¶sic thyngis done kyng wylliā send ambassatouris kyng hary desyryng northumberland afore restorit hym certifying gyf samyn war nocht done fauour suld takin force battall kyng hary seand 〈◊〉 othir leif northūbirland elli fecht se • battall aganis scottis auise noblis restorit kyng wyllyam sa mekyll northumbirland inhabit afore malcolme gudschir king wyllyam thocht nocht samyn refusit howbeit wald nocht •• rycht ye hail landis ȝit kyng hary yerꝭ efter penitent yi contract recouer said landis persuadit residew northumbrianis quhilkis stude vnder empire prouoke scottis frequent heirschippis battall yat mycht haue sum occasioun inuaid scottis recouer landis huntyngtoun cumbir northumberland empire al sone yir iniuris heirschippis war maid scottis wardan scottis bordour desirit restitution becaus na thing done according iustice wardanis rasit gret cumpanyis maid heirschippis slauchter athir side ȝit becaus king hary thꝭ tyme france corne thay wa • content sydis defend thair awin ony forthir inuasion othir quhill nixt ȝeir nixt symer kyng wyllyam come ane army cumbir rycht wyng geuyn gilcrist quhilk singulare manheid virtew prouyn oftymes tyme kyng malcolme maryit syster ye left 〈◊〉 geuyn ane cous •• g • yngis namyt rowland myddyl ward king williā quh •• ye scottis war arraying 〈◊〉 maner kyng hary send ane herald kyng wyllyam desiring hym ska •• l army ony 〈◊〉 inuasioun redres expensis maid • e werꝭ king wyllyam answerit rasit nocht hꝭ army desire money ȝit gaif first occasioun battal bot ay cōtent haue leiffit awin forthir nocht sa inhumane desyrus blude bot wald gladly skaill army sa landis quhilkis pertenit hym iust herytage war restorit last quhen kyng wyllyam waistit cūbir come anwyk northumbirland quhare abaid mony dayis haue battall ingland mene tyme inglismen lay sa clois togydder ony noyis ordyn yat na scottismē knew quhare thay war kyng wyllyam irkit lang residence anwik seand na ennimes appere maid hym afore returning scotland sum notabyll vassalage send al army heir thair maist awful weirly incursionis throw cuntre left none bot ane nowmer pepyl hym self thair returnyng incontinent ane buschement inglismen come hym ansenȝeis scotland war nocht suspeckit inglismen quhyll 〈◊〉 kyng circulit thaym 〈…〉 syde fynaly tane away ony scottisman wy •• saif onely ane cumpany quhilkis war left said hym tyme ¶kyng wyllyam tane wyse anwyk xiii day iuly x ȝeir regne fra incarnatioun • e thousand ane hundred lxxiiii ȝeris lang eftir brocht king hary prisonere norma •• nochtwithstandyng trubyl fel king willyam becaus na slauchter maid takyng weris continewit styl betuix ingland scotland quhill last peace maid vnder thir conditionis captiuite king wylliam northumbirland sall remane vnder dominion inglismen cumber huntingtoun sal remane afore vnder empire scottis ¶hovv sanct thomas cant •• bury vvas martyrit hovv king vvilliā vvas redemit hovv gilbert defendit liberte scotlād aganis ye paipir ligat sindry meruellis hovv abbayis abi • brothok hadingtoun vvas foundit ca v tyme thomas bischop cantorbury quhilk • ani • afore obstinat mynd defence liberte haly kirk recunsaled king hary requeist sindry gret princis bot recoū saling succedit gret dāmage within schort time eft king hary richt impacient sustene ye hatrent within breist quhilk consauit aganis sāct thomas send familiaris houshald men namit wyllyam bretoun hew mo • well willyam trace reginald fittis finaly slew haly bischop me within kirk cantorbury hie alter sanct benedict apon sext day follow • ng ye natiuite crist ȝeir nixt following king hary returning ireland efter put gret affliction rebellion aganis empire arriuit normandy com ye cathedral kirk ro •• ne quhare solempne aith p • rgit hym slauchter sanct thomas ȝit within dayis 〈◊〉 become sa penitent 〈◊〉 lynnyng 〈◊〉 sepulture sanct thomas 〈…〉 salt teris askit 〈◊〉 〈…〉 thrid 〈…〉 eskit ye nowmer sāctis ȝeir apperit ane meruellous sterne standing styl • baith day nycht mony othir sternis samyn quhen ye vnhappy chance kyng wyllyā diuulgat throw realme brothir dauid erle lewcester lycence king hary come scotland gouerne realme quhil • brothir war redemit al sone stabyllit realme gud iustice▪ send richard bischop sanct andros mony othir noblis normādy king hary maid kyng wyllyamis r • nsoun vnder maner king wyllyam sal pay ane hundreth thousand poundis striueling redemption tane half payit argent cōtent sickir payment othir half sal geif cumber huntingtoun northumbirland vnder ane reuersioun ay quhil residew ransoun war payit ye kyng ingland attoure kyng wyllyam sall moue na weir aganis ingland retention thir landis fra empire mair securite yi premissis foure ye strange •• castellis within scotland yt say berwik edinburgh roxburgh 〈◊〉 salbe delyuerit inglismē ni hādis sic thingꝭ done followit new trubyll scotland g • l •• r • galloway ane cruell ane vnhappy man tuk purpos conque • croun 〈…〉 slauchter heirschippis • • 〈…〉 kirkis ingland al sone refourmit yame come scotland summond ye bischoppis thairof northamptoun eft thair conuentioun began persuade thaym lang orisoun obey ye archebischop ȝork saying al othir realmes ane bischoppe heir thair complayntis yt yai mycht eschew gret expensis laubouris deuoluyng thair causis rome becaus na metropolitane kirk wes scotland quhair thay mycht conuene thair consultatioun best wes obey archebischop ȝork way thay mycht eschew surfet expensis hauand decision yair actionis esy proces thair superior answerit gilbert ane ȝoung man gret eruditioun quhilk wes send king suffir na thyng done preiudiciall cardinall realme said maner scotland sen first tuke ye faith crist wes neuir subdewit na othir bischop bot allanerlie cristis vicar thairfore wes ane thing rycht vnreasonabil thꝭ cardinal desyre ye scottis subdewit inglismen consideryng ilk ane thaym he weir ꝑpetually othir howbeit apperit honest treit cō cord peace amang thaym gif occasioun battall attoure na thing wes done bischoppis scotland worthy depriue thaym thayr liberte gif ony wrangꝭ wer done scotland thay mycht decidit sufficiently within realme ciuill prudent men gif ony gret chargis occurrit thay decidit kyng thir siclik reasonis desyrit haly fader paip thirl nocht ye realme sotland ony iurisdiction empire ennymes cōsidering neuir offendit sait becaus gilbert defendit weill liberte scotland wes maid bischop caithnes haly lyfe wes eikit ye noumer sanctis sindry meruellis wer sene ȝeir albioun mydsymerday callit natiuite sanct iohne • aptist wes sic vehement schour hail slew mony small bestial pepill wer housis yi mene tyme wer strikin erd violence samyn september son obscurit lycht noun twa houri ony eclipse interposition cluddis ȝorkschire wes sa gret thundir vncouth flammys mony abbayis kirkis wer brynt samyn lang eftir tyme wes biggit abbay abirbrothok ordour sanct benidict dedicat sāct thomas canterbery dotat king williā maist richely fra redemptioun imiclxxviii ȝeris samyn tyme ye abbay haddingtoun wes foundit adama quene kyng williamis moder quhilk deceissit sone eftir wes dotat ☞ ¶hovv pape alexander send kyng vvilliam ane rose full balme hovv gilcrist vve • dish • rist ye slauchter vvife gret cruelteis done turki cristin pepill hovv king vvilliam dantit ye theuis tuke gilcrist fauoure ca vi schort tyme eftir kīg williā send ambassatouris mak obedience paip alexander ye thrid ye paip sone eftir send king williā ane gold • n rose full balme sindry new priuilegis cōcernyng ye liberte haly kirk ye samyn tyme gilcrist slew wyfe suspitioun yat aganis adultry king williā mouit yi contemptioun banist hym scotland kest doun hous ground gilcrist ane brothir namyt bredus quhilk afore trubil gat ye landis ogiluy quhome ogiluyis tuke yair begynnyng yi tyme kyng hary gart rander castel edinburgh b • request bischop durame kyng william william eftir deith first wyfe maryit emengarda doucht ye erle bewmont quhilk wes gottyn kyng williamis bastard normand • 〈◊〉 sister mariage 〈◊〉 peace wes roborat betuix scotland ingland sic maner nane yame mycht resset othir rebellis within thair realmes thus wes gilcrist quhilk wes banist • ore ingland wyffis slauchter constranit returne scotland quhare two sonny 〈◊〉 lang tyme ane miserable lyfe vnknawin thair pure habites ony pepill amang ye woddis co • cuntre ¶at tyme soldane inuadit haly land heuy weris recouerit ierusalem mony othir townis quhilkis wer tyme vnder dominioun cristin men far enragit cruelte soldane culd nocht sac • blude cristin pepill hym wer slane xxxm futmen im twa hundreth horsmen sic wer bischoppis prelatis maisteris hospitalis ye • ame thir miserabill calamiteis quhen yai wer diuulgat maid pepill lament sorowfull murnyng attoure incredible noum •• nobill men wer haldyn captiuite quhilkis send yair freindis al cristin princis support thair redemptioun schew miserie displeseiris thay sufferit thair townis segit thair self brocht captiuite quhais infinite sorowis wer sa importable thay mouit euery pepill miseration teris kyng hary mouit thir insufferabill cruelteis done cristin pepill▪ promittit cum haistly ane army thair support bot purpos wes impeschit sindry trublis quhilk followit realme sonne hary quhilk wes crounyt hym afore conspirit assistence sindry princis realme put hym fra croun thus wes cō stranit ceis fra hailsum purpos yi tyme kyng williā come ro punist makulȝene makbenne mony othir wekit lymmaris ilis sic thingis done kyng william come abirbrothok cōman • craft • smē ceis expensis micht ryse maist magnificence honour god returnyng castell bertha saw auenture gilcrist two sonnis castand scherattis thair meit nocht knawing quhat thay wer thay wer disgisit nochtheles gret meruell sa plesand ȝoung men thay apperit wer occupyit sic vile laubour incōtinent gilcrist beld heid fel kneis afore hym said gif ony mercy tynt men ye maist reuthful prince quhen thay ar punist condignely thair offence beseik luf crist sinfull pepil quhen sparit nocht sched precious blude thair redemption haue piete reuth thir miserable sonnis quhilkis he sufferit gret displescir ony cryme • e thaym cōmittit last quhen kyng william inquiri • hym quhat wes wes brocht sic miserie teris fell sa fast fra ene ythand sychis mycht nocht schaw lang tyme quhat last said gylcrist maist vnhappy sorowfull creature erd quhilk alace put handis thy blude thairfore disherist landis exilit ingland thir two sonnis becaus mycht nocht suffer schamefull iniuris done inglismen obieckand dayly gret felicite sum tyme derisioun al lawis maid laitly aganis outlawis aithir realmes constranit cum heir sonnis quhare leif rutis herbis symer castis scherettis thou seys sustene liffis wynter heirfore gif ony reuth piete thy 〈◊〉 gyf thy indignatioun mesit lang tyme byrun haue mercy sorowfull lyfe remyt w oure offence desyre nocht restorit oure heritage honour bot allanerly thy fauoure grace gyf thow wyll condiscend heirto thow sall onely conques gret honoure fame exemple piete bot ane renownit prynce amang pepyl wyn gret merite afore god schawyng thy self followar cryst geuar mercy peace ¶the kyng mouit thir wourdis remembryng gret manheid quhylk sa oft prouyn afore syndry ieoperdyis honour commoun weill scotland seyng hym deieckit fra gret honoure supreme myserie▪ nocht onely remyttit offence bot pe • uisly embrasit hym army commandit hym gu • comfort syne gaif hym hors money follow hym forfair quhare restorit hym two sonnis thair landis except sa mekyll war geuyn afore kyng wyllyam abbay abirbrothok efter gylcryst perseuerit gud faith obeysance kyng becaus eldest sonne deceissit ony airis othir sonne vnabyll mary gaif mekyll herytage abirbrothok efter deith sonne na le deuotioun gaif resydew landis said abbay thairfore gylcryst two sonnis ar buryit said abbay sanct katherynis alter thair superscription schawis youcht kyng wyllyam geuyn wyse byggyng said abbay ȝit left na thyng vndone micht pertene ane gud prynce gouernit realme iustyce geuand engyne reward gud men virtewis personis punys lymmaris ¶he maid syndry lawis punys theuys oppressouris cuntre quhylkis war ouir prolixt put buke ☞¶hovv kyng vvyllyam recouerit landis hovv rychard kyng ingland philip king france vvent vvith gret armyis iovvry▪ thair vassalage trubyll hovv erle dauid returnit haly land foundit lundoris ca vii quhyll sic thyngis war done scotland kyng hary emprice sonne deceissit ingland quhome succedit sonne richard hary hꝭ first son wes deceissit ¶kyng richard eftir coronatioun full curage spreit gaderit ane strang army pa haly land maid peace nychtbouris na trubill suld follow realme absence afore iornay rande • berwik roxburgh striuelyng kyng william sa mekil northumbirland wes tane fra hym afore last battall • wik gaif ouir landis cumbir huntyngtoun vndir thir cōditionis munitionis strenthis thairof sall remane vndir capitanis remanent landis thairof inhabit scottis attoure haue beneuolence scottis dischargit ye •• sidew kyng williamis ranson except xm poundis quhilkis tuke allanerly support weris quhen kyng william resa • al landis castellis yi maner maid brothir dauid • rle huntyngtoun send vm men support kyng richard weris kyng richard left brothir iohne gouernour inglād returnyng maid sister sonne arthure duk normandy heritour ye croun ingland failȝeing succession brothir nocht lang eftir kyng richard come mony nobil men dukis erlis baronis massilia ane port prouance quhare pullit vp salis ane hundreth l schippis pa ierusalem fra redemptioun ane thousand ane hundreth lxxxxi ȝeris ye samyn maner phillip kyng france come port ianis mony nobill men spirituall temporall arriuit achon ane strang town iowry quhilk wes tyme vnder empire sarazenis beltit y• samyn strait sege quhill kyng phillip wes lyand thus sege achon king richard arriuyt ile cipre tuke purpos went ony purge ye samyn cristis ennymes sone eftir displayit baner come bludye swerd throw said ile finalie tuke kyng cipre douchter presoneris quhen deliuerit ile cristin pepil pullit vp salis meit kyng phillip achon aduenture met ane flot sarazenis ye gait quhilkis wer cumyng support said toun eftir lang terrible bergane sank ane large part sarazenis vnder seis ye remanent put flycht syne went forthwart kyng phillip sege continewit lang tyme yi toun throw ye gret defence ye sarazenis maid samyn howbeit vter wallis wer brokin sindry partis force rammis othir instrumentis cheualry last kyng phillip fell sic infirmite wes constranit returne france nochttheles kyng richard determit nocht depart fra sege achon quhill samyn wer expugnat mene tyme hapnit ane scot namyt oliuer said toun wes banist afore scotland fled ye sarazenis lang conuersatioun thaym thair perfite langage nane yame knawing quhat wes oliuer wes yan sodiour ane toure toun quhare na trinschis wallis wer beȝond ye samyn happinnit auenture se amang ye wache erle dauid huntington ane hꝭ kinnismē namit iohne durward quhome wes lāg tyme afore acquentit incontinent cryit hym name desyryng vnder assurance commoun hym efter certane cōmonyng olyuer set ane houre geif entres erle dauid al army toun sa erle dauid wald restore hym land heritage scotland houre set erle dauid come ane gret power mē toure afore rehersit quhare gat enteres army incontinent gret noyis clamoure come throw town ye gret slauchter pepyll foundyn kyng richard seand morow scottis standart wallis enterit town within schort tyme efter brocht ane gret castell quhilk stude nocht far fra town rewyne attoure rane mony othir gret townis strenthis iowry quhylk war takyn afore fra cristin men cruelte sarazenis war nocht ane wyckit contentioun rais betuix inglismen franche men desyre honouris last quhen kyng rychard dystroyit town achon returnand italy ane suddane tē pest seuerit nauy throw quhilk destitute freindis fynaly treasoun certane euyll cristin men brocht hary empryoure schip erle dauid tyl regeand tempest sa brokin yat mony thaym quhilkis war hir perist narrowly eschapit lyfe efter tane inhabitantis land brocht alexandria quhare haldyn lang tyme preson quhyll last cost marchandis uenice brocht constantinople nocht lang efter brocht uenis quhare redemit merchandis ingland brocht flanderis thair pullit vp salis returne scotland quhen lytyll departit fra land dreuyn vnmercyfull tempest nocht far fra norroway scheitland incredybyll dangeir finaly quhen maid ane voit byg ane kirk honoure virgyne mary gif war fortunat eschape dangeir seis arryuit tay besyde dunde far fra sanct nicholas chapell ony rudder taikyll gaif thankis god blyssyt virgyne delyueryng hym fra sic extreme peryll place quhare arriuit callit allectum bot efter cummyng changit name callid dunde quhilk sig • ifyis langage gift god king wyllyam heirand returnyng brothir quhome beleuit mony ȝeris afore deceissit come maist diligence dunde embrasit hym syne gaif thankis god blyssyt vyrgyne mary delyuerit brothir fra sa mony dangeris efter thꝭ gart maik generall processionis throw realme geif thankis god happy returnyng brothir sic thingis done ane conuentioun maid dunde quhylk licence geuyn erle dauid byg ane abbay quhat place plesit scotland dotat landis rentis pleseir kyng wyllyam gaif mony priuilegis dunde quhilkis induris thir dayis dauid nocht refusyng ye beneuolence brothir byggit ane abbay callit lundoris efter ordour sanct benedict ane thing thair richt meruellus na man hurt abbay eddaris thir eddaris lyis myddis ane vale circulit wod rynnand watter throw quhilk thay burgeon mair plentuous nowmer thā euir sene ī ony othir ꝑtis howbeit na mā gettꝭ skaith yair haue sene • oung barnis play amang thaym dāmage hurt following ☞ ¶hovv kyng richard returni • ingland hovv kyng vvyllyam punist gret • ymmaris realme na • iuite prince alexander coronatioun kyng iohne hovv paip send ane suerd kyng vvilliā ca viii kyng richard schort tyme efter redemit sa huge money mekyl al syluer goldyn vessel inglād cunȝeit redemptioun thus fynaly delyuerit • essauit ingland gret triumphe kyng wyllyam heirand returnyng king richard inglād come brothir erle da • id london gaif hym two thousand mark striuelyng waistit money payment ransoun weris thir humaniteis followit gret amite tendernes betuix two kingis ye mene tyme kyng wyllyam f • gret infirmite within ingland becaus pepyll beleuit deith rais gret trubyll partis scotland sindry lymmaris tra •• ing iustice expire deith inuadit pepyll heirschippis slauchter al partis ¶nocht lang efter kyng wyllyam conualescit infirmite returnit scotland sic deligence mony yir limmaris war tane punist effering thair demeritis principal mouar namit herald brocht kyng fyrst ene put syne geldit hyngit efter apon ane gallous attoure freindis war geldit samyn maner na succession suld follow thaym tymes cummyng ȝeir following mair derth thā euir sene afore boll beir mycht scarsly coft v cronis ¶and nixt ȝeir quhilk fra incarnation ane thousand ane hundred nynte nyne mair abundance plente euir hard afore ȝeir kyng wyllyamis wyfe namit armāga • da delyuerit prince alexander samyn ȝeir kyng richard ingland deceissit quhō iohne brothir succedit iii ȝeir following alexander maid prince scotland samyn ȝeir send ane legat fra paip kyng william presentit hym ane swerd wt hiltis scheith gold▪ set mony precious stanis legat al presentit ane bonat tyre maid maner diademe purpoure hew signify defendar faith tyme mony • indultis priuilegis war grātit paip ye libe • te haly kirk scotlād cōmandit king wyllyā ye saterday salbe haldyn halyday fra xii houri furth none quhilk sall schawin pepyll sound bell na prophane laubouris exercit fra tyme furth quhil monunday pepyll perseu • ir allanerly diuyne seru • ce gret punitioun ordanit thaym war found rebelland thairto ☞ hovv kyng vvyllyam kyng iohne vvar confiderat togydder mariage kyng vvyllyamis haly life liberalite kirk hovv toun perth tuk beginnyng ca ix efter kyng willyam returnit lō make homage landis northumbirland cumbir huntingtoun al sone maid homage king iohne desirit hym pa hym france aganis kyng philip becaus refusit band eldaris maid afore france king iohne clamit agane landis foresaid tuk ane gret nowmer guddis samyn maner po • nd ye proffet bygane nochtheles nobyllis ingland knawing rycht dyffycyll haue weir baith france scotland atanis causit saidis guddis redressit ȝeir followyng sa vehement frost scotland na pluch micht put land afore myddis marche attoure aill sa frosyn sald pound wechtis efter quhilk followit ane huge snaw gret mortalite bestyall al ane continewall trymblyng erd quaik followit fra epiphany day februar efter wynter kyng iohne endit weris france haue occasioun battall aganis ye scottis began byg ane castel fornens berwyk kyng wyllyam aduertist heirof send ambassatouris kyng iohne desiring hym se • k na occasioun battall b • g na strenthis fornens hym▪ becaus gat nocht bot repuls hꝭ desiris come ane gret power kest ye said castel king iohne reuenge thir iniuris rasit ane army cum scotland kyng wyllyam preuene trauell come bordouris ȝit quhē baith armyis war reddy fecht thay war seuerit interuention prudent men finaly baith ye armyis skalit two kyngis come ȝork quhare peace amite roborat betuix thaym vnder thir conditionis king wyllyamis two douchteris namit isobell margaret sal mary two sonnis king iohne namit hary rychard▪ fyne gif ane deit tothir sall succeid crowne ingland quhilkis king wyllyam sal geif sufficient drowry attour castel yat cassyn laitly kyng william sal remane ye samyn maner neuir edifiit tymes cumyng plege towquhare obseruatioun al thir premiss nyne nobyll men scotland salbe delyuerit king iohne conuentioun king wyllyam resignit landis northumbirland cumbir huntingtoun handis king iohne sonne prince alexander micht sesit thairintyll siclik consuetude obseruar iosing thir landis scotland yat thay suld haldyn kyng ingland homage maid hym successouris scottis kingis y• iosit brukit yame y• tyme efter yt thir two kingis wa • thair counsal ȝork brocht thaym ane child gret bewte ritour sindry landis ingland bot trublit meruellus infirmite ane ene consumit flux euyll humouris hand pynit away na power toung ȝit ta syde ¶the medcynaris seing hym haue sic contrarius infirmiteis nocht knawing ye caus thairof iugit hym incurabyll nochtheles kyng wyllyam maid ane croce hym restorit hym incontinent heill syndry beleuit th •• done myracle god virtew nobyl man sall nocht hyd vnknawin pepyl nocht lang • fter kyng wyllyā returnit scotland dotat kirkis newbottell melros dunfermelyng 〈◊〉 sindry landis foū dit ane new bischoprik callit argyle landis sufficient sustene samyn sic thingis done king wyllyam went castell bertha within schort dayis efter • atter tay almond rais sa terrybyll inundatioun preis brak ye wallis bertha drownit mony pepyl wes yocht king wyllyam narowly eschapit hꝭ wife barnis freindis ȝit ȝoung son na • iohne perist nurice 〈…〉 personis dependit hym tyme thus rais na le dolour lamentation •• th pepyll quhen thair townes ar • ane ennymes preis rage watteris apperis mair terribyll dangerus • han ony fyre fyre increissis small begynning schawis sa sone y• self inuadis pepyl mair • n thair guddis thā thair bodyis sone slokin quhare men ar deligent contrar wit delygence man may resist inundatioun watteris enteris duris windowis sic violence na remeid aganis bot gyf ane man fynd haistely schyppis baittis quhen sic thyngis nocht gottin yocht pepyll pa hicht hous ȝit thay ar nocht saiffit way ye watter gangis aboue thair heidis pu • ti thaym miserabyll deith thꝰ ar sindry houssis quhilkꝭ stude land nocht bot seyis king william seand castell bertha distroyit inundatioun watter wise foundit towne quhilk callit eftir perth ane man name quhilk gaif ground quhare town biggit king william caus samyn rise honour ryches gaif sindry preuilegis thairto bot town callit sāct iohnestoun foū dit fra redemption ane miic x ȝeris ¶hovv kyng iohne subdevvit ireland vvalis hovv kyng vvyllyam punist sindry conspiratouris hovv inglād ireland vvar maid tributaris ye paip kyng vvyllyamis deith hovv syndry ordouris freris began ca x ȝeir followyng kyng iohne ingland subdewit ye maist part ireland empire ni •• ȝeir subdewit walis samyn tyme rais caithnes gret trubyll▪ gothred son makculȝem quhais rebellyon schawin afore maid gret heirschippis ro syndry othir boūdis thairabout cumpany incressit ylk day mair assistence syndry lymmaris lochquhaber ilis punis thir attemptatis king william send erlis fyf atholl buchquhane vim men thay set battall vincust said gothred brocht hym presoner ye kīg quhom gart heid wt mony otherꝭ quhilkꝭ war brocht ye samyn maner tyme rais ane gret dissensioun betuix kyng iohne ingland paip innocent thrid efter followis king iohne tuk generall exaction tent peny al landis frutis pertenand kirk punist thaym y• war repugnant thairto maist cruelte becaus certane abbayis bischoprikis within realme war nocht obeysant tuk possession thair landis nocht onely reft fra thaym thair gold syluer iowellis bot banist religious mē thairof paip innocent traistād sic cruelteis nocht semand cristin princis yat othir princis suld nocht inuaid kirk siclik auarice persuadit kyng iohne mony wayis desist fra thir extorsionis redres iniuris done hym ye kirk becaus couth na way diuert mynd fra samyn denuncit hym cursit depriuit hym sa far micht al honour dignite makand inuocatioun cristin prince cum thair armyis aganis hym defence liberte haly kirk kyng iohne seand hym na pyssance resyst sa mony armyis deuysit aganis hym partis fenȝeit hym penitent haue absolutioun offence committit aganis kirk gaif ouir realmes ingland ireland paip innocent pay ȝeirly quhyll vii ȝeris war gone x thousand markis striuelyng paip successouris realmes ingland ireland quhilk pensioun ȝeirly payit oure dayis ¶sic thingis done kyng iohne realme wes assoylȝeit fra censuris led aganis thaym ¶schort tyme efter kyng wyllyam brokyn lang age deceissit striueling xlix ȝeir regne fra redemptioun ane thousand two hūdred xiiii ȝerꝭ burijt aberbrothak hye alter ȝeir afore deith two cometis apperit moneth marche richt terribyll sicht pepyll ane schane ay afore sonne risyng othir afore fallyng nixt ȝeir ane calf sene northumberland heid crag like awin nature remenant lyke nature ane hors nixt winter sene two mones lift seuerit fra othir hornit naturally mone vsis hir incressing wainding tyme king wyllyam war mony nobyll clerkis dominicus spanȝeart channoun saint augustinis ordoure quhilk sone efter left samyn began ordour freris callit predicatouris tyme sanct francis quhilk begā ordouris freir minouris callit gray freris quhom mony abbayꝭ ar
