war excellent precheouris kyng wyllyam foundit abbay balmernocht bot dotat emengard wyfe thꝭ tyme war institute y• monkis trinite callit redemptioun captiuis two yame war send scotland paip innocent quhome king wyllyam gaif hꝭ palyce ryall aberdene big yair abbay purpos geif thaym syndry othir thyngis gyf leuit ¶of king alexander secound actis hovv king iohne ingland inuadit kirk vvith gret exactionis▪ hovv paip kirkmen vvar corruppit money assist opinioun hovv kyng alexander renevvit band france deith kyng iohne ca xi kyng wyllyam deceissit wyse son alexander secound crownit scone efter coronation went ahirbrothok quha • e remanit xiiii▪ dayis doyng funerall obsequies kyng wyllyam fader cōmandit na playis bankettꝭ vsit ane ȝeir cum pepyl micht lament ye deith fader publik doloure kingis seruandis war clothit dule weid ȝeir followyng first conuentioun yat maid edinburgh quhare ratifyit thingis done fader efter assignit certane landis moder sustene hir ryal estait assignit certane iugis remane townis realm decision dout sum materis execution iustice tyme rais gret discention betuix kyng iohne ingland nobyllis sa full auarice birnand desire • conques guddis wald admit na heritoure thair landis quhill thair enteres iust valour thair heritage ane ȝeir tuk ȝerely pensionis fra abbottis byschoppis contrar liberte haly kirk quhē ony prelate deceissit tuk rentis place quhil successoure enterit prelatis ingland richt impacient suffer sic exactionis solistit syndry gret prince rise aganis king finaly dressit yair purpos sic menes yt baith ye kingꝭ france scotland promittit cum ingland thair support king iohne heirand sic rebellyoun maid aganis hym eschew present dangeir maid aggreance prelatis promittit gret aith repare al iniurꝭ done hym howbeit na thing thairof followit effect sa blindit auarice yat returnit euyl maneris send ambassatourꝭ gawlo ane cardinall rome complaning violence subdittis aganis hym quhilkis yair menis he persuadit kingis france scotland inuade hym sic maner may nocht gouerne realm liberte pape innocent bebecaus ane ȝeirly pension king iohne mair cōmouit complaynt promittit debait hym maist fauoure thay day war thair maist auaritious pepyll court rome thairfore euery thyng grantit mycht bryng ony importance thaym sicht reason conscience amang al sic inordinat personis nane mair vicious couatus gwalo pretermittit na thing vnsped kīg iohne quhare mycht fynd ony cō modite efter followyng wyll mak ane digressioun se far ye prelatis kirkmen auld tymes war aboue prelatis dayis virtewis syngular lyfe quhilkis prelatis present beris nocht bot name na thyng following thair life thay auld faderis war geuyn imitatatioun crist pouerte piete humilite iustice drawyng pepyll thair feruent cherite continewal precheing seruyce god equale affectioun pure ryche nocht arraying thaym gold syluer precious abulȝemē ti nocht vsing court accū panyit weirmen bordellis nocht contending exceid lust insolence prince doyng na thing dissait bot leuand pure conscience verite bot prelatis kirkmen oure dayis ar rutit vicis ar sene ony othir pepyl ☞ sic enorm • teis he rog • e perpetually kirk sen rich apprisit ha • dyn maist honoure amang kirk men kyng iohne nochtwithstandyng promes obligatioun maid afore gret aith quhen aduertist gwalois writingꝭ promitting defend hym materis began inuade nobyllis spretuall temporall mair exactionis afore regarding na thing bot onely conqueir guddis rich nobillis rycht impacient sustene thir extorsionis solistit lewis dalphine france alexander kyng scotland cū gret armyis thair support kyng iohne hauand lytyll confidence subdittis fled ane strenth throw quhilk lewis come ony obstakyll london quhare reslauit plesandly pepyll efter send king iohne desiring hym abstene fra exactionis nocht iniure hꝭ pepyll tymes cumyng sic extorsionis sic thingis makis prince baith odious thair subdittis othir pepyll attoure said lewis desirit kyng iohne redres skaithis quhilkis subdittis he sufferit tyrāny kepe faith thaym afore promittit gyf thocht sic thingis obseruat send sonne othir nerest freindis remane pl • ge obseruation thairof kyng iohne hauand confidence na thyng mair money gwalo cardinall afore rehersit wald heir na conditioun peace said suld nocht ceis quhill attemptatis done hꝭ pepil war cōdignely punist lewꝭ incontinent rasit army sindry inglismen opinion inuaid kīg iohne nochtheles consultit superseid passage becaus samyn mycht succeid mair publik dāmage cuntre tha • punitioun hym motiue thair trubyl king alexader heirand sic trubyll ingland come ane army london ony dammage done pepyl quhais cumyng al trubyl ceissit al sone thir two princis alexander lewis cōmonit betuix thaym syndry materis pertenyng thair realmes thay went kyng phylyp france leuand behynd thaym xm men assist lordis inglād aganis kyng iohne sone efter kynge philip king alexander met togydder bolonie quhare band renewit betuix scotland france pointis efter auld maner sic thyngis done kyng alexander lewis returnit ingland efter quhais cumyng kyng iohne tuk sic malancoly deceissit ☞ generall counsal haldin rome paip innocent hovv kyngis scotland ingland inuading aithir realmes vvith gret heirschippis slauchter hovv thay vvar agreit ca xi efter deith kyng iohne son hary crounit▪ quhil sic thingis war done ingland ane generall counsall rome quhilk iiiic xii bischoppis viiic abbotis counsall paip innocent cursit thaym war ennymes kyng iohne ingland specyall cursit lewis dalphyn france alexander kyng scotland otheris thair opinioun alliegeand yame inuasouris liberte rome becaus inglād tributar paip schort tyme following gwalo • auaritious cardynal afore rehersit come ingland cursit yame inuadit king iohne life interditit placis quhare yai com lewis seand maist part ingland assist king hary gwalo bocht ane absolutioun infinite money syne returnit france attoure auaritious cardinal curst interditit syndry gret prince ingland quhil thay war constranit yair absolutionis infinite money na sicht honest vnhonest actionis bot allanerly proffet nocht lang efter king hary come ane army scotland inuading cuntre gret slauchter heirschyppis quhare thay come ¶als sone aduertist kyng alexander gaderit power scotland geif hym battal fled gret deligence ingland nochtheles king alexāder followit hym kest mony castellis strē northumbirland ye groūd efter carlele garnist folkis returnit gret triumph honouris scotland kyng hary hei • yat king alexāder skailit army returnit ane new power scotland tuke baith town castell berwik syne brint heriit see camp haddyngtoun sais • nane yat found ye gait except wiffis barnis preistis returnit army ingland mene tyme auaritious prelat gwalo traisting fynd sufficient oportunite conques gret money scotland put • amyn vnder proces interdictioun persewit king alexander becaus inuadit ingland maist terribyll cursingis thir cursing inflā mit ye scottis sic hatrent aganis inglismen ye apperit ceis vter exterminion baith thair realmes nochtheles interuention prelatis peace fynaly maid betuix two realmes vnder thir cōditionis kyng alexander sall rander inglismen ye town carlele kyng hary sall rander town berwyk scottis hail dominon cumbir remane kyng alexander half northumbirland recroce kyng alexander assoilȝeit censuris led aganis hym gwalo two kyngis beand aggreit wyse al debaitis king alexā der assoilȝeit realme delyuerit fra interdiction incōtinent gwalo sall depart tume hand summond ye prelatis scotland anwik hauand na actionis aganis thaym bot onely trubyl yame quhil thay haue debursit large soumes money profet sindry thaym exonerat truble gaif hym large money otheris refusit desyris tuk indignatioun sperituall materis wer sa opinly sauld money incō tinēt gwalo sūmond yame rome beleuyng yai suld tak sic feir lāg iurnay trauell thairof yai suld cōdiscend purpos nochttheles thay wer litill affrayit thair bot went finalie ye paip complanyt insufferable iniuris done ingland scotland gwalo thus wes gwalo finalie dischargit auctorite condampnit gret soumes money paip thir prelatis yat wer sūmond hym rome wer assolȝeit fra petitioun tyme dauid erle hūtyngtoun deceissit wes buryit ane abbay ingland namit seuicia ¶hovv king hary king alexander vver alliar mariage translation sanct thomas cāterbery sindry legatis send scotland paip conques money ca xiii hary kyng inglād eftir cumyng • erfite age wes desirus peace yan weir▪ ane cōuention wes maid betuix kyng alexander ȝork ye quhilk two kyngis wer alliat togiddir maner iane sister kyng hary wes maryit kyng alexander ye two sisteris king alexander wer maryit two gret prince ingland alliance wes maid fra redemption imiicxx ȝeris ȝeir wes ye translatioun sanct thomas canterbury done ye kyng nobillis spirituall temporall al solempnite reuerence yt mycht deuisit nixt ȝeir ane legat wes send ye paip scotland purches money furnis ane new army pa ye turki quhē gottin na litill money effect ī scotlād spendit hꝭ lust insolence said returnyng paip wes reft fra hym brigandis schort tyme eftir cumyng rome ane othir legat wes send samyn effect scotland kyng alexander aduertist afore cumyng conuenyt noblis ane coūsal ye quhilk ane bischop said followis howbeit sindry thingis presentlie occurris quhilkis effrayis schawe sic materis bene preiudiciall ye cōmoun weil ȝit maist nobil prince quhen cōsidir thi humanite faith cōstance geuin na thing mair defence weil thy liegis nocht ceis action cō mon liberte schaw ye suth 〈◊〉 tyranny intollerable quhilk exercit kingis princis discending lynial succession yair kindly heritage mekill mair ye tyranny insufferable quhen exercit w men vile obscure lynage heirfore gif sindry manifest wrangis done w thir mony ȝeris bigane cū • ye paiyis mind yai wer sufferit sum maner bot sen lymmaris vile obscure lignage quhilkis ar promouit neficis thair horrible vice he nocht onlie interditit realm ony cōmission bot he spendit ī yair corruppit vice money thay gaderit cuntre ye papis autorite rasyng armyis aganis turki think thair cursit auarice suld haue na forthir place amāg trew pepill specially amang w becaus thay haue oure simplicite meiknes cōtemptioun ȝeris afore passait ȝe complanit ye iniuris done gwalo quhen held ȝour realm interditit mony al ȝour prelatis vnder cursing becaus thay wald answere hym money sustene lustꝭ attour gwalo wes periolus fontane al iniquite vice yat howbeit wes send • reit concord betuix inglismen scottis ȝit auarice gaif sic occasioun battall baith realmes wer nocht yair hatrent wes haistely mesit inuadit othir thair vter distructioun sen thir terrible dedis ar patent quha • nedis thaym remembrit ȝour displeseir attoure eftir wer exonerat gwalo come place ane new legat na better lyfe bot erar wors quhen got 〈◊〉 large money fra w redemptioun presoneris rasyng new armyis aganis ye turki spendit insolence fenȝeit yat wes • eft brigandis heirfore 〈◊〉 haue experience sa mony 〈◊〉 heuy dāmagis done w yir two legatis afore rehersit salbe reput mischant fulis admit thrid beleuit new legat salbe bett conditionis fallowis wes afore gif ony man list demand quhat done yi mater say nothir legat ȝit na othir legat tymes cumyng suld ressauit within realme becaus samyn heryit waistit money thair c • ntinewall exactionis gif ony ȝow he superflew money ȝe may dispone erar pure folk sic corrupit vse vicioꝰ • egatis finalie thir wourdis wer sa apprisit counsall legat wes nocht admittit cum ye realme ¶hovv kyng alexander punist synd • conspiratouris realme ye first cumyng blak gray frei • scotland ca xiiii peace robora • maner forsaid followit ane ciuill battal scotland motioun gilespy ro com gret army aganis kingis auctorite eftir slane mony kyngꝭ liegis brint ye toun ennernes punis yir attemptatis wes send iohne cumyn erle buchquhane ane cumpany chosyn men finalie slew sayd gil • spy baith sonnis brocht thair heidis kyng trubill beand dantit said followit ane othir men caithnes brint adam yair bischop eftir yat cursit thaym non paymēt yair teyndis kyng alexandir heirand si • terrible cruelte done nobil prelat ceissit nocht quhill iiiic principall doaris yairof wer hingit attour yt na successioun sal cum wickit seid gart geld yair sonnis place quhare thay wer geldit callit ȝit staney hyll attoure becaus erle caithnes maid na support bischop adam ȝit tuke punitioun thir lymmaris cōmittit cruelte wes forfaltit landis king alexander punitioun wes grerumly louit ye paip sic thingis done kyng alexander went abirdene dotat mony priuilegis howbeit samyn wes dotat afore sindry cōmoditeis othir kyngis bullis quhilkꝭ war grantit sindry p • ipis concernyng liberteis kirkis scotland wer geuyn kepyng • net gilbe • archeden murray quhilk sucedit immediatly ye sait caithnes eftir slauchter bischop adam ye thrid ȝeir eftir erle caithnes come kyng alexander quhen wes sittand modir ye epyphany day ȝuyll desirit grace kyng alexander wes pieteous reuthfull yat restorit hym honouris landis possessionis ane sobir compositioun money nochttheles offence wes vnpunist man wes sone eftir punist gret iustice god wes slane awin seruandis slepand bed hous quhare wes slane brint na man suld haue suspitioun slauchter bot wer cumyn suddane auēture perist ī ye samin maner bischop adam quhais deith wes participant yi tyme sindry blak freris wer send scotland sanct dominik said quhen kyng alexander went france renew band scotland kyng philip prayit sanct dominik send part freiris scotland instruct scottis thairfore thir freiris wer plesandly ressauit kirkis ereckit thair contemplatioun youcht thir men quhilkis wer send sāct dominik leiffit thay wer institute hym singulare lyfe ȝit oftymes hapnis thyngis fra gud begynn •• g fallis wers maneris thair successouris declinit fra gud religion maist insolence lust continewit vicious lyfe iiic ȝeris quhil last thay wer reformyt oure dayis freir iohne adamison ane man singulare • rudition lyfe quhilk wes professit theologie w abirdene samyn maner wer send scotland freir minouris sanct francis ordour mony thaym maner wer sindry ȝeris eftir deith sanct france nocht sa religious wes nochttheles thay ar men best lyfe specially amang w scotland ☞ ¶hovv kyng alexander punist sindry conspiratouris agreit kyng hary ingland nobillis nevv mariage natiuite sonne alexander hovv mony nobilli • scotland vver slane iovvry capi xv lang peace perseuerit eftir scotland quhyll last alane lord galloway constable scotland deceissit becaus deuidit al landis afore deith amang hꝭ thre douchteris bastard sonne gaderit ane army xm men beleuyng recouir lordschip galloway last quhen inuadit cuntre gret trubill wes slane vm men opinioun ye erle merche walter stewart ye residew hꝭ oist discomfist eldest douchter alane galloway wes maryit roger quincy quhilk wes maid constable scotland brukit continewally succession quhill tyme kyng robert secound quhais tyme roger quincinis successioun wes disherist forfaltit certane crymes cōmittit aganis kingis maieste eftir forfalt constabillary wes geuyn hayis arroll sic thingis done scotland kyng alexander wes aduertist gret deuisioun rysing betuix kyng hary ingland nobillis thairfore mei samyn went london iane quene isobell sister quhen agreit kyng hary nobillis debaitis maryit isobell sister erle northfolk mene tyme somerleid afore rehersit rasit gret truble al part • quhare come quhil last w • brocht erle merche ane cord hals afore ye king gat remissioun way 〈◊〉 offence tyme wer mony seditious personis ye court ingland trai • tyng gret cōmoditeis fall thaym weris youcht samyn wer contrarius thair cōmoun weill ȝit thay traistit oppression done ye pepyll vnpunist weri • lawis iustice he na place tyme battal thir men hop thair perticular cōmoditeis inflambit kyng hary cōtrac faith inuaid scottis battall began bygane castell fornens berwik howbeit cassyn afore king william condition peace neuir edifyit tymes cumyng ye bigging castell bene sufficient occasion weir betuix inglis scottis war ye noblis ingland inhibit samyn contrar yair band promes thus al occasion battall ceissit nixt ȝeir followyng come ambassatouris fra lewis kyng france schawyng hym reddy pa iowry yairfore desyrit support scotland hꝭ iornay king alexāder tenor confideration france send patrik erle marche dauid lindesay maid kyng tyme coronatioun stude afore hym ane hieland man salust hym kyng scottis eloquēt meter langage schawing al ye kingis quhilkis linialy discendit gathelus first begynnar scottis plesandly rewardit labouris king alexander ī ye secoūd ȝeir regne conuenit prelatis baronis realme tuke vp bonis grandame sanct margaret put yame ane precious fe • tour syluer xxi day iuly quhen hir blissit rest quhil ye bonis hir husband translatit hir ye samyn maner quhen samyn done scho brocht esaly ye samyn place quhare scho lyis yi day gret veneratioun pepyll baith buryit ane place king alexander day efter king alexander returnit scotland ye tender age king alexander ye realme scotlād gouernit gret felicite noblis efter h • cumyng perfite age maid hym puni • sindry extorsionis done certane noblis sūmond ye erlis menteith athole buchquhane lord strabogy quhilkis war cumingꝭ put yame horne becaus yai cōperit hꝭ iustice yir lordis mouit wt yi displeseir set yame reuēge ye samin finaly tuk ye king kinrossy ane gret power men brocht hym striueling▪ quhare yai held hym lang time captiuite ward throw quhilk ylk day tai mair trubyl ye realme sene afore becaus ye king haldyn captiuite sa astonist thay put kyng liberte tuk remission crime micht imput thaym woman slew hir husband erle menteith hir new • uffer iohne russell fled ingland quhare scho deit miserye tyme paip urbane 〈◊〉 ar monkis efter ordour trinite lang efter ane conuentioun betuix ye two kyngis ingland scotland wark accumpanyit yair noblis baith thair realmes thair sa gud redres maid ylk syde baith realmes war g • efter completyng samyn ¶of gret derth albion hovv acho kyng norrovvay inuadit scotland vvith gret cruelteis orison maid hym ambassatouris kyng alexander ca xvii ȝeir god ane miiclxiii ane gret derth albion heruist sa wak ye ȝeir afore cornis ye mais • part war corruppit maid ane miserabyll derth throw boundis albion acho kyng norroway denmark heirand scotland trublit maner beleuit find sufficient occasion subdew dominioun arriuit ane flot schyppis ilis lammas day callit aduincula petri ilis war continewally hal • vnder empire danis fra king edgaris tyme thir day eft king acho come arrane bute quhen king acho subdewit yame empire esperance mair felicite▪ arriuit albion tuk ye castel aire lang sege began waist al ye boundis liand yair king alexāder astonist yir nouellis ȝoung tender age sufficient resyst cruelte danis efter sa frequent victoryis fallyng thaym thocht na thing sa gud brek hꝭ ennimes lang tary fyne mycht prolong battall send ambassatouris king acho quhilkis principall said hym maner war nocht king nobillis anciant consuetude obseruit sen thair first begynnyng • eikis redres iniuris done thaym afore thay inuaid thair ennymes battall thow suld nocht se oratouris send bot erar ane army cumand thy contrar maist awfull weirly ordinance get neuir sa huge spulȝe ȝit sa triumphant victoryis ennimes quhen thay inuaid w maist wrangis wyll heir na reason redres thynk na thing sa gud eschew battall tak restitutioun guddis quhilkis ar tane fra w iniure battall ¶quhow may thair ony gretar wodnes fury thā thyng swerd fyre may tretit plesand wordis nochtheles quhen oure honorabyll iust desiris ar refusit ennymes quhen fynd thaym mair desirus weir peace ryse haistely maist hatrent reuenge thair contemptioun heirfore ar send fra souerane inquire quhat occasioun thow he inuaid realme subdittis violatioun peace quhilk he bene obseruat betuix hym danis thir hundred ȝeris bygane cumand nocht onely reif fra hym bute arrane othir lā dis quhilkis he iosit peace bot al ceissing fra na maner cruelte yat may deuysit pepyl quhat offence quhat cruelteis he pepyl done aganis inuaid realm sic awful ordinance slaing wiffis childrin febyll personis without ony mercy rāsoun howbeit maist cruell tyranni he miseratioun sic personis quhat furius ire he mouit birne ye kirkis god sanctis ye gret murder pepyll quhy puttis thow al placis quhare thow cumis heirschippis rewin attour gyf thow dredis god quhilk gouernis al thing yt se prouidence gif thow dredis sanctis vengeance cū punytion god ȝit thow suld dreid two maist pissant kingis albion alliat togidder maist tender blud quhilkis sal cū sic pissance yt thow may resist heirfore sen thow may depart honoure best ye redres al skaithis tyme auenture thow brocht sic extreme disperation thy army discōfist yt thow sall vterly distroyit fynd nocht repuls yocht thow wald implore mercy thir wourdis war said ambassatouris put sū terrour hardy kyng acho nochtheles answerit yame ī thꝭ maner ȝe beleif wise ambassatouris astonis w ȝour fers awfull wourdis traisting w sa full dredour yt wyl desist fra purpos ȝour onely minassyng ȝe ar void al reason prudence gyf ȝe sa ymagyn quhare ȝe aggrege iniuris reiffyng certane ilis fra ȝour dominioun vnderstand ȝe ar na lauchfull iugeis geif decision ony iniurꝭ richtis pertening w liegis forthir gif ȝe desire ye caus quhy haif inuadit arrane bute say thir ilis arrane bute bot al ilis albion pertenis w pepyl auld heritage ar cumyn tak mekyll proffet landis presently ȝe haue tane thaym tymes bygane thairfore schaw ȝoure kyng feir nocht minassyng na othir violence may aganis w nochtwithstandyng gyf mair desirus peace thā battall couatis eschew diceptioun birnyng townes ye slauchter pepyl gif desyrit se ye vter exterminion realm afore ene cōmand hym send w xm markis striueling frutis landis tane vp hym eldaris tymes bygane dischargeand hym thairof tymes cumyng said ilis may pa vnder perpetual dominioun gif refuse charge force hym abide chance battall aganis w quhilkis ar prepari • maist weirly ordinance inuade realme pepyll ☞hovv king alexander come vvith 〈◊〉 army aganis king acho 〈◊〉 maid tvvo kyngis thair armyis▪ hovv king acho vvas • scō •• st largis ca xviii alexander cōmouit answer seing na waye eschewe battall thocht thing na sa gud assailȝe ye chance fortoun gaderit xlm • meit enaimes quhilkꝭ wer deuidit ī thre batallꝭ ye first • ing wes ane vailȝeāt kny • ht alexander stewart nepot ye alexander yat dotat ye abbay paslay hym • n argyle leuenax athole galloway left wyng wes patrik dunbar hauand hym men louthiane fiffe • berwik striueling ye myddil wa • wes king alexander remanent pepill scotland support ye wyngis quhen dangeir occu • rit yir ba • tallis wer arrayit sic maner euery clan ane capitane assignit thayn thair awin langage exhort thaym wyn land honour yair manheid kyng alexander seyng ennymes sycht causit me done army said yame yi maner haif maid beluffit freindis orisoun god quhais prouidence wisdome euery thing gouernit erd send victory thaym quhilkꝭ he maist rycht iustest caus battall wald exhort ȝow haue sic faith confidence ennymy theuis • aris ȝe may inuincible curage distroy ȝour ennimes beleif weil ȝe ar nocht fecht aganꝭ yaim ye inuadis ȝour landis iust clame bot aganis thaym • raistis penurite vittallis regnād amang ȝow fynd sufficient oportunite conques ȝour landis thir lymmaris reiosis sa mekill thift reif thay ar nocht content onlie landis reft fra w thir mony ȝeris bigane bot ar cumin new tyrāny dwel ȝour maist inward lādis remembir heirfore nocht onlie heuy importable iniuris yame done bot al necessar fecht aganis thaym defence wyffis barnis liberteis landis hauand na securite lyfe bot ȝour handis restis schortlie na othir thing bot othir vincus ȝour ennimes manheid elli leif miserabillie vnd yair seruitude suffir ȝoure wiffis douchteris fulȝ • yair lust remembir ȝe ar nocht fecht onlie ȝour natiue cunire bot liuis thaym ar maist deir tendir freindis considir ye nocht onlie bot al scotlād seis ȝow fecht yi day notis baith ȝour mā heid cowarty belt ȝow yairfo • vailȝeant campionis ye manheid curage yt ȝour mater iust mouit onlie ȝour pure defēce cōsidir ȝour ennymes inuadis ȝow onlie pray spulȝe gudis salbe thairfore sone vincust quhen thay se ȝow geuin perseuerant constance debait samyn first pray ȝow refresche ȝoure bodyis meit syne cloith ye samyn armour ȝe may ye grace god haue victory skarslie wer thir wourdis sayd quhen kyng acho began exhort army maner followis wer nocht ȝour manheid prouin lang tyme wyse freindis sicker victory ȝour hādis bene vane ieoperde body day ȝow haif assailȝeit sic thingis yat bene vncertane thaym yat ar certane bene lesum gyf ȝe febill astonist pepill haue leuit ane hard sobir lyfe hame miserie gret laubour haue ieoperd ȝow battall aganis ȝour strang ennymes nochtheles sen ȝe deliuerit purpos ar votit follow gud fortoun ȝe may se occasion sufficiēt oportunite schawis quhat virtew r • ward sall follow ilk man laubouris ȝe se ȝe desirit maist ȝour ennymes full rich guddis quhilkis ar gottin na thing sa mekill preis dint swerd nocht onlie gif ȝe happin haue glore victory sall fall ȝow ryche treasour army bot hai • l realme scotland sal fall reward ȝour laubouris uincus thairfore ȝour ennymes euery thing scotland salbe offerit ȝow maist magnificence fra ȝour ennimes vincust euery ane ȝow salbe rewardit landis ȝoure pleseir ȝe salbe al riche ī tymes cūyng ȝour ennymes ar yi tyme thir sen gret chargis may nocht done extreme ieoperdie beseik ȝow aduise esalye yi battal sal led agan • ennymes derth ap • eris amang thaym he maid thaym febill ony othir pepill thus ar thay destitute corporall strenth thay sall gyf bakkis w thay cum ony straikis thay ar bot ane schaddow pepill may yairfore slane like miserabill beistis becaus thay ar noumer pepil ȝe thair spulȝe salbe ȝow riche contrar gyf discōfiture fallis ȝow quhilk god forbeit na thing sal fallow bot deith heirschip quhare ȝe cum youcht beleif na thing le sic aduersiteis beseik ȝow gif ony sic misaduenture fallis reuenge ȝoure deith ȝe nocht slane like beistis quhilkis ar offerit sacrifice ar circulit ȝe se ilk side wi • h ennymes schippis seuerit sa far fra w may ha • f na refuge thairby thus restis na succouris w gif discomfist attour quhat folly quhat extreme miserie ony creature leif wappinnis quhilkis may defend hꝭ life haue confidence onlie swiftnes feit sen ȝe haue sa gud experience quhat commoditeis may fal ȝour manheid quhat mischeif sorow may fall ȝour cowartry suffir nocht ȝour handis dul sleuth yt ȝe may propic • āt fortoun haue sikir victory quhilk ȝour handis quhairthrow incredible rich felicite may thair eftir succeid skarsly wer thir wourdis endit quhen baith armyis began array othir ye mene tyme acho come ordinance middilward quhare kyng alexander wes arrayit time traisting gif ye samyn wer brokin ye remanent battallis sone vincust battall wes fochtyn gret cruelte athir side specialie quhair two kyngis faucht thay ruschit ay yai partis quhair yai saw thair pepil waikest exhortyng yame schaw thair manheid curage kyng acho incontinent maid hym ane band forcy campionis rusche throw ye samyn battal quhair kīg alexander faucht nochttheles wes stoutlie resistit kyng alexander sa gret noumer pepill hym stuffit battall fresche men al partis quhair failȝeit quhill last baith wyngis danis wer put • lycht incontinent alexander stewart paslay come • bus • hement fresche men myd • ilward quhair kīg alexander wes fechtād aganis kyng acho lāg bergane vncertane victory ye danis seand alexander cum new recēt victory yame 〈◊〉 bakkis quhome followit ye •• ottis gret cruelte throw • unynghame maid ithand slau • h • e • thaym • uhill nych • • ut 〈◊〉 end thair laubour • orow king acho fled ane noumer castell air quhilk wes tan • • aitlie hym mene tyme gat tithingis • lot quhilk contenit l schippis wes • erist vnmercyfull tempest nane thaym sauit except foure • oure marineris quhilkis eschapi • eftir tinsal thair schippis war slane inhabitantis cuntre kyng acho brokin yi maner gat yir iiii schippis fled orknay yi battall wer slane xxiiiim danis scottis vm yi battall wes fourthin la • gi ye thrid day august fra redēption imiiclxiii ȝeris king acho cuming orknay send ane new army norroway denmark inuaid ye scottꝭ aganis nixt symer nochtheles becaus deceissit ye ȝeir nixt following army ska ••• ye weris ceissit ¶of natiuite alexāder ye ferd ye message send magnus king norrovvay king alexāder ye thrid▪ ansvver hovv said alexander recouerit ilis scotlād fra danis ca xix followit gret blythnes scotland eftir deith kyng acho samyn day yt deceissit ī orknay say ye xxi day ianuar wes borne alexand prince scotland gottin margaret sister kyng hary thus wes dowbill ioy glaidnes al partis scotland ye ennyme deid ane new prince borne eftir deith kīg acho succedit son magnus ane rycht catholik prince magnꝰ send chācellar ye ȝeir following kyng alexander perth offerit gif ouir rycht clame yt said magnꝰ king norroway arrane bute sa yt ye remanent ilis mycht peaceabilly iosit hym tymes cumyng answerd king alexāder yt ye ilis pertenit auld heritage hym ꝓgenitouris kingis scotland mycht haue na amite freindschip wt danis quhil ye said ilis war restorit hym ye nixt ȝeir yi chancellar norroway mony • thir nobyl mē returnit fra kyng magnꝰ scotland letteris vnder gret • le renūcit gaif ouir rycht clame yt micht haue ye ilis scotland king alexand sal pay ye said king norroway ye said renunciation iiiim markis striuelyng togidder ane ȝei • ly pension ane▪ cm̄ ye mair rob •• atioun perseuerand amite kyndnes betuix scottis danis tymes cumyng magaret king alexande • doucht hauand bot ane ȝeir age salbe geuin ī mariage hannigo ye son kyng magnus quhē scho cumyn perfite age place quare mai •• occision slauchter wes danis salbe maid ane hospitall pure folkis samyn tyme kyng hary son edward weir aganis symon morfort otheris sindry noblis inglād requeistit kyng alexander scotland support aganis yame kyng alexander send sone eftir alexander cumyn vm chosin mē ingland supportit kyng hary sic maner ye maist part ennymes war distroyit ye remanent constranit seik mercy yi trubil beād dātit said followit ane othir roger mortymer howbeit sone pecifyit said roger tane mony otheris factioun castel rowlard put deith tyme ye waithman robert hode fallow litil iohne quhō ar mony fabillis mery sportis soūg amang vulgar pepyll ¶of ansvver maid papis legat king alexander natiuite robert bruce vailȝeant conquerour deith king alexanderis vvife hir barnis ca xx ye ȝeir followyng wes ane legat send fra pai • clement ye feird gader money scotland rasyng allegit armyis aganis turki legat ressauit ye realme bot cō mandit schaw message bordouris desyrit ane breif ye said paip haue iiii mark striue •• ng ilk proche kirk lxxx markꝭ striuelīg ilk bischoprik abbacy yat ī scotland caus hym ye mair plesandly answerit desiris send certane statutꝭ maid hym vayage richt proffitabyl ye gouernance scottis yir petitionis answerit king alexander yat necessar send sa gret sowmes money desirit nochtheles suld send gyf war necessar certane armit mē prouidit expensis pa ye papis army aganis ye turki hꝭ othir pointis answerit ye scotlād wald ressaue na statutis bot yame yat war cōmandit ye paip generall counsall ay mo preceptis ar geuyn ye mo transgressouris ar foūdin ye ȝeir fra ye incarnation imiiclxxi ȝerꝭ thomas erle carrik past mony nobil men ye haly land al votit vnder ane mynd fecht aganis cristꝭ ennymes deith yame returnit yai war al slane pest insufferable • ti ye cuntre yi erle carrik left na heritour succeid efter hym heritage fai • ane douchter namit martha xv ȝeris yi lady hir solace hapnit pa ye huntis quhare scho auenture met ane nobyl man robert bruce son air robert bruce lord annandale scotland cleueland ingland yi lady finaly sa inamorit yi mā y• scho hint hors ye renȝeis forcely led hym hir carrik quhare scho lang tary consultation freindis tuk hym hir husband lord al sone king alexand aduertist heirof tuk hir castell turnebery eschetit al hir landis gudis handis scho maryit consent nochtheles ye king within dayis efter sic cōpassion hir yt tuk ane esy cōpositiō 〈2 page missing〉 wyfe dansing wt al glaidnes ya • mycht deuisit apperit • yair sicht ane ymage ane deid man nakit flesche lyre bair bonis throw quhilk ye king remanēt pepil • sa astonist yt yai left yair sport 〈◊〉 affray ye time king alexander wer mony nobil clerkꝭ thomas de aquino man singular • lyfe erudition theologie bonauenture ye ordour freir minoris michell scot rycht excellēt 〈◊〉 quhilk singulare erudi • ion wes na le tretit edward king ingland yan alexand • ing scottis sa endis heir ye 〈…〉 yir cronikillis heir begynnis xiiii buke croniklis scotland ¶hovv scotland vvas gydit vi gouernouris hovv mariage betuix ye mad norrovvay king edvvard ingland failȝeit hovv bruce balliol contendit croun hovv decision thairof vvas cōmittie king edvvard hovv maid balliol king ca primo alexander ye thrid quhilk deceissyt miserabilly wes schawin left na ai • ꝭ testamenter ȝit gottin body succeid ye croun saif onlie ye madin norroway said yus wes ye realme gret tr • bil wes ony king vi ȝeris ix monethis followit mony terribill cruelteis al ꝑtis ye realme sic ꝑsonis wer dātit afore feir iustice began 〈…〉 ouirhail peple sindry oppressionis ȝit ye realme w • gouernit al ye said tyme vi regentis quhais namis wer williā fraseir bischop sanct androis duncane erle fif iohn̄ cumyn erle buchquhan yir war regentis ye north robert bischop glasgew schir iohn̄ cumyn iames stewart scotland war regentis ye south ye mene tyme edward kīg ingland callit lāg schankꝭ tuk purpos cōques ye realm scotland destitute ony heid becaus knew ye madin norroway iust heritour ye croun scotland send ambassatourꝭ scotland desiring yi madin nort • way geuin hym ī mariage ye lordꝭ eft lāg cōsultation assentit desirꝭ vnd yir cōditionis yt ye realm scotland suld fre peace quiete ony subiection seruitude ī tyme afore ī ye tyme kīg alexand gif na succession followit betuix hī yi madin norroway ye croun return ye nerrest airꝭ king alexand last deceissit ony clame king edward successouris time cumyng incōtinēt ii nobyll knichtꝭ schir michel scot schir michel wemis war direckit ambassatourꝭ brīg yi madin norroway effect • oresaid nochtheles afore yair cumyng madin deceissit thus returnit yir ambassatouris ony expeditiō yair erādꝭ hir deith failȝeit al amite kindnes betuix inglismē scottis followit gret trubil ī scotlād freindꝭ kīg alexāder cōtending ye croun ye gret dāmage violation baith ye law god mā specially betuix iohn̄ balliol robert bruce yi robert nepot yat robert bruce yt marijt isabel ȝounge • doucht erle dauid hūtingtoun quhō gat ane son namit robert quhilk maryit ye heritour carrik haue schawin fad yi robert yt clames croun iohn̄ ballioll gottin margaret eldest douchter ye said erle dauid hūtington allane lord galloway quhilk maryit ye said margaret hir ii douchterꝭ quhilkꝭ ye eldest namit doruidilla maryit schir iohne balliol fader yi iohn̄ ballioll yat clamit ye croun becaus cūyn eldest doucht erle dauid ye reason nerrest aire king williā nane othir sa neir approche ī blud hym lyue ye tothir side robert bruce howbeit discēdit ye ȝoūgest doucht erle dauid cumyn ye first mail hꝭ fad first born clamit ye croun ye reason pertene hym yi debait clame sa fauori • assistence sindry gret prince realme yt micht na wayꝭ decidit howbeit oftymis brocht afore yir gouernouris regentis foresaid becaus thay dred gif yai declarit ye tane yame king ye tothir suld vsurpe crown ꝑforce thay remittit decision ye richt yairof kīg edward ingland wt power constrane ye said ꝑtiis stād sentēc • king edward plesandly ressauit ye ambassatourꝭ quhilkis war send yi effect ꝓmittit cū berwik agane ane certan day last quhē cūin ye place day assignit began explore ye richtꝭ yir ii ꝑtiis afore rehersit quhē considerit yam lenth maid answer sayng▪ micht decide ī sa difficil mat quhil sindry wise prudent assessourꝭ cōcurrand wt hym yairfore desirit haue xii scottis maist knawlege eruditioun yt scotland ꝓmittit tak xii ye maist resolut wise clerkꝭ inglād sit apon decision ye mat ye fine yt difficulteis dowtis salbe sa cruelly socht furth yt ye iust verite micht allanerly triumphe quhē wryttyn reasonis iuris baith ye ꝑetis returnit londō bot dayly • ccurris ye ingine mortal pepyl ar sa fragyl y• nane beris cōmissioun office quhare ony ꝓffet risis yt may ꝑt yairwith quhil yair hādis weil oynttit ye samyn maner king edward couth keip hādis clene ye cōmission geuin apon ye decision yi debait eft returning lō brocht certane resolute men frāce decide yi mater cōmandit yame vareant dowble yair delyuerance ye fyne yat quhen yai war found vareant ane mynd ī decision yi pley micht ye erar mak quhom list yame two king ye maist part yir mē law iugi • wt robert bruce cumyn ye first male iohn̄ balliol ye secound▪ otheris quhilkis war subornat king edward declarit ioh • ballioll haue maist richt▪ cumyn ye eldest sist king edward beleuing sufficiēt time cōques ye realm scottis becaus deuidit syndry votis returnit berwik quhare gaderit ye xxiiii men maist eruditioun deuisit afore geif finall sentence mater quhen cumyn baith ye ꝑtiis as ••• sourꝭ ane quiet chalmer quhare deuisit sit mater causit ye samyn kepit wt maist deligence ony ysching entres concludit make hym kyng wald sworn hald ye croun hym superioure thairof becaus knew robert bruc • singulare manheid wysdome aboue ye balliol thocht best assailȝe hym first gif war repugnant desiris geif ye crown ye balliol last quhen king edward proponit yi mater maner afore rehersit robert bruce▪ yi robert hauād na respect singulare proffet honour cō pair cōmon weill liberte scotland▪ answerit yt wald rā di • natiue cuntre sen bene fr • geuyn faith 〈◊〉 • ing edward mak hym homa •• ▪ • e gat ye sentence geuyn hym 〈◊〉 said erle glocester ane 〈◊〉 gret prudence auctorire ingland seand ye balliol maid kīg▪ 〈◊〉 robert bruce sa vnreasonably 〈◊〉 said maner remembir 〈◊〉 king edward quhat done yt day • geuand iust sentence mater yocht ye samyn • e hid salbe richt manifest quhen ye gret iuge ye ripis ye conscience ••• retis euery mannis mynd sall caus ye answer ye horribyl iugement▪ thow he geuyn sentence ane king thā salbe iugemēt geuin ye schort tyme efter iohn̄ balliol went wt gret triūphe scone crownit sanct androis day fra incarnation imiiclxxxxii ȝeris ¶hovv balliol come gret trubyl making homage king edvvard allia vvith king phillip france hovv king edvvard vvan bervvik treason slevv scottis samyn ca ii kyng balliol sāct 〈◊〉 day ȝule nixt ȝeir come new castell maid homage king edward ye realme scotland cōtrarye mynd noblis geuand hym self realme quhilk fre day seruitude inglismē howbeit smal felicite succedit ye samyn wtin schort tyme efter king edward chargit hym tenour band homage cū al ye power micht mak weir ye king frāce cōtinent king iohn̄ become penitēt ye makyng ye said homage sēd ambassatouris london renounce ye said homage allegit becaus maid auise ye iii estatꝭ scotland vane ī ye self keipit king edward answerit ye ambassatouris kyng balliol sen wyl cū w sal cū dant ye scottꝭ mair esaly send ambassatouris ye king france quhō cō fiderat lang peace stabill yi peace mair firmance ye king francꝭ doucht geuyn ī mariage edward son howb • purposit quhē scottꝭ war vtly distroyit inuaid france afore notwt standing ony mariage band hym ꝯtrackit ye mene tyme king edward recōseld robert bruce ī sic familiarite yt ꝓmittit mak kīg scottis esperāce yairof gaif hī ye keping syndry gret castellis scotlād quhilkꝭ war ye tyme ī inglismenis handꝭ kīg balliol dredād yir slichtꝭ inglismē extreme dāgeir cū hꝭ realm sēd williā bischop sāct andros wt schir iohn̄ sowlis schir ingerame umfra ī • rance renew ye band wt phillip ye iiii kyng thairof quhilk wes finaly done vnd yir new • oitioꝭ ni ye doucht charlꝭ erle uallance angeos brothir kyng philip france salbe maryit edward balliollis son sal haif landis quhilkis balliol possedit france namit dampart harecure horny quhilkꝭ kyng iohne sall ressaue lxm crounis towquhair wes balliol aduertist kyng edward wes cumand gret ordinance sege berwik thairfore conuenit nobillis ane counsal yair auise send mony al baronis gentilmen fife louthiane defence thairof inglismen come nocht onlie strang army land bot al come ane gret nauy sege said town see ye scottis quhilkis wer send ye ballioll defence ye toun tuk xviii▪ thair schippis remanent chasit fra ye sege king edward prouokit brokin displeseir come wt doubill army yan afore tak ye said toun becaus couth nocht get force gret defence yat ye scottis maid thocht assailȝe samyn maist treasonable slycht maid hym rais army fra sege said toun syne went ane othir part returnit fenȝeit ensen • eis baneris scotland hauād sanct androis croce aboue thair harnes ye scottis maner send certane lymmaris scotland afore ye toun saying iohn̄ balliol wes cumand army defence thairof cōmanding yame haif ye portꝭ op • n agane cūing ye fuliche peple ye toun reiosing ye cūing ye kyng yai beleuit opinnit ye portis come furth toun partis traistyng onlie deliuerit feir ennymes bot al pissance meit thaym plane battall gif ennymes wald assailȝe yame ony forthir ȝit quhen yai saw yame neir ye portis yai knew weill yair langage habit yai wer inglismen incō tinent maid yame deligence rescoues toun ye mene tyme inglismen ran swift hors betuix yame ye toun incontinent kyng edward enteri • army slew nocht onlie sodiouris weirmen bot barnis wemen agit ꝑsonis ony • th mercy ranson left na creature scottis blude lyue within ye toun yi toun wes tane gud friday ye xxix day marche fra redemptioun imiiclxxxxv ȝeris edward maist furious tyrane mycht yow rage wt sic cruelte ye peple ony exception age quhair na occasioun wes precedent iniuris quhare ye pepil wes subdewit force armis yir cruel tigris ruschit throw al ye toun sauit nane kick mercat quhair yai mycht apprehendit lamētable slauhter wes throw al ye partis ye toun y• ane mil mycht haif gane two day ithādlie stremis blude yi toun wer slane viim mē wt maist part nobillis gentilmen fiffe louthiane hovv king balliol vvas discōfist dū bar tint al strenthis scotland hovv gaif ouir croun king edvvard fled france ca iii kyng balliol heirād ye miserabil slauchter pepyll berwik gaderit ane army wt gret hatrent reuenge ye samyn▪ faucht king edward dūbar quhare discōfist mony al army tane slane efter yi discōfitour ye erlis marche menteith wt lxx knichtis fled ye castel dūbar war seigit sa lang quhill thay war constranit laik vittallis randerit king edward thair lyuis sais • nochtheles yai war al slane yi cruel tyrane kyng edward ony respect fayth promes said yame ye followit ye opinion balliol yt robert bruce solistit al freindes ye begīnyng ye battall leif ye balliol ye way ye caus discō fitour bot thir wordis war fals said ye freindis balliol allanerly malyce ye fine yat bruce suld cū hatrēt ye scottis robert • ruce • fter yi victory past king edward desirit hym fulfil ye 〈◊〉 maid afore vnd gret 〈◊〉 nochtheles gat bot ane 〈◊〉 answer▪ king edward 〈◊〉 desire king scotland thā bruce answer 〈◊〉 yow yt haif na othir besines 〈◊〉 bot conques realmes king •• me robert bruce persa •• ng sic dissait treason vnd • r wordis king edward returnit richt sorrowfull landis ingland hauand gret indignation mynd yt obeyit ye king ingland forthir thā reason requi ••• concludit deliuerit mynd quhen tyme occurrit reuenge 〈◊〉 done king edward • ist cruel maner efter victory king edward tuk baith castel edinburgh striuelyng chasit ye balliol ye castel • ar • thair iohne cumyng lord strabogy come kyng edward sworn lege man sone efter yi iohne comyng brocht balliol wt son edward mō • ro quhair ye said iohn̄ balliol void al kingly abulȝemētis come ane quhit wand hand king edward feir lyfe resignit richt titill yt mich • haue ye croun scotland 〈◊〉 burdoun king edwardis hādis maid hym chartour thairof maner iiii ȝeir regne efter kyng edward cōuen • al ye noblis scotland berwik quhare yai war sworn leill trew subdittis hym tymes cumyng mair secur •• e constranit yame randir ye strenthis munitionis scotland baith see land hādis sic thingis done send iohne balliol son edward london quhare yai war keipit strāg ward lang tyme quhill last sufferit iohne balliol return scotland leuand son plege yt suld attempt na rebellion aganis hym iohne balliol eft returnyng seing hym self nothir cherist cōmonis nobyllis scotland fled normandy faderis heritage quhare lāg age wes maid blind efter quhais deith son edward succedit heritage frāce inuadit scotlād gret trubyll sall efter schaw ¶hovv king edvvart come vvith ane army aganis france hovv erle buchquha • e maid gret hei • schippis ingland vvilliam vvallace vassalage aganis inglismen ca iiii kynge edward nocht remouyng battal mynd▪ supersedit france garnist strenthis scotland resist rebellyon scottis sine went ane army frāce leuand behynd hym hew cressyngham regent scotland returning beleuit lytyll iniuris attemptit scottis gret afflictioun done yame weris afore rehersit bot tyrāny sic natur • yt may neuir haue sufficient munition sicker targe nochtwithstandyng quhat sumeuir garneson laid defence thairof euery pepyl yt opprest tyranny wyll labour exoner thaym yairof quhen euir yai may fynd ony sufficient oportunite ye lordꝭ scotland sone efter ye departing king edward renuncit al band promis maid hym conuenit togidder al ane mynd striuelyng recouer yair realme liberte thꝭ coū sall wer chosyn xii nobyll men gouernourꝭ scotland ylk mā wtin yair awin boūdis yt yai micht ye mair esaly resist ye tyrāny kīg edward amang quhō iohne cumyng erle buchquhan principall ane man singulare prudence baith weir peace yi erle buchquhan come ane army northūbirland quhare ceissit fra na maner cruelte yt micht deuisit waistit al ye landis yairof fyre swerd last segit carlele bot sa strangly defendit micht tane tyme ane ȝoung mā namit wyllyā wallace son schir andro wallace cragy knicht stature corporall strenth aboue al othir man sene dayis sic prudēce craft cheuelry ye nane found perregal hym wallace fra first ȝouth ꝑsewit inglismen extreme▪ hatrent sindry ieoperdis mony vailȝeant actis support scottis sic incredible strenth cūyng ꝑfite age yt vincust oftymes iii iiii inglismē atanis singulare battall quhen ye fame illuster vassalage blawin throw realme mony nobyll men exoner yame fra seruitude inglismē assistit hꝭ opinion throw quhilk sa strang yt mycht na way circūuenit treasoun inglismen finaly behad hym sa manly al ieoperdis yt chosyn general vocis quhē maist truble apperit gouernour scotland ī place iohne balioll delyuer ye samyn fra seruitude tyrāny inglismen tyme mony al ye abbasijs prelatijs scotland wa • inglismēnis handis nochtheles williā wallace cōmission william fraser bischop sant andros eieckit put yame furth al ꝑtis scotland left nothir temporal spiritual religius mā yair blud scotland sone efter ressauit ye army y• iohne cumyng erle buchquhan afore constranit scottis obey hym othir force fauour syne come wt prowd baner throw syndry partis scotland inuading inglismen otheris yair opinion efter sindry gret ieoꝑdis wā ye castellꝭ forfare dūde brechin montros slew al ye soudiouris fundin thaym wallace prowd yir feliciteis tuk dūnoter efter yt ye principal capitanis yairof war furth slew personis found syne garnist strāgest maner efter went aberdene quhilk left wast cū yng becaus castel garnist sic prouision yt mycht takyn gret murdir pepyll left samyn returnit angus king edward heirand thir doingis france send hew cressinghame ane army inuade wallace al sone wallace aduertist comyng army left sege cowpar went brig stryuelyng stop ye ouircumyng hew cressinghame fynaly slew hym syngulare manheid put army flicht efter victory returnit ye sege cowꝑ quhilk rāderit hym sone efter returning mony scottis send thair ambassatouris wallace efter victory promitting support hym money vittallis gif wald ressaue yame ī fauouris sindry othir castellis war r • ̄derit hym quhilkꝭ war garnist hym al prouision efter scalit army come striueling ane certane maist tē der freindis becaus saw ane miserabil derth rising al partis scotland ye gret mortalite ye pepyl thairof gaif besines releif ye pepyl sustene yame ye frutis ingland incontinent cōmandit al scottꝭ reddy agane ane prefixt day pa thair auld ennymes mene tyme maid sic punition yame quhilkis 〈◊〉 repugnant ꝓclamation 〈◊〉 ye remanent pepyl feir yairof 〈◊〉 hꝭ purpos sone eft wallace wt iii battallis arrayit maist awful ordināce brint herijt al northumbirland new castel •• forcy cheuelry become sic • errou • fayis yt returnit riche spulȝe gret triūphis scotland ony battall ¶of kyng edvvardis message send vvallace v • allace ansvver▪ gret prudence cheuelry hovv scottis vvar discomfist falkirk hovv kyng frāce purchest peace scottis ca v edward lāg schākis heirand ye gret heirschippis slauchter done pepil returnit heuy displeseir ingland send ambassatouris wallace saying bene ingland wallace durst haue done sic cruelteis pepyl thir wordis answerit wallace tuk bot tyme ingland quhen king edward kyng edward tuke scotland quhen fand ye samyn destitute ane heid makand hym conques realme efter noblis chosin hym amiable freindly cōpositour geif decisioun apon iuris richtis two partis contending ye crown attour mak syngulare māheid prudence mair knawin inglismen king edward may vnderstand besines geuyn perpetuall defence scotlād obstinat mynd baith delyuer said realme seruitude reuenge cruelteis done inglismen tymes bygane cōmādit ane herald pa king edward aduertis hym yt suld hald pasche ingland gif god fortunit hym lyue dispite king edward al pepil yat wyll beir armoure name last quhen king edward wallace war baith cumyn place assignit day battall set sydis howbeit inglismen wa • dowble mair nowmer thā scottis ȝit wallace per • e curage na thing effrayit yair multitude com first feild quhen armyis war reddy ione ye inglismen left thair palȝonis maid yame f • e mene tyme ye scottis prowde efter mony victoryis seand yair ennymes geif bakkis micht scarsly refrenit fra chace wallace quhilk knew na thing better ye dissait inglismen ran wt swift hors afore scottis exhortyng yame ryn wylfully thair awin perdition deuisit aganis yame slicht ennymes becaus hasty fleyng ing •• smen nocht bet cullourit fra •• e yairfore sufficiēt yame haue victory bot ony strakis ye scottis beand dantit thus thair wyld fury prudence worthy camploun wer saiffit thair honour liuis returnit scotland infinite spulȝe rich forthir pepill supportit wallace ay yat grew manheid pissance aganis inglismen samyn maner yai began inuy hym quhen wes cumin vailȝeant dedis maist felicite honour specially gret lordis princis realme hauand gret indignattoun ane man small lynage suld rise virtew sa gret estimation reuerence aboue yame throw quhilk rais gret seditioun scotland specially cumyngis robert bruce quhilkꝭ inuyit hym maist ¶kyng edward knawing new sedition send ambassatouris principall men quhilkis inui • wallace maist quhen gottyn yame bound opinion come ane army scotland wallace knawing na thing treason deuisit aganis hym rasit army met hym falkirk eftir cumyng rais ane odioꝰ debait betuix ye stewart cumyn wallace quhilk thaim thre suld haue wangard ye first two thocht heuy yat man sobir lynage small beginning suld preferrit thaym dignite honouris cheualry ye thrid thocht charge wes geuin hym thre esta • ti scotland yat cause wald gif na place yame ye mene tyme ye inglismē come awfully aganis thaym yai wer constranit cum forthwart aganis thair ennymes breistis boldyn yair awin yā yair 〈◊〉 disples • ir kyng edward 〈…〉 thair seditioun come 〈◊〉 deligence battall quhen battallis wer reddy iune ye cumyngis fled feild fol • ꝭ yair opinion robert bruce wes tyme army ingland myt yairfor mak na support scottis yai wer miserablie slane sydis youcht ye scottis wer murdrist maner ȝic wallace left na thing vndone mycht pertene deuore ane vailȝeant campioun exhorting folkis sumtyme nocht effrayir yame quhilkis war afore discō fist onlie feir yair visage sū tyme ruscheand throw ennymes yair gret slaucht instruck folkis quhat wes done bot last scottis faucht day hym ouirset multitud inglismen ye cumpanyis robert bruce cumand thair bakkis wer slane wallace seand hym circulit partis ruschit feirslye throw ennymes deliuerit hym hym self maner mene tyme ane strang capitane inglād namyt freir brtangis followit wallace wt gret ferocite bot wallace na thyng astonist cuming met hym nochtwithstanding ye discomfitour scottꝭ sic manheid curage yat slew yi capitane face al army ingland residew inglismen feir yairof ceissit fra ony thare chace scottis yi vnhappy battal wes slane ioh • stewart bute al folkis quhilkis wer left wallace extreme dangeir efter micht haue delyuerit yame yairof makduf slane battal schir iohne grahame quhais deith • icht displesant wallace▪ mony othir nobyl vailȝeant men war slane maner quhilkis war ouir prolixt schaw said robert bruce efter cumyn ye backis scottis said wallace maner ¶o wallace quhat presumptuous foly knawyng thy self desert left nobillis commonis scotland fecht sic vane audacite aganis pissance riche kyng ingland seis thow nocht thy self • ynnand vter confusioun consideris thow irrecouerabyl dā mage approcheing thy displeseir answerit wallace robert thy febyll cowartry sleuth mouis assailȝe mony patellus ieoperdyis defence thy rycht delyuering realme scotland fra tyranny inglismē thir wourdis war sa deip inp • entit 〈◊〉 brucis hart determit 〈◊〉 abide na langat opinion ingland treuth sendill 〈◊〉 ar ye scottis vincust inglismen without sum diuisioun amang thaym self youcht scottis 〈◊〉 tyme stude sic array thay war inuincibyl culd nocht 〈…〉 afore ȝit robert bruce come ane buschement inglismen thair bakkis quhilk thay war miserably discomfist slane battall strykyn magdalen day fra redemp •• oun ane miiclxxxxviii ȝ • ri thairfore inglismen held ay efter ane happy day fecht aganis scottis forthir youcht robert bruce quhilk wes efter king scottis baith battall dunbar battall falkirk ye opinion ingland aganis scottis na crime mycht imput hym thairfore first becaus na refuge scotland ballioll persewit hym deid becaus contendand hym crown secoundly held lordschip cleueland king ingland ane inglismā born howbeit nerest air proximite blud crowne scotland reasoun thairof behuuit make hym seruice al kyng edward promittit retreit sentence gaif ballioll make said robert kyng attoure sanct paule fynd ane gret scurge crystyn pepyll persewit thaym maist cruell ennymyte fra come thair opinioun gretest pyllar faith samyn maner wheit robert bruce persewit scottis gret cruelte postponyng hym fra iust heritage croun ȝit fra maid kyng best prince euir rang aboue scottis youcht fand scotland gret miserie neir conquest tyranny inglismen ȝit recouerit syngulare manheid left fre ony clame gud tranquillyte wallace efter yi discomfitoure come perth becaus couth nocht suffir inuy nobyllis rysyng ylk day aganis hym exonerat hym auctorite dischargit hym gouernance realme samyn tyme philip fourt name kyng france hauand gret miseratioun calamyte fallyn confiderat freindis scotland actioun allanerlye france send ambassatouris edward prince ingland quhilk contrackit mariage douchter purchest peace scottis fra ye feist sanctis witsonday nixt following ☞ ¶hovv inglismen vver discomfist roslyng hovv kyng edvvard • conquest gret roumes scotland▪ hovv fo • bessis tuke thair first begynnyng ca vi scottis brokin cōtinewal weris send thair ambassatouris paip boniface cōplene gret afflictiō done thaym king edward quhilk set perdition thair liberte cōques yair realme desirit ye paip sen mair empire aboue inglismen ony othir realme interpone auctorite constrane king edward desyst fra inuasioun scottis scottis war content al pleyis concernyng liberte croun scotland war decidit halynes sen samyn may na othirwayis decidit insufferabil dāmage fallyng ye pepyl blind desyre nobyllis contending ye crowne paip efter tane ripe deliberation mater decernit ye scottis haue iust action battal defence thair liberteis aganis king edward sone efter scottis chesit iohne cumyn gouernoure thair realme al sone king edward aduertist yair rebellyon send ane army throw boundis scotland come perth inuadyng cuntre gret trubyll mony nobyllis becaus thay micht nocht suffer iniuris war randerit otheris quhilkis mair sycht thair liberte seruitude fled ye woddis chesit symon fraseir college thair weris iohne cumyn syne gaderit ane power viii thousand chosyn men reuenge iniuris done inglismen fynaly slew euery ane thaym ouir takyn remanent chasit cuntre kyng edward commouit vassalage send ane vailȝeant capitane namit rodulphe confrey scotland xxx thousand men rodulphe efter cumyng scotland tuke lytyl respect scottis bot allanerly war cumyn take scotland pleseir thairfore purposit pa throw boundis scotland thre armyis thre sindry partis ylk army hauand x thousand men nowmer cō mandit thaym meit togydder roslyng efter thay cumyn throw cuntre thre syndry partis al sone iohne cumyn symon fraseir war aduertist yairof thay rasit thair folkis traisting na thyng sa gud assailȝe chance battal ane thir thre armyis thay traistit gyf happinnit thaym haue victory ane thir thre armyis ye remanent two mair able vincust incontinent thay exhortit thair folkis fecht defence thair wyffis lyberteis guddis scottis rasit thir wourdis esperance victory faucht sic inuincible curage thay put first battal inglismen flicht skarsly thay gaderit spulȝe thairof quhen ye secound battall come yame mair cruelte first nochtheles throw curage thair recent victory thay ionit incredibyll manheid skarsly secound battall vincust quhen thrid battal come thaym fresche power yocht scottis war woundit slane gret nowmer ȝit hortatioun thair capitane thay ruschit pertely new spreit curage thair ennimes efter lang bergane thay put yair ennimes flycht yame bene sauit war nocht scottis war ouirset lang fechting victory succedit scottis sanc • mathewis day fra redemption imiiic twa ȝeris dout gif euir ony victorie wes conquest afore thir dayis manheid honoure xxx thousand inglismen lang prouision set bat • vincust dyscomfist skars viii thousand scottis thairfore ilk man beleuit victory nocht cuming singulare fauour grace god ȝit ye scottis kepit bot schort tyme yi victorie king edward knawin yi discomfitour rosling rasit army inuaid ye scottis baith see land ye scottis seand ordinance pissance thay mycht resist fled thair strenthis throw quhilk king edwardis army went ony obstakill throw scotland fra north south partis yairof na man foūd resist yame except wallace sa mony assistit hym quhilkis leiffit montanis woddis eschew fury inglismen kyng edward heirand ye wallace lurkit dennis lay wait abidyng sum tyme inuaid inglismen desirit sindry message sworne inglisman haue thairfore gret erldomes lordschippis within ingland wallace refusit saying hꝭ liberte wes small rentis scotland possession gret landis ingland vnder seruitude castel striueling wes kepit yir dayis b • ane vailȝeant knycht schir william olifer quhen bene continewally segit thre monethis la •• vitallis rāderit ye hous king edward vnder thir conditionis personis ar ye said castel sal haue fre pasport depart yair baggis guddis thair pleseir nochtheles kyng edward ane fals tyrane brak aith promes behalf eftir castell wes randerit tuke schir william olifer send hym presoner londoun quhair remanyt mony ȝeris eftir captiuite mony othir castellis wer tane kyng edward maner sodiouris thairof slane ony mercy ranson ye castell urquhard wes takin nane left lyue except ane woman gret child quhome surname boyis forbes discendit woman yat wes sauit maner wes wife alexander boyis lord said castell howbeit wes vnknawin tyme scho wes pure array eftir taiking castell scho fled ireland quhare scho bure hir son alexander alexander quhen scotlād wes recouerit inglismennis hādis come king robert bruce desirit restorit hꝭ faderis heritage quhilk wes occupyit tyme othir possessoris kyng robert wery quhat wes done yi • er thocht nocht semand ane prince suld tak landis fra nobill men quhilkis wer geuin thaym reward yair manheid al wes iust spulȝe ye man kindely heritage quhilk fader freindis guddis tynt defence realme yus wes ane mydway deuisit quhilk certane landis mar litil le proffet yan landis urquhard wer geuyn said alexander boyis nochy • le man wes callit boyis wes callit forbes slew ane beit singulare manheid quhome surname forbessis discendit ¶of sindry gret cruelteis done king edvvard aganis scottis hovv ye bruce cumyn • var confiderat hovv th • cumyn vvas slane ca vii scotland beand subdewit maner kyng edward gart distroy auld lawis constitutionis scotland traisling thairthrow caus scottis inglismen incres togidder blude amite faith ¶he brint cronikles scotland maner bukis al weill deuyne seruyce othir materis fyne memorye scottis suld peri gret punitioun maid thaym quhilkis war repugnant thir chargis ¶he gart scottis wryte bukis efter vse sarum constranit thaym say efter vse attoure banist scottis quhilkis ony syngulare eruditioun put thaym oxfurd dreidand nobillis scotland thair eruditioun suld incres virtew sum tyme delyuer thair realme seruitude ¶attoure tyrane sic bane arrogance dystroyit antiquiteis scotland efter passit throw syndry boundis thairof commandit round tempyl beside camelon cassin quhilk biggit haue schawin honoure claudius empriour goddes uictory nocht suffering inuy sa mekyll antiquiteis oure eldaris remane memorye ȝit inhabitantis saiffit samyn fra vter euersioun put romane ansenȝe superstitionis ye wallis thairof ingrauit armis king arthoure commandit callit arthouris hoif ¶ 〈◊〉 • yng edward afore returning ingland na memorie suld remane scotland thair bukis beand vniuersaly brint send chiar marbyll scotland london put westmynster quhare remanis ȝit syne callit lordis scotland ane conuention ar sanct androis tuk new band thaym leill trew subdittis hym ony rebellioun tymes cumyng lordis scotland war bound hym day except wallace quhom na landis rich mycht brek fra defence lyberte scotland ¶kyng edward hald scottis opinioun left behynd hym ane vailȝeant knycht odomer wallance gouernoure scotland syne returnit gret triumphe london ¶in mene tyme robert bruce iohne cumyn conuenit togydder first cumyn said bruce thow seis howe kyng edward slais oure pepyll ony occasyoun occupyis oure kyngrik reasoun gud curage thairfore take thy armour wappynnis suffer haue thy landis sall make ye king gyf thow wyll nocht suffer kyng thow sall nocht onely haue landis heritage bot thou sall ay nixt honoure dignite ☞ ¶thus bruce cumyn confiderat togidder endentouris subscriuit athir handis interchangit thair selis sic thingis done bruce returnit ingland ¶this rebellyoun robert bruce procedit becaus haldyn ay kyng edward suspition richt crown scottis thairfore durst remane lang scotland king edward slane hym afore▪ gif micht haue gottin hym brethir togidder efter confideration ye cumyn tho • ht power auctorite wald lityl effect scotland gif bruce war king thairfore send ane secret seruand king edward schew ye writingis la •• ly maid betuir hym robert bruce desiring kyng edward gif intendit iose scotland trubyll put ye bruce haistely deith kīg edward gaif litil faith 〈◊〉 yir writyngis first sicht beleuit yt thay come inuy cumyn quhilk dred ye yat suld lytyll pyssance sc • tland 〈◊〉 robert bruce gat ony auc • orite last king edward schew yir 〈…〉 bruce demandit 〈◊〉 ony cognossance 〈◊〉 writ bruce denyit • e let •• ri gret constance sch • wing samyn proceding onely inuy cumyn yairfore desirit 〈◊〉 letteris ane • icht failȝeing yat preuit ye letteris fals fenȝeit suld tyne al landis within ingland king edward gaif lytyll faith thi • let • e • ye wyll god yt bruce suld sauit recouer ye realme scotland seruitude tyranny inglismē ye erle glomer sone efter departyng robert bruce fra kingis presence send hym 〈◊〉 striuelyng pēnyis ii scharp sputris throw quhilk bruce cō iecturit yt na thing proffitable hym bot spur hꝭ hors becaus season wynter erd ouircouerit • awis gart ane smyth scho hors bakw • rtis nane suld follow hym fut steppis departit londō two traist seruandis deligence yt micht come vii day efter lochmaben quhare • brothir edward quhilk gret meruel haiste cummyng incōtinent schew come gret trubyll ye cumyn narrowly eschapit life ye mene tyme thay went forthwart thay met ane futman way becaus eschewit gait thay tuke hym fand new wrytyngis hym direckit fra cumin kyng edward quhilk schew gif ye bruce wer nocht slane na thing bot conspiration truble sall follow al partis scotland aganis kīg edward al sone bruce red thir writingis inquirit diligentlie quhair cumin wes seruand suspeekand na euill schew yt wes ye freiris dunfreis ye bruce incontinent slew yi man bering yir writingis come haistly queir dūfreis quhair fand ye cumyn eftir yt accusit hym schawin awin enventurꝭ straik hym ane swerd wambe syne fled haistely ye kirk met iames lindesay roger kirkpatrik tender freindis said thaym trow cumyn slane quhome yai answerit he thow attēptit sa gret ane mater left vncertane incōtinent yai went ye cumyn inquirit gif ony deidis woūdis gyf trowit recouir gif ony gud surrigiane becaus sayd mycht recouir yai straik hym iii▪ iiii othir straikis mair cruelly sone eftir gaif gaist ȝeir god imiii v • eris ☞ hovv vvallace vves • r •• sit schir iohne mentei • h king robert brucia coronatioun gret miserie hovv cōquest scotland hovv ye douglas tuk yair beginning ca viii thꝭ tyme wallace wes tane treasonably schir iohn̄ • nteith glasgew deliuerit kyng edward kīg edward promittit general edict syndry landis wt gret sowmes money yame ye wald delyuer y• said wallace ī hꝭ hā dis finaly thꝭ wallace brocht london quhare cruelly martyrit tyrāny kīg edward hꝭ quarterꝭ sēd sindry gret tounis scotland hoūg vp schame end maid ye nobil wallace maist forcy campion yat dayis yocht othir scottis randerit baith yame self yair cuntre seruitude inglismen wald neuir subdewit bot ay iosing auld liberte scotland nochtheles sic inuy he ay bene ȝit scotland y• na nobyll man may leif bot outhir ane treason othir finaly distroyit writtin yat ane haly heremite ingland reuist spreit heuinly contemplation saw wallace fleand inestimabyl glore vnto ye heuyn y• faucht defēce cūtre ye deith robert bruce efter ye slauchter ye cumyng send paip absolution attempt ane thing mair audacite aganis kyng edward quhilk micht better resyst tyranny tymes cumyng come freindis scone quhare crownit xxvii day marche ȝit quhen gaderit al ye pepyl yt micht inuaid king edward bot ane small nowmer maist part scotland aganis hym king edward aduertist rebellion maid aganis hym king robert send ane army scotland odomer wallance lieutennent faucht kyng robert meffene ye xix day iuny quhare ye said king robert put flycht youcht army slane tyme ȝit pepil ȝeid fra hym traisting ane euyl signe begin sic discomfitour odomer wallance efter yi victory banist ye wiffis yame ye • sisti • kīg robert throw quhilk mony noble wemen ladyis war cōstranit pa ye desertis woddis eschew ye cruelte inglismen king robert discomfist wise come athole quhare faucht aganis ye cumyngis inglismē put flicht ye samyn maner afore men slane ȝit thir frequent discomfitouris sa desolate freindis yt went solita • personis cumpany amang ye montanis woddis su •• enand miserable life ru • ꝭ herbis yi mischāce ii maist faithfull seruandis hym ye erle leuenax gylbert hay yocht • ̄ tyme b • fers persecution ennimes yai went fra hi • presence ȝit yai baid ay opinion last al fr • indis feir yair liuis skalit fled heir thair thair best refuge quene fled sāct dutho tane williā cuming erle ro deliuerit ye king ingland quhare scho abaid cōtinewally ye battal baunochtburn brothir nigell thomas alexander war tane sū yame heidit carlele sum berwik finaly thay yat fled fra hym war othir slane within ye ȝeir elli haldin presoneris ingland thꝰ king robert brocht sic misery yt sumtyme nakit hungery meit drink saif watter ruris herbis youcht knew weil ye slauchter brothir al othir afflictionis done perdition hym freindis ȝi • sic excellent fortitude al aduersite yat na thing mycht brek inuincible curage sa accustomit euery truble weiris ȝouthe curit nocht sleip ye cald erd drink watter steid aill wyne attoure ane thyng yat apperis haue cumyn myracle grace god howbeit freindis war neir vterly distroyit ceissit neuir haue ferme esperance sumtyme recouer hꝭ realme lyberte pepyl last quhen bene vagabound wylsum sindry partis eschew ye treason yame quhilkis war waitand put hym deith come ane freind ilis quhare gat sic support men wappinnis yt tuk new curage assailȝe ennymes ye samyn way tuke castell carrik slew inglismen quhilkis wer fu • din syne delt spulȝe thairof gret liberalite amang • rmen freindis quhilkis war lurkand vnder couert herirand doingis begā return hym al partis sone efter thair assistence wan ye castel innernes slew al ye sodiouris thairof siclik felicite wa • mony str • chꝭ ye north becaus na pyssance keip thaym kest thaym al partꝭ quhare ȝeid last quhē cumand glennesk gat aduertising yt iohne cumyng syndry inglismen scottis war gaderit aganis hym becaus groūd strenthy tuk purpos abide yame battall nochtheles iohne cumyng yir inglismē scottis quhilkis war gaderit geif hym battal seing hym na thing affrayit thair cumyng send ambassa • ourꝭ haue trewis eschew present dangeir quhill th • war gaderit mair strangly aganis hym ȝit quhen thir desiris war grantit thay followit hym new power thair maist cruel maner king robert bure hym sa vailȝeantly yt oftymes singulare virtew put yame flycht maid ay slauch • ter yame howbeit samyn wes bot smal occurris oftymes frequent scarmussing ieoperdis▪ ye fame thir honourable actis drew hym sic fauoure syndry gret baronis scotland assistit hym amang quhome iames dowglas ane man gret spreit manheid quhilk tendir familiar cousing wyllyam lambertoun bischop sanct andros iames dowglas support kyng robert power tuk bischoppis gold hors sindry othir vailȝeant ȝoūg men opinion went kyng robert byschop lambertoun knawin na thyng thairof howbeit assistit weil yair bot durst opinly auenture gif ony infeliciteis followit efter micht haue cumyn hꝭ displeseir iames dowglas tē derly ressauit kyng robert co • tinewit seruice baith weir peace end lyfe iames discendit ye illuster surname dowglas quhilkis war euir sicker targe weirwal scotland aganis inglismen wan mony lā dis yair syngular māheid vassalage said ye bru • buke ☞¶sa mony gud ye douglas h • bene ane surname vvas neuir scotland sene ¶for thay decorit yi realme mony noble actis glore marciall dedis grew gret estimation nochtheles thair hicht gret pissance baith manrent landis sa suspect kingis quhilkꝭ succedit efter yame caus thair declination▪ • sen surname wes put doun scotlād done vailȝeant dedis ingland bot returne oure h • • orie ☞ deith tyrane kyng edw •• langschankis hovv edvvard camauer son vvas maid kyng ingland hovv kyng robert gat sindry victory •• ennymes 〈◊〉 • rth scotland ca ix edward ingland dredand scottis thir feliciteis ryse ilk day • ore insolēce come ane aufull ordinance euir afore scotlād purpos subdew alluterlie ony recouir cumyng ye bordo • ri fell ane heuy maledy deceissit suddanlie ony confessioun sacrament haly kirk treuth ane knycht ingland namyt schir william banistar ye houre kyng edwardis deith▪ fell ane extasy saw odius tyran cruellie • eurgi • murdir sa mony innocent pepill finalie saw hym c • nuoyi • infinite noumer deuillis hell al sone knycht sene visioun fell ane heuy maledy culd neuir 〈◊〉 rest quhill wes brocht ane opin place al ye pepil schaw visioun quhen schaw • n samyn pepill circumstance afore reheirsit conualescit perfeuerit gud lyfe pennance deith yi apperis trew becaus bludy tyrane ragit vnnatural cruelte cristi •• pepil aboue ye rigour armes quhen wes ī last extreme cōmandit l ȝoung childrin quhilkis wer takin ye castell kildrū eftir wes inglism • n slane ony compassioun thair tendir • eris innocence eftir deith nobillis ingland • uk • n edward ou • carnauer maid hym kyng edward following ye futsteppis fader sūmond lordis scotland dunfreis quhare mony thaym wer sworne make homage faith hym yair superiour kyng otheris rebellit aganis hym traisting ye deith kyng edward gret dissentioun trubill follow inglād sonne wes ȝoung tuke na counsal lordis▪ bot allanerlie peter ganarstoun quhilk wes haitit baith inglismen scottis▪ kyng edward sone eftir returnit ingland send ambassatouris france desiryng support weris ye mene tyme iohne cumin erle buchquhan gaderit ane army inglismē scottis aganis kyng robert yocht kīg robert wes gret infirmi •• com ane hors litter ye camp aganis hꝭ ennymes cumyn othir scottis inglismen gret noumer ab • id ane strenth traisting • e yair onlie multitude put kyng robert 〈◊〉 flycht bot last cumyn wes discomfist mony army slane elli ta • e victory wes gottin enuertour x mylis fra abirdene wes sa plesand kyng robert yt gat heil yairthrow ȝeir donald ye ilis come ane gret power aganis kyng robert wes discomfist edward bruce ye watter deir kyng robert eftir sindry chance battall succeding hym gret felicite come ane army argyle nocht onlie subdewit cuntre opinioun bot tuke alexander lord argyle one strang castel thairof banis • al freindis ingland quhair sone efter deceissit ye ȝeir king edward come ane army rāfrew returnit ingland wt werkꝭ worthy haue memory ȝeir throw continewall weris rais sic derth scotland nothir vittallis bestial micht gottin ony partis thairof throw quhilk derth sa g • et pepyll eit hors othir
