kyng robert ye ȝeir followyng quhylk fra incarnatioun ane miiicxi ȝeris chasit inglismen partis 〈◊〉 sco • land syne enterit two sindry • ymes ingland efter 〈◊〉 put mony landi • pepyl thairof • heirschippis slauchter returni • scotland innowmerabil • iches spulȝe pray besti • throw quhilk inglād put 〈◊〉 na le affliction trubyll • cotland ȝeirꝭ afore reher ••• king edward ȝeir following ye viii day ianuar king robert wan ye town perth strang hand slew pepyll found kest ye wallis yairof ground ye sam • ȝeir y• castellis dunfreis aire l • nark mony • thir strenthis castellis scotland war randerit hym cassyn ye ground castell roxburgh takin schir iames douglas fastronis euyn fra redemptioun ane miiicxiii ȝeris ye samyn ȝeir thomas randale erle murray wan castel edinburgh ȝeir edward bruce segit castell striueling youcht assailȝeit al ingyne practik yat micht tak ony hous ȝit labour vane castell onely strang wallis bot richt strenthy nature ye crag standing ane hye mote quhare na passage bot ane ꝑ • castell ane vailȝeant knicht schir phillip mowbray scottisman howbeit followit ye tyme opinioun inglismen hauand sufficient vittallis defend lang tyme edward richt sorowfull mind nocht knawing quhidder suld leif sege continew styll importable expensis thoucht richt degrading honoure se • • ane sa gret charge apō hād desist cowartly thairfra last tuke purpos assailȝe mynd said capitane▪ said gif wald randir hous pleseir suld al familiar king robert afore king edward fynaly becaus capitane refusit • andir hous sort assailȝeit hym ane new burde howbeit ye samyn succedit mai • felicite prudence gif capitane gat na releif king edward within ye ȝeir nixt following sall randit said castell scottis conditioun peace maid edward bruce gret foly ylk prudent man mycht beleif ryche pissant kyng ingland wald cum support mater hauand • lang day prouidit thairwith attour aganis • cheuelry geif sa lang trewis quhyll thair ennymes micht sufficiently armit inuaid thaym battall howbeit thir conditionis trewis • ane edward bruce wer found rycht vnplesand kyng robert ȝit wald nocht repugnant yairto auenture sum seditioun truble mycht follow thairefter •• ix hym brothir ȝit vnderstude battall wes led alwayis aganis kyng ingland mene tyme kyng edward send kyngis princis wer alliat hym haue support aganis ye scottis promitting eftir victory deuide scotland amang thaym thairfore nocht onlie peple stude vnder empire bot sindry othir infinite pepill come hym thair auenturis specially thay bot small insycht hame traisting purches conques victorie landis rich sufficient sustene thair estait tymes cumyng esperance thairof thay brocht thaym yair wiffis childrin guddis quhilkis thay mycht turs baith fute hors ye landis quhare kyng edward gat support battall wer thir followis holland ȝeland brabane flanderis picardy bollony gascunȝe normandye mony othir regionis quhilkis wer tyme othir cō fiderat inglād elli vnder thair dominioun thaym mony scottis men quhilkis felicite succedyng inglismen tuke part yi tyme king edward contrar thair natiue prince ye noumer come tyme scotland king edward extendit ane hundreth fifty thowsand fute men al mony hors men wes infinite noumer scudlaris car • age men yair wiffis child madinnis seruandis thay wer sicker sit doun perpetually scotland throw quhilk nowmer wes sa gret na ordour craft cheualry mycht obseruat amang thaym men wiffis childrin wer mixt togidder throw quhilk rais ane huge rei • clamour partis quhare yai come throw diuersite toungis kyng edward incredible noumer pepil richt proud insolent tuke litill sollicitude thocht battall quhen wes approcheand neir ye merchis scotland tuke auisement nobillis quhat cruell schame full torment micht best punis kīg robert nobillis presuming vane arrogance put thaym pyne thay bene sicker handis attoure brocht hym ane carmelite monk discriue conques victory scotland nocht onlie kyng bot euery man cumpany vsit maist detraction scottis • tothir side kyng robert thing gret prudence industry xxxm men feirs weil exercit cheualry come pertlie aganis ennymes set doun hꝭ tentꝭ wt gud array ane plane aboue banochburn uncertane quhethir yi gret confidence folkis gif caus • ayis haue na cōtemption beleuit followit eftir quhen inglismen began wonder durst cū wt sa small power aganis yair huge ordinance wes said ane agit wyse capitane ingland get na victory day strang bergane gret murdir pepill knew weill ye gret wisdome manheid kyng robert forcy campionis sa lang exercit cheualry forthir strenth hꝭ manheid wt crafty slycht maid deip fowse • place quhare battall wes set dang sta • ki scharp pointis rysing vp couerit scherrettis▪ sic ingyne fu • men mych • pa thairon ony dangeir bot quhen ony preis hors men come abone ye said fowseis ye lofting suld brek incontinent horsmen suld othir reuin staikis elli inclusit ony passage sic thingis done abaid still ye said place abidyng gret curage cumyng inglismen quhen baith armyis wer approcheing 〈◊〉 othir within ane myle kyng edward send viiic horsmen ane 〈◊〉 gait castell striue •••• adue • ti capitane 〈◊〉 al sone kyng robert 〈…〉 proceding forthwart 〈…〉 thomas randale v 〈…〉 laif cuntre fra thair 〈…〉 quhilk met thir inglismen 〈◊〉 inc •• dible manheid throw quhilki • wes touch • cruelly 〈◊〉 victorie lāg tyme ye face • aith y• armyꝭ ye mene tyme schir iames douglas dred yat erle thomas speciall tender freind suld 〈…〉 set multitude inglismē incontinent fell kneis kyng robert desiring licence support freind becaus kyng wald nocht condiscend purpos sa haistely desyrit ruschit ye army ony licence ane cūpany chosin men ye effect foresaid last quhen wes cumyng neir ye place quhare erle faucht saw ye victorie inclinand hym gret murdir inglismen stude still suld nocht cumyng • eif fra tender freind ye glore victorie quhilk conquest sic felicite manheid victorie wes sa plesand army scottis yat euery man wes spretit new curage beleuyng wt sicker esperance felicite hastely approcheing ¶hovv tvvo kyngis exhortit ya •• armyi • battall hovv inglismen vve • discomfist banochburn king edvvard chasit douglas dūbar gret rich fell scottis yi • victorie hovv toun handvvarp flemingis tuk thair begining ca xi inglismen wa • litil astonist discōfitour howbeit thay saw scottis vassalage māheid noumer pepill fyne scottis sall • ht insolent throw said victorie yat set battal fecht wt yame ye morow kyng robert maid folkis youcht thay wer noumer reddy battall samyn maner casting hym mony wayis bring ennymes fowleis afore deuisit first cōmandit army mak thair confessionis reddy morow ressaue ye blissit sacrament eftir messe throw quhilk thay mycht haue better esperance victory tothir side inglismen hie curage beleuit nocht bot huge pray landis guddis fal yame smal laubour ane day nycht afore battall kyng robert wes rycht wery hauand gret solicitude weil army mycht take na rest bot rolland ieoperdeis chance fortoun mynd sum tymes went deuoit cō templatioun makand orisoun god sāct phillane quhais arme beleuit set siluer wes closit ane cais within palȝeon traisting better fortoun follow samyn mene tyme ye cais • hakkit suddanlie ony motion werk mortall creaturis preist astonist wounder went alter quhare cais lay quhen fand arme cais crijt heir ane gret mirakle incōtinent confessit brocht tume cais feild dredand yt rillik suld tynt feild quhair sa gret ieoperdeis apperit kyng reiosing mirakill past remanent nycht prayaris gud esperance victorie morow gaderit al army messe ressaue body god mak thaym haue curage aganis thair ennymes army wes ane deuoit man namit maritius abbot inchechaffray quhilk said messe ane hi • mote ministerit eucharist kyng nobillis causit preistis mak ministratioun thairof residew army eftir kyng robert callit ye pepill standart said maner beleif maist forcy campionis nane amāg ȝow nocht knawing necessar w fecht day aganis oure ennymes ȝe se ane army gaderit aganis ȝow nocht onlie inglismen bot sindry othir nationis liand yame cumyng aganis w thair wiffis childrin nocht onlie dwel boundis bot al banis w ye samyn tēdis manure lādis frequēt housis tempillis finalie bring w sic vter rewyne yat fame memorie sall peri albion oure ennymes he tane lang consultatioun howbeit wes folie quhat cruel horrible torment thay sall pyne w euir vincust cum yair hādis knawing ȝour inuincible curage manheid sa lang exercit cheualry quhilk rycht patent lang experience nochyeles gif ȝe wil knaw quhat vailȝeant men bene thir inuading ȝow sic vane mynassing maist forcy inuincible campionis thay ar refuse realmes ony practik experience cheualry continewally sen yair first ȝeris drownit lustis amang effeminat huris becaus thir febill cowart bodyis he waisti • thair patrimony landis gudis vile corruppit vsis thay intend ding ȝow fra ȝour natiue landis heritage roumes noctheles ȝe sall haue sone experience yat salbe na mair difficulte slay thaym yan scheip forther suppois thay wer dotat maist vertew▪ ȝe suld • ther affrayit • ȝit fule hardy sa fa • haue ane iustar qu • rrell defend yan yai haue ꝑsew sa far suld beleif yat god salbe mair fauorable w yan yame god he schawin w fauour myrakle sanct phillane quhilk cumyn beleif ȝour eiris yairfore pray ȝow gud cōfort ȝe ar set ȝone confusit multitude peple traist weill quhare god concurrant na multitude ennimes may auail noumer pepil cumis aganis ȝow pray rich sall cum ȝour proffet tothir side kyng edward prayit folkis remember gif thay faucht vailȝeant lie ane hour two yai suld haue infynite rich ye realme scotland reward thair laubour quhilk desyrit nocht bot superiorite attour prayit yam remember quhat irrecouerable schame suld follow sen thay wer departit thair cuntreis returne hame pro • fet victorie last quhen yai wer pas forthwart battal yai mycht skarslie • e seuerit fra embrasing yair wiffis childrin nocht yel •• hortation yair capitanis yai come gud array archea • stude arrayit amang ye hors • n abou • 〈◊〉 ye inglismē fech • thā maist fury aganꝭ ye scottis vncertane victory seing yi new ordināce cuming ye hyll yair face sore affrayit beau thay micht skarsly sustene ye violent preis scottis thā present thay beleuit vtly distroyit gif ya • ꝑseuerit ony forthir ī battal gaif backis quhom followit ye scottis insaciabyll yre maid slaucht al ꝑtis quhare thay come▪ specially quhare king edward fled▪ schir iames douglas iiiic chosin mē na thīg irkit wt ꝯtinewall slaucht ennymes followit kīg edward lang chace dūbar quhare wes ressauit pat • ik • ū bar erle marche xv erlis put ī ingland ane fischar bait exāple ye vnsicker • ait glore princ • yocht yi edward wes yi day morow rycht proud mony dukꝭ erlis baronis vnd empire vnlik sūtyme ye gret • king xerris ȝit cōstranit euyn sai • life ī ane pure fischar ba •• fleand y• see ī inglād battall war slane lm inglismē ye duk glocister wt iic knichtis amang otheris wes slane schir gelis argenty lyis ī sanct cuthbertis kirk beside edinburgh ye deith schir gelis sa displesant king robert ye familiar • e yt hym ingland yt reiosit na thing ye p̄sent victory w • yairfore heuely repreuit noblis becaus apperit dolorus efter sa gret felicite falling hꝭ pepil scottis war slane scarsly iiiim mē ii knichtis schir williā pont schir walt ro ye spulȝe wes sa gret gold siluer▪ othir iowellꝭ gott • n ye said felo yt al ye scottꝭ richit ye samyn notwithstanding thair gret pouerte falling thyam afore ꝯtinewal weris yai gat yi tyme lytyl le money rich ranson inglis presoneris tane yame thā spulȝe ye feild kīg robertis wyfe quhilk haldyn viii ȝeris afore ī ingland wes inter changeit ane duk ingland ye goldin silkin claithis quhilkis kyng edwardis palȝonis war maid war distribut amāg ye abbays scotland vestamētis frontallis yair altaris quhilkis mony ȝit remanis day attour ye freir carmelite quhilk wes brocht haue writtin king edward put victory • versis wes tane yi feild cōmandit king robert sithement hꝭ rāsoun write saw yi carmelite f • eir maid yir • ousty versis quhilkꝭ beginnis thꝰ de plātu c • metrū cū carmine nudo said ye nicht afore yi battal ii men vncouth habit come abbot glassinbery inglād ane abbay hospitalite desirit luging ye abbot ressauit yame plesandly quhē demādit yame quhat yai war quhare thay war passand yai schew yt yai war seruādꝭ god send help ye scottis banochburn ye mo • ow yt abbot fand yam away cuir ye ȝetis wer opnit yair beddis stā ding ī ye array yai war left beleuit thairfore yt yai war angellis send ꝓuision god defende ye scottis • yair iust materis aganis ye tyrāny inglismen ye samin day yt yi battal strikin ane knicht wt schinād armour schew ye pepil aberdene ye scot • ꝭ gottin ane glorious victory inglismē son • eft went ouir pē • land firth▪ haldin ye pepil sanct maunis prince sūtyme orknay ye caus kīg robert dotat ye kirk orknay vli str • ueling ye customes aberdene furnis breid wyne walx ye said kirk king robert eft yi gloriꝰ victory rewardit mony nobil mē realme lādis gudis thair prouin māheid virtew ī ye said battal robert fleming faithful seruice gat ye lādis cūmernald quhō ar discend • ane noble hous ꝑseuerand ȝit gret honoure thir day said ye ii knichtis braban come request kīg edward yi battal last quhen thay hard maist iniurius wordis detraction spokin inglismen ye nicht afore ye battal aganis king robert yai prayit god send hym victory yit wordis yai come ī sic hatrent inglismen yt thay eschapi • narrowly yair lyfe proclamationis maid y• wald brig yair heidis suld haue ic mark • riueling hꝭ reward king robert • rād ī quha • trubil thay come sake rewardit yame • ith riche spulȝe ye said battal quhilkꝭ thay returnit braban biggit y• toun hādwarp ingrauit ye armes yt bruce maist curiously ī al ꝑtis ye said toun ane memorial ye beneuolence yt yir ii knych • ꝭ kīg robert liberalite yi gloriꝰ victory succedit scottis ye natiuite sāct iohne baptist fra redemptioun imiiic xiiii ȝeris ¶hovv croun scotland vvas tail ȝeit kīg robert airis hovv edvvard brothir vvas maid king ireland • slane inglismen▪ hovv kīg robert sufferit gret distres ī irelād ca xii banochburn dicōfist • thꝭ maner king robert set ane parliament aire quhilk consent thre estatis gat croun scotland railȝe • hym ye aris • le gottin body 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 failȝ • ing yairof ye croun cū edward bruce bruthir failȝeing ye airꝭ • ale yame baith ye croun cū mariory douchter ye airꝭ gotti • hir body quhatsūeuir attour gif kīg robert hꝭ bruthir ha • nit deceis ye airis mariory war ꝑfite age cōmandit y• thomas randal erle murray syster son king robert sall gouernour scotland quhil ye airꝭ • said war cumin ꝑfection yi mariory gottin king robert ye erle marri sister first wife maryit efter ye auise ye noblis 〈◊〉 walter gret stewart scotland king robert sone eft maryit elizabeth • oucht ye erle hullester • uhō gat ane son namit dauid 〈◊〉 douchterꝭ margaret mald 〈◊〉 first maryit ye erle 〈◊〉 bure hym ane son namit 〈◊〉 ▪ ye secoūd mald deceissit 〈◊〉 • ance king robert efter ye 〈◊〉 mariory first douchter went throw al ye boundis • lme confermit yair auld ••• uilegis bot dota • sindry townis ba •• onyis realme new prerogatiuis specially ye townis perth dund • aberdene apperis ȝit charteris ye ȝeir following quhilkis fra redemption imiiic xv ye princis ireland opprest lang tyrā ny inglismē traisting becaus sa huge victory gotin scottꝭ recouer yair liberte send yair ambassatouris kīg robert desiring hym send bruthir edward ressaue ye croun irelād edward refusing yair desiris went ane nowmer mē ireland quhare assistēce ye pepil yairof wan ane gret town namit ulcony slew ye inglsmen yt fand prince ireland efter yt thay chosin edward bruce king send ambassatouris ye paip desiring hym ratify ye thing y• ya • haue done yair cōmon weill thay wald leif na langer vnder seruitude inglismen yir ambassatouris purchest mony terribyl monitionis ye paip aganis inglismē caus yame depart ireland ȝit yai wald obey thairto bot thirlit ye pepil yairof ylk day wt mair tyranny king robert heirand quhat dangeir brothir bec • yn new armyis inglismē ylk day contrar left schir iames douglas gouernour scotland went ane army support bruthir ireland quhare sustenit sic miserabil distres yt ane gret ꝑ • army deit hunger ye residew constranit eit hors quhē within ane dayis iornay hꝭ bruthir kīg edward haue supportit hym sufficiently ye residew hꝭ army ye said edward abiding cumyng faucht vnprudently wt inglismē vncertane quhethir knew ye cumyng king robert brothir gyf throw birnand desire battall dred yt bruthir suld reif hym ye glore victory last seand curage men fail yt suld tine ye honour nation faucht na le māheid thā ꝑseuerand cōstance ye deith slane▪ fra ye incarnation imiiicxviii ȝeris ¶hovv king edvvard vvas discomfist schir iames douglas gret vassalage done vvilliam sinclar bischop dunkeld aganis inglismen hovv bervvik vvas recouerit ca xiii edward king ingland heirād ye passage kyng robert ireland thocht tyme expedient conques scotland come ane greter power euir afore nochtheles schir iames douglas gouernoure gaif hym battal bordouris put hym army flycht howbeit victory succedit infinite slauchter athir syde battall schir iames douglas slew thre ye maist vailȝeant campionis ingland awin handis kyng edward disparit ye souerane mā heid wisdome schir iames douglas conques ony honour scotland land tuk purpos assailȝe se send ane flote schippis forth quhilk brint heryit land euery syde thaym duncane erle fyf heirand yir cruelteis done inglismen come wt vc bodyn men resist yair inuasioun nochtheles fra saw yame mair power thā micht resist fled abak mene tyme met hym williā sinclare bischop dūkeld lx weil armit men finaly brocht agane ye pla • e quhare inglismē war rynnand wt awful incursionis throw ye cūtre ye first iunyng vc inglismē war slane ye remanent chasit yair baitis finaly yai entrit sa gret nowmer yt ye baitꝭ sank doun wt yame yai micht cū yair schippis bischop sinclare thꝭ honest vassalage wes ay callit eft king robertꝭ bischop ye ȝeir robert stewart son walter stewart mariory bruce borne quhilk succedit efter ye deith king dauid bruce ye croun ȝeir quhilk fra redēption imiiicxviii ȝeris erle thomas rā dal enterit ye north ꝑtis inglād returnit gret pray men gudis ony trubyl army recouerit berwik industry ane inglismā namit spalden quhō ye said town recouerit efter yt bene inglismēnis handis xx ȝeris posterite brukꝭ ȝit certane landis angus ye samyn caus ȝeir following king edward segit berwik bot sa vailȝeantly defēdit yt returnit hame wt smal honour tyme mariory bruce king robertis doucht deceissit sone efter lang peace takin betuix inglismen scottis ¶of blak parliament hovv king edvvard cōplanit paip iniuris scottis orison maid papis legat king robert ansvver ca xiiii kyng robert ha • realme ony trubyl ennymes held ane parliament perth desirit lordis schaw yair haldingꝭ charteris yair landis lordꝭ efter lang auisement pullit yair swerdis ani said thay na othir euidentis chartouris schaw yair landis king robert richt affrayit sicht howheit tuke gret indignation hatrent mynd dissimilit ye samyn ane time said yai schaw yame nobil men sen thay wan deba •• tit yair landꝭ ye swerd nochtheles •• gret hatrent aganis yame mynd determit reuenge yair proude cōtemption quhē euir fand sufficient oportunite sindry ye noblis aduertist yat ye king mouit gret hatren • aganis yame thocht best attempt ane thing mair cruel aganis hym afore hꝭ purpos come effect maid ane bād amāg yame self put hym auenture sum compasit sli • htis kyng edwardis handis▪ yi treason nocht lang hid king robert nochtheles verite thairof suld mair patent king robert gart certane quiet person ly ye gait ripe al passingeris wart bordouris se gyf thay micht find ony letteris thaym quhairthrow mycht ye mair surely aduertist yair treason said ane palmer send thir lordis haue passit king inglād yair band y• samyn inclusit withī ane staf nochyeles tane finaly brocht ye band letterꝭ cōtenand ye hail treason deuisit aganis king robert al sone kīg robert visit ye letterꝭ send yir noblis cū hym wt al deligence ane gret mater war occur • ant quhilk micht dressit yair cōsultation efter yair cuming demandit yame gif ya • kend yair 〈◊〉 writtis selis becaus yat 〈◊〉 deny thay war send 〈◊〉 castellꝭ remane ward quhil 〈…〉 forthir auisit sic thingis done went berwik cōman ••• ane masar arrest schir williā soulis capitane yairof iusti • e becaus masar feir gret man astonist pullit mais fra hym said capitane tratour arrest thus schir williā tane brocht perth nocht lang efter ane cō uention lordis perth call blak perliament fra ye incarnation ane miiicxx ȝeris ye first king robert accusit sister sonne dauid abirnethy knew treason howbeit assistit yairto bot wald reuele tyme king wald fane yt bene saiffit nochtheles sa rigorꝰ laif micht esaly done becaus na man laubourit hym heidit gret lament pepyll haldin ye floure cheuelry fochty • mony ȝeris afore gret honoure victory aganis turki morow remanent conspiratouris war heidit ye samyn maner ony • rcy yi tyme king edward send wryttyng ye paip complening iniuris done scottis saying sa cruelly inuadit thaym mycht nocht pa army aganis turki eldaris afore ȝit cum realme support inuade ony othir pepyll thairfore desirit papis halynes gif h • desirit peace amang cristin princis •• wyld fury scottis rageand maist cruelte aganꝭ hym thir siclik wourdis mouit paip gret hatrent aganis scottis howbeit haill occasioun al weris betuix ingland scotland sone efter ane legat send paip king robert complenyng iniuris trubyl done pepyll aganis inglismen saying ye cristin faith micht neuir sickir sa lang crystyn princis war contynewall debait amang thaym self weill apperit gret turk cruell vnmercyful ennyme cristin pepyll conquest laitly gret boundis cristindome eikand dayly empire new conques legat efter thir wordis remouit quhil king tane auisement nobillis quhat answerit mater haill nobilite scotland beand present conuentioun lang degeist deliberation concludit mair dispite inuaid inglismē new army said▪ wourdis legat war nocht worthy haue answer ylk mā mycht cleirly vnderstand paip w • nocht sa myschant▪ bot knew weill ye motiue thir w • ri sen yair caus bene • oft deuoluit afor • inglismen continewaly set conques thair realm howbeit thay na iust tytyll clame thairto crown scotland he ben iosit scot • sic liberte ye lxxxxvi kingis lang progression he linaly succedit thay dayis ay ane blude ony interruption quhill laitly inglismen quhen thay saw ye succession king alexander failȝe maid thaym conques crown scotland caus thay wald first dant ye inuasion inglismen efter thay wald correckit papis mynd legat depeschit thꝭ maner returnit hame ony expedition desiris ¶hovv kyng edvvard efter gret crueltei • done army scotland vvas discomfist kyng robert byland hovv hāmyltonis tuk thair begynnyng king edvvardis deith ca xv schort time followīg king robert enterit ane army ingland waistit al landis thairof wt fyre swerd quhi • come croce stane mure king edward mouit yir iniuris come scotland ane hūdreth thousand armit mē fute hors king robert aduertist cuming gart bring al cornis bestial within strenthis quhare thay micht gottyn support army ingland last inglismen come edinburgh bot ya • war constranit within xv dayis depart penurite vittallis ȝit within dayis efter thay returnit scotland • c •• ssit fra na maner cruelte pepil thairof thay spulȝeit abbay 〈◊〉 melros slew sindry agit monkis thay spulȝeit ye eucarist ye • ai siluer quhairit hang kest ane trein kist cō parit iustly barnis lucifer quhilkis intendit spulȝe god awin hous attoure thay brint driburgh mony othir religioꝰ abbayis place king robert reuenge yir iniuris come sone efter ingland waist landis townis yairof quhil come vnto ȝork faucht king edward byland put army flycht gret slauchter baith inglismen normandis quhilkꝭ mony war takin ransonit gret sowmes money battall strokyn fra redemptiō imiiicxxiii ȝeris nocht lang efter king robert send ane ambassatoure renew band betuix france scotland e • ki • yir conditionis said band gif succession failȝeit ony thir two kingis vncertane quha suld yair aire clame richt crown decidit noblis baith ye realmes thay sall onely exclude tyrānis gif ony yame wald vsurpe crown bot defend ye iust heritour thairof band ratifyit comunion blissit sacrament interuention ye papis auctorite tyme ane inglisman nobil bl • de namit hantoun eschew ye hatrent kīg edward fled king robert scotland yi hātoun eft ye battal banochburn ye king inglandis hous london ane syngulare fauour king robert oftymes auā sing gret manheid virtew quhill last iohne spensar rich • familiar tender seruitour king edward howbeit vile obscure līnage tuk sic displescir auāsing king edwardꝭ ennyme ya • pullit haistely swerd 〈◊〉 hātoun howbeit lityl y• wers hantoun impatiēt suffer thꝭ outrage man hye spreit curage ceissit nocht fra contynewall wait quhyl last slew spē sar becaus consultit freindis eschew ye kingis hatrent fled gret deligence scotland tenderly 〈◊〉 king robert gat landes cadȝow quhais posterite perse • eris ȝit amang w spred gret nowmer pepyl callit hāmyltoni • sum part changit fra ye name yair first begynnar quhill sic thyngis war done scotland king edward • ouernit ye realme ingland baith 〈…〉 peace counsal hew spensar ane man smal lynnage quhilk montit hye honoure • n sic maner kyng gouernit onely hym held 〈…〉 noblis na estimation • oblis impacient suffer ane mā 〈…〉 lynnage aboue thaym 〈◊〉 quene hir son prince 〈◊〉 ingland tuke kyng edward fo • ce armes toward slew yi spensar mony othir kyngis treasonable coūsallourꝭ schort ty • e • fter kyng edward slane miserably pr • son ia • ellouris quhilkis kepit pres • un quhare put hym hais • ely deith auyse sonne pressit ane heuy burd wambe becaus deit sa haistely thay desirit punition yai put ane hait yrne throw ane horne fundement brint ye inwart partis body thairwith quhil deid yt pepyl micht vnderstand deit na outwart woundis bot allanerly naturale infirmite efter quhais deith hꝭ son edward windsour succedit crownit ye xxvi day ianuary fra ye incarnation ane thousand iiicxxvi ȝe • ¶hovv iohne ballio • transfertit al rycht crovvne scotland king robert hovv crovvn vvas nevv tailȝe • dauid bruce hovv schir iames dovvglas erle thomas randaill gret vassal age scotland ca xvi robert recouerer • otlād efter mony illuster dedis publik weill liberte scotland howbeit richt yneuch crown thairof knawing balliol vnabyll iose crown becaus exonera • hym self thairof p •• tyng realme ennymes handis ȝit airis ballioll suld haue na iust clame crown efter deith send schir iames dowglas ī frāce solist iohne ballioll transfer • icht king robert airis geif balliol baith money landis scotland richt said balliol cumyng schir iames fallyn blynd lang age said ay vnabyl haue gouernit realme scotland na • e sa abyll king robert hꝭ cousing quhilk sa vailȝeantly defendit fra maist cruell ennymes ¶incontinent balliol callit freindꝭ afore hym transferrit richt clame yt micht haue ye croun scotland ye said king robert airis quhatsumeuir desyryng na thing sa mekyl hym airꝭ regne perpetuall felicite kyng robert heirand ye returnyng schir iames dowglas gud expedition • eris conuenit noblis ane counsall cambusk • neth maid new ta •• ȝe son dauid yi maner gif son dauid dece ••• airis body hꝭ nepot robert stewart gottin • iory bruce hꝭ doucht sal succeid ye croun al ye noblis wer sworne defēd thꝭ new tailȝe ye mene time kyng edward send ambassatouris scotland desiryng peace howbeit wes vnder dissait nochtstandyng peace cōtrackit inuadit scotland continewal weris nocht lang efter kyng robert fel gret infirmite gaif ouir gouernance realme erle thomas randall schir iames douglas thay war ii ye maist nobill knychtis warld thir two chiftanis enterit northumberland xxvm men aganis quhome come kyng edward icm men nochtheles thir two campionis gouernit thair army sic manheid wisdome thay waistit ye cuntre quhare yai come returnit ony dāmage scotland kyng edward resist thir incursionis come ane cm men scotland wrocht gret cruelteis quhare thay come yat fyne scottis suld come defence thair landis guddis last quhen thay lyue thre dayis ye watter tyne mycht cum ouir wes rysin aboue brayis tythingis come yat al northumberlād wes brint heryit scottis ye forray passand sa fast throw cuntre ony residence yt na man wist quhare find yame mene tyme wer send exploratouris swift hors se quhair scottis wer fand thaym within thre mylis ye tentis inglismen arrayit ane hill reddy fecht edward rasit tentis incontinent come fornens scottis moro • baith ye armyis wer arrayit vtheris sycht scottis beand small noumer regard inglismen stude arrayit ane gret strenth hill last quhen inglismen stand day durst nocht brek thair array thay returnit thair palȝonis send ane herald scottis desiring yame gif yat durst fecht cum planis quhare thay mycht haue battal bene na prudence capitanis garnis thair army maist ordour munition mycht deuisit quhen ye armyis stād thre nychtis athir sycht durst nocht inuaid othir thay returnit thair tentis eftir ye baith ye armyis standin lang tyme arrayit othir sycht maner schir iames douglas tuke purpos assailȝe ane mater gret vassalage incontinent chesit iic rycht vailȝeant deliuer men swift geldingis slippit quietly wache inglismen quhilkꝭ wer tyme sleip except ane certane quhilkis wer awalkenit dyn hors feit thus come douglas ony noyis king edwardis palȝoun wer nocht army ingland rais hastelie hym slane kyng cuttit ii towis tent returnit army scottis ony dāmage hym folkis ye inglismen eftir effray wer vigilant time cuming thay bene alluterlie discomfist gif army scottis inuadit thaym said nycht scottis traisting yi vassalage sufficient tyme returnit hame ony displeseir al sone inglismen wer aduertist scottis wer departit thay come haistely ye place quhare thair tentis lay esperance sum ryche spulȝe fād xm pair hieland schone skatterit throw boundis quhair ye army scotland lay quhilkis wer left behynd cariage impediment thair ganging ye inglismen beleuit sic thingis left thair derisioun returnit hame ony proffet honoure sallyng thaym yi vayage ȝeir walter stewart deceissit quhais son robert wes eftir king scotland ȝeir following quene elizabeth moder prince dauid bruce deceissit wes buryit dūfermling fra redemptioun imiiicxxviii ȝeris • myn ȝeir kyng robert wan ye ca • el noram sone eftir segit castell anwik quhare mony nobill men scotland wer slane▪ ☞ ¶and end • eir •• ng edwarde send ambassa • ouris scotland treit peace 〈◊〉 renuncit rycht clame yat 〈◊〉 mycht haue ye realme • co • land declarit al fre 〈◊〉 wes tyme kyng alexander ye 〈◊〉 thir condi • ionis ••• mbirland salbe marchis • otland ye • ist partis cumber marchis ye west bordour •• thairof attoure ye said renun •• ation maid kyng edward skaithis done scottis • glismen kyng robert sal pay said kyng edward xxxm markis striueling peace sall remane sickernes king edward maryit sister iane dauid bruce prince scotland berwik ye xvii day iuli • presence mony nobillis baith scotland ingland ☞ deith louyng kyng robert bruce testament legacy hovv schir iames douglas vv • chosin pa vvith hart haly land ca xvii kyng robert leiffit nocht lang eftir mariage deceissit cardros lipre quhilk fel hym letter end age vii day iunii ye xxiiii ȝeir regne fra redemptioun imiiicxxix ȝeris ane ye maist vailȝeant princis wes ony part warld dayis hauand experiēce baith gud euil fortoun realme beand ty • e brethir slane except hꝭ brothir edward perseuerit sic manheid inuincible spreit yat recouerit realme liberte quhen mony gret baronis scotland wer aganis attoure wes na le honoure apprising amang ennymes yan amang freindꝭ king edward happinnit cōmoun ane solēpnit banker sindry vailȝeant princis concernyng ye glore armes cheualry quhen noblis wer disputand sindry purpos yairof thay fel ane question quhilkis wer ye thre maist vailȝeant forcy campionis leiffand yair dayis eftir lang contentioun thay proponit yi questioun discussit ane herald wes king armes kyng armes wes rycht stupefact residew heraldis nocht allanerlie king bot mony nobillis wer beleuit thair singulare manheid noumerit amang yi • thre howbeit happinnit far fra thair purpos herald knew nocht onlie nobillis ingland bot othir nobillis vailȝeant princis warld quhare trauellit hauand al thair dedis recent memory first maist vailȝeant campioun said herald wes hary ye emprioure subdewit thre kyngis thre realmes debaittit imperiall dignite gud felicite end lyfe ¶the secound schir gelis argenty becaus victorious thre sindry battallis aganis sarazenis slew thre thair principall capitanis awin handis ¶the thrid gif war nocht displesant prince schaw verite robert bruce kyng scotland incontinent rais ane huge noyis clamour ye pepyll thair present becaus herald sa per • ely schew verite ony feir presence prince said herald beseik thy hienes gif haue nocht failȝeit take declaratioun na displeseir gyf necessar ony mā vincust le dishonour vincust hym maist vailȝeant hym maist cowart attoure schaw ȝow far auance gret manheid king robert quhilk ȝe may euyl suffer nowmerit thir two first campionis howbeit gyf verite war schawin mycht prefer hym weill two maist vaylȝeant campionis afore rehersit ye gret actis vailȝeant dedis done hary empriour war nocht done awin manheid prudence bot erar counsall nobillis contrar robert exilit realme recouerit manheid contrar gret pyssance thy nobyll fader mony gret baronis scotland fynaly stabyllit sic tranquillite apperit mair terribyll ennymes ingland otheris inuasouris euir ennymes war afore subdittis attoure nane lyue wyll reproche honoure wyll deny thir premissis bot wyll preif samyn handis singulare battall honoure adiugit hym victorious attoure sic incredybyll manheid strenth yat nane hꝭ realme durst moue ony rebellioun aganꝭ hym king robert schort tyme afore deith gaderit nobyllis ane counsall commendit thaym gouernance sonne dauid tyme bot seuyn ȝeris age gaif counsall afore deith yame syndry hi • materis concernyng gouernance scotland first counsallit thaym neuir make ane lord ilis pepyll thairof ar ay flowand thair myndis sone brocht rebellyoun aganis kyng fra thay fall thairintyll extreme lauboure dant thaym ye gret straitnes land • secoundly neuir set battall inglismen ieoperd realme apon chance ane battall bot resist inglismen erar frequent • armussyng ony set battall fyne gyf scottis discomfist thay may haue sum pyssance resist thair ennymes thridly inhibit scottis take ony lang peace inglismen ingyne man growis dull febyll lang sleuth laik vse experience thay may nocht sustene gret chargis battall specially quhen thay ar effeminate lang peace sen ye inglismen kepi neuir peace scottis quhen thay se ony auantage thoucht best neuir haue peace inglismen aboue thre four ȝeris quhen lest occasion battall appe • • e inglismen maist vigilant auenture thair ennymes cum thaym ony aduertysyng becaus maid solempne vote pa ane army defence crystyn faith aganis turki preuenit untimus deith left hart crist chesit trew knycht schir iames dowglas pa haly graif howbeit presence bene maist necessar defence realme caus dowglas bure ye bluddy hart thair armis ¶and 〈◊〉 heir endis fourtene buke thir croniklis heir begynnis xv buke croniklis scotland ☞¶hovv schir iames douglas past vvith kyng roberti • ha •• haly graif coronatioun kyng dauid bruce hovv erle thomas randale vvas maid gouernoure deith ca primo quhen schir iames dowglas chosyn maist worthy scotland pa kyng robertis hart haly land put ane cais gold arromitike precious vnȝementis tuke hym schi • wyllyam synclare schi • robert logan mony othir nobyl men haly graif quhare buryit said hart maist reuerence solempnite culd deuisit sic thyngis done went othir cristin princis quhilkis war gaderit gret armyis fra syndry partis crystyndome weir aganis turki syngular vassalage dantit nocht onely ennymes crist bot frequen • victoryis wan gret honoure crystyn pepyll ¶at last quhen completit chargis commandit souerane na le honoure magnificence pulli • vp salis haue returnit scotland mene tyme contrarius wyndis dryuyn ane angyll spanȝe quhare fand kyng aragon reddy fecht aganis sarazenis quhilkis war cumyn gret nauyis inuade realme dowglas make manheid syngulare virtew patent partis quhare come went kyng aragon faucht support sindry ieoperdyis gret felicite quhill last hauand ouir gret confidence fortoun quhilkis bryngis mony nobyl men deith become necligent held nocht weir men hym accustomat afore mene tyme ane buschement turki quhilkis warly afore wait come hym wt displayit baner yocht nowmer schrinkit nocht bot faucht obstinatly perseuerant manheid deith slane ye xxvi day august fra redemption ane thousand thre hundreth xxx ȝeris ¶this ye end nobyll dowglas maist vailȝeant knycht dayis quhylk bene rycht necessar defence commoun weil scotland gyf bene fortunat returne lvii sindry tymes victorious inglismen xiii tymes turki wryttyn lenth scoticronicon bot wyl returne history ☞ ¶efter deith kyng robert sonne dauid hauand bot viii ȝeris age crownit scone ye xxiiii day nouember fra incarnatioun • e thousand thre hundreth xxxi ȝeris becaus vnabyll gouerne ye realme tender age erle thomas randale maid gouernoure erle thomas seyng pepyll brokyn lang weris thoucht maist expedient quhill thay war sum partis enrichit thair gudis haue peace ingland belyue ambassatouris war dereckit hym ingland purchest peace thre ȝeris mene tyme erle thomas gaue ingyne gouerne realme equite peace fyne pepyll mycht leif ony feir ennymes theuis inuade thaym thair landis guddis commandit sadyllis brydyllis othir instrumentis pertenand vse husbandry sal ly thair furth baith day nycht gyf ony thaym war stollyn tane away schiref schire sall caus samyn othir restorit aw • aris • llis pay awin put fynaly sic extreme punitioun maid theuis baith thift • ykry war dantit partis realme brocht mair tranquillite euir ony kingis tyme afore mony insolent wild men war dantit seuerite iustice ¶attoure virtew suld autorist realme commandit na vagabound ydill pepyll ressauit ony town without thay sū craft debait thair leuyng way purgit realme mony ydill lymmaris said sic seuerite iustice tyme ane ca • le becaus mycht nocht steill othir mennis guddis stall awin pleuch yrnis mycht haue valour thair recompensit hym schiref▪ nochtheles sic extreme dilygence maid serchyng pleuch yrnes schiref thay war fynaly found hym self caus hyngit eftir erle thomas seand difficyl bring thaym fra stouth he bene hantit thairwith held ay hym ane gard bodin men throw quhilk punist rebellyoun lymmaris partis realm personis competit iustice war punist mercy otheris war found rebelland thairto war othir slane tane efter gard hapnit nocht lang efter halydon quhare thre score men war gaderit togydder inuading pepyll reiffis iniuris becaus thay contempnit offyciaris efter thay war summond compere iustice thay war tane gard hynggit iebatis throw iustyce na rebellyoun sene realme mony ȝeris efter sic tranquillite nocht allanerly theuis lymmaris war dantit bot realme incressit ryches ye gret terrour thair fais kyng edward seyng gret felicite succedyng scottis dredād thaym reuenge auld iniuris singulare māheid prowes erle thomas thocht na thyng sa gud attempt thing slicht micht nocht b • force y• eft deith erle thomas ye realme scotlād myt patent hꝭ iniurꝭ king dauid ȝoung mony nobillis mouit gret hatren • aganis hous slauchter thair faderis ye blak parliament thairfore tuk cōsultation quhat ingyne slycht mycht best distroy erle thomas last • uk purpos sla hym vennome becaus dangerus attempt mater ane scottismā • • eling treason sum auenture thocht necessar haue 〈◊〉 man gret spreit quhilk couth •• ssimill saying ane thyng mouth quhilk thocht neuir hart quhen serchi • • ang fand nane sa abyll bring purpos effect ane monk • oftymes men ordoure he • respect schame iustice bot clokis thair wickit lyffis vnder fenȝei • schaddow ane co • le ¶schortly iustruckit yi monk bene ane medcin •• hauand speciall remeidis aganis grauell infirmite erle thomas heuely torm • ntit king edward cōmandit monk vse vennomus potionis amang othir seropis promittit gif erle thomas slane industry reward hym maist richely monk instruckit wyse cumyng scotland▪ fenȝeit hym haue knawlege mony nobillis baith ingland france nocht onely curit thaym syndry grauellis bot crafty potionis brak confermit stanis he curit mony dyuers pepyll thair infirmyteis forthir informit erle thomas ane maist vailȝeant princis warld heuely pinit said maledy nochtheles gyf said erle wald vse counsall suld delyuerit within schort tyme maledy ¶this monk ane othir lymmar instruckit hym maner colleig quhylk schew partis quhare went companȝeoun past men practik science monk fynaly sa cōmendit brocht erle thomas inquirit hym gyf culd cure maledy releif hym insufferahyll dishonoure monk tuke hym gladly hand instruckit commandit erle obserue ane diet sone eft gaif hym soft seropis quhen admittit mair familiarite gaif hym ane vennomus potioun howbeit vennome nocht haiste deid bot erar consume ane man lang proces monk efter erle thomas drunkin • ennome fynd occasioun get away said ane syngulare medcine ingland quhilk neuir vsit bot quhen othir medcyne • ailȝeit ¶thus fand occasioun depart ingland promittit returne scotlād al deligence ¶nocht lang eftir yi monk returnit kyng edward said sen haue done thy chargis thow deuysit best rais thy army haist thow may • otland trubyl deith▪ conques realme thow list mene tyme erle thomas • certane dolouris ylk day mair incressing hꝭ wambe becaus herd tell ye kīg edward cumād ane army aganis hym na returnyng ye monk set day tuke ane vehement suspitioun treason fand sone efter medcinaris yat ye vennome sa sunkin bowellis yat nocht remedable howbeit mycht nocht ryde gang meit king edward gart turs hym ane cheriot motiue kyng edward rais weir tyme allegit falt redres ye bordouris king edward aduertist erle thomas cū mand arrayit battal meit hym send ane herald scotland treit peace howbeit send erar espy materis stude ony othir purpos erle thomas heirand cumyng herald arrayit hym best abulȝement sat ane chiar dissimuland gret infirmite na thyng • lit hym belyue herald brocht presence schew message last quhen herald desyrit certane thyngis nocht respondent reason erle thomas answerit sall schaw sone quhat rycht inglismen he sic wickit iniust petitionis quhen depeschit herald answer gaif precious abulȝementis arrayit tyme herald sone efter herald returnit kyng edward said saw neuir ane mair lusty vailȝeant prince said erle thomas king edward herand erle thomas gud heill scalit army beleuyng monk nocht done sic chargis promittit gart brin accordyng weill demeritis▪ mene tyme erle thomas returnit hame deceissit mussilburgh buryit dunfermeling fra incarnation ane miiicxxxi ȝeris ☞ ¶hovv erlis marche mar vvas maid gouernouris scotland hovv edvvard ballioll come scotland cōques croun▪ batrall duppline ca ii erle thomas deceissit yi maner ane counsall set noblis quhilk generall votis thre estatis patrik erle marche dauid erle mar war chosyn gouernouris first gouerne realme south syde forth tothir gouerne north side sic thyngis done rais gret trubyll scotland edward ballioll afore rehersit maner followyng tha • r ane wykit līmare namit twyname lorison quhilk oftymes dila • adultry haldin officiall glasgew mony ȝeris vnder censuris kirk last tuk officiall passand town ayre held hym captiuite quhil payit two hundreth pound striuelyng bot oppressyoun nocht vnpunist • scharply persewit schir iames douglas afore passage haly land fled ingland quhare met dauid cumyn erle atholl mony othir scottis quhilkis war banist afore kyng robert thair assystance kyng ingland thir lymmaris confiderat togydder vnder ane band abayd lang tyme ingland ¶and fra thay war aduertyst deith erle thomas randale schir iames douglas thay went france edward ballioll persuadit hym mony reasonis cum scotland recouer faderis heritage crown ballioll persuadit thair wordis howbeit na sicht afore ye crown scotland come ingland seik support kīg edward knew inglismen ay ennymes scottis ꝓmittit king edward gif al materꝭ succedit felicite hald realme scotland hym superiour thairof king edward glaid condition nochtwithstanding ye peace afore contrackit mariage syster maid afore kyng dauid scotland send vim men weill prouydit schippis pa hym scotland traisting efter cumyng fynd mony othir freindis yat wald assist hym schew afore mony scottis war ingland balliol quhilkis informit hym gif arriuit scotland mony lordis yairof wald assist opinion balliol persuadit thir reasonis arriuit kingorne quhare brocht folkis land sone efter slew alexander seytoun put folkꝭ flicht balliol proude victory come wt folkꝭ perth erlis mar marche aduertist cumyng▪ rasit two gret armyis come aganis hym yai bene fecht aganꝭ weirmen bot allanerly thay wer punis certane theuis lymmaris ingland last thay concludit cōuene baith togidder strathern thay mycht inuade thair ennymes ani ballioll howbeit knew ennymes cumand mair power thā mycht resist na thing affrayit ye mater sa far procedit na feir deith fleing mycht auale nochtheles beleuit gif army faucht perseuerant constance haue victory sū chāce fortoun alwayis set tentis dupline nocht far fra water erne samyn nycht ye erle mar come wt gret multitude pepyl parkit yame ī ye sicht balliollis army bot erle marche lay othirardour scottis seand thair ennymes sa nowmer held thaym cōtemption pretermittit yair wache passing nycht syngyng dansyng reuelling drinking thir doingis succedit mair vnhappely thay war done sa manifest contemption face thair ennymes contrar ye inglismen richt circumspect vigilant sic spyis yt euery thing done said army scottis manifest thaym balliol reiosing vane insolent foly amang scottis commandit army reddy inuade thair fais nycht followyng come ony noyis ye watter erne fand ye furd thairof ane lang staik quhilk affixit myddis yairof andro murray tullibard treason led army ouir watter erne come sa quietly erle marri tentis yat slew hym sleipand bed incontinent huge clamour come apon ye remanent army scottis slew yame burit sleip ony defence followit sa cruell slauchter nocht hard bot rummissing granis deand pepyll nocht bene edward balliol gart ylk man army bynd ane quhit clout arme na man mycht haue knawin myrknes nycht quha freindis fayis inglismen war inflāmit sic ire thay couth nocht saciar blud murdir scottis sauit nane mycht ouirtaikin mony ye nobillis wer slane ye noumer iiim gret noumer cōmonis ane certane thaym quhilkis eschapit fra battall returnit agane reuenge murdir thair freindis wer slane ye principal noblis quhilkis wer slane feild wer erle mar robert bruce erle carrik alexander fraseir knycht william hay constable kyn sa halelie yat wer nocht wyfe wes deliuerit ane son surname bene al vterlie distroyit robert keith merscheall mony surname▪ dauid lindsay glēnesk alexand seiton george dūbar robert strathaquhen thomas haliburtoun iohne skrymgeour knychtis mony otheris quhilkis wer ouir prolixt schaw erle fiffe wes tane battall wes strikin ye thrid day august fra redēptioun imiiicxxxii ȝeris ¶hovv edvvart ballioll vvas crounit scone hovv king dauid fled frāce hovv perth vvas recouerit▪ ballioll vincust douglas hovv king edvvard segit bervvik ca iii duplyne discōfist said balioll went perth tuke small difficulte said sindry inglismen auld hatrent aganis scottis went eftir thair victory duplyne se gif ony scottis wer liand feild abill recouer gif yai gud surrurgianis yai mycht chace residew thair lyfe nochtheles seyng miserable slauchter wes maid thaym ye nycht afore thay fell gret comploratioun saying thay beleuit nocht sa infinite noumer scottis slane erle marche h • rand scottis discomfist sa miserablie duplyne come wt foure gret cumpanyis sege ye toun perth last quhen lyue certane tyme sege yairof fowseis brand fild toun reddy randerit handis skalit fra sege howbeit mycht haif toun battall baith pleseir ballioll incontinent becaus peple come fast opinioun come bischop dū keld erle fiffe • one wes crounit xxiiii day september ȝeir afore rehersit discomfitoure yi last battal rais gret trubil scotland ye king dauid hauād bot ix ȝeris ī age counsall freindis fled france wt hꝭ quene iane sister kīg edward wes tenderlie ressauit phillip vi kyng france yat name quhare remanit ix ȝeris nixt ȝeir robert keyth alexand lindesay othir sindry nobillis reuenge slauchter thair faderis duplyne wan toun perth fourt moneth eftir thair sege erle fiffe androw murray tullibard wer tane wt otheris thair complicis quhilkis kepit said toun name ballioll erle wes send ward kildrūmy bot andro murray treason afore cōmittit wes hedit toun eftir yt tane maner wes geuin keiping iohne lindesay winnyng toun sic manheid virtew put scottis esperance better fortoun yairfore iohne randale erle murray son erle thomas afore rehersit archebald douglas lord galloway brothir iames douglas slane laitlie spanȝe come ane gret cumpany aganis ballioll balliol weil aduertist yairof met yam annandale quhair wes cruellie fochtin bot last ballioll wes discomfist hym self chasit ane hors bridil roxburgh yi battall wer slane schir henry ballioll schir iohne mowbray walter cumyn richard kirklie alexander bruce erle carrik lord galloway wer taikin presoneris saiffir ye erle murray thay wer nocht lang afore ye opinioun ballioll eftir victorie andro murray ane man gret pissāce rentis wes maid gouernor colleig ye erle marche thir twa gouernouris knawyng kyng edward cum aganis yame power ingland send schir alexander seitoun mony othir gentil men keip berwik sic thingis done andro murray come wt ane army sege roxburgh faucht sa vailȝeantly yat put balliol flycht nochtheles followit feirslie wes tane brocht presonere within castell tyme williā douglas liddisdale callit singulare manheid ye flour cheualry faucht vnhappely aganis inglismē annandale quhare wes tane presonere folkis discomfist william wes son gud schir iames douglas afore rehersit baith thir nobill men wer redemit gret soumes money eftir yai bene haldin othir half ȝeir ingland realme standing thus ieoperdy pepill wer deuidit two partis tane half assistit ballioll tothir kyng dauid kyng edward ingland seing sa gret truble scotland thocht tyme sufficient cōques croun vnderstud na thīg sa difficill bot may done othir al sum part gif oft assailȝeit nochtwithstanding band peace mariage sister iane kyng dauid scotland afore contrackit gaderit ane army baith ingland normandy angeos flanderis wagit money come scotland speciallie quhare maist rebellioun wes aganis ye balliol schew wes cumyn support ballioll nochtheles gif thingis succedit desirit wald na mair haue kepit faith promes ballioll otheris scottis seing thaym neir ouirset al sidis ennymes send iohne randale erle murray france kyng dauid get sum support fra kyng phillip france debait realme tyme kyng edward segit berwik baith see land nochtheles scottis debaitit al vailȝeantlie assailȝeit nocht allanerlie ischit sindry tymes inglismē bot slew sindry yair wachis sum tymes brint thair schippis gret manheid mene tyme william seitoun son schir alexander afore rehersit followit sa feirslie ane scarmusche aganis inglismen yat wes takin bastard brothir ane man singulare manheid inuading ouir feirslie inglis schippis vnder nycht fell see quhare perist sege continewit foure monethis continewallie town maid gret penurite vittallis ¶at last schir alexander seitoun send sonne kyng edward promittyng gif wald ceis sege rander toun hym within vi dayis▪ gif na support come hym within said tyme▪ sickir obseruation promys left sonne air pledge ¶of orison maid alexander seitonis vvife hovv son vvas slane tyranny kyng edvvard ca iiii sic thingis done berwik nobillis scotland yair conuention maid archebald douglas gouernour androw murrayis place douglas rais sege berwik come ane army inglād kyng edward aduertist thairof send ane herald schir alexander seiton certifying gif toun wer nocht randerit haist baith sonnis suld haistelie hingit afore eyne alexand answerd yat ye dayis wer nocht run trewis desyrit kyng othir keip faith elli deliuer pledgis mycht auantage king edward hauād na sycht faith band gart rais haistelie ane gallous afore toun haue baith sonnis alexander thairto ane yame wes taikin presonere othir deliuerit maner pledge haif schawin alexander seing sōnis led maner ye gallous wes mouit gret cōmiseration thinkād wes ane thing rycht detestable odious sonnis suld sa innocētlie slane considering mycht saif thaym gif wer obeysant ye pleseir ye tyrane sa cōmiseration sonnis yat ane part faith promittit kyng realme tothir syde wes oft drawin sindry purpos mycht skarslie refreine hym self fra randeryng toun ȝit vncertane bot compassioun sonnis natural affection bene obeysant desyre kyng edward wer nocht wiffe moder sonnis ane wyse woman aboue spreit man exhortit oftymes erar suffer immolatioun murdir sonnis yan cōmit sa manifest treason aganis prince deir husband said scho behald degeistly quhat thow doi gif thow fulfyll desire tyrane violat lufe thow he thy cūtre gif thow brek faith promittit thy souerayne ony feir deith appering thy sonnis thow sall fayll na le schame thy self freindꝭ thā dammage thy cuntre youcht sonnis de excellent fortitude defence thair cuntre sall succede na le thair louyng fame thy gret honoure weill considder first abhominable thow salbe perpetually thy natioun gif thow commit sa manifest treasoun betrais town ȝon tyrane mynassis oure sonnis deith intending bryng w opin schame gif fulfyl mynd sall neuir quhil warld induris recouir oure honour lat neuir thairfore town committit faith credit schamefully tynt oure dyssait traist nocht ȝon tyrane wyl obserue promis ony better efter town randerit hym afore haue trewis hym syndry dayis ȝit ryn ȝit kepi na faith w forthir gif ȝon fals manesworn king wyl nocht kepe sic thingis w he promittit bot failȝe he done ī tymes bygane quhat mischeif sorow sall cum w gyf fulfyll desire oure town salbe put sak oure housis brint oure tempillis spulȝeit gudis escheittit oure virginis matronis fuilȝeit innocent pepill toun slane mercy ransoun lyfe sonnis deir w sal redeme yame vengeance murdir sa mony pepill ar yai weill sauir fra thair deith quhen haue ransonit thaym sa manifest treason quhat pleseir hone •• e sall iose ye residew lyfe quhen filit sa schameful cowartry apperꝭ thairfore mair honoure w follow constance ferme purpos sic nobyll pepil bene rememberit haly writ saif lyuis oure sonnis sic irrecouerabyll dishonoure nocht danyell cassyn afore ye lyonis cruel tyranni becaus wald nocht offend god nocht thre barnis cassin ane birnand 〈◊〉 becaus thay wald nocht adorne fals ydolis nocht seuyn •• nnis machobee thair mo •• er put gret torment quhen thay • constantly refusit eit swine flesch • quhilk inhibit thaym thair lawis considder reuolue deir husband thy mynd quhat constance plesant vult • sonnis contempnis tormentis ȝou tyrane wald god mycht de siclyke defence cuntre thay certane gif mycht deith delyuer toun sonnis may thow suld se pa ony feir murnyng bot gret spreit curage deith thair slauchter na deith bot ane changing yair fragyll lyffis eternale glore thynk pyne sollicitude trauel sufferit thaym ten monethis berand thaym wambe weill warit haue gud frut lauboure se affection mynd sa oft desyryng thaym nobyll men brocht gud fyne thynk nocht sonnis tynt bot erar remane intermynabyll honoure ar ȝit abyll recouer thaym new chyldren bot may neuir recouir honoure quhen lost quhen happy nobyll woman exhortit hir husband thir siclyke wourdis scho broucht hym sorowfull heuy vnto hir chalmer ya • commiseratioun sonnis suld commit na thyng outhir aganis honoure weil toun ȝit euir flowand mynde impulsioun lufe sonnis ane part faith cuntre othir part mene time baith sonnis war put deith gallous deing maist honour defence thair cuntre ☞ hovv scottis vvar discomfist halidon hyll bervvik vvas randerit inglismen vvith mony othir strenthis munitionis scotland cap̄ v archebald dowglas gouernoure scotland heirand schamefull cruelte done king edward come thrid day efter army fra northumbirland reuenge displeseir thairof set tentis nocht far fra king edwardis army sindry prudent men war dowglas army quhilkis per suadit hym mony reasonis abstene fra battall kyng edward ane army full pepyl dayly exercit cheuelry richt insolent eftir thair frequent victoryis gret munitionis weirlie instrumentis cōtrar scottis wer brokin weris afore past thair agit wise capitanis sindry discomfitouris slane ye peple present army ȝoung ony experience armes thairfore alliegit na thing sa gud desist quhill thay sum practik experience armes answerit ye gouernour folkis howbeit yai wer noumer ennimes laikit na curage wer mouit extreme hatrent aganis inglismen cruelte laitlie cōmittit aganis sonnis schir alexander seitoun wes thairfore profitable abide lāg tary yair ire sall peri forthir na exercition mycht eik thair strenthis sa mekill ire rageand thair breistis ye douglas left hailsum counsal cōmandit army refresche yame self meit sleip reddy fecht aganis yair ennymes morow brek ye day arrayit folkis yair best maner wangard wes geuin hew lord ro hauand hym kēneth erle suthirland simon iohne fraseir iohn̄ murray lieutenand ye erle murray quhilk wes yan trublit gret infirmite secound battall wes geuin alexander lindesay alexand gordon reginall grahame robert kenneth thrid battal wes ye douglas gouernour hauand hym iames iohne allane sonnis walter gret stewart scotland tothir side inglismen na thing affrayit ordinance come pertlie displayit baneris becaus thay knew ground quhair feild wes set lang residence sege forsaid thay fenȝeit thaym fle thair first iunyng ane hyll sum part stay throw straitnes thairof wes rycht contrarius thaym assailȝeit rycht commodius thaym stude defence thairof al sone inglismen wer cumyn hill yai stintit thair fleing sound trumpat went haistelie thair array incontinent thay set scottis quhilk wer skatterit ye vail following feirsly ye mony yame wer miserabillie slane residew wer sa astonist ye yame faucht saif onlie thay mair respect thair honoure thair lyuis victorie apperīg yocht thay slew gret noumer inglismē ȝit yai wer put flicht finaly mair slauchter wes maid ye chace afore ye battall ane wyng inglismen lay afore stopit yair passage thus wer thay miserablie slane ilk syde na presoneris wer tane except ane noumer quhilkis wer sauir onlie becaus thair ennymes wer irkit slaucht lamentable battal wer slane mony nobillis gentilmen scotland eschapit afore fra battal duplyne yai wer estimit ye noumer xiiiim▪ mē thir ar ye principal men yt wer slane archebald dowglas gouernoure iohne stewart iames stewart alane stewart sonnis walter stewart erle ro ye erle suthirland ye erle carrik sa mony wer tane wer heidit morow cōmand kyng edward except ane ꝑsonis quhilk wer hid inglismen proffet thair ransoun amang quhome wes schir william douglas liddisdale tane thꝭ mischeuous vnhappy battall wes strikin magdalenis day fra redemptioun ane thousand iii hundrth xxxiii ȝeris efter discomfitour alexander seytoun patrik dunbar capitanis berwik disparit support gaif ouir town king edward thair lyuis guddis condition peace sauit quhē thay geuyn thair • fidelite king edward commandit patrik dunbar big castel dū bar apon awin expensis becaus kest afore quhen disparit releif cōmandit kepe tymes cumyng vnder name kyng edward efter sorofull victory scottis returnit ingland left behynd hym mony gret noblis ingland edward ballioll gouerne scotland thair deuise ¶the ballioll went throw boundis scotland garnist stren • thairof inglismen except v castellis allanerly quhylkis war scottis mennis handis say castel dunbriton quhylk kepit malcolme flemyng cummerland castell lochleuyn alane uepount castell kildrūmy cristyne bruce castell urquhart robert lauder ye peil low doun iohne thomeson thir castellis stude opynyoun king dauid ☞ contention betuix alexander movvbray hary bevvmont▪ hovv inglismen perist sege lochleuvn ca vi samyn tyme phillip kyng france send ambassatouris paip desyring hym interpone auctorite constant ye inglismen desist fra thair cruell inuasioun maid scottis inglismen held papis ambassatouris sic contemption thay wald nocht suffer thaym cum thair presence throw quhilk thay wer constranit depart ony expeditioun thair materis sone efter ane conuentioun maid edward ballioll perth quhare nobyllis scotland ratifyit hym king promyttit thair aithis neuir rebell aganis hym tymes cumyng mene tyme rais ane scharp contentioun betuix hary bewmont alexander mowbray certane landꝭ ī buchquhā hary bewmont clamit thir landis pertene maryit said alexanderis douchter quhylk heritoure allegit said landis ye tothir side alexander mowbray clamit thir landis reasoun succession aire brothir efter lang contentioun said alexander mowbray gat landis adiugit hym sentence ballioll dauid cumyn e • le atholl richard talbot allieging sentence wrangusly geuyn aganis hary bewmont maid ane conspiratioun aganis ballioll stuffit castell dongard buchquhane mony othir housis scotland aganis auctorite ballioll seyng gret trubyll apperyng hym way retretit sentence gaif alexander mowbray new sentence adiugit landis pertene said hary bewmont becaus maryit herytoure thairof parteis clamit thir landis war sa gret iust verite thair debait couth neuir decidit sicht iustice thus ye ballioll constranit haue ay ta party ennyme quhen tothir become freind nocht lang efter ballioll come ramfrew ressauit pepyll strenthis thairof opinioun brocht hym keyis castellis rothesay dunnone schir allane lyle sereif bute yus grew balliol dayly mair pissance cōfluence pepil enrichit thaym landis gudis assistit robert stewart heirand balliol set ylk day slauchter come bute castell dunbritane▪ quhare plesandly ressauit malcolme flemyng keipar thairof mene tyme ballyoll rasit ane army take strenthis scotland becaus thay war occasioun battall aganis hym ¶in nixt ȝeir laid ane sege castell lochleuyn quhen considerit castell mycht nocht tane lang sege left schir iohne stryuelyng ly sege thairof ane gret power quhyll castell war ¶and thair besines mair esaly thay maid thair bastailȝeis trinscheis fale deuat kirkȝard sanct sarfe besyde kinrosse castell kepit alane uepount iames lamby cietezanis sanct andros ¶at last quhen thir inglismen assailȝeit lang tyme get castell efter mony gret assaltis syndry ingynis howbeit thay war vane thay deuysit ane subtell slycht take castell ony straik ¶first thay inclusit watter ran loch ane hye dyke biggir sa strait fale deuat treis wat • er leuyn suld haue na passage bot inclusit perforce quhyll war rysyn aboue castell pepyll perist caus dam boldyn mair haistely thay brocht burnis fra syndry partis said loch schir iohne stryuelyng capitane sege seand al thingis beleuit done dew maner na thyng mycht auale bot proces tyme wyn hous went dunfermelyng deuotion becaus sanct margretis day ye haly quene scotland left behynd hym sa mony thocht sufficient kepe sege alane uepount capitane foresaid knawyng ye gret dangeir apperyng hym send iiii men castel within ye nicht ane bait speris wappynnis breke ye dyke foresaid quhen thay laubourit nycht borand dike fore said thay tuke purpos becaus yai • lauboure semit vane returne castell ony expeditioun nochtheles ane thaym exhortit ye laif continew furth ane houre se quhat fyne mycht cum thair lauboure al sone thay persauit ane hole maid throw dyke thay returnit castell incontinent streme followit sa fast quhare watter gat passage▪ brake bastailȝeis nocht onely drownit pepyll lay vnder ye dam bot brocht thaym hors cariage al yair prouision ye see alane uepount quhen watter fallin ye auld mesoure yschit castell slew ane part thaym war eschapit tyme remanent put flycht ☞¶iohne striuelyng herand sic calamyte fallyng folkis returnit sege maid ane vow neuir depart thairfra quhyll war taikyn euery person found slane last quhen lyin lang sege thairof seing castell nocht abyl takin constranit leif sege gret slauchter folkis sege lochleuin lenttyn fra redemptioun im iiicxxxv ȝeris ¶hovv robert stevvart iohne randall recouerit syndry strenthis scotland hovv dauid cumyn vvas brocht gret trubyll rebellioun aganis scottis hovv vvas tane fauoure ca vii kyng edward ȝeir following come scotland fifty thowsand men send lxx schippis see quhilkis mony war brokin betuix inchekeith ye northland becaus saw na rebellyoun aganis hym returnit ingland ye ballioll left dauid cumyn erle athole gouernoure take remanent strenthis scotland hald pepyll opinioun erle dauid insolence yi new auctoryte tuke possessioun landis murray buchquhan quhilkis pertenit robert stewart nocht onely gat inhabitantis thairof sworne opinioun bot confiscat guddis yame war found contrarius thairto robert stewart incontinent assemblit freindis auise dongall campbell lochquhow tuke castell dunnone slew personi • found cōmonis bute arrane glaid happy beginning gaderit ye nowmer iiii hundreth men fortyfy said robert mene tyme schir alane lyle sereif bute come thaym ane cumpany armyt men followit ane scharp battall quhyll last sereif slane folkis discomfist syndry folkis war brocht presoneris robert stewart thir siclike feliciteis mouit syndry scottis leif ye opinioun ingland come robert stewart lāg efter ye erle murray returnit fra kīg dauid france arriuit dunbritane quhare plesandly ressauit robert stewart ane nobyll man na le manheid wisdome fader erle thomas afore rehersit sone efter robert stewart erle murray come gret power cliddisdale rāfrew kyle cunyngham aire brocht ye samyn ro murray king dauidis opinioun erle murray heirand gret iniuris done erle dauid athole went aberdene erle dauid seing pepyll gaderit ilk day new power recouer yair leberte fled montanis desertis quhare brocht gret misere constranit lang tyme sustene lyfe rutis herbis last quhen saw na way eschew come lamentabyll weid petuusly desyring grace nobillis scotland ressauit hym thair fauour ane man nobyll blude gret manrent landis gart hym sweir trew kyng dauid afore kyng edward tyme schir wyllyam douglas liddisdale andro murray war redemit gret ranson efter yt thay war haldin thre ȝeris presoneris ingland thair cumyng edinburgh ane conuentioun lordis erle murray robert stewart generall electioun war chosyn gouernouris ¶mony scottis tyme left opinoun inglismen laurence prestoun iohne heryng iohne halyburtoun knychtis mony otheris quhilkis baid efter perpetually ye faith kyng dauid nocht lang efter ane conuentioun maid gouernouris darse auyse syndry gret materis concernyng commoun weill nochtheles dauid cumyn erle athole come sa strang power yt thay durst attempt na thing aganis inglismen ☞hovv king edvvard come scotland vvith gr • armyis baith see land hovv duke gilder vvas discomfist hovv erle dauid cumyn vvas slane ca viii kyng edward herād rebellion scottis wise come fifty thousand men perth brocht ic lxxx schippis forth ¶thir schippis sone efter ye cumyng forth brint heryit see costis ylk syde spulȝeit abbay sanct colme bot thair sacralege nocht lang vnpunist quhen thay war returnand ingland thair nauy violent wedder brocht gret trubyll sum thaym perist otheris brokin craggis residew thair nauy knawyng thay incurrit ye hatrent god sanct colme thair sacralege returnit said abbay maid gret offerandis recompence thair offence returnit hame disples • ir ¶at tyme duke gilder come gret power throw ingland support king edward discomfist burrow mure besyde edinburgh chasit ca • el thairof quhilk tyme inglismennis handis last constranit lang sege cum wyll guddis tynt life onely sauit erle murray randerit hym curtesly guddis sufferit hym depart efter sworn neuir assist inglismen amang spulȝeis yi battal found ane woman meruellus stature quhylk preuit gret vassalage battall slew mony vailȝeant men hir awin handis forthir becaus thꝭ duk gilder freind philip king france conuoyit erle murray ye bordouris mene tyme ane buschement inglismē scottis lay wait randerit hym kyng edwardis handis erle athole beleuing new felicite fall inglismen taking erle murray come perth gaif faith ballioll maid gouernoure scotland sone efter kyng edward returnit ingland tuke balliol hym beleuit al sone conquest scotland ballioll suld rebell aganis hym samyn maner iohne ballyol fader afore erle dauid richt insolent efter auctorite began exerce new tyranny scottis war repugnant kyng edward sum thaym spulȝeit yair landis guddis otheris put deith nobyllis hauand gret indignation erle athole suld exerce sic tyranny thair pepil ꝯsiderīg saiffit ye ȝeir afore thair cōmiseratioun come gret power aganis hym dauid cumyn herand lordis gaderit thus aganis hym left sege kyldrummy quhare tyme gaif thaym battall last quhen victory inclinand erle dauid multitude pepyl yat assistit hym iohn̄ crag capitane kildrummy come castel thre hundreth fresche men quhais cumyng victory succedit scottis erle dauid disparit lyfe suld nocht cum quik ennimes hādis ruschit ane cumpany tender freindis amang gret pres ennymes quhare slane alexander gordoun battal war slane walter bryde robert cumyn mony athir gentyl mē commonis schir thomas cumyn tane presonere heidit morow robert menȝeis eschapit fleing castell cāmore becaus gret nowmer pepyll enterit hym ony prouision vittallis castel mycht nocht defendit bot randerit morow efter ye pepyl thairof war sworn king dauidis opinioun ¶hovv andro murray vvas maid gouernoure scotland hovv king edvvard returnit vvith nevv army scotland▪ hovv inglismen vvar discomfist pāmore ca ix dauid erle athole slane wyse ane conuention maid nobyllis andro murray maid gouernoure place erle murray quhilk tane vnhappely said inglismen andro efter lyue lang tyme ye sege cowpar aduertist ye cumynis maid gret trubyl north partis scotland thairfore thocht mair necessar support ye cuntre sege ony castellis cumynis knawyng cumyng met hym set battall bot thay war vincust battall slane robert cumyn wyllyam cumyn thomas calder vailȝeant knychtis howbeit thay war ennimes kyng dauid ye tyme victory gottin said andro murray brocht al north scotland vnder gud obeisance kīg dauid inglismen abaid efter victory scotland except sa mony war within castell dongard last sayd castell tane na man left leuand except hary bewmont capitane quhylk sworn depart ingland ony returning sic thingis done gouernour laid ane sege castel lochindoris quhare elre dauid cumynis wife ye tyme thꝭ woman knawing hir hous mony dayis afore abyll segit send kyng edward desirit rescours kyng edward dredand tyne al strenthis scotland gif war nocht haistely rescoursit come xlm men said castell loch indors efter stuffi • new prouision come bludy swerd throw murray returnyng mar brint town aberdene nauy quhilk arriuit forth began maner thir afore spulȝe abbay sanct colme samyn maner yair sacr • lege nocht lang vnpunist • ne schyppis ladyn sanct colmes guddis sank ony tempest see ground king edward returnyng perth becaus cassyn afore commandit reparit new wallis bastailȝeis expensis thir vi abbayis abirbrothok coupar lundoris balmerinoch dunfermelyng sanct andros maid hary bewmōt capitane ye castel sāct andros quhilkꝭ returnit hym ingland contrar faith maid afore sege dongard attoure maid hary farrar capitane castel lucre wyllyam montegew capitane sriueling wyllyam feltoun capitane roxburgh thomas urthred capitane perth quhill sic thyngis war done scotland kyng edward come hym brothir heltane quhilk exercit gret cruelte scottis nochtwithstā ding thair perseuerance opinioun kyng edward brothir sum thaym slew otheris brint thair kirkis tempillis last king edward tuke sic displeseir aganis heltane brothir becaus brint ye kirk sāct bute ane thousand personis yt dang hym throw body ane swerd afore alter sanct iohne said haly place sal na mair refuge othir housis god he bene afore fra thy tyranny quhen thow distroyit sa mony innocent pepyll sicht rycht wrang sic thyngis done kyng edward returnit ingland left behind hym ballioll ane gret power perth tyme hary bewmont slew scottis quhome mycht apprehend specially thaym war slauchter cousin dauid cumin ¶als sone andro murray aduertist king edwardis departing come fra ye mont • ni quhare lay afore eschewing fury inglismen last assistence sindry nobyl men tuk ye castel kincleuyn kest ground sone efter come mernes quhare wan ye castel kylnesse kest • samyn maner passand forthwart wise brint dū notir tothir syde inglismen maid na le slauchter heirschippis partis quhare thay come throw quhilk mernis angus stryuelyng gowry continewall reiffis murdir weris done thaym war left waist last andro resist inglismen gaderit pepyll murray▪ mar buchquhan faucht panmore angus quhare victorius huge slauchter maid ennymes battall war slane hary montford quhilk send laitly kīg edward support ballyoll iiiim nobyllis gen • yll men ingland throw quhais deith rais gret dolour syndry partis ingland seand thair pissance gretly brokyn • ynsall sa mony noblis efter victory ro murray pai • throw fyf angus kest dowir castell lucre othir castellis fyf except allanerly castell cowpar ¶hovv vvyllyā talbot richard montegevv yvar vincust scottis deith andro murray sindry vassalagis done vvillyam douglas gret derth albion▪ ca x kyng edward heirand ye victory falling yi maner enny me send ane vailȝeant knicht namit willia talbot scotland two armyis support ballioll aganis quhom come williā keith laurence preston robert gordoun gret power scottis put thir inglismen flicht ye principall capitane williā talbot tane presonere payit two hundreth mark striueling ranson schir william montegew erle sarisbery come new ordinance sege ye castel dunbar lay xxii owlkis sege thairof nochtheles sa vailȝeātly debarttit ye contes marche callit blak anna constrant depart fra sege ȝeir following ane miserabil derth boūdis scotland gret mortalite pepyl ye land lay wast ony store cornis cōtinewall weris afore past ye sodiouris war ye castell cowpar laik vittallis left castell desert fled kingorn quhare yai hyrit ane schip haue pa • ingland nochtheles ane euyll mariner thay come ane sand bed perist • ye nixt flude tyme mony strenthis lowthiane inhabit inglismen town edinburgh stuffit mony sodiouris baith inglis scottis amang quhom ane scot gret spreit namit robert pendergest becaus fauorit scottismen ye marscheall callit thomas knatoun strake hym violently ane club▪ quhyll blude sprang heid robert mouit iniure lay ylk day wait quhill last slew mar • heall come wyllyam douglas ye nerrest way persuadyng hym pa delygence edinburgh quhare suld fynd ennymes geuyn nocht bot lust insolence wyllyā douglas come incontinent said town slew iiiic inglismen thair beddis buryit ī wyne sleip thus war inglismen constranit mair vigilant tymes cumyng lang efter andro murray gouernoure scotland deceissit gret dammage common weil thairof bury • rosmarky fra redemptionane •• hundreth xxxviii ȝeris tyme rais ane scharp weir betuix kyngis ingland france gret weill scotland apperandly scotland sa waik tyme gyf kyng ingland continewit weris suld haue cumyn ony esperance releif vter ruyne efter deith andro murray gouernour robert stewart tuke hym al charge ye realme ye returnyng king dauid france tyme wyllyam dowglas mony ieoperdice gret lauboure recouerit teuidal inglysmennis handis thairfore iosit ye said landis heritage conquest māheid prowes kyng edward mouit thir displeseiris send ane vailȝeant knycht namit schir thomas barclay ane gret power scotland aganis quhom come wyllyam douglas robert stewart gouernoure faucht hym blakburn quhare scottis war discomfist thaym eschapit vntane slane nocht lang efter wyllyā douglas faucht inglismen cragingis hauand hym bot xl men cūpany vincust schir iohne striuelyng vc men ye opinion ingland ȝeir following wan ye castell harmytage slew personis found nixt ȝeir william douglas faucht aganis schir laurence abirnethy principall capitane ballioll gret buschementis men athir syde fyue tymes dyscomfist nochtheles renewit ay battall last tuk said laurence presonere brocht hym dūbritane thir vassalagis william douglas gretumly estemit direckit ambassatoure france king dauid certane hie materis concerning realme mene tyme robert stewart come gret power sege ye toun perth lay sege yairof ten owlkis last quhen wes disparit tak said toun reddy depart thairfra william dowglas come france fra kyng dauid arriuit gret munitioun tay sone eftir cū myng toun wes randerit gouernour fra redemption ane miiicxli ȝeris ȝeir wes sic derth scotland ingland pepill wes constranit eit hors hundis othir siclik forbodin flesche ¶hovv ye ballioll fled ingland gret vassalage done robert stevvart vvilliam douglas hovv king dauid returnit scotland hovv vvilliam douglas vves banist ca xi perth ressauit yi wyse garnist strang munitionis ye gouernour wēt army striuelyng tuke viii day eftir sege wes laid yairto vnder thir conditionis thomas fulky capitane thairof mycht pa wyfe barnis guddis ony impeschemēt inglād edward balliol seing thir feliciteis fallyng scottis fled ingland mene tyme ye castell edinburgh wes subtell menis william douglas william bullok walter fraseir walter touris iohne sandelandis knychtis maner following dowglas ane seruand namit tourꝭ quhilk come schip command douglas forth fenȝeing ane marcheand sindry wynis sell ane deuisit slycht brocht twa punsionis wyne schip morow drew ane certan gallonis wyne past thairwith castell edinburgh desirit stewart cum furth taist wynis stewart fand wynis delicious said thow sall w ane hie pleseir gyf thow prouide w certane veschellis wyne wyne he bene rycht skant w yir mony ȝeris attoure mak hym sicker wyne gaif money hand touris prayit hym bring wyne airly morow castell suld reddy ressaue yi tourꝭ come afore ye lycht ye twa punsionis sone eft cūyng ye ȝettꝭ wer oppinit ye portaris ressaue ye wyne last quhē ye cart cumyn wtin ye ȝettis yi touris pullit ane wege incontinent cart fel • doun punsionis myddis ȝet stoppit samyn clois douglas quhilk w • nocht far fra slycht come haistely bodin men ȝettis eftir slane ye portaris enterit said castell left na man lyue thus wes realme returnit inglismennis handis nobill men nochtwithstanding absence yair king france apperis thairfore yat nobil men ar al necessar kyngis ony landis rich ennymes beand dantit maner ballioll wes eieckit al freindis cōstranit returne inglād secund day iunij ȝeir afore rehersit king dauid wyfe iane sindry gret nobillis franche scottis come happely throw ye seis arriuit innerberuy conuoyit gret triumphe perth cumyng alexander ramsay dalhouse ane maist vailȝeant men wes dayis gaderit ane strang power enterit inglād first laid ane buschement folkis vnder couert ane vail yat yai mycht tak thair ennymes auantage quhen thay saw ganand occasion sic thingis done wēt forthwart residew folkis ye mene tyme bordorarꝭ sindry garnisonis cuntre come aufull • e aganis hym sone eft maid hym craft cheualry flee quhill last ennymes followit ye place quhare buschementis wer lyand vnder wait incontinent buschemētis rais inuadit yame • u • ilk side finalie discōfist yam gret slauchter amang sindry othir presoneris quhilkis wer tane tyme e • le salisbery capitane roxburgh wer tane • e erle wes interchangit ye erle 〈◊〉 murray quhilk wes haldin mony ȝeris afore presonere ingland alexander ramsay seand capitane roxburgh mony sodiouris thairof tane iurnay come haistely ledderꝭ roxburgh enterit perforce ouir wallis king dauid vassalage gaif baith ye capitanry roxburgh screifschip teuidale said alexander caus▪ come gret hatrent william douglas wes finalie tane hym kirk hawik wes haldin captiuite castell hermetage quhyll deceissit ☞ ¶kyng dauid rycht cōmouit yat yi nobill man alexander wes put doun maner thocht gyf sic attemptatis wer vnpunist thay mycht occasioun conspire aganis hym sum hi • ar materis gart serche yi william douglas punist deith nochtheles said william drew hym fra kyngis presence abaid montanis othir desertis scotland quhill robert stewart othir nobillis finaly recounsalit hym kyngis fauoure gat hym restorit baith honour landis teuydale afore ¶hovv king dauid revvardit airi • thaym vvar slane duplyne halidon hyll hovv inuadit ingland
