syndry tymes vvith gret iniuris ca xii scotland beand pecifiit maner inglismen eieckit partis thairof king dauid set ane counsall • perth commandit al thaym yat ony honest vassalage defence realme thair faderis slane battallꝭ dupline halydon geuyn hym byl mycht considder thair honest ieoperdꝭ reward yame effering thair meritis last quhen thay war conuenit beand perticularly aduertist euery dedis done thaym self yair faderis rewardit thaym richely gold seluer iowellis thay mycht haue al mekyll pleseit tyme present thay sorow tyme bygane nane couth schaw ony freindis kynnismen slane ony vailȝeant deidꝭ awin handis bot rewardit gudly recompence amang syndry othir war rewardit tyme hew boece grand schir maister hector boece compilar thir croniklis gat recompence faderꝭ slauchter duplyne heritoure lady barony balbrid geuyn hym mariage quhilk barony ȝit possedit airis said hew quhen kyng dauid rewardit noblis realme yi wyse thocht na thyng sa gud reuenge ye iniuris done sa mony ȝeris afore inglismen ȝit sindry prudent men gaif counsall delay weris quhill pepill wer conualescit baith thair bodyis guddis thay wer waistit lang weris afore enduring attour ye season wes yan manure yair landis thay mycht releif pepill gret derth quhilk yai presentlie sustenit thir wordis answerit kyng dauid wald assailȝe ye chance fortoun bring pepil ī gret rich spulȝe inglismen reuenge iniuris done thaym sa mony ȝeris afore sone eftir fensabill men wer cōmandit reddy agane ane certane day nocht lang eftir maid erle murray lieutenand army enterit northumbirlād quhare remanit ane moneth▪ inuading ye cuntre fyre swerd syne returnit scotland gret rich sone eftir returnyng rasit ane new power scotland enterit agane ingland ye inglismen seing yame self nocht pissance resist army gaderit yair guddis strenthis mene tyme v knychtis scotland namit stewart eglintoun cragy boyd fullartoun persewing inglismen ouir feirslie wer taikin redemit eftir gret ranson kyng dauid seing hym self ilk day waisting tyme na apperance battall returnit scotland lang eft went agane inglād wes trublit vehemēt wei • haill yt mycht skarslie debait hym self army vnperist storme wedder tothir syde ye inglismen wer gaderit aganis hym ouirset tempest samyn maner▪ king dauid purpos suld nocht vane kest doun sindry strang housis ye bordouris ingland returnit scotland ony othir trubyll army ☞ hovv kyng dauid request france inuadit ingland vvith gret displeseiris hovv vves taikin durame hovv inglismen cōquest gret boundis scotland ca xiii kyng phillip frāce wes cruelly inuadit duryng tyme king edward ingland send oratouris scotland desiring king dauid inuaid ingland battall fyne yat king edward resist ye iniure scottis suld leif ye sege caleis mene tyme come ambassatouris fra king edward scotland treit peace kyng dauid promittit rander baith berwik ballioll scottis mennis handis wes thay alliegit gret occasioun iniuris lāg continewing betuix inglis scottis lordis answer yir materis went thair counsall bot yai wer deuidit sindry opinionis ilk man eftir fantasie sū rage ȝouth auld hatrent aganis inglismen wer desirus battall otheris irkit lang weris desirit peace thocht thir offeris ingland nocht contempnyt sen mony cōmoditeis mycht follow thairthrow alwayis wes demit gyf sic honest offeris wer contempnit truble proffet suld follow apperit perpetuall amyte kyndnes sall continew betuix inglismen scottis gif wer tane away mouar thair weris answerit kyng dauid otheris wer opinioun france memorie infinite pleseiris done w kyng phillip mouis w schaw sum kyndnes hym nocht onlie ressauit w quhen maist dangeir occurrit bot defendit w fra ennymes quhen wer exilit realme forthir band afore contrackit betuix kyng robert oure fader france mouis w assist opinion france thairfore gyf nobill men hauand sycht thaym he auancit common weill liberte thing wes gud reuenge auld iniuris • e ennymes thus wes con •••• haue battall ingland 〈◊〉 solicitatioun kyng dauid desirit sū honest vassalage mycht thairthrow comparit glore eldaris ambassatouris ingland wer depeschit wyse ony expeditioun thair desiris ambassatouris frāce fullelie satifyit sone eftir opin proclamatioun fensabill men within realme wer cōmandit meit ye kyng ane certane day place mene tyme erle ro come mony folkis perth maid mowster kyng nycht following slew lord ilis vii kynnismen slepand thair beddis returnit incontinēt ro king dauid nochtwithstandyng gret displeseir tuke said slauchter rycht desirus haue punist supersedit punitioun thairof quhill tyme occurrit ganand cūing ye bordouris maid mony knychtis steir thaym knychtlie vassalage maid williā douglas erle william wes son archebald douglas slane afore h • lidon hyll sic thingis done kyng dauid distroyit maist part northumbirland fyre swerd said king dauid wes monist visioun sleip abstene fra landis pertenand sanct cuthbart othirwayis hꝭ weris suld haif ane miserable end al sone wes awalkinnit thocht sic visiōis bot fantaseis cōmandit army nochtwithstanding sic visioun spare na lādis townis quhair thay come last thay come durame quhare sanct cuthbart patron spulȝeit baith abbay placis yairabout kyng edward impacient suffir thir iniuris send erle northumbirland france gret power erle afore cumyng send ane herald kyng dauid desiring return scotland put end weris otherwayis suld haif ba • tall thrid day eftir king dauid tuke litil respect yi message bot cōmādi • folkis reddy resist thair ennymes morow deuidit army thre battallis ye first wyng wes robert stewart prince scotland patrik erle marche secund wyng wes iohne erle murray william erle douglas ye myd battall wes king dauid ye remanent nobillis scotland erle douglas becaus wes wardane bordouris departit fra scottis espye army ingland vnwarlie quhair thair army lay ye vc folkꝭ wer slane hym self narowly eschaping life last quh • baith ye armyis wer otheris sicht dauid grahame come fyue hundreth bodin men ye skyrtis inglis archearis haue brokin thaym nochtheles wes inuadit arrowis mony folkis war slane hym self narowly eschaping scottis nochtwithstandyng baith thir discomfitouris ruschit feirsly thair ennymes faucht lang tyme gret manheid deith last robert stewart erle marche seyng thair folkis defaik curage efter thay fochtyn lang tyme doutsum victory fled feild fleing erle marche robert stewart ane gret displeseir army scottis battall faucht aganis thaym come sa awfully battall quhare king dauid faucht fynaly vincust put flycht kyng dauid left ane small cū pany feild howbeit left na thing vndone mycht pertene deuore ane forcy campioun sum tyme persuadyng folkis returne new battall sū tyme ruschit ane buschement vailȝeant mē quhare saw maist confluence preis inglismen purpos haue put thaym abak resydew folkis mycht haue • ane new curage returne battall nochthelis thair abaid nane hym • ot sa mony mair respect thair honoure l •• e fechtand perseuerand manhe •• deith youcht king dauid destitute ony h • lp ȝit ceissit nocht perseuere obstinat battall quhyll ouirset multitude pepyll two speris hyngand body youcht mycht nothir fle ȝit breke said speris ȝit wald nocht suffer hym tane thynkand na thing sa odious remane life efter sa gret slauchter maid nobillis ceissit nocht prouoke ennymes maist dispitfull wourdis sla hym inglismen seing mycht nocht eschape set thair besynes take hym iohne copland desyrit hym ȝoldyn▪ baith swerd wappinuis war dong handis nochtheles tuke copland sic violent dynt chaftis dang two forthir teith na better chance left wyng quhare erlis murray dowglas faucht battall vincust erle murray slane erle dowglas tane sorowfull battall war slane erle murray erle stratherne constabyll marcheall chalmerlane chancellar scotland gret nowmer mony othir nobyllis commonis kyng tane v▪ erllis say dowglas fife suthirland wygtoun menteith ane arrowheid schot king dauidis leg sic violence▪ couth nocht gotty • furth ingyne man ȝit quhen visit sanct mona • wond opni • heid fell besyde othir gret ryches tynt feild haly • roce halyrudhous tyn • king dauid him▪ traisting vertew yairof inuincibyll battall nochtheles spulȝeit al othir iowellis found hym tyme yi battall strikin durame xvii day october fra redemption imiiicxlvi ȝeris inglismen efter victory tuke ye castell roxburgh hermetage ony resistente subdewit annandale galloway mers teuidale twedale e • trik forrest maid marchis cokburnis peth sowtray hege ¶hovv vvyllyam douglas recouerit syndry landis inglismennis handis inuadit ingland vvith gret displeseris hovv kyng edvvard vvrocht gret trubyll scotland ca xiiii balliol come ni • ȝeir ingland erle northumbirland heryit lowthyane cliddisdale brocht spulȝe thairof galloway quhare abaid lang efter scot • efter sorrowfull battall durame maid robert stewart gouernoure tyme schir wyllyam dowglas son gud schir iames dowglas yt slane spāȝe returnit france support freindis chasit inglismē douglasdale teuidale twydale ertrik forrest twedale iohne copland capitane roxburgh gaderit ane army inglismen nochtheles discomfist chasit roxburgh nixt ȝeir quhilk fra incarnation ane thousand iii hundreth xlix sa gret pest partis scotland▪ tha • ye thrid part ye pepyl deceissit pest rais sa terribyll inflation ye ilk man yat tuk • ceissit within two dayis efter sa contagius yat fader wa • vise sonne sonne ye fa •• er nixt ȝeir iohne 〈◊〉 • lew ane nobyll knycht schir dauid berclay aberdene within nycht procuration schir william douglas liddisdale quhilk tyme haldyn ingland erle dowglas schir dauid berclay slew afore iohne dowglas bruthir said schir wyllyam fader schir iames dowglas dalkeith ȝeir following said schir wyllyam dowglas liddisdale slane huntis ettrik forrest cousyn god sonne william erle douglas ye slauchter alexander ramsay othir auld enuy meteis thus ye hous douglas mony ȝerꝭ deuidit amang yam self persewing othir gret vnkindnes slauchter nixt ȝeir quhilk fra redemption ane thousand iii hundreth lv efter pasche come scotland ane nobyl knicht eugenius de garanteris lx weil accuterit men delyuerit gouernour othir lordis scotland support france thair weris ingland xlm crownis sonne sone efter ye king ingland send ane army scotland▪ brint baith mers louthyane te • ydale erlis marche dowglas impacient suffir displeseir rasit ane army inuade ingland nochtheles fra thay war aduertist inglād gaderit thay abaid bordouris send schir williā ramsay ryn ane foray throw ye cuntre last quhen returnand hame gret pray men guddis ye inglismen brak hym followit yth • nd chace quhyl thay war cumyn army scottis ¶incontinent scottis set thaym gret noyis clamour put thaym fynaly flycht inglysm • n war tane schir thomas gray son iohne darras tane siclyk mony othir inglismen ¶the franchemen coft sindry inglis presoneris tyme slew thaym reuenge ye slauchter yair faderis quhilkis war slane afore inglismen france erlis marche dowglas efter victory come haistely ledderis wallis berwyk wan toun howbeit nocht gret slauchter inglismen war slane alexander ogil capitane berwik thomas persey bruthir erle northū birland edward gra • scottis war slane thomas uaus andro scot balwery iohne gordoun william sinclare thomas prestoun alexander mowbra knychtis quhen scottis ye town berwik maner thay war aduertist yt king edward cumand thaym new ordinance becaus thay na prouision resist army thay brint town kest maist part wallis thairof nochtheles king edward efter cumyng reparit new wallis went roxburgh thair met hym ye ballioll transferrit rycht clame ye croun scotland said king edwardis handis requestit hym perseueir perpetuall hatrent aganis scottis nocht lang efter king edward come hadingtoun ye gret dammage pepyll lyand thair ane part nauy spulȝeit kirk lady callit quhit kirk returnit spulȝe thairof thair schippis bot thair sacralege lang vnpunist suddanly rais ane north wynd raschit thair schippis sa violently see bankis sandis thaym eschapit saif sa mony swame land kyng edward contemptioun god becaus nauy trubyllit maner persewit abbayis religius placis quhare come gret cruel • e treuth ane inglysman spulȝeit ornamentis yt ymage lady ye quhyte kirk incontinent ye crucifix fel doun heid dang harnis ☞ battall poyteris hovv king dauid vvas redemit hovv punist baronis thair fleing fra hym durame ca xv sone efter returnyng kyng edward ingland william douglas nidisdale recouerit ye landis galloway lādis dryisdale war recouerit ki • kpatrik maner xx day september ȝeir battall poyteris france maner following edward prince walis son kyng edward windisore come ane army france▪ inuadit cuntre sa cruelly syndry boundis thairof apperit gif war nocht haistely resistit cū vnder empire mene tyme william erle dowglas kynnismen freindis nowmer iiim men went france te • derly ressauit king iohn̄ first king yat name lang efter kyng iohne rasit ane army come potteris edward prince walis son king edward windisore efter ye cumyng king iohn̄ began rais army fenȝeit hym subtel slicht war astonist depart towart ingland tha • franchemen scottismen suld breke thair array feirs following army ☞ ¶at first skarmushe schir iohne claremon • merschal frāce slane prince edward glaid beginnyng seand folkꝭ rasit new curage thocht na thing sa gud follow fortoun come haistely poiteris quhare king iohne campit tyme notht lang efter baith armyis iunit faucht gret manheid quhill last dalphyne france fled gret buschementis throw quhilk king iohn̄ left desolat feild ȝoungest sonne phillip quhilk namit efter phillip hardy becaus swerd found drawin hādis thus king iohne tane brocht presonere ingland ye • rle douglas rescorsit hꝭ freindis feild bot archebald dowglas son schir iames douglas yt slane spanȝe tane bot redemit small ransoun quhen brocht afore inglismen cote armoure gilt harnes ye maner faucht schir wyllyam ramsay colluthy tuk hym ye chaftis neif said tratoure thow art ye deith thy maister erle dowglas thow clothit armour yat suld haue debatit hym incontinent causit hym draw butis held hym sic vile laubour redemit smal ransoun said yt king edward full vane arrogāce sat crownit septour diademe betuix two captiue kyngis scotland france feist ȝule sic thingis mycht rehersit glore takand na respect vnsickir stait man na sic aduersite micht fall hym king dauid within certane ȝerꝭ efter wes brocht ye erle north hamptoun berwyk quhare mony lordis scotland conuenit make ransoun becaus thay culd aggre thairapon brocht agane london ye nixt michaelmes redemit icm mark striueling efter yt lyin xi ȝeir presonere ingland yt money suld payit mair surely trewis war tane xiiii ȝeris mony lordis baronis scotland war laid plege lō payment ye said ransoun king dauid obelist eftir returnyng scotland cast castellis mortoun dalswyntoun dunfreis durisdere becaus thay war noysum inglismen efter returnyng scotland set ane parliamēt maid gret punitioun thaym fled fra durame first brake tailȝe maid cousyn robert stewart ye croun scotland ane gret occasion discomfitoure durame fleing thairfore transferrit said tailȝe iohne suthirland quhilk wes gottin iane ȝoungest sister causi • lordis sworn kepe ye said tailȝe erle • suthirland traisting son iohne succede crown delt maist part landis amang freindis quhilkis war hayis sinclaris ogilbyis gordonis nochtheles ye said erle frustrat baith landis crown scotland son iohn̄ geuyn amāg ye remanent plegis king dauidꝭ ransoun deceissit london efter deith erle suthirlandis son robert stewart recounsalit king dauid maid heritour croun vnder ye tailȝe afore mony othir gret baronis war punist ye wife thair fleing durame ye kirk scotland gaif x penny yai • frutis kīg dauid help ye pament ranson yi time realme france wes gret displeseir kyng iohne wes haldin captiuite quhill last left baith sonnis pledge hym come paris quhair pieteuslie regratit captiuite said wes ane gret los hym nocht sic nobil men dayis roland gawyne laubour redemptioun wes king charlis tyme afore hym incōtinēt stude vp ane nobil man gret manheid wisdome ennyme ye kyngis sleuth said mycht fynd sic ane prince charlis suld fynd rolland gawyne othir duche peri ynew thir wordis wer deparprentit kyng iohnis mynd ony man beleuit becaus hꝭ febilnes sleuth wes opinlie reprochit▪ nocht lang eftir returnit ingland visie sonnis deceissit londoun ¶of gret trubyl fell scotland king dauidis secund mariage deith syndry gret clerkis mer • elli sene albion ca xvi nocht lāg eftir kyng dauid callit lordis baronis ane counsall tyme captiuite london • romittit transfer ye croun scotland kyng edwardis sonne gyf lordis scotland wald consent thairto lordis quhen mater wes proponit afore thaym answerit thay wald neuir cōsent yairto sa lang ony thaym mycht beir wappinnis armour kyng dauid wes rycht ioy • yi answer wes nocht oblist laubour▪ forthir mater lordis wald consent nixt ȝeir quhilk wes fra redemption ane miiiclvii lady iane spous kyng dauid past pilgramage sāct thomas canterbery ingland deceissit ony childrin hir body kyng dauid eftir hir deith mariit ane lusty woman namit margaret logy douchter schir iohne logy within thre monethis eftir repentit wes sorowful▪ yt degradit blud ryal sic obscure lynnage yat • anist hir otheris gaue hym counsall thairto realme last lady past ane certane hir freindis auinion quhare ye paip held seit ye tyme wes fauorit scho gat finalie ane sentence aganis king dauid annere hir lawchful lady wyffe thus suld ye realme haue cumyn vnder interdiction gret truble wer nocht scho deceissit ye way returnand hame kīg dauid eftir mony othir poleseis reparit ye strenthis realme biggit ane toure ye castel edinburgh quhilk wes eft callit dauidꝭ toure finalie quhen brocht realme gret trāquillite tuk purpos pa ierusalem vesy sepulture crist quhen prouidit al thingis necessar yairto fell ane hait feuour deceissit castell edinburgh ye xxxix ȝeir regne xlvii ȝeir age wes beryit ī halyrudhous fra redemption ane miiiclxx ȝeris sindry meruellis wer sene ȝeir albion rauinuis kayis piottꝭ clekit yair birdis wynter contrar nature thair kynd ye ȝowis wer barrant ony lāmys▪ myse ratonis abundit sic plente yai mycht nocht distroyit sa gret spate watter wes partis scotland mony housis cieteis wer distroyit yi tyme wer mony nobill clerkis iohne dun ye ordour sāct francis ane man gret knawlege ī theologie richard myddiltoun williā ockam mony otheris ¶and sa endis heir xv buke thir croniklis heir begynnis xvi buke croniklis scotland ☞ hovv robert stevvart vvas maid king scottis▪ sonnis douchteris hovv realme vvas tailȝeit thaym ca primo kyng dauid buryit maner afore rehersit ye noblis cōuenit lithquo cheis ane successour croun quhilk day mony ye noblis bea • opinioun robert stewart come william erle douglas ane gret power clamyt ye croun richt edward ballioll ye cumyn saying wes surrogat baith yair rychtis wes yairfore iust heritour ye croun apperit ye said erle william wald vsurpe croun ꝑforce gif wer nocht geuyn hym beneuolence nochtheles wes frustrat purpos george erle marche iohne dunbar erle murray sindry othir gentill men quhilkis beleuit haue fauorit action • lady day lentern callit ye annunciatioun said robert stewart wes crowni • gret solempnite ye lvii ȝeir age yat ye amyte kyndnes sal stand betuix ye said nobill prince subdeit erle douglas fore said wes accordit yat eufame eldest douchter kīg robert salbe geuin iamis ye erle douglas son mariage way come ye stewartꝭ ye croun quhais succession regnis ȝit gret felicite viii person fra robert quhen kyng robert ressauit ye croun wyfe eufame douchter erle ro quhome two sonnis walter dauid afore maryit ye said erle rossis douchter elizabeth mure place wif hir thre sonnis iohne robert alexander diuers douchteris quhilkis ane wes maryit iohne dunbar erle murray ane othir wes maryit iohn̄ lion lord glāmis erldome murray continewit dunbarris allanerlie duryng lyfe erle iohne son quhom successioun failȝeit except ane douchter quhilk wes heritour said erledome wes maryit eftir douglas yi way ye douglas come erledome murray kyng robert eftir coronatioun maid sindry erlis lordis knychtis baronis iames lindesay glennesk wes maid erle crawfurd thrid ȝeir king robert deceissit eufame quene king robert incontinent maryit elizabeth mure lemmen afore rehersit affection hi • barnis thay mycht lawchful reabillit virtew matrimony subsequent nocht lang eftir auyse parliamēt maid iohn̄ eldest son gottyn elizabeth mure erle carrik hir secund son robert erle menteith fiffe ye thrid son alexander erle buchquhan lord badȝenocht eldest son walter gottin eufame wyfe maid erle athole lord brechin secund son dauid erle strathern yi walter slaar iames first pretendit ay gret richt ye croun lang efter ane parliament set perth thair ye croun scotland tailȝeit king robert sonnis maner iohne son gottin elizabeth mure lemman reason first gottin son legitimat matrimony subsequent sall succede immediatly croun failȝeing succession male croun sall cum robert secund son failȝeing hym alexander falt succession croun cum walter quhilk gottyn eufame first wife failȝeyng succession male hym ye croun cum dauid erle strathern airis quhatsumeuir noblis war sworne thair straitest maner obserue keip new tailȝe thair best maner ☞¶hovv erle marche brint roxburgh hovv inglismen vvar syndry tymes discomfist scottis ca ii borderarꝭ ingland quhilkis leuꝭ allanerly yair werꝭ spulȝe inuy fortoun lang peace scotland war brocht extreme pouerte thairfore fynd occasion weir thay slew certane freindis georgꝭ erle marche fair roxburgh ¶erle george impatient suffer slauchter send ane herald hary erle northumbirland wardane ye bordour ingland desirand slayaris men randerit ye iniuris done thaym redressit last quhen send oftymes ye said wardane effect foresaid fyndand nocht bot answer full derisioun supersedit displeseir quhill mair sufficient oportunite occurrit ȝeir following syndry marchandis ingland cōuenit roxburgh mene tyme ye said erle george gaderit ane gret power brothir erle murray tuk said town put sak inglismen sone efter come ane army scotland brint certane landis pertenand schir iohne gordoun thay lay marche erle marchis landis saiffit nothir wife barne quhare thay come regardyng nocht quhat misery thay sufferit swa thay micht noy thair ennymes schir iohn̄ gordoun richt desirus reuenge iniure come ingland ane gret power brocht ane pray men guddis ony obstakyll aganis quhome come iohne lylburn ane army gordoun na thing affrayit met hym gret manheid curage throw quhilk followit ane scharp battal fochtin lang tyme vncertane victory scottis war fyue tymes vincust yat day al oft victorius last inglismen war cleirly discomfist lilburn thair capitane brocht presoner scotland hary perse erle northumbirland come viim mē dun reuenge yir displeseiris ye nicht following ye lādwart mē hirdis fillit syndry dry leddryn polkis full small stanis band yam • togidder maner clogboggis thair hors syne chasit yame ye campe quhare thir inglismen lay incontinent gret hors yt wes amang ye army ingland war sa effrayit noyis thir clogboggis na renȝeis mycht hald yame bot ran skatterit throw cū tre feir trubyll ye inglismen stud nicht arrayit battall ay waytand quhen thair ennymes suld inuaid thaym morow thay returnit hame falt hors thair feit efter yt thair hors war far skatterit fra thaym fallyn pray cuntre ¶in mene tyme thomas musgraue capitane berwik come support erle northumbirland bot vincust brocht presonere iohne gordoun scotland nocht onely war scottis victorius eist partis scotland bot ye west bordouris maner quhare schir iohne iohnestoun ye ylk faucht inglismen syndry skarmussing ay victoriꝰ ☞of gret pest scotland hovv inglismen vvas discomfist sulvvay message send charlis france hovv surname lyouns tuke thair beginnyng ca iii yi tyme paip gregour ye xi send ane legat fra auinioun king robert inhibit hym intromit ony guddis pertenand kirk efter prelatis deith ȝeir abbay sāct andros brint necligence ane plumbar quhilk left ane hꝭ hait irnis ane craw nest quhare rasit sa huge fyre yt micht slokin quhill kirk brint xxii day october fra redemptioun imiiiclxviii borne dauid stewart quhilk efter duk rothesay sanct andros day nixt following toun berwik tane schir iohne gordoun within ye nicht bot nocht lang kepit doung ou • samyn way entrit efter thꝭ williā erle douglas come xxm men faire pynnire within ingland spulȝeit ye marchandis thair guddis returnit incredibyll pray scotland scottis beleuyng haue cumyn gret proffet thir guddis come irrecouerabyll dissolatioun thir guddis come sa greuous pest scotland ye thrid part pepyll deceissit thrid tyme yat pest come scotland fra incarnatioun god imiiiclxx ȝeris inglismen recouer thir heirschippis maid y• erle douglas pynnire come scotlād ouir sulway inuadit cuntre fire slauchter maist cruel maner ye mene tyme scottis gaderit nowmer vc men stude ane strait glen quhil inglismen war cumyn yame wt sa huge noyis clamour set yame yt yai gaif backis iiiic yame war slane mony al ye laif perist sulway king charlis ye vi heirand ye fame yir illuster dedis send hꝭ ambassatouris king robert ī scotland exhortād hym follow • oun inuade ennymes continewal battal ꝓmittit ane ȝeirly pensioun money hym hꝭ successouris kingis scotland gif cōstranit ye army ingland pa france yir ambassatouris renewit ye band frāce scottis sone efter war depeschit thā send walt wardlaw cardinal bischop glasgew mony othir nobyll men renew ye band france nixt ȝeir iohne lioun chancellar scotland wes slane vnhappely iames lindesay erle crawfurd said yt iohne lioun wes ane lusty man dotat mony giftis nature fortoun excellent bewte gud maneris sa plesand euery creature yt wes maid secretar said erle eftir ye maid sa familiar kyng robert yat gat douchter elizabeth mariage mony riche landis callit glāmis quhom ar discendit surname lionis memorie heirof yai beir lioun thair armes lillyis tressoure samyn maner king beris exceppād allanerlie yat yai beir thair lionis ane blak feild iohne lioun eftir mariage grew ilk day ī maist tendernes king robert throw quhilk ye erle crawfurd tuke sic displeseir slew hym forfair kyng robert cōmouit contemptioun banist erle crawfurd sindry ȝeris scotland quhill last wes recounsalit intercessioun ye erllis douglas marche ye kingꝭ fauour ye ȝeir following quhilk wes fra redemptioun imiiiclxxvi deceissit prince edward ingland yat tuke king iohne poyters nixt ȝeir deceissit kyng edward wyndesore fader left behynd hym iiii sonnis lyue say duk clarence duk longcastel duk ȝork ye erle cambrige ȝeir wes ye coronatioun kyng richart son prince edward afore deceissit ¶of gret cruelteis done inglismen aganis scottis hovv king france send gret support scottis ca iiii fourt ȝeir eftir quhilk wes fra redemptioun ane miiiclxxxi iohne gant duk lōg castel come mony noble men treit peace betuix two realmes ingland scotland last quhen tane iii ȝeris peace scottis wes returnand hame gat aduertising cōmonis ingland wer risin gret power aganis new kyng richard slane bischop canterbery mony othir nobillis gentillis ingland incontinent returnit ye bordouris wes cōuoyit william erle douglas archebald douglas lord galloway halirudhous beside edinburgh quhare remanit quhill last iakstro wes quarterit otheris opinioun punist al sone trewis wer outrun archebald douglas lord galloway rycht impacient sustene ye iniuris daylie done galloway annandale inglismen lochmaben come ane gret power support ye erlis douglas marche quhen thay lyin sege said hous ix dayis thay faucht aganis ane buschemēt inglismen yt come carleil reskew ye said hous put thaym lang bergane flycht throw quhilk yai gat baith victorie thair ennymes ye hous randerit thaym ane day al sone ye hous wes tane wes cassin doun ye ground king richard heirand lochmaben tane yi maner send ye baron gray stok gret munition vittallis fornis ye castel roxburgh last quhen wes cumyn withī ane myle ye said castell wes tane ye erle marche brocht dunbar ordinance king richart heirand yir syndry iniuris done scottis send eme duk longcastell gret armyis scotland baith see land eftir yat dantit ba • th mers louthian come edinburgh curtesse gat yair ye tyme exile returnit ingland ony ferder inuasioun nochtheles nauy abaid still forth heryit brint yt see coistis ilk side yair returnyng thay brint abbay sanct colme bot kirk wes sauyt miracle said ane inglismā put fyre thryis kirk ȝeid ay ye inglisman ran wod nauy inglismen nocht saciat yir cruelteis come fiffe spulȝeit mony tounis yairof last thomas nicholas erskīnis alexander lindesay william cunynghame kilmauris set aponne thaym fiffe slew sa gret noumer thaym thaym returnit thair schippis ȝeir erle douglas put ye inglismen teuidale recouerit ye strenthis yairof quhilkis wer haldin vnder ye dominion inglismen fra ye feild durame thay dayis wes last vassalage done ye said erle william ane maist vailȝeant men wes dayis deceissit sone eftir ye hait feuour ye castell douglas lyis melros eftir deith succedit sonne iames erledome douglas ane rycht feirs vailȝeant knycht moneth septēber nixt following recouerit toun berwik inglismennis handis come sic ane army ingland yat brint heryit ye boundis yairof ye new castell nocht lang eftir wes commandit kyng robert return perth excusation ceissing gyf counsall concernyng sindry gret materis iohne ueam admyral france erle ualentines come moneth maii scotland iic xl weir schippis twa thousand vc armit men mony thaym baronis gentilmen iiiic thaym wer hakbutteris iic cro bowaris pickis halbertis sic like munition weir thair vittallis fornest wagis payit ane ȝeir aboue gret ordinance thay brocht iiiic curacis quhyt harnis iiiic halflang swordis lm crounis son geuin quhare king robert thocht expediēt amang nobillis nocht lang eft auyse ye baronis scotland king robert rasit ane army fifty thowsand men maid robert hꝭ son quhilk wes erle fiffe lieutenand said army maid erlis douglas marche capitanis vnder hym army come ingland kest doun castellis werk furd cornwell nochtheles weddir wes bittir thay wer constranit returne scotland yair returning yai set doun yair tentis roxburgh sege castell thairof admyrall france desyrit gif castell wer munitioun folkis kepit tymes cūing ye kyng francis name becaus ye scottis refusit wyn ye hous ye sort ye army skalit ye hal • omes nixt following admirall departit france ye residew folkꝭ ¶hovv king richard inuadit scotland vvith gret cruelteis gret vassalage done vvyllyam douglas ca v efter ye departyng frā chemen scottis come ane army inglād remanit two monethis syne returnit gret pray men guddis scotland king richard efter returnyng france reuenge thir iniuris done scottis come gret ordinance throw mers louthiane putting baith lādis townis kirkis quhare come vt euersion brint melros driburgh newbotil slew al ye religiꝰ mē yairof al brīt edinburgh ye kirk sāct geil bot ye abbay sauit ye duk lōgcastel lugit ī afore sic thīgis done kīg richard returnit ingland ony dāmage done hym scottis ye nixt ȝeir quhilk fra redemption imiiiclxxxvii deceissit byschop walter warldlaw glasgew cardinall lang efter returning king richard ingland ye duk albany come wt ane army xxxm men ingland army iames erle douglas archebald douglas lord galloway army come sa warly throw watter sulway yat thay come cokirmouth ingland abaid thair thre day inuading cuntre gret cruelteis returnit gret pray guddis scotland amang syndry spulȝeis gottin iornay found ane charter certane landis geuyn ye king ingland vnder thir wordis king athelstane geuis paulane oddam roddam al gud al fair euir thay myne war yairto witnes mald wyfe quhilk charter nocht vnlike ane charter geuin king wyllyam maner followis heir wyllyam kyng thrid ȝeir ring geuis ye normand huntere thow art baith leif dere hop hoptoun boundis vp vnder erd hell aboue erd heuyn fra fra myne ye thyne al fre kingrik myne verify yt yi saith bite ye quhit walx wt tuith meg mald mariory eldest son ane bow ane braid arrow quhen cum hunt apon ȝarrow thir charteris apperis mair faith geuin wordis kingis princis othir pepyll thay dayis ar geuyn ingyne man sekis sa many slichtis new inuentionis na wordis found sufficient strenth sic donationis charteris geuyn oure day last iornay aganis inglismen wyllyam son archebald douglas lord galloway wan gret fame honour aboue mony othir vailȝeant dedis brint ye suberbyllis carlele hauand bot two seruandis cumpany maid sa meruellus slauchter sodiouris thairof kest sindry thaym ouir brig otheris slew quhilkis kepit said brig efter quhen said town segit followit sa feirsly sodiouris quhilkis ischit furth finaly tane presonere foure inglismen wappinnis doung fra hym last quhen brocht within town fellit two thaym neif ye remanent two chasit throw quhilk rescoursit hym self fra ennymes king robert thꝭ maist honorabil vassalage gaif ye said williā doucht gelis mariage quhilk excellit othir wemen bewte said ye king frāce sa inamorit yi virgine yt cōmandit ane paintour cū ī scotland paint hir visage ye quik nochtheles afore ye cūyng paintour scho maryit ye said williā yi wyllyā gat hir ane douchter quhylk marijt eft ye erle orknay ¶hovv robert stevvart vvyllyā douglas gret vassalage ireland hovv iames erle douglas vincust hary perse syngular battall hovv • egit nevv castell ca vi ȝeir following quhilk fra redemption imiiiclxxxviii robert erle fiffe archebald lord galloway entrit ane proude army ingland tyme come syndry ireland men gret buschementtis galloway tuke gret prayis samyn robert stewart 〈…〉 douglas son archebald 〈◊〉 galloway tyll reuenge thair 〈◊〉 went ane army 〈◊〉 segit ane strang town 〈◊〉 carlingfurd cietezanis 〈…〉 na pyssance resist 〈…〉 trewis certane sowmes 〈…〉 mene tyme yai 〈◊〉 ane cūpany viiic men 〈…〉 ane othir town namit 〈◊〉 nochtheles said 〈◊〉 wyllyā faucht sic 〈◊〉 yat thay vincust yair ennimes • efter thay spulȝeit 〈◊〉 carlingfurd thay brint powder syne • uk xv schippis quhilkis war lyand raid chargit thaym guddis toun thair returnyng hame thay spulȝeit ile man nocht lang efter thair returnyng scotland king rychard send ane army scotland army enterit ye mers kest mony gret touris strenthis thairof kyng robert conuenit nobyllis aberdene quhilk concludit rais power ye realme al deligence reuenge thir iniuris done inglismen lang efter ii armyis war rasit first geuin gouernance robert stewart erle fiffe hauand hym ye erle menteith archebald douglas lord galloway alexand lindesay walcop ye nowmer xvm mē pa cu •• bir tothir army geuyn iames erle douglas george erle marche hauand thaym iames lindesay erle crawfurd iohn̄ dunbar erle murray hay constabyll scotland siclyk nowmer afore inuade northumberland thir armyis wrocht sic cruelteis yat nocht hard bot spraichis rūmissing deand pepyll partis quhare thay come maist terribyll flambis bryngand gret townis bigingis vter rewyne last baith yir armyis met togidder new castell efter yat thay past wt swerd fyre throw al boundis northumbirland cumber mene tyme erle douglas chesit xm vailȝeant men sege ye new castel quhilk stā dis apon ye watter tyne began serche deligētly quhat maner mycht maist esaly inuade said town quhilk full pepyll maist part chosyn men northumberland ȝork war ye said town schir hary perse secound son ye erle northūbirland callit ythand priking hary haitspure hary confiding syngulare manheid lang vse armes come furth new castell desyryng fecht erle douglas syngular batttall douglas na thing refusynge desyris glaidly condiscendit fecht ī quhat sort plesit fynaly thir two feits campionis montit thair ba • dit coursouris ran aufully togidder square ground speris deith dowglas wyse circumspect doingis nocht onely sauit hym self fra displeseir ennymes bot strenth singulare mā heid dang perse ye sadyl inglismen quhilk stude afore portis abiding chance fortoun suddanly rescoursit perse brocht hym yair town thus succedit na le honour dowglas dishonoure perse sic thingis done dowglas callit capitanis hym schaw thaym quhat part toun micht maist esaly takyn incontinent army come pertly ledderis wallis fillit ye fowseis gret multitude hay treis nochtheles town sa vailȝeantly defendit cō stranit depart fra ye sege gret slauchter folkis sone efter tuke viage returne scotland ¶hovv inglismen vvar discomfist ottirburn▪ erle doug • slane perse brocht presoner scotland hovv hepburnis tuke thair begynning ca vii erle iames dowglas cumyn town ottirburn ī riddisdale haue returnit scotland quhen suddanly come hym ane bord • rar ane swift gelding schew inglismen war cumand hym arrayit battallis thꝰ war y• scottis gr • ūly effrayit nochtheles ye douglas exhortit thaym remember thair frequent victoryis quhilkis yai vincust sa oft afore thair ennymes prayit thaym feir nocht multitude thair f • is▪ na difficulte vincus thaim quhilkis he bene sa oftymes afore thaym discomfist attour thair ennymes war na yat tyme thay war afore bānokburn quhare xxxm discomfist iiicm fynaly desirit yam haue gud sicht yair manheid vassalage prouyn sa gret felicite ȝeris afore past yat thay may conques sum new recent victory quhilk suld mair apprisit ony auld glore othir victoryis past afore becaus knew al folkis cumpany exercit yame mekyll dayis exhortit euery ane yame hym self schaw thair mā heid virtew sum notabyll vassalage thair ennymes ye tothir syde ha • haitspur capitane inglismē exhortit hꝭ folkꝭ fe • ht defence yair cuntre thair pare • ti child wiffis ••• dids schew thay war sic pissance thay mycht distro • th • • ennimes yair pleseir becaus victory sicker thair handis thair ennymes perturbat best pa forthwart sic curage thair ennymes may vincust yair first iunyng incōtinent sound trumpat baith ye armyis iunit maist fury faucht lang vncertane victory quhil last yai war seuerit fra othir cumyng nycht nochtheles thay abaid risyng ye mone • echt agane new battall al sone thai • fore mone risyn thay iunit agane mair hatrent afore quhen fore bro • scottis war slane inglismen began put ye scottis abak dout thay ansenȝeis douglas put hꝭ army flicht war patrik hepburn son freindis come mair haistely support scottis quhome battallis war renewit quhyll ye armyis war fechtand ī sic cruelte douglas come ane heuy mace mair wecht quantite ony man micht weild thay dayis tuschit amang gret preis ennimes quhare maid sic terribil slauchter thay war finaly put flicht chace continewit gret slauchter inglismē quhil brek ye day battal hary perse brothir rodulphe war takin keith marcheall scotland inglismen war slane vc al noblis mony war takin amang quhom war two perseis robert ogil thomas halbart iohne lilburn willyā wauchlute robert hekon iohne colwell pa • rik louell knichtis mony othir noblis sic multitude yat • akaris war smal nowmer compare gret nowmer presone • • victory succedit scottꝭ 〈…〉 slaucht mony nobyl mē quhen feild cleirly discō fi •• erllis crawfurd marche murray entrit douglas pall • •• quhare returnit ef • er victory fand hym neir deid thryis strikin throw body ane deidis wound heid quhilk geuin hym inglismen efter hewmond boūd weil heid quhē thay saw hym ī sic dolorus array yai fel doun teris murnyng douglas wt sic curage mycht said thaym thir wordis hartly freindis auoid lament dolour ȝour breistis reiose ye present victory quhilk grantit ȝow special fauoure god haue ieoperd lyuis day ye honour yat succedit w yairfore turn ȝour terꝭ dolour ympnis orisonis saule forȝet gud dedꝭ done ȝow howbeit yi mischāce fallin me▪ gif ȝe desire recōpence indeficiēt kindnes sa oft sustenit ȝour weill eis beseik ȝow pray reuthful maist pissant god haue merci saule beseik ȝow cheris virtew manheid defence ȝour realme liberte hald ȝour self sic ꝑpetuall concord yt ȝe may dayly incres honour amite ye terrour fayis skarsly war thir wordis said quhē ouirset dolour randerit saule god wes quhill leuit ane maist vailȝeant campionis yt euir decorit realme maist honoure eft quhais deith sic sorrowful cheir followit army yt nothir ye present victory spulȝeis gret rich falling thaym chance fortoun mycht contene thair ene fra contynewal teris nocht lang efter cū yng robert stewart erle fife dolour howbeit sum part ceissit renewit youcht victory succedit scottis gret murdir inglismen ȝit nane army bot wald haue bene cō tent haue changit lyfe dowglas erle dowglas brocht eft deith melros buryit beside fader erle wyllyam becaus erle iames na airis gottin body archebald lord galloway succedit said erldome said tyme king dauid bruce ane inglisman tane presoner namit hepburn haldyn mony ȝeris scotland none payment rāsoun last quhen ye erle marche dangeir lyfe rage ane insolent vndātit hors yi hepburn come pertly brydyl quhen na othir mā durst refrene hors yus sauit ye erlis lyfe gat certane lādis louthiane quhais posterite growin ī sic pissāce landis surname yt sindry noble knichtis quhilkis ar oure dayis ar discendit ye samyn blud mony noble erllis bothwell na le honour nobilite landis thā ony othir erllis baronis ar realm yat surname he bene mony noble prelatis syngular eruditioun ȝit occurris dayis battall otterburne strikin sanct oswaldis day ye v day august ȝeir god ane miiiclxxxviii ȝeris ¶hovv robert erle fyf vvas maid gouernour scotland hovv alexander bastard son king robert vvas punist tyranny kyng robertis deith ca viii nixt ȝeir ane ꝑliamēt haldin perth quhilk kyng robert schew afore noblis brokin age mycht nocht deuore gouernance realme yair fore consent thre estatis maid robert secund son gouernour scotland eldest son iohn̄ erle carrik gat sic ane strake leg schir iames douglas hors dalkeith mycht nocht trauell throw realme king rychard efter battall otterburn send marcheal ingland wardane fornens scotland hary perse bruthir haldyn presoneris scotland erle first cumyng •• prouit bordouraris inglād misauenture fallyng yame ottirburne said gret schame thaym vincust scottis thay beand ay foure ane last maid gret aith quhare euir fand ony scottis suld geif thaym battall howbeit wa • thay gret nowmer nochtheles oft occurris sic vane ostē tation succedis sendyll grauite honoure end erle nocht lang efter quhen robert gouernour scottis cumyn northumbirland ane smal army tuk flicht quhen herald demandit hym quhy vnmyndfull vote answerit commandit maister ieoperd sa mony lusty vailȝeant men war army sicker auantage robert gouernour efter waistit maist part northumbirland returnit gret pray men guddis scotland ȝeir trewis tane thre ȝerꝭ betuix france ingland scottis gif thay plesit war comprisit within ye said trewis sone efter come ambassatouris king robert direckit fra kyng richard ingland se gif wald stand peace afore contrackit quhom answerit wald gladly stand thairto quhill thir gret materis war dressit scotland alexander stewart erle buchquhan thrid son king robert brint cathedrall kirk murray lantern ornament ye north scotland thay day kyng robert impacient sustene sa gret oppression cruelte done sonne alexander▪ tuk hym efter yat brocht presence put hym strang preson quhare remanit end lyfe ye realme beand maner brocht gud tranquillite king robert lang age brocht gret infirmite deceissit castel dundonald xix day apryle fra redemptioun ane thousand iii hundreth lxxxx ȝeris efter rong xix ȝeris ¶of kyng robert ye thrid ye deith vvilliā douglas lord niddisdale hovv clānis clankais glenquhattanis faucht perth ca ix efter ye deith king robert ye secund sonne iohn̄ erle carrik crownit scone lady day august callit ye assumptioun lordis thocht iohn̄ ane vnchancy name ane king king iohne france wes tane vnhappely poyteris afore rehersit yairfore thay callit hym robert efter hꝭ fader thꝭ tyme williā douglas niddisdale chosyn ye lordis sprus admirall pa iic xl schippis aganis turki sa far wyllyam estemit afore ye said lordis inuijt gretū ly lord clifford inglisman th • irfore ye said clifford appelit singulare battall nochtheles afore cumyng day clifford sa affrayit lay wait gret buschementis mē finaly slew said douglas ye brig danskin deith ceissit gret vassalage micht haue bene done aganis turki nocht lang efter coronation robert thrid tithingis come yat duncane stewart son alexander ye kingis bruthir afore rehersit cumyn angus gret buschementis men slew walter ogiluy sonnis freindis defence cuntre bot attemptatis war nocht lang vnpunist tane erle crawfurd complicis punist thair conspiration tyme mekyl north scotland heuely trublit two clannis irsmen namit clankayis glenquhattanis inuading cuntre thair wetis ythand slauchter reif last appointit betuix heidis men thir two clannis auyse erlis murray crawfurd xxx • rincipall men ta clan sal cum othir xxx tothir clan arrayit thair best auise sall conuene afore king perth decision al pleis fecht scharp swerdis deith ony harnes clan quhare ye victory succedit haue perpetuall empire aboue ye tothir baith thir clannis glaid condition come north inche beside perth iugis se • scaffaldis discus ye verite ane thir clannis wantit ane man perfurnis furth ye nowmer wagit ane carll money debait thair actioun▪ howbeit man pertenit na thyng thaym blud kindnes thir two clannis stude arrayit gret hatrent aganis othir sound trumpet ruschit togidder takand na respect thair woundis sa thay micht distroy thai • ennymes faucht maner lang vncertane victory quhen ane fel ane othir put rowme last ye clankayis war al slane except ane swam throw watter tay glenquhattannis left xi personis lyue bot ya • war sa hurt thay mycht nocht hald thair swerdis thair handis▪ debait fra ye incarnation ane miiiclxxxxvi ȝeris ¶hovv king robert maid son duke rothesay bruthir duke albany gret vassalage done 〈◊〉 ye erl • cravvfurd ca x thrid ȝeir efter ane parliament haldyn perth quhai • king robert thrid efter mony constitutionis 〈◊〉 common weil maid dauid eldest son hauand xviii ȝeris age duk rothesay robert brothir quhilk wes gouernour erle menteith fiffe duk albany thir wer first dukis wer scotland duryng peace betuix inglismen scottis frequent cumpanyis wer inglismen scotland siclik scottis ī inglād throw quhilk oftymes mony honorabil tornamentis wer betuix scottis inglis defence thair honouris glore armes amang quhō wes litil apprisit ye honorabill victorie gottin dauid erle crawfurd brig londoun aganis lord wellis maner lord wellis wes sēd ambassatour scotland concerning certane hie materis betuix ye two kyngis inglis scottis quhen wes ane solempne banket quhare scottis men inglis wer cōmonyng dedis armes lord wellis said lat wourdis haue na place gyf ȝe knaw nocht ye cheuelry vailȝeant dedis inglismen assailȝe day place quhen ȝe list ȝe sall sone haue experience yan said dauid erle crawfurd wil assailȝe incontinent cōsent athir parteis day place wes assignit lord wellis chesit brig londoun place erle dauid chesit sanct georgis day reason wes sum tyme ane vailȝeāt knycht yus deꝑtit lord wellis towart london afore day erle dauid come xxx personis weil acoutterit london al sone day battall wes cumyn baith ye partyis wer cōuoyit ye brig sone eftir soūd trūpat ye two partyis ran haistelie togidd yair vardit cursou • ꝭ square groundin speris ye deith erle dauid nochtwithstanding violent dynt speris brokin hewmont visage sat stranglie yt pepill mouit vane suspitioun cryit erle dauid contrar ye lawis army wes bound sadil erle dauid herād murmour demontit hors ony support ascendit agane sadyll incontinent yai ruschit togidder new speris ye secound tyme birnād ire conques honoure bot thrid rynk lord wellis wes doung ye sadyll sic violence yat fell ye ground gret displeseir inglismē erle dauid seing hym fall demontit haistelye fra hors tenderly embrasit yat ye pepill mycht vnderstād faucht na hatrent bot allanerlie ye glore victorie signe humanite vesyit hym ilk day quhill recouerit heill mony othir contentionis wes tyme betuix inglismen scottis ilk man contending decore awin nation maist louing lang eftir erle dauid maid ane solempne banket quhair mony noblis ingland wer present ye tyme nocht ceissing thair custome loyf maist yame self last quhen ye herald ingland blasonit erle dauid ane vailȝeant nobil knycht ane inglisman mouit inuy said meruel yocht scottis nobill vailȝeant yai wer gottin nobil eldaris quhen yair faderis wer banist yair realme neir conquest yan said erle dauid meruell youcht inglismē febill degenerat yai wer gottin cukis freiris ingland quhen gret nobillis yairof gat w scotland sic humaniteis kyndnes continewing betuix inglis scottis erle dauid returnit scotland mony nobillis ingland becaus vincust lord wellis apon sāct georgis day foūdit vii preistis sing lady kirk dunde ye honour sanct george ¶hovv schir robert morlo vvas vincust hevv trail hovv hary duke longcastell conquest croun ingland depriuit king richard ca xi nocht lang eftir schir robert morlo inglisman come scotland • eddy f • cht aganis ony man wald assailȝe hym singulare battall vincust archebald edmonstoun hew wallace bot last wes vincust hew traill berwik deceissit displeseir sindry othir tornamentis wer ye samyn ȝeir betuix inglismen scottis variant chance fortoun ye samyn ȝeir kīg richard ingland maryit isabell doucht charlis vi name king france becaus scho bot xi ȝeris age mycht nocht sustene ye det mariage kīg richard went auise noblis dant ye rebellion ireland purpos remane ye samyn quhil wif war cumyn ꝑfection sone eft hꝭ derparting ireland erllis derby northūbirland mony othir noblis ingland cōspirit put fra ye croun kyng richard herand ꝯspiration maid aganis hym come ireland walis send writtingis freindis cum haistely hym yt mycht recouer realme punis ye rebellion noblis ye principal lordis quhilkis cōspirit aganis hī send thair writtingis desiring reconsalit hī promittit gif wald remit yair offēce resaue maist honour bot neuir rebell aganis hym tymes cūyng kyng richard giffand yame credit maner come walis hꝭ returnyng london wes tane lordis nochtwithstanding yair promes put captiuite quhill renuncit rycht croun ingland wes adiugit perpetual preson eftir lang truble gat furth preson vnder habit ane woman come galloway quhare maid seruice ane scot namit makdonald last wes knawin brocht king robert thrid quhom wes tretit gret reuerence king richard knawing hym self deieckit fra rial estait gaif hail cō templation quhill last deceissit striueling wes buryit blak freris thairof eftir expulsioun hary ye fourt yat name son iohne gant duk longcastell wes crounyt westmonister ye xiii day october ye ȝeir god imiiiclxxxxix nocht lang eftir isabel king richardis wife hauād bot xii ȝeris ī age returnit paris efter ye scho redemit hir fader gret ransoun said ane remit come king hary eft coronation monest hym auctorite god restore ye iust heritour croun pronosticat▪ gif war rebel land thairto gret vengeance calamite suld fall hous king hary dredand yt heremitis wordis suld moue ye pepyll conspiration aganis hī gart put heremit hastely deith yi heremit schew sa followit gret slaucht trubyl succedit cōtinewally betuix ye airꝭ king richard ye hous lōgcastel quhill last hary ye vii ye name marijt ye douchter edward ye iiii iust heritour ye croun ingland baith thir housis war recoūsali • othir ony cōtētion following ¶hovv mariage betuix duk rothesay erle marchis douchter vvas dissoluit trubyll come thairthrovv ca xii ye nixt ȝeir quhilk wes imiiiic fra saluatioun kyng robert wed • son ye duk rothesay ye erle marchis douchter archebald erle douglas hauand indignation yat ye erle marche suld preferrit hym maryit doucht meriory ye said duke auise robert duk albany erle marche afore ye mariage wes completit went ye kyng inquire gif wald stand first contract becaus gat na plesand answer maid ane vow reuenge contemption done hym al displeseir mycht sone eftir went ingland left house dunbar weil stuffit keiping sister son robert maitland archebald erle douglas eftir departyng come dunbar desirit samyn randerit hym scharp writtingis kyngis yi robert maitland wes sa astonist ye kingis writtingis yt randerit ye hous ye douglas george erle marche knawing ye hous tane fra hym ye douglas brocht freindis ingland determit maist ennymy scotland inuaid displeseir king robert dreidand trubl • returne rebellion send ane herald desiring hym writtingis returne scotland haif al iniuris reparit pleseir becaus ye said george refusit return scotland quhill done sum hie displeseir ye erle douglas king robert send writtingꝭ king hary ingland desiryng hym gif wald intertene peace scottꝭ put george dunbar boundis inglād suffir na rebellis scotlād haif resset realme kyng hary denyit yir honest petitionis kīg robert yus wes ye peace dissoluit betuix scottis inglis sone eftir hary haitspur said erle marche tuke gret pray guddis scotland nocheles afore thair returnyng berwik archebald erle douglas recouerit ye samyn come edinburgh quhare sone eft deceissit hait feuir archebald wes ane nobil man singulare mā heid virtew hauand preistis religious men gret reuerence foundit ye colleige bothwell nunreis lynclowden quhilk wes eftir changit ane colleige preistis▪ becaus nunnis thairof wer euill lyfe eftir deith archebald erle douglas secound son archebald wes maid erle douglas eldest son william deceissit ȝeir afore hovv king hary come scotlād vvith gret army▪ deith ye duk rothesay▪ hovv scottis • ar discōfist nesbet ye erle marche ca xiii sschort tyme eftir kyng hary come scotland ane army howbeit smal iniuris pepil yairof desyrit nocht bot baner ereckit yair wallis alwayis wes ane plesand ennyme gret humaniteis ye pepil al placis scotland quhair wes lugit finalie schew ye lordis scotland yt come thair realme coūsall noblis ony hatrent yat bure scottis sone eftir returnit ony ferther iniure ingland nixt ȝeir quhilk wes fra redemption imiiiic deceissit walter trail bischop sanct audrois samyn ȝeir deceissit quene annabell drōmond quhais deith succedit gret displeseir hir son dauid duk rothesay buryng hir lyfe wes haldin virtews honest occupatioun eftir hir deith began rage maner insolence fulȝeit virginis matronis nunnis vnbridillit lust last kyng robert informit ȝoung insolent maneris send letteris brothir duke albany intertene said son ye duk rothesay leir hym honest ciuill maneris duk albany glaid yir writingis tuk duk rothesay betuix dūde sanct androis brocht hym falkland inclusit ye tour yair ony meit drink said ane woman hauand cōmiseratioun duk l • meill fall doun throw ye loftis ye toure quhilkis lyfe wes certane • ayis • auit yi womā fra wes knawin wes put deith ye maner ane othir woman gaif hym mylk hir paup throw ane lang reid wes slane gret cruelte fra wes knawin yan wes duke destitute mortall supplie brocht finalie sa miserable hungry appetite yat • nocht allanerlie filth toure quhare wes bot awin fingaris gret marterdome body wes beryit lū doris kythit miraklis mony ȝerꝭ eftir quhil last kyng iames first began punis hꝭ slayaris fra ye tyme furth ye miraclis ceissit ye samyn tyme george erle marche reuenge ye cōtemptioun done erle douglas come ye erle northūbirland scotlād ane gret pray men guddis ye samyn reuenge yir attemptatis ye erle douglas come ane army northumbirland waistit ye cuntre gret displeseiris al sone wes returnit patrik hepburn went ingland litill le dāmage douglas army afore youcht wes counsalit freindis depart hame becaus inglismen wer cūand hym multitude peple yan mycht resist ȝit refusit finalie faucht sic manheid aganis inglismen yat apperit haif ye victorie incontinent george dunbar eldest son erle marche come ane hundreth speris put folkis flycht battall wes slane patrik hepburn ye halis mony gentyll men hous sindry wer takin iohne william cokburne robert lawder ye ba iohne thomas haliburtoun yi battall wes strikin nesbet ye mers ye xxii day iuni • fra redemptioun imiiiic • wa ȝeris ¶hovv ye scottis vvar discōfist hō mildoun hovv hary haitspur thomas perse brothir vvas slane schrevvisbery ye erle douglas tane ca xiiii nisbet discomfist wyse followit ane othir discomfitour displesand archebald erle douglas maich kyng robert rycht desyrus reuenge yir iniuris done inglismen come xm men ye new castell brint heryit ye cuntre al partis quhare come army wes mordok eldest son duk robert erle fiffe thomas erle murray george erle angus w mony othir noblis scotland last quhen yai wer returnand hame infinite pray rich guddis met thaym hary haitspure george erle marche trublit yame sa di • arrowis yt yai war put flicht nochtheles hortation adā gordoun schir iohn̄ swintoun yai renewit battal faucht lytyll mair felicite thā afore yai war al slane tane vnhappy battall war slane schir iohn̄ swintoun adam gordon iohn̄ leuinstoun callēdar alexand ramsay dalhousy sindry othir gentylmen nobillis scotlād archebald erle douglas mordo stewart eldest son duke robert george erle angus robert erskin alloway ye lord saltoun iames douglas maister dalkeith ii brethir iohn̄ williā mony al ye baronis fife louthiane war tane hary haitspur proude yi victory come victorius army throw louthiane mers purpos subdew ye samyn ye empire inglād pissance ye erle marche come teuidale segit ye castel cokclauis bot sa vailȝeantly defendit iohn̄ greinlay yt cōstranit depart yairfra efter yt said iohn̄ greinlay geuyn plegis gif gat na rescours within ii monethis rand ye hous yi battal hōmildon strikin ye rude day heruist fra ye incarnaton imiiiiciii ȝeris efter ye deꝑting inglismen iohn̄ gled stanis went duk robert gouernor schawing ye castel cōdicionat rāderit without gat support agane ye terme affixit mony ye noblis quhen yai cōuenit yi effect thocht better tyne ye castell cok • lauis thā ieoperd ye pepyl defence yairof yai war brokin ye werꝭ afore rehersit yus ye castel bene left desert war gouernour declarit pa propir ꝑson ye rescours yairof howbeit • ane ye noblis wald follow hym ye mene time rais sic displeseir betuix king hary ingland hary haitspur yt necessar sēd ony support ī rescours ye said castell hary haitspur fenȝeand pa aganis ye scottis rasit ane army support ye duk ȝork ye erle stanefurd hauād hym cūpany ye erle douglas quhilk tane afore hōmildoun mony freindis support aganis king hary vnd yi cōdition gif ye king ingland discōfist put fra ye croun ye said erle douglas suld ranson fre haue berwik rāderit reward assistence king hary knawing yair rebellion come arrayit battall schrewisbery quhare ye perse assēblit ye tyme quhen ye battallis war reddy iune yai war seuerit interuention george erle marche efter ye king hary sworn exoner hym ye croun ingland gif sic thingis war acceptable noblis erar sa gret effusion blud suld maid defalt perse geuand ferme credit yir wordꝭ sufferit army skaill yair logynnis ye nicht yt yai micht ye better furnist vittallis al sone yai war skailit ye king set yam wt arrayit battallis slew said hary perse thomas perse brothir mony othir noblis heidismen yair factioun ye erle douglas quhilk assistit ye said hary perse ꝯdition afore rehersit faucht yt day incredible māheid slew iii mē array ye kingis coit armour ingland quhē saw ye fourt cū ye samyn array meruellit quhat way sa mony kingis war cūyn aganis hym▪ last quhen ye feild dyscomfist takyn nane cumpany saiffit bot hym self knawin ane maist vailȝeant knychtis 〈◊〉 albion yi erle namit archebald tyne mā wan neuir feild yt howbeit faucht ay gret māheid▪ tint ane ene battal hōmildon yi feild tynt ane stanis last quhen brocht ye supper ye quenis tabyll ingland efter ye mony lordis ingland war menand yair heuy woūdis gottin ī yi last battal said yai sit full styl yt he ane reuyn breik yocht ye victory succedit kīg hary ȝit gret slauchter best capitanis bot mair nowmer war slane cōtrapart hary perse erle northūbirland knawing baith sonnis slane ī yi last battal schrew • • ery traistit na felicite abyde ingland come scotland hꝭ nepot ressauit hary wardlaw bischop sanct androis ¶hovv iames secund son king robert vvas tane inglismā ye tēnour ye letteris send vvith hym ca xv king robert aduertist yt son ye duk rothesay deceissit gret martyrdome ye tour falkland throw hꝭ deith grew ilk day ī gret sorow malācoly last send hꝭ brothir robert duk albany accusit ye treasonble slauchter ye duk rothesay hꝭ son▪ duk robert mony vane reasonis schew hym innocēt ye duk rothesay slauchter ꝓmittit gif ye king wald pa edinburgh deliuer ye līmaris boūd hād • quhilkꝭ war occasion hꝭ sōnis deith ye king richt desirus reuenge sonnis deith come bute ī ane cheriot edinburgh ī ye mene tyme duk robert deliuerit hā dis certane līmaris 〈◊〉 punist ye slauchter ye said duk howbeit yai neuir saw hym yair dayis yoch • yi • līmaris war accusit punist ye deith ȝit ye duk haldin ay suspition ye kīg semit vsurpe ye croun quhē al kingis sōnis war slane yairfore kīg robert besocht god send vengeāce ye said robertis posterite al otherꝭ quhilkis war occasion son ye duk rothesayis deith▪ king robert eft hꝭ returnyng bute send secūd son iames prince scotlād wal • wardlaw bischop sanct androis ye son hary haitspur quhilk nepot ye erle northūbirlād equale age ye said iames ye bischop sanct androis knawyng duk robert set vter besynes cōques ye croun send secreit writingꝭ ye kīg schew richt difficil dangerus kepe son ī scotlād cōsidering ye gouernour al ye realm vnd obesance thꝰ cō cludit ye kīg send son othir frāce ingland quhare mycht eschew al treason deuisit aganis hym sone efter ane schip prouidit necessaris tender supplicationis direckit baith king france ingland ressaue hym vnder thair • arge protectioun beneuolence gyf happinni • hym ariue within ony thair realmes hary lord sinclare ye secūd erle orknay chosyn yi besines pullit vp salis ye ba hauād ye said iames ye ȝoūg perse mony othir noblis gentilmē scotland ī cūpany yi iames richt wery vncouth aire corruption seys desirit refresche hym land takin al cumpany maner otheris writis takin flamburgh held apon seys inglismen quhilkis war aduertist treason certane scottis passage france treuth takyn ix ȝeir age xxxday marche fra redemption ane miiiiciiii ȝeris haldin captiuite inglismen xviii ȝeris efter taking p̄sentit yir supplicatiōis quhilkis war direckit fra fader kīg robert king hary quhais rēnour efter followis robert king scottis hary king ingland greting thy gret magnificence humilite iustice ar richt patent w gouernance thy last army ī scotland howbeit sic thingis bene vncertane w afore youcht thow semit ennyme maist auful incursionis ī realm ȝit fād mair hūaniteis pleseitꝭ dāmage thy cumyng subdittis specially yame ye ressauit thy nobyl fader ye duk longcastel ye tyme exile scotlād may ceis yairfore quhil ar life bot ay luif loif yt maist nobyl worthy prince iois yi realme yocht realmes nationis cōtend amang yame self cōques glore landis ȝit na occasion amang w inuade athir realmes liegis iniuris bot erar contend amang self quhay sall persew othir maist humanite kindnes w wyll mei occasion battal quhare ony occurris thy pleseir forthir becaus haue na le sollicitude preseruing child fra certane deidly ennymes sum tyme thy nobyl fader ar • stranit seke support vncouth princis howbeit ye inuasion ennymes sa gret smal • fence occurris aganis yame without thay preseruit amite nobyll men warld sa full peruersit malyce na cruelte offence may deuysit erd▪ bot ye samyn may wrocht motion gold syluer heirfore becaus knaw thy hienes ful mony nobyl virtewis sic pissance rich yt na prince day may cōpair yairto desyre yi humanyte support thꝭ time▪ traist vnknawin yi maieste eldest son dauid slane miserabylly preson brothir ye duk albany quhome chesit gouernoure quhen war fallyn decrepit age subdittis realme besekand thy hienes thairfore sa fauorable berar iames secund allanerly sonne may haue targe leif vnder thy faith iustyce sum memory oure posterite knawand vnstabyl conditioun mannis lyfe sa suddan • alterit flurisand suddanly falling vter consumption forthir beleif weill quhen kyngis princis he na othir beild bot yair awin folkis thair empire caduke fragyll mynd commoun pepyll ar euir flowand mair inconstant wynd ȝit quhen princis ar roborat amite othir vncouth kyngis thair br • thir nychtbouris na aduersite may occurre eiect thaym fra thair dignite riall forthir gif thy hyenes think nocht expedient god forbeid obtemper thir desyris ¶ȝit request ane thyng quhilk ratifijt oure last trewis conditioun peace supplicatioun maid ony two kyngis ingland scotland sall stand maner saifcondict berar thus desyre obseruat oure allanerly sonne gratious god conserue maist nobyll prynce ¶of ye gret lamentation maid king robert thrid takyng son deith ca xvi quhen thir letteris war red kyng hary callit lordis ane counsall auyse quhat done mater sum yame irkit lang weris mouit commiseration aduersite fallyng king robert said best obtemper desirꝭ son cū beneuolence seke refuge aganis ennymes otheris war far discrepant fra ye purpos sayng iames wes takin ī tyme weir fader king robert inuadyng inglismen cō tinewal weris bot ressetting yair ennymes realme alliegit ye syndry scottꝭ come support hary haitspure othir conspiratouris ye last battal schrewisbery thus concludit kepe said iames lauchfull presoner ȝit beneuolence kīg hary war chosin sa wise expert preceptouris instruk hym virtew science yt na le resolute ī euery sciēce bene perpetually occupyit bot ane weil lernit fecht swerd iust turnay worsyll syng dance ane expert medicinar richt crafty playing baith lute harp sindry othir instrumentis musik expert gramer oratry poetry maid sa flowand sententious versis yat apperit weil ane naturall borne poete al ane cunnyng theolog lernit science ye tyme captiuite ha • dyn ye said tyme gret admiration pepyl singuler virtew thꝰ succedit captiuite hꝭ gret proffet honoure kyng robert herand son tane yi maner inglismen maid ane heuy lamentation said maryit othir anciant kingis progenitouris scotlād afore nobyl princis kingis honest nationis bene lichtlit contempnit liegis eldest son slane ye tothir chasit ye cuatre falt freindis tane ennymes yi may exampyl al kingꝭ efter succeding neui • degrade thair maieste blud riall lawar blud thā thaym self ye way yai salbe lichtlit cōtempnit yair awin subdittis na estimation amang vncouth princis king robert tuk sic malancoly ye taking son inglismē yi maner yat deceissit sone efter ye xvi ȝeir regne fra ye incarnation imiiiicvi ȝerꝭ buryit paslay quene annabell afore rehersit king robert ane mā gret stature richt lyberall gratious werkis▪ howbeit mēȝeit ane straik ane hors haue schawin richt feruent deuotion sa mercyful ye pepyl yt wald suffer na iniurꝭ done aganis yame punitioun gyf mycht haue past throw cuntre impediment feit ye realme suld haue bene gouernit wt na le felicite dayis thā ony othir princis tyme afore duk robert eft deith wes chosin new election gouernour gi • ye realme efter ye kingis deith better iustice afore ye mene tyme ye castel iedburgh wes tane men teuydale ca • n ye ground archebald erl • douglas herand kyng robert deceissit maid ane way redemption returnit ī scotland lang efter ane coūsal set restore george erle march • honour laudis efter lang disputation concludit yat suld want ane part landis namit annerdale lochmaben ye said lādis pa vnder perpetuall dominion ye douglas thir cō ditionis erle marche restorit landis peace ¶hovv vniuersite sanct andros tuk begynnyng hovv gret virtevv police vvas brocht scotland king iames first hovv gret skaith fallis realm promotion vicius prelatis ca xvii tyme rais gret trubil scotland donald ilis willyam erle ro sonne hew ro quhilk slane afore halidoun hyll two douchteris quhilkꝭ eldest geuyn mariage walter lesly wt ye erledome ro gat hir ane son namit alexander ane douchter quhilk efter maryit donald ilis alexander succedit erledome ro efter ye deith fader walter marijt ane douchter namyt eufamia quhylk heritour ye erledome ro duke albany persuadit effem quhen scho ȝoung ony experience resing ye said erledome handis vnder condition gi • scho deceissit without airis hir body said erledome sall cum secound son iohn̄ erle buchquhan gif ye said iohne deceissit airis male gottin body brothir robert sal succeid failȝeing airis male ye maner erledome ro sal cum croun thir thingis done gret slicht effem deceissit industry beleuit duke robert yat erledome suld cum son way iohne duke robertis secound son quhilk erle buchquhan afore maid erle ro left bot ane douchter behynd hym quhilk maryit wyllyam seytoun knicht thir causis ye seytonis clamit ye lordschip buchquhan donald ilis herand wiffis ant deceissit come duke robert desiring ye landis ro geuyn hym nerrest lauchfull heritour yairto nochthels gat bot repuls thairfore come power ye ilis subdewit ro opinion nocht cōtent thir boū dis come throw murray bogheual syndry othir boundis lyand thair syne come garioch birne abirdene punis thir attemptatis come alexander stewart erle marre faucht aganis ye said donald harlaw quhair gret slauchter maid sydis battall ixc hyeland men war slane makclane makinthos principal capitanis vnder donald ilis erle marri syde war slane alexander ogiluy seref angꝰ iames skrimgeour constabyl dunde alexander irrewyn drū robert mald panmure thomas murray wyllyam abirnethy saltoun alexander straitoun lourestoun robert dauidstoun prouest abirdene knichtis mony othir yi battall strikin sanct iames euyn ye ȝeir god imiiiicxi ȝeris donald efter discomfitoure fled gret deligence ilis nochtheles duke robert ꝑsewit said donald scharply yat come wyl efter yt sworn neuir inuade ye realme mair trubyll nocht lang efter yi battal patrik dunbar secound sonne ye erle marche wan fast castell tuke thomas haldane capitane thairof presoner tyme ye brig roxburgh brokin wyllyā douglas drumlanerik toun roxburgh brint ylk ȝeir began ye vniuersite sanct andros mony excellent noble clerkis war brocht syndry cuntreis preceptouris followit gret confluence ȝoung pepyl al partis scotland desire letteris throw gret exercition virtew quhilk began spreid fast cuntr • • pecially cumyng hame kyng iames first scotland • noble prince sa ful 〈◊〉 yt held al men science ī gret •• uerence geuand perpetual 〈◊〉 caus pepyll incres 〈◊〉 craftis virtew bring 〈◊〉 self honour glore thair 〈◊〉 yt c • etezanis suld 〈◊〉 plesand honest craftis 〈◊〉 thair ydill rude maneris 〈◊〉 quhilkis war afore accusto ••• first returnyng scotl •• 〈◊〉 thocht na thyng sa gud 〈…〉 expart clerkis 〈…〉 realmes decore hꝭ 〈◊〉 weill brocht scotland 〈◊〉 doctouris theology viii • • cou • decreis mony othir expert men al science promouit thaym syndry prelacyis attour nane tyme yat ony syngular virtew cūnyng bot sufficiently promouit sum leuyng • e hym na man promouit bischoprikis dayis war syngular erudition science gret felicite succedit scottis dayis ye prouerbe sayis happy ar ye pepyll yt he ane philosophoure thair kyng bot allace far oure tyme different fra yai dayis beleue nane he sic eloquence fouth langage yt may sufficiently deplore ye gret displesouris yat fallis w laik letteris virtew princis thay dayis quhen maist graue personis maist erudition virtew war socht al partis cumpany ye princis nuris thaym virtew princely maneris ar chosyn nane effect bot thay y• ar maist ygnorāt mischeuous lymmaris hauād nane othir ingyne bot nuris princis vice insolence trow quhilk na le infelicite he fallen ye princis ye realme ye pepyl thairof nane rasit dignite office honour benifice bot maist vnhappy auaritious pepyll void virtew gud maneris sa gret ennymes men letteris yat thay may suffer yame rise proffit dignite honouris appetādly yai wald na virtew suld spreid cuntre bot pepyll ay thair ignorance abusit auenture gif ye pepil war brocht perfite knawlege yat thay suld othir constrane thir prelatis amend thair lyuis elli spulȝe thaym pray gudis ya • swelly ī thair corruppit vsis la • thaym amend sic faltis he charge yairof howbeit na thing mouis w bot cōmiseratioun piete detest thair vicis ¶hovv erllis buchquhan vvigtoun vvent vvith gret armyis support france deith duke robert ca xviii ylk tyme iohne drummond slew treasonabilly patrik graham erle strathern nocht withstandyng assurance tane betuix thaym nobyllis maid sic diligence drummond fynaly takin punist said cryme nocht lang efter rais gret weris betuix charlis vi kyng france hary ye v king ingland kyng charlis held syndry landis frāce fra king hary howbeit thay pertenit hym iust heritage last king hary lang sege wan town hunflew syne proude baner come throw picardy waistit boundis thairof quhill come blainge quhen returnyng ingland come hym syndry princis gaif hym battall nochtheles yai war al slane thair army discomfist mene tyme kyng hary aduertist gret rebellioun maid aganis hym walis throw quhilk constranit nocht withstanding yi victory return ingland efter cumyng met hym prince walis mony gret princis inglād opinion gaif hym battall put kyng hary flicht kyng hary withstanding discomfitour come agane new army walis brocht thaym last irrecouerabyll subiection quhil sic thingis war done ingland wyllyā halyburtoun wan ye castel werk slew al ꝑsonis found howbeit succedit sone efter gret infelicite syndry inglismen knew secretis ye place clam vp throw ane scheild brak wall sic maner yai maid ane quiet passage thair fallowis thꝰ castel tane inglismen scottis foūdin slane tyme ane gret sisme kirk thre papis creat atanis repair thir arrouris followit coūsall constantine quhilk thir thre papis war eieckit ye fourt creat said counsall ye ȝeir fra redemption imiiiicxix thrid day september deceissit robert duke albany quhilk gouernour scotland xv ȝeris efter deith king robert ye thrid ane vailȝeant noble prince dayis king charlis tyme send scotland erle uandoun chancellar france geit support scottis aganis ingland promittit gret wagis landis officis tyl scottis wald cum defence realme sone efter iohn̄ stewart erle buchquhan secund son duk robert archebald douglas erle wigtoun past france viim armit mē war tenderly ressauit king charlis ordinance scottis cumand said france maid king hary ingland richt cōmouit thairfore caus said ordinance depart france gart ye nois rumour pa throw boundis realme cum haistely ane army scottis feir thir nouellis scottis lay al nixt symer bordouris ab • dand cumyng army ye mene tyme kyng hary past normandy opprest ye inhabitantis thairof gret iniuris subdewit town roan empire last quhen cumyn maist triumphe victory abyll haue gottin haill dominioun france vincust ane lady gaif besynes fra cheuelry lust amouris way king hary put end weris tuke katrine douchter charlis vi name kyng france mariage vnder thir conditionis gif king charlis deceissit afore kīg hary said king hary sall succeid crown france gif hary deceissit first leuād behynd hym ane sonne gottin said king charlis douchter son sall succeid crown france efter ye deith king charlis quhilk cōditioun king charlis son spulȝeit richt yt ye croun france king charlis regne allanerly life peace schort tyme indurit thairfore said erllis buchquhan wigtoun thair ordinance war ye mair plesandly tretit ye king dalphine france gat toun casteltoun castell thairof remane tyll quhill thay schawin sum honest vassalage ☞hovv duke clarence vvas slane vvith mony othir lordis inglād bauge deith king hary kyng charlis ca xix war ye erllis buchquhan wigtoun aduertist yat thomas duk clarence cumyng xm men sege ye toun castell bauge othir syndry landis orleance quhilk pertenit dalphyne france erle buchquhan knawing ye subtell slichtes inglismen send cousyn schir iohne stewart dernely knycht spy thair army bot sone efter chasit scottis schew duke cumand al ordinance arrayit battall thaym scottis incontinent went harnes met ye duk clarence ane plane beside said toun quhare baith ye armyis ruschit togidder maist fury ye first • unyng thomas duke clarence hurt face ane speir knycht swintoun efter slane erle buchquhan resydew inglismen astonist slauchter duke clarence othir gret princis • yair land gaif bakkis scottis • eissit fra cōtinewal chace inglismē quhil far run within ye nicht battall war slane ye duke clarence ye erle reiddisdale lord ro lord gray mony othir gret baronis ye nowmer xvic yame war takin erle huntingtoun ye erle somerside brothir quhilkis war brethir kīg iames ye firstis wyfe battal strikin pasche euin fra redēptioun imiiiicxxi ȝeris dalphyne france glaid victory gaif syndry lādis ye erle buchquhan maid hym cōstable france king hary mouit gret ire slaucht brothir ye duk clarence come ane new army france hym iames prince scotland traisting draw ye scottis france auctorite dalphyne france rais ylk day mair pissance honour vassalage syndry chosyn campionis scotland▪ king hary schort tyme efter send said prince cum counsall quhare auising noblis quhat ingyne slichtis mycht best inuade ennymes ¶king hary ye cumyng said iames began schaw quhat displesei • bene done hym scottis baith ingland france efter yat schawin mony humaniteis done hym fader king robert desirit ye said iames pa scottis france cōmand yame name returne scotland king hary ꝓmittit gif said iames brocht yi mater gud effect remit hꝭ ransoun bot send hym scotland gret rich honour yir wordis answerit iames sa far thow noble prince he schawin wyll schaw ony humanyteis towart sall laubour sa far ye pleseir effering yairto▪ nochtheles mater quhilk thow desiris labour▪ meruel nocht lityll yat thow cōsideris nocht haue na power aboue ye scottis sa lang ane priuat man haldin captiuite nochtheles wer put liberte scottis maid lawchfull subdittis wald glaidlie laubour materis thy pleseir al sone said thir wordis departit fra ye counsall yan said kyng hary maist happy peple sall thay yat happinnis get ȝon nobil man yair prince mony ieoperdeis frequent skarmussing wer maid yi ȝeir betuix ye dalphyne france inglismen ye inglismen tyme normandy gasconȝe vnder thair empire bure sic hatrent aganis ye scottis yat yai slew yame quhare yai wer tane maist schamefull deid howbeit thay vsit sic cruelteis othir pepill quhen kyng hary distroyit sindry boundis bryane gret heirschippis slaucht inuadit ye landis kirk sanct fyacre vengeance god wes strikin sic infirmite na ingyne man mycht cure hym last quhen demandit ye medicinarꝭ quhat maledy yi bene falling hym sa haistely thay said wes ye maledy sanct fiacre quhilk wes sumtyme ane scot discendit nobill blude thairof yan said kyng hary se nocht bot scottis born perditioun w quhilkis ar aye sa gret ennymes w leiffand deid hame feild thay persew w na le hatrent quhen thay ar eikit amang noumer sanctis quhen yai wer present life kyng hary seing hꝭ infirmite incres ilk day causit hym brocht cornwel quhare miserabilly deceissit wes brocht ane cape leid ingland buryit amang ye sepulturis othir kyngis ¶at tyme charlis ye vi kyng france deceissit eftir quhom succedit charlis ye vii yat name quhais deith ye gret feruour weris began cule betuix inglismen scottis cause erlis buchquhan wigtoun returnit scotlād sone eftir thair returnyng yai come ane army berwik lay lang sege thairof ony werkis worthy haue memory thairfore iurnay wes callit dirtin raid ☞ hovv ambassatouris vvar send ingland redemptioun iames first hovv franchemen scottis vvar discomfist vvernoll gret vassalage done madin france ca xx eftir deith duk robert son mordo stewart erle fiffe menteith wes maid gouernour iosit said office foure ȝeris howbeit wes rycht vnganand thairto nocht sic wisdome manheid fader duke robert afore hym wes ane soft prince ony fortitude aduersite temporance prosperite sū tyme apperit febill yat na consolatioun mycht rais hym esperance bett fortoun sum tyme wes ouir seuere cruell executioun iustice ye mater requirit necligent chastifying sonnis walter alexander yai finalie conspirit aganis vncertane quhidder ye ꝓcedit softnes mynd far yat couth nocht punys ye iniquiteis sonnis feruent luf affection yame gif thair faltis wer gret yai deseruit punition thā micht vse yame thay wer delatit sindry oppressionis pepil yi walter incurrit extreme indignation fader ane falcon quhilk slew cōtemptioun fader becaus fader wald gif hym said falcon pleseir slew halk apon hꝭ faderis hand duk mordo mouit yi gret cōtemptioun said walter sen thow thy brothir rewlit soft empire sall bring hym hame sal chaistifie ȝow baith sone eftir cōuenit noblis ane counsall desirit thaym send ambassatouris ingland redemptioun iames first y• name mycht return scotland ressaue ye gouernance yair oftymes gret feliciteis cumis contentioun vnhappy parteis inuadyng othir athir iniuris
