happinnit tyme yi haisty debait rising betuix duk mordo sonnis wer nocht thair contentioun iames first neuir cumyn scotland quhilk bene rycht dāmageus realme bot returne historie erle buchquhan cōstable france beleuit litill proffet pleseir fall ye hame cumyng iames first becaus fader duk robert held hym lang realme thairfore solistit gudfader archebald erle dowglas pa wt hym ī france sone eftir ye said erlis past xm chosyn men france wer ressauit gret honour charlis ye vii king france eftir kyng put thair folkis ordinance maid erle douglas duk turyne wes ane nobill man howbeit wes vailȝeant yan fortunat ye mene tyme duk bedfurd lieutenand ye kīg inglād come gret army france eftir yat wyn mony townis villagis france segit ane toun namit lyuer brocht sic necessite ye capitane thairof gaif plegis rander inglismē gif gat na rescours within schort tyme kyng charllis knawand ye castell forsaid sic dangeir send duk lanson erlis buchquhan dowglas residew army rescours said hous afore yair cūin thay wer aduertist inglismen gottin ye hous randerit yame tane ane othir toun normandy namit warnol incōtinent thay went harnes arrayit thame plane nocht far fra ye toun quhen ye armyis wer reddy iune duk lanson richt inuyful yat scottis suld ryse ony landis honouris within france come away xxm men erlis douglas buchquhan nochtwithstanding treason ruschit forthwart pert curage thair ennymes faucht gret manheid deith nochtheles baith armyis scotland france wer finaly discomfist put flycht yi vnhappy battall wer slane iohne erle buchquhan constable france archebald erle douglas duke turyne lieutenand france archebald douglas son erle wigtoun mony scottis cumpany thair bodyis wer buryit gret lament pepill kirk sanct graciane within toun turyne franchemē wer slane erle uentodore sereif narbone mony othir wag • ouris cōmonis ye noumer vim thaym wer taikin ye marcheall france mony othir noblis eft discomfiture succedit gret calamite displeseir franchemen al boundis yair realme partis thairof vntakin vnsegit inglismen thus franchemen bene brocht vter rewyne wer nocht iane madin france cloithit baith mannis array hardiment ereckit kyng charlis fra extreme desolatioun esperance better fortoun yi madin come loryne frāce send nocht speciall fauour god quhais hardimēt happy victoryis kyng charlis recouerit realme eieckit inglismen boundis yairof bot last scho wes taikin luffingburgh ye burgū dianis▪ sald inglismen quhuilkis brocht hir sone eft roan quhare yai accusit hir socery incantationis▪ saying scho aganis thair lawis inst •• utionis bure armour mannis claithis vnder figour ane woman finalie tyranny inglismen wes sa gret thay wald heir nane hir reasonis excuse bot brint hir cruelly deith hir industry vassalage yai tynt ye dominion france scho confessit schortlie afore hir deith sa lang scho keippit hir virginite scho wes victoriꝰ euery battall ony experiēce euill fortoun fra scho wes corruppit scho wes maid sone pray hir ennymes tyme robert patillok come scotland ane army kyng charlis ye seuint recouerit sindry boūdis frāce • ut inglismennis handis wes callit thairfore inhabitantis thairof pittit • oy gasconȝe ¶and sa endis heir xvi buk thir croniklis heir begynnis xvii buk croniklis scotland ¶hovv iames ye first vvas redemit coronation actis ca primo eftir deith archebald erle douglas duke turyne haue schawin warnoll hame bot deceissit afore thay wer redemyt yi iames hꝭ singulare virtew mony freindis ingland amang quhilkis wer speciall maist tende • hym iohne bewfurd erle somersyde brothir ye cardinal ingland thir two nobill men mony gret princis ingland conuoyit hym bourdouris scotlād maryit ye said erlis douchter gat fra hym besyde mony goldin siluer veschell sindry riche precious hyngaris quhilkis war ye history hercules maist curiusly wrocht thus entrit prince iames scotland come • sonday lentern edinburgh quhare ressauit lordis scotland spirituall temporall maist honour gret confluence pepyl come hym partis scotland richt desirus se hī mony yame neuir sene hym afore elli leist prent visage yair memory howbeit yai war weil informit syngulare virtew mony ȝeris afore al sone solempnite pasche done come perth sone efter went scone quhare crownit lady iane duke mordo hary byschop sanct androis xxi day may fra redēption imiiiicxxiiii 〈◊〉 mony nobyl men come ingland iames first gat landis fra amang quh • ane namit andro gray quhilk rewardit syndry lādis hym rais ye surname grayis scotlād quhais posterite ꝑseueris ȝit amang w cled gret landꝭ honouris baith gowry angus sic thingis done ye kyng▪ returnit edinburgh sūmond yame io • ony auctorite duryng ye tyme duk robert duk mordo gouernouris first conuenit hym chancellar thesaurer ye clerk register ye comptrollar otheris yat bure ony chargis concerning kingis tentis last quhē lang compt found ye maist part landis rentis pertenyng ye crown waistit emis duke robert duke mordo gouernouris amang thair freindꝭ na thing left sustene crown except customes burrowis na thing content estate howbeit schew gud vult tyme al sone auisit al euidentis rollis pertenand crown set ane parlyament edinburgh auyse • thre estatis ordanit ane general tax • rasit throw ye realme xii p • nyis pound al landis scotland spirituall temporal iiii pennyis ilk kow ox hors ye space two ȝeris cum payment ranson taxt rasit first ȝeir bot secound rais sic murmur amang pure cōmonis yat remittit residew tuke neuir taxt scotland efter ye quhyll douchter maryit dalphine frāce▪ amang mony othir thingis done yi parliamēt ye pepyll complanit syndry oppressionis done yame duke mordois sonnis otheris gret men realme kyng incontinent gart arrest walter stewart son duke mordo malcolme flemyng cumernald thomas boid kylmarnok walter send ward ba bot mal • olme thomas war send ward dalkeith nochtheles ye king tuk ane easy compositioun yame money efter parteis war •• thit parliament king iames gaif hꝭ aith fidelite deba •• liberteis haly kirk end lyfe remanent baronis efter hym gaif thair aithis maner lang efter ane vthir counsall set perth quhilk kyng gart arrest duk mordo alexander son archebald thrid name erle douglas brothir wyllyam erle angus george erle marche adam hepburn halis mony othir gret baronis scotland put yame syndry castellis strenthꝭ remane ward quhil war auisit incontinent tuk castellis f • lkland doun menteith duk mordo send carlaurok duches put temptalloun ¶hovv duk murdo tvvo sonnis vvar iustif • ie kyng iames hovv • erle ca • hnes vvas slane inuerlochty erle mar vincust ca ii beltane day ȝeir nixt followyng callit inuentioun haly croce iames stewart thrid son duke mordo mouit gret ire fader brethir war haldin ī captiuite come wt ane gret power dunbritane brint efter slane iohn̄ stewart dūdonald xxxii men kyng richt cōmouit thir attemptatis followit yi iames sa fersly chasit ireland quhare deceissit v day efter war brocht ye king v complecis ye said iames yai war hyngit quarterit stryueling king cōtinewit parliament xviii day may striuelyng thair hym self sittand septoure swerd crown iugement walter stewart son aire duk mordo conuickit heidit afore ye castel morow duk mordo secund son alexander duncane stewart erle lanax war conuickit forfaltit crymis lese maieste heidit afore castell maner forefaltoure duk mordo sonnis erledomes fiffe menteith lanax come ye kingis handis remanent lordis gret baronis quhilkis war ward tyme kingis pleseir war richt affrayit herād ye scharp execution iustice maid duke mordo sonnis nochtheles thay war put liberte ane ȝeir efter recounsalit kingis fauoure nixt ȝeir quhilk fra redemption ane miiiicxxvii king tuk alexander lord ilis erle ro innernes morow war tane sindry wickit lymmaris oppressouris cuntre hyngit iebattis thrid day efter lord ilis accusit afore ye king intertenyng theuis bringing yame kingis iustice quhare thay mycht apprehendit becaus lord ilis promittit amend sic thingis tymes cumyng put liberte throw quhilk followit gret trubyll within dayis efter brint town innernes lay ithandly segeand ye castell thairof▪ quhyll finaly aduertist king cumand hym gret power thā fled ye ii last lord ye ilis seand sa mony pepyl lyand ilk day wait bring hym kingis iustice come dissagisit pure array fell kneis afore king halyrudhous pasche day quhare sittand hꝭ orison desirit grace saik ye rais ye day fra deith ye king requeist ye quene saiffit lyfe cōmandit hym remane quhil ye seruice war done yan ye king began muse gif restorityis alexand landꝭ honourꝭ ony forthir punition suld occasion conspi • e aganis hym tymes cumyng thairfore ye said alexander send schir williā douglas erle angus kingis sister son remane castell temptalloun yt na trubyll suld rise freindis eufame moder doucht walt sū tyme erle ro wardit sāct colmes inche scho ane gret solister hym attēpt sic besines aganis ye king nocht lang efter donald ballocht brothir said lord alexander ilis come ane gret power men lochquhaber erles mar cathnes saif ye cuntre fra trubyl come yair folkis faucht ye said donald inuerlochty quhare ye erle cathnes slane erle mar discō fist thꝰ returnit donald victory gret pray guddis ilis king incōtinent punis thir attemptatis come ane army dounstafage purposyng haue passit ye ilis thair met hym heidismen clannis •• airof excusyng thair offence saying thay war cōstranit aganis yair wyll pa ye said donald displeseir cuntre thir clannis war finaly tane fauour ye king sworn persew ye said donald ye deith lang efter donald fled ireland quhare slane heid brocht striueling king ¶of gret iustice done kyng iames first al partis scotland natiuite iames secund syndry actis done said noble prince iames first ca iii trubyll dantit maner foresaid king iames past throw al boundis realme punist mony strang lymmaris oppressouris pepyl deith na remissioun geuyn afore gouernour admittit afore iustice thay war expirit de • th attoure king thocht nocht pl • sand god proffitable cō mon weil sa mony slauchteris reiffis oppressionis done afore cuntre falt iustice wa • vnpunist said first two ȝeris regne iiim pepyll wa • slane iustice syndry auld crymes offēcis cōmittit aganis ye pepyll ȝeris afore yocht thꝭ punition apperit sufficiēt yneuch pepyll realme ȝit ane lymmer namit angꝰ duffe strathern come ane cūpany theuis tuk ane gret pray gudis murray cathnes incō tinent followit hym angꝰ murray gret power othir angus duffe na thing affrayit cumyng met hym ye maner strachnauern followit ane scharp battal f • chtin sic cruelte ylk syde yat xii personis war left onely lyue kyng iames herand yi slauchter said na le sorowfull slauchter men cathnes murray howbeit nane left lyue mycht punist offence thairof yi tyme ane othir gret lymmer namit makdonald ro quhilk grew spulȝeis heirschippis ye pepyl gret rich yi lymmer schod ane pure wed • hors schone becaus scho said scho suld gang king reuele wekit oppressiōis ¶als sone scho helit hir woūdis scho past ye king schew gret cruelteis done lymmer king maid sone efter sic deligence yat tuk makdonald xii hꝭ complecis punist yame maist schamefull deith ye thrid ȝeir efter quhilk fra redemption imiiiicxxx ye xvi day october iane ye quene delyuer two sonnis ani alexander iames first deceissit infance nixt iames secund quhilk succedit immediatly efter fader ye croun mony gret baronis lordis war present yair baptyme thair war • knicht • maid amang quhom first willyam son archebald erle douglas quhilk succedit eft ye erldome douglas ye nixt ȝeir efter king arrestit archebald erle douglas duke turyne held hym lang captiuite ward last supplication quene othir gret prelatis realme ye kyng remittit offencis put baith hym alexāder erle ro liberte al sone ye realme brocht gud tranquillite maner ya • iust mesuris concernyng ye interchange vittallis wyne aill othir 〈◊〉 y• war markit mark 〈◊〉 bailȝeis prouest war brokin occupiaris yair cōdampnit gret sowmes money last quhen reparit ye strēthꝭ realme siclike munitionis afferit veseit vniuersite sanct androis oftimes present thair generall disputationis tuk sic pleseir thair intyl dotat vniuersite syndry preuilegis gaif thaym power cheis maist perfit personis mycht put thaym gret prelacyis scotland thay vakit thus war men ay promouit benifices effering thair eruditioun knawlege yairfore maner virtew spred fast tyme aboue al othir commoditeis seruyce god incressit gret reuerence honour maist crafty musik ȝit occurris dayis nixt ȝeir quhilk fra saluation im▪ iiiicxxxi hary vi king ingland come paris crownit nostre dame kirk hauād bot xii ȝeris age ȝit ȝeris efter put baith fra empire ingland france come fugitiue kyng iames thrid quhome plesandly ressauit ȝit ane notabyl example ye vnstabyl vnsickir chance fortoun sen sum tyme kyng two maist pissant kīgdomes put fra yame baith constranit seke refuge vncouth pepyll ¶hovv bischop sanct androi • lang precheing dissuadit riottus custome bankettis ca iiii nocht lang efter wes ane parlyament perth amang mony othir actꝭ done thꝭ parlyament remoue ye surfet expensis maid riottus cheir bankettis quhilkis war brocht scotland inglismen hame cumyng king iames na le dammage mānis bodyis wasting yair guddis rais vp hary wardlaw bischop sanct androis said maner suppos mony nobyl werkꝭ maist wyse prince ar brocht realme thy cumyng iustice religion polesy mony othir gud lawis proffet common weill na thing pretermittit left vndone mycht proffet auance thy realme honest maneris vsit afore amang w thy wysdome confirmit al new bonteis appering amang w ar cū myn thy industry hir ye mair cure laudour ye thow he tane bring sic honest ꝯstitutio • amang w think thay suld ye mair deligently kepit yair ane lurkand pest fast burgeand sic irremediable vēnome ye gif yt samyn haistely remedyit thir commoditeis brocht thy cūyng yi realme salbe lytyll effect noblis yt sittis heir thy p̄sence he desirit tyl schaw mater yair name desire thy hyen • schaw thy wisdome al weill mater othir thingis ye done syndry nobyll men sic war thy freindis ī ingland ar cumin cuntre vnworthy haue thy fauour howbeit yai haue brocht yame maneris inglismen qu •• lkis ar richt dāmageus thy pepyll youcht thair maneris schamfully yair awin cuntre becaus yair pepil accustomit yair think ane gret syn cut thy pepyll sic vennomus maneris mene thir superflew costlye coursis metis yt thay persuade mē eit drink mair sufficient nuttsing nature wyll thow considder temperance vsit amang oure auld faderis thow sall fynd na thing sa contrarius thairto new glotony brocht amang w ȝit wait quhid der sorrowfull pest • •• myn amang w mair awin defalt defalt inglismen considder haue geuyn place yairto sone ȝit quhatsumeuir way vnhappy custome cum amang w contempnit mony vicis followis thair apon sic ar intemperance lust sleuth reif waisting gudis gif tēperāce nurisar al virtew intē perance moder tyl al vice fo • lust intemperance ar sa knit togidder thay may na wayis seuerit fra othir yt seruand wambe man obey al thingis yt desiris followis lust wambe defloration virginis adultre incest thir mischeu • vennome ȝoung mē followis onely superflewite • drinkꝭ fra ane man geuin ani plesei • wambe becumis ydill ony thocht thingis cū ay ye mair yat ye ingyne man geuyn thairto mair feirsly rynnis tyl euery kynd vice yocht ane mā haue waistit patrimony sic superflew meitis drinkis ȝit vennome yt swelleis fenȝeit pleseir thairof sal neuir seuir fra hī quhil deid thir siclik wordis bischop hary dissuadit king pepyl fra al superflew coursis immoderat bankettis nochtheles intemperance risyn sa insatiabil voracite • na foule ye air fische ye see ar sufficient satify ye hungry appetite gl • tonis quhill yair wambe sa boldin thay may draw thair aynd mony othir siclik skaith •• dayly fallyng yame se experience ☞ sege roxburgh hovv ye king brocht mony craftismen realme hovv paule cravv vva • brint ye charturaris perth foundit ca v ye ȝeir ye xvii day iuny ane roxburgh scottis war nowmerit army iicm men futmen caragemen last quhen kyng lyue ye sege foresaid xv dayis waistit al munittoun powder returnit hame ony mair felicite succeding hꝭ army sone efter returnyng army deceissit robert cardin bischop dū keld efter quhome succedit bischop iames kennedy kyngis syster son gottyn countes angꝰ within ii ȝeir efter trāslatit sait sanct androis kyng iames craftismē slane weris nocht lang efter tane sanct androis ane man beum namit paule craw precheand new vane superstitionis pepyl specially aganis sacrament alter ueneration sanctis confession maid preistis last brocht afore theologis al opinionis condampnit becaus perseuerit obstinatly end pley condampnit brint confessit afore deith send beum preiche scottis ye herisyis hus wiccleif king thyng suld vnknawin hym realme last quhen considderit maneris thair banketting r • preuit thaym becaus thay suff • ri • men pay thai • houssis efter yat thay war callyt thair dy • naris supparis ¶at tyme foundit abbay charturaris monkis beside perth gret magnificence kyng iames nixt ȝeir come ambassatouris scotland fra kyng hary desyryng band france dissoluir betuix▪ scottis franchemen promittyng gyf counsall scotland wald assent yairto geif ouir berwik landis lyand betuix tweid recroce northumberland kyng knawyng nocht bot dissait thair promittis depeschit yame ony mair cōmonyng thay materis ¶hovv erle marche vvas forc • faltit syndry vassalagis done erle mar gret industry vvisdome ca vi ȝeir fra incarnation thousand iiii hundred xxxiii ȝeris king tuke george dunbar son erle marche rebellit aganis king robert thrid fader wardit hym castell edinburgh ¶and sone efter send wylliam erle angus wyllyam creichtoun chancellar adam hepburn halis scharp wryttyngis ye capitanis keparis yairof delyuer ye said castel ony tary yair handis yus ye castel rā drit ony mair tary ye king incō tinent set ane parliamēt perth thair george erle marche forefaltit ye treasonabyl rebellion george fad aganis king robert thrid way failȝeit ye nobyl anciant hous ye erldome marche quhilk flurisit sa mony ȝeris gret defence munition realme small offence brocht nocht kyng mouit sum miseration within schort tyme efter gaif ye erldome buchquhan said george ane ȝeirlye pension iiiic markis payit hym said erledome marche pension brukit said george patrik sonne quhyl cumyng kyng iames ye secound perfite age ye ȝeir deceissit alexāder stewart erle mar alexander ane bastart son alexander erle buchquhan afore rehersit quhilk son king robert secound ane man syngular virtew tender ȝeris se • e • eodium quhen tane phil • yp duke burgundie grit glore wan said iornay maryit • lady namit iane coūtes holland nochtheles put fra hir vncert • ne quhethir come ye said countes becaus scho ane othir husband becaus inhabitantis desirit nocht 〈◊〉 myngit vncouth • lude within schort tyme efter returnit scotland send seruandis holland desyring ye proffet land becaus gat nocht bot repuls thairof held con • inewall weris hollandaris quhill thay war constranit pleis hym proffettis bygane tuke peace scot • ane hundreth ȝeris erle • r ane richt industrius ciuill man brocht ungary scotland syndry gret hors •• spreid cuntre thair genus • io • thus cuntre within ȝeris efter fillit ful gret hors howbeit afore tyme nocht bot small naggis realme wise erle wisdome maid lieute •• ād al ye north scotland buryit dankeld efter deith al landis rich conques war confiscat ye kingis handis becaus gottin vnlauchfull bed ¶hovv denmark scotland vvar aggret al deb • ti • hovv kīg iames douchter margaret vvas maryit dalphine france▪ hovv perse vvas discōfist douglas piperden ca vii lang afore tyme ane herald send king denmark scotland desiring ye ȝeirly tribute aucht hym mony ȝeris bygane ilis accordyng promes maid king alexander thrid sone efter send king schir wyllyam creichtoun denmark quhare dressit materꝭ sa plesandly nocht followit efter bot gud peace amite betuix two realmes danis scottis tyme send ambassatouris charlis vii renew band betuix scotland france roborat ye samyn mair permanent felicite margaret eldest douchter ye said king iames wes geuyn mariage lowis daulphine france gret prouysion maid schippīs mony ye grettest noblis scotland send cōuoy hir france ane c xl ladyis matronis virginis amang quhom v sisterꝭ ye said margaret ferther quhen yi prouision maid schippis reddy ye wyndis come ane herald inglād desirand kyng nocht send douchter france schew gyf war repugnant thairto douchter suld tane hir cumpany inglismen lyand see abiding hir cumyng kyng iames nochtwithstanding bost mynassing inglismen cōmandit marineris pull vp salis mair deligence ye mene tyme inglismen yat lay wait taking ye said margaret hir cumpany auēture come apon ane flote spanȝeartis quhare gret slauchter othir side ye mene tyme quhē thay war fechtand maist feirsly scottis nauy come throw seys ony sycht ennymes landit turyne quhare thay war ressauit gret triumphe king charlis mariage maid solempnitly betuix son lowis dalphin said margaret quhyl sic thingis war done france scotland hary perse northumbirland come iiiim men scotland vncertane quhidder come awin kyngis auctorite wyllyam douglas erle angus resist inuasion come ane cūpany chosyn men amang quhom war adā hepburn halis alexand ramsay dalhoussy alexander elphinstoun yat ylk met ye said hary perse piperdene quhare fochtin cruelly gret slauchter al sydis bot last scottis war victorius battall war slane scottis alexander elphinstoun ye ylk iic gentylmen cōmonis scotland ye said aduersar war slane hary cliddisdale iohn̄ ogil richard perse wt xvc inglismē quhilkꝭ xl war knychtꝭ yame war tane iiic brocht scotland ¶of slauchter kyng iames first punition yat vvas maid yairfore syndry meruellis sene albion ca viii gret myscheif sorow followit scotland efter discomfitour inglismen piperden hid wachsing walter stewart erle athole quhilk pretendit ay ane richt crown reason yat gottyn king robert ye secund first wyfe erle schew afore ye genology stewardis principal mouar robert duk albany sla dauid steward duk rothesay efter hame cumyng iames first solistit said kyng slay duk mordo othir duk robertis lynnage traisting quhē thir nobyll men war put fynd sum hyd way slay kyng barnis mycht thairefter succede crown becaus duke robertis sonnis war deceissit sum thaym slane battal uernoll otheris iustifyit kyng iames perswadit robert stewart nepot robert grahame cousyn slay kyng robert afore kyngis horne syndry gret offensis done hym aganis kingis auctorite na thing mair hatrent kyng thir vnhappy tratouris lyand said wait espy ganand tyme fulfyll thair cursit purpos come sone efter ye blak freris perth quhare ye kyng lugit ye tyme licence portaris thay enterit ye kingis hall purposyng haue remanit thair quhyll cumyng ane othir familiar seruand kyng haue gottyn entres kingis secret chalmar way participant thaym said treasoun ȝit afore ye cumyng yi man ane seruant namit walter straroun opnit dure went furth ressaue wyne kyngis collation al sone saw thaym aufully arrayit dure cryit treason maid hym strenth return agane nochtheles sone slane ȝit slayng hym maid sic tary laif yat ane ȝoung madyn namit katherine douglas quhilk efter maryit alexander louell bolunny slekit dure becaus ye bar away yat suld haue closit • ure scho schot hir arme place quhare bar suld haue passit scho bot ȝoung hir bonis 〈◊〉 thairfore hir arme sone • rokin schonder ye dure doung 〈◊〉 force incontinent thay • nte •• efter yat thay slane •• miliar seruandis yat maid debait 〈◊〉 tyme thay slew king •• ny cruell woundis hurt •• ene defence principall man yt maid debait yi tyme patrik dunbar brothir george ••• quhill erle marche le • deid chalmer defence prince wes myn sta • u • e braid schulderit smal wais • membris sa weil proporcionat yt na thing failȝeit hym yat mycht geuyn nature ane maist virtuous princis yt euir afore dayis richt iust life scharp punisar vice slane ye xxi day februar xliiii ȝeir aige xiii ȝeir regne fra redemption ane miiiicxxxvi ȝeris body buryit abbay charteraris quhilk fundit schort tyme afore deith nobillis rycht sorowfull hꝭ slauchter maid gret deligence sercheing thir forenamit tratouris quhill last thay war apprehendit brocht edinburgh quhair thay war punist maner ¶the erle athole quhylk pryncypall mouar treason first spulȝeit claithis saif onely ane lynnyn curche hyd priuat memberis incontinent maid ane instrument tre lyke drawer ane wel efter thay festenit ane cart thay band erle apon point said drawer ȝeid ye said cart throw ye toun sum tyme rasand tratour ya • pepyl micht se hym hie ye aire leit hym fall doun ane swak apon gait syne brocht hym ane place▪ quhare maist confluence pepyll crownit hym hait yrne ane weche said suld crownit kyng afore deith thir illusionis causit hym leif ay vnder vane esperance conques crown morow yi erle harlit complicis throw streitis town ye thrid day wambe opnit bowellis tane furth cassyn flichtrand fyre afore ene efter al tormentꝭ hert tane body cassyn ye fyre heid schorne fra hꝭ body body quarterit nepot robert stewart punist ye maner robert grahame principall slayar king harlit throw town ane cart hand slew king bound thairto hait yrne schot throw al partis hꝭ body specially quhare ya • beleuit na haisly deid following efter gret punition tane hym demandit durst sa bald sla kyng answerit bot foly demād quhat ane mā dar durst said leip hell howbeit heuyn hell war chois wayis condingly punist maner ye tyme scotland eneas siluius ambassatour eugenius ye iiii pape ye name ane mā mony letteris send ye said pape trete peace betuix inglismen scottꝭ yi eneas wes eft syngular virtew maid pape rome nochyeles quhē erādis maist besaly scotland come yi inuy fortoun yt prince slane fra saw hym deid said ye scottis war worthy ioys ony kingdomes honouris bot gif thay condigly punist ye kingis slaucht cō mendit yame gretūly quhen saw sa scharp punition maid slauchter tyme kyng iames ye first war sindry meruellis sene albion ane sow hir lytter wt dog heidis ane calfe sene ane hors heid ane comet apperit lang afore kingis deith 〈◊〉 bemes sa vehement frost ye winter afore ye wyne ail sauld pound wechtis meltit agane fyre ane swerd sene fleand air na le terroure admiration pepyl sa endis heir xvii buke thir croniklis ☞ ¶the epistil direckit ye trāslatoure kyngis grace erasmus roterodamus buke namit institutioun cristin kyngis schawis maist nobyl prince na thing mair admiration werkis kingis quhilkis ar sa patent sicht pepyll euery man he thaym mouth thair cōmendation repreif thus may na thyng sa fruteful dant ye cōmoun errouris pepyll honest vixtewis life kingis ye lyfe kingis drawis yair subdittis imitation yair werkis worthy vnworthy cumis lycht impulsion fortoun na thing sufferis hyd forthir euery history yat men redis apperis euidently maneris ye pepyl quhilkis ar vsit kyng sen na thing yt pepyl followis mair imitation kepi mair recent memory thā werkis nobil men reason thair besines suld mair respondent virtew thā ony othir estatis amang mony knichtly exercitionis vsit nobyl princis fynd nane mair proffitable yame thā frequent reding thir othir historyis yame may found mony hailsome documentis attoure frute history sa necessare yt ye dedis forcy campionis suddandly euanissis contrar effect thairof causis thay thingis quhilkis ar mony ȝerꝭ gone appere al recent memory thay war bot recently done thairfore said moral poete horace eildis awin cuntre following sic thingꝭ bene done afore laik experience bot ane barne thir reasonis 〈◊〉 yt he bene ȝour humyl seruitour senȝour first infāce he trāslatit ye history scotland sen ye first begynnyng thairof ȝour vulgar langage▪ yat ȝour h • ene may knaw ye vailȝeant nobyl dedis done ȝour progenitouris haue cognasance realme he bene gouernit thir xviiic ȝeris bygane quhilk neuir subdewit vncouth empire bot ye natiue princis yairof howbeit ye he sustenit gret truble weris romani inglismē danis wt sindry chācis fortoun heir may ȝour hienes vndstand ȝour realme suld gouernit iustice quhat ꝑsonꝭ ar maist abil beir auctorite office yair intil seand mony ȝour eldarꝭ degenerat fra virtew efter yt thay war accumpanyi • ȝoung insolent pepyll vane fleschouris quhilkis na regard weil honoure thair prince bot onely thair awne cōmoditeis dout bot ye maner ar mony personis dependyng ȝour hienes vennomit auarice ȝoure grace assa •• ȝe na thing sa dāmagius ȝour honoure princely estate bot salbe weill commendit thaym gif thay f • nd ȝour wyl pleseir set yairto nochtheles ȝoure hienes cumyn • ow sic perfection ȝe vnderstand weill quhay bene presently •• sari quha best suffaris ȝour • ommoun weil sen ȝour mai • ste 〈◊〉 manheid wisdome he 〈…〉 region brocht 〈◊〉 rest gud peace trāquil ••• e howbeit samyn couth nocht 〈◊〉 done ȝour gret baronis 〈◊〉 • ender aige apperis thairfore 〈◊〉 nobyll worthy deidis pro •• dis mai • naturall inclinatioun actiue cu • age ony gudly pe • suasioun assisteris yocht • hienes dotat gif • nature he bene sene afore ony othir prince traist ferme •• gif sic preemin • nt giftis nature 〈◊〉 vnwa • ly abusit na werkis sall follow worthy haue memory ¶thairfore souera •• dare baldly afferme na othir besines sall mair fruitfull ȝour hienes thā frequent reding thir siclik historyis sic thingis sall nocht onely moue ȝow imitation virtew bot sall infound na le experience wisdome thā ȝe war trauellit throw warld agit lang pr •• e ȝeris seand sa mony exemplis virtewis vi • ius leuing sic illuster dedis armis gif ȝour • eldaris possedit prudence equaualent thair innatiue manheid▪ na pepyl reason mycht haue bene preferrit thaym marciall glore mair lenth apperis • edyng history heir sall ȝoure grace vnderstand inuiolatly faith crist he bene obseruit ȝoure progenitouris neuir abarrand fra sicker religion piete heir sal bra • differēce knawin betuix kingis tyrānis seneca sayis tragideis ar nocht kingis bene clothit purpour diademe bot onely thay sekis na singulare proffet dammage thair cōmoun weill sa vigilant ye life yair subdittis mair deir precius thaym yair awin lyfe ane tyrane sekis ryches ane king sekis honoure conquest virtew ane tyrane gouernis realme slauchter dredoure falset ane king gidis hꝭ realme prudence integrite fauour ane tyrane suspeckis thaym tha • he rich gret dominioun auctorite gret rentis ane king haldis sic men maist helply frei • dis ane tyrane luffis nane bot vane fleschou • ꝭ vicius wickit lymma • quhais counsall rage slauchter tyranny ane king luffis men wisdome grauite science knawing weill gret materis may weill dressit thair prudence tr • uth ye kyngis tyranni he mony handis mony ene▪ mony mo membrꝭ ane tyrane settis hym dr • ane kīg • u • fit ane tyrane reiosis make pepyll pu • e ane king mak yame riche ane tyrane drawis hꝭ pepyl syndry factionis discord hatrent ane king makꝭ peace tranquillite concord knawing na thing • dammagious di • ision amang subditis ane tyrane confoundis diuine humane lawis ane kyng obseruis thaym reiosis equite iustice thir properteis salbe patent reding ye lyuis gud euyl kingis ye history p̄cedent yus may ȝour hienes haue gret cōmodite pleseir foresaid storie quhat thing may mair plesand thā se yi present volume ane cleir myrroure variance tyme bygane syndry chācis fortoun bludy fechtyng terribyll berganis sa mony ȝeris continewit defence ȝour realme liberte quhilk fallyn ȝour hienes gret felicite howbeit ye samyn he oftymes bene ransonit wt maist nobyll blude ȝoure antecessouris quhat wyl nocht reiose heir ye knichtly affaris thay forcy campionis king robert bruce wyllyam wallace first innatiue desyre recouer realme brocht sic calamite yat mony dayis durst nocht appeir sicht pepyl bot amang desertis leuād rutis herbes esperance better fortoun bot last singulare manheid come sic preeminent glore yt reput maist vailȝeant nobyl prince yat wes efter empire yi othir small begynnyng feirs curage corporall strenth put inglismen scotland bot al befeir hꝭ aufull visage put edward king ingland flicht held bordouris fornence scotland waist siclik mony othir vailȝeant princis he bene realme caratak galdꝰ kēneth gregour fergus mony otheris precedent history youcht sum ȝour progenitouris war degenerat fra virtew followis lytyll admiration romane empriouris mony war vicious nero caligula helyogabalꝰ domicius cō modꝰ uttellius mony otheris youcht thair vicius dedis bene abhominabyll thair posterite ȝit ye deploration thair calamite sall moue redaris imitatioun virtew neuir hard bot ane man vicious life he ane vicious ending▪ nocht onely kyngis princis bene deieck fra thair imperial estait quhen thay war aberrant fra virtuous discipline bot mony nobyll baronis maner▪ quhen thay proude insolence war repugnāt thair superiour traist yairfore souerayne ȝour hienes wil put na le eloquence thā grauite memory haue fame deseruis presently yi life beseikand glorius mercyfull lord geif ȝow grace perseueir sic felicite yt ȝoure subdittis may haue sufficient motiue desyre ȝour hienes lang lyue ¶the quhilk mot grant gratius god amen ¶finis epistole ❧ heir endis hystory croniklis scotland cosmography dyscription thairof compill • noble clerk maister hector boece channon aberdene translatit laitly vulgar commoun langage maister iohne bellenden archedene murray imprentit edinburgh thomas dauidson prenter kyngis nobyll grace ☞cvm privilegio▪ ☜
